translated_keywords: 凝缩体;植物生物学;细胞功能;组织发育;胁迫反应;植物特异;生物化学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 植物细胞与其他真核细胞共享多种生物凝聚体，但同时也存在越来越多的植物特异性凝聚体以支持不同的细胞功能。在不同植物组织中运作的凝聚体有助于发育和胁迫响应等方面。若要查看此 SnapShot，请打开或下载 PDF 文件。
authors: Fang Xiaofeng; Li Pilong
title: SnapShot: Condensates in plant biology.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 凝缩体;植物生物学;细胞功能;组织发育;胁迫反应;植物特异;生物化学;分子生物学
translated_title: 植物生物学中的冷凝体。
abstract: Plant cells share a number of biological condensates with cells from other eukaryotes. There are, however, a growing number of plant-specific condensates that support different cellular functions. Condensates operating in different plant tissues contribute to aspects of development and stress responses. To view this SnapShot, open or download the PDF.
affiliations: School of Life Sciences, Tsinghua University, Beijing, China. Electronic address: xffang@tsinghua.edu.cn.; School of Life Sciences, Tsinghua University, Beijing, China; State Key Laboratory of Membrane Biology, Tsinghua University, Beijing, China; Beijing Frontier Research Center for Biological Structure, Tsinghua University, Beijing, China; Tsinghua-Peking Center for Life Sciences, Beijing, China. Electronic address: pilongli@tsinghua.edu.cn.

translated_keywords: 基因组学;生物多样性保护;适应潜力;转化思维;参考基因组;政策制定者;纵向监测;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 《全球生物多样性框架》的一项关键行动是维持所有物种的遗传多样性，以保障其适应潜力。为实现这一目标，需要将一种致力于将基础研究成果转化为直接实际效益的转化思维应用于生物多样性保护。尽管关于基因组学对保护价值的讨论很多，但生成基因组资源的研究人员与将其应用于生物多样性管理的实践者之间仍然存在脱节。随着全球对非模式物种参考基因组构建工作的努力不断增加，对实用生物多样性应用的投资至关重要。理解种群和多物种多样性以及长期监测等应用需要得到支持，同时政策制定者也需要接受教育，以便将这些数据整合到基于证据的决策中。如果不进行这样的投资，利用基因组学彻底改变全球生物多样性保护的机会将无法完全实现。
authors: Hogg Carolyn J
title: Translating genomic advances into biodiversity conservation.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组学;生物多样性保护;适应潜力;转化思维;参考基因组;政策制定者;纵向监测;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 将基因组学进展转化为生物多样性保护
abstract: A key action of the new Global Biodiversity Framework is the maintenance of genetic diversity in all species to safeguard their adaptive potential. To achieve this goal, a translational mindset, which aims to convert results of basic research into direct practical benefits, needs to be applied to biodiversity conservation. Despite much discussion on the value of genomics to conservation, a disconnect between those generating genomic resources and those applying it to biodiversity management remains. As global efforts to generate reference genomes for non-model species increase, investment into practical biodiversity applications is critically important. Applications such as understanding population and multispecies diversity and longitudinal monitoring need support alongside education for policymakers on integrating the data into evidence-based decisions. Without such investment, the opportunity to revolutionize global biodiversity conservation using genomics will not be fully realized.
affiliations: School of Life & Environmental Sciences, The University of Sydney, Sydney, NSW, Australia. carolyn.hogg@sydney.edu.au.

translated_keywords: 深度学习;群体遗传学;基因组数据;人口结构;种群历史推断;自然选择;统计推断;生物信息学;分子进化
translated_abstract: 在群体遗传学中，不同物种和种群的大规模基因组数据的出现为利用统计推断理解驱动遗传多样性的进化力量提供了新的机遇。然而，群体基因组学时代在分析海量基因组和变异方面带来了新的挑战。深度学习在涉及大规模数据的众多应用中表现出最先进的性能。近年来，深度学习方法在群体遗传学中越来越受欢迎；借助大规模基因组数据集、强大的计算硬件以及复杂的深度学习架构的出现，这些方法被用于识别群体结构、推断种群历史并研究自然选择。本文介绍了常见的深度学习架构，并提供了实施用于群体遗传推断的深度学习模型的全面指南。我们还讨论了在群体遗传学中应用深度学习的当前挑战和未来方向，重点关注效率、鲁棒性和可解释性。
authors: Huang Xin; Rymbekova Aigerim; Dolgova Olga; Lao Oscar; Kuhlwilm Martin
title: Harnessing deep learning for population genetic inference.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 深度学习;群体遗传学;基因组数据;人口结构;种群历史推断;自然选择;统计推断;生物信息学;分子进化
translated_title: 利用深度学习进行群体遗传推断
abstract: In population genetics, the emergence of large-scale genomic data for various species and populations has provided new opportunities to understand the evolutionary forces that drive genetic diversity using statistical inference. However, the era of population genomics presents new challenges in analysing the massive amounts of genomes and variants. Deep learning has demonstrated state-of-the-art performance for numerous applications involving large-scale data. Recently, deep learning approaches have gained popularity in population genetics; facilitated by the advent of massive genomic data sets, powerful computational hardware and complex deep learning architectures, they have been used to identify population structure, infer demographic history and investigate natural selection. Here, we introduce common deep learning architectures and provide comprehensive guidelines for implementing deep learning models for population genetic inference. We also discuss current challenges and future directions for applying deep learning in population genetics, focusing on efficiency, robustness and interpretability.
affiliations: Department of Evolutionary Anthropology, University of Vienna, Vienna, Austria. xin.huang@univie.ac.at.; Human Evolution and Archaeological Sciences (HEAS), University of Vienna, Vienna, Austria. xin.huang@univie.ac.at.; Department of Evolutionary Anthropology, University of Vienna, Vienna, Austria.; Human Evolution and Archaeological Sciences (HEAS), University of Vienna, Vienna, Austria.; Integrative Genomics Laboratory, CIC bioGUNE - Centro de Investigación Cooperativa en Biociencias, Derio, Biscaya, Spain.; Institute of Evolutionary Biology, CSIC-Universitat Pompeu Fabra, Barcelona, Spain. oscar.lao@ibe.upf-csic.es.; Department of Evolutionary Anthropology, University of Vienna, Vienna, Austria. martin.kuhlwilm@univie.ac.at.; Human Evolution and Archaeological Sciences (HEAS), University of Vienna, Vienna, Austria. martin.kuhlwilm@univie.ac.at.

translated_keywords: variant calling; benchmarking; long reads; de novo assembly; pangenomes; human genome; telomere-to-telomere assembly; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: 从DNA测序中进行遗传变异检测已使数十万人类种系变异得以理解。测序技术和变异检测方法快速发展，通常能够在人类基因组的大部分区域提供可靠的变异信息。本文描述了长读长技术、深度学习、从头组装以及泛基因组在解决越来越具有挑战性的重复基因组区域（包括医学相关的区域）中的进展，并探讨了新的基准数据集和基准方法如何揭示这些技术的优势与局限性。最后，本文展望了在端粒到端粒的人类基因组参考组装完成以及人类泛基因组构建之后，对人类基因组变异进行全面表征的可能性，并讨论了评估这些新可及的重复区域和复杂变异所需的创新方法。
authors: Olson Nathan D; Wagner Justin; Dwarshuis Nathan; Miga Karen H; Sedlazeck Fritz J; Salit Marc; Zook Justin M
title: Variant calling and benchmarking in an era of complete human genome sequences.
keywords: (Auto-generated) variant calling; benchmarking; long reads; de novo assembly; pangenomes; human genome; telomere-to-telomere assembly; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_title: 在完整人类基因组序列时代下的变异 Calling 与基准测试
abstract: Genetic variant calling from DNA sequencing has enabled understanding of germline variation in hundreds of thousands of humans. Sequencing technologies and variant-calling methods have advanced rapidly, routinely providing reliable variant calls in most of the human genome. We describe how advances in long reads, deep learning, de novo assembly and pangenomes have expanded access to variant calls in increasingly challenging, repetitive genomic regions, including medically relevant regions, and how new benchmark sets and benchmarking methods illuminate their strengths and limitations. Finally, we explore the possible future of more complete characterization of human genome variation in light of the recent completion of a telomere-to-telomere human genome reference assembly and human pangenomes, and we consider the innovations needed to benchmark their newly accessible repetitive regions and complex variants.
affiliations: Material Measurement Laboratory, National Institute of Standards and Technology, Gaithersburg, MD, USA.; UC Santa Cruz Genomics Institute, University of California Santa Cruz, Santa Cruz, CA, USA.; Baylor College of Medicine, Human Genome Sequencing Center, Houston, TX, USA.; The MITRE Corporation, McLean, VA, USA.; Material Measurement Laboratory, National Institute of Standards and Technology, Gaithersburg, MD, USA. jzook@nist.gov.

translated_keywords: 单细胞基因组;遗传变异;细胞状态;人类疾病;数据整合;诊断与治疗;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 单细胞基因组技术正在以前所未有的分辨率揭示组织中的细胞组成、身份和状态。如今，这些技术已经发展到可以对数千个个体的群体样本进行分析的程度。将单细胞信息与这种规模的基因型数据相结合，为将遗传变异与人类生物学和疾病关键方面的细胞过程联系起来提供了机会。这一策略在疾病诊断、风险预测以及治疗方案开发方面具有潜在意义。然而，有效整合大规模单细胞基因组数据、遗传变异及额外表型数据，需要在数据生成和分析方法上取得进展。随着单细胞遗传学作为一个独立领域开始兴起，我们回顾了该领域的现状、面临的挑战以及未来的机会。
authors: Cuomo Anna S E; Nathan Aparna; Raychaudhuri Soumya; MacArthur Daniel G; Powell Joseph E
title: Single-cell genomics meets human genetics.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 单细胞基因组;遗传变异;细胞状态;人类疾病;数据整合;诊断与治疗;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 单细胞基因组学与人类遗传学相结合
abstract: Single-cell genomic technologies are revealing the cellular composition, identities and states in tissues at unprecedented resolution. They have now scaled to the point that it is possible to query samples at the population level, across thousands of individuals. Combining single-cell information with genotype data at this scale provides opportunities to link genetic variation to the cellular processes underpinning key aspects of human biology and disease. This strategy has potential implications for disease diagnosis, risk prediction and development of therapeutic solutions. But, effectively integrating large-scale single-cell genomic data, genetic variation and additional phenotypic data will require advances in data generation and analysis methods. As single-cell genetics begins to emerge as a field in its own right, we review its current state and the challenges and opportunities ahead.

translated_keywords: 植物泛基因组;作物改良;生物多样性;进化;野生近缘种;驯化植物;环境适应;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 植物基因组序列编目了基因及其调控表达的遗传元件。这样的基因目录服务于多种研究目标，从绘制驯化植物表型多样性分子基础图谱，到探究数百万年前开花植物进化创新的起源。过去二十年DNA测序技术的变革性进展使研究人员能够更加轻松地对更多基因组进行测序。泛基因组——即一个物种或更高分类单元多个个体的完整序列——现已纳入遗传学家的研究工具箱。作物植物及其野生近缘种的基因组正以育种应用为导向进行研究。此外，泛基因组在生态和进化研究中也具有适用性，因为它们有助于分类和监测生命之树中的生物多样性，加深我们对植物物种分化机制的理解，并揭示植物如何适应环境变化或人类施加的新选择压力。
authors: Schreiber Mona; Jayakodi Murukarthick; Stein Nils; Mascher Martin
title: Plant pangenomes for crop improvement, biodiversity and evolution.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 植物泛基因组;作物改良;生物多样性;进化;野生近缘种;驯化植物;环境适应;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 植物泛基因组在作物改良、生物多样性和进化中的应用
abstract: Plant genome sequences catalogue genes and the genetic elements that regulate their expression. Such inventories further research aims as diverse as mapping the molecular basis of trait diversity in domesticated plants or inquiries into the origin of evolutionary innovations in flowering plants millions of years ago. The transformative technological progress of DNA sequencing in the past two decades has enabled researchers to sequence ever more genomes with greater ease. Pangenomes - complete sequences of multiple individuals of a species or higher taxonomic unit - have now entered the geneticists' toolkit. The genomes of crop plants and their wild relatives are being studied with translational applications in breeding in mind. But pangenomes are applicable also in ecological and evolutionary studies, as they help classify and monitor biodiversity across the tree of life, deepen our understanding of how plant species diverged and show how plants adapt to changing environments or new selection pressures exerted by human beings.
affiliations: Department of Biology, University of Marburg, Marburg, Germany.; Leibniz Institute of Plant Genetics and Crop Plant Research (IPK) Gatersleben, Seeland, Germany.; Martin Luther University Halle-Wittenberg, Halle (Saale), Germany.; Leibniz Institute of Plant Genetics and Crop Plant Research (IPK) Gatersleben, Seeland, Germany. mascher@ipk-gatersleben.de.; German Centre for Integrative Biodiversity Research (iDiv) Halle-Jena-Leipzig, Leipzig, Germany. mascher@ipk-gatersleben.de.

translated_keywords: 基因组学;灵长类动物;进化;疾病;功能基因组;单细胞技术;诱导多能干细胞;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 灵长类基因组学是理解人类进化和疾病的根本基础的关键。然而，目前只有少数现存的500多种灵长类物种具有遗传多样性和功能基因组数据集。大规模的努力正在进行中，以表征灵长类基因组、遗传多态性和分歧以及灵长类系统发育中的功能景观。由此产生的数据集将能够连接基因型与表型，并为灵长类特征（包括人类疾病）的遗传学提供新的见解。在本综述中，我们描述了现有的基因组组装以及遗传变异和功能基因组数据集。我们还强调了样本获取的一些挑战。最后，我们探讨了单细胞功能基因组学和诱导多能干细胞衍生类器官技术的进步将如何促进我们对灵长类生物学分子基础的理解。
authors: Juan David; Santpere Gabriel; Kelley Joanna L; Cornejo Omar E; Marques-Bonet Tomas
title: Current advances in primate genomics: novel approaches for understanding evolution and disease.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组学;灵长类动物;进化;疾病;功能基因组;单细胞技术;诱导多能干细胞;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 理解进化与疾病的新方法
abstract: Primate genomics holds the key to understanding fundamental aspects of human evolution and disease. However, genetic diversity and functional genomics data sets are currently available for only a few of the more than 500 extant primate species. Concerted efforts are under way to characterize primate genomes, genetic polymorphism and divergence, and functional landscapes across the primate phylogeny. The resulting data sets will enable the connection of genotypes to phenotypes and provide new insight into aspects of the genetics of primate traits, including human diseases. In this Review, we describe the existing genome assemblies as well as genetic variation and functional genomic data sets. We highlight some of the challenges with sample acquisition. Finally, we explore how technological advances in single-cell functional genomics and induced pluripotent stem cell-derived organoids will facilitate our understanding of the molecular foundations of primate biology.

translated_keywords: 遗传变异；参考基因组；种群基因组学；图模型；生物多样性；保护基因组学；泛基因组；生物信息学；分子生物学
translated_abstract: 完整的遗传变异数据集是生物多样性基因组学研究的关键。长读长测序技术使得高度连续且单倍型解析的参考基因组的常规组装成为可能。然而，即使完整无缺，单一个体的参考基因组也可能导致下游分析出现偏差，并无法充分代表种群或物种内的遗传多样性。通过将来自同一群体、物种或属的多个高质量基因组的序列信息整合到一个单一参考中，构建的泛基因组图谱可以克服这种表征偏差。本文综述了构建、可视化和操作泛基因组图谱的可用工具和数据结构，同时提供了实用示例，并讨论了其在生命之树中不同类群的生物多样性和保护基因组学中的应用。
authors: Secomandi Simona; Gallo Guido Roberto; Rossi Riccardo; Rodríguez Fernandes Carlos; Jarvis Erich D; Bonisoli-Alquati Andrea; Gianfranceschi Luca; Formenti Giulio
title: Pangenome graphs and their applications in biodiversity genomics.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 遗传变异；参考基因组；种群基因组学；图模型；生物多样性；保护基因组学；泛基因组；生物信息学；分子生物学
translated_title: 泛基因组图及其在生物多样性基因组学中的应用
abstract: Complete datasets of genetic variants are key to biodiversity genomic studies. Long-read sequencing technologies allow the routine assembly of highly contiguous, haplotype-resolved reference genomes. However, even when complete, reference genomes from a single individual may bias downstream analyses and fail to adequately represent genetic diversity within a population or species. Pangenome graphs assembled from aligned collections of high-quality genomes can overcome representation bias by integrating sequence information from multiple genomes from the same population, species or genus into a single reference. Here, we review the available tools and data structures to build, visualize and manipulate pangenome graphs while providing practical examples and discussing their applications in biodiversity and conservation genomics across the tree of life.
affiliations: Laboratory of Neurogenetics of Language, the Rockefeller University, New York, NY, USA.; Department of Biosciences, University of Milan, Milan, Italy.; Department of Biotechnology and Biosciences, University of Milano-Bicocca, Milan, Italy.; Centre for Ecology, Evolution and Environmental Changes (CE3C) and CHANGE, Global Change and Sustainability Institute, Departamento de Biologia Animal, Faculdade de Ciências, Universidade de Lisboa, Lisboa, Portugal.; Faculdade de Psicologia, Universidade de Lisboa, Lisboa, Portugal.; The Vertebrate Genome Laboratory, New York, NY, USA.; Department of Biological Sciences, California State Polytechnic University, Pomona, Pomona, CA, USA.; The Vertebrate Genome Laboratory, New York, NY, USA. gformenti@rockefeller.edu.

translated_keywords: 参考基因组;序列映射;lift-over;全基因组图谱;变异检测;精准医学;参考转换;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 完整的端粒到端粒（T2T）基因组组装有望改进分析并发现新的变异，但许多重要的基因组资源仍然与较旧的参考基因组相关联。因此，需要在不同参考基因组之间转换基因组特征和读段比对结果。本文介绍了一种名为levioSAM2的方法，该方法利用全基因组图谱在基因组组装之间进行快速且准确的转换。除了支持使用多个参考基因组外，我们还证明了将读段比对到高质量参考基因组（例如T2T-CHM13）并将其转换到较旧的参考基因组（例如基因组参考联盟（GRC）h38）可以提高旧参考基因组上变异调用的准确性。通过利用T2T-CHM13的质量提升，levioSAM2相比基于GRC的映射，在真实短读和长读数据集上减少了小变异和结构变异的错误调用。特别是在一组复杂的医学相关基因中，性能得到了显著改善，而这些基因在GRC参考基因组中的质量较低。
authors: Chen Nae-Chyun; Paulin Luis F; Sedlazeck Fritz J; Koren Sergey; Phillippy Adam M; Langmead Ben
title: Improved sequence mapping using a complete reference genome and lift-over.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 参考基因组;序列映射;lift-over;全基因组图谱;变异检测;精准医学;参考转换;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 基于完整参考基因组和lift-over的序列映射改进
abstract: Complete, telomere-to-telomere (T2T) genome assemblies promise improved analyses and the discovery of new variants, but many essential genomic resources remain associated with older reference genomes. Thus, there is a need to translate genomic features and read alignments between references. Here we describe a method called levioSAM2 that performs fast and accurate lift-over between assemblies using a whole-genome map. In addition to enabling the use of several references, we demonstrate that aligning reads to a high-quality reference (for example, T2T-CHM13) and lifting to an older reference (for example, Genome reference Consortium (GRC)h38) improves the accuracy of the resulting variant calls on the old reference. By leveraging the quality improvements of T2T-CHM13, levioSAM2 reduces small and structural variant calling errors compared with GRC-based mapping using real short- and long-read datasets. Performance is especially improved for a set of complex medically relevant genes, where the GRC references are lower quality.

translated_keywords: 基因表达;基因组演化;多倍体化;序列分歧;纤维品质;泛基因组;亚基因组;生物信息学;植物遗传学
translated_abstract: 多倍化是物种形成和进化的重要驱动力，然而，多倍体与祖先二倍体在特定性状上的平行选择的基因组基础仍未被探索。本文通过构建50个遗传多样性广泛的样本的基因组组装，建立了基于图的二倍体（A2）和异源四倍体（AD1）棉花物种泛基因组。我们描绘了四倍体栽培种的镶嵌基因组图谱，展示了半野生型对现代栽培种的基因组贡献。泛基因组比较确定了二倍体和四倍体棉花之间同源和高度分化的变异区域，并暗示了可能与两个亚基因组中对比性基因组大小变化相关的序列进化过程。我们强调了二倍体中占43%的多倍化后基因表达的遗传调控关系，并具体鉴定了六个未充分研究的收敛遗传位点，这些位点对纤维质量的平行选择有贡献。本研究为解析生物体内可取性状平行选择的遗传调控成分提供了框架。
authors: Li Jianying; Liu Zhenping; You Chunyuan; Qi Zhengyang; You Jiaqi; Grover Corrinne E; Long Yuexuan; Huang Xianhui; Lu Sifan; Wang Yuejin; Zhang Sainan; Wang Yawen; Bai Ruizhe; Zhang Mengke; Jin Shuangxia; Nie Xinhui; Wendel Jonathan F; Zhang Xianlong; Wang Maojun
title: Convergence and divergence of diploid and tetraploid cotton genomes.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因表达;基因组演化;多倍体化;序列分歧;纤维品质;泛基因组;亚基因组;生物信息学;植物遗传学
translated_title: 二倍体与四倍体棉花基因组的趋同与趋异
abstract: Polyploidy is an important driving force in speciation and evolution; however, the genomic basis for parallel selection of a particular trait between polyploids and ancestral diploids remains unexplored. Here we construct graph-based pan-genomes for diploid (A2) and allotetraploid (AD1) cotton species, enabled by an assembly of 50 genomes of genetically diverse accessions. We delineate a mosaic genome map of tetraploid cultivars that illustrates genomic contributions from semi-wild forms into modern cultivars. Pan-genome comparisons identify syntenic and hyper-divergent regions of continued variation between diploid and tetraploid cottons, and suggest an ongoing process of sequence evolution potentially linked to the contrasting genome size change in two subgenomes. We highlight 43% of genetic regulatory relationships for gene expression in diploid encompassing sequence divergence after polyploidy, and specifically characterize six underexplored convergent genetic loci contributing to parallel selection of fiber quality. This study offers a framework for pan-genomic dissection of genetic regulatory components underlying parallel selection of desirable traits in organisms.
affiliations: National Key Laboratory of Crop Genetic Improvement, Hubei Hongshan Laboratory, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan, China.; Department of Ecology, Evolution, and Organismal Biology, Iowa State University, Ames, IA, USA.; Key Laboratory of Oasis Ecology Agricultural of Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, Agricultural College, Shihezi University, Shihezi, China.; National Key Laboratory of Crop Genetic Improvement, Hubei Hongshan Laboratory, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan, China. xlzhang@mail.hzau.edu.cn.; National Key Laboratory of Crop Genetic Improvement, Hubei Hongshan Laboratory, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan, China. mjwang@mail.hzau.edu.cn.

translated_keywords: 基因组结构;遗传多样性;结构变异;端粒到端粒组装;酿酒酵母;单倍型;水平基因转移;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 泛基因组能够全面反映物种的遗传多样性，包括序列多态性和结构变异（SV）。本文构建了酿酒酵母参考组装面板（ScRAP），其中包括代表该物种系统发育和生态多样性的142株菌株的高质量参考基因组。ScRAP 包含了几株杂合二倍体和多倍体分离株的单倍型分阶段组装。我们鉴定出大约4800个非冗余的SV，这些变异提供了对基因组多样性的广泛视角，包括端粒长度动态和转座元件的变化。研究发现复杂非整倍体现象频繁发生，其中大染色体经历了大规模缺失和易位。我们还发现SV可以影响断点附近的基因表达，并在基因库的进化中发挥重要作用。此外，我们发现水平获得的区域插入到染色体末端并可生成新的端粒。总体而言，ScRAP 展示了泛基因组在理解种群规模下基因组进化方面的优势。
authors: O'Donnell Samuel; Yue Jia-Xing; Saada Omar Abou; Agier Nicolas; Caradec Claudia; Cokelaer Thomas; De Chiara Matteo; Delmas Stéphane; Dutreux Fabien; Fournier Téo; Friedrich Anne; Kornobis Etienne; Li Jing; Miao Zepu; Tattini Lorenzo; Schacherer Joseph; Liti Gianni; Fischer Gilles
title: Telomere-to-telomere assemblies of 142 strains characterize the genome structural landscape in Saccharomyces cerevisiae.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组结构;遗传多样性;结构变异;端粒到端粒组装;酿酒酵母;单倍型;水平基因转移;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 端粒到端粒组装的142株系揭示了酿酒酵母基因组结构景观。
abstract: Pangenomes provide access to an accurate representation of the genetic diversity of species, both in terms of sequence polymorphisms and structural variants (SVs). Here we generated the Saccharomyces cerevisiae Reference Assembly Panel (ScRAP) comprising reference-quality genomes for 142 strains representing the species' phylogenetic and ecological diversity. The ScRAP includes phased haplotype assemblies for several heterozygous diploid and polyploid isolates. We identified circa (ca.) 4,800 nonredundant SVs that provide a broad view of the genomic diversity, including the dynamics of telomere length and transposable elements. We uncovered frequent cases of complex aneuploidies where large chromosomes underwent large deletions and translocations. We found that SVs can impact gene expression near the breakpoints and substantially contribute to gene repertoire evolution. We also discovered that horizontally acquired regions insert at chromosome ends and can generate new telomeres. Overall, the ScRAP demonstrates the benefit of a pangenome in understanding genome evolution at population scale.

translated_keywords: UniAligner;序列比对;参数-free;罕见子字符串;进化关系;人类着丝粒;高突变率;重复序列;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 尽管“完整基因组学”的最新进展揭示了之前无法触及的基因组区域，但对着丝粒及其他超长串联重复序列（ETRs）变异的分析仍面临算法上的挑战，因为目前尚无用于准确比较ETRs序列的工具。出人意料的是，经典的比对方法，如Smith-Waterman算法，在构建ETRs的生物合理比对时也遭遇失败。我们提出了UniAligner——一种无需参数且具有序列依赖性评分的序列比对算法，该算法能够自动针对任何一对被比较的序列调整其评分策略。UniAligner优先考虑稀有子字符串的匹配，这些匹配更可能与两条序列之间的进化关系相关。我们将UniAligner应用于估算人类着丝粒中的突变率，并量化了着丝粒中大规模复制和缺失的极高发生率。这一高发生率表明，就结构组织而言，着丝粒可能是人类基因组中一些进化速度最快的区域之一。
authors: Bzikadze Andrey V; Pevzner Pavel A
title: UniAligner: a parameter-free framework for fast sequence alignment.
keywords: (Auto-generated) UniAligner;序列比对;参数-free;罕见子字符串;进化关系;人类着丝粒;高突变率;重复序列;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 一种无参数的快速序列比对框架
abstract: Even though the recent advances in 'complete genomics' revealed the previously inaccessible genomic regions, analysis of variations in centromeres and other extra-long tandem repeats (ETRs) faces an algorithmic challenge since there are currently no tools for accurate sequence comparison of ETRs. Counterintuitively, the classical alignment approaches, such as the Smith-Waterman algorithm, fail to construct biologically adequate alignments of ETRs. We present UniAligner-the parameter-free sequence alignment algorithm with sequence-dependent alignment scoring that automatically changes for any pair of compared sequences. UniAligner prioritizes matches of rare substrings that are more likely to be relevant to the evolutionary relationship between two sequences. We apply UniAligner to estimate the mutation rates in human centromeres, and quantify the extremely high rate of large duplications and deletions in centromeres. This high rate suggests that centromeres may represent some of the most rapidly evolving regions of the human genome with respect to their structural organization.
affiliations: Graduate Program in Bioinformatics and Systems Biology, University of California, San Diego, La Jolla, CA, USA.; Department of Computer Science and Engineering, University of California, San Diego, La Jolla, CA, USA. ppevzner@ucsd.edu.

translated_keywords: Setaria; pan-genome; 基因家族; 结构变异; 图谱基因组; 标记辅助育种; 环境适应性; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: 狗尾草（*Setaria italica*）是东亚农业的起源作物之一，也是研究C4光合作用以及开发适应多气候育种方法的模式植物。本文通过对全球收集的样本进行代表性基因组组装，构建了狗尾草泛基因组。该泛基因组由73,528个基因家族组成，其中核心基因、软核心基因、可变基因和特有基因分别占23.8%、42.9%、29.4%和3.9%；同时检测到202,884个非冗余结构变异。泛基因组变异的特征分析表明其在狗尾草驯化和改良中的重要性，例如通过识别产量相关基因*SiGW3*发现了一个伴随基因表达变化的366 bp启动子存在/缺失变异。我们还开发了一种基于图的基因组，并对来自13个环境下的68个农艺性状进行了大规模遗传学研究，在不同地理位点鉴定了可用于狗尾草改良的潜在基因。这些成果可用于标记辅助育种、基因组选择和基因编辑，从而加速不同气候条件下作物的改良。
authors: He Qiang; Tang Sha; Zhi Hui; Chen Jinfeng; Zhang Jun; Liang Hongkai; Alam Ornob; Li Hongbo; Zhang Hui; Xing Lihe; Li Xukai; Zhang Wei; Wang Hailong; Shi Junpeng; Du Huilong; Wu Hongpo; Wang Liwei; Yang Ping; Xing Lu; Yan Hongshan; Song Zhongqiang; Liu Jinrong; Wang Haigang; Tian Xiang; Qiao Zhijun; Feng Guojun; Guo Ruifeng; Zhu Wenjuan; Ren Yuemei; Hao Hongbo; Li Mingzhe; Zhang Aiying; Guo Erhu; Yan Feng; Li Qingquan; Liu Yanli; Tian Bohong; Zhao Xiaoqin; Jia Ruiling; Feng Baili; Zhang Jiewei; Wei Jianhua; Lai Jinsheng; Jia Guanqing; Purugganan Michael; Diao Xianmin
title: A graph-based genome and pan-genome variation of the model plant Setaria.
keywords: (Auto-generated) Setaria; pan-genome; 基因家族; 结构变异; 图谱基因组; 标记辅助育种; 环境适应性; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_title: 基于图模型的模式植物狗尾草基因组和泛基因组变异研究
abstract: Setaria italica (foxtail millet), a founder crop of East Asian agriculture, is a model plant for C4 photosynthesis and developing approaches to adaptive breeding across multiple climates. Here we established the Setaria pan-genome by assembling 110 representative genomes from a worldwide collection. The pan-genome is composed of 73,528 gene families, of which 23.8%, 42.9%, 29.4% and 3.9% are core, soft core, dispensable and private genes, respectively; 202,884 nonredundant structural variants were also detected. The characterization of pan-genomic variants suggests their importance during foxtail millet domestication and improvement, as exemplified by the identification of the yield gene SiGW3, where a 366-bp presence/absence promoter variant accompanies gene expression variation. We developed a graph-based genome and performed large-scale genetic studies for 68 traits across 13 environments, identifying potential genes for millet improvement at different geographic sites. These can be used in marker-assisted breeding, genomic selection and genome editing to accelerate crop improvement under different climatic conditions.

translated_keywords: pangenome graph; Minigraph-Cactus; genome alignments; genetic variation; Human Pangenome Reference Consortium; CHM13 reference; Drosophila melanogaster; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: 泛基因组参考通过存储一组具有代表性的多样化单倍型及其比对信息（通常以图的形式表示）来解决参考基因组的偏差问题。变异调用器确定的替代等位基因可以用于构建泛基因组图，但长读长测序技术的进步正在推动高质量、高相位组装的广泛应用。直接从组装数据构建泛基因组图而非基于变异调用的方式，能够更好地利用图结构在不同尺度上表示遗传变异的能力。本文介绍了一种名为Minigraph-Cactus的泛基因组管道，该方法可以直接从全基因组比对中构建泛基因组图，并展示了其在处理来自人类泛基因组参考联盟的90个单倍型时的可扩展性。该方法能够在构建过程中包含所有类型的遗传变异，同时兼容现有的比对和基因分型工具。我们评估了泛基因组分析中所使用参考基因组的质量和完整性对其结果的影响，并证明使用端粒到端粒联盟提供的CHM13参考基因组可以提高我们的方法的准确性。此外，我们还展示了如何构建黑腹果蝇（*Drosophila melanogaster*）的泛基因组图谱。
authors: Hickey Glenn; Monlong Jean; Ebler Jana; Novak Adam M; Eizenga Jordan M; Gao Yan; Human Pangenome Reference Consortium; Marschall Tobias; Li Heng; Paten Benedict
title: Pangenome graph construction from genome alignments with Minigraph-Cactus.
keywords: (Auto-generated) pangenome graph; Minigraph-Cactus; genome alignments; genetic variation; Human Pangenome Reference Consortium; CHM13 reference; Drosophila melanogaster; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_title: 基于Minigraph-Cactus的基因组比对构建泛基因组图谱
abstract: Pangenome references address biases of reference genomes by storing a representative set of diverse haplotypes and their alignment, usually as a graph. Alternate alleles determined by variant callers can be used to construct pangenome graphs, but advances in long-read sequencing are leading to widely available, high-quality phased assemblies. Constructing a pangenome graph directly from assemblies, as opposed to variant calls, leverages the graph's ability to represent variation at different scales. Here we present the Minigraph-Cactus pangenome pipeline, which creates pangenomes directly from whole-genome alignments, and demonstrate its ability to scale to 90 human haplotypes from the Human Pangenome Reference Consortium. The method builds graphs containing all forms of genetic variation while allowing use of current mapping and genotyping tools. We measure the effect of the quality and completeness of reference genomes used for analysis within the pangenomes and show that using the CHM13 reference from the Telomere-to-Telomere Consortium improves the accuracy of our methods. We also demonstrate construction of a Drosophila melanogaster pangenome.

translated_keywords: 个性化泛基因组;参考偏倚;变异检测;读段映射;局部单倍型采样;k-mer计数;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: //github.com/vgteam/vg）中的Giraffe短读比对器，并使用人类泛基因组参考联盟的人类泛基因组图，将其准确性与最先进的方法进行了比较。与Genome Analysis Toolkit相比，该方法将小变异基因分型错误减少了四倍，并使已知变异的短读结构变异基因分型结果与长读变异发现方法具有竞争力。
authors: Sirén Jouni; Eskandar Parsa; Ungaro Matteo Tommaso; Hickey Glenn; Eizenga Jordan M; Novak Adam M; Chang Xian; Chang Pi-Chuan; Kolmogorov Mikhail; Carroll Andrew; Monlong Jean; Paten Benedict
title: Personalized pangenome references.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 个性化泛基因组;参考偏倚;变异检测;读段映射;局部单倍型采样;k-mer计数;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 个性化泛基因组参考
abstract: Pangenomes reduce reference bias by representing genetic diversity better than a single reference sequence. Yet when comparing a sample to a pangenome, variants in the pangenome that are not part of the sample can be misleading, for example, causing false read mappings. These irrelevant variants are generally rarer in terms of allele frequency, and have previously been dealt with by filtering rare variants. However, this blunt heuristic both fails to remove some irrelevant variants and removes many relevant variants. We propose a new approach that imputes a personalized pangenome subgraph by sampling local haplotypes according to k-mer counts in the reads. We implement the approach in the vg toolkit ( https://github.com/vgteam/vg ) for the Giraffe short-read aligner and compare its accuracy to state-of-the-art methods using human pangenome graphs from the Human Pangenome Reference Consortium. This reduces small variant genotyping errors by four times relative to the Genome Analysis Toolkit and makes short-read structural variant genotyping of known variants competitive with long-read variant discovery methods.

内部核糖体进入位点

translated_abstract: 遗传信息在转译阶段的实施策略复杂性使其成为最难理解却又最引人入胜的研究领域之一。显然，这种多样化的策略不仅源于漫长的进化历史，而且对基因表达的精炼和代谢调控具有至关重要的意义。这一观点尤其适用于那些主要表现出生化和生理反应而缺乏行为反应的生物体。植物就是这类生物体的一个典型代表。应对不利的环境条件在植物生理学中起着关键作用，这一点在全球变暖加剧以及自然生态系统的不可逆损失或退化背景下尤为明显。从概念上讲，植物对非生物胁迫的响应包含一系列复杂且精细的策略，这些策略受到多种非生物胁迫因子的影响，并通过分子遗传机制微调代谢途径，使植物能够克服非标准和非最佳的生长条件。本文旨在综述当前关于非生物胁迫条件下植物转译调控领域的研究进展。我们将按时间顺序评估不同的调控元件和模式，并强调关注研究转录阶段遗传信息动态变化的重要高通量技术的重要性。
authors: Suhorukova Aleksandra V; Sobolev Denis S; Milovskaya Irina G; Fadeev Vitaliy S; Goldenkova-Pavlova Irina V; Tyurin Alexander A
title: A Molecular Orchestration of Plant Translation under Abiotic Stress.
keywords: IRES; abioitic stress; G-qudruplex; codon bias; 5′-UTR; uORF; plant translation
translated_title: 非生物胁迫下植物翻译的分子调控
abstract: The complexities of translational strategies make this stage of implementing genetic information one of the most challenging to comprehend and, simultaneously, perhaps the most engaging. It is evident that this diverse range of strategies results not only from a long evolutionary history, but is also of paramount importance for refining gene expression and metabolic modulation. This notion is particularly accurate for organisms that predominantly exhibit biochemical and physiological reactions with a lack of behavioural ones. Plants are a group of organisms that exhibit such features. Addressing unfavourable environmental conditions plays a pivotal role in plant physiology. This is particularly evident with the changing conditions of global warming and the irrevocable loss or depletion of natural ecosystems. In conceptual terms, the plant response to abiotic stress comprises a set of elaborate and intricate strategies. This is influenced by a range of abiotic factors that cause stressful conditions, and molecular genetic mechanisms that fine-tune metabolic pathways allowing the plant organism to overcome non-standard and non-optimal conditions. This review aims to focus on the current state of the art in the field of translational regulation in plants under abiotic stress conditions. Different regulatory elements and patterns are being assessed chronologically. We deem it important to focus on significant high-performance techniques for studying the genetic information dynamics during the translation phase.
affiliations: Laboratory of Functional Genomics, Timiryazev Institute of Plant Physiology, Russian Academy of Sciences, 127276 Moscow, Russia.

translated_keywords: 大麦;结构变异;泛基因组;基因拷贝数变异;适应性演化;粉痂病抗性;支链调控因子;淀粉酶家族扩张;发育调控;农艺性状;生物信息学;植物遗传学
translated_abstract: 泛基因组是包含一个物种多个个体注释基因组序列的集合。这些数据集揭示的结构性变异对作物植物的遗传分析具有重要价值。本文报道了大麦的一个泛基因组，该泛基因组包括76个野生和栽培基因组的长读长序列组装以及1,315个基因型的短读长序列数据。这项研究扩展了作物中序列变异的目录，其中包括富含基因拷贝数变异的结构复杂位点。为了展示泛基因组的实用性，我们重点关注了四个与抗病性、植物结构、营养释放和毛状体发育相关的位点。在粉孢病抗性位点发现了新的等位变异，并在营养枝调节因子中检测到种群特异性拷贝数增加。在优质酿造大麦中，淀粉水解酶家族的扩张与微型酿造试验中的酶活性变化相关联。删除增强子基序可能改变大麦籽粒上毛状体的发育轨迹。我们的研究结果表明，结构复杂位点的等位多样性可能帮助作物植物适应农业生态系统的新型选择压力。

title: Structural variation in the pangenome of wild and domesticated barley.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 大麦;结构变异;泛基因组;基因拷贝数变异;适应性演化;粉痂病抗性;支链调控因子;淀粉酶家族扩张;发育调控;农艺性状;生物信息学;植物遗传学
translated_title: 野生和栽培大麦泛基因组的结构变异
abstract: Pangenomes are collections of annotated genome sequences of multiple individuals of a species1. The structural variants uncovered by these datasets are a major asset to genetic analysis in crop plants2. Here we report a pangenome of barley comprising long-read sequence assemblies of 76 wild and domesticated genomes and short-read sequence data of 1,315 genotypes. An expanded catalogue of sequence variation in the crop includes structurally complex loci that are rich in gene copy number variation. To demonstrate the utility of the pangenome, we focus on four loci involved in disease resistance, plant architecture, nutrient release and trichome development. Novel allelic variation at a powdery mildew resistance locus and population-specific copy number gains in a regulator of vegetative branching were found. Expansion of a family of starch-cleaving enzymes in elite malting barleys was linked to shifts in enzymatic activity in micro-malting trials. Deletion of an enhancer motif is likely to change the developmental trajectory of the hairy appendages on barley grains. Our findings indicate that allelic diversity at structurally complex loci may have helped crop plants to adapt to new selective regimes in agricultural ecosystems.

translated_keywords: 中国少数民族;泛基因组;参考序列;结构变异;单核苷酸变异;人群遗传学;新发序列;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 人类基因组学正在经历从单一参考序列到泛基因组形式的范式转变，但亚洲血统的人群代表性不足。本文介绍了中国泛基因组联盟第一阶段的数据，包括基于58个核心样本（代表36个少数民族）的116个高质量单倍型分相从头组装数据集。这些核心组装数据平均具有30.65×的高保真长读长测序覆盖度、超过35.63兆碱基的N50连续性以及3.01吉碱基的总大小，相比GRCh38增加了1.89亿个常染色体多态性序列碱基和1,367个蛋白编码基因拷贝数。我们鉴定出1,590万个小型变异和78,072个结构变异，其中590万个小型变异和34,223个结构变异未在最近发布的泛基因组参考中报告。中国泛基因组联盟的数据表明，在代表性不足的少数民族个体中纳入样本可以显著增加新序列和缺失序列的发现。这些缺失的参考序列富集了源自古老等位基因的遗传信息以及与角化作用、紫外线辐射反应、DNA修复、免疫反应和寿命相关的功能基因，这暗示了其在揭示人类进化和复杂疾病映射中缺失遗传率方面的巨大潜力。
authors: Gao Yang; Yang Xiaofei; Chen Hao; Tan Xinjiang; Yang Zhaoqing; Deng Lian; Wang Baonan; Kong Shuang; Li Songyang; Cui Yuhang; Lei Chang; Wang Yimin; Pan Yuwen; Ma Sen; Sun Hao; Zhao Xiaohan; Shi Yingbing; Yang Ziyi; Wu Dongdong; Wu Shaoyuan; Zhao Xingming; Shi Binyin; Jin Li; Hu Zhibin; Chinese Pangenome Consortium (CPC); Lu Yan; Chu Jiayou; Ye Kai; Xu Shuhua
title: A pangenome reference of 36 Chinese populations.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 中国少数民族;泛基因组;参考序列;结构变异;单核苷酸变异;人群遗传学;新发序列;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 36个中国人群的泛基因组参考数据
abstract: Human genomics is witnessing an ongoing paradigm shift from a single reference sequence to a pangenome form, but populations of Asian ancestry are underrepresented. Here we present data from the first phase of the Chinese Pangenome Consortium, including a collection of 116 high-quality and haplotype-phased de novo assemblies based on 58 core samples representing 36 minority Chinese ethnic groups. With an average 30.65× high-fidelity long-read sequence coverage, an average contiguity N50 of more than 35.63 megabases and an average total size of 3.01 gigabases, the CPC core assemblies add 189 million base pairs of euchromatic polymorphic sequences and 1,367 protein-coding gene duplications to GRCh38. We identified 15.9 million small variants and 78,072 structural variants, of which 5.9 million small variants and 34,223 structural variants were not reported in a recently released pangenome reference1. The Chinese Pangenome Consortium data demonstrate a remarkable increase in the discovery of novel and missing sequences when individuals are included from underrepresented minority ethnic groups. The missing reference sequences were enriched with archaic-derived alleles and genes that confer essential functions related to keratinization, response to ultraviolet radiation, DNA repair, immunological responses and lifespan, implying great potential for shedding new light on human evolution and recovering missing heritability in complex disease mapping.

translated_keywords: 癌症基因组;精准肿瘤学;全基因组测序;候选驱动基因;临床相关突变;计算化学基因组分析;化合物靶点;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 对癌症患者进行基因组分析正日益被视为指导治疗的必要步骤。为了探索全基因组测序（WGS）在扩大可能接受精准治疗的癌症范围方面的价值，我们分析了英国10万基因组计划招募的35种癌症类型的10,478名患者的全基因组测序数据。我们确定了330个候选驱动基因，其中包括74个在任何癌症中都是新的基因。我们估计，大约55%的研究患者携带至少一个具有临床意义的突变，这些突变可以预测对某些治疗的敏感性或耐药性，或者临床试验的资格。通过执行癌症突变的计算化学基因组学分析，我们还确定了额外的化合物靶点，这些化合物是未来临床试验有吸引力的候选药物。这项研究迄今为止是识别现实世界中癌症驱动基因并评估其对精准肿瘤学指导影响的最大规模努力之一。
authors: Kinnersley Ben; Sud Amit; Everall Andrew; Cornish Alex J; Chubb Daniel; Culliford Richard; Gruber Andreas J; Lärkeryd Adrian; Mitsopoulos Costas; Wedge David; Houlston Richard
title: Analysis of 10,478 cancer genomes identifies candidate driver genes and opportunities for precision oncology.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 癌症基因组;精准肿瘤学;全基因组测序;候选驱动基因;临床相关突变;计算化学基因组分析;化合物靶点;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 分析10,478个癌症基因组鉴定候选驱动基因及精准肿瘤学机遇
abstract: Tumor genomic profiling is increasingly seen as a prerequisite to guide the treatment of patients with cancer. To explore the value of whole-genome sequencing (WGS) in broadening the scope of cancers potentially amenable to a precision therapy, we analysed whole-genome sequencing data on 10,478 patients spanning 35 cancer types recruited to the UK 100,000 Genomes Project. We identified 330 candidate driver genes, including 74 that are new to any cancer. We estimate that approximately 55% of patients studied harbor at least one clinically relevant mutation, predicting either sensitivity or resistance to certain treatments or clinical trial eligibility. By performing computational chemogenomic analysis of cancer mutations we identify additional targets for compounds that represent attractive candidates for future clinical trials. This study represents one of the most comprehensive efforts thus far to identify cancer driver genes in the real world setting and assess their impact on informing precision oncology.
affiliations: Division of Genetics and Epidemiology, The Institute of Cancer Research, London, UK.; University College London Cancer Institute, University College London, London, UK.; Department of Medical Oncology, Dana-Farber Cancer Institute, Boston, MA, USA.; Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard, Cambridge, MA, USA.; Harvard Medical School, Boston, MA, USA.; Centre for Immuno-Oncology, Nuffield Department of Medicine, University of Oxford, Oxford, UK.; Systems Biology & Biomedical Data Science Laboratory, University of Konstanz, Konstanz, Germany.; Division of Molecular Pathology, The Institute of Cancer Research, London, UK.; Division of Cancer Therapeutics, The Institute of Cancer Research, London, UK.; Manchester Cancer Research Centre, University of Manchester, Manchester, UK.; Division of Genetics and Epidemiology, The Institute of Cancer Research, London, UK. richard.houlston@icr.ac.uk.

translated_keywords: 基因组编辑;泛基因组;基因复制;旁系同源;表型预测;基因功能;驯化基因家族;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 泛基因组学和基因编辑技术正在革新全球作物的育种工作。一个重要的机遇在于在主要作物（即在全球范围内种植的作物）与地方作物（即在特定区域内本地种植的作物）之间交换基因型到表型的知识，以增强我们的食物系统。然而，物种特异性的遗传变异及其与自然或工程突变的相互作用构成了实现可预测表型效应的障碍，即使是在相关作物之间也是如此。在这里，通过建立富含作物的茄属的泛基因组，并整合功能基因组学和泛遗传学，我们发现基因复制及其随后的旁系同源多样化是基因型到表型可预测性的主要障碍。尽管在包括13种地方作物在内的22个物种的染色体规模参考中，基因的大尺度共线性得到了广泛保守，但数千个基因复制，特别是在关键驯化基因家族内，其序列、表达和功能表现出动态轨迹。通过将非洲茄子品种纳入我们的泛基因组，并应用数量遗传学和基因组编辑，我们剖析了影响果实大小的旁系同源演化复杂历史。经典果实大小调节因子CLAVATA3（CLV3）的一个冗余旁系同源物的丢失被谱系特异性串联复制所补偿。随后，衍生拷贝的假基因化以及大型品种特异性缺失形成了一个单一融合的CLV3等位基因，该等位基因与控制相同性状的酶促基因一起调控果实器官数量。我们的研究结果表明，在较短时间内发生的旁系同源多样化是性状可进化性中的未充分探索的条件。揭示并导航这些条件对于跨物种转化基因型到表型关系至关重要。
authors: Benoit Matthias; Jenike Katharine M; Satterlee James W; Ramakrishnan Srividya; Gentile Iacopo; Hendelman Anat; Passalacqua Michael J; Suresh Hamsini; Shohat Hagai; Robitaille Gina M; Fitzgerald Blaine; Alonge Michael; Wang Xingang; Santos Ryan; He Jia; Ou Shujun; Golan Hezi; Green Yumi; Swartwood Kerry; Karavolias Nicholas G; Sierra Gina P; Orejuela Andres; Roda Federico; Goodwin Sara; McCombie W Richard; Kizito Elizabeth B; Gagnon Edeline; Knapp Sandra; Särkinen Tiina E; Frary Amy; Gillis Jesse; Van Eck Joyce; Schatz Michael C; Lippman Zachary B
title: Solanum pan-genetics reveals paralogues as contingencies in crop engineering.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组编辑;泛基因组;基因复制;旁系同源;表型预测;基因功能;驯化基因家族;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 茄属泛基因组学揭示旁系同源基因在作物工程中的 contingency 作用
abstract: Pan-genomics and genome-editing technologies are revolutionizing breeding of global crops1,2. A transformative opportunity lies in exchanging genotype-to-phenotype knowledge between major crops (that is, those cultivated globally) and indigenous crops (that is, those locally cultivated within a circumscribed area)3-5 to enhance our food system. However, species-specific genetic variants and their interactions with desirable natural or engineered mutations pose barriers to achieving predictable phenotypic effects, even between related crops6,7. Here, by establishing a pan-genome of the crop-rich genus Solanum8 and integrating functional genomics and pan-genetics, we show that gene duplication and subsequent paralogue diversification are major obstacles to genotype-to-phenotype predictability. Despite broad conservation of gene macrosynteny among chromosome-scale references for 22 species, including 13 indigenous crops, thousands of gene duplications, particularly within key domestication gene families, exhibited dynamic trajectories in sequence, expression and function. By augmenting our pan-genome with African eggplant cultivars9 and applying quantitative genetics and genome editing, we dissected an intricate history of paralogue evolution affecting fruit size. The loss of a redundant paralogue of the classical fruit size regulator CLAVATA3 (CLV3)10,11 was compensated by a lineage-specific tandem duplication. Subsequent pseudogenization of the derived copy, followed by a large cultivar-specific deletion, created a single fused CLV3 allele that modulates fruit organ number alongside an enzymatic gene controlling the same trait. Our findings demonstrate that paralogue diversifications over short timescales are underexplored contingencies in trait evolvability. Exposing and navigating these contingencies is crucial for translating genotype-to-phenotype relationships across species.

translated_keywords: 分生组织病毒排除；抗病毒免疫； shoot apex meristem（可译为顶端分生组织）；RNA干扰；植物干细胞
translated_abstract: 未分化植物和动物干细胞对于细胞、组织以及器官的分化、发育和生长至关重要。它们具有不同于专化细胞的特殊抗病毒免疫特性。与动物干细胞相比，本文讨论了植物干细胞如何防御病毒入侵及其相关机制。
authors: Li Jie; Hong Elizabeth; Zhang Pengcheng; Tör Mahmut; Zhao Jianjun; Jackson Stephen; Hong Yiguo
title: Antiviral defense in plant stem cells.
keywords: meristem virus exclusion; antiviral immunity; shoot apical meristem; RNAi; plant stem cell
translated_title: 植物干细胞的抗病毒防御机制
abstract: Undifferentiated plant and animal stem cells are essential for cell, tissue, and organ differentiation, development, and growth. They possess unusual antiviral immunity which differs from that in specialized cells. By comparison to animal stem cells, we discuss how plant stem cells defend against viral invasion and beyond.

translated_keywords: 植物免疫;效应子;生态位建立;植物病原体;细胞外空间;宿主防御;水分与营养竞争;植物病理学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 植物的细胞外空间，即所谓的细胞外基质（apoplast），是多种微生物的栖息地。鉴于这一区室的重要性，植物和微生物都试图控制、利用并响应其组成成分。当感知到细胞外基质环境时，病原体会激活毒力程序，包括输送效应蛋白，这些效应蛋白在抑制植物免疫方面具有明确的作用。我们认为，效应蛋白的另一个关键且基础的功能是生态位建立——具体而言，通过操控植物生理过程，增加细胞外基质中的水分和营养代谢物含量。植物免疫系统的某些方面通过限制水分、养分以及毒力激活信号来对抗生态位的建立。这种复杂的竞争关系，无论是对植物还是病原体而言，都提供了关于毒力、宿主易感性、宿主防御以及植物病原学起源的重要见解。这一新框架聚焦于微生物生态位的形成，并强调了未来研究植物-微生物相互作用的关键领域。
authors: Roussin-Léveillée Charles; Mackey David; Ekanayake Gayani; Gohmann Reid; Moffett Peter
title: Extracellular niche establishment by plant pathogens.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 植物免疫;效应子;生态位建立;植物病原体;细胞外空间;宿主防御;水分与营养竞争;植物病理学;分子生物学
translated_title: 植物病原体的细胞外微环境建立
abstract: The plant extracellular space, referred to as the apoplast, is inhabited by a variety of microorganisms. Reflecting the crucial nature of this compartment, both plants and microorganisms seek to control, exploit and respond to its composition. Upon sensing the apoplastic environment, pathogens activate virulence programmes, including the delivery of effectors with well-established roles in suppressing plant immunity. We posit that another key and foundational role of effectors is niche establishment - specifically, the manipulation of plant physiological processes to enrich the apoplast in water and nutritive metabolites. Facets of plant immunity counteract niche establishment by restricting water, nutrients and signals for virulence activation. The complex competition to control and, in the case of pathogens, exploit the apoplast provides remarkable insights into the nature of virulence, host susceptibility, host defence and, ultimately, the origin of phytopathogenesis. This novel framework focuses on the ecology of a microbial niche and highlights areas of future research on plant-microorganism interactions.
affiliations: Centre SÈVE, Département de Biologie, Université de Sherbrooke, Sherbrooke, Québec, Canada.; Department of Horticulture and Crop Science, The Ohio State University, Columbus, OH, USA. mackey.86@osu.edu.; Department of Molecular Genetics, The Ohio State University, Columbus, OH, USA. mackey.86@osu.edu.; Center for Applied Plant Sciences, The Ohio State University, Columbus, OH, USA. mackey.86@osu.edu.; Department of Horticulture and Crop Science, The Ohio State University, Columbus, OH, USA.; Centre SÈVE, Département de Biologie, Université de Sherbrooke, Sherbrooke, Québec, Canada. peter.moffett@usherbrooke.ca.

translated_keywords: 参考引导组装；大口黑鲈；计算机模拟文库；基因组连续性；非洲猫鱼
translated_abstract: 长读长测序技术相较于短读长方法能够生成更加连续的基因组组装结果，但其较高的成本往往构成显著障碍。为解决这一问题，我们探索了基于映射的基因组组装和参考引导组装作为更具成本效益的替代方案。我们评估了这些方法在提高斑点叉尾鲶（*Clarias batrachus*）和赤梢鱼（*Culter alburnus*）草图基因组连续性方面的有效性。研究结果显示，采用迭代映射策略可以减少组装错误。具体而言，经过三次迭代后，*C. batrachus* 基因组每10万碱基对的错配数从2447.20降至2432.67，在两次迭代后达到最低值2422.67。此外，*C. batrachus* 基因组的N50值从362,143 bp增加到1,315,126 bp，在两次迭代后达到最大值1,315,403 bp。同时，参考引导组装的*C. batrachus* 错配数达到3.70，而*C. alburnus* 达到0.34。相应地，*C. batrachus* 和*C. alburnus* 基因组的N50值分别从362,143 bp和3,686,385 bp提升至2,026,888 bp和43,735,735 bp。最终，我们成功利用改进后的*C. batrachus* 和*C. alburnus* 基因组，结合Ragout和Ragtag方法进行了比较基因组学研究。通过全面对比基于映射的基因组组装与参考引导组装方法，我们揭示了参考引导组装在减少组装错误、提高组装连续性和完整性方面的重要贡献。这些进展确立了参考引导组装及虚拟文库的利用作为一种有前景且适合的比较基因组学研究方法。
authors: Liu Kai; Xie Nan; Wang Yuxi; Liu Xinyi
title: The Utilization of Reference-Guided Assembly and In Silico Libraries Improves the Draft Genome of Clarias batrachus and Culter alburnus.
keywords: Reference-guided assembly; Culter alburnus; In silico libraries; Genome contiguity; Clarias batrachus
translated_title: 基于参考引导组装和计算机模拟文库的利用改进了斑点叉尾鮰和赤梢鱼的基因组草图
abstract: Long-read sequencing technologies can generate highly contiguous genome assemblies compared to short-read methods. However, their higher cost often poses a significant barrier. To address this, we explore the utilization of mapping-based genome assembly and reference-guided assembly as cost-effective alternative approaches. We assess the efficacy of these approaches in improving the contiguity of Clarias batrachus and Culter alburnus draft genomes. Our findings demonstrate that employing an iterative mapping strategy leads to a reduction in assembly errors. Specifically, after three iterations, the Mismatches per 100 kbp value for the C. batrachus genome decreased from 2447.20 to 2432.67, reaching a minimum of 2422.67 after two iterations. Additionally, the N50 value for the C. batrachus genome increased from 362,143 to 1,315,126 bp, with a maximum of 1,315,403 bp after two iterations. Furthermore, we achieved Mismatches per 100 kbp values of 3.70 for the reference-guided assembly of C. batrachus and 0.34 for C. alburnus. Correspondingly, the N50 value for the C. batrachus and C. alburnus genomes increased from 362,143 bp and 3,686,385 bp to 2,026,888 bp and 43,735,735 bp, respectively. Finally, we successfully utilized the improved C. batrachus and C. alburnus genomes to compare genome studies using the combined approach of Ragout and Ragtag. Through a comprehensive comparative analysis of mapping-based and reference-guided genome assembly methods, we shed light on the specific contributions of reference-guided assembly in reducing assembly errors and improving assembly continuity and integrity. These advancements establish reference-guided assembly and the utilization of in silico libraries as a promising and suitable approach for comparative genomics studies.
affiliations: Institute of Fishery Science, Hangzhou Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Hangzhou, 310024, China. xqa9038@dingtalk.com.; Institute of Fishery Science, Hangzhou Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Hangzhou, 310024, China.

translated_keywords: 免疫系统不相容性;自然变异;选择压力;基因重组;免疫受体;网络视角;缺陷机制;植物科学;生物信息学
translated_abstract: 植物杂交缺陷中许多是由自然发生的基因组变异之间的免疫系统不相容性引起的，而这构成了作物改良的一个障碍。本文综述了从泛基因组和网络视角探讨免疫系统不相容性的方法。泛基因组提供了关于自然变异如何塑造免疫系统不相容性进化景观的见解，通过这一视角，选择、多态性和重组抗性成为共同特征，这些特征协同驱动这些不相容性。在免疫网络背景下理解这些不相容性时，免疫受体的广谱活性、复杂的调控失调以及单点失效似乎成为免疫系统缺陷的常见主题。正如遗传学家通过破坏基因来研究其功能一样，我们也可以通过研究受损的免疫系统来深化对植物免疫系统的理解，并致力于改善它们。
authors: Lee Rachelle R Q; Chae Eunyoung
title: Monkeys at Rigged Typewriters: A Population and Network View of Plant Immune System Incompatibility.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 免疫系统不相容性;自然变异;选择压力;基因重组;免疫受体;网络视角;缺陷机制;植物科学;生物信息学
translated_title: 从种群和网络视角看植物免疫系统不相容性
abstract: Immune system incompatibilities between naturally occurring genomic variants underlie many hybrid defects in plants and present a barrier for crop improvement. In this review, we approach immune system incompatibilities from pan-genomic and network perspectives. Pan-genomes offer insights into how natural variation shapes the evolutionary landscape of immune system incompatibilities, and through it, selection, polymorphisms, and recombination resistance emerge as common features that synergistically drive these incompatibilities. By contextualizing incompatibilities within the immune network, immune receptor promiscuity, complex dysregulation, and single-point failure appear to be recurrent themes of immune system defects. As geneticists break genes to investigate their function, so can we investigate broken immune systems to enrich our understanding of plant immune systems and work toward improving them.
affiliations: 1Department of Biological Sciences, National University of Singapore, Singapore; email: rachelle.rq.lee@gmail.com.; 2Department of Biology, University of Oxford, Oxford, United Kingdom; email: eunyoung.chae@biology.ox.ac.uk.

translated_keywords: 组学方法；非生物胁迫；生物胁迫；商业化路线图；内生菌
translated_abstract: 内生微生物是栖息于植物组织内部且不对宿主造成伤害的一类微小生物。研究发现，这些微生物能够为植物提供多种益处，包括促进生长和提高抗逆性。本文综述了近年来关于内生微生物通过何种机制赋予宿主植物非生物胁迫和生物胁迫耐受性的理解进展。具体而言，我们重点关注内生微生物在增强养分吸收、调控植物激素、产生次生代谢物以及激活植物防御反应中的作用。此外，我们还讨论了开发基于内生微生物产品的商业化过程中面临的挑战，如产品优化、毒理学分析及原型设计等。尽管存在这些挑战，但人们对内生微生物在农业和环境修复中的潜在应用兴趣日益增加。随着进一步的研究与开发，基于内生微生物的产品有望在可持续农业和环境管理中发挥重要作用。
authors: Kaur Gursharan; Patel Arvind; Dwibedi Vagish; Rath Santosh Kumar
title: Harnessing the action mechanisms of microbial endophytes for enhancing plant performance and stress tolerance: current understanding and future perspectives.
keywords: Omics approaches; Abiotic stress; Biotic stress; Roadmap for commercialization; Endophytes
translated_title: 当前认识与未来展望
abstract: Microbial endophytes are microorganisms that reside within plant tissues without causing any harm to their hosts. These microorganisms have been found to confer a range of benefits to plants, including increased growth and stress tolerance. In this review, we summarize the recent advances in our understanding of the mechanisms by which microbial endophytes confer abiotic and biotic stress tolerance to their host plants. Specifically, we focus on the roles of endophytes in enhancing nutrient uptake, modulating plant hormones, producing secondary metabolites, and activating plant defence responses. We also discuss the challenges associated with developing microbial endophyte-based products for commercial use, including product refinement, toxicology analysis, and prototype formulation. Despite these challenges, there is growing interest in the potential applications of microbial endophytes in agriculture and environmental remediation. With further research and development, microbial endophyte-based products have the potential to play a significant role in sustainable agriculture and environmental management.
affiliations: University Institute of Biotechnology, Chandigarh University, Mohali, 140413, India.; University Institute of Biotechnology, Chandigarh University, Mohali, 140413, India. vagishdwibedi@gmail.com.; Institute of Soil, Water and Environmental Sciences, Volcani Resaerch Center, Agricultural Research Organization, 7528809, Rishon Lezion, Israel. vagishdwibedi@gmail.com.; Department of Pharmaceutical Chemistry, School of Pharmaceuticals and Population Health Informatics, Faculty of Pharmacy, DIT University, Dehradun, 248009, Uttarakhand, India. skrath1985@gmail.com.

translated_keywords: Transformer；大型语言模型；基础模型；解码器；编码器；嵌入；人工智能
translated_abstract: 大型语言模型（LLMs），例如ChatGPT，已经席卷全球。然而，LLMs的应用不仅限于人类语言，还可以用于分析序列数据，如DNA、蛋白质和基因表达。由此产生的基础模型能够重新用于识别数据中的复杂模式，从而生成强大的多功能预测工具，用以预测细胞系统的状态。本文综述了不同类型的LLMs及其在生物学领域的最新应用。鉴于植物学界尚未广泛采用这些模型，我们还探讨了如何将这些模型应用于植物王国。
authors: Lam Hilbert Yuen In; Ong Xing Er; Mutwil Marek
title: Large language models in plant biology.
keywords: transformer; large language models; foundation model; decoder; encoder; embedding; AI
translated_title: 大型语言模型在植物生物学中的应用
abstract: Large language models (LLMs), such as ChatGPT, have taken the world by storm. However, LLMs are not limited to human language and can be used to analyze sequential data, such as DNA, protein, and gene expression. The resulting foundation models can be repurposed to identify the complex patterns within the data, resulting in powerful, multipurpose prediction tools able to predict the state of cellular systems. This review outlines the different types of LLMs and showcases their recent uses in biology. Since LLMs have not yet been embraced by the plant community, we also cover how these models can be deployed for the plant kingdom.
affiliations: School of Biological Sciences, Nanyang Technological University, 60 Nanyang Drive, Singapore, 637551, Singapore.; School of Biological Sciences, Nanyang Technological University, 60 Nanyang Drive, Singapore, 637551, Singapore. Electronic address: mutwil@ntu.edu.sg.

translated_keywords: 决策制定；细胞自动机；去中心化信息处理；植物发育；集体行为
translated_abstract: 分子基序可以解释单个细胞内的信息处理，但细胞群体如何共同实现这一过程仍知之甚少。植物的适应性和生存依赖于其去中心化的多细胞器官系统中稳健且精确的决策能力。移动信号分子，包括激素、代谢物和RNA，在协调多细胞集体决策中起着核心作用，然而关于细胞间通讯如何扩展到器官层面转换的机制尚不清晰。本文探讨了在植物器官中，通过不同尺度和多种模态的分布式信息处理如何产生统一输出。此外，还通过数学和计算方法对这些事件进行表征，以理解这些过程的发生方式，并利用它们来调控植物对环境的响应发育。
authors: Davis Gwendolyn V; de Souza Moraes Tatiana; Khanapurkar Swanand; Dromiack Hannah; Ahmad Zaki; Bayer Emmanuelle M; Bhalerao Rishikesh P; Walker Sara I; Bassel George W
title: Toward uncovering an operating system in plant organs.
keywords: decision-making; Cellular Automata; decentralised information processing; plant development; collective behaviour
translated_title: 迈向揭示植物器官的操作系统的研究
abstract: Molecular motifs can explain information processing within single cells, while how assemblies of cells collectively achieve this remains less well understood. Plant fitness and survival depend upon robust and accurate decision-making in their decentralised multicellular organ systems. Mobile agents, including hormones, metabolites, and RNAs, have a central role in coordinating multicellular collective decision-making, yet mechanisms describing how cell-cell communication scales to organ-level transitions is poorly understood. Here, we explore how unified outputs may emerge in plant organs by distributed information processing across different scales and using different modalities. Mathematical and computational representations of these events are also explored toward understanding how these events take place and are leveraged to manipulate plant development in response to the environment.
affiliations: School of Life Sciences, University of Warwick, Coventry, CV4 7AL, UK.; University of Bordeaux, CNRS, Laboratoire de Biogenèse Membranaire, UMR 5200, F-33140 Villenave d'Ornon, France.; ASU-SFI Center for Biosocial Complex Systems, Arizona State University, Tempe, AZ 85287, USA; Beyond Center for Fundamental Concepts in Science, Arizona State University, Tempe, AZ 85287, USA.; Umeå Plant Science Center, Department of Forest Genetics and Plant Physiology, Swedish University of Agricultural Sciences, 90183 Umeå, Sweden.; ASU-SFI Center for Biosocial Complex Systems, Arizona State University, Tempe, AZ 85287, USA; Beyond Center for Fundamental Concepts in Science, Arizona State University, Tempe, AZ 85287, USA; School of Earth and Space Exploration, Arizona State University, Tempe, AZ 85287, USA.; School of Life Sciences, University of Warwick, Coventry, CV4 7AL, UK. Electronic address: george.bassel@warwick.ac.uk.

translated_keywords: 乳酸杆菌；乳酸菌；可移动基因组；植物乳杆菌科；生物合成基因簇；泛基因组；可移动基因组；系统群；植物乳酸植杆菌
translated_abstract: 1）这些基因组包含足够的基因组数据以对26个物种进行泛基因组分析；2）标准化Heap系数λ（一种衡量泛基因组开放性的指标）的平均值为0.27（范围在0.07到0.37之间）；3）泛基因组的开放性与转座子和可移动元件的丰度及其基因组位置相关；4）每个物种的泛基因组被分为核心、辅助和稀有基因组，突出了物种特有的特性（如运动性和限制-修饰系统）；5）在研究的26个物种中，植物乳杆菌属（*Lactiplantibacillus plantarum*）的泛基因组包含最多的基因组，并且可以划分为九个不同的系统发育群；6）基因组挖掘揭示了丰富的检测到的生物合成基因簇，其功能涵盖了从抗菌和益生菌到食品保存等多个方面，但约93%的功能未知。本研究首次对乳酸杆菌科家族进行了深入的比较泛基因组学分析。
authors: Rajput Akanksha; Chauhan Siddharth M; Mohite Omkar S; Hyun Jason C; Ardalani Omid; Jahn Leonie J; Sommer Morten Oa; Palsson Bernhard O
title: Pangenome analysis reveals the genetic basis for taxonomic classification of the Lactobacillaceae family.
keywords: Lactobacillus; Lactic acid bacteria; Mobilome.; Lactobacillaceae; Biosynthetic gene clusters; Pangenome; Mobilome; Phylogroup; Lactiplantibacillus plantarum
translated_title: 泛基因组分析揭示了乳酸杆菌科分类学分类的遗传基础。
abstract: Lactobacillaceae represent a large family of important microbes that are foundational to the food industry. Many genome sequences of Lactobacillaceae strains are now available, enabling us to conduct a comprehensive pangenome analysis of this family. We collected 3591 high-quality genomes from public sources and found that: 1) they contained enough genomes for 26 species to perform a pangenomic analysis, 2) the normalized Heap's coefficient λ (a measure of pangenome openness) was found to have an average value of 0.27 (ranging from 0.07 to 0.37), 3) the pangenome openness was correlated with the abundance and genomic location of transposons and mobilomes, 4) the pangenome for each species was divided into core, accessory, and rare genomes, that highlight the species-specific properties (such as motility and restriction-modification systems), 5) the pangenome of Lactiplantibacillus plantarum (which contained the highest number of genomes found amongst the 26 species studied) contained nine distinct phylogroups, and 6) genome mining revealed a richness of detected biosynthetic gene clusters, with functions ranging from antimicrobial and probiotic to food preservation, but ∼93% were of unknown function. This study provides the first in-depth comparative pangenomics analysis of the Lactobacillaceae family.
affiliations: Department of Bioengineering, University of California, San Diego, La Jolla, USA.; Novo Nordisk Foundation Center for Biosustainability, Technical University of Denmark, Kemitorvet, Building 220, 2800 Kongens, Lyngby, Denmark.; Bioinformatics and Systems Biology Program, University of California, San Diego, La Jolla, USA.; Department of Bioengineering, University of California, San Diego, La Jolla, USA; Bioinformatics and Systems Biology Program, University of California, San Diego, La Jolla, USA; Department of Pediatrics, University of California, San Diego, La Jolla, CA, USA; Center for Microbiome Innovation, University of California San Diego, La Jolla, CA 92093, USA; Novo Nordisk Foundation Center for Biosustainability, Technical University of Denmark, Kemitorvet, Building 220, 2800 Kongens, Lyngby, Denmark. Electronic address: palsson@ucsd.edu.

translated_keywords: 细胞分裂素；生长-防御权衡；植物细胞壁完整性；内复制；细胞壁感知；细胞周期进程；生长素
translated_abstract: 植物细胞壁是动态结构，在生长、发育和胁迫响应中发挥关键作用。尽管我们对细胞壁生物学的理解日益加深，但植物细胞壁完整性（CWI）与细胞周期进程之间的联系仍知之甚少。本文综述旨在探讨植物中CWI与细胞周期进程之间复杂的关系，并借鉴酵母和哺乳动物的研究成果。我们概述了植物细胞周期，强调内复制在细胞壁组成中的作用，并讨论了最近关于CWI感知与细胞壁生物合成及基因表达调控之间分子机制的研究进展。此外，我们还探讨了该领域的未来展望和未解之谜，例如特定CWI感知机制的鉴定以及CWI维持在生长-防御权衡中的作用。阐明这些联系可能对作物改良和可持续农业具有重要意义。
authors: Soni Nancy; Bacete Laura
title: The interplay between cell wall integrity and cell cycle progression in plants.
keywords: Cytokinin; Growth-defense trade-off; Plant cell wall integrity; Endoreplication; Cell wall sensing; Cell cycle progression; Auxin
translated_title: 植物细胞壁完整性和细胞周期进程之间的相互作用
abstract: Plant cell walls are dynamic structures that play crucial roles in growth, development, and stress responses. Despite our growing understanding of cell wall biology, the connections between cell wall integrity (CWI) and cell cycle progression in plants remain poorly understood. This review aims to explore the intricate relationship between CWI and cell cycle progression in plants, drawing insights from studies in yeast and mammals. We provide an overview of the plant cell cycle, highlight the role of endoreplication in cell wall composition, and discuss recent findings on the molecular mechanisms linking CWI perception to cell wall biosynthesis and gene expression regulation. Furthermore, we address future perspectives and unanswered questions in the field, such as the identification of specific CWI sensing mechanisms and the role of CWI maintenance in the growth-defense trade-off. Elucidating these connections could have significant implications for crop improvement and sustainable agriculture.
affiliations: Faculty of Natural Sciences, Institute for Biology, Norwegian University of Science and Technology, 5 Høgskoleringen, 7491, Trondheim, Norway.; Faculty of Natural Sciences, Institute for Biology, Norwegian University of Science and Technology, 5 Høgskoleringen, 7491, Trondheim, Norway. laura.bacete@umu.se.; Department of Plant Physiology, Umeå Plant Science Centre (UPSC), Umeå University, 901 87, Umeå, Sweden. laura.bacete@umu.se.

translated_keywords: 胞间连丝；胞间信号转运；生物胁迫；植物激素；非生物胁迫；胼胝质；非细胞自主性蛋白
translated_abstract: 这些细胞间的桥梁允许细胞之间直接（细胞质到细胞质）的信息传递。胞间连丝运输调节植物生长、发育和胁迫反应的关键分子。它们嵌入细胞外基质中，但具有灵活性，可根据植物的需求调整细胞间物质流。本文综述了胞间连丝的形成与功能，并探讨了植物通信网络对发育和环境信号的响应能力。我们展示了环境压力如何塑造细胞间的相互作用，并帮助植物适应其生长需求。
authors: Bayer Emmanuelle M; Benitez-Alfonso Yoselin
title: Plasmodesmata: Channels Under Pressure.
keywords: plasmodesma; symplasmic intercellular trafficking; biotic stress; plant hormones; abiotic stress; callose; non-cell-autonomous proteins
translated_title: 承受压力的通道
abstract: Multicellularity has emerged multiple times in evolution, enabling groups of cells to share a living space and reducing the burden of solitary tasks. While unicellular organisms exhibit individuality and independence, cooperation among cells in multicellular organisms brings specialization and flexibility. However, multicellularity also necessitates intercellular dependence and relies on intercellular communication. In plants, this communication is facilitated by plasmodesmata: intercellular bridges that allow the direct (cytoplasm-to-cytoplasm) transfer of information between cells. Plasmodesmata transport essential molecules that regulate plant growth, development, and stress responses. They are embedded in the extracellular matrix but exhibit flexibility, adapting intercellular flux to meet the plant's needs.In this review, we delve into the formation and functionality of plasmodesmata and examine the capacity of the plant communication network to respond to developmental and environmental cues. We illustrate how environmental pressure shapes cellular interactions and aids the plant in adapting its growth.
affiliations: Laboratoire de Biogenèse Membranaire (LBM), CNRS UMR5200, Université de Bordeaux, Villenave D'Ornon, France; email: emmanuelle.bayer@u-bordeaux.fr.; School of Biology, Centre for Plant Sciences, and Astbury Centre, University of Leeds, Leeds, United Kingdom; email: y.benitez-alfonso@leeds.ac.uk.

translated_keywords: 生物分子凝聚体；应激韧性；RNA代谢；相分离；发育；RNA结合蛋白
translated_abstract: RNA结合蛋白（RBP）从RNA合成到降解全程参与其中，介导RNA代谢的各个方面，并对真核生物的多种细胞和发育过程产生影响。许多RBP与其结合的RNA一起发生相分离，从而在动态无膜生物分子凝聚体中形成并发挥功能，以实现RNA代谢的时空协调或调控。越来越多的证据表明，具有RNA结合结构域和内在无序区域的相分离RBP在植物发育和胁迫适应中起着重要作用。本文综述了目前关于RBP动态分配到凝聚体中如何控制植物发育并赋予其感知实验变化的能力，从而在胁迫条件下赋予生长可塑性的知识，重点讨论了富含RBP的核凝聚体和细胞质颗粒在介导RNA代谢中的动态特性和功能机制。此外，我们还探讨了环境信号、蛋白质修饰以及N6-甲基腺苷（m6A）RNA甲基化等多种因素如何调节RBP的相分离行为，并强调了未来研究作物中相分离RBP的前景与挑战。
authors: Fan Sheng; Zhang Yu; Zhu Shaobo; Shen Lisha
title: Plant RNA-binding proteins: Phase separation dynamics and functional mechanisms underlying plant development and stress responses.
keywords: biomolecular condensates; stress resilience; RNA metabolism; phase separation; development; RNA-binding proteins
translated_title: 相分离动态与植物发育及胁迫响应的功能机制
abstract: RNA-binding proteins (RBPs) accompany RNA from synthesis to decay, mediating every aspect of RNA metabolism and impacting diverse cellular and developmental processes in eukaryotes. Many RBPs undergo phase separation along with their bound RNA to form and function in dynamic membraneless biomolecular condensates for spatiotemporal coordination or regulation of RNA metabolism. Increasing evidence suggests that phase-separating RBPs with RNA-binding domains and intrinsically disordered regions play important roles in plant development and stress adaptation. Here, we summarize the current knowledge about how dynamic partitioning of RBPs into condensates controls plant development and enables sensing of experimental changes to confer growth plasticity under stress conditions, with a focus on the dynamics and functional mechanisms of RBP-rich nuclear condensates and cytoplasmic granules in mediating RNA metabolism. We also discuss roles of multiple factors, such as environmental signals, protein modifications, and N6-methyladenosine RNA methylation, in modulating the phase separation behaviors of RBPs, and highlight the prospects and challenges for future research on phase-separating RBPs in crops.
affiliations: Temasek Life Sciences Laboratory, 1 Research Link, National University of Singapore, 1 Research Link, Singapore 117604, Singapore.; Temasek Life Sciences Laboratory, 1 Research Link, National University of Singapore, 1 Research Link, Singapore 117604, Singapore; Department of Biological Sciences, National University of Singapore, 14 Science Drive 4, Singapore 117543, Singapore. Electronic address: lisha@tll.org.sg.

translated_keywords: 气候变化；生物源挥发性有机化合物；生态系统；异戊二烯；植物通讯；二次有机气溶胶
translated_abstract: 气候变化对生物的季节性活动时间（即物候）产生了深远影响。然而，这种影响并非单向的，植物物候同样会影响大气组成和气候过程，从而反作用于气候变化。其中一个重要方面是植物释放生物源挥发性有机化合物（BVOCs），这些化合物连接了地表、大气与气候。BVOC排放表现出显著的日变化和季节变化，因此被视为重要的物候特征。为了理解植物物候与气候之间相互作用所形成的动态平衡，本文综述了近年来关于植物物候分子机制及其与气候相互作用的研究进展。我们概述了研究植物分子物候、自然环境下全基因组基因表达分析的相关工作，并解释了这些研究如何革新了物候的概念，将其从可观察的表型转变为由基因-环境互作驱动的动态分子响应。此外，我们还阐述了如何通过建立分子物候与植物分布变化、物种组成以及气候变化之间的联系，将这一知识扩展到植物种群、区域乃至全球层面。
authors: Satake Akiko; Hagiwara Tomika; Nagano Atsushi J; Yamaguchi Nobutoshi; Sekimoto Kanako; Shiojiri Kaori; Sudo Kengo
title: Plant Molecular Phenology and Climate Feedbacks Mediated by BVOCs.
keywords: climate change; biogenic volatile organic compounds; ecosystems; isoprene; plant communications; secondary organic aerosols
translated_title: 植物分子物候与BVOC介导的气候反馈
abstract: Climate change profoundly affects the timing of seasonal activities of organisms, known as phenology. The impact of climate change is not unidirectional; it is also influenced by plant phenology as plants modify atmospheric composition and climatic processes. One important aspect of this interaction is the emission of biogenic volatile organic compounds (BVOCs), which link the Earth's surface, atmosphere, and climate. BVOC emissions exhibit significant diurnal and seasonal variations and are therefore considered essential phenological traits. To understand the dynamic equilibrium arising from the interplay between plant phenology and climate, this review presents recent advances in comprehending the molecular mechanisms underpinning plant phenology and its interaction with climate. We provide an overview of studies investigating molecular phenology, genome-wide gene expression analyses conducted in natural environments, and how these studies revolutionize the concept of phenology, shifting it from observable traits to dynamic molecular responses driven by gene-environment interactions. We explain how this knowledge can be scaled up to encompass plant populations, regions, and even the globe by establishing connections between molecular phenology, changes in plant distribution, species composition, and climate.
affiliations: Department of Biology, Faculty of Science, Kyushu University, Fukuoka, Japan; email: akiko.satake@kyudai.jp.; Faculty of Agriculture, Ryukoku University, Otsu, Japan.; Institute for Advanced Biosciences, Keio University, Tsuruoka, Japan.; Division of Biological Science, Nara Institute of Science and Technology, Ikoma, Japan.; Graduate School of Nanobioscience, Yokohama City University, Yokohama, Japan.; Graduate School of Environmental Studies, Nagoya University, Nagoya, Japan.; Japan Agency for Marine-Earth Science and Technology, Yokohama, Japan.

translated_keywords: 植物泛基因组; 基因多样性; 结构变异; 农艺性状; 图谱参考系统; 数据存储; 算法开发; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: 单一参考基因组无法充分反映物种的多样性，相比之下，泛基因组通过整合多个基因组来捕获给定物种的所有非冗余基因及其基因组多样性。新的测序技术使研究人员能够生成多个高质量的基因组序列，并以更高的精度编目遗传变异。泛基因组学研究在植物基因组中检测到结构变异，剖析了农艺性状的遗传结构，并有助于揭示植物表型的分子基础和进化起源。泛基因组的概念进一步演变为所谓的超级泛基因组，其包括同一属或同一分支中的野生近缘种，并转向基于图的参考系统。然而，在许多作物中构建泛基因组和表示复杂的结构变异仍然具有挑战性。需要标准化的计算流程和通用的数据结构来比较和解释泛基因组。不断增长的植物泛基因组数据需要新的算法、巨大的数据存储能力和培训，以帮助研究人员和育种者利用新发现的基因和遗传变异。
authors: Jayakodi Murukarthick; Shim Hyeonah; Mascher Martin
title: What Are We Learning from Plant Pangenomes?
keywords: (Auto-generated) 植物泛基因组; 基因多样性; 结构变异; 农艺性状; 图谱参考系统; 数据存储; 算法开发; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_title: 从植物泛基因组学中我们学到了什么？
abstract: A single reference genome does not fully capture species diversity. By contrast, a pangenome incorporates multiple genomes to capture the entire set of nonredundant genes in a given species, along with its genome diversity. New sequencing technologies enable researchers to produce multiple high-quality genome sequences and catalog diverse genetic variations with better precision. Pangenomic studies have detected structural variants in plant genomes, dissected the genetic architecture of agronomic traits, and helped unravel molecular underpinnings and evolutionary origins of plant phenotypes. The pangenome concept has further evolved into a so-called superpangenome that includes wild relatives within a genus or clade and shifted to graph-based reference systems. Nevertheless, building pangenomes and representing complex structural variants remain challenging in many crops. Standardized computing pipelines and common data structures are needed to compare and interpret pangenomes. The growing body of plant pangenomics data requires new algorithms, huge data storage capacity, and training to help researchers and breeders take advantage of newly discovered genes and genetic variants.

translated_keywords: 杨属；结构变异；泛基因组；基因组演化；全基因组复制
translated_abstract: //www.populus-superpangenome.com）。这一森林树木领域的开创性超泛基因组资源不仅有助于推动该全球重要树种属的育种工作，也为理解树木生物学提供了有价值的洞见。
authors: Shi Tingting; Zhang Xinxin; Hou Yukang; Jia Changfu; Dan Xuming; Zhang Yulin; Jiang Yuanzhong; Lai Qiang; Feng Jiajun; Feng Jianju; Ma Tao; Wu Jiali; Liu Shuyu; Zhang Lei; Long Zhiqin; Chen Liyang; Street Nathaniel R; Ingvarsson Pär K; Liu Jianquan; Yin Tongming; Wang Jing
title: The super-pangenome of Populus unveils genomic facets for its adaptation and diversification in widespread forest trees.
keywords: Populus; structural variation; pangenomes; genome evolution; whole-genome duplication
translated_title: 杨属植物的超泛基因组揭示了广泛分布的森林树种适应与多样化的基因组特征。
abstract: Understanding the underlying mechanisms and links between genome evolution and adaptive innovations stands as a key goal in evolutionary studies. Poplars, among the world's most widely distributed and cultivated trees, exhibit extensive phenotypic diversity and environmental adaptability. In this study, we present a genus-level super-pangenome comprising 19 Populus genomes, revealing the likely pivotal role of private genes in facilitating local environmental and climate adaptation. Through the integration of pangenomes with transcriptomes, methylomes, and chromatin accessibility mapping, we unveil that the evolutionary trajectories of pangenes and duplicated genes are closely linked to local genomic landscapes of regulatory and epigenetic architectures, notably CG methylation in gene-body regions. Further comparative genomic analyses have enabled the identification of 142 202 structural variants across species that intersect with a significant number of genes and contribute substantially to both phenotypic and adaptive divergence. We have experimentally validated a ∼180-bp presence/absence variant affecting the expression of the CUC2 gene, crucial for leaf serration formation. Finally, we developed a user-friendly web-based tool encompassing the multi-omics resources associated with the Populus super-pangenome (http://www.populus-superpangenome.com). Together, the present pioneering super-pangenome resource in forest trees not only aids in the advancement of breeding efforts of this globally important tree genus but also offers valuable insights into potential avenues for comprehending tree biology.

translated_keywords: CRISPR应用；突变检测；PlantEd；植物再生；基因调控；CRISPR平台；CA18111
translated_abstract: CRISPR/Cas基因组编辑系统的发现彻底改变了我们对植物基因组的理解。十多年来，CRISPR/Cas被广泛用于植物基因组的修饰，以研究特定基因和生物合成途径，并加速多种植物（包括模式作物和非模式作物）的育种进程。尽管CRISPR/Cas系统在基因组编辑方面非常高效，但许多瓶颈和挑战阻碍了其进一步改进与应用。本文综述了在组织培养、转化、再生以及突变体检测过程中可能出现的挑战，并探讨了新CRISPR平台提供的机遇及其在基因调控、非生物和生物胁迫响应改良以及植物从头驯化等特定应用中的潜力。
authors: Cardi Teodoro; Murovec Jana; Bakhsh Allah; Boniecka Justyna; Bruegmann Tobias; Bull Simon E; Eeckhaut Tom; Fladung Matthias; Galovic Vladislava; Linkiewicz Anna; Lukan Tjaša; Mafra Isabel; Michalski Krzysztof; Kavas Musa; Nicolia Alessandro; Nowakowska Justyna; Sági Laszlo; Sarmiento Cecilia; Yıldırım Kubilay; Zlatković Milica; Hensel Goetz; Van Laere Katrijn
title: CRISPR/Cas-mediated plant genome editing: outstanding challenges a decade after implementation.
keywords: CRISPR applications; mutant detection; PlantEd; plant regeneration; gene regulation; CRISPR platforms; CA18111
translated_title: 实施十年后的未解挑战
abstract: The discovery of the CRISPR/Cas genome-editing system has revolutionized our understanding of the plant genome. CRISPR/Cas has been used for over a decade to modify plant genomes for the study of specific genes and biosynthetic pathways as well as to speed up breeding in many plant species, including both model and non-model crops. Although the CRISPR/Cas system is very efficient for genome editing, many bottlenecks and challenges slow down further improvement and applications. In this review we discuss the challenges that can occur during tissue culture, transformation, regeneration, and mutant detection. We also review the opportunities provided by new CRISPR platforms and specific applications related to gene regulation, abiotic and biotic stress response improvement, and de novo domestication of plants.

translated_keywords: 钙调蛋白；钙离子；病原效应子；致病力；植物免疫
translated_abstract: 钙信号是植物防御反应的核心。在这篇观点文章中，我们探讨了病原体如何通过其分泌的效应蛋白靶向钙传感器（如钙调蛋白CaM和类钙调蛋白CMLs）来利用这一通路。我们展示了效应蛋白操纵钙稳态、细胞骨架动态、代谢、激素生物合成、基因调控以及叶绿体功能的不同机制，以抑制植物免疫并增强其致病性。靶向钙信号以破坏或削弱宿主防御似乎是感染动物细胞的病原体的一种常见策略，我们在此列举了一些这种趋同现象的例子。理解这些策略能够深入了解植物与病原体之间的相互作用，并为开发新的疾病控制策略铺平道路。
authors: Galaud Jean-Philippe; Genin Stéphane; Aldon Didier
title: Pathogen effectors hijack calcium signaling to promote virulence.
keywords: calmodulin; calcium; pathogen effectors; virulence; plant immunity
translated_title: 效应蛋白劫持钙信号转导以促进致病力
abstract: Calcium signaling is a cornerstone of plant defense responses. In this opinion article we explore how pathogens exploit this pathway by targeting calcium sensors such as calmodulin (CaM) and calmodulin-like proteins (CMLs) with their secreted effectors. We illustrate different mechanisms by which effectors manipulate calcium homeostasis, cytoskeletal dynamics, metabolism, hormone biosynthesis, gene regulation, and chloroplast function to suppress plant immunity and enhance virulence. Targeting calcium signaling to thwart or weaken host defenses appears to be a common strategy among pathogens infecting animal cells, and we present here selected examples of this convergence. Understanding these strategies provides valuable insights into the interactions between plants and pathogens, and should pave the way for the development of new disease control strategies.
