translated_keywords: 进化路径;机器学习模型;微生物泛基因组;可预测进化;基因存在性;随机性与确定性;进化平衡;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 进化路径可能是随机的或确定性的。在近期的一篇文章中，Beavan 等人通过将机器学习模型应用于微生物泛基因组来研究这种平衡问题。几乎三分之一的基因存在情况可以被可靠推断，这表明进化过程中存在令人惊讶的可预测性。
authors: Wolfe Joanna M
title: Pangenomes at the limits of evolution.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 进化路径;机器学习模型;微生物泛基因组;可预测进化;基因存在性;随机性与确定性;进化平衡;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 进化极限上的泛基因组
abstract: Evolutionary pathways can be random or deterministic. In a recent article, Beavan et al. investigate this balance by applying machine learning models to microbial pangenomes. The presence of almost one-third of genes can be reliably inferred, indicating a surprising amount of predictable evolution.
affiliations: Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University, Cambridge, MA 02138, USA; Department of Organismic & Evolutionary Biology, Harvard University, Cambridge, MA 02138, USA. Electronic address: jowolfe@g.harvard.edu.

translated_keywords: 棒状杆菌毒力；前噬菌体元件；被忽视的病原体；棒状杆菌抗微生物耐药性；无害棒状杆菌；泛基因组分析；整合子
translated_abstract: 在过去的二十年里，Corynebacterium striatum从临床培养物中分离的数量不断增加，大多数分离株表现出对最后一线抗菌药物的耐药性增加（AMR）。泛基因组学领域的进展将有助于理解这些以前被认为是共生菌的细菌种类的临床意义，从而为识别新的药物靶点和控制策略铺平道路。我们使用310个C. striatum基因组序列构建了一个泛基因组，并使用Roary、PIRATE和PEPPAN三种工具进行了泛基因组分析。研究了抗微生物耐药基因和毒力因子与核心基因组系统发育的关系。详细探讨了基因组岛（GIs）、整合子和前噬菌体区域。该物种的泛基因组范围在5253到5857个基因之间，包含2070到1899个核心基因簇。一些抗微生物耐药基因存在于核心基因组部分，但大多数位于可变基因组中。此外，一些在致病性Corynebacterium物种中描述的已知毒力因子也位于可变基因组中。共鉴定出115种噬菌体，其中只有44个完整的前噬菌体区域。本研究提供了C. striatum详细的比较泛基因组报告。该物种显示出非常缓慢增长的泛基因组，核心基因组中的基因数量相对较高，导致基因组变异较低。携带抗药性和毒力因子的前噬菌体元件在该物种中似乎较少见。GIs在该物种中动员抗生素耐药基因方面似乎发挥了重要作用，整合子在该物种中的频率为50%。控制策略应针对核心基因组上携带的毒力和耐药决定因素以及频繁出现在辅助基因组中的决定因素。
authors: Nageeb Wedad M; Hetta Helal F
title: Pangenome analysis of Corynebacterium striatum: insights into a neglected multidrug-resistant pathogen.
keywords: Corynebacterium virulence; Prophage elements; Neglected pathogens; Corynebacterium antimicrobial resistance; Corynebacterium striatum; Pangenome analysis; Integrons
translated_title: 深入认识一种被忽视的多重耐药病原体
abstract: Over the past two decades, Corynebacterium striatum has been increasingly isolated from clinical cultures with most isolates showing increased antimicrobial resistance (AMR) to last resort agents. Advances in the field of pan genomics would facilitate the understanding of the clinical significance of such bacterial species previously thought to be among commensals paving the way for identifying new drug targets and control strategies. We constructed a pan-genome using 310 genome sequences of C. striatum. Pan-genome analysis was performed using three tools including Roary, PIRATE, and PEPPAN. AMR genes and virulence factors have been studied in relation to core genome phylogeny. Genomic Islands (GIs), Integrons, and Prophage regions have been explored in detail. The pan-genome ranges between a total of 5253-5857 genes with 2070 - 1899 core gene clusters. Some antimicrobial resistance genes have been identified in the core genome portion, but most of them were located in the dispensable genome. In addition, some well-known virulence factors described in pathogenic Corynebacterium species were located in the dispensable genome. A total of 115 phage species have been identified with only 44 intact prophage regions. This study presents a detailed comparative pangenome report of C. striatum. The species show a very slowly growing pangenome with relatively high number of genes in the core genome contributing to lower genomic variation. Prophage elements carrying AMR and virulence elements appear to be infrequent in the species. GIs appear to offer a prominent role in mobilizing antibiotic resistance genes in the species and integrons occur at a frequency of 50% in the species. Control strategies should be directed against virulence and resistance determinants carried on the core genome and those frequently occurring in the accessory genome.
affiliations: Department of Medical Microbiology and Immunology, Faculty of Medicine, Suez Canal University, Ismailia, 41111, Egypt. wedad_saleh@med.suez.edu.eg.; Department of Medical Microbiology and Immunology, Faculty of Medicine, Assiut University, Assiut, 71515, Egypt. helalhetta@aun.edu.eg.

translated_keywords: 植物激素；纳米肥料；基因表达；信号传导；养分运输；抗逆性
translated_abstract: 将植物必需营养元素封装或与纳米级吸附剂结合定义为纳米肥料（NFs）。非必需元素以纳米形式配制并能促进植物生长和提高抗逆性也属于NFs的范畴。与传统化学肥料相比，NFs具有明显优势，例如使用更少的施肥量即可获得更高的植物生物量和产量，从而减少环境污染。NFs通过叶面喷施或根部施用被植物成功吸收，其吸收效率取决于NFs的大小、表面电荷及其他理化性质。较小的NFs可通过蜡质角质层上的通道进入植物体内，这与其疏水性有关；而较大的NFs则通过叶片气孔导管进入。基于电荷的吸附、质外体运动及胞吞作用共同介导了NFs通过根系的转运，NFs的尺寸影响其进入维管组织的能力。最近的转录组学、蛋白质组学和代谢组学研究揭示了NFs促进植物生长的分子机制。NFs调控营养转运蛋白基因的表达，控制养分吸收并减少过量养分毒害。NFs通过广泛调节细胞分裂、光合作用、碳水化合物和氮素代谢以及与发育、胁迫响应和植物防御相关的植物激素依赖性信号通路，加速植物生长。NFs模拟Ca²⁺在信号级联中的第二信使及其相关蛋白，最终调控转录因子并协调基因表达以增强生长和抗逆性。开发未来的先进纳米肥料必须探索其与植物的分子互作，以降低毒性并提高有效性。
authors: Dey Arpan; Sadhukhan Ayan
title: Molecular mechanisms of plant productivity enhancement by nano fertilizers for sustainable agriculture.
keywords: Phytohormone; Nano fertilizer; Gene expression; Signaling; Nutrient transport; Stress tolerance
translated_title: 纳米肥料提高植物生产力的分子机制及其可持续农业应用
abstract: Essential plant nutrients encapsulated or combined with nano-dimensional adsorbents define nano fertilizers (NFs). Nanoformulation of non-essential elements enhancing plant growth and stress tolerance also comes under the umbrella of NFs. NFs have an edge over conventional chemical fertilizers, viz., higher plant biomass and yield using much lesser fertilization, thereby reducing environmental pollution. Foliar and root applications of NFs lead to their successful uptake by the plant, depending on the size, surface charge, and other physicochemical properties of NFs. Smaller NFs can pass through channels on the waxy cuticle depending on the hydrophobicity, while larger NFs pass through the stomatal conduits of leaves. Charge-based adsorption, followed by apoplastic movement and endocytosis, translocates NFs through the root, while the size of NFs influences passage into vascular tissues. Recent transcriptomic, proteomic, and metabolomic studies throw light on the molecular mechanisms of growth promotion by NFs. The expression levels of nutrient transporter genes are regulated by NFs, controlling uptake and minimizing excess nutrient toxicity. Accelerated growth by NFs is brought about by their extensive regulation of cell division, photosynthesis, carbohydrate, and nitrogen metabolism, as well as the phytohormone-dependent signaling pathways related to development, stress response, and plant defense. NFs mimic Ca,2+ eliciting second messengers and associated proteins in signaling cascades, reaching transcription factors and finally orchestrating gene expression to enhance growth and stress tolerance. Developing advanced nano fertilizers of the future must involve exploring molecular interactions with plants to reduce toxicity and improve effectiveness.
affiliations: Department of Bioscience and Bioengineering, Indian Institute of Technology Jodhpur, Jodhpur, Rajasthan, India.; Department of Bioscience and Bioengineering, Indian Institute of Technology Jodhpur, Jodhpur, Rajasthan, India. ayansadhukhan@iitj.ac.in.

translated_keywords: 特化代谢物；小分子介导的反馈抑制；转录调控
translated_abstract: 近年来，我们对植物代谢的理解取得了显著进展，揭示了次生代谢物在调控与生物合成网络相关的基因表达中的重要意义。本文是一篇观点文章，聚焦于小分子介导的转录水平反馈调节的分子机制及其潜在的作用模式，包括代谢物信号感知、感应器的本质以及导致转录和转录后调控的信号转导机制，这些内容基于来自植物及其他生命王国的证据。此外，我们还讨论了识别小分子-蛋白质相互作用的发生、效应及定位所面临的挑战。进一步了解由小分子控制的代谢流，将有助于合理设计代谢工程中的转录调控系统，以生产高价值的次生代谢产物。
authors: Li Ying; Grotewold Erich; Dudareva Natalia
title: Enough is enough: feedback control of specialized metabolism.
keywords: specialized metabolites; small-molecule-mediated feedback inhibition; transcriptional regulation
translated_title: 专化代谢的反馈控制
abstract: Recent advances in our understanding of plant metabolism have highlighted the significance of specialized metabolites in the regulation of gene expression associated with biosynthetic networks. This opinion article focuses on the molecular mechanisms of small-molecule-mediated feedback regulation at the transcriptional level and its potential modes of action, including metabolite signal perception, the nature of the sensor, and the signaling transduction mechanisms leading to transcriptional and post-transcriptional regulation, based on evidence available from plants and other kingdoms of life. We also discuss the challenges associated with identifying the occurrences, effects, and localization of small molecule-protein interactions. Further understanding of small-molecule-controlled metabolic fluxes will enable rational design of transcriptional regulation systems in metabolic engineering to produce high-value specialized metabolites.
affiliations: Department of Horticulture and Landscape Architecture, Purdue University, West Lafayette, IN 47907, USA; Purdue Center for Plant Biology, Purdue University, West Lafayette, IN 47907, USA. Electronic address: li2627@purdue.edu.; Department of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI 48824, USA.; Department of Horticulture and Landscape Architecture, Purdue University, West Lafayette, IN 47907, USA; Purdue Center for Plant Biology, Purdue University, West Lafayette, IN 47907, USA; Department of Biochemistry, Purdue University, West Lafayette, IN 47907, USA.

translated_keywords: 群落结构；个体发育；功能 traits；表型整合；植物结构
translated_abstract: 基于性状的生态学提高了我们对生物体、群落、生态系统及其更广泛功能的理解。然而，由于未考虑表型整合和时间动态，其预测能力仍然有限。本文强调了塑造植物在其生命周期内三维发育的形态发生过程对其表现的影响。我们展示出，建筑性状的多样性使我们能够超越器官层面的性状，以捕捉生态位的时间和空间维度，并为群落组装过程提供信息。总体而言，我们认为，考虑多层级的拓扑结构、几何形状和个体发育特征可以动态地看待整个植物的表现型，并为研究表型整合、植物适应性和表现以及群落结构与动态提供了一个相关框架。
authors: Laurans Marilyne; Munoz François; Charles-Dominique Tristan; Heuret Patrick; Fortunel Claire; Isnard Sandrine; Sabatier Sylvie-Annabel; Caraglio Yves; Violle Cyrille
title: Why incorporate plant architecture into trait-based ecology?
keywords: community structure; ontogeny; functional trait; phenotypic integration; plant architecture
translated_title: 为何将植物结构纳入基于性状的生态学中？
abstract: Trait-based ecology has improved our understanding of the functioning of organisms, communities, ecosystems, and beyond. However, its predictive ability remains limited as long as phenotypic integration and temporal dynamics are not considered. We highlight how the morphogenetic processes that shape the 3D development of a plant during its lifetime affect its performance. We show that the diversity of architectural traits allows us to go beyond organ-level traits in capturing the temporal and spatial dimensions of ecological niches and informing community assembly processes. Overall, we argue that consideration of multilevel topological, geometrical, and ontogenetic features provides a dynamic view of the whole-plant phenotype and a relevant framework for investigating phenotypic integration, plant adaptation and performance, and community structure and dynamics.
affiliations: CIRAD, UMR AMAP, F-34398 Montpellier, France; AMAP, Université de Montpellier, CIRAD, CNRS, INRAE, IRD, Montpellier, France. Electronic address: marilyne.laurans@cirad.fr.; LiPhy, Université Grenoble-Alpes, CNRS, Grenoble, France.; AMAP, Université de Montpellier, CIRAD, CNRS, INRAE, IRD, Montpellier, France; CNRS UMR7618, Institute of Ecology and Environmental Sciences, Paris, Sorbonne University, Paris, France.; AMAP, Université de Montpellier, CIRAD, CNRS, INRAE, IRD, Montpellier, France.; CIRAD, UMR AMAP, F-34398 Montpellier, France; AMAP, Université de Montpellier, CIRAD, CNRS, INRAE, IRD, Montpellier, France.; CEFE, Université de Montpellier, CNRS, EPHE, IRD, Montpellier, France.

translated_keywords: 寡糖；抗病性；PTI；糖链；DAMPs；PRRs；损伤相关分子模式；细胞壁；拟南芥；模式触发免疫；模式识别受体
translated_abstract: 除了作为结构屏障外，植物细胞壁还是植物适应环境条件的重要组成部分。细胞壁是动态结构，其组成和完整性能够根据环境挑战和发育信号进行调整。这些细胞壁的变化被植物感受器/受体感知，从而在发育过程中以及应激感知时触发适应性反应。由病原体感染、损伤或其他压力引起的植物细胞壁损伤会释放出一些细胞壁分子，例如碳水化合物（糖类），这些分子充当损伤相关分子模式（DAMPs）。DAMPs 被模式识别受体（PRRs）的胞外区（ECDs）感知，以激活模式触发免疫（PTI）和疾病抗性。同样地，从与植物相互作用的微生物的细胞壁和胞外层释放的糖类被特定的 ECD-PRRs 识别为微生物相关分子模式（MAMPs），从而触发 PTI 反应。近年来，植物感知的寡糖/DAMPs/MAMPs 的数量有所增加。然而，植物 PRRs 识别糖类的结构机制仍然有限。目前，这一知识主要集中在 LysM-PRR 家族受体上，该家族受体参与感知多种分子，如来自真菌的几丁聚糖寡糖和脂质几丁聚糖寡糖（即细菌来源的 Nod/MYC 因子和共生真菌因子），这些分子触发不同的生理反应。然而，最近发现植物 PRRs 的其他家族也参与寡糖/多糖的识别。这些包括具有富含亮氨酸重复序列和 Malectin 结构域的受体激酶（LRR-MAL RKs）、含有 Malectin 样结构域的 Catharanthus roseus 接收样激酶 1 类似组（CrRLK1L）、壁相关激酶、凝集素-RKs 和 LRR-扩展蛋白。这些新植物受体糖类识别的结构基础表征将揭示它们与哺乳动物中参与糖类感知的类似之处。获得的知识有可能促进可持续的基于糖类的作物保护解决方案的发展。
authors: Molina Antonio; Jordá Lucía; Torres Miguel Ángel; Martín-Dacal Marina; Berlanga Diego José; Fernández-Calvo Patricia; Gómez-Rubio Elena; Martín-Santamaría Sonsoles
title: Plant cell wall-mediated disease resistance: Current understanding and future perspectives.
keywords: oligosaccharides; disease resistance; PTI; glycans; DAMPs; PRRs; damage-associated molecular patterns; cell wall; Arabidopsis thaliana; pattern-triggered immunity; pattern recognition receptor
translated_title: 当前认识与未来展望
abstract: Beyond their function as structural barriers, plant cell walls are essential elements for the adaptation of plants to environmental conditions. Cell walls are dynamic structures whose composition and integrity can be altered in response to environmental challenges and developmental cues. These wall changes are perceived by plant sensors/receptors to trigger adaptative responses during development and upon stress perception. Plant cell wall damage caused by pathogen infection, wounding, or other stresses leads to the release of wall molecules, such as carbohydrates (glycans), that function as damage-associated molecular patterns (DAMPs). DAMPs are perceived by the extracellular ectodomains (ECDs) of pattern recognition receptors (PRRs) to activate pattern-triggered immunity (PTI) and disease resistance. Similarly, glycans released from the walls and extracellular layers of microorganisms interacting with plants are recognized as microbe-associated molecular patterns (MAMPs) by specific ECD-PRRs triggering PTI responses. The number of oligosaccharides DAMPs/MAMPs identified that are perceived by plants has increased in recent years. However, the structural mechanisms underlying glycan recognition by plant PRRs remain limited. Currently, this knowledge is mainly focused on receptors of the LysM-PRR family, which are involved in the perception of various molecules, such as chitooligosaccharides from fungi and lipo-chitooligosaccharides (i.e., Nod/MYC factors from bacteria and mycorrhiza, respectively) that trigger differential physiological responses. Nevertheless, additional families of plant PRRs have recently been implicated in oligosaccharide/polysaccharide recognition. These include receptor kinases (RKs) with leucine-rich repeat and Malectin domains in their ECDs (LRR-MAL RKs), Catharanthus roseus RECEPTOR-LIKE KINASE 1-LIKE group (CrRLK1L) with Malectin-like domains in their ECDs, as well as wall-associated kinases, lectin-RKs, and LRR-extensins. The characterization of structural basis of glycans recognition by these new plant receptors will shed light on their similarities with those of mammalians involved in glycan perception. The gained knowledge holds the potential to facilitate the development of sustainable, glycan-based crop protection solutions.
affiliations: Centro de Biotecnología y Genómica de Plantas, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (UPM) - Instituto Nacional de Investigación y Tecnología Agraria y Alimentaria (INIA/CSIC), Campus de Montegancedo UPM, Pozuelo de Alarcón (Madrid), Spain; Departamento de Biotecnología-Biología Vegetal, Escuela Técnica Superior de Ingeniería Agronómica, Alimentaría y de Biosistemas, UPM, Madrid, Spain. Electronic address: antonio.molina@upm.es.; Centro de Biotecnología y Genómica de Plantas, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (UPM) - Instituto Nacional de Investigación y Tecnología Agraria y Alimentaria (INIA/CSIC), Campus de Montegancedo UPM, Pozuelo de Alarcón (Madrid), Spain; Departamento de Biotecnología-Biología Vegetal, Escuela Técnica Superior de Ingeniería Agronómica, Alimentaría y de Biosistemas, UPM, Madrid, Spain. Electronic address: lucia.jorda@upm.es.; Centro de Biotecnología y Genómica de Plantas, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (UPM) - Instituto Nacional de Investigación y Tecnología Agraria y Alimentaria (INIA/CSIC), Campus de Montegancedo UPM, Pozuelo de Alarcón (Madrid), Spain; Departamento de Biotecnología-Biología Vegetal, Escuela Técnica Superior de Ingeniería Agronómica, Alimentaría y de Biosistemas, UPM, Madrid, Spain.; Centro de Biotecnología y Genómica de Plantas, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (UPM) - Instituto Nacional de Investigación y Tecnología Agraria y Alimentaria (INIA/CSIC), Campus de Montegancedo UPM, Pozuelo de Alarcón (Madrid), Spain.; Centro de Investigaciones Biológicas Margarita Salas, Consejo Superior de Investigaciones Científicas (CSIC), Ramiro de Maeztu 9, 28040 Madrid, Spain.

translated_keywords: 跨物种转移；应激生物学；孤儿基因；功能分析；SnRK–TOR轴；分子/机制事件；免疫调节
translated_abstract: 孤儿基因（OGs）是与其密切相关的物种中没有显著序列相似性的蛋白质编码基因。尽管这些基因在功能上具有重要意义，但对其参与多种生物过程的分子机制知之甚少。本文讨论了孤儿基因在物种特异性适应中的出现及其进化机制。此外，我们还探讨了孤儿基因在多个过程中的作用机制，包括生长、发育、繁殖以及由碳代谢介导的免疫反应。我们强调了孤儿基因与蔗糖非发酵1（SNF1）相关蛋白激酶（SnRKs）-雷帕霉素靶点（TOR）信号轴之间的相互联系，该信号轴在植物激素信号传导、营养代谢和应激反应中起关键作用。最后，我们提出了一种通过转基因方法实现跨物种和种内孤儿基因转移的高通量技术流程，以推动未来的生物技术发展。
authors: Fakhar Ali Zeeshan; Liu Jinbao; Pajerowska-Mukhtar Karolina M; Mukhtar M Shahid
title: The ORFans' tale: new insights in plant biology.
keywords: cross-species transfer; stress biology; Orphan Genes; functional analysis; SnRK–TOR axis; molecular/mechanistic events; immunomodulation
translated_title: 植物生物学的新见解
abstract: Orphan genes (OGs) are protein-coding genes without a significant sequence similarity in closely related species. Despite their functional importance, very little is known about the underlying molecular mechanisms by which OGs participate in diverse biological processes. Here, we discuss the evolutionary mechanisms of OGs' emergence with relevance to species-specific adaptations. We also provide a mechanistic view of the involvement of OGs in multiple processes, including growth, development, reproduction, and carbon-metabolism-mediated immunity. We highlight the interconnection between OGs and the sucrose nonfermenting 1 (SNF1)-related protein kinases (SnRKs)-target of rapamycin (TOR) signaling axis for phytohormone signaling, nutrient metabolism, and stress responses. Finally, we propose a high-throughput pipeline for OGs' interspecies and intraspecies gene transfer through a transgenic approach for future biotechnological advances.
affiliations: Department of Biology, University of Alabama at Birmingham, 1300 University Blvd., Birmingham, AL 35294, USA.; Department of Biology, University of Alabama at Birmingham, 1300 University Blvd., Birmingham, AL 35294, USA. Electronic address: smukhtar@uab.edu.

translated_keywords: 信号通路；植物免疫；CDC48（细胞分裂周期48）
translated_abstract: 蛋白质稳态，即蛋白质合成与降解之间的平衡，必须被精确调控以确保细胞存活，这尤其依赖于泛素-蛋白酶体系统（UPS）。在所有物种中，包括植物，生物和非生物胁迫都会破坏这种稳态。作为维持蛋白质平衡的关键因子，CDC48蛋白在植物中的新兴功能逐渐受到关注，特别是在应对生物胁迫方面。本文综述了植物中CDC48的研究进展，详细描述了其高度保守的结构，阐述了仅存在于Viridiplantae中的基因扩张现象，讨论了其多种功能及其调控机制，并最终聚焦于其在植物免疫反应中的作用机制，尽管这一过程目前仍不完全清楚。
authors: Inès Damien; Courty Pierre-Emmanuel; Wendehenne David; Rosnoblet Claire
title: CDC48 in plants and its emerging function in plant immunity.
keywords: signaling pathways; plant immunity; CDC48
translated_title: 植物中的CDC48及其在植物免疫中的新兴功能
abstract: Protein homeostasis, namely the balance between protein synthesis and degradation, must be finely controlled to ensure cell survival, notably through the ubiquitin-proteasome system (UPS). In all species, including plants, homeostasis is disrupted by biotic and abiotic stresses. A key player in the maintenance of protein balance, the protein CDC48, shows emerging functions in plants, particularly in response to biotic stress. In this review on CDC48 in plants, we detail its highly conserved structure, describe a gene expansion that is only present in Viridiplantae, discuss its various functions and regulations, and finally highlight its recruitment, still not clear, during the plant immune response.
affiliations: Agroécologie, Institut National de Recherche pour l'Agriculture, l'Alimentation, et l'Environnement (INRAE), Institut Agro, Université de Bourgogne, Université Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, Dijon, France.; Agroécologie, Institut National de Recherche pour l'Agriculture, l'Alimentation, et l'Environnement (INRAE), Institut Agro, Université de Bourgogne, Université Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, Dijon, France. Electronic address: claire.rosnoblet@u-bourgogne.fr.

translated_keywords:
1. BCG1 → BCG1（需根据具体上下文确认是否为特定术语或专有名词）
2. plant immunity → 植物免疫
3. PAMP → 病原相关分子模式（Pathogen-Associated Molecular Pattern）
4. bivalent histone modifications → 双价组蛋白修饰
translated_abstract: 组蛋白双修饰在发育过程中调控基因表达，但其在植物-微生物互作中的功能知之甚少。在近期的一项报道中，赵等研究人员表明，含有病原相关分子模式（PAMP）基序的双组蛋白修饰标记基因1（BCG1）的表达受到表观遗传调控，通过组蛋白H3第4位赖氨酸三甲基化（H3K4me3）和第27位赖氨酸三甲基化（H3K27me3），从而逃避植物免疫。
authors: Tang Guangfei; Liu Wende
title: Bivalent histone modifications: how phytopathogens evade plant immunity.
keywords: BCG1; plant immunity; PAMP; bivalent histone modifications
translated_title: 植物病原体如何逃避植物免疫
abstract: Bivalent histone modifications regulate gene expression during development, but little is known about their function in plant-microbe interactions. In a recent report, Zhao et al. showed that expression of bivalent chromatin-marked gene 1 (BCG1), containing a pathogen-associated molecular pattern (PAMP) motif, is epigenetically regulated by trimethylation of lysine 4 (H3K4me3) and lysine 27 (H3K27me3) of histone H3 to evade plant immunity.
affiliations: State Key Laboratory for Biology of Plant Diseases and Insect Pests, Institute of Plant Protection, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing 100193, China.; State Key Laboratory for Biology of Plant Diseases and Insect Pests, Institute of Plant Protection, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing 100193, China. Electronic address: liuwende@caas.cn.

translated_keywords: 适应；重复进化；趋同进化；基因组学；平行进化；分歧时间
translated_abstract: 随着谱系的分化，由于等位基因共享减少、基因功能分化以及基因组结构重组等因素，基因重用的程度应逐渐降低。事实上，我们发现许多关于重复适应的基因组研究显示，分化时间较近的谱系在重复适应过程中表现出更高的基因重用程度，但在较老的分化时间尺度上，这一关系变得不那么清晰。因此，未来的研究应探索塑造基因重用的因素及其在广泛分化时间尺度上的相互作用，以更深入地理解进化可重复性。
authors: Bohutínská Magdalena; Peichel Catherine L
title: Divergence time shapes gene reuse during repeated adaptation.
keywords: adaptation; repeated evolution; convergent evolution; genomics; parallel evolution; divergence time
translated_title: 分歧时间调控重复适应过程中的基因重用。
abstract: When diverse lineages repeatedly adapt to similar environmental challenges, the extent to which the same genes are involved (gene reuse) varies across systems. We propose that divergence time among lineages is a key factor driving this variability: as lineages diverge, the extent of gene reuse should decrease due to reductions in allele sharing, functional differentiation among genes, and restructuring of genome architecture. Indeed, we show that many genomic studies of repeated adaptation find that more recently diverged lineages exhibit higher gene reuse during repeated adaptation, but the relationship becomes less clear at older divergence time scales. Thus, future research should explore the factors shaping gene reuse and their interplay across broad divergence time scales for a deeper understanding of evolutionary repeatability.
affiliations: Division of Evolutionary Ecology, Institute of Ecology and Evolution, University of Bern, Bern, 3012, Switzerland; Department of Botany, Faculty of Science, Charles University, Prague, 12800, Czech Republic. Electronic address: magdalena.bohutinska@natur.cuni.cz.; Division of Evolutionary Ecology, Institute of Ecology and Evolution, University of Bern, Bern, 3012, Switzerland.

translated_keywords: pangenomics; orphan crops; genetic diversity; genome editing; global food security; climate change; selection methods;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 全球粮食安全在很大程度上依赖于少数几种主粮作物，而尽管被忽视作物的研究较少，但它们在环境适应性和增强营养特性方面具有巨大潜力，尤其是在气候不断变化的情况下。主要作物已经从基于基因组学的育种中受益，最初利用单一基因组，后来使用泛基因组。DNA测序技术的最新进展使得几种被忽视的作物构建泛基因组成为可能，从而更全面地了解遗传多样性。被忽视作物的研究现已进入泛基因组学时代，应用这些泛基因组与先进的选择方法和基因编辑技术，可以将这些被忽视的作物转化为具有更广泛农业意义的作物。
authors: Hu Haifei; Zhao Junliang; Thomas William J W; Batley Jacqueline; Edwards David
title: The role of pangenomics in orphan crop improvement.
keywords: (Auto-generated) pangenomics; orphan crops; genetic diversity; genome editing; global food security; climate change; selection methods;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 泛基因组学在孤儿作物改良中的作用
abstract: Global food security depends heavily on a few staple crops, while orphan crops, despite being less studied, offer the potential benefits of environmental adaptation and enhanced nutritional traits, especially in a changing climate. Major crops have benefited from genomics-based breeding, initially using single genomes and later pangenomes. Recent advances in DNA sequencing have enabled pangenome construction for several orphan crops, offering a more comprehensive understanding of genetic diversity. Orphan crop research has now entered the pangenomics era and applying these pangenomes with advanced selection methods and genome editing technologies can transform these neglected species into crops of broader agricultural significance.
affiliations: Rice Research Institute, Guangdong Academy of Agricultural Sciences & Key Laboratory of Genetics and Breeding of High Quality Rice in Southern China (Co-construction by Ministry and Province), Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs & Guangdong Key Laboratory of Rice Science and Technology, Guangzhou, China.; School of Biological Sciences, University of Western Australia, Perth, WA, Australia.; School of Biological Sciences, University of Western Australia, Perth, WA, Australia. dave.edwards@uwa.edu.au.; Centre for Applied Bioinformatics, University of Western Australia, Perth, WA, Australia. dave.edwards@uwa.edu.au.

translated_keywords: medicinal plants; genome assembly; annotation flaws; secondary metabolites; biosynthetic gene clusters; functional genomics; synthetic biology; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: 长读长DNA测序技术推动了药用植物基因组学的发展，截至2025年2月，已有来自203种植物的超过400个基因组被测序。然而，许多基因组仍然存在组装和注释上的缺陷，仅有11个无缺口的端粒到端粒组装。核心挑战仍然是鉴定与次生代谢物生物合成、调控及演化相关的基因。高质量的完整基因组对于表征生物合成基因簇以及实现稳健的功能基因组学和合成生物学应用至关重要。我们建议在现有基础上进一步完善不同品种的基因组组装，借鉴作物基因组学研究的经验，并运用前沿的基因组学技术来推进药用植物基因组学的研究。
authors: Cheng Ling-Tong; Wang Zi-Long; Zhu Qian-Hao; Ye Min; Ye Chu-Yu
title: A long road ahead to reliable and complete medicinal plant genomes.
keywords: (Auto-generated) medicinal plants; genome assembly; annotation flaws; secondary metabolites; biosynthetic gene clusters; functional genomics; synthetic biology; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_title: 通往可靠且完整的药用植物基因组的漫漫长路
abstract: Long-read DNA sequencing has propelled medicinal plant genomics forward, with over 400 genomes from 203 plants sequenced by February 2025. However, many genomes still have assembly and annotation flaws, with only 11 gapless telomere-to-telomere assemblies. The core challenge remains identifying genes linked to secondary metabolite biosynthesis, regulation and evolution. High-quality complete genomes are essential for characterizing biosynthetic gene clusters and for enabling robust functional genomics and synthetic biology applications. We propose to focus on achieving more complete genome assemblies in diverse varieties on the basis of refining the currently available ones, leverage lessons from crop genomics research, and apply the cutting-edge genomics technologies in research of medicinal plant genomics.
affiliations: Institute of Crop Science, Zhejiang Key Laboratory of Crop Germplasm Innovation and Utilization, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou, China.; State Key Laboratory of Natural and Biomimetic Drugs, School of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Peking University, Beijing, China.; CSIRO Agriculture and Food, Canberra, Australia.; Institute of Crop Science, Zhejiang Key Laboratory of Crop Germplasm Innovation and Utilization, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou, China. yecy@zju.edu.cn.

translated_keywords: 基因组;微共线性;宏共线性;功能元件;进化机制;可视化工具;部署增强;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 《基因组背景查看器》是一款基于网络的应用程序，用于根据微观和宏系统结构来识别、比对和可视化基因组区域。通过使用功能元件（如基因注释）作为搜索和比较的基本单位，该工具能够实时计算并展示来自多个联邦数据源的多种组装版本之间的区域关系，使用户能够快速探索多个注释基因组，并识别有助于揭示与功能后果相关的进化机制的分歧和结构事件。在本研究中，我们介绍了《基因组背景查看器》的第2版，并重点介绍了增强可用性、性能以及部署简易性的新功能。
authors: Cleary Alan M; Farmer Andrew D
title: Genome Context Viewer (GCV) version 2: enhanced visual exploration of multiple annotated genomes.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组;微共线性;宏共线性;功能元件;进化机制;可视化工具;部署增强;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 增强对多个注释基因组的可视化探索
abstract: The Genome Context Viewer is a web application for identifying, aligning, and visualizing genomic regions based on their micro and macrosyntenic structures. By using functional elements such as gene annotations as the unit of search and comparison, the Genome Context Viewer can compute and display relationships between regions across many assemblies from federated data sources in real-time, enabling users to rapidly explore multiple annotated genomes and identify divergence and structural events that can help provide insight into evolutionary mechanisms associated with functional consequences. In this work, we introduce version 2 of the Genome Context Viewer and highlight new features that enhance usability, performance, and ease of deployment.
affiliations: National Center for Genome Resources, 2935 Rodeo Park Dr E, Santa Fe, NM 87505, USA.

translated_keywords: 基因组过滤;序列数据库;污染读取;自动化更新;交互式仪表板;数据清洗;基因组功能;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: (i) 自动更新相关数据库；(ii) 快速比对每个读段与数据库；(iii) 创建用户自定义数据库的能力；(iv) 用户友好的交互式仪表板，用于调查污染的来源和频率；(v) 生成无污染的文件。可用性：https://genomefltr.tau.ac.il/。
authors: Dotan Edo; Alburquerque Michael; Wygoda Elya; Huchon Dorothée; Pupko Tal
title: GenomeFLTR: filtering reads made easy.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组过滤;序列数据库;污染读取;自动化更新;交互式仪表板;数据清洗;基因组功能;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 简化的读段过滤工具
abstract: In the last decade, advances in sequencing technology have led to an exponential increase in genomic data. These new data have dramatically changed our understanding of the evolution and function of genes and genomes. Despite improvements in sequencing technologies, identifying contaminated reads remains a complex task for many research groups. Here, we introduce GenomeFLTR, a new web server to filter contaminated reads. Reads are compared against existing sequence databases from various representative organisms to detect potential contaminants. The main features implemented in GenomeFLTR are: (i) automated updating of the relevant databases; (ii) fast comparison of each read against the database; (iii) the ability to create user-specified databases; (iv) a user-friendly interactive dashboard to investigate the origin and frequency of the contaminations; (v) the generation of a contamination-free file. Availability: https://genomefltr.tau.ac.il/.
affiliations: The Shmunis School of Biomedicine and Cancer Research, George S. Wise Faculty of Life Sciences, Tel Aviv University, Tel Aviv 69978, Israel.; School of Zoology, George S. Wise Faculty of Life Sciences, Tel Aviv University, Tel Aviv 69978, Israel.; The Steinhardt Museum of Natural History, Israel National Center for Biodiversity Studies, Tel-Aviv University, Tel Aviv 69978, Israel.

translated_keywords: 黄曲霉毒素；生物合成基因簇；构巢曲霉；米曲霉；同质性；比较泛基因组；CAZyme
translated_abstract: 黄曲霉（*Aspergillus flavus*）和米曲霉（*Aspergillus oryzae*）是两种亲缘关系密切的真菌，在食品安全与发酵领域却扮演着截然不同的角色。为了全面研究它们的系统发育、基因组及代谢特性，我们利用两者的完整去冗余基因组集合进行了广泛的比较泛基因组分析。基于所有鉴定到的单拷贝直系同源基因以及六种常用于真菌分类的管家基因的系统发育分析，并未发现*Aspergillus flavus*和*Aspergillus oryzae*基因组之间存在明确分化。对基因组中的黄曲霉毒素生物合成基因簇进行分析后发现，非黄曲霉毒素产生菌株在系统发育树中广泛分布，涵盖了*Aspergillus flavus*和*Aspergillus oryzae*菌株。这表明黄曲霉毒素的产生并非区分这两种真菌的显著特征。此外，*Aspergillus oryzae*和*Aspergillus flavus*菌株在基因组属性（如基因组大小、基因含量、GC含量）以及代谢特征和途径方面表现出显著相似性。两物种基因组中CAZyme基因和次级代谢产物生物合成基因簇的分析进一步凸显了它们的相似性。综合来看，这些结果挑战了传统上将*Aspergillus flavus*和*Aspergillus oryzae*视为不同物种的观点，强调了它们在系统发育、基因组和代谢上的同质性，可能表明它们实际上属于同一物种。
authors: Han Dong Min; Baek Ju Hye; Choi Dae Gyu; Jeon Min-Seung; Eyun Seong-Il; Jeon Che Ok
title: Comparative pangenome analysis of Aspergillus flavus and Aspergillus oryzae reveals their phylogenetic, genomic, and metabolic homogeneity.
keywords: Aflatoxin; Biosynthetic gene cluster; Aspergillus flavus; Aspergillus oryzae; Homogeneity; Comparative pangenome; CAZyme
translated_title: 黄曲霉和米曲霉的比较泛基因组分析揭示其系统发育、基因组及代谢上的同质性
abstract: Aspergillus flavus and Aspergillus oryzae are closely related fungal species with contrasting roles in food safety and fermentation. To comprehensively investigate their phylogenetic, genomic, and metabolic characteristics, we conducted an extensive comparative pangenome analysis using complete, dereplicated genome sets for both species. Phylogenetic analyses, employing both the entirety of the identified single-copy orthologous genes and six housekeeping genes commonly used for fungal classification, did not reveal clear differentiation between A. flavus and A. oryzae genomes. Upon analyzing the aflatoxin biosynthesis gene clusters within the genomes, we observed that non-aflatoxin-producing strains were dispersed throughout the phylogenetic tree, encompassing both A. flavus and A. oryzae strains. This suggests that aflatoxin production is not a distinguishing trait between the two species. Furthermore, A. oryzae and A. flavus strains displayed remarkably similar genomic attributes, including genome sizes, gene contents, and G + C contents, as well as metabolic features and pathways. The profiles of CAZyme genes and secondary metabolite biosynthesis gene clusters within the genomes of both species further highlight their similarity. Collectively, these findings challenge the conventional differentiation of A. flavus and A. oryzae as distinct species and highlight their phylogenetic, genomic, and metabolic homogeneity, potentially indicating that they may indeed belong to the same species.
affiliations: Department of Life Science, Chung-Ang University, Seoul 06974, Republic of Korea.; Department of Life Science, Chung-Ang University, Seoul 06974, Republic of Korea. Electronic address: cojeon@cau.ac.kr.

translated_keywords: Plant Reactome;植物途径;知识库;基因注释;代谢通路;数据互操作性;FAIR原则;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: //plantreactome.gramene.org）是一个免费访问的综合性植物通路知识库。它提供了来自水稻（Oryza sativa）的经过注释的参考通路，并基于基因直系同源关系将这些通路投影到另外129个物种中，涵盖单细胞光能自养生物、非维管植物和高等植物，从而涵盖了广泛的分类多样性。目前，植物Reactome包含339条参考通路的集合，覆盖了代谢和运输通路、激素信号传导、发育过程的遗传调控以及复杂的转录网络，这些网络协调植物对非生物和生物刺激的响应。除了作为一个数据存储库之外，植物Reactome还充当一个动态的数据发现平台。用户可以在丰富的植物通路背景下分析和可视化组学数据，如基因表达、基因-基因相互作用、蛋白质组和代谢组数据。植物Reactome致力于促进数据互操作性，坚持全球数据标准，并遵循可发现性、可访问性、互操作性和可重用性（FAIR）的数据政策原则。
authors: Gupta Parul; Elser Justin; Hooks Elizabeth; D'Eustachio Peter; Jaiswal Pankaj; Naithani Sushma
title: Plant Reactome Knowledgebase: empowering plant pathway exploration and OMICS data analysis.
keywords: (Auto-generated) Plant Reactome;植物途径;知识库;基因注释;代谢通路;数据互操作性;FAIR原则;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 推动植物通路探索与组学数据分析
abstract: Plant Reactome (https://plantreactome.gramene.org) is a freely accessible, comprehensive plant pathway knowledgebase. It provides curated reference pathways from rice (Oryza sativa) and gene-orthology-based pathway projections to 129 additional species, spanning single-cell photoautotrophs, non-vascular plants, and higher plants, thus encompassing a wide-ranging taxonomic diversity. Currently, Plant Reactome houses a collection of 339 reference pathways, covering metabolic and transport pathways, hormone signaling, genetic regulations of developmental processes, and intricate transcriptional networks that orchestrate a plant's response to abiotic and biotic stimuli. Beyond being a mere repository, Plant Reactome serves as a dynamic data discovery platform. Users can analyze and visualize omics data, such as gene expression, gene-gene interaction, proteome, and metabolome data, all within the rich context of plant pathways. Plant Reactome is dedicated to fostering data interoperability, upholding global data standards, and embracing the tenets of the Findable, Accessible, Interoperable and Re-usable (FAIR) data policy.
affiliations: Department of Botany & Plant Pathology, Oregon State University, Corvallis, OR 97331, USA.; NYU Grossman School of Medicine, New York, NY 10016, USA.

translated_keywords: RIN1; 密植; 茎段长度; 粒产量; GA2ox7; STF1/STF2; SUPPRESSOR OF PHYA 105 3a; 生物学; 分子遗传学
translated_abstract: 主要谷类作物从绿色革命特性（如更短且紧凑的植株形态）中获益，从而允许高密度种植，但大豆相对被忽视。为了在高密度种植条件下平衡理想的大豆产量与植株高度，需要缩短节间长度而不减少节点和豆荚数量。本文研究了一种短节间大豆突变体——rin1（reduced internode 1）。rin1的部分功能缺失是由SUPPRESSOR OF PHYA 105 3a（SPA3a）部分丧失引起的。RIN1通过与ELONGATED HYPOCOTYL 5（HY5）的两个同源蛋白STF1和STF2的物理相互作用促进其降解。RIN1通过STF1/STF2-GA2ox7调控模块调节赤霉素代谢以控制节间发育。田间试验表明，与优良品种野生型相比，rin1在高密度种植条件下显著提高了籽粒产量。因此，rin1突变体可作为提高高密度栽培和大豆-玉米间作系统中籽粒产量的宝贵资源。
authors: Li Shichen; Sun Zhihui; Sang Qing; Qin Chao; Kong Lingping; Huang Xin; Liu Huan; Su Tong; Li Haiyang; He Milan; Fang Chao; Wang Lingshuang; Liu Shuangrong; Liu Bin; Liu Baohui; Fu Xiangdong; Kong Fanjiang; Lu Sijia
title: Soybean reduced internode 1 determines internode length and improves grain yield at dense planting.
keywords: (Auto-generated) RIN1; 密植; 茎段长度; 粒产量; GA2ox7; STF1/STF2; SUPPRESSOR OF PHYA 105 3a; 生物学; 分子遗传学
translated_title: 大豆矮化基因Soybean reduced internode 1决定节间长度并在密植条件下提高产量。
abstract: Major cereal crops have benefitted from Green Revolution traits such as shorter and more compact plants that permit high-density planting, but soybean has remained relatively overlooked. To balance ideal soybean yield with plant height under dense planting, shortening of internodes without reducing the number of nodes and pods is desired. Here, we characterized a short-internode soybean mutant, reduced internode 1 (rin1). Partial loss of SUPPRESSOR OF PHYA 105 3a (SPA3a) underlies rin1. RIN1 physically interacts with two homologs of ELONGATED HYPOCOTYL 5 (HY5), STF1 and STF2, to promote their degradation. RIN1 regulates gibberellin metabolism to control internode development through a STF1/STF2-GA2ox7 regulatory module. In field trials, rin1 significantly enhances grain yield under high-density planting conditions comparing to its wild type of elite cultivar. rin1 mutants therefore could serve as valuable resources for improving grain yield under high-density cultivation and in soybean-maize intercropping systems.

translated_keywords: 基因年龄;基因功能;基因簇;基因重组;选择压力;进化保守;必需基因;生物信息学;微生物学
translated_abstract: 细菌和古菌基因组包含大量的操纵子，通常由两到五个基因组成。然而，在更大的尺度上，基因顺序在原核生物的进化过程中保存得较差。尽管如此，不同类别基因在原核生物染色体上的非随机定位可能反映了重要的功能和进化约束。我们研究了在细菌和古菌多样性范围内进化保守（古老）基因和可变（年轻）基因在基因组中的定位模式。几乎所有细菌和古菌染色体都被发现包含大量100-300 kb的大片段，这些片段显著富集了古老或年轻的基因。同样地，具有致死敲除表型（必需）基因也观察到了类似的聚类现象。基因组进化的数学模型表明，原核生物染色体中的这种长程基因聚类反映了由选择和中性过程共同驱动的持续基因组重排，而不是进化保守的结果。
authors: Wolf Yuri I; Schurov Ilya V; Makarova Kira S; Katsnelson Mikhail I; Koonin Eugene V
title: Long range segmentation of prokaryotic genomes by gene age and functionality.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因年龄;基因功能;基因簇;基因重组;选择压力;进化保守;必需基因;生物信息学;微生物学
translated_title: 原核生物基因组的长程分割基于基因年龄和功能特性
abstract: Bacterial and archaeal genomes encompass numerous operons that typically consist of two to five genes. On larger scales, however, gene order is poorly conserved through the evolution of prokaryotes. Nevertheless, non-random localization of different classes of genes on prokaryotic chromosomes could reflect important functional and evolutionary constraints. We explored the patterns of genomic localization of evolutionarily conserved (ancient) and variable (young) genes across the diversity of bacteria and archaea. Nearly all bacterial and archaeal chromosomes were found to encompass large segments of 100-300 kb that were significantly enriched in either ancient or young genes. Similar clustering of genes with lethal knockout phenotype (essential genes) was observed as well. Mathematical modeling of genome evolution suggests that this long-range gene clustering in prokaryotic chromosomes reflects perpetual genome rearrangement driven by a combination of selective and neutral processes rather than evolutionary conservation.
affiliations: National Center for Biotechnology Information, National Library of Medicine, National Institutes of Health, Bethesda, MD 20894, USA.; Institute for Molecules and Materials, Radboud University, Nijmegen 6525AJ, The Netherlands.

translated_keywords: Orthologous clusters; Phylogenetic analysis; Gene family analysis; Comparative genomics; Visualization tools; Collinearity analysis; 基因家族收缩与扩张分析; 生物信息学; 分子进化
translated_abstract: //orthovenn3.bioinfotoolkits.net 免费访问。
authors: Sun Jiahe; Lu Fang; Luo Yongjiang; Bie Lingzi; Xu Ling; Wang Yi
title: OrthoVenn3: an integrated platform for exploring and visualizing orthologous data across genomes.
keywords: (Auto-generated) Orthologous clusters; Phylogenetic analysis; Gene family analysis; Comparative genomics; Visualization tools; Collinearity analysis; 基因家族收缩与扩张分析; 生物信息学; 分子进化
translated_title: 一个整合的平台，用于探索和可视化基因组间的直系同源数据。
abstract: Advancements in comparative genomics research have led to a growing interest in studying species evolution and genetic diversity. To facilitate this research, OrthoVenn3 has been developed as a powerful, web-based tool that enables users to efficiently identify and annotate orthologous clusters and infer phylogenetic relationships across a range of species. The latest upgrade of OrthoVenn includes several important new features, including enhanced orthologous cluster identification accuracy, improved visualization capabilities for numerous sets of data, and wrapped phylogenetic analysis. Furthermore, OrthoVenn3 now provides gene family contraction and expansion analysis to support researchers better understanding the evolutionary history of gene families, as well as collinearity analysis to detect conserved and variable genomic structures. With its intuitive user interface and robust functionality, OrthoVenn3 is a valuable resource for comparative genomics research. The tool is freely accessible at https://orthovenn3.bioinfotoolkits.net.
affiliations: Integrative Science Center of Germplasm Creation in Western China (CHONGQING) Science City, Biological Science Research Center, Southwest University, Chongqing, China.; State Key Laboratory of Plant Environmental Resilience, College of Biological Sciences, China Agricultural University, Beijing, China.

translated_keywords: 方法；故障排查；实体组织；光学基因组图谱；血液；细胞；肿瘤学
translated_abstract: 光学基因组图谱。
authors: Sahajpal Nikhil Shri; Mondal Ashis K; Hastie Alex; Chaubey Alka; Kolhe Ravindra
title: Optical Genome Mapping for Oncology Applications.
keywords: method; troubleshooting; solid tissue; optical genome mapping; blood; cells; oncology
translated_title: 光学基因组图谱在肿瘤学应用中的研究
abstract: Optical genome mapping (OGM) is a next-generation cytogenomic technology that has the potential to replace standard-of-care technologies used in the genetic workup of various malignancies. The ability to detect various classes of structural variations that include copy number variations, deletions, duplications, balanced and unbalanced events (insertions, inversions, and translocation) and complex genomic rearrangements in a single assay and analysis demonstrates the utility of the technology in tumor research and clinical application. Herein, we provide the methodological details for performing OGM and pre- and post-analytical quality control (QC) checks and describe critical steps that should be performed with caution, probable causes for specific QC failures, and potential method modifications that could be implemented as part of troubleshooting. The protocol description and troubleshooting guide should help new and current users of the technology to improve or troubleshoot the problems (if any) in their workflow. © 2023 Wiley Periodicals LLC. Basic Protocol: Optical genome mapping.
affiliations: Greenwood Genetic Center, Greenwood, South Carolina.; Department of Pathology, Augusta University, Augusta, Georgia.; Bionano Genomics, San Diego, California.

translated_keywords: 化学生态学；表观遗传学；分子进化遗传学；生物合成基因簇；次生代谢
translated_abstract: 次生代谢对植物生存至关重要，并能产生具有营养、治疗和工业价值的化学物质。某些次生代谢物的生物合成基因在染色体的局部区域呈簇状排列。这些生物合成基因簇（BGCs）的排列挑战了真核生物随机基因排列的传统模型，引发了对其调控、生态意义和进化的疑问。本文综述了这些问题，探讨了BGCs在与植物共生相关生态相互作用中的贡献，同时评估了控制其协调性应激特异性和组织特异性表达的分子-（表观）遗传机制。基于证据显示BGCs具有独特的染色质特征且富含转座元件（TEs），我们将新兴假说整合到一个更新的进化模型中，强调了应激诱导的表观遗传过程如何塑造了BGC的形成。
authors: Cawood George Lister; Ton Jurriaan
title: Decoding resilience: ecology, regulation, and evolution of biosynthetic gene clusters.
keywords: chemical ecology; epigenetics; molecular evolutionary genetics; biosynthetic gene clusters; secondary metabolism
translated_title: 解析 resilient 的生态学、调控与生物合成基因簇的演化
abstract: Secondary metabolism is crucial for plant survival and can generate chemistry with nutritional, therapeutic, and industrial value. Biosynthetic genes of selected secondary metabolites cluster within localised chromosomal regions. The arrangement of these biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) challenges the long-held model of random gene order in eukaryotes, raising questions about their regulation, ecological significance, and evolution. In this review, we address these questions by exploring the contribution of BGCs to ecologically relevant plant-biotic interactions, while also evaluating the molecular-(epi)genetic mechanisms controlling their coordinated stress- and tissue-specific expression. Based on evidence that BGCs have distinct chromatin signatures and are enriched with transposable elements (TEs), we integrate emerging hypotheses into an updated evolutionary model emphasising how stress-induced epigenetic processes have shaped BGC formation.
affiliations: Plants, Photosynthesis and Soil, School of Biosciences, The University of Sheffield, Western Bank, Sheffield, S10 2TN, UK. Electronic address: gdlcawood1@sheffield.ac.uk.; Plants, Photosynthesis and Soil, School of Biosciences, The University of Sheffield, Western Bank, Sheffield, S10 2TN, UK. Electronic address: j.ton@sheffield.ac.uk.

translated_keywords: 水稻基因组; 基因注释项目; 数据库更新; 全基因组组装; 基因共表达; 同线基因; 比较基因组分析; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: Oryza sativa L.）是全球重要的谷物作物，为人类提供热量。由于其较小的基因组，水稻被广泛用作禾本科植物遗传和基因组研究的模式生物。自2002年首个水稻基因组序列发布以来，已生成了改进的参考基因组组装、多个全基因组组装、广泛的基因表达谱以及来自超过3000个水稻种质资源的重测序数据。为了便于植物学家访问水稻基因组，我们更新了水稻基因组注释项目数据库（RGAP；https://rice.uga.edu），新增了包括16个全基因组组装和多个水稻泛基因组项目（如3000水稻基因组计划）生成的序列变异在内的新数据集。我们还更新了基于80个RNA测序数据集的基因表达丰度数据，并通过基因共表达分析构建了39个共表达模块，这些模块捕获了高度连接的共调控基因集合，以促进基因功能的发现。为了便于比较基因组分析，我们在日本晴参考基因组与其他水稻基因组之间鉴定了32,335个同线基因，在日本晴与另外四个禾本科植物基因组之间鉴定了19,371个同线基因。RGAP数据库的基础设施改进包括升级的基因组浏览器和数据访问门户、增强的网站安全性以及提升的网站性能。
authors: Hamilton John P; Li Chenxin; Buell C Robin
title: The rice genome annotation project: an updated database for mining the rice genome.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 水稻基因组; 基因注释项目; 数据库更新; 全基因组组装; 基因共表达; 同线基因; 比较基因组分析; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_title: 一个挖掘水稻基因组的更新数据库
abstract: Rice (Oryza sativa L.) is a major cereal crop that provides calories across the world. With a small genome, rice has been used extensively as a model for genetic and genomic studies in the Poaceae. Since the release of the first rice genome sequence in 2002, an improved reference genome assembly, multiple whole genome assemblies, extensive gene expression profiles, and resequencing data from over 3000 rice accessions have been generated. To facilitate access to the rice genome for plant biologists, we updated the Rice Genome Annotation Project database (RGAP; https://rice.uga.edu) with new datasets including 16 whole genome rice assemblies and sequence variants generated from multiple rice pan-genome projects including the 3000 Rice Genomes Project. We updated gene expression abundance data with 80 RNA-sequencing datasets and to facilitate gene function discovery, performed gene coexpression resulting in 39 coexpression modules that capture highly connected sets of co-regulated genes. To facilitate comparative genome analyses, 32 335 syntelogs were identified between the Nipponbare reference genome and other rice genomes and 19 371 syntelogs were identified between Nipponbare and four other Poaceae genomes. Infrastructure improvements to the RGAP database include an upgraded genome browser and data access portals, enhanced website security and increased performance of the website.
affiliations: Department of Crop & Soil Sciences, University of Georgia, Athens, GA 30602, USA.; Center for Applied Genetic Technologies, University of Georgia, Athens, GA 30602, USA.; Institute of Plant Breeding, Genetics & Genomics, University of Georgia, Athens, GA 30602, USA.; The Plant Center, University of Georgia, Athens, GA 30602, USA.

translated_keywords: 生物胁迫；生长-防御权衡；非生物胁迫；根域微生物群；有益微生物
translated_abstract: 有益微生物（BMs）能够促进植物生长并增强其抗逆性。本文综述了BMs通过改善养分吸收、产生促生长激素以及刺激根系发育来诱导植物生长的机制。同时，探讨了BMs如何提高植物的抗病性和帮助其抵御非生物胁迫的作用。已知生长与防御之间的权衡会影响植物在不利条件下的生存能力。本文讨论了研究表明BMs通过微生物相关分子模式及包括富含亮氨酸重复受体样激酶通路、脱落酸信号通路和特定转录因子调控在内的多条途径调节生长-防御权衡的研究成果。这种多方面的关系凸显了BMs在可持续农业中的重要意义。最后，强调了整合人工智能以革新生物肥料研究的必要性。本文还阐明了植物-微生物协同作用的微生物制剂的前沿进展及其潜力。
authors: Liu Yan; Shi Aiqin; Chen Yue; Xu Zhihui; Liu Yongxin; Yao Yanlai; Wang Yiming; Jia Baolei
title: Beneficial microorganisms: Regulating growth and defense for plant welfare.
keywords: biotic stresses; Growth‐defense trade‐offs; abiotic stresses; rhizosphere microbiomes; beneficial microorganisms
translated_title: 调控生长与防御以增进植物福祉
abstract: Beneficial microorganisms (BMs) promote plant growth and enhance stress resistance. This review summarizes how BMs induce growth promotion by improving nutrient uptake, producing growth-promoting hormones and stimulating root development. How BMs enhance disease resistance and help protect plants from abiotic stresses has also been explored. Growth-defense trade-offs are known to affect the ability of plants to survive under unfavourable conditions. This review discusses studies demonstrating that BMs regulate growth-defense trade-offs through microbe-associated molecular patterns and multiple pathways, including the leucine-rich repeat receptor-like kinase pathway, abscisic acid signalling pathway and specific transcriptional factor regulation. This multifaceted relationship underscores the significance of BMs in sustainable agriculture. Finally, the need for integration of artificial intelligence to revolutionize biofertilizer research has been highlighted. This review also elucidates the cutting-edge advancements and potential of plant-microbe synergistic microbial agents.
affiliations: Xianghu Laboratory, Hangzhou, China.; Jiangsu Provincial Key Lab of Solid Organic Waste Utilization, Nanjing Agricultural University, Nanjing, China.; Horticulture Research Institute, Zhejiang Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Hangzhou, China.; Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory of Lingnan Modern Agriculture, Genome Analysis Laboratory of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen, China.; Institute of Environment, Resource, Soil and Fertiliser, Zhejiang Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Hangzhou, China.; Department of Plant Pathology, Key Laboratory of Integrated Management of Crop Diseases and Pests, Ministry of Education, Nanjing Agricultural University, Nanjing, China.

translated_abstract: https://mtb.bioinf.med.uni-goettingen.de/SeqCAT/。
authors: Kornrumpf Kevin; Kurz Nadine S; Drofenik Klara; Krauß Lukas; Schneider Carolin; Koch Raphael; Beißbarth Tim; Dönitz Jürgen
title: SeqCAT: Sequence Conversion and Analysis Toolbox.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因变异;序列转换;参考基因组;标准化;遗传研究;用户界面;应用程序接口;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 序列转换与分析工具箱
abstract: Dealing with sequence coordinates in different formats and reference genomes is challenging in genetic research. This complexity arises from the need to convert and harmonize datasets of different sources using alternating nomenclatures. Since manual processing is time-consuming and requires specialized knowledge, the Sequence Conversion and Analysis Toolbox (SeqCAT) was developed for daily work with genetic datasets. Our tool provides a range of functions designed to standardize and convert gene variant coordinates based on various sequence types. Its user-friendly web interface provides easy access to all functionalities, while the Application Programming Interface (API) enables automation within pipelines. SeqCAT provides access to human genomic, protein and transcript data, utilizing various data resources and packages and extending them with its own unique features. The platform covers a wide range of genetic research needs with its 14 different applications and 3 info points, including search for transcript and gene information, transition between reference genomes, variant mapping, and genetic event review. Notable examples are 'Convert Protein to DNA Position' for translation of amino acid changes into genomic single nucleotide variants, or 'Fusion Check' for frameshift determination in gene fusions. SeqCAT is an excellent resource for converting sequence coordinate data into the required formats and is available at: https://mtb.bioinf.med.uni-goettingen.de/SeqCAT/.
affiliations: Department of Medical Bioinformatics, University Medical Center Göttingen, Goldschmidtstr. 1, 37077 Göttingen, Germany.; Göttingen Comprehensive Cancer Center (G-CCC), 37075 Göttingen, Germany.; Department of General, Visceral and Pediatric Surgery, University Medical Center Göttingen, Robert-Koch Str. 40, 37075 Göttingen, Germany.; Department of Hematology and Medical Oncology, University Medical Center Göttingen, Robert-Koch Str. 40, 37075 Göttingen, Germany.; Campus Institute Data Science (CIDAS), Göttingen, Germany.

translated_keywords: 酶复合体；相互作用组；AlphaFold2；植物油脂生物合成；三酰甘油；代谢组
translated_abstract: 植物脂质通过参与细胞膜形成、能量储存和信号传导，在植物发育和胁迫响应中发挥着至关重要的生物学作用。主要由储存脂质三酰甘油组成的植物油脂在食品、生物燃料及油脂化学工业中也有重要应用。脂质生物合成发生在多个亚细胞区室，并涉及各种途径的协调作用。尽管过去几十年的生化和分子生物学研究已经鉴定出许多与脂质代谢相关的蛋白质，但我们对参与脂质生物合成、修饰和转运的动态蛋白相互作用组的理解仍然有限。本文综述了植物脂质生物合成相关蛋白相互作用组的鉴定和表征方面的进展，重点关注由不同亚基组成的蛋白质复合体（如脂肪酸生物合成和修饰中的序列反应）以及由合作途径中的酶形成的瞬时或动态相互作用组（如三酰甘油生物合成中的膜结合酶组装）。此外，我们展示了使用AlphaFold2预测的一些代表性蛋白相互作用组结构，并讨论了利用相互作用组知识在植物脂质生物技术中的当前和潜在策略。最后，文章还讨论了该研究领域尚未解决的问题及其可能的解决方法。
authors: Xu Yang; Singer Stacy D; Chen Guanqun
title: Protein interactomes for plant lipid biosynthesis and their biotechnological applications.
keywords: enzyme complex; interactome; AlphaFold2; plant oil biosynthesis; triacylglycerol; metabolon
translated_title: 植物脂质生物合成的蛋白质相互作用组及其生物技术应用
abstract: Plant lipids have essential biological roles in plant development and stress responses through their functions in cell membrane formation, energy storage and signalling. Vegetable oil, which is composed mainly of the storage lipid triacylglycerol, also has important applications in food, biofuel and oleochemical industries. Lipid biosynthesis occurs in multiple subcellular compartments and involves the coordinated action of various pathways. Although biochemical and molecular biology research over the last few decades has identified many proteins associated with lipid metabolism, our current understanding of the dynamic protein interactomes involved in lipid biosynthesis, modification and channelling is limited. This review examines advances in the identification and characterization of protein interactomes involved in plant lipid biosynthesis, with a focus on protein complexes consisting of different subunits for sequential reactions such as those in fatty acid biosynthesis and modification, as well as transient or dynamic interactomes formed from enzymes in cooperative pathways such as assemblies of membrane-bound enzymes for triacylglycerol biosynthesis. We also showcase a selection of representative protein interactome structures predicted using AlphaFold2, and discuss current and prospective strategies involving the use of interactome knowledge in plant lipid biotechnology. Finally, unresolved questions in this research area and possible approaches to address them are also discussed.
affiliations: Department of Molecular and Cellular Biology, University of Guelph, Guelph, Ontario, Canada.; Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, Lethbridge Research and Development Centre, Lethbridge, Alberta, Canada.; Department of Agricultural, Food and Nutritional Science, University of Alberta, Edmonton, Alberta, Canada.

translated_keywords: dbSNP; 单核苷酸多态性; 基因组研究; 全基因组关联研究; 人类遗传变异; 精准医学; 种群基因组学; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/snp。
authors: Phan Lon; Zhang Hua; Wang Qiang; Villamarin Ricardo; Hefferon Tim; Ramanathan Aravinthan; Kattman Brandi
title: The evolution of dbSNP: 25 years of impact in genomic research.
keywords: (Auto-generated) dbSNP; 单核苷酸多态性; 基因组研究; 全基因组关联研究; 人类遗传变异; 精准医学; 种群基因组学; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_title: 在基因组研究中的 25 年影响
abstract: The Single Nucleotide Polymorphism Database (dbSNP), established in 1998 by the National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI), has been a critical resource in genomics for cataloging small genetic variations. Originally focused on single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs), dbSNP has since expanded to include a variety of genetic variants, playing a key role in genome-wide association studies (GWAS), population genetics, pharmacogenomics, and cancer research. Over 25 years, dbSNP has grown to include more than 4.4 billion submitted SNPs and 1.1 billion unique reference SNPs, providing essential data for identifying disease-related genetic variants and studying human diversity. Integrating large-scale projects like 1000 Genomes, gnomAD, TOPMed, and ALFA has expanded dbSNP's catalog of human genetic variation, increasing its usefulness for research and clinical applications. Keeping up with advancements such as next-generation sequencing and cloud-based infrastructure, dbSNP remains a cornerstone of genetic research supporting continued discoveries in precision medicine and population genomics. DATABASE URL: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/snp.
affiliations: Information Engineering Branch, National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI), National Library of Medicine (NLM), National Institutes of Health (NIH), Bethesda, MD 20894, USA.

translated_keywords: CRISPR/Cas9; sgRNA设计; 序列基序; 基因组编辑; 实验验证; 转录起始位点; CRISPR工具; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: //transcrispr.igcz.poznan.pl/transcrispr/访问。
authors: Woźniak Tomasz; Sura Weronika; Kazimierska Marta; Kasprzyk Marta Elżbieta; Podralska Marta; Dzikiewicz-Krawczyk Agnieszka
title: TransCRISPR-sgRNA design tool for CRISPR/Cas9 experiments targeting specific sequence motifs.
keywords: (Auto-generated) CRISPR/Cas9; sgRNA设计; 序列基序; 基因组编辑; 实验验证; 转录起始位点; CRISPR工具; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_title: 针对特定序列基序的CRISPR/Cas9实验TransCRISPR-sgRNA设计工具
abstract: Eukaryotic genomes contain several types of recurrent sequence motifs, e.g. transcription factor motifs, miRNA binding sites, repetitive elements. CRISPR/Cas9 can facilitate identification and study of crucial motifs. We present transCRISPR, the first online tool dedicated to search for sequence motifs in the user-provided genomic regions and design optimal sgRNAs targeting them. Users can obtain sgRNAs for chosen motifs, for up to tens of thousands of target regions in 30 genomes, either for the Cas9 or dCas9 system. TransCRISPR provides user-friendly tables and visualizations, summarizing features of identified motifs and designed sgRNAs such as genomic localization, quality scores, closest transcription start sites and others. Experimental validation of sgRNAs for MYC binding sites designed with transCRISPR confirmed efficient disruption of the targeted motifs and effect on expression of MYC-regulated genes. TransCRISPR is available from https://transcrispr.igcz.poznan.pl/transcrispr/.
affiliations: Institute of Human Genetics, Polish Academy of Sciences, Poznań, Poland.

translated_keywords: 泛基因组学；变异图；算法；de Bruijn图；序列分析
translated_abstract: 由于单一参考基因组无法涵盖所有人类个体中存在的变异，因此引入了泛基因组图谱来整合广泛的基因组分析中的群体多样性。已有多种数据结构被提出用于表示基因组集合为泛基因组，特别是图谱形式。本研究收集了所有公开可用的高质量人类单倍型，并构建了迄今为止最大的人类泛基因组图谱，纳入了52个个体以及两个合成参考（CHM13和GRCh38）。我们使用五种最先进的工具（Bifrost、mdbg、Minigraph、Minigraph-Cactus 和 pggb）构建了该集合的变异图和de Bruijn图。我们考察了这些工具在表示输入序列间变异时的差异，包括整体图结构和特定遗传位点的表示方式。这项工作揭示了泛基因组图谱表示之间的关键差异，为终端用户提供如何为其应用选择最合适的图类型的信息。
authors: Andreace Francesco; Lechat Pierre; Dufresne Yoann; Chikhi Rayan
title: Comparing methods for constructing and representing human pangenome graphs.
keywords: Pangenomics; Variation graphs; Algorithms; de Bruijn graphs; Sequence analysis
translated_title: 比较构建和表征人类泛基因组图谱的方法
abstract: As a single reference genome cannot possibly represent all the variation present across human individuals, pangenome graphs have been introduced to incorporate population diversity within a wide range of genomic analyses. Several data structures have been proposed for representing collections of genomes as pangenomes, in particular graphs. In this work, we collect all publicly available high-quality human haplotypes and construct the largest human pangenome graphs to date, incorporating 52 individuals in addition to two synthetic references (CHM13 and GRCh38). We build variation graphs and de Bruijn graphs of this collection using five of the state-of-the-art tools: Bifrost, mdbg, Minigraph, Minigraph-Cactus and pggb. We examine differences in the way each of these tools represents variations between input sequences, both in terms of overall graph structure and representation of specific genetic loci. This work sheds light on key differences between pangenome graph representations, informing end-users on how to select the most appropriate graph type for their application.
affiliations: Department of Computational Biology, Institut Pasteur, Université Paris Cité, Paris, F-75015, France. francesco.andreace@pasteur.fr.; Sorbonne Université, Collège doctoral, F-75005, Paris, France. francesco.andreace@pasteur.fr.; Bioinformatics and Biostatistics Hub, Institut Pasteur, Université de Paris, F-75015, Paris, France.; Department of Computational Biology, Institut Pasteur, Université Paris Cité, Paris, F-75015, France.

translated_keywords: 泛基因组；分类；最小化子；索引
translated_abstract: 基因组分析依赖于大规模参考序列集合，如泛基因组或分类学数据库。SPUMONI 2 是一种高效工具，用于短读和长读序列的分类。它利用一种新颖的采样文档阵列进行多类别分类。通过引入最小化子（minimizers），SPUMONI 2 的索引大小仅为 minimap2 在模拟群体泛基因组中的 1/65。与 SPUMONI 相比，SPUMONI 2 的速度提升了 3 倍，而与 minimap2 相比则提升了 15 倍。我们证明，在自适应采样、污染检测和多类别宏基因组分类等实际场景中，SPUMONI 2 在准确性和效率之间实现了优势互补。
authors: Ahmed Omar Y; Rossi Massimiliano; Gagie Travis; Boucher Christina; Langmead Ben
title: SPUMONI 2: improved classification using a pangenome index of minimizer digests.
keywords: Pangenome; Classification; Minimizer; Indexing
translated_title: 基于泛基因组最小化消化索引的改进分类法
abstract: Genomics analyses use large reference sequence collections, like pangenomes or taxonomic databases. SPUMONI 2 is an efficient tool for sequence classification of both short and long reads. It performs multi-class classification using a novel sampled document array. By incorporating minimizers, SPUMONI 2's index is 65 times smaller than minimap2's for a mock community pangenome. SPUMONI 2 achieves a speed improvement of 3-fold compared to SPUMONI and 15-fold compared to minimap2. We show SPUMONI 2 achieves an advantageous mix of accuracy and efficiency in practical scenarios such as adaptive sampling, contamination detection and multi-class metagenomics classification.
affiliations: Department of Computer Science, Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, MD, USA. oahmed6@jhu.edu.; Department of Computer & Information Science & Engineering, University of Florida, Gainesville, FL, USA.; Faculty of Computer Science, Dalhousie University, Halifax, NS, Canada.; Department of Computer Science, Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, MD, USA.

translated_keywords: 基因组演化；单倍体型解析的基因组；基因组结构；泛基因组学；可视化；遗传变异
translated_abstract: //git.wur.nl/bioinformatics/pantools获取。
authors: Jonkheer Eef M; de Ridder Dick; van der Lee Theo A J; de Haan Jorn R; Berke Lidija; Smit Sandra
title: Exploring intra- and intergenomic variation in haplotype-resolved pangenomes.
keywords: genome evolution; haplotype‐resolved genomes; genome organization; pangenomics; visualization; genetic variation
translated_title: 探索单倍型解析泛基因组中的基因组内和基因组间变异
abstract: With advances in long-read sequencing and assembly techniques, haplotype-resolved (phased) genome assemblies are becoming more common, also in the field of plant genomics. Computational tools to effectively explore these phased genomes, particularly for polyploid genomes, are currently limited. Here we describe a new strategy adopting a pangenome approach. To analyse both intra- and intergenomic variation in phased genome assemblies, we have made the software package PanTools ploidy-aware by updating the pangenome graph representation and adding several novel functionalities to assess synteny and gene retention, profile repeats and calculate synonymous and nonsynonymous mutation rates. Using PanTools, we constructed and analysed a pangenome comprising of one diploid and four tetraploid potato cultivars, and a pangenome of five diploid apple species. Both pangenomes show high intra- and intergenomic allelic diversity in terms of gene absence/presence, SNPs, indels and larger structural variants. Our findings show that the new functionalities and visualizations are useful to discover introgressions and detect likely misassemblies in phased genomes. PanTools is available at https://git.wur.nl/bioinformatics/pantools.
affiliations: Bioinformatics Group, Wageningen University & Research, Wageningen, The Netherlands.; Biointeractions and Plant Health, Wageningen Plant Research, Wageningen, The Netherlands.; Genetwister Technologies B.V, Wageningen, The Netherlands.

translated_keywords: 统计模型；宏基因组 shotgun 测序；假设检验；宏基因组组装基因组；微生物组
translated_abstract: 从宏基因组 shotgun 测序数据中恢复元基因组组装基因组（MAGs）在微生物组研究中变得越来越普遍，因为MAGs能够更深入地揭示可培养和不可培养微生物的功能潜力。然而，元基因组组装的基因组质量参差不齐，可能包含遗漏和污染等问题。这些错误给基因检测以及跨样本类型比较基因富集带来了挑战。为了解决这一问题，我们提出了 happi 方法，这是一种考虑基因组质量的基因富集假设检验方法。我们通过使用已发表的Saccharibacteria MAGs、Streptococcus thermophilus MAGs 以及模拟数据，展示了 happi 相较于现有方法的优势。
authors: Trinh Pauline; Clausen David S; Willis Amy D
title: happi: a hierarchical approach to pangenomics inference.
keywords: Statistical models; Shotgun metagenomics; Hypothesis testing; Metagenome-assembled genomes; Microbiome
translated_title: 一种用于泛基因组推断的分层方法
abstract: Recovering metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) from shotgun sequencing data is an increasingly common task in microbiome studies, as MAGs provide deeper insight into the functional potential of both culturable and non-culturable microorganisms. However, metagenome-assembled genomes vary in quality and may contain omissions and contamination. These errors present challenges for detecting genes and comparing gene enrichment across sample types. To address this, we propose happi, an approach to testing hypotheses about gene enrichment that accounts for genome quality. We illustrate the advantages of happi over existing approaches using published Saccharibacteria MAGs, Streptococcus thermophilus MAGs, and via simulation.
affiliations: Department of Environmental & Occupational Health Sciences, University of Washington, Seattle, WA, USA.; Department of Biostatistics, University of Washington, Seattle, WA, USA.; Department of Biostatistics, University of Washington, Seattle, WA, USA. adwillis@uw.edu.

translated_keywords: 胃癌;基因组学;泛基因组;结构变异;驱动基因;参考基因组;疾病特异性泛基因组;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 泛基因组是物种或群体中所有个体遗传信息的总和。基因组学研究正逐渐转向以泛基因组作为参考的范式，但在疾病基因组学研究中，基于泛基因组的分析仍处于起步阶段。本研究构建了基于图模型的胃癌患者泛基因组GGCPan（包含185名胃癌患者），并系统比较了使用GGCPan、线性泛基因组GCPan以及人类参考基因组作为参考时的癌症基因组学研究结果。在小变异检测和微卫星不稳定性状态识别方面，三种不同参考基因组之间的差异较小；而在结构变异识别方面，使用GGCPan作为参考具有显著优势。通过三种不同参考基因组共检测到24个候选胃癌驱动基因，其中8个基因是共同的，另有5个基因仅基于泛基因组被检测到。我们的研究结果表明，疾病特异性泛基因组作为参考具有广阔前景，但为了适应泛基因组时代的疾病基因组学研究，仍需开发或改进一整套工具。
authors: Jiao Du; Dong Xiaorui; Fan Shiyu; Liu Xinyi; Yu Yingyan; Wei Chaochun
title: Gastric cancer genomics study using reference human pangenomes.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 胃癌;基因组学;泛基因组;结构变异;驱动基因;参考基因组;疾病特异性泛基因组;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 基于参考人类泛基因组的胃癌基因组学研究
abstract: A pangenome is the sum of the genetic information of all individuals in a species or a population. Genomics research has been gradually shifted to a paradigm using a pangenome as the reference. However, in disease genomics study, pangenome-based analysis is still in its infancy. In this study, we introduced a graph-based pangenome GGCPan from 185 patients with gastric cancer. We then systematically compared the cancer genomics study results using GGCPan, a linear pangenome GCPan, and the human reference genome as the reference. For small variant detection and microsatellite instability status identification, there is little difference in using three different genomes. Using GGCPan as the reference had a significant advantage in structural variant identification. A total of 24 candidate gastric cancer driver genes were detected using three different reference genomes, of which eight were common and five were detected only based on pangenomes. Our results showed that disease-specific pangenome as a reference is promising and a whole set of tools are still to be developed or improved for disease genomics study in the pangenome era.
affiliations: Department of Bioinformatics and Biostatistics, School of Life Sciences and Biotechnology, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, Shanghai, China.; Department of General Surgery of Ruijin Hospital, Shanghai Institute of Digestive Surgery, and Shanghai Key Laboratory for Gastric Neoplasms, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine, Shanghai, China yingyan3y@sjtu.edu.cn.; Department of Bioinformatics and Biostatistics, School of Life Sciences and Biotechnology, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, Shanghai, China ccwei@sjtu.edu.cn.

translated_keywords: 结构变异；泛保守片段；结构多态性；泛基因组；参考基因组；k-mer
translated_abstract: 人类泛基因组作为一个新的参考序列，解决了当前GRCh38参考序列的许多局限性。其首个版本基于来自具有不同背景个体的94个高质量单倍体组装数据构建。我们采用k-mer索引策略对多个组装数据进行比较分析，包括泛基因组参考、GRCh38和端粒到端粒（telomere-to-telomere）参考组装CHM13。我们的k-mer索引方法使我们能够识别一组在所有组装数据中普遍保守的序列，称为“泛保守片段标签”（PSTs）。通过检查这些片段之间的间隔区域，我们区分出高度保守的基因组片段以及具有结构相关多态性的片段。研究发现，在泛基因组参考中存在60,764个具有独特地理种族特征的多态区间。本研究利用超保守序列（PSTs）建立了人类泛基因组组装与参考基因组之间的联系。该方法允许以参考基因组为比较框架，考察泛基因组中的任何感兴趣序列。
authors: Lee HoJoon; Greer Stephanie U; Pavlichin Dmitri S; Zhou Bo; Urban Alexander E; Weissman Tsachy; Human Pangenome Reference Consortium; Ji Hanlee P
title: Pan-conserved segment tags identify ultra-conserved sequences across assemblies in the human pangenome.
keywords: structural variations; pan-conserved segment; structural polymorphism; pangenome; reference genome; k-mer
translated_title: 泛基因组中共存的片段标签识别人类泛基因组组装中超保守的序列。
abstract: The human pangenome, a new reference sequence, addresses many limitations of the current GRCh38 reference. The first release is based on 94 high-quality haploid assemblies from individuals with diverse backgrounds. We employed a k-mer indexing strategy for comparative analysis across multiple assemblies, including the pangenome reference, GRCh38, and CHM13, a telomere-to-telomere reference assembly. Our k-mer indexing approach enabled us to identify a valuable collection of universally conserved sequences across all assemblies, referred to as "pan-conserved segment tags" (PSTs). By examining intervals between these segments, we discerned highly conserved genomic segments and those with structurally related polymorphisms. We found 60,764 polymorphic intervals with unique geo-ethnic features in the pangenome reference. In this study, we utilized ultra-conserved sequences (PSTs) to forge a link between human pangenome assemblies and reference genomes. This methodology enables the examination of any sequence of interest within the pangenome, using the reference genome as a comparative framework.
affiliations: Division of Oncology, Department of Medicine, Stanford University School of Medicine, Stanford, CA 94305, USA.; Department of Psychiatry and Behavioral Sciences, Stanford University School of Medicine, Stanford, CA 94305, USA.; Department of Genetics, Stanford University School of Medicine, Stanford, CA 94305, USA.; Department of Electrical Engineering, Stanford University, Palo Alto, CA 94304, USA.

translated_keywords: 葡萄藤；葡萄属；泛全基因组关联分析；野生种；超级泛基因组
translated_abstract: 捕获野生近缘种的遗传多样性对于作物改良至关重要，因为野生种质是提升栽培品种可持续性和适应性的关键农艺性状的重要来源。一个属内的遗传多样性可以通过超泛基因组来捕捉，这为解释基因组变异提供了框架。本文报告了九个北美野生葡萄的基因组测序、组装和注释，这些基因组在染色体尺度上进行了相位划分和支架构建。我们利用两两全基因组比对方法生成了一个无参考的超泛基因组，揭示了野生葡萄物种从序列到基因水平的基因组多样性程度。泛基因组图谱能够捕捉同一物种内单倍型之间以及不同物种之间的基因组变异，并且能够准确评估杂交后代与其亲本的相似性。用于构建泛基因组的物种很好地代表了该属，这一点通过在已知性别决定区域和对普里西病抗性位点中捕获已知等位基因变体得以体现。通过泛基因组全基因组关联分析，我们展示了超泛基因组的实用性，它能够有效地映射整个属范围内的样本短读长序列，并识别与葡萄自然群体盐度耐受性相关的位点。本研究强调了无参考超泛基因组如何揭示野生近缘种的适应性性状的遗传基础，并加速作物育种研究。
authors: Cochetel Noé; Minio Andrea; Guarracino Andrea; Garcia Jadran F; Figueroa-Balderas Rosa; Massonnet Mélanie; Kasuga Takao; Londo Jason P; Garrison Erik; Gaut Brandon S; Cantu Dario
title: A super-pangenome of the North American wild grape species.
keywords: Grapevine; Vitis genus; Pan-GWAS; Wild species; Super-pangenome
translated_title: 北美野生葡萄物种的超泛基因组
abstract: Capturing the genetic diversity of wild relatives is crucial for improving crops because wild species are valuable sources of agronomic traits that are essential to enhance the sustainability and adaptability of domesticated cultivars. Genetic diversity across a genus can be captured in super-pangenomes, which provide a framework for interpreting genomic variations. Here we report the sequencing, assembly, and annotation of nine wild North American grape genomes, which are phased and scaffolded at chromosome scale. We generate a reference-unbiased super-pangenome using pairwise whole-genome alignment methods, revealing the extent of the genomic diversity among wild grape species from sequence to gene level. The pangenome graph captures genomic variation between haplotypes within a species and across the different species, and it accurately assesses the similarity of hybrids to their parents. The species selected to build the pangenome are a great representation of the genus, as illustrated by capturing known allelic variants in the sex-determining region and for Pierce's disease resistance loci. Using pangenome-wide association analysis, we demonstrate the utility of the super-pangenome by effectively mapping short reads from genus-wide samples and identifying loci associated with salt tolerance in natural populations of grapes. This study highlights how a reference-unbiased super-pangenome can reveal the genetic basis of adaptive traits from wild relatives and accelerate crop breeding research.
affiliations: Department of Viticulture and Enology, University of California Davis, Davis, CA, USA.; Department of Genetics, Genomics and Informatics, University of Tennessee Health Science Center, Memphis, TN, USA.; Human Technopole, Milan, Italy.; Crops Pathology and Genetics Research Unit, United States Department of Agriculture-Agricultural Research Service, Davis, CA, USA.; Horticulture Section, School of Integrative Plant Science, Cornell AgriTech, Cornell University, Geneva, NY, USA.; Department of Ecology and Evolutionary Biology, University of California Irvine, Irvine, CA, USA.; Department of Viticulture and Enology, University of California Davis, Davis, CA, USA. dacantu@ucdavis.edu.; Genome Center, University of California Davis, Davis, CA, USA. dacantu@ucdavis.edu.

authors: Smith Timothy P L; Bickhart Derek M; Boichard Didier; Chamberlain Amanda J; Djikeng Appolinaire; Jiang Yu; Low Wai Y; Pausch Hubert; Demyda-Peyrás Sebastian; Prendergast James; Schnabel Robert D; Rosen Benjamin D; Bovine Pangenome Consortium
title: The Bovine Pangenome Consortium: democratizing production and accessibility of genome assemblies for global cattle breeds and other bovine species.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组组装;牛种群;泛基因组;国际协作;社区资源;基因组多样性;公共数据;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 使全球牛品种及其他牛科物种基因组组装的生产和获取民主化
abstract: The Bovine Pangenome Consortium (BPC) is an international collaboration dedicated to the assembly of cattle genomes to develop a more complete representation of cattle genomic diversity. The goal of the BPC is to provide genome assemblies and a community-agreed pangenome representation to replace breed-specific reference assemblies for cattle genomics. The BPC invites partners sharing our vision to participate in the production of these assemblies and the development of a common, community-approved, pangenome reference as a public resource for the research community ( https://bovinepangenome.github.io/ ). This community-driven resource will provide the context for comparison between studies and the future foundation for cattle genomic selection.
