translated_keywords: 基因集分析;SNP分析;基因富集分析;亚网络分析;功能基因组数据;表观基因组;人类基因组;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: //www.openxgr.com），这是一个新设计的网络服务器，能够为用户输入的基因、SNP或基因组区域列表提供几乎实时的功能富集和亚网络分析。它通过利用本体论、网络以及功能基因组数据集（如启动子捕获Hi-C、e/pQTL和增强子-基因图谱，用于将SNP或基因组区域链接到候选基因）实现这一目标。该平台提供了六种分析器，每种分析器针对不同层次的基因组汇总数据进行特定解释。三种富集分析器旨在识别与输入基因相关的本体论术语，以及与输入SNP或基因组区域相关联的基因。三种亚网络分析器允许用户从输入的基因、SNP或基因组区域层面的汇总数据中识别基因亚网络。附带逐步用户手册的OpenXGR为人类基因组的汇总数据分析提供了一个用户友好且一体化的平台，从而促进了更集成和有效的知识发现。
authors: Bao Chaohui; Wang Shan; Jiang Lulu; Fang Zhongcheng; Zou Kexin; Lin James; Chen Saijuan; Fang Hai
title: OpenXGR: a web-server update for genomic summary data interpretation.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因集分析;SNP分析;基因富集分析;亚网络分析;功能基因组数据;表观基因组;人类基因组;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 用于基因组汇总数据解释的网络服务器更新
abstract: How to effectively convert genomic summary data into downstream knowledge discovery represents a major challenge in human genomics research. To address this challenge, we have developed efficient and effective approaches and tools. Extending our previously established software tools, we here introduce OpenXGR (http://www.openxgr.com), a newly designed web server that offers almost real-time enrichment and subnetwork analyses for a user-input list of genes, SNPs or genomic regions. It achieves so through leveraging ontologies, networks, and functional genomic datasets (such as promoter capture Hi-C, e/pQTL and enhancer-gene maps for linking SNPs or genomic regions to candidate genes). Six analysers are provided, each doing specific interpretations tailored to genomic summary data at various levels. Three enrichment analysers are designed to identify ontology terms enriched for input genes, as well as genes linked from input SNPs or genomic regions. Three subnetwork analysers allow users to identify gene subnetworks from input gene-, SNP- or genomic region-level summary data. With a step-by-step user manual, OpenXGR provides a user-friendly and all-in-one platform for interpreting summary data on the human genome, enabling more integrated and effective knowledge discovery.
affiliations: Shanghai Institute of Hematology, State Key Laboratory of Medical Genomics, National Research Center for Translational Medicine at Shanghai, Ruijin Hospital, Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine, Shanghai200025, China.; Translational Health Sciences, University of Bristol, BristolBS1 3NY, UK.; Bioinformatics Department, School of Life Sciences and Technology, Tongji University, Shanghai200092, China.; School of Life Sciences, Central South University, Hunan410083, China.; High Performance Computing Center, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, Shanghai200240, China.

translated_keywords: PanSynteny; 宏共线性; 微共线性; 基因组架构; 调控元件; 进化历史; 功能整合; 生物信息学; 分子进化
translated_abstract: //github.com/yhw320/PanSyn），这是目前最全面且最新的基因组共线性分析流水线，提供逐步说明和应用实例以展示其使用方法。PanSyn继承了现有流行工具的基本功能和高级功能，提供了一种用户友好且高度定制化的基因组大尺度共线性分析方法，以及基因组结构、泛进化和调控分析的综合方法，这些功能在现有的公共共线性软件或工具中尚未实现。PanSyn的优势包括：(i) 通过微共线性基因及其相关调控元件的功能剖绘进行先进的微共线性分析；(ii) 包括从祖先到现存物种的核型进化推断在内的全面的大尺度共线性分析；(iii) 微共线性和大尺度共线性的功能整合，用于基因组结构和调控区块的泛进化剖绘，以及与来自三维基因组和ENCODE项目的外部功能基因组数据集的整合。PanSyn需要对Linux环境和Perl编程语言的基本了解，并能够访问计算机集群，特别是在大规模基因组比较时。我们的协议可以轻松由有能力的研究生或博士后实施，并且对于几十到几百个基因组的执行可能需要几天到几周的时间。PanSyn为综合进化和功能基因组学提供了迄今为止最全面和强大的工具。
authors: Yu Hongwei; Li Yuli; Han Wentao; Bao Lisui; Liu Fuyun; Ma Yuanting; Pu Zhongqi; Zeng Qifan; Zhang Lingling; Bao Zhenmin; Wang Shi
title: Pan-evolutionary and regulatory genome architecture delineated by an integrated macro- and microsynteny approach.
keywords: (Auto-generated) PanSynteny; 宏共线性; 微共线性; 基因组架构; 调控元件; 进化历史; 功能整合; 生物信息学; 分子进化
translated_title: 基于宏观和微观共线性整合方法解析全演化及调控基因组架构。
abstract: The forthcoming massive genome data generated by the Earth BioGenome Project will open up a new era of comparative genomics, for which genome synteny analysis provides an important framework. Profiling genome synteny represents an essential step in elucidating genome architecture, regulatory blocks/elements and their evolutionary history. Here we describe PanSyn, ( https://github.com/yhw320/PanSyn ), the most comprehensive and up-to-date genome synteny pipeline, providing step-by-step instructions and application examples to demonstrate its usage. PanSyn inherits both basic and advanced functions from existing popular tools, offering a user-friendly, highly customized approach for genome macrosynteny analysis and integrated pan-evolutionary and regulatory analysis of genome architecture, which are not yet available in public synteny software or tools. The advantages of PanSyn include: (i) advanced microsynteny analysis by functional profiling of microsynteny genes and associated regulatory elements; (ii) comprehensive macrosynteny analysis, including the inference of karyotype evolution from ancestors to extant species; and (iii) functional integration of microsynteny and macrosynteny for pan-evolutionary profiling of genome architecture and regulatory blocks, as well as integration with external functional genomics datasets from three- or four-dimensional genome and ENCODE projects. PanSyn requires basic knowledge of the Linux environment and Perl programming language and the ability to access a computer cluster, especially for large-scale genomic comparisons. Our protocol can be easily implemented by a competent graduate student or postdoc and takes several days to weeks to execute for dozens to hundreds of genomes. PanSyn provides yet the most comprehensive and powerful tool for integrated evolutionary and functional genomics.

translated_keywords: 结构变异；单核苷酸多态性（SNPs）；基准数据集；医学相关基因；插入缺失（Indels）；测序技术；遗传变异
translated_abstract: 基因组基准数据集对于推动基因组学和生物信息学领域的发展至关重要。它们能够反映测序技术和分析方法的表现，并揭示未来的研究挑战。然而，这些数据集依赖于测序技术、参考基因组以及可用的基准方法。因此，创建一个基因组基准数据集是一项耗时且极具挑战性的任务，通常需要多种测序技术、不同的变异调用工具以及繁琐的人工校对。本文综述了现有的基准数据集及其应用价值，并重点关注具有医学相关性和复杂基因组特征的最新基准研究。
authors: Majidian Sina; Agustinho Daniel Paiva; Chin Chen-Shan; Sedlazeck Fritz J; Mahmoud Medhat
title: Genomic variant benchmark: if you cannot measure it, you cannot improve it.
keywords: Structural variant; SNPs; Benchmark datasets; Medical genes; Indels; Sequencing technology; Genetic variation
translated_title: 如果你无法衡量它，就无法改进它。
abstract: Genomic benchmark datasets are essential to driving the field of genomics and bioinformatics. They provide a snapshot of the performances of sequencing technologies and analytical methods and highlight future challenges. However, they depend on sequencing technology, reference genome, and available benchmarking methods. Thus, creating a genomic benchmark dataset is laborious and highly challenging, often involving multiple sequencing technologies, different variant calling tools, and laborious manual curation. In this review, we discuss the available benchmark datasets and their utility. Additionally, we focus on the most recent benchmark of genes with medical relevance and challenging genomic complexity.
affiliations: Department of Computational Biology, University of Lausanne, 1015, Lausanne, Switzerland.; SIB Swiss Institute of Bioinformatics, 1015, Lausanne, Switzerland.; Baylor College of Medicine, Human Genome Sequencing Center, Houston, TX, 77030, USA.; Sema4 OpCo, Inc., Stamford, CT, 06405, USA.; Baylor College of Medicine, Human Genome Sequencing Center, Houston, TX, 77030, USA. Fritz.Sedlazeck@bcm.edu.; Department of Computer Science, Rice University, 6100 Main Street, Houston, TX, 77005, USA. Fritz.Sedlazeck@bcm.edu.; Baylor College of Medicine, Human Genome Sequencing Center, Houston, TX, 77030, USA. Medhat.Mahmoud@bcm.edu.; Department of Molecular and Human Genetics, Baylor College of Medicine, Houston, TX, USA. Medhat.Mahmoud@bcm.edu.

translated_keywords: 序列比对；泛基因组学；参考偏倚
translated_abstract: 当供体变异已知且读段为模拟生成时；当供体变异已知且读段为真实数据时；以及当变异未知且读段为真实数据时。通过使用 Biastools，我们观察到更包容的图谱基因组可以减少偏倚位点的数量。我们发现，端到端比对相对于局部比对在插入缺失（indels）处能减少偏倚。最后，我们利用 Biastools 来表征 T2T 参考序列如何改善大规模偏倚问题。
authors: Lin Mao-Jan; Iyer Sheila; Chen Nae-Chyun; Langmead Ben
title: Measuring, visualizing, and diagnosing reference bias with biastools.
keywords: Sequence alignment; Pangenomics; Reference bias
translated_title: 使用 biastools 测量、可视化和诊断参考偏倚
abstract: Many bioinformatics methods seek to reduce reference bias, but no methods exist to comprehensively measure it. Biastools analyzes and categorizes instances of reference bias. It works in various scenarios: when the donor's variants are known and reads are simulated; when donor variants are known and reads are real; and when variants are unknown and reads are real. Using biastools, we observe that more inclusive graph genomes result in fewer biased sites. We find that end-to-end alignment reduces bias at indels relative to local aligners. Finally, we use biastools to characterize how T2T references improve large-scale bias.
affiliations: Department of Computer Science, Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, USA. mlin77@jhu.edu.; Department of Computer Science, Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, USA.; Department of Computer Science, Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, USA. langmea@cs.jhu.edu.

translated_keywords: 水稻泛基因组；驯化；渗入；同线基因；去驯化
translated_abstract: 亚洲稻是世界上种植最广泛的作物之一。为了探索亚洲稻的驯化和去驯化基因组历史，已经开展了大规模的重测序分析，但水稻的进化仍存在争议。本文通过整合和合并基于长读长测序的74个高精度基因组（涵盖所有生态型和普通野生稻及栽培稻的全部种系），构建了一个基于同源基因组的泛基因组。同源基因组群的分析揭示了亚种间在基因存在-缺失变异和单倍型组成上的分化，并识别出大量可能从古代粳稻向古代籼稻或其野生祖先发生渗入的基因组区域，这些区域几乎包括了所有已知的驯化基因以及一个跨越4.5 Mb着丝粒的区块，支持主栽培稻亚种起源于单一驯化事件的观点。杂草稻与栽培稻之间的基因组比较突显了野生渗入对杂草稻去驯化综合征出现的贡献。这项研究强调了种间渗入在塑造水稻多样化和分化中的重要意义，并尝试利用泛基因组的优势进行进化研究。
authors: Wu Dongya; Xie Lingjuan; Sun Yanqing; Huang Yujie; Jia Lei; Dong Chenfeng; Shen Enhui; Ye Chu-Yu; Qian Qian; Fan Longjiang
title: A syntelog-based pan-genome provides insights into rice domestication and de-domestication.
keywords: Rice pan-genome; Domestication; Introgression; Syntelog; De-domestication
translated_title: 基于同源基因组的泛基因组揭示了水稻驯化和去驯化的见解
abstract: Asian rice is one of the world's most widely cultivated crops. Large-scale resequencing analyses have been undertaken to explore the domestication and de-domestication genomic history of Asian rice, but the evolution of rice is still under debate. Here, we construct a syntelog-based rice pan-genome by integrating and merging 74 high-accuracy genomes based on long-read sequencing, encompassing all ecotypes and taxa of Oryza sativa and Oryza rufipogon. Analyses of syntelog groups illustrate subspecies divergence in gene presence-and-absence and haplotype composition and identify massive genomic regions putatively introgressed from ancient Geng/japonica to ancient Xian/indica or its wild ancestor, including almost all well-known domestication genes and a 4.5-Mbp centromere-spanning block, supporting a single domestication event in main rice subspecies. Genomic comparisons between weedy and cultivated rice highlight the contribution from wild introgression to the emergence of de-domestication syndromes in weedy rice. This work highlights the significance of inter-taxa introgression in shaping diversification and divergence in rice evolution and provides an exploratory attempt by utilizing the advantages of pan-genomes in evolutionary studies.
affiliations: Hainan Institute of Zhejiang University, Sanya, 572025, China.; Institute of Crop Science, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou, 310058, China.; Center for Evolutionary & Organismal Biology, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou, 310058, China.; State Key Laboratory of Rice Biology, China National Rice Research Institute, Hangzhou, 310006, China.; State Key Laboratory of Rice Biology, China National Rice Research Institute, Hangzhou, 310006, China. qianqian188@hotmail.com.; Hainan Institute of Zhejiang University, Sanya, 572025, China. fanlj@zju.edu.cn.; Institute of Crop Science, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou, 310058, China. fanlj@zju.edu.cn.

translated_keywords:
全基因组测序  
Clinical actionability：临床可操作性  
Personalized medicine：精准医学  
WES：外显子组测序  
Clinical genetic testing：临床遗传学检测  
Genomic technologies：基因组技术  
Cerebral Palsy：脑瘫
translated_abstract: 脑性瘫痪（CP）长期以来被认为是由获得性损伤引起的，但新兴研究表明，遗传变异也是CP的重要病因。尽管基于微阵列和全外显子组测序的研究一直是建立新的CP-基因关联并为个别患者提供遗传病因的主要方法，但仍有许多CP患者的病因未知。基因组技术的最新进展为发现人类基因组、转录组和表观基因组中先前未被检测到的变异提供了额外的机会。本文综述了这些前沿技术在解决CP个体分子诊断挑战中的应用，并探讨了尽可能确定分子病因的重要性，因为基因组医学有可能以新的、更精确的方式为CP患者提供治疗机会。
authors: Lewis Sara A; Ruttenberg Andrew; Iyiyol Tuğçe; Kong Nahyun; Jin Sheng Chih; Kruer Michael C
title: Potential clinical applications of advanced genomic analysis in cerebral palsy.
keywords: WGS; Clinical actionability; Personalized medicine; WES; Clinical genetic testing; Genomic technologies; Cerebral Palsy
translated_title: 先进基因组分析在脑瘫中的潜在临床应用
abstract: Cerebral palsy (CP) has historically been attributed to acquired insults, but emerging research suggests that genetic variations are also important causes of CP. While microarray and whole-exome sequencing based studies have been the primary methods for establishing new CP-gene relationships and providing a genetic etiology for individual patients, the cause of their condition remains unknown for many patients with CP. Recent advancements in genomic technologies offer additional opportunities to uncover variations in human genomes, transcriptomes, and epigenomes that have previously escaped detection. In this review, we outline the use of these state-of-the-art technologies to address the molecular diagnostic challenges experienced by individuals with CP. We also explore the importance of identifying a molecular etiology whenever possible, given the potential for genomic medicine to provide opportunities to treat patients with CP in new and more precise ways.
affiliations: Pediatric Movement Disorders Program, Barrow Neurological Institute, Phoenix Children's Hospital, Phoenix, AZ, United States; Departments of Child Health, Neurology, and Cellular & Molecular Medicine and Program in Genetics, University of Arizona College of Medicine, Phoenix, AZ, United States.; Department of Genetics, Washington University School of Medicine, St. Louis, MO, United States.; Department of Genetics, Washington University School of Medicine, St. Louis, MO, United States; Department of Pediatrics, Washington University School of Medicine, St. Louis, MO, United States. Electronic address: jin810@wustl.edu.; Pediatric Movement Disorders Program, Barrow Neurological Institute, Phoenix Children's Hospital, Phoenix, AZ, United States; Departments of Child Health, Neurology, and Cellular & Molecular Medicine and Program in Genetics, University of Arizona College of Medicine, Phoenix, AZ, United States; Programs in Neuroscience and Molecular & Cellular Biology, School of Life Sciences, Arizona State University, Tempe, AZ, United States. Electronic address: kruerm@arizona.edu.

translated_keywords: Hi-C; 基因组结构; 数据可视化; 机器学习; 转录因子; 凝缩蛋白; 假设检验; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: 基因组浏览器虽然有助于整合分析多个基因组数据集，但每次只能可视化少数区域，并缺乏提取有意义信息的统计功能。我们介绍了HiCognition，这是一款基于全新基因组区域集概念的可视化探索和机器学习工具，能够检测三维染色体构象与任意类型的一维基因组剖面集合之间的模式和关联。通过展示转录和黏附亚基异构体如何影响染色体构象，我们展示了HiCognition灵活的用户界面和机器学习工具如何帮助理解基因组结构与功能之间的关系。
authors: Langer Christoph C H; Mitter Michael; Stocsits Roman R; Gerlich Daniel W
title: HiCognition: a visual exploration and hypothesis testing tool for 3D genomics.
keywords: (Auto-generated) Hi-C; 基因组结构; 数据可视化; 机器学习; 转录因子; 凝缩蛋白; 假设检验; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_title: 用于三维基因组学的视觉探索与假设检验工具
abstract: Genome browsers facilitate integrated analysis of multiple genomics datasets yet visualize only a few regions at a time and lack statistical functions for extracting meaningful information. We present HiCognition, a visual exploration and machine-learning tool based on a new genomic region set concept, enabling detection of patterns and associations between 3D chromosome conformation and collections of 1D genomics profiles of any type. By revealing how transcription and cohesion subunit isoforms contribute to chromosome conformation, we showcase how the flexible user interface and machine learning tools of HiCognition help to understand the relationship between the structure and function of the genome.
affiliations: Institute of Molecular Biotechnology of the Austrian Academy of Sciences, Vienna BioCenter, Vienna, Austria.; Research Institute of Molecular Pathology, Vienna BioCenter, Vienna, Austria.; Institute of Molecular Biotechnology of the Austrian Academy of Sciences, Vienna BioCenter, Vienna, Austria. daniel.gerlich@imba.oeaw.ac.at.

translated_keywords: 基因组异常；结构变异 (SV)；染色质空间构象；均质染色区段 (HSRs)；染色体外DNA (ecDNA)
translated_abstract: 基因组异常与癌症和不孕症密切相关。本研究开发了一种简单而高效的方法——多重基因组异常测序（MGA-Seq），可以从单一样本中同时检测结构变异、拷贝数变异、单核苷酸多态性、均质染色区以及胞外DNA（ecDNA）。MGA-Seq 直接对邻近连接的基因组片段进行测序，生成的数据集包含三维基因组信息和全基因组测序信息，能够大致定位基因组结构变异并辅助断裂点鉴定。此外，通过使用 MGA-Seq，我们绘制了局灶扩增和原癌基因共扩增图谱，从而有助于探索 ecDNA 的转录调控功能。
authors: Lin Da; Zou Yanyan; Li Xinyu; Wang Jinyue; Xiao Qin; Gao Xiaochen; Lin Fei; Zhang Ningyuan; Jiao Ming; Guo Yu; Teng Zhaowei; Li Shiyi; Wei Yongchang; Zhou Fuling; Yin Rong; Zhang Siheng; Xing Lingyu; Xu Weize; Wu Xiaofeng; Yang Bing; Xiao Ke; Wu Chengchao; Tao Yingfeng; Yang Xiaoqing; Zhang Jing; Hu Sheng; Dong Shuang; Li Xiaoyu; Ye Shengwei; Hong Zhidan; Pan Yihang; Yang Yuqin; Sun Haixiang; Cao Gang
title: MGA-seq: robust identification of extrachromosomal DNA and genetic variants using multiple genetic abnormality sequencing.
keywords: Genomic abnormalities; Structural variation (SV); Spatial chromatin conformation; Homogenously staining regions (HSRs); Extrachromosomal DNA (ecDNA)
translated_title: 利用多重遗传异常测序 robustly 鉴定染色体外DNA和基因变异
abstract: Genomic abnormalities are strongly associated with cancer and infertility. In this study, we develop a simple and efficient method - multiple genetic abnormality sequencing (MGA-Seq) - to simultaneously detect structural variation, copy number variation, single-nucleotide polymorphism, homogeneously staining regions, and extrachromosomal DNA (ecDNA) from a single tube. MGA-Seq directly sequences proximity-ligated genomic fragments, yielding a dataset with concurrent genome three-dimensional and whole-genome sequencing information, enabling approximate localization of genomic structural variations and facilitating breakpoint identification. Additionally, by utilizing MGA-Seq, we map focal amplification and oncogene coamplification, thus facilitating the exploration of ecDNA's transcriptional regulatory function.

translated_keywords: 代谢物；土壤耕作；农作措施；施肥；微生物群落
translated_abstract: 根际植物与微生物组之间的动态复杂相互作用对植物健康和生产力起着重要作用。Behr 等人采用跨学科方法研究了耕作实践如何影响根际过程，为通过微生物操作提高农业生产力提供了令人兴奋的方向。
authors: Azarbad Hamed
title: Colorful windows to the dark rhizosphere.
keywords: metabolites; soil tillage; farming practices; fertilization; microbiomes
translated_title: 多彩窗口透视黑暗的根际区域
abstract: The dynamic and complex interactions between plant and microbiomes in the rhizosphere play a major role in the plant's health and productivities. Using interdisciplinary approaches, Behr et al. studied how farming practices can influence the rhizosphere process, offering an exciting direction for microbial manipulation to enhance agricultural productivity.
affiliations: Department of Biology, Evolutionary Ecology of Plants, Philipps-University Marburg, Karl-von-Frisch-Strasse 8, 35043 Marburg, Germany. Electronic address: azarbad@staff.uni-marburg.de.

translated_keywords: 植物胁迫；生物技术；eccDNA；合成eccDNA
translated_abstract: 染色体外环状DNA（eccDNA）是一种存在于染色体之外的遗传物质，在植物生物学的下一代基因工程中具有潜力。通过提高植物的抗逆性、生长速度和产量，eccDNA为全球粮食安全和环境可持续性面临的挑战提供了有前景的解决方案，使农业生物技术进入了一个变革性的时代。
authors: Mohan Binoop; Thingujam Doni; Pajerowska-Mukhtar Karolina M; Mukhtar Muhammad Shahid
title: EccDNA in plant-stress and biotechnological solutions in agriculture.
keywords: plant stress; biotechnology; eccDNA; synthetic eccDNA
translated_title: 植物应激中的eccDNA及农业生物技术解决方案。
abstract: Extrachromosomal circular DNA (eccDNA) is genetic material that exists outside of chromosomes and holds potential for next-generation genetic engineering in plant biology. By improving plant resilience, growth, and productivity, eccDNA offers a promising solution to global challenges in food security and environmental sustainability, making this a transformative era in agricultural biotechnology.
affiliations: Department of Biology, University of Alabama at Birmingham, 3100 East Science Hall, 902 14th Street South, Birmingham, AL 35294, USA.; Department of Biology, University of Alabama at Birmingham, 3100 East Science Hall, 902 14th Street South, Birmingham, AL 35294, USA; Department of Biological Sciences, Clemson University, 132 Long Hall, Clemson, SC 29634, USA.; Department of Biology, University of Alabama at Birmingham, 3100 East Science Hall, 902 14th Street South, Birmingham, AL 35294, USA; Department of Genetics and Biochemistry, Clemson University, 105 Collings St Biosystems Research Complex, Clemson, SC 29634-0318, USA. Electronic address: mshahid@clemson.edu.

translated_keywords: 水杨酸;植物免疫;信号转导;代谢调控;转录因子;表观修饰;激素互作;分子生物学;生物化学
translated_abstract: SA的生物合成既受局部调控也受系统性调控，而其感知则通过多个细胞靶标发生，包括代谢酶、氧化还原调节因子、转录共因子，以及最近发现的一种RNA结合蛋白。此外，SA通过下游信号成分的复杂翻译后修饰以及促进生物分子凝聚体的形成来发挥功能，这些凝聚体作为细胞信号枢纽发挥作用。SA还通过与其他植物激素的串扰影响更广泛的细胞功能。展望未来，我们提出了探索SA功能的新领域，这无疑将在未来多年内继续带来更多的惊喜。
authors: Spoel Steven H; Dong Xinnian
title: Salicylic acid in plant immunity and beyond.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 水杨酸;植物免疫;信号转导;代谢调控;转录因子;表观修饰;激素互作;分子生物学;生物化学
translated_title: 水杨酸在植物免疫及其它方面的应用。
abstract: As the most widely used herbal medicine in human history and a major defence hormone in plants against a broad spectrum of pathogens and abiotic stresses, salicylic acid (SA) has attracted major research interest. With applications of modern technologies over the past 30 years, studies of the effects of SA on plant growth, development, and defence have revealed many new research frontiers and continue to deliver surprises. In this review, we provide an update on recent advances in our understanding of SA metabolism, perception, and signal transduction mechanisms in plant immunity. An overarching theme emerges that SA executes its many functions through intricate regulation at multiple steps: SA biosynthesis is regulated both locally and systemically, while its perception occurs through multiple cellular targets, including metabolic enzymes, redox regulators, transcription cofactors, and, most recently, an RNA-binding protein. Moreover, SA orchestrates a complex series of post-translational modifications of downstream signaling components and promotes the formation of biomolecular condensates that function as cellular signalling hubs. SA also impacts wider cellular functions through crosstalk with other plant hormones. Looking into the future, we propose new areas for exploration of SA functions, which will undoubtedly uncover more surprises for many years to come.
affiliations: Institute of Molecular Plant Sciences, School of Biological Sciences, University of Edinburgh, The King's Buildings, Edinburgh EH9 3BF, UK.; Department of Biology, Howard Hughes Medical Institute, Duke University, Durham, NC 27708, USA.

translated_keywords: 数据降维;基因组学;最小化器;序列比对;泛基因组;数据草图;替代技术;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 随着测序数据呈指数级增长，亟需概念和计算上的突破以提取有用的生物学洞见。其中一种突破性方法——最小化子（minimizers），能够在减少数据处理量的同时保留部分关键特性。本文首先对最小化子进行基本介绍，接着概述其近期方法学发展，并综述了最小化子在分析基因组数据中的多样化应用，包括从头基因组组装、宏基因组学、读段比对、读段校正以及泛基因组研究。此外，我们还简要介绍了其他数据速写技术，如通用命中集（universal hitting sets）、同步子（syncmers）或脉冲序列（strobemers）。最小化子及其替代方案已迅速成为处理海量数据不可或缺的工具。
authors: Ndiaye Malick; Prieto-Baños Silvia; Fitzgerald Lucy M; Yazdizadeh Kharrazi Ali; Oreshkov Sergey; Dessimoz Christophe; Sedlazeck Fritz J; Glover Natasha; Majidian Sina
title: When less is more: sketching with minimizers in genomics.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 数据降维;基因组学;最小化器;序列比对;泛基因组;数据草图;替代技术;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 基因组学中的最小化者绘图”
abstract: The exponential increase in sequencing data calls for conceptual and computational advances to extract useful biological insights. One such advance, minimizers, allows for reducing the quantity of data handled while maintaining some of its key properties. We provide a basic introduction to minimizers, cover recent methodological developments, and review the diverse applications of minimizers to analyze genomic data, including de novo genome assembly, metagenomics, read alignment, read correction, and pangenomes. We also touch on alternative data sketching techniques including universal hitting sets, syncmers, or strobemers. Minimizers and their alternatives have rapidly become indispensable tools for handling vast amounts of data.
affiliations: Department of Fundamental Microbiology, UNIL, Lausanne, Switzerland.; Department of Computational Biology, UNIL, Lausanne, Switzerland.; SIB Swiss Institute of Bioinformatics, Lausanne, Switzerland.; Department of Endocrinology, Diabetology, Metabolism, CHUV, Lausanne, Switzerland.; Baylor College of Medicine, Houston, USA.; Department of Computational Biology, UNIL, Lausanne, Switzerland. sina.majidian@unil.ch.; SIB Swiss Institute of Bioinformatics, Lausanne, Switzerland. sina.majidian@unil.ch.

translated_keywords: 植物免疫；病原体感知；信号传导；基因-for-基因假设；细胞表面受体；细胞内受体；疾病抗性；生物工程；分子生物学；植物病理学
translated_abstract: 植物病害对农业生产和生态生物多样性构成了持续且严重的威胁。植物拥有复杂的先天免疫系统，能够检测并响应病原体感染以防止疾病发生。在过去的一个世纪里，我们对这一系统的理解取得了巨大进展。早期关于植物抗病性和病原体毒力的遗传学描述体现在基因对基因假说中，而生理学研究则识别了病原体来源的激发子，这些激发子能够触发植物细胞和组织中的防御反应。如今，针对这些现象的分子研究表明，植物免疫涉及特定病原体来源分子和蛋白质的细胞表面及细胞内检测，并最终诱导各种细胞响应。胞外和胞内受体触发不同的信号过程，但其输出结果在许多方面相似，已有大量证据表明这些通路整合成了相互依赖的网络，控制着疾病的结果。目前，病原体识别和信号传导过程的许多分子细节已经为人所知，这为通过生物工程增强植物对疾病的保护提供了机会。本文综述了当前对植物免疫主要原则的理解，并着重介绍了引领这些洞见的关键科学里程碑。
authors: Dodds Peter N; Chen Jian; Outram Megan A
title: Pathogen perception and signaling in plant immunity.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 植物免疫；病原体感知；信号传导；基因-for-基因假设；细胞表面受体；细胞内受体；疾病抗性；生物工程；分子生物学；植物病理学
translated_title: 植物免疫中的病原体感知与信号转导
abstract: Plant diseases are a constant and serious threat to agriculture and ecological biodiversity. Plants possess a sophisticated innate immunity system capable of detecting and responding to pathogen infection to prevent disease. Our understanding of this system has grown enormously over the past century. Early genetic descriptions of plant disease resistance and pathogen virulence were embodied in the gene-for-gene hypothesis, while physiological studies identified pathogen-derived elicitors that could trigger defense responses in plant cells and tissues. Molecular studies of these phenomena have now coalesced into an integrated model of plant immunity involving cell surface and intracellular detection of specific pathogen-derived molecules and proteins culminating in the induction of various cellular responses. Extracellular and intracellular receptors engage distinct signaling processes but converge on many similar outputs with substantial evidence now for integration of these pathways into interdependent networks controlling disease outcomes. Many of the molecular details of pathogen recognition and signaling processes are now known, providing opportunities for bioengineering to enhance plant protection from disease. Here we provide an overview of the current understanding of the main principles of plant immunity, with an emphasis on the key scientific milestones leading to these insights.
affiliations: Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organization, Agriculture and Food, Canberra, ACT 2601, Australia.

translated_keywords: 长读长测序；结构变异；可变数目 tandem 重复序列（VNTR）分析；家养动物；牛亚科；图泛基因组；基因组组装
translated_abstract: 尽管已有多种模型和算法被提出用于从多个输入组装体构建泛基因组，但它们对变异表示的影响以及由此对下游分析的影响在很大程度上仍不清楚。我们使用pggb、cactus和minigraph算法，以Bos taurus taurus参考序列和来自普通牛、黄牛、野牛、牦牛及爪哇野牛的11个单倍型解析组装体，构建了多物种超级泛基因组。从这些泛基因组中，我们共恢复了221,000个非冗余结构变异（SVs），其中135,000个（占61%）在所有三种方法中均一致存在。基于组装体的SV调用与泛基因组的一致性调用高度吻合（96%），但仅验证了少量每个图谱特有的变异。pggb和cactus这两种同时包含碱基级变异的方法，在与小变异调用的精确匹配率上约为95%，这显著提高了相对于minigraph重新比对组装体时的编辑率。我们利用这三个泛基因组研究了9,566个可变数目串联重复序列（VNTRs），发现其中63%在三个图谱中的预测重复次数相同，而minigraph由于其近似坐标系统可能会过高或过低估计重复次数。我们进一步分析了一个高变VNTR位点，结果显示重复单元拷贝数影响了邻近基因和非编码RNA的表达。我们的研究结果表明，三种泛基因组方法之间具有良好的一致性，但也揭示了它们各自的优缺点，需要在分析来自多个输入组装体的不同类型的变异时加以考虑。
authors: Leonard Alexander S; Crysnanto Danang; Mapel Xena M; Bhati Meenu; Pausch Hubert
title: Graph construction method impacts variation representation and analyses in a bovine super-pangenome.
keywords: Long sequencing reads; Structural variation; VNTR profiling; Domestic animals; Bovinae; Graph pangenome; Genome assembly
translated_title: 图构造方法对牛超泛基因组变异表示和分析的影响
abstract: Several models and algorithms have been proposed to build pangenomes from multiple input assemblies, but their impact on variant representation, and consequently downstream analyses, is largely unknown. We create multi-species super-pangenomes using pggb, cactus, and minigraph with the Bos taurus taurus reference sequence and eleven haplotype-resolved assemblies from taurine and indicine cattle, bison, yak, and gaur. We recover 221 k nonredundant structural variations (SVs) from the pangenomes, of which 135 k (61%) are common to all three. SVs derived from assembly-based calling show high agreement with the consensus calls from the pangenomes (96%), but validate only a small proportion of variations private to each graph. Pggb and cactus, which also incorporate base-level variation, have approximately 95% exact matches with assembly-derived small variant calls, which significantly improves the edit rate when realigning assemblies compared to minigraph. We use the three pangenomes to investigate 9566 variable number tandem repeats (VNTRs), finding 63% have identical predicted repeat counts in the three graphs, while minigraph can over or underestimate the count given its approximate coordinate system. We examine a highly variable VNTR locus and show that repeat unit copy number impacts the expression of proximal genes and non-coding RNA. Our findings indicate good consensus between the three pangenome methods but also show their individual strengths and weaknesses that need to be considered when analysing different types of variants from multiple input assemblies.
affiliations: Animal Genomics, ETH Zurich, Universitaetstrasse 2, 8092, Zurich, Switzerland. alexander.leonard@usys.ethz.ch.; Animal Genomics, ETH Zurich, Universitaetstrasse 2, 8092, Zurich, Switzerland.; Animal Genomics, ETH Zurich, Universitaetstrasse 2, 8092, Zurich, Switzerland. hubert.pausch@usys.ethz.ch.

translated_keywords: 病毒致病机理；植物-病毒传播媒介互作；中国；植物对病毒侵染的抗性/感性；新发植物病毒；植物病毒学；基于植物病毒的载体
translated_abstract: 植物病毒是一类持续威胁全球粮食安全的胞内病原体。近20年来，中国科学家在植物病毒学基础研究和植物病毒病防控技术方面取得了显著进展。本文综述了这些里程碑式的进展，包括新作物侵染病毒的鉴定、多种病毒致病机制的解析、病毒与其宿主植物及病毒传播介体节肢动物之间的多层次互作关系的研究，以及植物编码抗性与感病因子的深入探究。值得注意的是，还成功研发了多种基于植物病毒的载体，用于植物基因功能研究和目标基因表达。最后，本文还对中国的植物病毒学未来研究进行了展望。
authors: Wu Jianguo; Zhang Yongliang; Li Fangfang; Zhang Xiaoming; Ye Jian; Wei Taiyun; Li Zhenghe; Tao Xiaorong; Cui Feng; Wang Xianbing; Zhang Lili; Yan Fei; Li Shifang; Liu Yule; Li Dawei; Zhou Xueping; Li Yi
title: Plant virology in the 21st century in China: Recent advances and future directions.
keywords: viral pathogenesis; plant-virus transmission vector interactions; China; plant resistance/susceptibility to viral infection; emerging plant viruses; plant virology; plant virus-based vectors
translated_title: 近期进展与未来方向
abstract: Plant viruses are a group of intracellular pathogens that persistently threaten global food security. Significant advances in plant virology have been achieved by Chinese scientists over the last 20 years, including basic research and technologies for preventing and controlling plant viral diseases. Here, we review these milestones and advances, including the identification of new crop-infecting viruses, dissection of pathogenic mechanisms of multiple viruses, examination of multilayered interactions among viruses, their host plants, and virus-transmitting arthropod vectors, and in-depth interrogation of plant-encoded resistance and susceptibility determinants. Notably, various plant virus-based vectors have also been successfully developed for gene function studies and target gene expression in plants. We also recommend future plant virology studies in China.
affiliations: State Key Laboratory for Ecological Pest Control of Fujian and Taiwan Crops, Vector-borne Virus Research Center, College of Plant Protection, Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University, Fuzhou, 350002, China.; State Key Laboratory of Plant Environmental Resilience and Ministry of Agriculture Key Laboratory of Soil Microbiology, College of Biological Sciences, China Agricultural University, Beijing, 100193, China.; State Key Laboratory for Biology of Plant Diseases and Insect Pests, Institute of Plant Protection, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing, 100193, China.; State Key Laboratory of Integrated Management of Pest Insects and Rodents, Institute of Zoology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, 100101, China.; CAS Center for Excellence in Biotic Interactions, University of Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, 100049, China.; State Key Laboratory of Plant Genomics, Institute of Microbiology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, 100101, China.; State Key Laboratory of Rice Biology, Institute of Biotechnology, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou, 310058, China.; Department of Plant Pathology, The Key Laboratory of Plant Immunity, Nanjing Agricultural University, Nanjing, 210095, China.; State Key Laboratory for Managing Biotic and Chemical Threats to the Quality and Safety of Agro-products, Institute of Plant Virology, Ningbo University, Ningbo, 315211, China.; MOE Key Laboratory of Bioinformatics, Center for Plant Biology, School of Life Sciences, Tsinghua University, Beijing, 100084, China.; State Key Laboratory of Protein and Plant Gene Research, School of Life Sciences, Peking University, Beijing, 100871, China.

translated_keywords: 基因表达噪声; 基因组环境; 表观遗传修饰; 单细胞分析; 报告基因; 组蛋白修饰; 干细胞样亚群; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: 同基因群体中的单个细胞在基因表达上往往表现出显著的细胞间差异，这种“噪声”来源于多个因素，包括基因所在的基因组和细胞环境。大规模的基因组环境图谱揭示了表观遗传修饰和转录因子占据对平均表达水平的影响，但要利用这些图谱解释表达噪声，则需要新的方法来检测基因组各位置处的表达噪声如何变化。为填补这一空白，我们开发了单细胞报告基因表达噪声与转录组分析方法（SARGENT），该方法能够同时测量整合到基因组各处的报告基因的噪声程度以及含有所述报告基因的单个细胞的整体mRNA谱。使用SARGENT，我们进行了首个全面的全基因组范围调查，以研究基因组位置对基因表达噪声的影响。我们发现表达的均值和噪声与不同的组蛋白修饰相关联。我们量化了报告基因噪声的内在成分和外在成分，并利用相关的mRNA谱将外在成分归因于CD24+“干细胞样”亚群与更“分化”的亚群之间的差异。SARGENT还揭示了转基因整合对内源基因表达的影响，这将有助于指导寻找“安全港”位点的研究。综上所述，我们证明SARGENT是一种强大的工具，可用于测量基因组各位置处基因表达的均值和噪声，并且由SARGENT生成的数据揭示了关于基因表达噪声全基因组调控的重要见解。
authors: Hong Clarice K Y; Ramu Avinash; Zhao Siqi; Cohen Barak A
title: Effect of genomic and cellular environments on gene expression noise.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因表达噪声; 基因组环境; 表观遗传修饰; 单细胞分析; 报告基因; 组蛋白修饰; 干细胞样亚群; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_title: 基因组和细胞环境对基因表达噪声的影响
abstract: Individual cells from isogenic populations often display large cell-to-cell differences in gene expression. This "noise" in expression derives from several sources, including the genomic and cellular environment in which a gene resides. Large-scale maps of genomic environments have revealed the effects of epigenetic modifications and transcription factor occupancy on mean expression levels, but leveraging such maps to explain expression noise will require new methods to assay how expression noise changes at locations across the genome. To address this gap, we present Single-cell Analysis of Reporter Gene Expression Noise and Transcriptome (SARGENT), a method that simultaneously measures the noisiness of reporter genes integrated throughout the genome and the global mRNA profiles of individual reporter-gene-containing cells. Using SARGENT, we perform the first comprehensive genome-wide survey of how genomic locations impact gene expression noise. We find that the mean and noise of expression correlate with different histone modifications. We quantify the intrinsic and extrinsic components of reporter gene noise and, using the associated mRNA profiles, assign the extrinsic component to differences between the CD24+ "stem-like" substate and the more "differentiated" substate. SARGENT also reveals the effects of transgene integrations on endogenous gene expression, which will help guide the search for "safe-harbor" loci. Taken together, we show that SARGENT is a powerful tool to measure both the mean and noise of gene expression at locations across the genome and that the data generatd by SARGENT reveals important insights into the regulation of gene expression noise genome-wide.
affiliations: The Edison Family Center for Genome Sciences and Systems Biology, School of Medicine, Washington University in St. Louis, Saint Louis, MO, 63110, USA.; Department of Genetics, School of Medicine, Washington University in St. Louis, Saint Louis, MO, 63110, USA.; The Edison Family Center for Genome Sciences and Systems Biology, School of Medicine, Washington University in St. Louis, Saint Louis, MO, 63110, USA. cohen@wustl.edu.; Department of Genetics, School of Medicine, Washington University in St. Louis, Saint Louis, MO, 63110, USA. cohen@wustl.edu.

translated_keywords: 暗基因组;内源性病毒元件;数据库集成基因组筛查;水平基因转移;病毒化石记录;基因组进化;生态演化;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 基因组中未被充分理解的区域，通常被称为“暗基因组”，包含了许多功能相关且具有生物学信息特征的内容。这些内容包括内源性病毒元件（EVEs），即来源于病毒的序列，它们能够显著影响宿主生物学并作为病毒化石记录存在。在本研究中，我们引入了一种数据库集成基因组筛选（DIGS）方法，以计算机模拟的方式探索暗基因组，重点关注脊椎动物基因组中的EVEs。通过对874个脊椎动物基因组使用DIGS，我们发现了大约110万个EVE序列，其中超过99%源自内源性逆转录病毒或含有EVE DNA的可移动元件。我们发现剩余的6038个序列代表了超过一千次跨10个病毒家族的水平基因转移事件，其中包括一些之前未被报道为EVEs的序列。我们探讨了非逆转录病毒EVEs的基因组和系统发育特性，并确定了其在脊椎动物进化过程中获得的速度。本研究揭示了新型病毒多样性，扩展了对病毒在脊椎动物宿主中分布的认识，并提供了关于脊椎动物病毒生态学和进化的全新见解。我们全面整理并分析了874个脊椎动物基因组中的EVEs，揭示了病毒的分布、多样性和长期进化，并展示了其对脊椎动物基因组进化的广泛影响。我们的结果证明了将关系型数据库管理系统与基于相似性搜索的筛选管道相结合，用于计算机模拟探索暗基因组的强大能力。
authors: Blanco-Melo Daniel; Campbell Matthew A; Zhu Henan; Dennis Tristan P W; Modha Sejal; Lytras Spyros; Hughes Joseph; Gatseva Anna; Gifford Robert J
title: A novel approach to exploring the dark genome and its application to mapping of the vertebrate virus fossil record.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 暗基因组;内源性病毒元件;数据库集成基因组筛查;水平基因转移;病毒化石记录;基因组进化;生态演化;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 一种探索“暗基因组”的新方法及其在脊椎动物病毒化石记录绘图中的应用
abstract: Genomic regions that remain poorly understood, often referred to as the dark genome, contain a variety of functionally relevant and biologically informative features. These include endogenous viral elements (EVEs)-virus-derived sequences that can dramatically impact host biology and serve as a virus fossil record. In this study, we introduce a database-integrated genome screening (DIGS) approach to investigate the dark genome in silico, focusing on EVEs found within vertebrate genomes. Using DIGS on 874 vertebrate genomes, we uncover approximately 1.1 million EVE sequences, with over 99% originating from endogenous retroviruses or transposable elements that contain EVE DNA. We show that the remaining 6038 sequences represent over a thousand distinct horizontal gene transfer events across 10 virus families, including some that have not previously been reported as EVEs. We explore the genomic and phylogenetic characteristics of non-retroviral EVEs and determine their rates of acquisition during vertebrate evolution. Our study uncovers novel virus diversity, broadens knowledge of virus distribution among vertebrate hosts, and provides new insights into the ecology and evolution of vertebrate viruses. We comprehensively catalog and analyze EVEs within 874 vertebrate genomes, shedding light on the distribution, diversity, and long-term evolution of viruses and reveal their extensive impact on vertebrate genome evolution. Our results demonstrate the power of linking a relational database management system to a similarity search-based screening pipeline for in silico exploration of the dark genome.
affiliations: Vaccine and Infectious Disease Division, Fred Hutchinson Cancer Center, 1100 Fairview Ave N, Seattle, WA, 98109, USA.; Herbold Computational Biology Program, Public Health Sciences Division, Fred Hutchinson Cancer Center, 1100 Fairview Ave N, Seattle, WA, 98109, USA.; University of California, Davis, 1 Shields Ave, Davis, CA, 95616, USA.; MRC-University of Glasgow Centre for Virus Research, 464 Bearsden Rd, Bearsden, Glasgow, G61 1QH, UK.; MRC-University of Glasgow Centre for Virus Research, 464 Bearsden Rd, Bearsden, Glasgow, G61 1QH, UK. robert.gifford@glasgow.ac.uk.; Centre for Epidemic Response and Innovation (CERI), School of Data Science and Computational Thinking, Stellenbosch University, Stellenbosch, South Africa. robert.gifford@glasgow.ac.uk.

translated_keywords: 非编码RNA;植物-环境互作;跨 kingdom 通讯;细胞间运输;RNA干扰;外泌体;RNA结合蛋白;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 作为保守的调控因子，非编码RNA（ncRNA）对植物生活的多个方面具有重要影响，包括生长、发育和环境响应。非编码RNA不仅可以通过胞间连丝和韧皮部在细胞间传递，还可以跨越细胞屏障来调节不同的过程。越来越多的证据表明，非编码RNA的细胞间跨界传播能够调控植物与其它生物之间许多重要的相互作用，例如植物对病原体攻击的响应、豆科植物与根瘤菌的共生以及与寄生植物的互作。在这些相互作用中，植物ncRNA被认为被分类到胞外囊泡（EVs）或其他非囊泡载体中，以穿过细胞屏障，并在不同物种的受体细胞中触发跨界的RNA干扰（RNAi）。有研究表明，胞外RNA及其相关RNA结合蛋白（RBPs）的特性在决定RNA是保留在细胞内还是分泌到细胞外方面起着重要作用。尽管关于植物中RNA分泌途径的报道较少，但植物中外泌ncRNA的输出是由一系列途径协调完成的。近年来，移动小RNA（sRNA）的鉴定和功能分析引起了越来越多的关注。本文综述了我们对植物胞外ncRNA的功能、分类、运输和调控的理解的最新进展。
authors: Liu Ting; Xu Liu-Gen; Duan Cheng-Guo
title: The trans-kingdom communication of noncoding RNAs in plant-environment interactions.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 非编码RNA;植物-环境互作;跨 kingdom 通讯;细胞间运输;RNA干扰;外泌体;RNA结合蛋白;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 植物与环境互作中的非编码RNA的跨界通讯
abstract: As conserved regulatory agents, noncoding RNAs (ncRNAs) have an important impact on many aspects of plant life, including growth, development, and environmental response. Noncoding RNAs can travel through not only plasmodesma and phloem but also intercellular barriers to regulate distinct processes. Increasing evidence shows that the intercellular trans-kingdom transmission of ncRNAs is able to modulate many important interactions between plants and other organisms, such as plant response to pathogen attack, the symbiosis between legume plants and rhizobia and the interactions with parasitic plants. In these interactions, plant ncRNAs are believed to be sorted into extracellular vesicles (EVs) or other nonvesicular vehicles to pass through cell barriers and trigger trans-kingdom RNA interference (RNAi) in recipient cells from different species. There is evidence that the features of extracellular RNAs and associated RNA-binding proteins (RBPs) play a role in defining the RNAs to retain in cell or secrete outside cells. Despite the few reports about RNA secretion pathway in plants, the export of extracellular ncRNAs is orchestrated by a series of pathways in plants. The identification and functional analysis of mobile small RNAs (sRNAs) are attracting increasing attention in recent years. In this review, we discuss recent advances in our understanding of the function, sorting, transport, and regulation of plant extracellular ncRNAs.
affiliations: Shanghai Center for Plant Stress Biology, CAS Center for Excellence in Molecular Plant Sciences, Shanghai Institute of Plant Physiology and Ecology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Shanghai, 200032, China.; Univ. of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, 100049, China.

translated_keywords: 基因组组织;植物多样性;比较基因组学;基因调控;多倍体化;形态生理变异;选择压力;生物进化;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 被子植物既是地球占主导地位的植物群，也是农业的基石，其丰富的多样性与独特的进化历史密切相关。本文通过从遗传连锁作图到基因调控分析等基因组学方法，探讨了被子植物基因组组织与植物形态多样性之间的相互作用。植物遗传硬件的共性使得稳健的比较基因组学成为可能，从而为被子植物的进化提供了宏观视角，并揭示了普遍过程和特定元件在植物多样性形成中的贡献。我们认为，植物基因组的硬件——无论是内容还是动态变化——都受到选择压力的影响，这种压力导致植物（如玉米）和动物（如人类）之间尽管基因组大小和基因数量相当，但在基因调控上存在显著差异。植物独特的基因组内容和动态变化可能部分反映了植物不定型发育对基因调控提出的不同需求。植物基因组重复多倍化、单个基因复制以及广泛的重排和选择性保留为形态和/或生理变异的选择提供了丰富的原材料，这些变异有助于植物在自然或人工生态位中获得适应性优势。这些发现为增加植物生物学知识以及改良植物以更好地满足人类需求提供了日益丰富的信息。
authors: Paterson Andrew H; Queitsch Christine
title: Genome organization and botanical diversity.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组组织;植物多样性;比较基因组学;基因调控;多倍体化;形态生理变异;选择压力;生物进化;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 基因组组织与植物多样性
abstract: The rich diversity of angiosperms, both the planet's dominant flora and the cornerstone of agriculture, is integrally intertwined with a distinctive evolutionary history. Here, we explore the interplay between angiosperm genome organization and botanical diversity, empowered by genomic approaches ranging from genetic linkage mapping to analysis of gene regulation. Commonality in the genetic hardware of plants has enabled robust comparative genomics that has provided a broad picture of angiosperm evolution and implicated both general processes and specific elements in contributing to botanical diversity. We argue that the hardware of plant genomes-both in content and in dynamics-has been shaped by selection for rather substantial differences in gene regulation between plants and animals such as maize and human, organisms of comparable genome size and gene number. Their distinctive genome content and dynamics may reflect in part the indeterminate development of plants that puts strikingly different demands on gene regulation than in animals. Repeated polyploidization of plant genomes and multiplication of individual genes together with extensive rearrangement and differential retention provide rich raw material for selection of morphological and/or physiological variations conferring fitness in specific niches, whether natural or artificial. These findings exemplify the burgeoning information available to employ in increasing knowledge of plant biology and in modifying selected plants to better meet human needs.
affiliations: Plant Genome Mapping Laboratory, University of Georgia, Athens, GA, USA.; Department of Genome Sciences, University of Washington, Seattle, WA, USA.

translated_keywords: 辅助基因组；水平基因转移；毒力；适应；核心基因组；基因重复
translated_abstract: （a）物种群内基因组变异（泛基因组）的本质；（b）代谢物转运蛋白作为辅助蛋白的概念，这些蛋白能够提供定义生态位的“附加”表型。我们讨论了改善对真核微生物泛基因组变异采样和理解的需求，并回顾了影响泛基因组内辅助基因库组成的因素。在这一讨论中，我们概述了基因复制是真核生物泛基因组变异以及转运蛋白基因家族进化的关键因素。此外，我们还指出，通过功能表征编码转运蛋白的基因，结合分析转运蛋白基因如何从辅助基因组中获得或丢失，可以揭示许多关于微生物生态位范围、生态学以及毒力进化的信息。我们提倡通过基因组测序和对辅助基因库中基因的功能分析，系统地协调研究真核生物的泛基因组。
authors: Milner David S; Galindo Luis Javier; Irwin Nicholas A T; Richards Thomas A
title: Transporter Proteins as Ecological Assets and Features of Microbial Eukaryotic Pangenomes.
keywords: accessory genome; horizontal gene transfer; virulence; adaptation; core genome; gene duplication
translated_title: 转运蛋白作为生态资产及微生物真核生物泛基因组的特征
abstract: Here we review two connected themes in evolutionary microbiology: (a) the nature of gene repertoire variation within species groups (pangenomes) and (b) the concept of metabolite transporters as accessory proteins capable of providing niche-defining "bolt-on" phenotypes. We discuss the need for improved sampling and understanding of pangenome variation in eukaryotic microbes. We then review the factors that shape the repertoire of accessory genes within pangenomes. As part of this discussion, we outline how gene duplication is a key factor in both eukaryotic pangenome variation and transporter gene family evolution. We go on to outline how, through functional characterization of transporter-encoding genes, in combination with analyses of how transporter genes are gained and lost from accessory genomes, we can reveal much about the niche range, the ecology, and the evolution of virulence of microbes. We advocate for the coordinated systematic study of eukaryotic pangenomes through genome sequencing and the functional analysis of genes found within the accessory gene repertoire.
affiliations: Department of Biology, University of Oxford, Oxford, United Kingdom; email: thomas.richards@biology.ox.ac.uk.; Merton College, University of Oxford, Oxford, United Kingdom.

translated_keywords: 博物馆馆藏；PCR扩增；基因组组装；长读长测序
translated_abstract: 博物馆馆藏中保存了数以百万计的样本，其中许多长时间未被用于长读长测序。本文利用含千碱基大小DNA的乙醇保存样本表明，无扩增的测序方案能够生成连续的基因组组装结果。此外，通过采用改良的基于扩增的方案，并使用替代聚合酶以克服PCR偏差，我们成功组装了3.1 Gb的长颈树懒基因组，突破了此前500 Mb的组装上限。我们的方法还改进了其他难以测序的软体动物和节肢动物（包括毫米级生物）的基因组组装。通过强调馆藏作为宝贵的样本资源并促进小型及难测序生物的基因组组装，本研究推动了获取所有真核生物参考基因组的努力。
authors: Bein Bernhard; Chrysostomakis Ioannis; Arantes Larissa S; Brown Tom; Gerheim Charlotte; Schell Tilman; Schneider Clément; Leushkin Evgeny; Chen Zeyuan; Sigwart Julia; Gonzalez Vanessa; Wong Nur Leena W S; Santos Fabricio R; Blom Mozes P K; Mayer Frieder; Mazzoni Camila J; Böhne Astrid; Winkler Sylke; Greve Carola; Hiller Michael
title: Long-read sequencing and genome assembly of natural history collection samples and challenging specimens.
keywords: Museum collections; PCR amplification; Genome assembly; Long-read sequencing
translated_title: 自然历史收藏样本和疑难标本的长读长测序与基因组组装
abstract: Museum collections harbor millions of samples, largely unutilized for long-read sequencing. Here, we use ethanol-preserved samples containing kilobase-sized DNA to show that amplification-free protocols can yield contiguous genome assemblies. Additionally, using a modified amplification-based protocol, employing an alternative polymerase to overcome PCR bias, we assemble the 3.1 Gb maned sloth genome, surpassing the previous 500 Mb protocol size limit. Our protocol also improves assemblies of other difficult-to-sequence molluscs and arthropods, including millimeter-sized organisms. By highlighting collections as valuable sample resources and facilitating genome assembly of tiny and challenging organisms, our study advances efforts to obtain reference genomes of all eukaryotes.
affiliations: LOEWE Centre for Translational Biodiversity Genomics, Senckenberganlage 25, Frankfurt, 60325, Germany.; Senckenberg Research Institute, Senckenberganlage 25, Frankfurt, 60325, Germany.; translated_keywords: 植物免疫；磷饥饿响应；菌根共生；植物-微生物互作
translated_abstract: 磷（P）是植物生命与生长所必需的主要营养元素，植物主要从土壤中以无机磷酸盐（Pi）的形式吸收磷。为应对Pi缺乏，植物通过一系列发育和生理变化进化出一套复杂的系统来提高Pi的获取和利用效率，这一过程被称为Pi饥饿响应（PSR）。此外，植物还通过整合PSR和免疫信号通路，聚集并管理有益微生物以增强Pi吸收。研究表明，在植物生长与防御之间存在权衡，植物会降低其免疫细胞状态以容纳对宿主有益的微生物，从而促进营养吸收和生长，但这也伴随着感染风险的增加。然而，现有数据表明，即使在营养缺乏的情况下，植物也会选择性激活针对病原体的防御反应，而对非病原体的防御反应则较少或不激活。本文综述了植物在Pi缺乏条件下平衡免疫与生长相关过程的原则和机制的最新进展，以优化其适应性。
authors: Inoue Kanako; Tsuchida Natsuki; Saijo Yusuke
title: Modulation of plant immunity and biotic interactions under phosphate deficiency.
keywords: Plant immunity; Phosphate starvation response; Mycorrhiza symbiosis; Plant–microbe interactions
translated_title: 磷缺乏条件下植物免疫及生物相互作用的调控
abstract: Phosphorus (P) is an essential macronutrient for plant life and growth. P is primarily acquired in the form of inorganic phosphate (Pi) from soil. To cope with Pi deficiency, plants have evolved an elaborate system to improve Pi acquisition and utilization through an array of developmental and physiological changes, termed Pi starvation response (PSR). Plants also assemble and manage mutualistic microbes to enhance Pi uptake, through integrating PSR and immunity signaling. A trade-off between plant growth and defense favors the notion that plants lower a cellular state of immunity to accommodate host-beneficial microbes for nutrition and growth at the cost of infection risk. However, the existing data indicate that plants selectively activate defense responses against pathogens, but do not or less against non-pathogens, even under nutrient deficiency. In this review, we highlight recent advances in the principles and mechanisms with which plants balance immunity and growth-related processes to optimize their adaptation to Pi deficiency.
affiliations: Division of Biological Science, Graduate School of Science and Technology, Nara Institute of Science and Technology, Takayama 8916-5, Ikoma, Nara, 630-0192, Japan.; Division of Biological Science, Graduate School of Science and Technology, Nara Institute of Science and Technology, Takayama 8916-5, Ikoma, Nara, 630-0192, Japan. saijo@bs.naist.jp.

translated_keywords:
宏基因组组装基因组  
泛基因组  
辅助基因组  
同源性  
基因组可塑性  
核心基因  
直系同源  
比较基因组学
translated_abstract: 比较基因组学的一个关键步骤是将开放阅读框分组成具有功能和进化意义的基因簇。然而，基因簇化受到频繁发生在原核生物中的种内重复和水平基因转移的影响，这使得基因簇化变得复杂。因此，基因簇化方法必须在识别多拷贝基因家族中垂直传递的代表（可通过共线性保守识别）和检索完整的物种水平直系同源基因集之间取得平衡。我们通过分析125个原核生物泛基因组进行了研究，探讨了采用同源性、直系同源性或共线性保守作为正式基因簇化标准的影响。聚类标准对泛基因组的功能表征、核心基因组推断以及祖先基因组内容的重建影响程度不同。当使用不同的聚类标准时，物种水平上的泛基因组和核心基因组大小估计值会以相同的比例变化，从而允许在不同聚类标准下进行稳健的跨物种比较。然而，跨物种比较基因组可塑性和功能谱受聚类标准之间不一致性的显著影响。这些不一致性不仅由移动遗传元件驱动，还涉及防御、次级代谢和其他辅助功能相关的基因。在某些泛基因组特征中，方法学不一致导致的变异性甚至可能超过生态和系统发育变量的影响。选择适当的基因聚类标准对于进行无偏的泛基因组分析至关重要。我们提供了实用指南，根据研究目标和基因组组装质量选择合适的聚类方法，并提供了一个基准数据集，用于评估未来比较研究的稳健性和可重复性。
authors: Manzano-Morales Saioa; Liu Yang; González-Bodí Sara; Huerta-Cepas Jaime; Iranzo Jaime
title: Comparison of gene clustering criteria reveals intrinsic uncertainty in pangenome analyses.
keywords: MAG; Pangenome; Accessory genome; Homology; Genome plasticity; Core gene; Orthology; Comparative genomics
translated_title: 基因聚类标准的比较揭示了泛基因组分析中的内在不确定性。
abstract: A key step for comparative genomics is to group open reading frames into functionally and evolutionarily meaningful gene clusters. Gene clustering is complicated by intraspecific duplications and horizontal gene transfers that are frequent in prokaryotes. In consequence, gene clustering methods must deal with a trade-off between identifying vertically transmitted representatives of multicopy gene families, which are recognizable by synteny conservation, and retrieving complete sets of species-level orthologs. We studied the implications of adopting homology, orthology, or synteny conservation as formal criteria for gene clustering by performing comparative analyses of 125 prokaryotic pangenomes. Clustering criteria affect pangenome functional characterization, core genome inference, and reconstruction of ancestral gene content to different extents. Species-wise estimates of pangenome and core genome sizes change by the same factor when using different clustering criteria, allowing robust cross-species comparisons regardless of the clustering criterion. However, cross-species comparisons of genome plasticity and functional profiles are substantially affected by inconsistencies among clustering criteria. Such inconsistencies are driven not only by mobile genetic elements, but also by genes involved in defense, secondary metabolism, and other accessory functions. In some pangenome features, the variability attributed to methodological inconsistencies can even exceed the effect sizes of ecological and phylogenetic variables. Choosing an appropriate criterion for gene clustering is critical to conduct unbiased pangenome analyses. We provide practical guidelines to choose the right method depending on the research goals and the quality of genome assemblies, and a benchmarking dataset to assess the robustness and reproducibility of future comparative studies.
affiliations: Centro de Biotecnología y Genómica de Plantas, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (UPM) - Instituto Nacional de Investigación y Tecnología Agraria y Alimentaria (INIA-CSIC), Madrid, Spain.; Barcelona Supercomputing Centre (BSC-CNS) - Institute for Research in Biomedicine (IRB Barcelona), The Barcelona Institute of Science and Technology, Barcelona, Spain.; Guangdong Province Key Laboratory of Microbial Signals and Disease Control, Integrative Microbiology Research Centre, South China Agricultural University, Guangzhou, China.; Centro de Biotecnología y Genómica de Plantas, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (UPM) - Instituto Nacional de Investigación y Tecnología Agraria y Alimentaria (INIA-CSIC), Madrid, Spain. j.huerta@csic.es.; Centro de Biotecnología y Genómica de Plantas, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (UPM) - Instituto Nacional de Investigación y Tecnología Agraria y Alimentaria (INIA-CSIC), Madrid, Spain. jaime.iranzo@upm.es.; Institute for Biocomputation and Physics of Complex Systems (BIFI), University of Zaragoza, Zaragoza, Spain. jaime.iranzo@upm.es.

translated_keywords: 噬菌体；恒定多样性平衡；泛基因组；“杀死胜者”；群体基因组学
translated_abstract: 现代微生物学面临的一个重大难题是微生物中存在的庞大泛基因组（基因库），其规模远超人类等复杂生物的基因组。本文认为，不同菌株携带的基因库多样性得以维持，主要归因于病毒捕食所施加的选择压力。病毒通过时间上的恒定-多样性平衡维持了较高的菌株多样性，从而防止特定克隆系对资源的垄断。因此，病毒促进了海洋中溶解有机物的释放与降解，这可能通过自上而下和自下而上控制的结合来改善生态系统的功能。通过维持这种平衡，病毒成为海洋微生物适应环境的关键要素，并且很可能作为一个单一的进化单元发挥作用。
authors: Rodriguez-Valera Francisco; Bellas Christopher
title: How Viruses Shape Microbial Plankton Microdiversity.
keywords: phages; constant-diversity equilibrium; pangenome; kill-the-winner; population genomics
translated_title: 病毒如何塑造微生物浮游生物的微多样性
abstract: One major conundrum of modern microbiology is the large pangenome (gene pool) present in microbes, which is much larger than those found in complex organisms such as humans. Here, we argue that this diversity of gene pools carried by different strains is maintained largely due to the control exercised by viral predation. Viruses maintain a high strain diversity through time that we describe as constant-diversity equilibrium, preventing the hoarding of resources by specific clones. Thus, viruses facilitate the release and degradation of dissolved organic matter in the ocean, which may lead to better ecosystem functioning by linking top-down to bottom-up control. By maintaining this equilibrium, viruses act as a key element of the adaptation of marine microbes to their environment and likely behave as a single evolutionary unit.
affiliations: Evolutionary Genomics Group, Departamento de Producción Vegetal y Microbiología, Universidad Miguel Hernández, San Juan de Alicante, Spain; email: frvalera@umh.es.; Department of Ecology, Universität Innsbruck, Innsbruck, Austria; email: christopher.bellas@uibk.ac.at.

translated_keywords: 氮吸收;代谢;非生物胁迫;硝酸盐转运蛋白;WRKY1转录因子;氮同化;氨基酸;生物量;分子生物学;植物生理学
translated_abstract: 氮（N）作为一种无机大量营养元素对植物的生长、发育和生物量积累至关重要。许多外部因素和胁迫条件，如酸碱度、盐分、温度、氧气和降雨等，都会影响植物对氮的吸收与代谢。植物对铵离子（NH₄⁺）和硝酸根离子（NO₃⁻）的吸收主要依赖于土壤特性。在高浓度硝酸根离子（>1 mM）条件下，低亲和力转运系统由基因网络NRT1激活；而在低浓度硝酸根离子条件下，高亲和力转运系统则由NRT2基因家族调控。细胞内最终被同化的氮形式是铵离子，这一过程通过谷氨酰胺合成酶和谷氨酸合成酶这两种关键酶介导完成。WRKY1是植物氮调控网络中的主要转录因子。然而，转录组和代谢组分析表明，在非生物胁迫下，包括甘氨酸、谷氨酰胺和天冬氨酸在内的氮同化代谢物表现出显著变化。过表达硝酸根离子转运蛋白（OsNRT2.3a和OsNRT1.1b）能够显著提高多种作物的生物量和产量。调节相关基因的表达水平可能是改善土壤和环境胁迫条件下（如不利温度、干旱、盐害、重金属及养分胁迫等）氮代谢的有效工具。
authors: Akhtar Kashif; Ain Noor Ul; Prasad P V Vara; Naz Misbah; Aslam Mehtab Muhammad; Djalovic Ivica; Riaz Muhammad; Ahmad Shakeel; Varshney Rajeev K; He Bing; Wen Ronghui
title: Physiological, molecular, and environmental insights into plant nitrogen uptake, and metabolism under abiotic stresses.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 氮吸收;代谢;非生物胁迫;硝酸盐转运蛋白;WRKY1转录因子;氮同化;氨基酸;生物量;分子生物学;植物生理学
translated_title: 非生物胁迫下植物氮吸收、代谢的生理、分子及环境见解
abstract: Nitrogen (N) as an inorganic macronutrient is inevitable for plant growth, development, and biomass production. Many external factors and stresses, such as acidity, alkalinity, salinity, temperature, oxygen, and rainfall, affect N uptake and metabolism in plants. The uptake of ammonium (NH4 +) and nitrate (NO3 -) in plants mainly depends on soil properties. Under the sufficient availability of NO3 - (>1 mM), low-affinity transport system is activated by gene network NRT1, and under low NO3 - availability (4 + ion is the final form of N assimilated by cells mediated through the key enzymes glutamine synthetase and glutamate synthase. The WRKY1 is a major transcription factor of the N regulation network in plants. However, the transcriptome and metabolite profiles show variations in N assimilation metabolites, including glycine, glutamine, and aspartate, under abiotic stresses. The overexpression of NO3 - transporters (OsNRT2.3a and OsNRT1.1b) can significantly improve the biomass and yield of various crops. Altering the expression levels of genes could be a valuable tool to improve N metabolism under the challenging conditions of soil and environment, such as unfavorable temperature, drought, salinity, heavy metals, and nutrient stress.
affiliations: State Key Laboratory for Conservation and Utilization of Subtropical Agro-bioresources, Guangxi Key Laboratory of Sugarcane Biology, College of Life Science and Technology, Guangxi University, Nanning, China.; Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory for Lingnan Modern Agriculture, Genome Analysis Laboratory of the Ministry of Agriculture, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen, China.; Feed the Future Innovation Lab for Collaborative Research on Sustainable Intensification, Kansas State University, Manhattan, Kansas, USA.; Institute of Environment and Ecology, School of the Environment and Safety Engineering, Jiangsu University, Zhenjiang, China.; College of Agriculture, Food and Natural Resources (CAFNR), Division of Plant Sciences & Technology, University of Missouri, Columbia, Missouri, USA.; Institute of Field and Vegetable Crops, National Institute of the Republic of Serbia, Novi Sad, Serbia.; Department of Environmental Sciences and Engineering, Government College University Faisalabad, Faisalabad, Pakistan.; WA State Agricultural Biotechnology Centre, Centre for Crop and Food Innovation, Food Futures Institute, Murdoch University, Murdoch, Western Australia, Australia.; Guangxi Key Laboratory of Agro-Environment and Agric-Products Safety, College of Agriculture, Guangxi University, Nanning, China.

journal: Annual review of biomedical data science
translated_abstract: 混血群体构成了全球人类遗传多样性的重要组成部分，但它们常常被排除在基因组学分析之外。这种排除是有问题的，因为它导致了对多样化队列的遗传结构和历史以及跨人群基因组医学理解的差异。混血群体在统计上具有特殊挑战，因为它们从多个来源群体继承基因组片段——这也是它们历史上被排除在遗传研究之外的主要原因。然而近年来，已经开发出越来越多的统计方法和软件工具，以在基因组学分析背景下考虑和利用混血现象。本文综述了这些计算策略，以便在大规模基因组学研究中合理纳入混合血统人群，并详细说明现有工具中存在的持续差距。
authors: Tan Taotao; Atkinson Elizabeth G
title: Strategies for the Genomic Analysis of Admixed Populations.
keywords: ancestry; statistical genetics; admixture; methods; genomics; complex traits
translated_title: 混杂群体基因组分析策略
abstract: Admixed populations constitute a large portion of global human genetic diversity, yet they are often left out of genomics analyses. This exclusion is problematic, as it leads to disparities in the understanding of the genetic structure and history of diverse cohorts and the performance of genomic medicine across populations. Admixed populations have particular statistical challenges, as they inherit genomic segments from multiple source populations-the primary reason they have historically been excluded from genetic studies. In recent years, however, an increasing number of statistical methods and software tools have been developed to account for and leverage admixture in the context of genomics analyses. Here, we provide a survey of such computational strategies for the informed consideration of admixture to allow for the well-calibrated inclusion of mixed ancestry populations in large-scale genomics studies, and we detail persisting gaps in existing tools.
affiliations: Department of Molecular and Human Genetics, Baylor College of Medicine, Houston, Texas, USA; email: elizabeth.atkinson@bcm.edu.

translated_keywords: 参考基因组;附着染色体;泛基因组变异图; Fusarium oxysporum;水平基因转移;染色体动态;宿主特异性;生物信息学;植物病理学
translated_abstract: 附加染色体在某些但并非所有物种个体中存在，在植物病原真菌的致病性和宿主特异性方面发挥着重要作用。然而，由于其变异特性，基于参考的分析变得复杂，尤其是当这些染色体缺失于参考基因组时。泛基因组变异图谱提供了一种无需参考的替代方法来研究这些染色体。本文构建了由73个多样化尖孢镰刀菌（Fusarium oxysporum）基因组组成的泛基因组变异图谱，这是一种主要的植物病原真菌，其基因组具有分隔结构，包括保守的核心染色体和可变的附加染色体。为了深入了解附加染色体的动态变化，我们首先利用全对全相似性映射构建了一个染色体相似性网络。我们识别出在所有菌株中保守的十一条核心染色体以及大量高度可变的附加染色体。其中一些附加染色体是宿主特异性的，可能在决定宿主范围中起作用。通过基于k-mer的方法，我们进一步确认了所有可用的（581个）F. oxysporum基因组组装中存在这些附加染色体，并验证了宿主特异性附加染色体的存在。为进一步分析尖孢镰刀菌中染色体的进化，我们针对同源染色体组构建了泛基因组变异图谱。这揭示附加染色体由不同片段的附加区域组成，且可能在附加区域之间的重排形成了这些嵌合附加染色体。此外，我们表明附加染色体很可能在自然群体中发生水平转移。我们的研究结果表明，泛基因组变异图谱是一种强大的方法，可以阐明尖孢镰刀菌中附加染色体的进化动态，这不仅对镰刀菌属具有重要价值，也为其他含有附加染色体的物种提供了类似的分析框架。
authors: van Westerhoven Anouk C; Fokkens Like; Wissink Kyran; Kema Gert H J; Rep Martijn; Seidl Michael F
title: Reference-free identification and pangenome analysis of accessory chromosomes in a major fungal plant pathogen.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 参考基因组;附着染色体;泛基因组变异图; Fusarium oxysporum;水平基因转移;染色体动态;宿主特异性;生物信息学;植物病理学
translated_title: 主要植物病原真菌附属染色体的无参鉴定与泛基因组分析
abstract: Accessory chromosomes, found in some but not all individuals of a species, play an important role in pathogenicity and host specificity in fungal plant pathogens. However, their variability complicates reference-based analysis, especially when these chromosomes are missing in the reference genome. Pangenome variation graphs offer a reference-free alternative for studying these chromosomes. Here, we constructed a pangenome variation graph for 73 diverse Fusarium oxysporum genomes, a major fungal plant pathogen with a compartmentalized genome that includes conserved core as well as variable accessory chromosomes. To obtain insights into accessory chromosome dynamics, we first constructed a chromosome similarity network using all-vs-all similarity mapping. We identified eleven core chromosomes conserved across all strains and a substantial number of highly variable accessory chromosomes. Some of these accessory chromosomes are host-specific and likely play a role in determining host range. Using a k-mer based approach, we further identified the presence of these accessory chromosomes in all available (581) F. oxysporum assemblies and corroborated the occurrence of host-specific accessory chromosomes. To further analyze the evolution of chromosomes in F. oxysporum, we constructed a pangenome variation graph per group of homologous chromosomes. This reveals that accessory chromosomes are composed of different stretches of accessory regions, and possibly rearrangements between accessory regions gave rise to these mosaic accessory chromosomes. Furthermore, we show that accessory chromosomes are likely horizontally transferred in natural populations. Our findings demonstrate that a pangenome variation graph is a powerful approach to elucidate the evolutionary dynamics of accessory chromosomes in F. oxysporum, which is not only a useful resource for Fusarium but also provides a framework for similar analyses in other species containing accessory chromosomes.
affiliations: Theoretical Biology and Bioinformatics, Utrecht University, Padualaan 8, 3583CH, Utrecht, the Netherlands.; Laboratory of Phytopathology, Wageningen University & Research, Droevendaalsesteeg 1, 6708PB, Wageningen, the Netherlands.; Molecular Plant Pathology, Swammerdam Institute of Life Sciences, University of Amsterdam,1090GE, Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

translated_keywords: 染色质；单分子生物物理；DNA复制；基因组组织；DNA修复；基因组维护
translated_abstract: 基因组作为染色质这种长而复杂的生物大分子，具有自我组织和自我维持的能力。由于基因组运作过程中固有的异质性、随机性、相分离以及染色质动力学特性，使用群体分析方法研究基因组面临诸多挑战。为此，来自不同学科的各种基于单分子力、荧光和测序的技术被开发出来，以填补群体测量技术的空白，这些技术从独特的角度揭示了基因组结构及其维持机制的细节。单分子工具箱能够捕捉到关于遗传物质组织、构象变化及包装的分子层面信息，以及维持因子的连续性和随机运动，为跨学科合作提供了绝佳机会，以理解遗传物质在健康状态下的功能及其在疾病中的异常表现。本文综述了单分子技术为基因组科学带来的新见解及其逐步革新该领域的潜力。
authors: Rudnizky Sergei; Murray Peter J; Wolfe Clara H; Ha Taekjip
title: Single-Macromolecule Studies of Eukaryotic Genomic Maintenance.
keywords: chromatin; single-molecule biophysics; DNA replication; genomic organization; DNA repair; genomic maintenance
translated_title: 真核基因组维持的单分子研究
abstract: Genomes are self-organized and self-maintained as long, complex macromolecules of chromatin. The inherent heterogeneity, stochasticity, phase separation, and chromatin dynamics of genome operation make it challenging to study genomes using ensemble methods. Various single-molecule force-, fluorescent-, and sequencing-based techniques rooted in different disciplines have been developed to fill critical gaps in the capabilities of bulk measurements, each providing unique, otherwise inaccessible, insights into the structure and maintenance of the genome. Capable of capturing molecular-level details about the organization, conformational changes, and packaging of genetic material, as well as processive and stochastic movements of maintenance factors, a single-molecule toolbox provides an excellent opportunity for collaborative research to understand how genetic material functions in health and malfunctions in disease. In this review, we discuss novel insights brought to genomic sciences by single-molecule techniques and their potential to continue to revolutionize the field-one molecule at a time.
affiliations: Department of Biophysics and Biophysical Chemistry, Johns Hopkins University School of Medicine, Baltimore, Maryland, USA.; Department of Biology, Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, Maryland, USA.; Program in Cellular and Molecular Medicine, Boston Children's Hospital, Boston, Massachusetts, USA; email: taekjip.ha@childrens.harvard.edu.; Department of Pediatrics, Harvard Medical School, Boston, Massachusetts, USA.; Howard Hughes Medical Institute, Boston Children's Hospital, Boston, Massachusetts, USA.

translated_keywords: 诱导抗性；害虫；丛枝菌根共生；MIR；病原体；植物激素；植物免疫
translated_abstract: 丛枝菌根（arbuscular mycorrhizal, AM）共生是地球上最古老且分布最广泛的互利共生关系，涉及属于Glomeromycotina亚纲的植物和土壤真菌。复杂的分子、细胞和遗传发育程序使伙伴识别、真菌在植物组织中的定殖以及共生功能（如以碳水化合物和脂质交换磷元素）的激活成为可能。作为古老的专性生物营养体，AM真菌已经进化出策略来规避植物防御反应，从而确保这种亲密而持久的互利共生关系。它们是能够增强植物应对生物胁迫能力的根际相关微生物之一，由此产生的菌根诱导抗性（mycorrhiza-induced resistance, MIR）对不同宿主和多种攻击者均有效。本文综述了在AM真菌侵染过程中调控植物免疫机制的分子机制，以及在地下和地上害虫及病原体引发的MIR表现期间的相关机制。了解MIR效率谱及其调控机制对于优化这些有益微生物的生物技术应用以实现可持续作物保护具有重要意义。
authors: Fiorilli V; Martínez-Medina A; Pozo Maria J; Lanfranco L
title: Plant Immunity Modulation in Arbuscular Mycorrhizal Symbiosis and Its Impact on Pathogens and Pests.
keywords: priming; mycorrhiza-induced resistance; pests; arbuscular mycorrhizal symbiosis; MIR; pathogens; phytohormones; plant immunity
translated_title: 丛枝菌根共生中的植物免疫调控及其对病原体和害虫的影响
abstract: Arbuscular mycorrhizal (AM) symbiosis is the oldest and most widespread mutualistic association on Earth and involves plants and soil fungi belonging to Glomeromycotina. A complex molecular, cellular, and genetic developmental program enables partner recognition, fungal accommodation in plant tissues, and activation of symbiotic functions such as transfer of phosphorus in exchange for carbohydrates and lipids. AM fungi, as ancient obligate biotrophs, have evolved strategies to circumvent plant defense responses to guarantee an intimate and long-lasting mutualism. They are among those root-associated microorganisms able to boost plants' ability to cope with biotic stresses leading to mycorrhiza-induced resistance (MIR), which can be effective across diverse hosts and against different attackers. Here, we examine the molecular mechanisms underlying the modulation of plant immunity during colonization by AM fungi and at the onset and display of MIR against belowground and aboveground pests and pathogens. Understanding the MIR efficiency spectrum and its regulation is of great importance to optimizing the biotechnological application of these beneficial microbes for sustainable crop protection.
affiliations: Department of Life Sciences and Systems Biology, University of Turin, Turin, Italy; email: luisa.lanfranco@unito.it.; Department of Plant-Microbe Interactions, Institute of Natural Resources and Agrobiology of Salamanca, CSIC, Salamanca, Spain.; Department of Soil and Plant Microbiology, Estación Experimental del Zaidín, CSIC, Granada, Spain; email: mariajose.pozo@eez.csic.es.

translated_keywords: 单倍型图；泛基因组；PHG；基因组浏览器；图谱浏览器；图格式
translated_abstract: 泛基因组的发展通过捕获物种内的全部遗传多样性彻底改变了基因组学研究。泛基因组组装整合多个个体的数据以构建全面的基因组图景，揭示核心和附属基因组元件。这种方法能够识别新的基因、结构变异以及基因存在-缺失变异，为物种进化、适应及性状变异提供见解。表示泛基因组需要创新的可视化格式，有效传达复杂的基因组结构和变异。本文深入探讨了构建泛基因组的当代方法及其在植物基因组中的最新进展。文章考察了泛基因组表示的结构，包括格式比较、转换、可视化技术及其对提升作物改良策略的意义。早期的比较研究已经揭示了不同作物物种中新的基因序列、拷贝数变异和存在-缺失变异。泛基因组的概念，即从广泛的基因型中捕获多种遗传变异，为物种遗传组成提供了整体视角。然而，对于具有较大基因组的植物构建泛基因组面临挑战，包括管理庞大的基因组序列数据以及理解种质资源中的遗传变异。为应对这些挑战，研究人员探索了成本效益更高的替代方案，以在一个称为泛基因组的单一组装中封装物种多样性。这涉及减少基因组序列的体积，同时关注遗传变异。随着泛基因组概念在植物基因组学中的日益重要，出现了多种软件工具来促进泛基因组的构建。本文阐明了开发和利用专为植物构建泛基因组而设计的软件工具，并讨论了适合下游分析的表示格式，为理解植物物种的遗传景观和进化动态提供了有价值的见解。总之，本文强调了泛基因组构建和表示格式在解析复杂植物基因组遗传架构中的重要意义，为探索和理解植物遗传多样性提供了全面概述。
authors: Ruperao Pradeep; Rangan Parimalan; Shah Trushar; Sharma Vinay; Rathore Abhishek; Mayes Sean; Pandey Manish K
title: Developing pangenomes for large and complex plant genomes and their representation formats.
keywords: Haplotype graph; Pangenome; PHG; Genome viewer; Graph viewer; Graph format
translated_title: 大型复杂植物基因组泛基因组的构建及其表示格式
abstract: The development of pangenomes has revolutionized genomic studies by capturing the complete genetic diversity within a species. Pangenome assembly integrates data from multiple individuals to construct a comprehensive genomic landscape, revealing both core and accessory genomic elements. This approach enables the identification of novel genes, structural variations, and gene presence-absence variations, providing insights into species evolution, adaptation, and trait variation. Representing pangenomes requires innovative visualization formats that effectively convey the complex genomic structures and variations. This review delves into contemporary methodologies and recent advancements in constructing pangenomes, particularly in plant genomes. It examines the structure of pangenome representation, including format comparison, conversion, visualization techniques, and their implications for enhancing crop improvement strategies. Earlier comparative studies have illuminated novel gene sequences, copy number variations, and presence-absence variations across diverse crop species. The concept of a pan-genome, which captures multiple genetic variations from a broad spectrum of genotypes, offers a holistic perspective of a species' genetic makeup. However, constructing a pan-genome for plants with larger genomes poses challenges, including managing vast genome sequence data and comprehending the genetic variations within the germplasm. To address these challenges, researchers have explored cost-effective alternatives to encapsulate species diversity in a single assembly known as a pangenome. This involves reducing the volume of genome sequences while focusing on genetic variations. With the growing prominence of the pan-genome concept in plant genomics, several software tools have emerged to facilitate pangenome construction. This review sheds light on developing and utilizing software tools tailored for constructing pan-genomes in plants. It also discusses representation formats suitable for downstream analyses, offering valuable insights into the genetic landscape and evolutionary dynamics of plant species. In summary, this review underscores the significance of pan-genome construction and representation formats in resolving the genetic architecture of plants, particularly those with complex genomes. It provides a comprehensive overview of recent advancements, aiding in exploring and understanding plant genetic diversity.
affiliations: Center of Excellence in Genomics and Systems Biology (CEGSB) and Center for Pre-Breeding Research (CPBR), International Crops Research Institute for the Semi-Arid Tropics (ICRISAT), Hyderabad, India.
