Electronic address: Manish.Pandey@icrisat.org.

translated_keywords: 升温； elevated CO2（高浓度二氧化碳）；干旱；植物适合度；植物-微生物互作；叶圈微生物群落
translated_abstract: 植物在数亿年的演化过程中与多种微生物群落共同进化，这对它们适应生物和非生物胁迫产生了深远影响。多组学技术的快速发展极大地提高了我们对植物微生物群落的多样性、组成和功能的理解，但全球气候变化如何影响植物微生物群落的组装及其在调节宿主植物适应环境变化中的作用尚未完全明了。本文综述了植物微生物群落组装方面的最新进展以及其对气候变暖、二氧化碳浓度升高和干旱等气候变化因子的响应。此外，本文还探讨了气候变化背景下植物-微生物互作的研究趋势和热点，并总结了植物微生物群落影响植物适应气候变化的关键机制。我们提出，亟需开展未来研究以揭示气候变化调控的关键植物基因和信号分子对微生物群落的影响，阐明植物-微生物互作在群落水平上的进化响应，并构建合成微生物群落以缓解气候变化对植物适应性的不利影响。
authors: Zeng Qing; Hu Hang-Wei; Ge An-Hui; Xiong Chao; Zhai Chang-Chun; Duan Gui-Lan; Han Li-Li; Huang Si-Yun; Zhang Li-Mei
title: Plant-microbiome interactions and their impacts on plant adaptation to climate change.
keywords: warming; elevated CO2; drought; plant fitness; plant–microbe interactions; phyllosphere microbiomes
translated_title: 植物-微生物组相互作用及其对植物适应气候变化的影响
abstract: Plants have co-evolved with a wide range of microbial communities over hundreds of millions of years, this has drastically influenced their adaptation to biotic and abiotic stress. The rapid development of multi-omics approaches has greatly improved our understanding of the diversity, composition, and functions of plant microbiomes, but how global climate change affects the assembly of plant microbiomes and their roles in regulating host plant adaptation to changing environmental conditions is not fully known. In this review, we summarize recent advancements in the community assembly of plant microbiomes, and their responses to climate change factors such as elevated CO2 levels, warming, and drought. We further delineate the research trends and hotspots in plant-microbiome interactions in the context of climate change, and summarize the key mechanisms by which plant microbiomes influence plant adaptation to the changing climate. We propose that future research is urgently needed to unravel the impact of key plant genes and signal molecules modulated by climate change on microbial communities, to elucidate the evolutionary response of plant-microbe interactions at the community level, and to engineer synthetic microbial communities to mitigate the effects of climate change on plant fitness.
affiliations: State Key Laboratory of Regional and Urban Ecology, Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, 100085, China.; University of Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, 100049, China.; School of Agriculture, Food and Ecosystem Sciences, Faculty of Science, The University of Melbourne, Parkville, VIC 3010, Australia.; Key Laboratory of Plant Carbon Capture, CAS Center for Excellence in Molecular Plant Sciences, Institute of Plant Physiology and Ecology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Shanghai, 200032, China.; Hawkesbury Institute for the Environment, Western Sydney University, Penrith, NSW 2751, Australia.; School of Life Sciences, Institute of Life Science and Green Development, Hebei University, Baoding, 071002, China.

translated_keywords: 植物；泛基因组；基因组变异；生物信息学流程；数据分析与可视化
translated_abstract: 从头组装与比较、基于参考基因组的迭代组装以及基于图模型的泛基因组构建。每种方法在处理不同数量和结构的DNA测序数据时都有其优势和挑战。随着高质量基因组组装技术和先进生物信息学工具的出现，基于图模型的泛基因组正成为探索遗传变异生物学和功能意义的高级参考。
authors: Hu Haifei; Li Risheng; Zhao Junliang; Batley Jacqueline; Edwards David
title: Technological Development and Advances for Constructing and Analyzing Plant Pangenomes.
keywords: plant; pangenome; genome variation; bioinformatic pipeline; data analysis and visualization
translated_title: 植物泛基因组构建与分析的技术发展与进展
abstract: A pangenome captures the genomic diversity for a species, derived from a collection of genetic sequences of diverse populations. Advances in sequencing technologies have given rise to three primary methods for pangenome construction and analysis: de novo assembly and comparison, reference genome-based iterative assembly, and graph-based pangenome construction. Each method presents advantages and challenges in processing varying amounts and structures of DNA sequencing data. With the emergence of high-quality genome assemblies and advanced bioinformatic tools, the graph-based pangenome is emerging as an advanced reference for exploring the biological and functional implications of genetic variations.
affiliations: Rice Research Institute, Guangdong Academy of Agricultural Sciences & Key Laboratory of Genetics and Breeding of High Quality Rice in Southern China (Co-construction by Ministry and Province), Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs & Guangdong Key Laboratory of New Technology in Rice Breeding & Guangdong Rice Engineering Laboratory, Guangzhou 510640, China.; College of Agriculture, South China Agricultural University, Guangzhou, Guangdong 510642, China.; School of Biological Sciences, University of Western Australia, Perth, WA, Australia.; Centre for Applied Bioinformatics, University of Western Australia, Perth, WA 6009, Australia.

translated_keywords: 数据库；系统基因组学；基因组重测序；生活史性状；基因组特征；昆虫基因组学；比较基因组学；数据共享政策
translated_abstract: 得益于测序技术和生物信息学工具的快速发展，针对特定研究目的对昆虫物种进行基因组测序的做法正变得越来越普遍。昆虫基因组不仅提供了基因序列集，还标志着昆虫学领域从还原论向系统生物学的关注转变。借助昆虫基因组，研究人员能够识别并研究与感兴趣性状相关的整个基因家族、通路或基因网络的所有成员的功能。比较基因组学研究为昆虫进化提供了新的见解，并解决了分类学中的长期争议。此外，通过使用个体昆虫的重测序数据来鉴定变异，随后进行全基因组关联分析，现在可以揭示重要性状的遗传基础。本文综述了当前昆虫基因组测序项目的研究进展以及昆虫基因组在揭示昆虫系统发育关系和解析重要生活史性状机制方面的应用。我们还总结了基因组数据共享面临的挑战及可能的解决方案，并为充分挖掘昆虫基因组数据提供了指导。
authors: Li Fei; Wang Xianhui; Zhou Xin
title: The Genomics Revolution Drives a New Era in Entomology.
keywords: databases; phylogenomics; genome resequencing; life-history traits; genomic features; insect genomics; comparative genomics; data sharing policy
translated_title: 基因组革命推动昆虫学进入新时代
abstract: Thanks to the fast development of sequencing techniques and bioinformatics tools, sequencing the genome of an insect species for specific research purposes has become an increasingly popular practice. Insect genomes not only provide sets of gene sequences but also represent a change in focus from reductionism to systemic biology in the field of entomology. Using insect genomes, researchers are able to identify and study the functions of all members of a gene family, pathway, or gene network associated with a trait of interest. Comparative genomics studies provide new insights into insect evolution, addressing long-lasting controversies in taxonomy. It is also now feasible to uncover the genetic basis of important traits by identifying variants using genome resequencing data of individual insects, followed by genome-wide association analysis. Here, we review the current progress in insect genome sequencing projects and the application of insect genomes in uncovering the phylogenetic relationships between insects and unraveling the mechanisms of important life-history traits. We also summarize the challenges in genome data sharing and possible solutions. Finally, we provide guidance for fully and deeply mining insect genome data.

translated_keywords: 转座子；适应；茄属；茄科泛基因组；多倍体
journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America
journal_full_name: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America
translated_abstract: 马铃薯（茄属植物，茄科）是全球最重要的非谷物类粮食作物。其近缘野生种群主要分布在茄属Pétota组，该组包含具有有性和无性繁殖方式以及不同倍性水平的物种。本研究构建了一个由296个材料组成的Pétota组泛基因组，其中包括二倍体和多倍体，并通过存在/缺失变异（PAV）进行比较。Pétota核心基因组（至少97%的材料共享的基因）和外壳基因组（3%-97%的材料共享的基因）富集了基础分子和细胞功能，而云基因组（存在于少于3%的成员材料中的基因）则富含转座元件（TEs）。对栽培种与野生种的PAV比较表明，基于PAV构建的系统发育树将材料分成了不同的分支，这与之前使用DNA标记构建的系统发育树相似。通过分支特异性泛基因组方法，在第1+2分支和第3分支的核心基因中鉴定出非生物胁迫响应，在第4分支的核心基因中鉴定出开花和块茎形成。各分支间的TE含量存在差异，其中第1+2分支由来自北美和中美洲的物种组成，这些物种与其他分支的物种存在生殖隔离，其TE含量明显低于其他分支。相比之下，具有离体培养历史的材料被鉴定出来，发现其TE含量较高。结果表明，TEs在自然和人工环境中对茄属Pétota组的适应过程中发挥了重要作用。
authors: Bozan Ilayda; Achakkagari Sai Reddy; Anglin Noelle L; Ellis David; Tai Helen H; Strömvik Martina V
title: Pangenome analyses reveal impact of transposable elements and ploidy on the evolution of potato species.
keywords: transposons; adaptation; Solanum; Petota pangenome; polyploidy
translated_title: 泛基因组分析揭示转座元件和倍性对马铃薯物种进化的影响
abstract: Potato (Solanum sp., family Solanaceae) is the most important noncereal food crop globally. It has over 100 wild relatives in the Solanum section Petota, which features species with both sexual and asexual reproduction and varying ploidy levels. A pangenome of Solanum section Petota composed of 296 accessions was constructed including diploids and polyploids compared via presence/absence variation (PAV). The Petota core (genes shared by at least 97% of the accessions) and shell genomes (shared by 3 to 97%) are enriched in basic molecular and cellular functions, while the cloud genome (genes present in less than 3% of the member accessions) showed enrichment in transposable elements (TEs). Comparison of PAV in domesticated vs. wild accessions was made, and a phylogenetic tree was constructed based on PAVs, grouping accessions into different clades, similar to previous phylogenies produced using DNA markers. A cladewise pangenome approach identified abiotic stress response among the core genes in clade 1+2 and clade 3, and flowering/tuberization among the core genes in clade 4. The TE content differed between the clades, with clade 1+2, which is composed of species from North and Central America with reproductive isolation from species in other clades, having much lower TE content compared to other clades. In contrast, accessions with in vitro propagation history were identified and found to have high levels of TEs. Results indicate a role for TEs in adaptation to new environments, both natural and artificial, for Solanum section Petota.
affiliations: Department of Plant Science, McGill University, Sainte-Anne-de-Bellevue, QC H9X 3V9, Canada.; International Potato Center, Lima 15023, Peru.; United States Department of Agriculture - Agricultural Research Service (USDA ARS) Small Grains and Potato Germplasm Research, Aberdeen, ID 1691S 2700W.; Fredericton Research and Development Centre, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, Fredericton, NB E3B 4Z7, Canada.

translated_keywords: 内皮层；SGR家族；细胞分裂；向地性；液泡形成；重力感知；淀粉体沉降
translated_abstract: 在植物中，重力引导双向生长；它决定了地上部分的向上生长和根系的向下生长。由于重力的作用，根系能够牢固地固定植株，而地上部分则可以进行光合作用。重力还帮助植物形成最佳姿态并发展其结构，以高效利用水分、养分、CO₂和气体交换等资源。因此，向重力性对作物产量以及植物在恶劣气候条件下的生长至关重要。一些SGR家族成员已知会影响分蘖角度、器官大小和花序茎等性状。尽管SHOOT GRAVITROPISM（SGR）家族在调控地上部分向重力性命运方面起着关键作用，但与植物细胞和组织中其他参与重力响应的蛋白质相比，人们对它的功能了解甚少。此外，关于SGR家族在向重力性中的生理活动和生化反应的信息也较少。本文综述了近期在向重力性方面的研究进展，并展望了未来作物改良、多应用场景以及提高农业生产力的转化研究方向。植物已经进化出多个专门针对重力响应的基因家族，其中SGR家族尤为重要。SGR家族通过调节特定的生理和生化过程（如转录、细胞分裂、淀粉体沉降、内皮层发育和液泡形成）来调控植物的重力响应。本文重点分析了地上部分向重力性的最新发现，特别是关注植物细胞生物学、细胞生理学和稳态中的SGR蛋白。植物细胞通过淀粉体（淀粉颗粒）在重力方向上的沉降来感知重力信号，从而启动信号级联反应。植物重力性包括重力感知、信号传导和生长素重新分布（器官弯曲）三个组成部分。最终，我们聚焦于多个SGR基因在地上部分的功能，并全面更新了SGR家族成员在重力响应中的参与情况。
authors: Cho Yuhan; Kim Yujeong; Lee Hyebi; Kim Sundong; Kang Jaehee; Kadam Ulhas S; Ju Park Soon; Sik Chung Woo; Chan Hong Jong
title: Cellular and physiological functions of SGR family in gravitropic response in higher plants.
keywords: Endodermis; SGR family; Cell division; Shoot Gravitropism; Vacuole formation; Gravity sensing; Amyloplast sedimentation
translated_title: 高等植物向重力性反应中SGR家族的细胞与生理功能
abstract: In plants, gravity directs bidirectional growth; it specifies upward growth of shoots and downward growth of roots. Due to gravity, roots establish robust anchorage and shoot, which enables to photosynthesize. It sets optimum posture and develops plant architecture to efficiently use resources like water, nutrients, CO2, and gaseous exchange. Hence, gravitropism is crucial for crop productivity as well as for the growth of plants in challenging climate. Some SGR members are known to affect tiller and shoot angle, organ size, and inflorescence stem in plants. Although the SHOOT GRAVITROPISM (SGR) family plays a key role in regulating the fate of shoot gravitropism, little is known about its function compared to other proteins involved in gravity response in plant cells and tissues. Moreover, less information on the SGR family's physiological activities and biochemical responses in shoot gravitropism is available. This review scrutinizes and highlights the recent developments in shoot gravitropism and provides an outlook for future crop development, multi-application scenarios, and translational research to improve agricultural productivity. Plants have evolved multiple gene families specialized in gravitropic responses, of which the SGR family is highly significant. The SGR family regulates the plant's gravity response by regulating specific physiological and biochemical processes such as transcription, cell division, amyloplast sedimentation, endodermis development, and vacuole formation. Here, we analyze the latest discoveries in shoot gravitropism with particular attention to SGR proteins in plant cell biology, cellular physiology, and homeostasis. Plant cells detect gravity signals by sedimentation of amyloplast (starch granules) in the direction of gravity, and the signaling cascade begins. Gravity sensing, signaling, and auxin redistribution (organ curvature) are the three components of plant gravitropism. Eventually, we focus on the role of multiple SGR genes in shoot and present a complete update on the participation of SGR family members in gravity.
affiliations: Division of Life Science and Division of Applied Life Science (BK21 Four), Plant Molecular Biology and Biotechnology Research Center, Gyeongsang National University, Jinju, Gyeongnam, 52828, Republic of Korea.; Division of Life Science and Division of Applied Life Science (BK21 Four), Plant Molecular Biology and Biotechnology Research Center, Gyeongsang National University, Jinju, Gyeongnam, 52828, Republic of Korea. translated_keywords: 生物多样性；基因组分化；基因重组；物种边界
journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America
journal_full_name: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America
translated_abstract: 尽管生物体本身无法获取或观察到，核苷酸序列数据已被用于识别物种。然而，基因组范围内的序列分歧如何映射到物种状态仍不清楚。虽然基因序列分歧常用于界定细菌物种，但其与已确立的物种界限之间的对应关系尚未在真核生物类群中得到探索。由于同源重组等基因流动的基础过程在原核生物和真核生物之间存在根本差异，这两个领域的生殖隔离与全基因组序列分歧之间的关系可能有所不同。在原核生物中，同源重组作为基因流动的基础，直接依赖于基因组序列分歧的程度；而在有性繁殖的真核生物中，生殖不兼容可能源于少数几个基因的变化。以细菌全基因组序列分歧的测量为基础，我们评估了基因组标准如何对应真核生物的物种界限。在公认的真核生物物种中，种内基因序列分歧通常非常小，平均而言，全基因组序列分歧为1%的群体可能属于不同物种，而原核生物种群即使达到1%的分歧仍然能够发生重组，因此可以被视为同一物种。
authors: Hart Rowan; Moran Nancy A; Ochman Howard
title: Genomic divergence across the tree of life.
keywords: biodiversity; genomic divergence; genetic recombination; species boundaries
translated_title: 生命之树中的基因组分歧
abstract: Nucleotide sequence data are being harnessed to identify species, even in cases in which organisms themselves are neither in hand nor witnessed. But how genome-wide sequence divergence maps to species status is far from clear. While gene sequence divergence is commonly used to delineate bacterial species, its correspondence to established species boundaries has yet to be explored across eukaryotic taxa. Because the processes underlying gene flow differ fundamentally between prokaryotes and eukaryotes, these domains are likely to differ in the relationship between reproductive isolation and genome-wide sequence divergence. In prokaryotes, homologous recombination, the basis of gene flow, depends directly on the degree of genomic sequence divergence, whereas in sexually reproducing eukaryotes, reproductive incompatibility can stem from changes in very few genes. Guided by measures of genome-wide sequence divergence in bacteria, we gauge how genomic criteria correspond to species boundaries in eukaryotes. In recognized species of eukaryotes, levels of gene sequence divergence within species are typically very small, averaging 1% genome-wide sequence divergence are likely separate species, whereas prokaryotic populations with 1% divergence are still able to recombine and thus can be considered the same species.
affiliations: Department of Molecular Biosciences, University of Texas at Austin, Austin, TX 78712.; Department of Ecology and Evolution, University of Chicago, Chicago, IL 60637.; Department of Integrative Biology, University of Texas at Austin, Austin, TX 78712.

translated_keywords: 基因组注释；线粒体核互作不亲和；基因组碎裂；细胞器基因组；基因组重排；系统基因组学
translated_abstract: 过去十年见证了昆虫基因组数据的爆炸式增长，其中线粒体（mt）基因组数据的增长最为显著。新一代测序技术的广泛应用克服了许多早期方法上的局限性，使得整个线粒体基因组的常规测序成为可能，包括从降解标本或博物馆标本中进行测序，并可与核基因组项目并行开展。如今，不同分类群的多样性使得线粒体和核基因组系统发育分析之间的精细比较成为可能；大多数目之间表现出高度一致性，但也存在一些显著例外（如蜻蜓目、螳螂目、双翅目）。通过扩大分类取样范围，对线粒体基因重排的进化及其与单倍体二倍体现象的关联进行了检验，早期提出的趋势得到了广泛支持。基于昆虫特有的发现，开发了多种模式系统，例如线粒体基因组片段化（虱目及其近缘类群）和控制区重复（蓟马），从而可以验证这些异常基因组现象的假定进化驱动因素。最后，新兴研究领域探讨了线粒体基因组在昆虫物种形成和栖息地适应中的作用，具有非常广泛的影响潜力。昆虫线粒体基因组学研究与其他昆虫学领域的整合仍然是我们领域最大的机遇与挑战。
authors: Cameron Stephen L
title: Insect Mitochondrial Genomics: A Decade of Progress.
keywords: genome annotation; mitonuclear incompatibility; genome fragmentation; organelle genomes; genome rearrangements; phylogenomics
translated_title: 十年进展
abstract: The past decade has seen the availability of insect genomic data explode, with mitochondrial (mt) genome data seeing the greatest growth. The widespread adoption of next-generation sequencing has solved many earlier methodological limitations, allowing the routine sequencing of whole mt genomes, including from degraded or museum specimens and in parallel to nuclear genomic projects. The diversity of available taxa now allows finer-scale comparisons between mt and nuclear phylogenomic analyses; high levels of congruence have been found for most orders, with some significant exceptions (e.g., Odonata, Mantodea, Diptera). The evolution of mt gene rearrangements and their association with haplodiploidy have been tested with expanded taxonomic sampling, and earlier proposed trends have been largely supported. Multiple model systems have been developed based on findings unique to insects, including mt genome fragmentation (lice and relatives) and control region duplication (thrips), allowing testing of hypothesized evolutionary drivers of these aberrant genomic phenomena. Finally, emerging research topics consider the contributions of mt genomes to insect speciation and habitat adaption, with very broad potential impacts. Integration between insect mt genomic research and other fields within entomology continues to be our field's greatest opportunity and challenge.
affiliations: Department of Entomology, Purdue University, West Lafayette, Indiana, USA; email: cameros@purdue.edu.

translated_keywords: 基因组结构；分子进化；质体基因组；叶绿体；比较基因组学
translated_abstract: //irscope.shinyapps.io/IRplus/ 访问，源代码可在 https://github.com/AmiryousefiLab/IRplus/ 免费获取。
authors: Díez Menéndez Carmen; Poczai Peter; Williams Bernardo; Myllys Leena; Amiryousefi Ali
title: IRplus: An Augmented Tool to Detect Inverted Repeats in Plastid Genomes.
keywords: genome structure; molecular evolution; plastid genome; chloroplasts; comparative genomics
translated_title: 用于检测质体基因组反向重复序列的增强工具
abstract: High-throughput sequencing methods have increased the accessibility of plastid genomes, which are crucial for clarifying phylogenetic relationships. Current large sequencing efforts require software tools for routine display of their distinctive quadripartite structure, which is denoted by four junction sites. By concentrating on these junctions and their close vicinity, IRscope has emerged as the standard tool for detection of this structure and creating simplified comparative graphical maps of plastid genomes. Here, we provide an augmented version (IRplus) that encompasses a novel set of functions such as integrated error detection, flexible color schemes, and an upgraded method to detect inverted repeats in genomic sequences. Spanning across the plant tree of life, IRplus allows the quick visualization of various sets of plastid genomes and features, next to smooth interoperability with other widely used annotation file formats and platforms. The IRplus can be accessed at https://irscope.shinyapps.io/IRplus/, and source codes are freely available at https://github.com/AmiryousefiLab/IRplus.
affiliations: Escuela Politécnica Superior, Universidad Autónoma de Madrid, Madrid, Spain.; Botany Unit, Finnish Museum of Natural History, University of Helsinki, Helsinki, Finland.; Museomics Research Group, Helsinki Institute of Life Science (HiLIFE), University of Helsinki, Helsinki, Finland.; Department of Computer Science, University of Helsinki, Helsinki, Finland.; Systems Oncology Research Program, Faculty of Medicine, University of Helsinki, Helsinki, Finland.; Ludwig Center at Harvard and Laboratory of Systems Pharmacology, Harvard Medical School, Boston, Massachusetts, USA.

translated_keywords: 限制性位点相关DNA（RAD）测序；微生物遗传多样性；培养偏倚；单细胞扩增基因组（SAG）；微真核生物；全基因组扩增（WGA）
translated_abstract: 构建简化代表文库的测序方法能够对许多个体进行基因分型以开展种群基因组学研究。然而，该方法需要大量的DNA，并且不能直接应用于单细胞，这限制了它在大多数微生物上的应用。我们开发并实施了单扩增基因组分析后接限制位点相关DNA测序的方法，从而绕过了劳动密集型的培养过程，并避免了在单细胞真核生物种群基因组学研究中的培养偏倚。因此，这种方法为探讨迄今为止尚未被探索的物种的遗传多样性、基因流动、适应性、扩散和生物地理学等重要问题开辟了道路。
authors: Gollnisch Raphael; Wallenius Joel; Gribble Kristin E; Ahrén Dag; Rengefors Karin
title: SAG-RAD: A Method for Single-Cell Population Genomics of Unicellular Eukaryotes.
keywords: restriction-site associated DNA (RAD) sequencing; microbial genetic diversity; culturing bias; single amplified genome (SAG); microeukaryotes; whole-genome amplification (WGA)
translated_title: 单细胞真核微生物群体基因组学的一种方法
abstract: Sequencing of reduced representation libraries enables genotyping of many individuals for population genomic studies. However, high amounts of DNA are required, and the method cannot be applied directly on single cells, preventing its use on most microbes. We developed and implemented the analysis of single amplified genomes followed by restriction-site-associated DNA sequencing to bypass labor-intensive culturing and to avoid culturing bias in population genomic studies of unicellular eukaryotes. This method thus opens the way for addressing important questions about the genetic diversity, gene flow, adaptation, dispersal, and biogeography of hitherto unexplored species.
affiliations: Department of Biology, Aquatic Ecology, Lund University, Lund, Sweden.; Department of Earth Sciences, University of Oxford, Oxford, United Kingdom.; Faculty of Medicine, Department of Clinical Sciences, Lund University, Lund, Sweden.; Marine Biological Laboratory, Woods Hole, MA, USA.; National Bioinformatics Infrastructure Sweden (NBIS), SciLifeLab, Department of Biology, Lund University, Lund, Sweden.

translated_keywords: 存在-缺失变异；组装；基因含量；注释；泛基因组
translated_abstract: 泛基因组学是一种研究植物群体遗传多样性的新兴方法。与传统的重测序研究不同，后者通过将全基因组测序数据与单一参考基因组进行比较，泛基因组（PG）的构建涉及多个基因组之间的直接比较，从而能够检测参考基因组中不存在的基因组序列和基因，并分析基因含量的多样性。尽管近年来已有多篇描述各种植物物种泛基因组的论文发表，但对用于泛基因组构建的计算程序的影响了解得更透彻，可以指导研究人员做出更为明智的方法选择。本文通过构建和比较多种拟南芥和栽培大豆的泛基因组，并对已发表的泛基因组进行元分析，考察了几个关键方法因素对获得的基因池以及基因存在-缺失检测的影响。这些因素包括构建方法、测序深度以及用于基因注释的输入数据范围。我们观察到，使用三种常见程序（从头组装和注释、图谱到泛基因组、迭代组装）构建的泛基因组之间存在显著差异，并且结果依赖于输入数据的范围。具体而言，我们报告了使用不同程序和输入数据推断的基因内容之间的一致性较低。我们的结果应提高该领域对泛基因组构建过程中方法决策后果的认识，并强调进一步研究常用方法的必要性。
authors: Glick Lior; Mayrose Itay
title: The Effect of Methodological Considerations on the Construction of Gene-Based Plant Pan-genomes.
keywords: presence–absence variation; assembly; gene content; annotation; pan-genome
translated_title: 方法学考量对基于基因的植物泛基因组构建的影响
abstract: Pan-genomics is an emerging approach for studying the genetic diversity within plant populations. In contrast to common resequencing studies that compare whole genome sequencing data with a single reference genome, the construction of a pan-genome (PG) involves the direct comparison of multiple genomes to one another, thereby enabling the detection of genomic sequences and genes not present in the reference, as well as the analysis of gene content diversity. Although multiple studies describing PGs of various plant species have been published in recent years, a better understanding regarding the effect of the computational procedures used for PG construction could guide researchers in making more informed methodological decisions. Here, we examine the effect of several key methodological factors on the obtained gene pool and on gene presence-absence detections by constructing and comparing multiple PGs of Arabidopsis thaliana and cultivated soybean, as well as conducting a meta-analysis on published PGs. These factors include the construction method, the sequencing depth, and the extent of input data used for gene annotation. We observe substantial differences between PGs constructed using three common procedures (de novo assembly and annotation, map-to-pan, and iterative assembly) and that results are dependent on the extent of the input data. Specifically, we report low agreement between the gene content inferred using different procedures and input data. Our results should increase the awareness of the community to the consequences of methodological decisions made during the process of PG construction and emphasize the need for further investigation of commonly applied methodologies.
affiliations: Department of Life Sciences, School of Plant Sciences and Food Security, Tel-Aviv University, Tel Aviv, Israel.

translated_keywords: 质谱成像；植物；单细胞转录组学；空间转录组学；空间代谢组学
translated_abstract: 植物包含大量的细胞类型，并表现出复杂的调控机制。在植物科学中，单细胞水平的研究正变得越来越普遍。单细胞转录组学、空间转录组学和空间代谢组学技术已被结合用于分析植物发育过程。这些技术被用来研究植物组织在单细胞水平上的转录组和代谢组，从而系统地研究特定组织和细胞类型在明确发育阶段中的基因表达和代谢活动。本文综述了植物空间多组学领域的重要突破，并讨论了这些方法如何在未来在植物研究中发挥关键作用。
authors: Yu Xiaole; Liu Zhixin; Sun Xuwu
title: Single-cell and spatial multi-omics in the plant sciences: Technical advances, applications, and perspectives.
keywords: mass spectrometry imaging; plants; single-cell transcriptomics; spatial transcriptomics; spatial metabolomics
translated_title: 技术进展、应用与展望
abstract: Plants contain a large number of cell types and exhibit complex regulatory mechanisms. Studies at the single-cell level have gradually become more common in plant science. Single-cell transcriptomics, spatial transcriptomics, and spatial metabolomics techniques have been combined to analyze plant development. These techniques have been used to study the transcriptomes and metabolomes of plant tissues at the single-cell level, enabling the systematic investigation of gene expression and metabolism in specific tissues and cell types during defined developmental stages. In this review, we present an overview of significant breakthroughs in spatial multi-omics in plants, and we discuss how these approaches may soon play essential roles in plant research.
affiliations: State Key Laboratory of Cotton Biology, State Key Laboratory of Crop Stress Adaptation and Improvement, Key Laboratory of Plant Stress Biology, School of Life Sciences, Henan University, 85 Minglun Street, Kaifeng 475001, P.R. China.; State Key Laboratory of Cotton Biology, State Key Laboratory of Crop Stress Adaptation and Improvement, Key Laboratory of Plant Stress Biology, School of Life Sciences, Henan University, 85 Minglun Street, Kaifeng 475001, P.R. China. Electronic address: sunxuwussd@sina.com.

translated_keywords: 因果推断；水平基因转移；系统发育比较方法
journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America
journal_full_name: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America
translated_abstract: 细菌的生活方式和有效种群规模的不同。然而，以往的研究无法在这两种假说之间进行检验，因为生活方式的不同特征与有效种群规模高度相关且在系统发育上保守，这使得难以区分它们的重要性。我们通过基于系统发育的分析方法，在126个细菌物种中分离出不同因素的因果作用。研究发现，与自由生活的物种相比，宿主相关的物种泛基因组流动性较低，并且对于那些严格依赖宿主、生活在细胞内、更具致病性和较少运动性的宿主相关物种，其泛基因组流动性也较低。相比之下，我们并未发现支持另一种竞争假说的证据，即较大的有效种群规模会导致更流动的泛基因组。有效种群规模似乎与泛基因组变异相关，是因为它同样受到细菌生活方式的影响，而不是因为存在因果关系。
authors: Dewar Anna E; Hao Chunhui; Belcher Laurence J; Ghoul Melanie; West Stuart A
title: Bacterial lifestyle shapes pangenomes.
keywords: causal inference; horizontal gene transfer; phylogenetic comparative methods
translated_title: 细菌生活方式塑造泛基因组
abstract: Pangenomes vary across bacteria. Some species have fluid pangenomes, with a high proportion of genes varying between individual genomes. Other species have less fluid pangenomes, with different genomes tending to contain the same genes. Two main hypotheses have been suggested to explain this variation: differences in species' bacterial lifestyle and effective population size. However, previous studies have not been able to test between these hypotheses because the different features of lifestyle and effective population size are highly correlated with each other, and phylogenetically conserved, making it hard to disentangle their relative importance. We used phylogeny-based analyses, across 126 bacterial species, to tease apart the causal role of different factors. We found that pangenome fluidity was lower in i) host-associated compared with free-living species and ii) host-associated species that are obligately dependent on a host, live inside cells, and are more pathogenic and less motile. In contrast, we found no support for the competing hypothesis that larger effective population sizes lead to more fluid pangenomes. Effective population size appears to correlate with pangenome variation because it is also driven by bacterial lifestyle, rather than because of a causal relationship.
affiliations: Department of Biology, University of Oxford, Oxford OX1 3SZ, United Kingdom.

translated_keywords: 重大转变；进化；标度律；蛋白质；基因组
translated_abstract: 规模律是一种强大的方法来比较基因组，因为它们可以将所有生物体置于同一条曲线之上，并揭示基因组大小变化时的非平凡普遍性。先前的研究发现，基因组中功能类别的丰度与总功能类别数量之间表现出幂律缩放关系，这表明普遍存在约束塑造了基因组类别丰度。本文通过分析来自生命之树的不同分支的3,726个细菌、220个古菌和79个单细胞真核生物基因组，探讨了基因组进化如何与功能缩放相关联。我们重新审视了之前关于功能基因组缩放的观察结果，并扩展了分类学范围。研究发现，对于某些功能类别，缩放关系最好用多个指数描述，揭示了之前未被观察到的随着基因编码蛋白注释的增加或减少而发生的缩放转变。此外，我们发现不同系统发育群组在域级和门级上的缩放关系存在差异，并且其普遍性低于之前的预期。这种功能缩放的变化与门级分类学系统发育无关，表明细胞计划或生理学的差异超过了广泛的分类学演化模式。由于基因组由其所编码的功能蛋白维持和复制，这些结果表明了分类学群组之间的功能退化以及向独特演化轨迹的趋近。我们还发现，各个门经常跨越功能类别的缩放指数，表明单个支系可以在缩放指数之间移动。综上所述，我们的研究揭示了生命之树中功能的独特变化，并强调了随着基因组的扩大或缩小，各种功能的蛋白质可能会被添加或丢失。
authors: Gondhalekar Riddhi; Kempes Christopher P; McGlynn Shawn Erin
title: Scaling of Protein Function across the Tree of Life.
keywords: major transitions; evolution; scaling laws; proteins; genome
translated_title: 生命之树上蛋白质功能的尺度变化
abstract: Scaling laws are a powerful way to compare genomes because they put all organisms onto a single curve and reveal nontrivial generalities as genomes change in size. The abundance of functional categories across genomes has previously been found to show power law scaling with respect to the total number of functional categories, suggesting that universal constraints shape genomic category abundance. Here, we look across the tree of life to understand how genome evolution may be related to functional scaling. We revisit previous observations of functional genome scaling with an expanded taxonomy by analyzing 3,726 bacterial, 220 archaeal, and 79 unicellular eukaryotic genomes. We find that for some functional classes, scaling is best described by multiple exponents, revealing previously unobserved shifts in scaling as genome-encoded protein annotations increase or decrease. Furthermore, we find that scaling varies between phyletic groups at both the domain and phyla levels and is less universal than previously thought. This variability in functional scaling is not related to taxonomic phylogeny resolved at the phyla level, suggesting that differences in cell plan or physiology outweigh broad patterns of taxonomic evolution. Since genomes are maintained and replicated by the functional proteins encoded by them, these results point to functional degeneracy between taxonomic groups and unique evolutionary trajectories toward these. We also find that individual phyla frequently span scaling exponents of functional classes, revealing that individual clades can move across scaling exponents. Together, our results reveal unique shifts in functions across the tree of life and highlight that as genomes grow or shrink, proteins of various functions may be added or lost.
affiliations: Earth-Life Science Institute, Tokyo Institute of Technology, Tokyo, Japan.; School of Life Sciences and Technology, Tokyo Institute of Technology, Tokyo, Japan.; The Santa Fe Institute, Santa Fe, New Mexico, USA.; Blue Marble Space Institute of Science, Seattle, Washington, USA.; Center for Sustainable Resource Science, RIKEN, Saitama, Japan.

translated_keywords: 基因组可塑性；拷贝数变异；非整倍体；多倍体；应激适应
translated_abstract: 真菌物种具有动态基因组，并常在应对压力时表现出基因组可塑性。这种基因组可塑性往往伴随着影响适应性和抗逆性的表型后果。真菌病原体在临床和农业环境中均表现出基因组可塑性，且在适应抗真菌药物时常构成显著的人类健康挑战。因此，理解大规模基因组变化的速率、机制及其影响至关重要。本文综述了多倍体、非整倍体以及拷贝数变异在多种真菌物种中的普遍存在情况，特别关注重要的真菌病原体和模式生物。我们还探讨了环境压力与基因组变化速率之间的关系，并强调了基因型和表型变化背后的机制。对这些动态真菌基因组的全面理解对于寻找解决抗真菌药物耐药性增加的新方法至关重要。
authors: Vande Zande Pétra; Zhou Xin; Selmecki Anna
title: The Dynamic Fungal Genome: Polyploidy, Aneuploidy and Copy Number Variation in Response to Stress.
keywords: genome plasticity; copy number variation; aneuploidy; polyploidy; adaptation to stress
translated_title: 应激反应中的多倍体、非整倍体和拷贝数变异
abstract: Fungal species have dynamic genomes and often exhibit genomic plasticity in response to stress. This genome plasticity often comes with phenotypic consequences that affect fitness and resistance to stress. Fungal pathogens exhibit genome plasticity in both clinical and agricultural settings and often during adaptation to antifungal drugs, posing significant challenges to human health. Therefore, it is important to understand the rates, mechanisms, and impact of large genomic changes. This review addresses the prevalence of polyploidy, aneuploidy, and copy number variation across diverse fungal species, with special attention to prominent fungal pathogens and model species. We also explore the relationship between environmental stress and rates of genomic changes and highlight the mechanisms underlying genotypic and phenotypic changes. A comprehensive understanding of these dynamic fungal genomes is needed to identify novel solutions for the increase in antifungal drug resistance.
affiliations: Department of Microbiology and Immunology, University of Minnesota, Minneapolis, Minnesota, USA; email: selmecki@umn.edu.

translated_keywords: 植物；分子育种；方法学；泛基因组学；超级泛基因组
translated_abstract: 相比于单一参考基因组，泛基因组通过整合不同株系的基因组，能够提供一种更加全面且无参考偏倚的种群遗传信息表征。随着基因组测序数据的快速积累以及植物研究领域的不断拓展，植物泛基因组学研究已从单个物种逐渐发展到多物种研究，并衍生出涵盖某一属水平分类单元内所有基因组序列的超泛基因组这一概念。超泛基因组纳入栽培和野生近缘种两类资源，极大提升了植物遗传多样性、进化、驯化及分子育种等研究领域的解析能力。本文综述了植物超泛基因组的研究进展，重点阐述其构建需求、技术策略、潜在应用及代表性成果，同时探讨其独特优势与未来前景，分析当前面临的挑战并提出未来发展方向。
authors: He Wenchuang; Li XiaoXia; Qian Qian; Shang Lianguang
title: The developments and prospects of plant super-pangenomes: Demands, approaches, and applications.
keywords: plant; molecular breeding; methodology; pangenomics; super-pangenome
translated_title: 需求、方法与应用
abstract: By integrating genomes from different accessions, pangenomes provide a more comprehensive and reference-bias-free representation of genetic information within a population compared to a single reference genome. With the rapid accumulation of genomic sequencing data and the expanding scope of plant research, plant pangenomics has gradually evolved from single-species to multi-species studies. This shift has given rise to the concept of a super-pangenome that covers all genomic sequences within a genus-level taxonomic group. By incorporating both cultivated and wild species, the super-pangenome has greatly enhanced the resolution of research in various areas such as plant genetic diversity, evolution, domestication, and molecular breeding. In this review, we present a comprehensive overview of the plant super-pangenome, emphasizing its development requirements, construction strategies, potential applications, and notable achievements. We also highlight the distinctive advantages and promising prospects of super-pangenomes while addressing current challenges and future directions.
affiliations: Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory of Lingnan Modern Agriculture, Genome Analysis Laboratory of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen 518120, China.; Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory of Lingnan Modern Agriculture, Genome Analysis Laboratory of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen 518120, China; Yazhouwan National Laboratory, Sanya 572024, China; State Key Laboratory of Rice Biology, China National Rice Research Institute, Hangzhou 310006, China; Academician Workstation, National Nanfan Research Institute (Sanya), Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Sanya 572024, China. Electronic address: qianqian188@hotmail.com.; Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory of Lingnan Modern Agriculture, Genome Analysis Laboratory of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen 518120, China; Yazhouwan National Laboratory, Sanya 572024, China; Academician Workstation, National Nanfan Research Institute (Sanya), Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Sanya 572024, China. Electronic address: shanglianguang@caas.cn.

translated_keywords: 生物分子凝聚体；压力；传感器；相分离
translated_abstract: 植物已进化出复杂机制以快速高效地感知和适应环境胁迫。近期研究强调了生物分子凝聚体在调节植物胁迫感知与响应中的新兴作用。这些凝聚体通过多种机制在胁迫条件下调控转录、翻译、RNA代谢及信号通路等细胞过程。本文综述了当前关于植物胁迫响应生物分子凝聚体的知识，包括明确界定的胁迫颗粒、加工小体和核仁等经典凝聚体以及最近发现的植物特异性凝聚体。通过简要回顾酵母和动物研究的成果，我们讨论了植物凝聚体如何感知胁迫信号并引发细胞响应的机制。最后，本文对未来植物胁迫响应凝聚体的研究提供了展望。理解凝聚体如何作为胁迫感受器和调节器，将为通过靶向遗传或生物技术干预提高植物抗逆性提供潜在应用途径。
authors: Peng Jiaxuan; Yu Yidan; Fang Xiaofeng
title: Stress sensing and response through biomolecular condensates in plants.
keywords: biomolecular condensates; stress; sensor; phase separation
translated_title: 植物通过生物分子凝聚体进行应力感知与响应
abstract: Plants have developed intricate mechanisms for rapid and efficient stress perception and adaptation in response to environmental stressors. Recent research highlights the emerging role of biomolecular condensates in modulating plant stress perception and response. These condensates function through numerous mechanisms to regulate cellular processes such as transcription, translation, RNA metabolism, and signaling pathways under stress conditions. In this review, we provide an overview of current knowledge on stress-responsive biomolecular condensates in plants, including well-defined condensates such as stress granules, processing bodies, and the nucleolus, as well as more recently discovered plant-specific condensates. By briefly referring to findings from yeast and animal studies, we discuss mechanisms by which plant condensates perceive stress signals and elicit cellular responses. Finally, we provide insights for future investigations on stress-responsive condensates in plants. Understanding how condensates act as stress sensors and regulators will pave the way for potential applications in improving plant resilience through targeted genetic or biotechnological interventions.
affiliations: Center for Plant Biology, School of Life Sciences, Tsinghua University, Beijing 100084, China.; Center for Plant Biology, School of Life Sciences, Tsinghua University, Beijing 100084, China. Electronic address: xffang@tsinghua.edu.cn.

translated_keywords: DAG激酶；脂质信号；根系构型；磷脂酶；植物生殖；磷脂酸
translated_abstract: 磷脂酸（PA）是一类参与植物多种生物学过程的重要信号脂质。对PA代谢酶突变体的功能表征，结合脂质组学和蛋白质-脂质相互作用分析，揭示了PA信号在植物应对生物和非生物胁迫中的关键作用。此外，PA及其代谢酶还影响多个生殖过程，包括配子发生、花粉管生长、自交不亲和性、单倍体胚形成、胚胎发生以及种子发育，并在塑造植物生殖结构和根系构型中发挥重要作用。近期研究揭示了PA作用的多样化机制，但仍有许多方面有待阐明。本文综述了关于PA及其代谢酶研究的最新进展，重点强调其在植物有性生殖和形态建成中的作用，并探讨了PA功能背后的潜在机制及未来的研究方向。
authors: Yao Shuaibing; Yang Bao; Li Jianwu; Tang Shan; Tang Shaohua; Kim Sang-Chul; Wang Xuemin
title: Phosphatidic acid signaling in modulating plant reproduction and architecture.
keywords: DAG kinases; lipid signaling; root architecture; phospholipases; plant reproduction; phosphatidic acid
translated_title: 磷脂酸信号在调控植物生殖与株型中的作用
abstract: Phosphatidic acid (PA) is an important class of signaling lipids involved in various biological processes in plants. Functional characterization of mutants of PA-metabolizing enzymes, combined with lipidomics and protein-lipid interaction analyses, has revealed the key role of PA signaling in plant responses to biotic and abiotic stresses. Moreover, PA and its metabolizing enzymes influence several reproductive processes, including gametogenesis, pollen tube growth, self-incompatibility, haploid embryo formation, embryogenesis, and seed development. They also play a significant role in shaping plant reproductive and root architecture. Recent studies have shed light on the diverse mechanisms of PA's action, though much remains to be elucidated. Here, we summarize recent advances in the study of PA and its metabolizing enzymes, emphasizing their roles in plant sexual reproduction and architecture. We also explore potential mechanisms underlying PA's functions and discuss future research directions.
affiliations: Department of Biology, University of Missouri-St. Louis, St. Louis, MO 63121, USA; Donald Danforth Plant Science Center, St. Louis, MO 63132, USA.; Department of Biology, University of Missouri-St. Louis, St. Louis, MO 63121, USA; Donald Danforth Plant Science Center, St. Louis, MO 63132, USA. Electronic address: wangxue@umsl.edu.

translated_keywords: 非洲；高保真数据；Hi-C；变色龙基因组学；爬行动物；参考基因组
translated_abstract: 高质量参考基因组已成为功能、比较和进化基因组学研究的基础工具。然而，由于资源和技术的限制，针对非洲生物类群的高质量基因组构建工作进展缓慢。南非侏儒变色龙（Bradypodion）是一支相对较年轻的谱系，大量证据表明这些蜥蜴具有高度的适应能力。Bradypodion以栖息地特化而闻名，并在系统发育树中表现出趋同表型的证据。然而，Bradypodion表型的遗传基础尚不清楚，缺乏足够的基因组资源使得许多进化问题无法解答。本文利用PacBio长读长测序数据，对Bradypodion pumilum和Bradypodion ventrale进行了从头组装全基因组测序。BUSCO分析显示，B. pumilum基因组中单拷贝直系同源基因的完整性为96.36%，B. ventrale为94%。此外，这两个基因组的scaffold N50分别达到389.6 Mb和374.9 Mb。基于两种Bradypodion基因组的全基因组比对结果表明，B. pumilum与B. ventrale高度共线。此外，尽管Bradypodion与Anolis蜥蜴的分歧时间估计约为1.7亿年，但它们的基因组仍表现出显著的共线性。种群规模变化的共祖分析还表明，这些物种的有效种群大小历史变化与南非地区环境的显著变化相对应。这些高质量的Bradypodion基因组组装将为未来研究Bradypodion的进化历史、多样化以及适应的遗传基础提供支持。
authors: Taft Jody M; Tolley Krystal A; Alexander Graham J; Geneva Anthony J
title: De Novo Whole Genome Assemblies for Two Southern African Dwarf Chameleons (Bradypodion, Chamaeleonidae).
keywords: Africa; HiFi data; Hi-C; chameleon genomics; reptiles; reference genome
translated_title: 南非南部两种小型避役属（布拉迪波迪翁属）的整体基因组从头组装
abstract: A complete and high-quality reference genome has become a fundamental tool for the study of functional, comparative, and evolutionary genomics. However, efforts to produce high-quality genomes for African taxa are lagging given the limited access to sufficient resources and technologies. The southern African dwarf chameleons (Bradypodion) are a relatively young lineage, with a large body of evidence demonstrating the highly adaptive capacity of these lizards. Bradypodion are known for their habitat specialization, with evidence of convergent phenotypes across the phylogeny. However, the underlying genetic architecture of these phenotypes remains unknown for Bradypodion, and without adequate genomic resources, many evolutionary questions cannot be answered. We present de novo assembled whole genomes for Bradypodion pumilum and Bradypodion ventrale, using Pacific Biosciences long-read sequencing data. BUSCO analysis revealed that 96.36% of single copy orthologs were present in the B. pumilum genome and 94% in B. ventrale. Moreover, these genomes boast scaffold N50 of 389.6 and 374.9 Mb, respectively. Based on a whole genome alignment of both Bradypodion genomes, B. pumilum is highly syntenic with B. ventrale. Furthermore, Bradypodion is also syntenic with Anolis lizards, despite the divergence between these lineages estimated to be nearly 170 Ma. Coalescent analysis of the genomic data also suggests that historical changes in effective population size for these species correspond to notable shifts in the southern African environment. These high-quality Bradypodion genome assemblies will support future research on the evolutionary history, diversification, and genetic underpinnings of adaptation in Bradypodion.
affiliations: School of Animal, Plant and Environmental Sciences, University of the Witwatersrand, Johannesburg, South Africa.; South African National Biodiversity Institute, Kirstenbosch Research Centre, Claremont, South Africa.; Centre for Ecological Genomics and Wildlife Conservation, University of Johannesburg, Johannesburg, South Africa.; Department of Biology, Center for Computational and Integrative Biology, Rutgers University-Camden, Camden, New Jersey, USA.

translated_keywords: 植物防御；植物次生代谢物；致病细菌；致病真菌
translated_abstract: 由致病细菌和真菌引起的植物病害对野生植物和农作物均构成重大威胁。为了应对这些威胁，植物进化出了多种防御机制，其中包括植物次生代谢物（PSMs）的产生。这些化合物如萜类、酚类、生物碱和硫代葡萄糖苷等，为病原体抗性提供了多样化、高效且经济的手段。传统依赖合成微杀菌剂的病原体管理方法往往对环境不友好。相比之下，由于其高效性和环境优势，PSMs 提供了有前景的替代途径。本文综述了PSMs 的分类、生物合成途径、作用机制及其商业化进程，以加深对其病原体抗性能力的理解。目标是开发基于PSMs 的可持续细菌杀菌剂和真菌杀菌剂，从而制定有效的疾病管理策略。
authors: Yang Wenjuan; Zhang Lu; Yang Yong; Xiang Haibo; Yang Pingfang
title: Plant secondary metabolites-mediated plant defense against bacteria and fungi pathogens.
keywords: Plant defense; Plant secondary metabolites; Pathogenic bacteria; Pathogenic fungi
translated_title: 植物次生代谢物介导的植物对细菌和真菌病原体的防御
abstract: Plant diseases caused by pathogenic bacteria and fungi are major threats to both wild plants and crops. To counteract these threats, plants have evolved various defense mechanisms, including the production of plant secondary metabolites (PSMs). These compounds, such as terpenoids, phenolics, alkaloids, and glucosinolates, offer a versatile, efficient, and cost-effective means of pathogen resistance. The traditional pathogen management methods relying on synthetic microbicides are often environment unfriendly. In contrast, PSMs provide promising alternative way due to their high efficiency and environmental benefits. This article reviews the categories, biosynthetic pathways, mechanisms of actions, and the commercialization of the PSMs to enhance our understanding of their pathogen resistance capabilities. The goal is to develop sustainable disease management strategies using PSM-based bactericides and fungicides.
affiliations: State Key Laboratory of Biocatalysis and Enzyme Engineering, School of Life Sciences, Hubei University, Wuhan 430062, China.; State Key Laboratory of Biocatalysis and Enzyme Engineering, School of Life Sciences, Hubei University, Wuhan 430062, China. Electronic address: xhb_2086@163.com.; State Key Laboratory of Biocatalysis and Enzyme Engineering, School of Life Sciences, Hubei University, Wuhan 430062, China. Electronic address: yangpf@hubu.edu.cn.

translated_keywords: 细胞周期；DNA损伤；SMC5/6；减数分裂；植物发育；植物免疫
translated_abstract: 染色体结构维持5/6（SMC5/6）复合体在维护染色体结构完整性和形态方面发挥关键作用，从而有助于基因组稳定性的维持——这是生物正常生长和发育的基础。除了在真核生物DNA损伤修复中的基本功能外，近期研究扩展了我们对SMC5/6多功能性的理解。它不仅作为细胞周期调控的重要因子，还参与发育过程、植物免疫以及减数分裂DNA损伤修复等多重功能。本文综述了SMC5/6在调控植物生长、发育和免疫方面的新兴角色，为理解该复合体如何应对DNA损伤压力并协调生长策略提供了新视角。此外，我们强调SMC5/6为探索基因组维持、发育及应激反应背后的复杂机制提供了一个独特的窗口，这对作物改良具有深远意义。
authors: Zhao Yan; Zhang Jian; Fang Yiru; Zhang Pingxian; Chen Hanchen
title: The plant SMC5/6 complex: DNA repair, developmental regulation, and immune responses.
keywords: Cell cycle; DNA damage; SMC5/6; Meiosis; Plant development; Plant immunity
translated_title: DNA修复、发育调控与免疫响应
abstract: The Structural Maintenance of Chromosomes 5/6 (SMC5/6) complex plays a pivotal role in safeguarding the structural integrity and morphology of chromosomes, thereby contributing to genomic stability-a cornerstone for normal growth and development across organisms. Beyond its fundamental role in eukaryotic DNA damage repair, recent research has broadened our understanding of SMC5/6's multifaceted functions. It has emerged as a crucial regulator not only of the cell cycle but also in developmental processes, plant immunity, and meiotic DNA damage repair. In this review, we highlight its novel roles in modulating plant growth, development, and immunity, providing fresh perspectives on how this complex might help combat DNA damage stress and orchestrate growth strategies. Furthermore, we emphasize that SMC5/6 offers a unique window into the intricate mechanisms underlying genomic maintenance, development, and stress responses, with profound implications for crop improvement.

translated_keywords: 物种形成基因组岛；结构变异；杂交物种形成；多倍体物种形成；现存遗传变异；生殖隔离
translated_abstract: 植物研究对于揭示新物种起源机制发挥了重要作用。几十年来，植物学研究不仅补充了通过其他生物研究得出的物种形成概念，还在某些情况下对其提出了挑战，同时揭示了物种形成的其他方式。如今，基因组测序能力以空前的速度和规模发展，使生物学家能够解决长期存在的争议并应对物种形成研究中的其他新兴挑战。本文综述了近期基于基因组学的植物物种形成研究进展。我们讨论了利用基因组分化景观分析识别生殖隔离（RI）位点的相关复杂性，并强调结构变异在物种形成中的重要作用，这些作用正越来越多地被新的测序技术所揭示。此外，我们回顾了基因组学如何推进我们对某些物种形成途径（如杂交或全基因组复制）的理解，同时对其他途径（如种群瓶颈效应和遗传漂变）提出了质疑。尽管基因组学可以快速识别赋予生殖隔离的基因和突变，但我们强调后续分子实验和野外实验仍然至关重要。然而，基因组学已经阐明了古老变异而非新突变在物种形成早期阶段的重要作用。最后，我们指出了未来研究的有前景方向。这些方向包括扩展我们对表观遗传和结构变化在物种形成过程中作用的认识，扩大植物物种形成基因组学研究的范围和分类广度，并综合已有的大量基因组数据，这些数据已由植物物种形成研究社区生成。
authors: Bock Dan G; Cai Zhe; Elphinstone Cassandra; González-Segovia Eric; Hirabayashi Kaede; Huang Kaichi; Keais Graeme L; Kim Amy; Owens Gregory L; Rieseberg Loren H
title: Genomics of plant speciation.
keywords: genomic islands of speciation; structural variation; hybrid speciation; polyploid speciation; standing genetic variation; reproductive isolation
translated_title: 植物物种形成基因组学
abstract: Studies of plants have been instrumental for revealing how new species originate. For several decades, botanical research has complemented and, in some cases, challenged concepts on speciation developed via the study of other organisms while also revealing additional ways in which species can form. Now, the ability to sequence genomes at an unprecedented pace and scale has allowed biologists to settle decades-long debates and tackle other emerging challenges in speciation research. Here, we review these recent genome-enabled developments in plant speciation. We discuss complications related to identification of reproductive isolation (RI) loci using analyses of the landscape of genomic divergence and highlight the important role that structural variants have in speciation, as increasingly revealed by new sequencing technologies. Further, we review how genomics has advanced what we know of some routes to new species formation, like hybridization or whole-genome duplication, while casting doubt on others, like population bottlenecks and genetic drift. While genomics can fast-track identification of genes and mutations that confer RI, we emphasize that follow-up molecular and field experiments remain critical. Nonetheless, genomics has clarified the outsized role of ancient variants rather than new mutations, particularly early during speciation. We conclude by highlighting promising avenues of future study. These include expanding what we know so far about the role of epigenetic and structural changes during speciation, broadening the scope and taxonomic breadth of plant speciation genomics studies, and synthesizing information from extensive genomic data that have already been generated by the plant speciation community.
affiliations: Department of Botany and Biodiversity Research Centre, University of British Columbia, Vancouver, BC, Canada.; Department of Biology, University of Victoria, Victoria, BC, Canada.; Department of Botany and Biodiversity Research Centre, University of British Columbia, Vancouver, BC, Canada. Electronic address: lriesebe@mail.ubc.ca.

translated_keywords: 微生物;冷渗漏;宏基因组;基因目录;新物种;代谢功能;宏基因组组装基因组;生物地理分布;生物应用;生物信息学;分子生态学
translated_abstract: 冷泉环境中栖息着丰富且多样的微生物，这些微生物在生物应用方面具有巨大潜力，并对生物地球化学循环产生重要影响。尽管近年来宏基因组学研究扩展了我们对冷泉微生物群落及其功能的理解，但全球冷泉微生物的多样性和遗传资源库仍缺乏深入了解。本文从全球16个冷泉地点收集了165个宏基因组数据集，构建了一个全面的基因和基因组目录。非冗余基因目录包含1.47亿个基因，其中36%无法通过目前可用的数据库分配到特定功能。共获得了3,164个物种水平的代表性宏基因组组装基因组（MAGs），其中94%属于新物种。其中，鉴定出81种ANME物种，涵盖了除ANME-2d以外的所有亚分支，以及23种共生硫酸盐还原菌（SRB）物种，涉及Seep-SRB1a、Seep-SRB1g和Seep-SRB2三个分支。非冗余基因和MAG目录是一项宝贵的资源，将有助于深入理解冷泉微生物群落的功能。
authors: Han Yingchun; Zhang Chuwen; Zhao Zhuoming; Peng Yongyi; Liao Jing; Jiang Qiuyun; Liu Qing; Shao Zongze; Dong Xiyang
title: A comprehensive genomic catalog from global cold seeps.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 微生物;冷渗漏;宏基因组;基因目录;新物种;代谢功能;宏基因组组装基因组;生物地理分布;生物应用;生物信息学;分子生态学
translated_title: 全球冷泉的综合基因组目录
abstract: Cold seeps harbor abundant and diverse microbes with tremendous potential for biological applications and that have a significant influence on biogeochemical cycles. Although recent metagenomic studies have expanded our understanding of the community and function of seep microorganisms, knowledge of the diversity and genetic repertoire of global seep microbes is lacking. Here, we collected a compilation of 165 metagenomic datasets from 16 cold seep sites across the globe to construct a comprehensive gene and genome catalog. The non-redundant gene catalog comprised 147 million genes, and 36% of them could not be assigned to a function with the currently available databases. A total of 3,164 species-level representative metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) were obtained, most of which (94%) belonged to novel species. Of them, 81 ANME species were identified that cover all subclades except ANME-2d, and 23 syntrophic SRB species spanned the Seep-SRB1a, Seep-SRB1g, and Seep-SRB2 clades. The non-redundant gene and MAG catalog is a valuable resource that will aid in deepening our understanding of the functions of cold seep microbiomes.
affiliations: Key Laboratory of Marine Genetic Resources, Third Institute of Oceanography, Ministry of Natural Resources, Xiamen, 361005, China.; School of Marine Sciences, Sun Yat-Sen University, Zhuhai, 519082, China.; Southern Marine Science and Engineering Guangdong Laboratory (Zhuhai), Zhuhai, 519000, China.; Key Laboratory of Marine Genetic Resources, Third Institute of Oceanography, Ministry of Natural Resources, Xiamen, 361005, China. dongxiyang@tio.org.cn.; Southern Marine Science and Engineering Guangdong Laboratory (Zhuhai), Zhuhai, 519000, China. dongxiyang@tio.org.cn.

translated_keywords: 基因组;泛基因组;人类遗传学;基因组学;ASHG年会;75周年;杰出演讲者研讨会;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 本文集围绕“人类遗传学与基因组学的未来”杰出演讲者研讨会展开，收录了在1948年美国人类遗传学会（ASHG）成立75周年之际，于2023年华盛顿特区举行的ASHG年会上的报告内容。
authors: Miga Karen H
title: From complete genomes to pangenomes.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组;泛基因组;人类遗传学;基因组学;ASHG年会;75周年;杰出演讲者研讨会;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 从完整基因组到泛基因组
abstract: Highlighting the Distinguished Speakers Symposium on "The Future of Human Genetics and Genomics," this collection of articles is based on presentations at the ASHG 2023 Annual Meeting in Washington, DC, in celebration of all our field has accomplished in the past 75 years, since the founding of ASHG in 1948.
affiliations: Department of Biomolecular Engineering, University of California Santa Cruz, Santa Cruz, CA 95064, USA. Electronic address: khmiga@ucsc.edu.

translated_keywords: Hanwoo; 韩牛; 牛基因组; 染色体水平组装; 泛基因组图谱; 重复元件; 蛋白质编码基因; Bos taurus; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: 本研究首次完成了韩国地方品种汉牛（Bos taurus taurus）的染色体水平基因组组装，这是首个亚洲牛品种的基因组组装。此外，我们构建了包含14个B. taurus基因组组装的泛基因组图谱。Contig N50超过55 Mb，scaffold N50超过89 Mb，BUSCO分析（使用哺乳动物数据集）估算的基因组完整性为95.8%，表明该组装具有高质量。基因组中48.7%由各种重复元件组成，包括DNA转座子、串联重复序列、长散在核元件和简单重复序列等。共鉴定出27,314个蛋白编码基因，其中包括25,302个具有推断基因名称的蛋白质和2,012个未知功能蛋白质。对14个B. taurus常染色体的泛基因组图谱分析显示，总计有528.47 Mb的非参考区域和61.87 Mb的汉牛特有区域。我们的汉牛基因组组装和泛基因组图谱为研究B. taurus群体提供了宝贵的资源。
authors: Jang Jisung; Jung Jaehoon; Lee Young Ho; Lee Sanghyun; Baik Myunggi; Kim Heebal
title: Chromosome-level genome assembly of Korean native cattle and pangenome graph of 14 Bos taurus assemblies.
keywords: (Auto-generated) Hanwoo; 韩牛; 牛基因组; 染色体水平组装; 泛基因组图谱; 重复元件; 蛋白质编码基因; Bos taurus; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_title: 韩国本土牛的染色体水平基因组组装及14个Bos taurus组装的泛基因组图谱
abstract: This study presents the first chromosome-level genome assembly of Hanwoo, an indigenous Korean breed of Bos taurus taurus. This is the first genome assembly of Asian taurus breed. Also, we constructed a pangenome graph of 14 B. taurus genome assemblies. The contig N50 was over 55 Mb, the scaffold N50 was over 89 Mb and a genome completeness of 95.8%, as estimated by BUSCO using the mammalian set, indicated a high-quality assembly. 48.7% of the genome comprised various repetitive elements, including DNAs, tandem repeats, long interspersed nuclear elements, and simple repeats. A total of 27,314 protein-coding genes were identified, including 25,302 proteins with inferred gene names and 2,012 unknown proteins. The pangenome graph of 14 B. taurus autosomes revealed 528.47 Mb non-reference regions in total and 61.87 Mb Hanwoo-specific regions. Our Hanwoo assembly and pangenome graph provide valuable resources for studying B. taurus populations.
affiliations: Interdisciplinary Program in Bioinformatics, Seoul National University, Seoul, Republic of Korea.; Department of Agricultural Biotechnology and Research Institute of Agriculture and Life Sciences, College of Agriculture and Life Sciences, Seoul National University, Seoul, Korea.; Interdisciplinary Program in Bioinformatics, Seoul National University, Seoul, Republic of Korea. heebal@snu.ac.kr.; Department of Agricultural Biotechnology and Research Institute of Agriculture and Life Sciences, College of Agriculture and Life Sciences, Seoul National University, Seoul, Korea. heebal@snu.ac.kr.

translated_keywords: 信号转导；易感性；激素；病毒；脱落酸；抗性
translated_abstract: 在植物与病毒病原体的协同进化过程中，植物激素脱落酸（ABA）已成为一个关键角色。本文综述了大量证据，表明ABA在协调植物抗病毒免疫的复杂网络中起着至关重要的调控作用。一方面，ABA能够同步抗性途径，另一方面，它也可能被病毒效应蛋白利用作为易感因子。ABA通过激活精确降解病毒基因组的RNA沉默机制、用胼胝质屏障强化胞间连丝闸门以及启动抗性基因的转录程序，从而加强多层防御；但同时，它也能通过对抗其他防卫激素、抑制氧化爆发和抗病毒防御蛋白来增强易感性。有趣的是，多种病毒已独立进化出操纵ABA信号通路的策略。这种激素冲突的迷人模式揭示了ABA作为一个重要的调控开关，决定了感染进程。未来的研究应在考虑将其应用于病毒抗性策略之前，仔细探讨ABA调控对植物免疫和对各种病原体易感性的多方面影响。
authors: Kumar Rohit; Dasgupta Indranil
title: Abscisic acid: An emerging player in plant-virus interactions.
keywords: Signalling; Susceptibility; Hormones; Virus; Abscisic acid; Resistance
translated_title: 植物-病毒互作中的新兴角色
abstract: In the evolutionary arm race between plants and viral pathogens, the plant hormone abscisic acid (ABA) has surfaced as a crucial player. This review accumulates substantial evidence that portrays ABA as a crucial regulatory hub, coordinating the complex network of plant antiviral immunity. It is capable of synchronizing resistance pathways, yet it can also be exploited as a susceptibility factor by viral effectors. ABA fortifies multi-layered defenses on one hand, by activating RNA silencing mechanisms that precisely degrade viral genomes, strengthening plasmodesmal gateways with callose barriers, and priming the transcriptional programs of resistance genes. On the other hand, ABA can augment susceptibility by counteracting other defense hormones, dampening oxidative bursts, and inhibiting antiviral defence proteins. Interestingly, a variety of viruses have independently evolved strategies to manipulate ABA signalling pathways. This fascinating paradigm of hormonal conflicts unveils ABA as an important regulatory handle that determines infection trajectories. Future studies should carefully explore the multifaceted impacts of ABA modulation on plant immunity and susceptibility to diverse pathogens before considering practical applications in viral resistance strategies.
affiliations: Department of Plant Molecular Biology, University of Delhi South Campus, New Delhi, 110021, India.; Department of Plant Molecular Biology, University of Delhi South Campus, New Delhi, 110021, India. Electronic address: indasgup@south.du.ac.in.

translated_keywords: 基因组变异；存在-缺失变异（PAV）；泛基因组；参考偏倚
translated_abstract: 随着传统线性参考基因组局限性的显现，泛基因组学应运而生。与通常基于单个个体构建的传统参考基因组不同，泛基因组旨在代表某一生物群体中存在的所有基因组变异。目前，“泛基因组”这一术语被用于描述多种类型的基因组信息，但缺乏区分这些信息的专门语言。这对该领域的研究人员来说令人沮丧，对新进入该领域的研究者也造成了困惑。本文针对原核和真核生物，介绍了泛基因组学的基础知识，并提出了对描述泛基因组的语言进行规范化（详见术语表），以提高该领域讨论的精确性。
authors: Matthews Chelsea A; Watson-Haigh Nathan S; Burton Rachel A; Sheppard Anna E
title: A gentle introduction to pangenomics.
keywords: genomic variation; presence–absence variation (PAV); pangenome; reference bias
translated_title: 泛基因组概论
abstract: Pangenomes have emerged in response to limitations associated with traditional linear reference genomes. In contrast to a traditional reference that is (usually) assembled from a single individual, pangenomes aim to represent all of the genomic variation found in a group of organisms. The term 'pangenome' is currently used to describe multiple different types of genomic information, and limited language is available to differentiate between them. This is frustrating for researchers working in the field and confusing for researchers new to the field. Here, we provide an introduction to pangenomics relevant to both prokaryotic and eukaryotic organisms and propose a formalization of the language used to describe pangenomes (see the Glossary) to improve the specificity of discussion in the field.
affiliations: School of Agriculture, Food and Wine, Waite Campus, University of Adelaide, Urrbrae, South Australia 5064, Australia.; Australian Genome Research Facility, Victorian Comprehensive Cancer Centre, Melbourne, Victoria 3000, Australia.; South Australian Genomics Centre, SAHMRI, North Terrace, Adelaide, South Australia 5000, Australia.; Alkahest Inc., San Carlos, CA 94070, United States.; School of Biological Sciences, University of Adelaide, Adelaide, South Australia 5005, Australia.

translated_keywords: 梨；泛基因组图谱；等位基因特异性表达；单倍型解析组装；果实品质性状
translated_abstract: 杂交作物通常表现出更高的产量和更强的适应性，但杂种优势或异质性的基因组机制仍不清楚，这限制了我们预测杂交育种中表型性状表达的能力。本文中，我们生成了两种梨杂交品种“玉露香”（YLX）和“红星酥”（HXS）的单倍型解析的端粒到端粒（T2T）基因组组装，这两个品种具有相同的母本亲本但父本亲本不同。然后，我们利用这些组装来探索全基因组范围内的等位基因特异性表达（ASE），并构建了梨的泛基因组图谱。在两个杂交品种中，接近6000个基因观察到了ASE现象。其中一组与果实品质相关的ASE基因，如糖、有机酸和蜡质被鉴定出来，表明它们对杂种优势的重要贡献。具体而言，调控果实酸度的基因Ma1在HXS和YLX的父本单倍型中缺失。基于我们的组装和七个已发表的梨基因组，构建了一个泛基因组图谱。随后，对139个栽培梨种质（包括97个新测序的种质）的重测序数据进行比对，揭示了梨多样化过程中大量结构变异热点和选择性清除区域。正如预期的那样，在低有机酸含量的品种中未发现Ma1等位基因，并通过在梨果和愈伤组织中的Ma1过表达验证了这一关联。总体而言，这些结果揭示了ASE对果实品质杂种优势的贡献，并提供了一个稳健的泛基因组参考，用于高分辨率等位基因发现和关联作图。
authors: Li Qionghou; Qiao Xin; Li Lanqing; Gu Chao; Yin Hao; Qi Kaijie; Xie Zhihua; Yang Sheng; Zhao Qifeng; Wang Zewen; Yang Yuhang; Pan Jiahui; Li Hongxiang; Wang Jie; Wang Chao; Rieseberg Loren H; Zhang Shaoling; Tao Shutian
title: Haplotype-resolved T2T genome assemblies and pangenome graph of pear reveal diverse patterns of allele-specific expression and the genomic basis of fruit quality traits.
keywords: pear; pangenome graph; allele-specific expression; haplotype-resolved assembly; fruit quality traits
translated_title: 梨的单倍型解析的端粒到端粒（T2T）基因组组装和泛基因组图谱揭示了等位基因特异性表达的多样化模式及果实品质性状的基因组基础。
abstract: Hybrid crops often exhibit increased yield and greater resilience, yet the genomic mechanism(s) underlying hybrid vigor or heterosis remain unclear, hindering our ability to predict the expression of phenotypic traits in hybrid breeding. Here, we generated haplotype-resolved T2T genome assemblies of two pear hybrid varieties, 'Yuluxiang' (YLX) and 'Hongxiangsu' (HXS), which share the same maternal parent but differ in their paternal parents. We then used these assemblies to explore the genome-scale landscape of allele-specific expression (ASE) and create a pangenome graph for pear. ASE was observed for close to 6000 genes in both hybrid cultivars. A subset of ASE genes related to aspects of fruit quality such as sugars, organic acids, and cuticular wax were identified, suggesting their important contributions to heterosis. Specifically, Ma1, a gene regulating fruit acidity, is absent in the paternal haplotypes of HXS and YLX. A pangenome graph was built based on our assemblies and seven published pear genomes. Resequencing data for 139 cultivated pear genotypes (including 97 genotypes sequenced here) were subsequently aligned to the pangenome graph, revealing numerous structural variant hotspots and selective sweeps during pear diversification. As predicted, the Ma1 allele was found to be absent in varieties with low organic acid content, and this association was functionally validated by Ma1 overexpression in pear fruit and calli. Overall, these results reveal the contributions of ASE to fruit-quality heterosis and provide a robust pangenome reference for high-resolution allele discovery and association mapping.
affiliations: National Key Laboratory of Crop Genetics and Germplasm Enhancement and Utilization, Sanya Institute of Nanjing Agricultural University, College of Horticulture, Nanjing Agricultural University, Nanjing, Jiangsu 210095, China.; Pomology Institute, Shanxi Agricultural University, Taigu, Shanxi 030801, China.; Department of Botany and Biodiversity Research Centre, University of British Columbia, Vancouver, BC, Canada.; National Key Laboratory of Crop Genetics and Germplasm Enhancement and Utilization, Sanya Institute of Nanjing Agricultural University, College of Horticulture, Nanjing Agricultural University, Nanjing, Jiangsu 210095, China. Electronic address: taost@njau.edu.cn.

translated_keywords: 巨型病毒；比较基因组学；基因组演化
translated_abstract: 一个区域集中了核心基因，另一个区域则存在基因复制现象。我们还发现，与其他巨型病毒家族相比，Pithoviridae基因组更为保守，其水平基因转移来源的基因比例较低且稳定（占5%至7%）。该家族内基因组大小的变化主要由基因复制率的变化（从14%到28%）以及反向重复序列的大规模入侵引起。尽管这些重复元件在Cedratvirus中不存在，但它们在Pithovirus基因组中占据了多达四分之一的区域。通过专用分析流程识别出的这些富含重复序列的区域是突变、基因捕获事件及基因组重排的热点，这些过程共同推动了Pithoviridae的进化。
authors: Rigou Sofia; Schmitt Alain; Alempic Jean-Marie; Lartigue Audrey; Vendloczki Peter; Abergel Chantal; Claverie Jean-Michel; Legendre Matthieu
title: Pithoviruses Are Invaded by Repeats That Contribute to Their Evolution and Divergence from Cedratviruses.
keywords: giant viruses; comparative genomics; genome evolution
translated_title: 拟病毒属病毒受到重复序列的侵袭，这些重复序列对其进化和从塞德拉病毒的分化有贡献。
abstract: Pithoviridae are amoeba-infecting giant viruses possessing the largest viral particles known so far. Since the discovery of Pithovirus sibericum, recovered from a 30,000-yr-old permafrost sample, other pithoviruses, and related cedratviruses, were isolated from various terrestrial and aquatic samples. Here, we report the isolation and genome sequencing of 2 Pithoviridae from soil samples, in addition to 3 other recent isolates. Using the 12 available genome sequences, we conducted a thorough comparative genomic study of the Pithoviridae family to decipher the organization and evolution of their genomes. Our study reveals a nonuniform genome organization in 2 main regions: 1 concentrating core genes and another gene duplications. We also found that Pithoviridae genomes are more conservative than other families of giant viruses, with a low and stable proportion (5% to 7%) of genes originating from horizontal transfers. Genome size variation within the family is mainly due to variations in gene duplication rates (from 14% to 28%) and massive invasion by inverted repeats. While these repeated elements are absent from cedratviruses, repeat-rich regions cover as much as a quarter of the pithoviruses genomes. These regions, identified using a dedicated pipeline, are hotspots of mutations, gene capture events, and genomic rearrangements that contribute to their evolution.
affiliations: Information Génomique & Structurale, Unité Mixte de Recherche 7256 (Institut de Microbiologie de la Méditerranée, FR3479), IM2B, IOM, Aix-Marseille University, Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique, Marseille 13288 Cedex 9, France.

translated_keywords: 纳米污染；纳米生态学；次生代谢；初生代谢；植物修复
translated_abstract: 纳米污染（NPOs）是由于纳米颗粒（NPs）在工业和消费领域的广泛应用而迅速增长的后果，已成为一个关键的环境问题。尽管已有大量研究探讨了NPs污染对生态系统和人类健康的深远影响，但对其对植物生命的影响却鲜有关注。本文旨在通过深入分析NPOs与植物代谢之间的复杂相互作用来填补这一空白，涵盖初级和次级代谢过程。我们的研究涵盖了对植物与NPs相互作用机制的详细剖析，包括NPs的吸收、转运及其在植物组织中的分布，这些都受到粒径、形状和表面特性等理化性质的影响。此外，我们还评估了NPOs对光合作用、呼吸作用、养分吸收和水分运输等初级代谢过程的影响，并探讨了次级代谢的多方面变化，揭示了植物对NPs暴露的响应中次生代谢物的合成与调控。通过对NPOs对植物生长、发育及环境交互作用的潜在影响进行审视，本研究强调了全面理解植物-NPs动态关系的重要性。随着NPs在生态系统中的日益普及，这项研究为制定可持续的环境管理策略提供了基础指导，以应对NPs对植物生命发展和环境交互作用的广泛影响。
authors: Vignesh Arumugam; Amal Thomas Cheeran; Sivalingam Ramamoorthy; Selvakumar Subramaniam; Vasanth Krishnan
title: Unraveling the impact of nanopollution on plant metabolism and ecosystem dynamics.
keywords: Nanopollution; Nanoecology; Secondary metabolism; Primary metabolism; Phytoremediation
translated_title: 解析纳米污染对植物代谢和生态系统动态的影响
abstract: Nanopollution (NPOs), a burgeoning consequence of the widespread use of nanoparticles (NPs) across diverse industrial and consumer domains, has emerged as a critical environmental issue. While extensive research has scrutinized the repercussions of NPs pollution on ecosystems and human health, scant attention has been directed towards unraveling its implications for plant life. This comprehensive review aims to bridge this gap by delving into the nuanced interplay between NPOs and plant metabolism, encompassing both primary and secondary processes. Our exploration encompasses an in-depth analysis of the intricate mechanisms governing the interaction between plants and NPs. This involves a thorough examination of how physicochemical properties such as size, shape, and surface characteristics influence the uptake and translocation of NPs within plant tissues. The impact of NPOs on primary metabolic processes, including photosynthesis, respiration, nutrient uptake, and water transport. Additionally, this study explored the multifaceted alterations in secondary metabolism, shedding light on the synthesis and modulation of secondary metabolites in response to NPs exposure. In assessing the consequences of NPOs for plant life, we scrutinize the potential implications for plant growth, development, and environmental interactions. The intricate relationships revealed in this review underscore the need for a holistic understanding of the plant-NPs dynamics. As NPs become increasingly prevalent in ecosystems, this investigation establishes a fundamental guide that underscores the importance of additional research to shape sustainable environmental management strategies and address the extensive effects of NPs on the development of plant life and environmental interactions.

translated_keywords: 植物激素；盐胁迫；非生物胁迫；转运蛋白；缓解
translated_abstract: 高盐胁迫频繁影响植物的生长发育和生产力。本文综述了膜转运蛋白（MTs）和植物激素在介导盐胁迫中的复杂作用。膜转运蛋白在捕获钠离子（Na⁺）、维持钠（Na⁺）与钾（K⁺）之间的微妙平衡方面起着关键作用，这对支持细胞稳态和提高植物整体健康至关重要。这些转运蛋白通过调节离子平衡、促进重要营养物质的吸收与隔离，从而增强植物对盐胁迫的耐受性。多种植物激素，包括脱落酸、生长素、乙烯、细胞分裂素、赤霉素以及一氧化氮和硫化氢等气体生长调节剂，协同调控植物生长、发育及环境胁迫响应的多个方面。此外，其他植物激素如油菜素内酯、褪黑素和水杨酸也参与启动适应过程，例如调控渗透压、排除离子以及启动胁迫信号通路。本研究总结了关于植物盐胁迫耐受性分子和生理过程的研究进展，强调了膜转运蛋白与植物激素之间复杂的相互关系。研究目的是阐明这些相互作用以推动相关研究并制定提高植物盐胁迫耐受性的策略。
authors: Nidhi; Iqbal Noushina; Khan Nafees A
title: Synergistic effects of phytohormones and membrane transporters in plant salt stress mitigation.
keywords: Phytohormones; Salt stress; Abiotic stress; Transporters; Mitigation
translated_title: 植物激素与膜转运蛋白在缓解植物盐胁迫中的协同效应
abstract: Plants are frequently exposed to high salinity, negatively affecting their development and productivity. This review examined the complex roles of membrane transporters (MTs) and phytohormones in mediating salt stress. MTs are crucial in capturing sodium ions (Na+) and maintaining a delicate balance between sodium (Na+) and potassium (K+), essential for supporting cellular homeostasis and enhancing overall plant health. These MTs were instrumental in regulating ion balance and promoting the absorption and segregation of vital nutrients, thereby enhancing salt stress tolerance. Various plant hormones, including abscisic acid, auxin, ethylene, cytokinin, and gibberellins, along with gaseous growth regulators such as nitric oxide and hydrogen sulfide, collaborate to regulate and synchronize numerous aspects of plant growth, development, and stress responses to environmental factors. These transporters and other phytohormones, including brassinosteroids, melatonin, and salicylic acid, also collaborated to initiate adaptation processes, such as controlling osmotic pressure, removing ions, and initiating stress signaling pathways. This study consolidated the advancements in understanding the molecular and physiological processes contributing to plant salt tolerance, emphasizing the intricate relationships between MTs and phytohormones. The aim was to elucidate these interactions to promote further research and develop strategies for enhancing plant salt tolerance.

translated_keywords: 植物激素；一氧化氮；翻译后修饰；信号分子；非生物胁迫；生长；串扰；植物响应
translated_abstract: 植物的自然环境包含复杂的非生物胁迫集合，其在预期变化的气候下适应和生存的能力高度灵活，并涉及信号分子之间一系列平衡相互作用，其中一氧化氮（NO）成为关键组分。本文聚焦于NO在植物各种信号转导通路中的作用及其在多种非生物胁迫下维持细胞稳态的积极作用。此外，还综述了NO与各种植物激素相互作用的最新数据，这些相互作用调控生理和生化过程以获得非生物胁迫耐受性。这些交互作用调节植物的防御机制并有助于减轻胁迫的负面影响。在探讨NO的多样化功能时，还探索了NO介导的翻译后修饰，如N端规则通路、酪氨酸硝化和S-亚硝基化，这些修饰揭示了在胁迫条件下修饰各种代谢过程的蛋白质的确切机制和特性。综合考虑这些因素，本综述强调了NO及其与各种植物激素的关联在植物发育过程中特别是在不利环境下的重要作用。
authors: Saini Sakshi; Sharma Priyanka; Singh Pooja; Kumar Vikram; Yadav Priya; Sharma Asha
title: Nitric oxide: An emerging warrior of plant physiology under abiotic stress.
keywords: Phytohormones; Nitric oxide; Post-translational modifications; Signaling molecule; Abiotic stress; Growth; Crosstalk; Plant response
translated_title: 逆境下植物生理学中的新兴战士
abstract: The natural environment of plants comprises a complex set of various abiotic stresses and their capability to react and survive under this anticipated changing climate is highly flexible and involves a series of balanced interactions between signaling molecules where nitric oxide becomes a crucial component. In this article, we focussed on the role of nitric oxide (NO) in various signal transduction pathways of plants and its positive impact on maintaining cellular homeostasis under various abiotic stresses. Besides this, the recent data on interactions of NO with various phytohormones to control physiological and biochemical processes to attain abiotic stress tolerance have also been considered. These crosstalks modulate the plant's defense mechanism and help in alleviating the negative impact of stress. While focusing on the diverse functions of NO, an effort has been made to explore the functions of NO-mediated post-translational modifications, such as the N-end rule pathway, tyrosine nitration, and S-nitrosylation which revealed the exact mechanism and characterization of proteins that modify various metabolic processes in stressed conditions. Considering all of these factors, the present review emphasizes the role of NO and its interlinking with various phytohormones in maintaining developmental processes in plants, specifically under unfavorable environments.

translated_keywords: 生长发育；最佳采收期；次生代谢物；药用和香料植物
translated_abstract: 植物次生代谢物（SMs）在保护植物免受病原体和环境胁迫方面发挥着关键作用。这些天然产物广泛应用于制药、食品、化妆品和医疗保健等多个行业。然而，植物中这些化合物的数量和质量会受到遗传、形态、植物年龄以及季节性和昼夜变化等因素的影响。对于药用和芳香植物（MAPs）而言，收获时机尤为重要，因为其活性成分在生长周期中的特定时刻达到峰值。确定最佳收获时间对于确保植物实现预期的栽培目标至关重要。本文综述了发育和外部因素对MAPs中SMs定性与定量效果的影响。我们分析了近期关于环境和发育因素对MAPs次生代谢物影响的研究，并整理相关数据进行分析。本研究结果表明，这些因素如何影响植物次生代谢物的数量和质量，强调了确定最佳收获时间（即最佳采收期）以最大化利用这些化合物的重要性。我们的发现为理解影响次生代谢物的因素提供了重要见解，可作为MAPs生产中的质量控制工具。此外，本综述还可为研究人员、农民和工业用户优化植物生长和收获时机提供有价值的参考资源，以实现最大产量。总体而言，本综述为制定有效策略以生产高质量MAPs产品提供了有价值的信息。
authors: Hazrati Saeid; Mousavi Zahra; Nicola Silvana
title: Harvest time optimization for medicinal and aromatic plant secondary metabolites.
keywords: Growth and development; Balsamic time; Secondary metabolites; Medicinal and aromatic plants
translated_title: 药用和芳香植物次生代谢物收获时间的优化
abstract: Plant secondary metabolites (SMs) play a crucial role in shielding plants from pathogens and environmental stressors. These natural products find widespread applications across various industries, including pharmaceutical, food, cosmetic, and healthcare. However, the quantity and quality of these compounds in plants can be influenced by factors such as genetics, morphology, plant age, and the seasonal and daily variations. The timing of harvest holds particular significance for medicinal and aromatic plants (MAPs) as their active compounds peak at a specific moment during the plant growth cycle. Determining the optimal harvest time is essential to ensure the plants meet their intended cultivation goal. In this review, we analyzed how developmental and external factors impact the qualitative and quantitative effectiveness of SMs in MAPs. We examined recent studies on the effects of environmental and developmental factors on SMs of MAPs, compiling relevant data for analysis. The results of this review demonstrate how these factors influence the quantity and quality of plant SMs, underscoring the importance of determining the optimal harvest time (known as the balsamic time) to maximize the utilization of these compounds. Our findings offer crucial insights into the factors affecting SMs, serving as a tool for quality control in MAPs production. Moreover, this review can be a valuable resource for researchers, farmers, and industrial users aiming to optimize plant growth and harvest timing for maximum yield. Overall, our review provides valuable information for devising effective strategies to produce high-quality MAPs products.

translated_keywords: 人类泛基因组; 非洲基因组; 基因组多样性; 社区驱动研究; 数据本地治理; 能力建设; 基因组医学; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract:
人类参考基因组（GRCh38）主要来源于欧洲血统个体，未能充分反映全球人口的巨大遗传多样性。在努力使参考基因组多样化的过程中，面临可及性和代表性方面的挑战，加剧了对非洲基因组数据的匮乏问题，而这些数据对于研究在这些人群中流行的疾病至关重要。Sherman等人提出构建针对不同人种亚群的参考基因组。他们的非洲泛基因组计划揭示了GRCh38人类参考基因组中大量缺失的遗传变异，强调了群体特异性基因组的必要性。为此，像塞内加尔基因组项目（SEN-GENOME）这样的本地倡议应运而生，旨在记录历史上被忽视的人群的基因组信息。

SEN-GENOME体现了以社区为导向的去中心化研究模式。通过严格的招募标准和伦理实践，该项目计划对塞内加尔14个行政区内的31个民族语言群体的1,000个基因组进行测序，推动针对该地区的本地化基因组研究。SEN-GENOME成功的关键在于其致力于本地化的数据治理、能力建设以及与非洲更广泛的泛基因组项目的整合。尽管数据标准化和共享存在复杂性，但我们的合作努力目标一致，确保朝着全面的人类泛基因组迈进的步伐稳步前行。我们诚邀并欢迎与其他研究机构的合作，共同实现这一愿景。

总之，像SEN-GENOME这样的本地倡议在弥合基因组差异方面发挥着关键作用，为实现公平包容的基因组学研究提供了途径。由共同健康愿景引导的协作努力将推动我们对人类基因组有更全面的理解，并通过基因组医学改善健康状况。
authors: Gaye Amadou; Sene Andrea Regina G; Gadji Macoura; Deme Alioune; Cisse Aynina; Ndiaye Rokhaya
title: Toward building a comprehensive human pan-genome: The SEN-GENOME project.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 人类泛基因组; 非洲基因组; 基因组多样性; 社区驱动研究; 数据本地治理; 能力建设; 基因组医学; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_title: SEN-GENOME项目
abstract: The human reference genome (GRCh38), primarily sourced from individuals of European descent, falls short in capturing the vast genetic diversity across global populations. Efforts to diversify the reference genome face challenges in accessibility and representation, exacerbating the scarcity of African genomic data crucial for studying diseases prevalent in these populations. Sherman et al. proposed constructing reference genomes tailored to distinct human sub-populations. Their African Pan-Genome initiative highlighted substantial genetic variation missing from the GRCh38 human reference genome, emphasizing the necessity for population-specific genomes. In response, local initiatives like the Senegalese Genome project (SEN-GENOME) have emerged to document the genomes of historically overlooked populations. SEN-GENOME embodies community-driven decentralized research. With meticulous recruitment criteria and ethical practices, it aims to sequence 1,000 genomes from 31 ethnolinguistic groups, in the fourteen administrative regions of Senegal, fostering local genomic research tailored to the region. The key to SEN-GENOME's success is its commitment to local governance of data, capacity building, and integration with broader pan-genome projects in Africa. Despite the complexities of data harmonization and sharing, our collaborative efforts are aligned with common goals, ensuring steady progress toward a comprehensive human pan-genome. We invite and welcome collaboration with other research entities to achieve this shared vision. In summary, local initiatives such as SEN-GENOME are pivotal in bridging genomic disparities, offering pathways to equitable and inclusive genomic research. Collaborative endeavors guided by a collective vision for human health will propel us toward a more encompassing understanding of the human genome and better health through genomic medicine.
affiliations: Department of Integrative Genomics and Epidemiology, School of Graduate Studies, Meharry Medical College, Nashville, TN, USA.
