translated_keywords: 长链非编码RNA (lncRNAs)；跨代遗传；胁迫记忆；生物胁迫；胁迫预处理；植物免疫；组蛋白修饰
translated_abstract: 随着涉及单链RNA测序和基于RNA纯化技术的染色质隔离测序等转录组学技术的发展，编码及非编码RNA的转录组学研究得以高效开展。这些研究表明，非编码RNA在调控基因表达方面发挥着重要作用。长链非编码RNA（lncRNA）是一种长度大于200个核苷酸的非编码RNA，在植物发育过程中扮演多种角色，如光形态建成、表观遗传变化、生殖组织发育以及对生物和非生物胁迫的调节。表观遗传变化通过将基因状态切换至“开启-关闭”模式进一步调控基因表达，并且还调节胁迫记忆及其跨代遗传。凭借完善的调控机制，它们作为引导者、支架、信号或诱饵来调控基因表达。它们是组蛋白修饰、表观遗传修饰以及DNA甲基化等转录后修饰的主要调控因子。本文综述了lncRNA在植物免疫中的作用，并讨论了表观遗传标记如何响应害虫/病原体攻击而改变基因表达，以及如何影响染色质相关的胁迫记忆和植物中表观遗传印记的跨代遗传。此外，本文还总结了一些关于组蛋白修饰和DNA甲基化通过激活防御相关基因来抵抗病原体和害虫攻击的研究成果。
authors: Yajnik Kalpesh Nath; Singh Indrakant K; Singh Archana
title: lncRNAs and epigenetics regulate plant's resilience against biotic stresses.
keywords: lncRNAs; Transgenerational inheritance; Stress memory; Biotic stress; Stress priming; Plant immunity; Histone modifications
translated_title: 长链非编码RNA（lncRNAs）与表观遗传调控植物对生物胁迫的适应性。
abstract: With the advent of transcriptomic techniques involving single-stranded RNA sequencing and chromatin isolation by RNA purification-based sequencing, transcriptomic studies of coding and non-coding RNAs have been executed efficiently. These studies acknowledged the role of non-coding RNAs in modulating gene expression. Long non-coding RNAs (lncRNAs) are a kind of non-coding RNAs having lengths of >200 nucleotides, playing numerous roles in plant developmental processes such as photomorphogenesis, epigenetic changes, reproductive tissue development, and in regulating biotic and abiotic stresses. Epigenetic changes further control gene expression by changing their state to "ON-OFF" and also regulate stress memory and its transgenerational inheritance. With well-established regulatory mechanisms, they act as guides, scaffolds, signals, and decoys to modulate gene expression. They act as a major operator of post-transcriptional modifications such as histone and epigenetic modifications, and DNA methylations. The review elaborates on the roles of lncRNAs in plant immunity and also discusses how epigenetic markers alter gene expression in response to pest/pathogen attack and influences chromatin-associated stress memory as well as transgenerational inheritance of epigenetic imprints in plants. The review further summarizes some research studies on how histone modifications and DNA methylations resist pathogenic and pest attacks by activating defense-related genes.

translated_keywords: 次生代谢物；防御机制；生物胁迫；内生真菌；植物病原体
translated_abstract: 内生真菌定殖于植物内部组织，并与其宿主植物形成大多为互利共生的关系。植物-内生菌相互作用是一种复杂的机制，目前是研究的重点，旨在理解内生菌无症状定殖、逃避植物免疫反应、基因表达调控以及建立平衡互利关系的潜在机制。内生真菌依赖植物宿主获取营养、庇护和传播，并能提高宿主植物对生物胁迫（如食草动物、线虫、细菌、真菌、病毒及其他植物病原体）的耐受性。研究表明，内生真菌通过竞争空间或养分、捕食寄生、产生次生代谢物直接或间接防御系统以及诱导系统抗性（ISR），减轻并消除植物病原体的有害影响。此外，利用内生真菌进行作物改良，将是可持续农业发展的重要一步。本文综述了植物-内生菌相互作用及内生真菌克服宿主防御反应、随后定殖并建立平衡互利关系的研究进展。同时，文章还强调了内生真菌在缓解生物胁迫方面的潜力，并讨论了具有抗菌活性的多种生物活性化合物对农业病原体的抑制作用。此外，内生菌介导的ISR也得到了重点阐述。
authors: Waqar Sonia; Bhat Adil Ameen; Khan Abrar Ahmad
title: Endophytic fungi: Unravelling plant-endophyte interaction and the multifaceted role of fungal endophytes in stress amelioration.
keywords: Secondary metabolites; Defence mechanism; Biotic stress; Endophytic fungi; Phytopathogens
translated_title: 解析植物-内生菌相互作用及其在缓解压力中的多面角色
abstract: Endophytic fungi colonize interior plant tissue and mostly form mutualistic associations with their host plant. Plant-endophyte interaction is a complex mechanism and is currently a focus of research to understand the underlying mechanism of endophyte asymptomatic colonization, the process of evading plant immune response, modulation of gene expression, and establishment of a balanced mutualistic relationship. Fungal endophytes rely on plant hosts for nutrients, shelter, and transmission and improve the host plant's tolerance against biotic stresses, including -herbivores, nematodes, bacterial, fungal, viral, nematode, and other phytopathogens. Endophytic fungi have been reported to improve plant health by reducing and eradicating the harmful effect of phytopathogens through competition for space or nutrients, mycoparasitism, and through direct or indirect defense systems by producing secondary metabolites as well as by induced systemic resistance (ISR). Additionally, for efficient crop improvement, practicing them would be a fruitful step for a sustainable approach. This review article summarizes the current research progress in plant-endophyte interaction and the fungal endophyte mechanism to overcome host defense responses, their subsequent colonization, and the establishment of a balanced mutualistic interaction with host plants. This review also highlighted the potential of fungal endophytes in the amelioration of biotic stress. We have also discussed the relevance of various bioactive compounds possessing antimicrobial potential against a variety of agricultural pathogens. Furthermore, endophyte-mediated ISR is also emphasized.
affiliations: Section of Environmental Botany and Plant Pathology, Faculty of Life Sciences, Aligarh Muslim University, Aligarh, 202002, India. translated_keywords: 气体交换；植物激素；重金属；核酮糖-1,5-二磷酸羧化酶/加氧酶（Rubisco）；光保护；氧化还原平衡；电子传递
translated_abstract: 金属是植物代谢和生存的关键元素，在细胞过程中作为不可或缺的辅因子，对植物生长和存活至关重要。过量或不足的金属/类金属供应会危及植物的生命和生存，因此被视为一种强大的胁迫因素。叶绿体作为一种高金属需求的细胞器，在金属稳态网络中占据重要地位。因此，叶绿体中的金属介导电子传递链（ETC）是金属/类金属诱导胁迫的主要靶点。金属/类金属的过量或缺乏威胁植物光合作用的方式多种多样。光合作用碳反应的能量需求应与ETC的能量输出保持平衡。由于金属/类金属胁迫导致ETC组分功能障碍会引发光抑制，而碳固定过程的反馈抑制也会阻碍ETC。金属胁迫会损害抗氧化酶活性、色素生物合成以及气孔功能。然而，基因操作、养分管理、维持光稳态以及植物激素的应用是应对金属胁迫的策略之一。因此，全面理解金属/类金属胁迫的潜在机制，并探索减轻其对植物影响的策略至关重要。本文综述了金属/类金属对光合作用调控干扰的机制，并强调了适应性方法以缓解其对植物的影响。重点讨论了光稳态、营养互作、植物激素以及遗传干预在缓解金属/类金属胁迫中的作用。
authors: Shomali Aida; Das Susmita; Sarraf Mohammad; Johnson Riya; Janeeshma Edappayil; Kumar Vinod; Aliniaeifard Sasan; Puthur Jos T; Hasanuzzaman Mirza
title: Modulation of plant photosynthetic processes during metal and metalloid stress, and strategies for manipulating photosynthesis-related traits.
keywords: Gas exchange; Phytohormones; Heavy metals; Rubisco; Photostasis; Redox balance; Electron transfer
translated_title: 金属和类金属胁迫下植物光合作用过程的调控及其与光合作用相关性状操纵的策略。
abstract: Metals constitute vital elements for plant metabolism and survival, acting as essential co-factors in cellular processes which are indispensable for plant growth and survival. Excess or deficient provision of metal/metalloids puts plant's life and survival at risk, thus considered a potent stress for plants. Chloroplasts as an organelle with a high metal demand form a pivotal site within the metal homeostasis network. Therefore, the metal-mediated electron transport chain (ETC) in chloroplasts is a primary target site of metal/metalloid-induced stresses. Both excess and deficient availability of metal/metalloids threatens plant's photosynthesis in several ways. Energy demands from the photosynthetic carbon reactions should be in balance with energy output of ETC. Malfunctioning of ETC components as a result of metal/metalloid stress initiates photoinhiition. A feedback inhibition from carbon fixation process also impedes the ETC. Metal stress impairs antioxidant enzyme activity, pigment biosynthesis, and stomatal function. However, genetic manipulations, nutrient management, keeping photostasis, and application of phytohormones are among strategies for coping with metal stress. Consequently, a comprehensive understanding of the underlying mechanisms of metal/metalloid stress, as well as the exploration of potential strategies to mitigate its impact on plants are imperative. This review offers a mechanistic insight into the disruption of photosynthesis regulation by metal/metalloids and highlights adaptive approaches to ameliorate their effects on plants. Focus was made on photostasis, nutrient interactions, phytohormones, and genetic interventions for mitigating metal/metalloid stresses.

Electronic address: mhzsauag@yahoo.com.

translated_keywords: 全基因组关联研究；选择；猪；遗传力估计；泛基因组
translated_abstract: 猪是人类饮食中高质量蛋白质的主要来源之一。结构变异（SVs）是与多种性状和进化事件相关的遗传变异的重要来源。然而，目前猪的线性参考基因组限制了对SVs位置信息的展示。本研究生成了猪的泛基因组，并构建了横跨欧亚大陆的599个深度测序基因组的基因组变异图谱。此外，还构建了一个全基因组的基因集目录，表明核心基因比可变基因具有更高的进化保守性。随后，我们鉴定出546,137个SVs及其富集区域，并分析了它们与基因组特征的关系，发现欧亚猪之间存在显著分化。更重要的是，通过泛基因组检测到的SVs可以补充仅基于单核苷酸多态性（SNPs）的遗传力估计和全基因组关联研究。在受到选择的SVs中，我们鉴定出TBX19基因启动子区域的一个插入，可能与亚洲猪的发育、生长和胆小等性状相关，并可能影响该基因的表达。我们构建的猪泛基因组及鉴定的SVs为未来猪的功能基因组学研究提供了丰富的资源。
authors: Du Heng; Zhuo Yue; Lu Shiyu; Li Wanying; Zhou Lei; Sun Feizhou; Liu Gang; Liu Jian-Feng
title: Pangenome Reveals Gene Content Variations and Structural Variants Contributing to Pig Characteristics.
keywords: Genome-wide association study; Selection; Pig; Heritability estimation; Pangenome
translated_title: 泛基因组揭示参与猪性状的基因含量变异和结构变异
abstract: Pigs are among the most essential sources of high-quality protein in human diets. Structural variants (SVs) are a major source of genetic variants associated with diverse traits and evolutionary events. However, the current linear reference genome of pigs limits the presentation of position information for SVs. In this study, we generated a pangenome of pigs and a genome variation map of 599 deep-sequenced genomes across Eurasia. Moreover, a section-wide gene repertoire was constructed, which indicated that core genes were more evolutionarily conserved than variable genes. Subsequently, we identified 546,137 SVs, their enrichment regions, and relationships with genomic features and found significant divergence across Eurasian pigs. More importantly, the pangenome-detected SVs could complement heritability estimates and genome-wide association studies based only on single nucleotide polymorphisms. Among the SVs shaped by selection, we identified an insertion in the promoter region of the TBX19 gene, which may be related to the development, growth, and timidity traits of Asian pigs and may affect the gene expression. Our constructed pig pangenome and the identified SVs provide rich resources for future functional genomic research on pigs.
affiliations: State Key Laboratory of Animal Biotech Breeding; College of Animal Science and Technology, China Agricultural University, Beijing 100193, China.; National Animal Husbandry Service, Beijing 100125, China.

translated_keywords: 复杂植物基因组；组装算法；测序技术；单倍型分辨率组装；端粒到端粒基因组
translated_abstract: 在过去的二十年间，测序技术和计算算法的巨大进步推动了植物基因组学研究进入蓬勃发展阶段，已经解析了从无维管植物到开花植物的数百个基因组。然而，由于复杂基因组所具有的高杂合性、高度重复序列或高倍性等特点，其基因组组装仍然充满挑战，常规测序和组装方法难以完全解决这些问题。本文综述了复杂植物基因组组装面临的挑战与取得的进展，包括可行的实验策略、测序技术的改进、现有的组装方法以及不同的分相算法。此外，我们列举了复杂基因组项目的实际案例供读者参考，以解决未来与复杂基因组相关的问题。最后，我们预计完整、无间隙、端粒到端粒且完全分相的复杂植物基因组组装很快将成为常规操作。
authors: Kong Weilong; Wang Yibin; Zhang Shengcheng; Yu Jiaxin; Zhang Xingtan
title: Recent Advances in Assembly of Complex Plant Genomes.
keywords: Complex plant genome; Assembly algorithm; Sequencing technology; Haplotype-resolved assembly; Telomere-to-telomere genome
translated_title: 复杂植物基因组组装的最新进展
abstract: Over the past 20 years, tremendous advances in sequencing technologies and computational algorithms have spurred plant genomic research into a thriving era with hundreds of genomes decoded already, ranging from those of nonvascular plants to those of flowering plants. However, complex plant genome assembly is still challenging and remains difficult to fully resolve with conventional sequencing and assembly methods due to high heterozygosity, highly repetitive sequences, or high ploidy characteristics of complex genomes. Herein, we summarize the challenges of and advances in complex plant genome assembly, including feasible experimental strategies, upgrades to sequencing technology, existing assembly methods, and different phasing algorithms. Moreover, we list actual cases of complex genome projects for readers to refer to and draw upon to solve future problems related to complex genomes. Finally, we expect that the accurate, gapless, telomere-to-telomere, and fully phased assembly of complex plant genomes could soon become routine.
affiliations: Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory for Lingnan Modern Agriculture, Genome Analysis Laboratory of the Ministry of Agriculture, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen 518120, China.; Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory for Lingnan Modern Agriculture, Genome Analysis Laboratory of the Ministry of Agriculture, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen 518120, China. Electronic address: zhangxingtan@caas.cn.

translated_keywords: 单细胞测序（scRNA-seq）；大型语言模型（LLMs）；CRISPR-CAS9；端粒到端粒（T2T）；人工智能（AI）；泛基因组；下一代测序（NGS）；植物人工染色体（PACs）
translated_abstract: 在基因组学时代初期，生物学研究转向还原论，生成了植物基因的“部件清单”，并初步揭示了复杂生物过程。如今，随着基因组学时代的全面展开，高精度基因组学的进步使得对生物系统的时间和空间分析能够精确到单细胞水平。这些见解结合人工智能驱动的计算机模拟设计，正在推动首例合成植物的发展。通过整合还原论与系统论方法，研究人员不仅重新构想了植物作为食物、纤维和燃料的来源，还将其视为能够缓解气候变化影响的“环境恒温器”。
authors: Michael Todd P
title: Can a plant biologist fix a thermostat?
keywords: single‐cell sequencing (scRNA‐seq); large language models (LLMs); CRISPR‐CAS9; telomere‐to‐telomere (T2T); artificial intelligence (AI); pangenome; next‐generation sequencing (NGS); plant artificial chromosomes (PACs)
translated_title: 植物生物学家能修理恒温器吗？
abstract: The shift to reductionist biology at the dawn of the genome era yielded a 'parts list' of plant genes and a nascent understanding of complex biological processes. Today, with the genomics era in full swing, advances in high-definition genomics enabled precise temporal and spatial analyses of biological systems down to the single-cell level. These insights, coupled with artificial intelligence-driven in silico design, are propelling the development of the first synthetic plants. By integrating reductionist and systems approaches, researchers are not only reimagining plants as sources of food, fiber, and fuel but also as 'environmental thermostats' capable of mitigating the impacts of a changing climate.
affiliations: Plant Molecular and Cellular Biology Laboratory, The Salk Institute for Biological Studies, La Jolla, CA, 92037-100210, USA.

translated_keywords: 营养免疫；植物防御；先天免疫；金属转运；金属稳态
translated_abstract: 了解植物如何抵御入侵微生物对于全球许多地区的粮食安全和经济至关重要。因此，人们持续且专注地致力于揭示植物如何保护自己免受微生物侵害。已经阐明了主要防御激素信号通路，确定了许多触发免疫反应分子及其受体的身份，并正在研究病原体-宿主间的军备竞赛机制。近年来，有证据表明植物先天免疫中存在一层新的机制，涉及过渡金属的作用。这将植物金属营养与植物免疫反应联系起来，并为利用金属肥料而非农药进行病原体控制开辟了可能的新策略。本文综述了我们目前对金属介导的植物免疫反应的理解，并指出了未来研究该主题的方向。
authors: De Aishee; Hoang Cuong V; Escudero Viviana; Armas Alejandro M; Echavarri-Erasun Carlos; González-Guerrero Manuel; Jordá Lucía
title: Combating plant diseases through transition metal allocation.
keywords: nutritional immunity; plant defense; innate immunity; metal transport; metal homeostasis
translated_title: 通过过渡金属分配对抗植物病害
abstract: Understanding how plants fend-off invading microbes is essential for food security and the economy of large parts of the world. Consequently, a sustained and dedicated effort has been directed at unveiling how plants protect themselves from invading microbes. Major defense hormone signaling pathways have been characterized, the identity of many immune response-triggering molecules as well as many of their receptors have been determined, and the mechanisms of pathogen-host arms race are being studied. In recent years, evidence for a new layer of plant innate immunity involving transition metals has been brought forward. This would link plant metal nutrition with plant immune responses and open up possible new strategies for pathogen control involving metal fertilizers instead of pesticides. In this review, we outline our current understanding of metal-mediated plant immune response and indicate the future avenues of exploration of this topic.
affiliations: Centro de Biotecnología y Genómica de Plantas (UPM-INIA/CSIC), Universidad Politécnica de Madrid-Instituto Nacional de Investigación y Tecnología Agraria y Alimentaria (INIA)/Consejo Superior de Investigaciones Científicas (CSIC), 28223, Pozuelo de Alarcón (Madrid), Spain.; Departamento de Biotecnología-Biología Vegetal, Escuela Técnica Superior de Ingeniería Agronómica, Alimentaria y de Biosistemas, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid, 28040, Madrid, Spain.

translated_keywords: 植物含水量；酚类物质；热学性质；蜡质；生物物理；生物力学；植物光保护；植物角质层
translated_abstract: 植物表皮位于植物与环境的交界面，因此作为保护屏障，抵御生物和非生物的外部胁迫因子，并调节水分流失。此外，它还调节来自内部组织以及环境的机械应力。本文综述了对表皮含水量、机械性能、热学特性以及在较小程度上光学和电学特性的最新理解进展，以及这些特性的现象学关联和关系。基于不同生物物理属性相互作用而达到的平衡对于确保植物生长发育至关重要。表皮几何结构、表面形貌和微化学性质的显著变异性影响了对其某些生物物理特性的分析。本综述旨在提供关于植物表皮的更新视角，将其视为细胞壁的一种修饰形式，以确立植物表皮的现代生物物理学状态，并为该领域的未来研究提供灵感。
authors: Heredia Antonio; Benítez José J; González Moreno Ana; Domínguez Eva
title: Revisiting plant cuticle biophysics.
keywords: plant hydration; phenolics; thermal properties; waxes; biophysics; biomechanics; plant photoprotection; plant cuticle
translated_title: 重新审视植物角质层生物物理学
abstract: The plant cuticle is located at the interface of the plant with the environment, thus acting as a protective barrier against biotic and abiotic external stress factors, and regulating water loss. Additionally, it modulates mechanical stresses derived from internal tissues and also from the environment. Recent advances in the understanding of the hydric, mechanical, thermal, and, to a lower extent, optical and electric properties of the cuticle, as well as their phenomenological connections and relationships are reviewed. An equilibrium based on the interaction among the different biophysical properties is essential to ensure plant growth and development. The notable variability reported in cuticle geometry, surface topography, and microchemistry affects the analysis of some biophysical properties of the cuticle. This review aimed to provide an updated view of the plant cuticle, understood as a modification of the cell wall, in order to establish the state-of-the-art biophysics of the plant cuticle, and to serve as an inspiration for future research in the field.
affiliations: Departamento de Biología Molecular y Bioquímica, Instituto de Hortofruticultura Subtropical y Mediterránea "La Mayora", Universidad de Málaga-Consejo Superior de Investigaciones Científicas, Universidad de Málaga, E-29010, Málaga, Spain.; Instituto de Ciencia de Materiales de Sevilla, Centro Mixto Consejo Superior de Investigaciones Científicas-Universidad de Sevilla, E-41092, Seville, Spain.; Departamento de Mejora Genética y Biotecnología, Estación Experimental La Mayora, Instituto de Hortofruticultura Subtropical y Mediterránea "La Mayora", Universidad de Málaga-Consejo Superior de Investigaciones Científicas, E-29750, Málaga, Spain.

translated_keywords: 单线态氧；脂质过氧化；氧化修饰；活性氧（ROS）；光系统Ⅱ修复；逆行信号；叶绿体
translated_abstract: 固着植物通过线粒体和叶绿体感知并适应多样的环境刺激。这些复杂的过程涉及关键信号分子的生成，包括活性氧（ROS）、植物激素、挥发物以及多种代谢产物。此外，通过激活或失活对叶绿体蛋白进行特异性调控，显著增强了植物与动态环境相互作用的能力。尽管已有综述广泛探讨了质体逆行模块在发育和光信号中的作用，但我们的研究重点在于探究叶绿体如何利用光合ROS来应对环境波动并对抗氧化胁迫，从而维持初级代谢。揭示光合ROS与植物胁迫响应之间的微妙相互作用，有望带来新的见解，以增强抗逆性和优化净光合速率。本研究旨在为在不断变化的环境条件下提高植物韧性和农业生产力提供创新策略铺平道路。
authors: Lee Keun Pyo; Kim Chanhong
title: Photosynthetic ROS and retrograde signaling pathways.
keywords: singlet oxygen; lipid peroxidation; oxidative modification; ROS; PSII repair; retrograde signaling; chloroplast
translated_title: 光合作用产生的活性氧（ROS）与逆行信号通路
abstract: Sessile plants harness mitochondria and chloroplasts to sense and adapt to diverse environmental stimuli. These complex processes involve the generation of pivotal signaling molecules, including reactive oxygen species (ROS), phytohormones, volatiles, and diverse metabolites. Furthermore, the specific modulation of chloroplast proteins, through activation or deactivation, significantly enhances the plant's capacity to engage with its dynamic surroundings. While existing reviews have extensively covered the role of plastidial retrograde modules in developmental and light signaling, our focus lies in investigating how chloroplasts leverage photosynthetic ROS to navigate environmental fluctuations and counteract oxidative stress, thereby sustaining primary metabolism. Unraveling the nuanced interplay between photosynthetic ROS and plant stress responses holds promise for uncovering new insights that could reinforce stress resistance and optimize net photosynthesis rates. This exploration aspires to pave the way for innovative strategies to enhance plant resilience and agricultural productivity amidst changing environmental conditions.
affiliations: Shanghai Center for Plant Stress Biology, CAS Center for Excellence in Molecular Plant Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences, 200032, Shanghai, China.; University of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, 100049, Beijing, China.

translated_keywords: 植物；真菌类病毒；核酶；类病毒；RNA世界；线粒体类病毒；核酶环状体组；类病毒
translated_abstract: 植物相关微生物的功能相关性在整体生物体（holobiont）概念的理论框架内得到了阐述。病毒在植物整体生物体中的作用正被逐渐认识，这既包括其直接寄主于植物时的影响（隐秘植物病毒），也包括其通过三向互作感染与植物相关的微生物时的间接影响（如真菌病毒和噬菌体）。我们认为，类病毒——这些通常仅感染植物宿主的最小传染因子，也必须纳入植物整体生物体的研究范畴。同样地，最近发现的大量感染其他生命王国宿主且与植物密切相关的类病毒元件也应被纳入研究。本文还深入描述了这些类病毒元件的多样性及其在与植物相关的真菌中的初步功能特征。
authors: Navarro Beatriz; Turina Massimo
title: Viroid and viroid-like elements in plants and plant-associated microbiota: a new layer of biodiversity for plant holobionts.
keywords: plant; mycoviroid; ribozymes; ambiviruses; RNA world; mitoviruses; ribozycirculome; viroid
translated_title: 植物整体生物体生物多样性的一个新层次。
abstract: The functional relevance of plant-associated microorganisms is theoretically framed within the holobiont concept. The role of viruses in plant holobionts is being recognized both for their direct effects when hosted in plants (cryptic plant viruses) and for their indirect effects when infecting microorganisms associated with plants in tripartite interactions (e.g. mycoviruses and bacteriophages). We argue that viroids, the smallest infectious agents typically infecting only plant hosts, must also be included in plant holobiont studies. The same applies to the recently discovered large number of viroid-like elements infecting hosts of other life kingdoms that are closely associated with plants. Here we also describe in depth the diversity of such viroid-like elements and their initial functional characterization in plant-associated fungi.
affiliations: Institute for Sustainable Plant Protection-Bari, National Research Council of Italy, 70126, Bari, Italy.; Institute for Sustainable Plant Protection-URT Brescia, National Research Council of Italy, 25123, Brescia, Italy.; Department of Plant Protection, School of Agriculture, The University of Jordan, Amman, 11942, Jordan.

translated_keywords: 重新编程；根系分泌物；招募；植物健康；植物生长促进根际细菌（PGPR）
translated_abstract: 根际微生物组在植物生长和健康方面发挥着重要作用，对农业的可持续发展具有重要意义。植物通过招募和组装根际微生物组来满足其功能需求，这一过程被广泛认为是“求救信号”理论，但其内在机制仍存在局限性。本研究揭示了一种新的机制，即除了从头招募土壤微生物外，植物还能重新编程已定居根际细菌的功能表达，以满足植物不同生长阶段的功能需求。这可能是一种高效且低成本的策略，并对根际微生物组招募理论进行了重要扩展。研究发现，植物通过根系分泌物的动态变化，在植物发育的不同阶段，调控了两种模式根际细菌枯草芽孢杆菌SQR9和绿假单胞菌CHA0与生物控制及植物生长促进相关的基因表达。通过高通量qPCR技术，鉴定出16种关键化学物质显著调节根际细菌的功能基因表达。本研究不仅深化了我们对植物-根际微生物组互作的理解，还为调节和平衡根际微生物组的不同功能表达提供了新策略，从而改善植物健康和生长。
authors: Feng Haichao; Fu Ruixin; Luo Jiayu; Hou Xueqin; Gao Kun; Su Lv; Xu Yu; Miao Youzhi; Liu Yunpeng; Xu Zhihui; Zhang Nan; Shen Qirong; Xun Weibing; Zhang Ruifu
title: Listening to plant's Esperanto via root exudates: reprogramming the functional expression of plant growth-promoting rhizobacteria.
keywords: reprogramming; root exudates; recruitment; plant health; plant growth-promoting rhizobacterium (PGPR)
translated_title: 重新编程植物促生根际细菌的功能表达。
abstract: Rhizomicrobiome plays important roles in plant growth and health, contributing to the sustainable development of agriculture. Plants recruit and assemble the rhizomicrobiome to satisfy their functional requirements, which is widely recognized as the 'cry for help' theory, but the intrinsic mechanisms are still limited. In this study, we revealed a novel mechanism by which plants reprogram the functional expression of inhabited rhizobacteria, in addition to the de novo recruitment of soil microbes, to satisfy different functional requirements as plants grow. This might be an efficient and low-cost strategy and a substantial extension to the rhizomicrobiome recruitment theory. We found that the plant regulated the sequential expression of genes related to biocontrol and plant growth promotion in two well-studied rhizobacteria Bacillus velezensis SQR9 and Pseudomonas protegens CHA0 through root exudate succession across the plant developmental stages. Sixteen key chemicals in root exudates were identified to significantly regulate the rhizobacterial functional gene expression by high-throughput qPCR. This study not only deepens our understanding of the interaction between the plant-rhizosphere microbiome, but also provides a novel strategy to regulate and balance the different functional expression of the rhizomicrobiome to improve plant health and growth.
affiliations: Jiangsu Provincial Key Lab of Solid Organic Waste Utilization, Jiangsu Collaborative Innovation Center of Solid Organic Wastes, Nanjing Agricultural University, Nanjing, 210095, China.; College of Agriculture, Henan University, Zhengzhou, 450046, China.; School of Biology and Food, Shangqiu Normal University, Shangqiu, 476000, China.; State Key Laboratory of Efficient Utilization of Arid and Semi-arid Arable Land in Northern China, Institute of Agricultural Resources and Regional Planning, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Beijing, 100081, China.; Hebei Key Laboratory of Soil Ecology, Center for Agricultural Resources Research, Institute of Genetics and Developmental Biology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, 286 Huaizhong Road, Yuhua District, Shijiazhuang, 050021, China.

translated_keywords: 不一致；不完全谱系分选；竞争；群落组装；微生物生态学；系统基因组学
translated_abstract: 进化过程可能对群落组装产生重大影响，但关于系统发育亲缘关系作为种间相互作用强度决定因素的证据仍然不一。本文从一个新的视角出发，探讨了基因树与物种树之间的不一致性在群落生态学研究中解释系统发育信号时可能扮演的角色。现代基因组数据显示，许多分类群的进化历史比单一物种树更能由沿基因组分布的片段化历史所描述。如果基因组的一部分位点携带了与性状相关的遗传变异，则这些位点上的系统发育可能比整个基因组背景更能反映种间性状差异。我们提出了一种简单的方法来检测携带系统发育信号的位点，并通过青霉菌（Penicillium）基因组和种间相互作用强度的原理验证分析展示了该方法的应用。结果表明，可能被全基因组掩盖的系统发育信号可以通过系统基因组学技术检测到，从而为理解种间相互作用的遗传基础提供了一个窗口。
authors: Louw Nicolas L; Wolfe Benjamin E; Uricchio Lawrence H
title: A phylogenomic perspective on interspecific competition.
keywords: discordance; incomplete lineage sorting; competition; community assembly; microbial ecology; phylogenomics
translated_title: 基于系统基因组学的种间竞争视角
abstract: Evolutionary processes may have substantial impacts on community assembly, but evidence for phylogenetic relatedness as a determinant of interspecific interaction strength remains mixed. In this perspective, we consider a possible role for discordance between gene trees and species trees in the interpretation of phylogenetic signal in studies of community ecology. Modern genomic data show that the evolutionary histories of many taxa are better described by a patchwork of histories that vary along the genome rather than a single species tree. If a subset of genomic loci harbour trait-related genetic variation, then the phylogeny at these loci may be more informative of interspecific trait differences than the genome background. We develop a simple method to detect loci harbouring phylogenetic signal and demonstrate its application through a proof-of-principle analysis of Penicillium genomes and pairwise interaction strength. Our results show that phylogenetic signal that may be masked genome-wide could be detectable using phylogenomic techniques and may provide a window into the genetic basis for interspecific interactions.
affiliations: Department of Biology, Tufts University, Medford, Massachusetts, USA.

translated_keywords: 铬；重金属毒性；基因操作；解毒；植物耐性；植物修复
translated_abstract: 铬（Cr）是一种重金属，对生态系统包括植物构成了严重威胁。铬因其对许多生理和代谢途径的影响而对植物具有很强的危害性，最终导致植物生长发育受阻以及养分吸收能力下降。植物通过生理、生化和分子机制来抵御铬胁迫，例如增强抗氧化潜力以减少活性氧（ROS）的积累。一些基因已被发现对植物抵御铬胁迫起重要作用，如与植物络合素、金属硫蛋白激活相关的基因以及谷胱甘肽-S-转移酶等酶相关基因。此外，一些微小RNA（miRNAs）也被发现参与缓解铬胁迫，并通过调控转录因子、热休克蛋白（HSPs）以及某些蛋白质和激素的表达来提高植物耐受性。这些防御途径相关基因和miRNAs被用于培育转基因植物修复系统。转基因植物不仅对铬具有更高的耐受性，还能作为超富集植物，具有修复其他重金属污染的潜力。本文综述了环境铬污染、铬对植物的影响、参与缓解铬胁迫的不同基因和miRNAs，以及利用候选基因和miRNAs构建转基因植物修复系统的应用，同时探讨了CRISPR技术的应用。预计未来几年，组学方法和先进基因组学的整合将为更有效的植物铬修复提供新的机遇。
authors: Jobby Renitta; Sarkar Mrittika; Bose Roshnee; Srivastava Sudhakar; Suprasanna Penna
title: Chromiomics: Chromium detoxification and approaches for engineering tolerance in plants.
keywords: Chromium; Heavy metal toxicity; Genetic manipulation; Detoxification; Plant tolerance; Phytoremediation
translated_title: 植物铬解毒与耐性工程策略
abstract: Chromium (Cr) is a heavy metal that poses a grave threat to the ecosystem including plants. Chromium is very harmful to plants due to its effects on many physiological and metabolic pathways culminating in a negative impact on plant's growth, development, and ability to take up nutrients. Plants have developed physiological, biochemical, and molecular ways of defense against Cr, such as by augmenting antioxidant potential to reduce reactive oxygen species (ROS). A number of genes have been discovered to play a significant role in the defense mechanisms of plants against Cr, for example, genes associated with the activation of phytochelatins, metallothioneins, and those of enzymes like glutathione-S-transferases. Along with this, a few miRNAs have been found to be associated in alleviating Cr stress and, to augment plant tolerance by controlling transcription factors, HSPs, and the expression of a few proteins and hormones. Defense pathway genes and miRNAs have been used for the generation of transgenic phytoremediator plants. Not only do the transgenic plants have a higher tolerance to Cr, but they also act as hyperaccumulators for Cr and have the potential to remediate other heavy metals. This article describes about environmental Cr contamination, Cr effects on plants, different genes and miRNAs involved in Cr stress mitigation and use of candidate genes, microRNAs for creating transgenic plant systems for phytoremediation, and the applications of CRISPR technology. It is expected that the integration of omics approach and advanced genomics will offer scope for more effective phytoremediation of Chromium in the coming years.
affiliations: Amity Institute of Biotechnology, Amity University, Maharashtra - Pune Expressway, Bhatan, Panvel, Maharashtra 410206, India; Amity Centre of Excellence in Astrobiology, Amity University Maharashtra - Pune Expressway, Bhatan, Panvel, Mumbai, Maharashtra 410206, India.; Amity Institute of Biotechnology, Amity University, Maharashtra - Pune Expressway, Bhatan, Panvel, Maharashtra 410206, India.; Institute of Environment & Sustainable Development, Banaras Hindu University, Varanasi-221005, India.; Amity Institute of Biotechnology, Amity University, Maharashtra - Pune Expressway, Bhatan, Panvel, Maharashtra 410206, India; Amity Centre for Nuclear Biotechnology, Amity University, Maharashtra - Pune Expressway, Bhatan, Panvel, Maharashtra 410206, India. translated_keywords: 基因组背景；生物信息学；基因组可视化；微生物基因组学；基因邻居；功能注释
translated_abstract: //annoview.uwaterloo.ca访问。
authors: Wei Xin; Tan Huagang; Lobb Briallen; Zhen William; Wu Zijing; Parks Donovan H; Neufeld Josh D; Moreno-Hagelsieb Gabriel; Doxey Andrew C
title: AnnoView enables large-scale analysis, comparison, and visualization of microbial gene neighborhoods.
keywords: genomic context; bioinformatics; genome visualization; microbial genomics; gene neighborhoods; functional annotation
translated_title: AnnoView 支持对微生物基因组邻域进行大规模分析、比较和可视化。
abstract: The analysis and comparison of gene neighborhoods is a powerful approach for exploring microbial genome structure, function, and evolution. Although numerous tools exist for genome visualization and comparison, genome exploration across large genomic databases or user-generated datasets remains a challenge. Here, we introduce AnnoView, a web server designed for interactive exploration of gene neighborhoods across the bacterial and archaeal tree of life. Our server offers users the ability to identify, compare, and visualize gene neighborhoods of interest from 30 238 bacterial genomes and 1672 archaeal genomes, through integration with the comprehensive Genome Taxonomy Database and AnnoTree databases. Identified gene neighborhoods can be visualized using pre-computed functional annotations from different sources such as KEGG, Pfam and TIGRFAM, or clustered based on similarity. Alternatively, users can upload and explore their own custom genomic datasets in GBK, GFF or CSV format, or use AnnoView as a genome browser for relatively small genomes (e.g. viruses and plasmids). Ultimately, we anticipate that AnnoView will catalyze biological discovery by enabling user-friendly search, comparison, and visualization of genomic data. AnnoView is available at http://annoview.uwaterloo.ca.
affiliations: Department of Biology and Waterloo Centre for Microbial Research, University of Waterloo, 200 University Avenue West, Waterloo, ON N2L 3G1, Canada.; Australian Centre for Ecogenomics, School of Chemistry and Molecular Biosciences, University of Queensland, St Lucia, QLD 4072, Brisbane, Australia.; Department of Biology, Wilfrid Laurier University, 75 University Avenue West, Waterloo, ON, Canada.

translated_keywords: 参考基因组序列；精准医学；遗传多样性；泛基因组；端粒到端粒
journal: Annual review of genomics and human genetics
journal_full_name: Annual Review of Genomics and Human Genetics
translated_abstract: 一是无缺口的人类全基因组序列，例如由端粒到端粒联盟开发的序列；二是高质量的泛基因组，例如由人类泛基因组参考联盟开发的序列。长读长DNA测序技术和基因组组装算法的进步促进了这些成果的实现，完整的全基因组序列解决了历史上难以测序的区域，包括着丝粒、端粒和片段重复。同时，泛基因组捕获了全球范围内广泛的人类遗传多样性。这些进展共同开启了基因组研究的新时代，提高了基因组分析的准确性，为精准医学铺平了道路，并加深了对人类生物学的理解。
authors: Taylor Dylan J; Eizenga Jordan M; Li Qiuhui; Das Arun; Jenike Katharine M; Kenny Eimear E; Miga Karen H; Monlong Jean; McCoy Rajiv C; Paten Benedict; Schatz Michael C
title: Beyond the Human Genome Project: The Age of Complete Human Genome Sequences and Pangenome References.
keywords: reference genome sequence; precision medicine; genetic diversity; pangenome; telomere-to-telomere
translated_title: 完整人类基因组序列与泛基因组参考的时代
abstract: The Human Genome Project was an enormous accomplishment, providing a foundation for countless explorations into the genetics and genomics of the human species. Yet for many years, the human genome reference sequence remained incomplete and lacked representation of human genetic diversity. Recently, two major advances have emerged to address these shortcomings: complete gap-free human genome sequences, such as the one developed by the Telomere-to-Telomere Consortium, and high-quality pangenomes, such as the one developed by the Human Pangenome Reference Consortium. Facilitated by advances in long-read DNA sequencing and genome assembly algorithms, complete human genome sequences resolve regions that have been historically difficult to sequence, including centromeres, telomeres, and segmental duplications. In parallel, pangenomes capture the extensive genetic diversity across populations worldwide. Together, these advances usher in a new era of genomics research, enhancing the accuracy of genomic analysis, paving the path for precision medicine, and contributing to deeper insights into human biology.
affiliations: Department of Biology, Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, Maryland, USA; email: dtaylo95@jhu.edu, rajiv.mccoy@jhu.edu, mschatz@cs.jhu.edu.; Genomics Institute, University of California, Santa Cruz, California, USA; email: jeizenga@ucsc.edu, khmiga@ucsc.edu, bpaten@ucsc.edu.; Department of Computer Science, Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, Maryland, USA; email: qli111@jh.edu, arun.das@jhu.edu.; Department of Genetic Medicine, Johns Hopkins University School of Medicine, Baltimore, Maryland, USA; email: kjenike1@jh.edu.; Institute for Genomic Health, Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai, New York, NY, USA; email: eimear.kenny@mssm.edu.; Department of Biomolecular Engineering, University of California, Santa Cruz, California, USA.; Institut de Recherche en Santé Digestive, Université de Toulouse, INSERM, INRA, ENVT, UPS, Toulouse, France; email: jean.monlong@inserm.fr.

translated_keywords: 表观遗传时钟;植物;DNA甲基化;衰老;昼夜节律;表观遗传变化;生物进化;分子生物学;生物信息学
translated_abstract: 24小时）、植物衰老（时间尺度：数周至数世纪）以及植物谱系进化（时间尺度：数十年至数千年）相关的表观遗传变化表现出类似时钟的特性。本文首次对这些不同类型的表观遗传时钟进行分类，概述其主要特征，并探讨其生物学基础。
authors: Vo Binh Thanh; Mas Paloma; Johannes Frank
title: Time's up: Epigenetic clocks in plants.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 表观遗传时钟;植物;DNA甲基化;衰老;昼夜节律;表观遗传变化;生物进化;分子生物学;生物信息学
translated_title: 植物的表观遗传时钟。
abstract: For over a decade, the animal field has led the way in using DNA methylation measurements to construct epigenetic clocks of aging. These clocks can predict organismal age with a level of accuracy that surpasses any other molecular proxy known to date. Evidence is finally emerging that epigenetic clocks also exist in plants. However, these clocks appear to differ from those in animals in some key aspects, including in their ability to measure time beyond the life span of an individual. Clock-like epigenetic changes can be found in plant circadian rhythms (scale: 24 h), during plant aging (scale: weeks/centuries), and across plant lineage evolution (scale: decades/millennia). Here, we provide a first classification of these different types of epigenetic clocks, highlight their main features, and discuss their biological basis.
affiliations: Plant Epigenomics, TUM School of Life Sciences, Technical University of Munich, 85354, Freising, Germany.; Centre for Research in Agricultural Genomics (CRAG), CSIC-IRTA-UAB-UB, Campus UAB, Bellaterra, 08193 Barcelona, Spain; Consejo Superior de Investigaciones Científicas (CSIC), 08028 Barcelona, Spain.; Plant Epigenomics, TUM School of Life Sciences, Technical University of Munich, 85354, Freising, Germany. Electronic address: f.johannes@tum.de.

translated_keywords: 植物天然产物;代谢工程;多组学;异源宿主系统;生物合成途径;系统整合;基因挖掘;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 植物天然产物（PNPs）在植物生理学中发挥着重要作用，并被广泛应用于人类社会的各个领域。研究这些化合物的生物合成途径不仅有助于揭示植物进化过程，还能通过代谢工程实现其可持续生产。然而，由于参与PNPs生物合成的酶种类繁多且传统基因挖掘方法存在局限性，PNP生物合成途径的发现仍面临挑战。本文综述了用于预测和表征PNP生物合成途径的最新策略及近期实例，包括基于多组学工具和异源宿主系统的应用，并分享了我们对整合多种生物信息学和生化方法的系统流程的观点。
authors: Han Jianing; Miller Emma Parker; Li Sijin
title: Cutting-edge plant natural product pathway elucidation.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 植物天然产物;代谢工程;多组学;异源宿主系统;生物合成途径;系统整合;基因挖掘;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 前沿植物天然产物代谢途径解析
abstract: Plant natural products (PNPs) play important roles in plant physiology and have been applied across diverse fields of human society. Understanding their biosynthetic pathways informs plant evolution and meanwhile enables sustainable production through metabolic engineering. However, the discovery of PNP biosynthetic pathways remains challenging due to the diversity of enzymes involved and limitations in traditional gene mining approaches. In this review, we will summarize state-of-the-art strategies and recent examples for predicting and characterizing PNP biosynthetic pathways, respectively, with multiomics-guided tools and heterologous host systems and share our perspectives on the systematic pipelines integrating these various bioinformatic and biochemical approaches.
affiliations: Robert F. Smith School of Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering, Cornell University, Ithaca, NY 14853, USA.; Plant Biology Section, School of Integrative Plant Science, Cornell University, Ithaca, NY 14853, USA.; Robert F. Smith School of Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering, Cornell University, Ithaca, NY 14853, USA. Electronic address: sijin.li@cornell.edu.

translated_keywords: 模式物种；全基因组；高通量测序；应用；草本植物基因组学；研究策略
translated_abstract: 基因组学的进步极大地加速了药用植物的研究，草本基因组学的发展推动了“千种药用植物基因组计划”，以破译其遗传密码。然而，由于多倍体和/或高基因组杂合性的普遍存在，获得高质量的全基因组仍然困难重重。截至2022年9月，已发表了123种药用植物的全基因组序列。本文综述了这些已发表的基因组序列，涵盖其分类、研究团队、倍性、药用功能以及测序策略。全球超过1000个研究所或大学以及50个国家正在开展药用植物基因组研究。二倍体物种占已测序药用植物的大多数，禾本科植物的全基因组研究最为广泛。近40%的已发表论文研究了具有补益、滋补及清热功效的物种。与作物相比，药用植物仍处于驯化阶段，因此其遗传背景不明确且缺乏纯系，这使得它们的基因组更难完成。此外，目前尚无针对药用植物获取高质量全基因组的明确常规框架。本文首次提出了一个清晰完整的策略，用于创建药用植物的高质量全基因组。同时，综述了基于全基因组的药用植物生物学研究，包括育种和次生代谢物合成。我们还倡导建立药用模式植物的研究平台，以促进药用植物基因组学研究。
authors: Pei Yifei; Leng Liang; Sun Wei; Liu Baocai; Feng Xue; Li Xiwen; Chen Shilin
title: Whole-genome sequencing in medicinal plants: current progress and prospect.
keywords: model species; whole genome; high throughput sequencing; application; herbgenomics; research strategy
translated_title: 现状与展望
abstract: Advancements in genomics have dramatically accelerated the research on medicinal plants, and the development of herbgenomics has promoted the "Project of 1K Medicinal Plant Genome" to decipher their genetic code. However, it is difficult to obtain their high-quality whole genomes because of the prevalence of polyploidy and/or high genomic heterozygosity. Whole genomes of 123 medicinal plants were published until September 2022. These published genome sequences were investigated in this review, covering their classification, research teams, ploidy, medicinal functions, and sequencing strategies. More than 1,000 institutes or universities around the world and 50 countries are conducting research on medicinal plant genomes. Diploid species account for a majority of sequenced medicinal plants. The whole genomes of plants in the Poaceae family are the most studied. Almost 40% of the published papers studied species with tonifying, replenishing, and heat-cleaning medicinal effects. Medicinal plants are still in the process of domestication as compared with crops, thereby resulting in unclear genetic backgrounds and the lack of pure lines, thus making their genomes more difficult to complete. In addition, there is still no clear routine framework for a medicinal plant to obtain a high-quality whole genome. Herein, a clear and complete strategy has been originally proposed for creating a high-quality whole genome of medicinal plants. Moreover, whole genome-based biological studies of medicinal plants, including breeding and biosynthesis, were reviewed. We also advocate that a research platform of model medicinal plants should be established to promote the genomics research of medicinal plants.
affiliations: Institute of Chinese Materia Medica, China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences, Beijing, 100700, China.; Institute of Herbgenomics, Chengdu University of Traditional Chinese Medicine, Chengdu, 611137, China.; Innovative Institute of Chinese Medicine and Pharmacy, Chengdu University of Traditional Chinese Medicine, Chengdu, 611137, China.; Institute of Agricultural Bioresource, Fujian Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Fuzhou, 350003, China.; Institute of Chinese Materia Medica, China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences, Beijing, 100700, China. xwli@icmm.ac.cn.; Institute of Herbgenomics, Chengdu University of Traditional Chinese Medicine, Chengdu, 611137, China. slchen@icmm.ac.cn.; Innovative Institute of Chinese Medicine and Pharmacy, Chengdu University of Traditional Chinese Medicine, Chengdu, 611137, China. slchen@icmm.ac.cn.

translated_keywords: 《名古屋议定书》；获取与惠益分享；科技政策；生物多样性；人类；公平性；《生物多样性公约》；基因组学；遗传资源
journal: Annual review of genomics and human genetics
journal_full_name: Annual Review of Genomics and Human Genetics
translated_abstract: 人类研究负责任行为的伦理标准已经取得了长足的进步，然而，在人类遗传学和基因组学研究中公平性问题仍然令人担忧。解决这些担忧将有助于社会充分实现人类基因组研究的潜力。一个突出的问题是如何公平合理地分享从人类受试者研究中获得的利益。一些国际机构已认识到利益共享可以成为一种有效的伦理研究工具，但《生物多样性公约》及其关于获取与惠益分享的《名古屋议定书》等国际法律明确排除了人类遗传和基因组资源。如果在人类基因组学研究中应用类似原则，则必须考虑并预见这些协议所面临的重大挑战。我们提出，人类基因组研究中的利益共享可以是一种自下而上的努力，并嵌入到现有的研究过程中。我们建议制定“设计中的利益共享”框架，以解决在使用人类基因组资源和样本时公平性和公正性方面的担忧，并借鉴《名古屋议定书》的期望和十年实施经验。
authors: Mc Cartney Ann M; Scholz Amber Hartman; Groussin Mathieu; Staunton Ciara
title: Benefit-Sharing by Design: A Call to Action for Human Genomics Research.
keywords: Nagoya Protocol; access and benefit-sharing; science policy; biodiversity; human; equity; Convention on Biological Diversity; genomics; genetic resources
translated_title: 人类基因组研究的行动呼吁
abstract: The ethical standards for the responsible conduct of human research have come a long way; however, concerns surrounding equity remain in human genetics and genomics research. Addressing these concerns will help society realize the full potential of human genomics research. One outstanding concern is the fair and equitable sharing of benefits from research on human participants. Several international bodies have recognized that benefit-sharing can be an effective tool for ethical research conduct, but international laws, including the Convention on Biological Diversity and its Nagoya Protocol on Access and Benefit-Sharing, explicitly exclude human genetic and genomic resources. These agreements face significant challenges that must be considered and anticipated if similar principles are applied in human genomics research. We propose that benefit-sharing from human genomics research can be a bottom-up effort and embedded into the existing research process. We propose the development of a "benefit-sharing by design" framework to address concerns of fairness and equity in the use of human genomic resources and samples and to learn from the aspirations and decade of implementation of the Nagoya Protocol.
affiliations: Genomics Institute, University of California, Santa Cruz, California, USA; email: anmmccar@ucsc.edu.; Department of Science Policy and Internationalisation, Leibniz Institute DSMZ-German Collection of Microorganisms and Cell Cultures, Braunschweig, Germany; email: amber.h.scholz@dsmz.de.; Institute of Clinical Molecular Biology, Kiel University, Kiel, Germany; email: m.groussin@ikmb.uni-kiel.de.; School of Law, University of KwaZulu-Natal, Durban, South Africa.; Institute for Biomedicine, Eurac Research, Bolzano, Italy; email: ciara.staunton@eurac.edu.

translated_keywords: 基因组育种；鱼类基因组学；经济性状；基因组选择；基因组编辑
translated_abstract: 水产养殖是全球食品生产增长最快的领域，已成为全球粮食供应的重要组成部分。中国在产量方面拥有世界上最大的水产养殖业。然而，种质退化和疾病爆发等问题阻碍了鱼类养殖的可持续发展。基于基因组信息和基因型-表型关系的基因组育种实践，在提高水产养殖效率方面具有巨大潜力。2014年，中国半滑舌鳎基因组测序与注释工作的完成标志着中国鱼类基因组学时代的开端。自那时起，国内研究人员在功能基因组学研究方面取得了显著进展。截至目前，中国已组装并注释了60多种鱼类的基因组。基于这些参考基因组，进化、比较和功能基因组学研究彻底改变了我们对鱼类众多生物学和经济重要性状的理解，包括生长发育、性别决定、抗病性、变态和色素沉着等。此外，单核苷酸多态性（SNP）芯片、基因组选择和基因编辑等基因组工具和育种技术通过将功能基因组信息整合到育种活动中，极大地加速了遗传改良进程。本文旨在总结中国鱼类基因组资源、重要性状的基因组研究以及基因组育种技术的现状、进展和展望。该综述将为水产养殖研究人员、鱼类育种者和养殖户提供有关鱼类基因组研究和育种技术的最新信息，有助于促进生产性状的遗传改良，从而支持鱼类养殖的可持续发展。
authors: Zhou Qian; Wang Jialin; Li Jiongtang; Chen Zhangfan; Wang Na; Li Ming; Wang Lei; Si Yufeng; Lu Sheng; Cui Zhongkai; Liu Xuhui; Chen Songlin
title: Decoding the fish genome opens a new era in important trait research and molecular breeding in China.
keywords: genomic breeding; fish genomics; economic traits; genomic selection; genome editing
translated_title: 破译鱼类基因组开启中国重要性状研究与分子育种的新纪元。
abstract: Aquaculture represents the fastest-growing global food production sector, as it has become an essential component of the global food supply. China has the world's largest aquaculture industry in terms of production volume. However, the sustainable development of fish culture is hindered by several concerns, including germplasm degradation and disease outbreaks. The practice of genomic breeding, which relies heavily on genome information and genotypephenotype relationships, has significant potential for increasing the efficiency of aquaculture production. In 2014, the completion of the genome sequencing and annotation of the Chinese tongue sole signified the beginning of the fish genomics era in China. Since then, domestic researchers have made dramatic progress in functional genomic studies. To date, the genomes of more than 60 species of fish in China have been assembled and annotated. Based on these reference genomes, evolutionary, comparative, and functional genomic studies have revolutionized our understanding of a wide range of biologically and economically important traits of fishes, including growth and development, sex determination, disease resistance, metamorphosis, and pigmentation. Furthermore, genomic tools and breeding techniques such as SNP arrays, genomic selection, and genome editing have greatly accelerated genetic improvement through the incorporation of functional genomic information into breeding activities. This review aims to summarize the current status, advances, and perspectives of the genome resources, genomic study of important traits, and genomic breeding techniques of fish in China. The review will provide aquaculture researchers, fish breeders, and farmers with updated information concerning fish genomic research and breeding technology. The summary will help to promote the genetic improvement of production traits and thus will support the sustainable development of fish aquaculture.
affiliations: State Key Laboratory of Mariculture Biobreeding and Sustainable Goods, Yellow Sea Fisheries Research Institute, Chinese Academy of Fishery Sciences, Qingdao, Shandong, 266071, China.; Laboratory for Marine Fisheries Science and Food Production Processes, Qingdao Marine Science and Technology Center, Qingdao, Shandong, 266237, China.; Key Laboratory of Aquatic Genomics, Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, Beijing Key Laboratory of Fishery Biotechnology, Chinese Academy of Fishery Sciences, Beijing, 100041, China.; State Key Laboratory of Mariculture Biobreeding and Sustainable Goods, Yellow Sea Fisheries Research Institute, Chinese Academy of Fishery Sciences, Qingdao, Shandong, 266071, China. chensl@ysfri.ac.cn.; Laboratory for Marine Fisheries Science and Food Production Processes, Qingdao Marine Science and Technology Center, Qingdao, Shandong, 266237, China. chensl@ysfri.ac.cn.

translated_keywords: 进化；同源交换；重组；基因组；异源多倍体；表型新特征；表观基因组
translated_abstract: 异源多倍体是由不同进化谱系间的杂交与基因组加倍共同作用产生的。同源染色体（具有共同祖先的染色体）在异源多倍体形成后可能立即发生重组，并在随后的世代中持续进行。这种减数分裂配对行为的结果是动态且复杂的。同源交换（HEs）可能导致不平衡的配子形成、生育力下降以及选择劣势。然而，从另一方面来看，同源交换可以作为新的进化基质的来源，改变亲本基因拷贝的相对剂量，产生新的表型多样性，并有助于新异源多倍体的建立。然而，同源交换模式在不同谱系间、跨世代甚至在个体基因组和染色体内部均存在差异。尽管过去十年对该进化现象的兴趣有所增加，但其变异的原因和后果尚未完全明了。近期技术的进步显示出揭示同源交换机制基础的潜力。本文描述了异源多倍体被子植物谱系中的常见模式、潜在的基因组和表观基因组特征以及同源交换的后果。我们识别了关键的研究空白，并讨论了未来研究方向，这些方向对理解异源多倍体进化及其在多倍体作物重要表型性状开发中的应用具有深远意义。
authors: Deb Sontosh K; Edger Patrick P; Pires J Chris; McKain Michael R
title: Patterns, mechanisms, and consequences of homoeologous exchange in allopolyploid angiosperms: a genomic and epigenomic perspective.
keywords: evolution; homoeologous exchange; recombination; genomic; allopolyploidy; phenotypic novelty; epigenomic
translated_title: 基因组与表观基因组视角
abstract: Allopolyploids result from hybridization between different evolutionary lineages coupled with genome doubling. Homoeologous chromosomes (chromosomes with common shared ancestry) may undergo recombination immediately after allopolyploid formation and continue over successive generations. The outcome of this meiotic pairing behavior is dynamic and complex. Homoeologous exchanges (HEs) may lead to the formation of unbalanced gametes, reduced fertility, and selective disadvantage. By contrast, HEs could act as sources of novel evolutionary substrates, shifting the relative dosage of parental gene copies, generating novel phenotypic diversity, and helping the establishment of neo-allopolyploids. However, HE patterns vary among lineages, across generations, and even within individual genomes and chromosomes. The causes and consequences of this variation are not fully understood, though interest in this evolutionary phenomenon has increased in the last decade. Recent technological advances show promise in uncovering the mechanistic basis of HEs. Here, we describe recent observations of the common patterns among allopolyploid angiosperm lineages, underlying genomic and epigenomic features, and consequences of HEs. We identify critical research gaps and discuss future directions with far-reaching implications in understanding allopolyploid evolution and applying them to the development of important phenotypic traits of polyploid crops.
affiliations: Department of Biological Sciences, The University of Alabama, Tuscaloosa, AL, 35487, USA.; Department of Forestry and Environmental Science, Shahjalal University of Science and Technology, Sylhet, 3114, Bangladesh.; Department of Horticulture, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, 48823, USA.; Genetics and Genome Sciences Program, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, 48823, USA.; Department of Soil and Crop Sciences, Colorado State University, Fort Collins, CO, 80523, USA.

translated_keywords: 血管防御；活性氧物种；呼吸爆发氧化酶同源物（RBOHs）；NADPH氧化酶；植物免疫
translated_abstract: 活性氧（reactive oxygen species, ROS）是一类高反应性的含氧衍生物的总称，包括单线态氧、羟基自由基、超氧阴离子和过氧化氢等。在植物中，ROS 可在细胞壁、叶绿体、线粒体和过氧化物体中产生。尽管当 ROS 水平超过某一阈值时会对植物产生毒性作用，但低浓度的 ROS 可作为植物生长发育以及植物响应非生物和生物胁迫的重要信号分子。关于 ROS 在植物中的作用已有诸多综述进行过讨论。本文首先总结了细胞壁 ROS 信号转导调控机制的研究进展，随后提出其在植物抵御维管束病原菌方面的潜在功能，以期为植物维管束病害的防控提供新的思路。
authors: Wang Ran; Li Jianwei; Liang Yan
title: Role of ROS signaling in the plant defense against vascular pathogens.
keywords: Vascular defense; Reactive oxygen species; Respiratory burst oxidase homologs (RBOHs); NADPH oxidase; Plant immunity
translated_title: 活性氧信号在植物对抗维管束病原体防御中的作用
abstract: Reactive oxygen species (ROS) is a collective term for highly reactive oxygen derivatives, including singlet oxygen, hydroxyl radicals, superoxide anions, and hydrogen peroxide. In plants, ROS are produced in apoplasts, chloroplasts, mitochondria, and peroxisomes. Although ROS are toxic when their levels exceed a certain threshold, low-concentration ROS can serve as essential signaling molecules for plant growth and development, as well as plant responses to abiotic and biotic stresses. Various aspects of the role of ROS in plants have been discussed in previous reviews. In this review, we first summarize recent progress in the regulatory mechanisms of apoplastic ROS signaling and then propose its potential roles in plant defense against vascular pathogens to provide new ideas for the prevention and control of vascular diseases.
affiliations: State Key Laboratory for Managing Biotic and Chemical Treats to the Quality and Safety of Agro-products, Zhejiang Provincial Key Laboratory of Agricultural Microbiomics, Key Laboratory for Agricultural Microbiome of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, Institute of Biotechnology, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou 310058, China.; State Key Laboratory for Managing Biotic and Chemical Treats to the Quality and Safety of Agro-products, Zhejiang Provincial Key Laboratory of Agricultural Microbiomics, Key Laboratory for Agricultural Microbiome of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, Institute of Biotechnology, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou 310058, China. Electronic address: yanliang@zju.edu.cn.

translated_keywords: 合成生物学;植物发育;生化途径;基因表达工具;代谢工程;农业可持续性;天然产物生产;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 植物合成生物学（Plant SynBio）作为一个新兴领域，具有提升农业、人类健康和可持续性的潜力。通过整合遗传工具与工程原理，植物合成生物学旨在操控细胞功能并构建新的生化途径，从而开发出具有新表型特征、更高产量且能够生产天然产品和药物的植物。本文综述了重新编程植物发育和生化通路的研究努力。我们重点介绍了利用新型基因表达工具包来改变植物结构以提高模式植物和作物系统性能的研究，以及在植物组织中生产有用代谢物的工作。此外，我们还探讨了在应对影响农业和人类健康的复杂问题时采用植物合成生物学所面临的挑战与机遇。
authors: Akter Shammi; Castaneda-Méndez Oscar; Beltrán Jesús
title: Synthetic reprogramming of plant developmental and biochemical pathways.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 合成生物学;植物发育;生化途径;基因表达工具;代谢工程;农业可持续性;天然产物生产;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 植物发育和生化途径的合成重编程
abstract: Plant synthetic biology (Plant SynBio) is an emerging field with the potential to enhance agriculture, human health, and sustainability. Integrating genetic tools and engineering principles, Plant SynBio aims to manipulate cellular functions and construct novel biochemical pathways to develop plants with new phenotypic traits, enhanced yield, and be able to produce natural products and pharmaceuticals. This review compiles research efforts in reprogramming plant developmental and biochemical pathways. We highlight studies leveraging new gene expression toolkits to alter plant architecture for improved performance in model and crop systems and to produce useful metabolites in plant tissues. Furthermore, we provide insights into the challenges and opportunities associated with the adoption of Plant SynBio in addressing complex issues impacting agriculture and human health.
affiliations: Department of Plant and Soil Sciences, University of Delaware, Newark, DE 19716, USA; Delaware Biotechnology Institute, University of Delaware, 590 Avenue 1743, Newark, DE 19713, USA.; Department of Plant and Soil Sciences, University of Delaware, Newark, DE 19716, USA; Delaware Biotechnology Institute, University of Delaware, 590 Avenue 1743, Newark, DE 19713, USA. Electronic address: jbeltran@udel.edu.

translated_keywords: 植物-微生物组反馈；双向交互；根际微生物组；因果关系；土壤微生物群；植物遗传基础；微生物组组装；生物技术；生态学
translated_abstract: 植物与微生物组之间的相互作用是双向的，一方面涉及微生物组的组装过程，另一方面则涉及微生物组对植物的影响，即所谓的微生物组反馈。本文聚焦于地下部分，系统地将这两个方向分解为植物及其（根和根际）微生物组的组成部分，以识别方法学挑战和研究重点。我们发现，植物与微生物组之间的双向互动给遗传学研究带来了挑战。当植物突变体表现出表型改变且其微生物组也发生变化时，确定因果关系尤为困难。这种变化是由于突变直接作用于微生物组（例如通过根系分泌物），进而导致植物表型的变化，还是由于突变改变了植物的表型（例如根系结构），从而影响了微生物组？在此，我们提出反馈实验能够分离原因与结果，并且这些实验对于研究植物在自然土壤中的复杂微生物组交互作用非常有用。它们特别有助于探究植物的遗传基础，了解植物如何响应土壤微生物组。我们强调，与微生物组组装相关的机制相比，微生物组反馈的研究相对不足。从应用的角度来看，这可能有助于培育既能组装有益微生物组又能积极利用其反馈的作物品种。
authors: Janse van Rensburg Henry; Stengele Katja; Schlaeppi Klaus
title: Understanding plant responsiveness to microbiome feedbacks.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 植物-微生物组反馈；双向交互；根际微生物组；因果关系；土壤微生物群；植物遗传基础；微生物组组装；生物技术；生态学
translated_title: 理解植物对微生物组反馈的响应性
abstract: Plant microbiome interactions are bidirectional with processes leading to microbiome assembly and processes leading to effects on plants, so called microbiome feedbacks. With belowground focus we systematically decomposed both of these directions into plant and (root and rhizosphere) microbiome components to identify methodological challenges and research priorities. We found that the bidirectionality of plant microbiome interactions presents a challenge for genetic studies. Establishing causality is particularly difficult when a plant mutant has both, an altered phenotype and an altered microbiome. Is the mutation directly affecting the microbiome (e.g., through root exudates), which then causes an altered phenotype of the plant and/or is the altered microbiome the consequence of the mutation altering the plant's phenotype (e.g., root architecture)? Here, we put forward that feedback experiments allow to separate cause and effect and furthermore, they are useful for investigating plant interactions with complex microbiomes in natural soils. They especially allow to investigate the plant genetic basis how plants respond to soil microbiomes and we stress that such microbiome feedbacks are understudied compared to the mechanisms contributing to microbiome assembly. Thinking towards application, this may allow to develop crops with both abilities to assemble a beneficial microbiome and to actively exploit its feedbacks.
affiliations: Department of Environmental Sciences, University of Basel, Basel, Switzerland.; Department of Environmental Sciences, University of Basel, Basel, Switzerland. Electronic address: klaus.schlaeppi@unibas.ch.

translated_keywords: domestication; 未驯化; 多年生植物; 泛基因组
translated_abstract: 多年生果树作物的野生近缘种蕴含丰富的未开发遗传多样性，可为品种培育提供重要资源。然而，诸如连锁拖累、童期长以及高杂合度等障碍限制了其利用。随着基因组测序技术和组装方法的进步，并结合染色质构象捕获技术的应用，现已能够构建高质量参考基因组。这些基因组组装结果可以整合为泛基因组，涵盖编码区和非编码区的种内及种间变异。多年生果树作物的泛基因组正在开发中，以确定性状的遗传基础，这将有助于克服育种难题，通过育种与生物技术更快、更精准地培育出具有新特性的新品种。
authors: Sabety Jean; Svara Anze; Tegtmeier Richard; Feulner Hana; Cho Patrick; Sakina Aafreen; Hickok David; Khan Awais
title: Unlocking diversity from wild relatives of perennial fruit crops in the pan-genomics era.
keywords: Domestication; Undomesticated; Perennials; Pan-genome
translated_title: 泛基因组时代野生近缘植物的多样性解锁——以多年生果树为例
abstract: Crop wild relatives of perennial fruit crops have a wealth of untapped genetic diversity that can be utilized for cultivar development. However, barriers such as linkage drag, long juvenility, and high heterozygosity have hindered their utilization. Advancements in genome sequencing technologies and assembly methods, combined with the integration of chromosome conformation capture have made it possible to construct high-quality reference genomes. These genome assemblies can be combined into pan-genomes, capturing inter- and intraspecific variations across coding and non-coding regions. Pan-genomes of perennial fruit crops are being developed to identify the genetic basis of traits. This will help overcome breeding challenges, enabling faster and more targeted development of new cultivars with novel traits through breeding and biotechnology.
affiliations: Plant Pathology and Plant-Microbe Biology Section, Cornell University, 630 N Street, Geneva, NY, 14456, USA.; Plant Pathology and Plant-Microbe Biology Section, Cornell University, 630 N Street, Geneva, NY, 14456, USA. Electronic address: awais.khan@cornell.edu.

translated_keywords: 蓝莓;蔓越莓;泛基因组;遗传多样性;疾病抗性;代谢物合成;参考基因组;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 蔓越莓和蓝莓的人工栽培分别始于19世纪早期和20世纪早期的美国，由于其风味以及对健康的促进作用，如今这两种水果已在世界范围内种植和消费。然而，该行业仍面临诸多生产挑战（如病害压力），并且对更高产且果实品质更优的品种需求迫切。遗憾的是，与其它高价值作物相比，针对这些物种的分子工具相对有限。本文描述了蓝莓和蔓越莓的第一个泛基因组的构建与分析。我们对这两个泛基因组的分析表明，这两种作物表现出极大的遗传多样性，其中高丛蓝莓有48.4%的基因存在存在-缺失变异，蔓越莓则为47.0%。辅助基因（即不被所有品种共享的基因）显著富集了与抗病性和次生代谢物合成相关的分子功能，包括之前与改善果实品质性状相关的化合物。发现的数千个未出现在先前蓝莓和蔓越莓参考基因组中的基因，将成为未来研究的基础，并作为未来育种工作的潜在目标。泛基因组作为一个多序列比对，以及单个注释基因组均已公开，可供Genome Database for Vaccinium数据库进行分析，这是一个经过整理和集成的基于网络的关系型数据库。最后，泛基因组的核心基因预测将有助于开发一个社区基因分型平台，以指导该科植物未来的分子育种工作。
authors: Yocca Alan E; Platts Adrian; Alger Elizabeth; Teresi Scott; Mengist Molla F; Benevenuto Juliana; Ferrão Luis Felipe V; Jacobs MacKenzie; Babinski Michal; Magallanes-Lundback Maria; Bayer Philipp; Golicz Agnieszka; Humann Jodi L; Main Dorrie; Espley Richard V; Chagné David; Albert Nick W; Montanari Sara; Vorsa Nicholi; Polashock James; Díaz-Garcia Luis; Zalapa Juan; Bassil Nahla V; Munoz Patricio R; Iorizzo Massimo; Edger Patrick P
title: Blueberry and cranberry pangenomes as a resource for future genetic studies and breeding efforts.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 蓝莓;蔓越莓;泛基因组;遗传多样性;疾病抗性;代谢物合成;参考基因组;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 越橘和蔓越莓的泛基因组资源在今后遗传学研究和育种工作中的应用
abstract: Domestication of cranberry and blueberry began in the United States in the early 1800s and 1900s, respectively, and in part owing to their flavors and health-promoting benefits are now cultivated and consumed worldwide. The industry continues to face a wide variety of production challenges (e.g. disease pressures), as well as a demand for higher-yielding cultivars with improved fruit quality characteristics. Unfortunately, molecular tools to help guide breeding efforts for these species have been relatively limited compared with those for other high-value crops. Here, we describe the construction and analysis of the first pangenome for both blueberry and cranberry. Our analysis of these pangenomes revealed both crops exhibit great genetic diversity, including the presence-absence variation of 48.4% genes in highbush blueberry and 47.0% genes in cranberry. Auxiliary genes, those not shared by all cultivars, are significantly enriched with molecular functions associated with disease resistance and the biosynthesis of specialized metabolites, including compounds previously associated with improving fruit quality traits. The discovery of thousands of genes, not present in the previous reference genomes for blueberry and cranberry, will serve as the basis of future research and as potential targets for future breeding efforts. The pangenome, as a multiple-sequence alignment, as well as individual annotated genomes, are publicly available for analysis on the Genome Database for Vaccinium-a curated and integrated web-based relational database. Lastly, the core-gene predictions from the pangenomes will serve useful to develop a community genotyping platform to guide future molecular breeding efforts across the family.
affiliations: Department of Horticulture, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, 48824, United States.; Department of Plant Biology, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, 48824, United States.; Genetics and Genome Sciences, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, 48824, United States.; Plants for Human Health Institute, North Carolina State University, Kannapolis, NC United States.; Horticultural Sciences Department, University of Florida, Gainesville, FL 32611, United States.; Department of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, 48824, United States.; University of Western Australia, Perth 6009Australia.; Justus Liebig University, Giessen, 35390Germany.; Department of Horticulture, Washington State University, Pullman, WA, 99163, United States.; The New Zealand Institute for Plant and Food Research Limited (PFR), Auckland, New Zealand.; The New Zealand Institute for Plant and Food Research Limited (PFR), Palmerston, New Zealand.; The New Zealand Institute for Plant and Food Research Limited (PFR), Motueka, New Zealand.; SEBS, Plant Biology, Rutgers University, New Brunswick NJ 01019United States.; Department of Viticulture and Enology, University of California, Davis, Davis, CA 95616, United States.; National Clonal Germplasm Repository, USDA-ARS, Corvallis, OR 97333, United States.; Plants for Human Health Institute, North Carolina State University, Kannapolis, NCUnited States.; Department of Horticulture, North Carolina State University, Kannapolis, NCUnited States.; MSU AgBioResearch, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, 48824, United States.

translated_keywords: 疾病抗性；拟南芥（*Arabidopsis thaliana*）；化学感受受体（CR）；模式识别受体（PRR）；毒力；糖苷；糖苷水解酶（GH）；甲基化趋化蛋白（MCP）；细胞壁；损伤相关分子模式（DAMP）；模式触发免疫（PTI）；趋化作用；细胞壁降解酶（CWDE）
translated_abstract: 植物细胞壁是病原体在宿主中定殖时必须克服的关键抗性要素。某些病原体会分泌大量酶来水解植物细胞壁多糖，从而释放基于碳水化合物的分子（糖类），这些分子被植物模式识别受体感知并激活模式触发免疫和疾病抗性。这些释放的糖类被定殖的微生物用作碳源、化学引诱剂以定位植物表面的入侵点，并作为触发基因表达重编程的信号。细胞壁糖类的释放及其被植物和微生物的感知决定了植物-微生物互作的结果。本文综述并讨论了植物-微生物互作中这些较少探索方面的最新进展。
authors: Molina Antonio; Sánchez-Vallet Andrea; Jordá Lucía; Carrasco-López Cristian; Rodríguez-Herva José Juan; López-Solanilla Emilia
title: Plant cell walls: source of carbohydrate-based signals in plant-pathogen interactions.
keywords: disease resistance; Arabidopsis thaliana; chemoreceptor (CR); Pattern Recognition Receptor (PRR); virulence; glycan; Glycosyl Hydrolase (GH); Methyl-accepting Chemotaxis Protein (MCP); cell wall; Damage-Associated Molecular Pattern (DAMP); Pattern Triggered Immunity (PTI); chemotaxis; Cell Wall Degrading Enzyme (CWDE)
translated_title: 植物-病原体相互作用中的碳水化合物信号来源
abstract: Plant cell walls are essential elements for disease resistance that pathogens need to overcome to colonise the host. Certain pathogens secrete a large battery of enzymes to hydrolyse plant cell wall polysaccharides, which leads to the release of carbohydrate-based molecules (glycans) that are perceived by plant pattern recognition receptors and activate pattern-triggered immunity and disease resistance. These released glycans are used by colonizing microorganisms as carbon source, chemoattractants to locate entry points at plant surface, and as signals triggering gene expression reprogramming. The release of wall glycans and their perception by plants and microorganisms determines plant-microbial interaction outcome. Here, we summarise and discuss the most recent advances in these less explored aspects of plant-microbe interaction.
affiliations: Centro de Biotecnología y Genómica de Plantas, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (UPM) - Instituto Nacional de Investigación y Tecnología Agraria y Alimentaria (INIA/CSIC), Campus de Montegancedo UPM, Pozuelo de Alarcón (Madrid), Spain; Departamento de Biotecnología-Biología Vegetal, Escuela Técnica Superior de Ingeniería Agronómica, Alimentaría y de Biosistemas, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (UPM), Madrid, Spain. Electronic address: antonio.molina@upm.es.; Centro de Biotecnología y Genómica de Plantas, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (UPM) - Instituto Nacional de Investigación y Tecnología Agraria y Alimentaria (INIA/CSIC), Campus de Montegancedo UPM, Pozuelo de Alarcón (Madrid), Spain.; Centro de Biotecnología y Genómica de Plantas, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (UPM) - Instituto Nacional de Investigación y Tecnología Agraria y Alimentaria (INIA/CSIC), Campus de Montegancedo UPM, Pozuelo de Alarcón (Madrid), Spain; Departamento de Biotecnología-Biología Vegetal, Escuela Técnica Superior de Ingeniería Agronómica, Alimentaría y de Biosistemas, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid (UPM), Madrid, Spain.

translated_keywords: 植物-微生物互作；根际微生物；营养使用效率；合成生物学；根系分泌物；农业生产力；温室气体排放；生物技术；分子生物学
translated_abstract: 养分的有效供应和利用对作物生产力至关重要。目前的农业实践依赖过量的化学肥料，这加剧了温室气体排放和环境污染。根际微生物能够促进植物对养分的吸收，并提高养分利用效率。因此，调控植物-微生物在根际的交流成为一种有前景且可持续的策略，以提升农业生产力。近年来，植物工程领域的进展使得开发出能够通过根系分泌物特异性富集有益微生物的植物成为可能。同时，合成生物学技术也培育出了能改善植物养分可利用性和吸收能力的微生物。通过调控植物-微生物间的交流，研究人员旨在利用有益土壤微生物，从而提供一种精准且高效的优化植物养分利用效率的方法。
authors: Griffin Catherine; Oz M Tufan; Demirer Gozde S
title: Engineering plant-microbe communication for plant nutrient use efficiency.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 植物-微生物互作；根际微生物；营养使用效率；合成生物学；根系分泌物；农业生产力；温室气体排放；生物技术；分子生物学
translated_title: 工程化植物-微生物沟通以提高植物养分利用效率
abstract: Nutrient availability and efficient use are critical for crop productivity. Current agricultural practices rely on excessive chemical fertilizers, contributing to greenhouse gas emissions and environmental pollution. Rhizosphere microbes facilitate plant nutrient acquisition and contribute to nutrient use efficiency. Thus, engineering plant-microbe communication within the rhizosphere emerges as a promising and sustainable strategy to enhance agricultural productivity. Recent advances in plant engineering have enabled the development of plants capable of selectively enriching beneficial microbes through root exudates. At the same time, synthetic biology techniques have produced microbes capable of improving nutrient availability and uptake by plants. By engineering plant-microbe communication, researchers aim to harness beneficial soil microbes, thereby offering a targeted and efficient approach to optimizing plant nutrient use efficiency.
affiliations: Department of Biological Engineering, California Institute of Technology, Pasadena, CA 91125, USA.; Chemistry and Chemical Engineering, California Institute of Technology, Pasadena, CA 91125, USA.; Chemistry and Chemical Engineering, California Institute of Technology, Pasadena, CA 91125, USA. Electronic address: gdemirer@caltech.edu.

translated_keywords: 跨王国通讯；植物-微生物互作；细胞外囊泡
translated_abstract: 细胞外囊泡（EVs）是存在于生命各个界中的膜状纳米颗粒，已知通过蛋白质和核酸的转运在动物系统中介导细胞间通讯。对植物和微生物EVs的研究表明，它们具有类似的运输能力，并且能够不仅在生物体内，还能在生物体之间传递信号，在跨界的植物与其微生物伙伴之间进行交叉通讯。本文综述了近期关于植物和微生物EVs功能的研究，强调了物种间以及界别间功能保守性的新兴趋势，同时结合了个体水平上EV亚群的异质性，这使得EVs成为植物生物相互作用中强有力的调控机制。
authors: Qiao Serena Agnes; Roth Ronelle
title: Messenger and message: Uncovering the roles, rhythm and regulation of extracellular vesicles in plant biotic interactions.
keywords: cross-kingdom communications; plant-microbe interactions; extracellular vesicles
translated_title: 揭示细胞外囊泡在植物生物相互作用中的角色、节律与调控机制
abstract: Extracellular vesicles (EVs) are membrane-delimited nanoparticles found in every kingdom of life and are known to mediate cell-cell communication in animal systems through the trafficking of proteins and nucleic acids. Research into plant and microbial EVs suggests that these have similar transport capacity, and moreover are able to mediate signalling not only within an organism but also between organisms, acting between plants and their microbial partners in cross-kingdom signalling. Here, we review recent research exploring the roles of these EVs, both plant and microbial, highlighting emerging trends of functional conservation between species and across kingdoms, complemented by the heterogeneity of EV subpopulations at the organism level that places EVs as powerful regulatory mechanisms in plant biotic interactions.
affiliations: Department of Biology, South Parks Road, University of Oxford, Oxford, OX1 3RB, United Kingdom.; Department of Biology, South Parks Road, University of Oxford, Oxford, OX1 3RB, United Kingdom. Electronic address: Ronelle.roth@biology.ox.ac.uk.

translated_keywords: 植物天然产物；生物合成；去木质素；木质素；酶机制
translated_abstract: 木脂素和反式木脂素广泛分布于植物界，具有多样的化学结构和生物活性，展现出潜在的治疗价值。它们起源于苯丙烷生物合成途径，其特有的碳骨架通过独特的酶催化形成，特征在于区域选择性和立体选择性的C-C键形成过程。尽管对这些植物天然产物进行了大量研究，但其生物合成途径和酶机制仍不完全清楚。本文综述了近年来在阐明负责构建木脂素和反式木脂素独特碳骨架的生物合成酶功能和机制方面的最新进展。
authors: Ushimaru Richiro
title: Functions and mechanisms of enzymes assembling lignans and norlignans.
keywords: Plant natural product; Biosynthesis; Norlignan; Lignan; Enzyme mechanism
translated_title: 酶组装木质素和去木质素的功能与机制
abstract: Lignans and norlignans are distributed throughout the plant kingdom and exhibit diverse chemical structures and biological properties that offer potential for therapeutic use. Originating from the phenylpropanoid biosynthesis pathway, their characteristic carbon architectures are formed through unique enzyme catalysis, featuring regio- and stereoselective C-C bond forming processes. Despite extensive research on these plant natural products, their biosynthetic pathways, and enzyme mechanisms remain enigmatic. This review highlights recent advancements in elucidating the functions and mechanisms of the biosynthetic enzymes responsible for constructing the distinct carbon frameworks of lignans and norlignans.
affiliations: Graduate School of Pharmaceutical Sciences, The University of Tokyo, Tokyo 113-0033, Japan; Collaborative Research Institute for Innovative Microbiology, The University of Tokyo, Tokyo 113-8657, Japan. Electronic address: ushimaru@mol.f.u-tokyo.ac.jp.

translated_keywords: 生物合成；生物碱；自然界新发现；天然新结构；半合成
translated_abstract: 植物合成数以万计的含氮生物活性化合物，称为生物碱，其中包含现代医学中一些重要的临床药物。植物中新生物碱结构及其代谢途径的发现，为获取这些丰富的生物活性来源（包括自然界中新的、与治疗和工业应用相关的化合物）提供了途径。本文综述了生物碱生物合成研究的最新进展，包括完整的代谢通路解析。此外，还讨论了基于生物合成或半合成技术生产新老植物生物碱的最新发展。
authors: Bui Van-Hung; Rodríguez-López Carlos Eduardo; Dang Thu-Thuy T
title: Integration of discovery and engineering in plant alkaloid research: Recent developments in elucidation, reconstruction, and repurposing biosynthetic pathways.
keywords: Biosynthesis; Alkaloids; New-to-nature; New-in-nature; Semisynthesis
translated_title: 阐明、重构及重编程生物合成途径的最新进展。
abstract: Plants synthesize tens of thousands of bioactive nitrogen-containing compounds called alkaloids, including some clinically important drugs in modern medicine. The discovery of new alkaloid structures and their metabolism in plants have provided ways to access these rich sources of bioactivities including new-to-nature compounds relevant to therapeutic and industrial applications. This review discusses recent advances in alkaloid biosynthesis discovery, including complete pathway elucidations. Additionally, the latest developments in the production of new and established plant alkaloids based on either biosynthesis or semisynthesis are discussed.

Barber Faculty of Science, University of British Columbia, 3247 University Way, Kelowna, BC V1V 1V7, Canada.; Escuela de Ingeniería y Ciencias, Tecnológico de Monterrey, Ave. Eugenio Garza Sada 2501, Monterrey, N.L. 64849, Mexico.
