Electronic address: thuy.dang@ubc.ca.

translated_keywords: 水芸;异源多倍体;泛基因组;结构变异;亚基因组分化;表达分歧;转座元件;生物信息学;植物遗传学
translated_abstract: 水浮莲（Trapa spp., 千屈菜科）是一种传统但目前利用不足的非谷物作物。本文构建了异源四倍体芡实（Trapa natans，4x，AABB）两个二倍体亲本——二倍体芡实（2x，AA）和裂叶芡实（2x，BB）的染色体水平基因组组装。结合已发表的四种（亚）基因组，我们采用基于基因和图谱的泛基因组方法以及一个泛基因组转座子（TE）文库开发了芡属植物的基因组资源。泛基因组显示了显著的基因含量变异，其中可有可无的基因簇和私有基因簇占六个（亚）基因组总簇集的很大比例（51.95%）。通过存在-缺失变异（PAV）的基因分型，鉴定了与A或B系特异性相关的40,453个PAV，涉及2570个基因，其中1428个基因差异表达，并富集于器官发育过程、有机物质代谢过程和对刺激的响应。比较基因组分析表明，异源四倍体芡实经历了不对称的亚基因组分化，B亚基因组比A亚基因组更为占主导地位。多种因素，包括PAV、转座子的不对称扩增、同源交换（HEs）以及同源基因表达分化，共同影响了多倍化后的基因组演化。总体而言，本研究揭示了芡属植物的基因组结构和演化机制，促进了其功能基因组学研究和育种计划的发展。
authors: Zhang Xinyi; Chen Yang; Wang Lingyun; Yuan Ye; Fang Mingya; Shi Lin; Lu Ruisen; Comes Hans Peter; Ma Yazhen; Chen Yuanyuan; Huang Guizhou; Zhou Yongfeng; Zheng Zhaisheng; Qiu Yingxiong
title: Pangenome of water caltrop reveals structural variations and asymmetric subgenome divergence after allopolyploidization.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 水芸;异源多倍体;泛基因组;结构变异;亚基因组分化;表达分歧;转座元件;生物信息学;植物遗传学
translated_title: 苦草的泛基因组揭示了异源多倍化后的结构变异和不对称亚基因组分化。
abstract: Water caltrop (Trapa spp., Lythraceae) is a traditional but currently underutilized non-cereal crop. Here, we generated chromosome-level genome assemblies for the two diploid progenitors of allotetraploid Trapa. natans (4x, AABB), i.e., diploid T. natans (2x, AA) and Trapa incisa (2x, BB). In conjunction with four published (sub)genomes of Trapa, we used gene-based and graph-based pangenomic approaches and a pangenomic transposable element (TE) library to develop Trapa genomic resources. The pangenome displayed substantial gene-content variation with dispensable and private gene clusters occupying a large proportion (51.95%) of the total cluster sets in the six (sub)genomes. Genotyping of presence-absence variation (PAVs) identified 40 453 PAVs associated with 2570 genes specific to A- or B-lineages, of which 1428 were differentially expressed, and were enriched in organ development process, organic substance metabolic process and response to stimulus. Comparative genome analyses showed that the allotetraploid T. natans underwent asymmetric subgenome divergence, with the B-subgenome being more dominant than the A-subgenome. Multiple factors, including PAVs, asymmetrical amplification of TEs, homeologous exchanges (HEs), and homeolog expression divergence, together affected genome evolution after polyploidization. Overall, this study sheds lights on the genome architecture and evolution of Trapa, and facilitates its functional genomic studies and breeding program.
affiliations: Systematic and Evolutionary Botany and Biodiversity Laboratory, College of Life Sciences, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou, 310058, Zhejiang, China.; CAS Key Laboratory of Plant Germplasm Enhancement and Specialty Agriculture, Wuhan Botanical Garden, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Wuhan, 430074, Hubei, China.; Provincial Key Laboratory of Characteristic Aquatic Vegetable Breeding and Cultivation, Jinhua Academy of Agricultural Sciences (Zhejiang Institute of Agricultural Machinery), Jinhua, 321000, Zhejiang, China.; Jiaxing Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Jiaxing, 314016, Zhejiang, China.; Institute of Botany, Jiangsu Province and Chinese Academy of Sciences, Nanjing 210014, Jiangsu, China.; Department of Environment & Biodiversity, Salzburg University, Salzburg, 5020, Austria.; State Key Laboratory of Tropical Crop Breeding, Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory of Lingnan Modern Agriculture; Key Laboratory of Synthetic Biology, Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen 518124, Guangdong, China.

translated_keywords: 基因组折叠;细菌染色体;核区;非编码序列;动态特性;成像技术;基因表达;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 生命各个领域的染色体都是具有复杂层级组织的明确结构实体。对这种层级组织及其与基因表达或其他染色体代谢过程（如修复、复制或分离）的功能相互作用的研究正在多种物种中积极展开，包括原核生物。细菌染色体通常基因密集且非编码序列较少，并被组织成类核体，这是一种由DNA、RNA和蛋白质（核相关蛋白或NAPs）组成的无膜结构域。成像和基因组学方法的持续改进使这些兆碱基长分子的组织得以研究，从而能够解析其高度动态的特性以及相互交织的结构特征。本文综述并讨论了细菌染色体组织领域的一些最新进展。
authors: Yáñez-Cuna Fares Osam; Koszul Romain
title: Insights in bacterial genome folding.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组折叠;细菌染色体;核区;非编码序列;动态特性;成像技术;基因表达;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 细菌基因组折叠的研究进展
abstract: Chromosomes in all domains of life are well-defined structural entities with complex hierarchical organization. The regulation of this hierarchical organization and its functional interplay with gene expression or other chromosome metabolic processes such as repair, replication, or segregation is actively investigated in a variety of species, including prokaryotes. Bacterial chromosomes are typically gene-dense with few non-coding sequences and are organized into the nucleoid, a membrane-less compartment composed of DNA, RNA, and proteins (nucleoid-associated proteins or NAPs). The continuous improvement of imaging and genomic methods has put the organization of these Mb-long molecules at reach, allowing to disambiguate some of their highly dynamic properties and intertwined structural features. Here we review and discuss some of the recent advances in the field of bacterial chromosome organization.
affiliations: Institut Pasteur, CNRS UMR 3525, Université Paris Cité, Unité Régulation Spatiale des Génomes, 75015, Paris, France.; Institut Pasteur, CNRS UMR 3525, Université Paris Cité, Unité Régulation Spatiale des Génomes, 75015, Paris, France. Electronic address: romain.koszul@pasteur.fr.

translated_keywords: 植物合成生物学;异源表达系统;高价值天然产物;药物生产;基因发现;多步骤生物合成途径;代谢工程;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 植物合成生物学有能力为全球医药产品的生产和供应提供解决方案。近年来，“组学”技术的进步加速了药用植物基因的发现，使得具有高度结构复杂性的活性植物天然产物的多步骤生物合成途径能够更快速地在异源植物表达系统中重建。本文综述了用于在异源植物系统中生产高价值植物天然产物的概念和策略，并强调了在替代植物宿主中工程化改造传统和新型药物生物合成方面的最新成功案例。
authors: Sadre Radin
title: Plant synthetic biology for human health: advances in producing medicines in heterologous expression systems.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 植物合成生物学;异源表达系统;高价值天然产物;药物生产;基因发现;多步骤生物合成途径;代谢工程;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 异源表达系统中药物生产的进展
abstract: Plant synthetic biology has the capability to provide solutions to global challenges in the production and supply of medicines. Recent advances in 'omics' technologies have accelerated gene discoveries in medicinal plant research so that even multistep biosynthetic pathways for bioactive plant natural products with high structural complexity can be reconstituted in heterologous plant expression systems more rapidly. This review provides an overview of concept and strategies used to produce high-value plant natural products in heterologous plant systems and highlights recent successes in engineering the biosynthesis of conventional and new medicines in alternative plant hosts.
affiliations: Pelotonia Research Center, Department of Horticulture and Crop Science, the Ohio State University, 2255 Kenny Rd, Columbus, OH 43210, USA. Electronic address: sadre.2@osu.edu.

translated_keywords: 植物次生代谢；物种特异性；代谢组学；功能基因组学；整合组学；比较基因组学
translated_abstract: 通过比较野生种质资源与栽培种/野生近缘种的组学分析以及聚焦于基因簇的植物物种间比较基因组学分析，功能基因组学方法成功检测到植物次生代谢中的关键代谢多态性。在过去的几十年里，发现（i）种内特异性代谢多态性、（ii）串联重复基因的新功能化以及（iii）代谢基因簇是造成植物次生代谢物代谢多样性的重要因素。然而，这些发现使我们意识到，植物次生代谢中基因的鉴定需要根据目标代谢通路采取针对性策略。随着植物基因组序列和转录组数据的日益丰富，促进了种间比较分析，包括基因组分析和基因共表达网络分析。本文介绍了整合种间/种内比较代谢组学的功能基因组学方法，阐明其在提供代谢进化基因组特征方面的作用，并探讨了功能基因组学在植物次生代谢研究中的未来前景。
authors: Watanabe Mutsumi; Tohge Takayuki
title: Species-specific 'specialized' genomic region provides the new insights into the functional genomics characterizing metabolic polymorphisms in plants.
keywords: Plant specialized metabolism; Species specificity; Metabolomics; Functional genomics; Integrative omics; Comparative genomics
translated_title: 物种特异性“专化”基因组区域为揭示植物代谢多态性的功能基因组学特性提供了新见解。
abstract: Functional genomics approaches with comparative omics analyses of wild-accessions and cultivars/wild species, as well as comparative genomic analyses in plant species focusing on gene clusters, have successfully detected key metabolic polymorphisms in plant specialized metabolism. In recent decades, (i) intra-species specific metabolic polymorphisms, (ii) new functionalization of tandem duplicated genes, and (iii) metabolic gene clusters were found as the main factors creating metabolic diversity of specialized metabolites in plants. However, given findings aware us that the identification of genes in plant specialized metabolism requires strategic approaches depending on the target metabolic pathways. The increasing availability of plant genome sequences and transcriptome data has facilitated inter-specific comparative analyses, including genomic analysis and gene co-expression network analysis. Here, we introduce functional genomics approaches with the integration of inter-/intra-species comparative metabolomics, their key roles in providing genomic signatures of metabolic evolution, and discuss future prospects of functional genomics on plant specialized metabolism.
affiliations: Graduate School of Biological Sciences, Nara Institute of Science and Technology (NAIST), Takayama-cho 8916-5, Ikoma, Nara 630-0192, Japan.; Graduate School of Biological Sciences, Nara Institute of Science and Technology (NAIST), Takayama-cho 8916-5, Ikoma, Nara 630-0192, Japan. Electronic address: tohge@bs.naist.jp.

translated_keywords: 信号传导；钙调蛋白样蛋白；防御；生长；钙
translated_abstract: 钙信号（包括脉冲、振幅和持续时间）对植物发育及响应各种刺激至关重要，但钙信号需要通过钙感受器进行解码和转译。在植物中，已鉴定出三类含钙结合蛋白的钙感受器，包括钙依赖性蛋白激酶（CDPK）、钙调素B样蛋白（CBL）和钙调蛋白（CaM）。含有多个EF-hand结构域的类钙调蛋白（CMLs）也作为特异性钙感受器，在植物生长与防御决策过程中感知、结合并解读钙信号。近几十年来，系统综述了CMLs在植物发育及响应各种刺激中的功能，揭示了植物CML介导的钙信号转导网络的分子机制。本文通过对植物中CML表达及其生物学功能的概述，表明在钙信号感知过程中存在生长-防御权衡现象，而这一方面近年来尚未得到充分研究。
authors: Wang Lixin; Liu Zhiguo; Han Shoukun; Liu Ping; Sadeghnezhad Ehsan; Liu Mengjun
title: Growth or survival: What is the role of calmodulin-like proteins in plant?
keywords: Signalling; Calmodulin-like protein; Defense; Growth; Calcium
translated_title: 钙调蛋白样蛋白在植物中的作用是什么？
abstract: Calcium signalling, including pulse, amplitude, and duration, is essential for plant development and response to various stimuli. However, the calcium signalling should be decoded and translated by calcium sensors. In plants, three classes of calcium-binding proteins have been identified as calcium sensors, including calcium-dependent protein kinase (CDPK), calcineurin B-like protein (CBL), and calmodulin (CaM). Calmodulin-like proteins (CMLs), which have several EF-hands, also serve as specific calcium sensors and can sense, bind, and interpret the calcium signal during the plant's growth and defense decision-making processes. In recent decades, the function of CMLs in plant development and response to various stimuli has been systematically reviewed, shedding light on the molecular mechanism of plant CML-mediated networks in calcium signal transduction. Here, by providing an overview of CML expression and biological function in plants, we demonstrate that growth-defense trade-offs occur during calcium sensing, an aspect that has not been well studied in recent years.
affiliations: College of Horticulture, Hebei Agricultural University, Baoding 071001, Hebei, China.; College of Horticulture, Hebei Agricultural University, Baoding 071001, Hebei, China. Electronic address: yylp@hebau.edu.cn.; Department of Plant Biology, Faculty of Biological Sciences, Tarbiat Modares University, Tehran, Iran. Electronic address: ehsansadeghnejad@yahoo.com.; College of Horticulture, Hebei Agricultural University, Baoding 071001, Hebei, China. Electronic address: kjliu@hebau.edu.cn.

translated_keywords: 几丁质；防御基因；可持续策略
translated_abstract: 几丁质由N-乙酰氨基葡萄糖单元组成，是一种存在于真菌细胞壁和节肢动物外骨骼中的多糖，能够激发植物强烈的防御反应。通过激活防御基因、刺激防御化合物的产生以及强化物理屏障，几丁质增强了植物抵御病原体的能力。基于几丁质的处理方法对由真菌、细菌、病毒和线虫等多种病原体引起的植物病害显示出良好的防治效果，并已被纳入可持续农业实践。此外，几丁质处理还表现出促进植物生长和提高对非生物胁迫耐受性的额外益处。未来需要进一步研究以优化处理参数、探索几丁质衍生物并开展长期田间试验。在这些领域的持续努力将有助于开发创新且可持续的农业病害管理策略，从而提高作物产量并减少对化学农药的依赖。
authors: Saberi Riseh Roohallah; Gholizadeh Vazvani Mozhgan; Vatankhah Masoumeh; Kennedy John F
title: Chitin-induced disease resistance in plants: A review.
keywords: Chitin; Defense genes; Sustainable strategies
translated_title: 综述
abstract: Chitin is composed of N-acetylglucosamine units. Chitin a polysaccharide found in the cell walls of fungi and exoskeletons of insects and crustaceans, can elicit a potent defense response in plants. Through the activation of defense genes, stimulation of defensive compound production, and reinforcement of physical barriers, chitin enhances the plant's ability to defend against pathogens. Chitin-based treatments have shown efficacy against various plant diseases caused by fungal, bacterial, viral, and nematode pathogens, and have been integrated into sustainable agricultural practices. Furthermore, chitin treatments have demonstrated additional benefits, such as promoting plant growth and improving tolerance to abiotic stresses. Further research is necessary to optimize treatment parameters, explore chitin derivatives, and conduct long-term field studies. Continued efforts in these areas will contribute to the development of innovative and sustainable strategies for disease management in agriculture, ultimately leading to improved crop productivity and reduced reliance on chemical pesticides.

translated_keywords: 植物激素；信号传导；甘露糖结合凝集素；凝集素；胁迫；作物改良
translated_abstract: 生物和非生物胁迫对植物的发育、生长和产量产生不利影响。多年来，研究者们一直致力于理解植物在胁迫诱导下的响应，并揭示培育抗逆作物的策略。研究表明，包含多种基因和功能蛋白的分子网络在应对不同胁迫时起着关键作用。近期，人们对探索凝集素在调控植物各种生物学响应中的作用重新产生了浓厚兴趣。凝集素是天然存在的蛋白质，能够与其相应的糖缀合物形成可逆的结合。迄今为止，已识别并功能表征了多种植物凝集素，但它们在胁迫耐受性中的具体参与机制仍需更深入的分析。生物资源、现代实验工具和检测系统的可用性为植物凝集素研究提供了新的动力。在此背景下，本文综述了植物凝集素的背景信息及其与其他调控机制的相互作用，这些相互作用在缓解植物胁迫方面发挥了显著作用。同时，文章还强调了凝集素的多功能角色，并指出进一步丰富这一尚待深入研究领域的信息将开启作物改良的新纪元。
authors: Marothia Deeksha; Kaur Navdeep; Jhamat Chetna; Sharma Ipsa; Pati Pratap Kumar
title: Plant lectins: Classical molecules with emerging roles in stress tolerance.
keywords: Phytohormones; Signaling; Mannose-binding lectin; Lectin; Stress; Crop improvement
translated_title: 经典分子在胁迫耐受中的新兴作用
abstract: Biotic and abiotic stresses impose adverse effects on plant's development, growth, and production. For the past many years, researchers are trying to understand the stress induced responses in plants and decipher strategies to produce stress tolerant crops. It has been demonstrated that molecular networks encompassing an array of genes and functional proteins play a key role in generating responses to combat different stresses. Newly, there has been a resurgence of interest to explore the role of lectins in modulating various biological responses in plants. Lectins are naturally occurring proteins that form reversible linkages with their respective glycoconjugates. To date, several plant lectins have been recognized and functionally characterized. However, their involvement in stress tolerance is yet to be comprehensively analyzed in greater detail. The availability of biological resources, modern experimental tools, and assay systems has provided a fresh impetus for plant lectin research. Against this backdrop, the present review provides background information on plant lectins and recent knowledge on their crosstalks with other regulatory mechanisms, which play a remarkable role in plant stress amelioration. It also highlights their versatile role and suggests that adding more information to this under-explored area will usher in a new era of crop improvement.

Electronic address: pkpati@yahoo.com.

translated_keywords: 应用；功能；分类；凝集素样，特征描述
translated_abstract: 凝集素因其对碳水化合物具有特异性和可逆结合的能力而广为人知。由于其报道的特性，这些分子在植物中得到了特别的研究，突出显示了它们在抗菌、抗病毒、抗癌、抗寄生虫、杀虫和免疫调节方面的功能。omics数据库中凝集素及其类似序列的不断增加，为识别重要候选物提供了机会，并推断其在植物关键信号通路和过程中的作用。生物信息学为解析序列和预测凝集素领域的功能提供了一个快速且低成本的情景。因此，本文综述了植物凝集素注释、结构表征、分类及预测应用的现状。同时讨论了其致敏性和毒性特性，以及从一级结构预测这些效应的工具。本综述揭示了植物凝集素的一个有前景的研究情景，特别是在组学时代的凝集素研究新可能性。
authors: da Silva Ruana Carolina Cabral; Roldan-Filho Ricardo Salas; de Luna-Aragão Madson Allan; de Oliveira Silva Roberta Lane; Ferreira-Neto José Ribamar Costa; da Silva Manassés Daniel; Benko-Iseppon Ana Maria
title: Omics-driven bioinformatics for plant lectins discovery and functional annotation - A comprehensive review.
keywords: Applications; Function; Classification; Lectin-like, characterization
translated_title: 组学驱动的植物凝集素发现与功能注释的生物信息学方法——综述
abstract: Lectins are known for their specific and reversible binding capacity to carbohydrates. These molecules have been particularly explored in plants due to their reported properties, highlighting antimicrobial, antiviral, anticancer, antiparasitic, insecticidal, and immunoregulatory actions. The increasing availability of lectin and lectin-like sequences in omics data banks provides an opportunity to identify important candidates, inferring their roles in essential signaling pathways and processes in plants. Bioinformatics enables a fast and low-cost scenario for elucidating sequences and predicting functions in the lectinology universe. Thus, this review addresses the state of the art of annotation, structural characterization, classification, and predicted applications of plant lectins. Their allergenic and toxic properties are also discussed, as well as tools for predicting such effects from the primary structure. This review uncovers a promising scenario for plant lectins and new study possibilities, particularly for studies in lectinology in the omics era.

translated_keywords: Blowflies; Genomics; Genome Assembly; Knowledge Gaps; Phylogenetics; DNA Barcodes; Mitogenomes; 生物多样性; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: 丽蝇科（Calliphoridae）是一类物种丰富的昆虫群体，然而，尽管近年来基因组学取得了进展，公开可用的基因组组装仅限于16个物种。这一知识空白同样存在于线粒体基因组和条形码数据库中，这些资源主要集中在具有医学和兽医学重要性的物种上。虽然丽蝇科的系统发育研究已取得进展，但鉴于其多样化的生命史，对各个亚科进行额外的基因组测序仍至关重要。本文综述了丽蝇科遗传信息的现状，指出了公共数据库中存在的显著空白。DNA条形码、线粒体基因组和基因组分别仅占已知丽蝇科多样性中的16.5%（342种）、约3%（53种）和不到1%（16种）。尽管NCBI记录了183个与丽蝇科相关的基因组学项目，但许多亚科和属在基因组学上的代表性不足或完全没有代表，这影响了分类学、系统学、系统发育和进化等领域的研究。我们强调了高质量参考基因组的迫切需求，并指出需要涵盖所有丽蝇科亚科的目标物种，以支持快速、低成本的基因组学研究新时代的到来。
authors: Parmar Drashti R; Johnston Nikolas P; Wallman James F; Szpila Krzysztof
title: Blowfly genomics: current insights, knowledge gaps, and future perspectives.
keywords: (Auto-generated) Blowflies; Genomics; Genome Assembly; Knowledge Gaps; Phylogenetics; DNA Barcodes; Mitogenomes; 生物多样性; 分子生物学
translated_title: 当前见解、知识空白与未来展望
abstract: Blowflies (Calliphoridae) form a diverse, species-rich group, yet publicly available genome assemblies are limited to only 16 species, despite recent genomic advances. This knowledge gap extends to mitogenomes and barcode databases, which mainly focus on medically and veterinary-important species. While blowfly phylogenetics has progressed, additional genome sequencing is crucial for various subfamilies, given their diverse life histories. This review presents a quantitative overview of available genetic information for blowflies, highlighting substantial gaps in public databases. DNA barcodes, mitogenomes, and genomes represent only 16.5% (342 species), ∼3% (53 species), and <1% (16 species) of known family diversity, respectively. While 183 genomics-related calliphorid BioProjects are recorded by NCBI, many subfamilies and genera have limited or no genomic representation, impacting studies on identification, systematics, phylogenetics, and evolution. We stress the urgent need for high-quality reference genomes and highlight target species representing all blowfly subfamilies to support a new era of rapid, low-cost genomic research.

translated_keywords: 杯状蛋白基因家族；作物改良；功能；结构；进化
translated_abstract: 杯状蛋白超家族蛋白功能多样，在植物发育及响应各种胁迫方面发挥重要作用。然而，对这一家族成员的研究尚未得到足够重视。本文综述了近年来该家族基因的研究进展，探讨了其进化、结构特征及其生物学功能。重点介绍了杯状蛋白家族成员在植物细胞壁、根、叶、花、果实和种子发育中的意义及其在胁迫响应中的作用，并阐述了杯状蛋白在作物改良中的潜在应用。部分成员可促进植物生长发育，提高抗逆性，从而增加作物产量，为未来有效的作物研究与育种奠定基础。
authors: Hu Fei; Ye Ziyi; Dong Kui; Zhang Weimeng; Fang Da; Cao Jun
title: Divergent structures and functions of the Cupin proteins in plants.
keywords: Cupin gene family; Crop improvement; Function; Structure; Evolution
translated_title: 植物中杯蛋白的多样性结构与功能
abstract: Cupin superfamily proteins have extensive functions. Their members are not only involved in the development of plants but also responded to various stresses. Whereas, the research on the Cupin members has not attracted enough attention. In this article, we summarized the research progress on these family genes in recent years and explored their evolution, structural characteristics, and biological functions. The significance of members of the Cupin family in the development of plant cell walls, roots, leaves, flowers, fruits, and seeds and their role in stress response are highlighted. Simultaneously, the prospective application of Cupin protein in crop enhancement was introduced. Some members can enhance plant growth, development, and resistance to adversity, thereby increasing crop yield. It will be as a foundation for future effective crop research and breeding.
affiliations: School of Life Sciences, Jiangsu University, Zhenjiang 212013, Jiangsu, China.; School of Life Sciences, Jiangsu University, Zhenjiang 212013, Jiangsu, China. Electronic address: cjinfor@163.com.

translated_keywords: 光信号；植物生长；发育响应；光敏色素；隐花色素；分子机制；细胞机制；光受体；分子生物学；植物科学
translated_abstract: 除了为光合作用提供辐射能外，阳光还携带信号，使植物能够最佳地生长、发育并适应当前环境。本文回顾了研究历程，以了解植物感知和将这些信号转化为适当生长和发育反应的细胞及分子机制。由于全面综述不可能完成，我们限制了对光感受器中光敏色素和隐花色素类的覆盖范围，同时认识到向光素和紫外光受体类在植物监测光信号方面也具有重要作用。
authors: Huq Enamul; Lin Chentao; Quail Peter H
title: Light signaling in plants-a selective history.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 光信号；植物生长；发育响应；光敏色素；隐花色素；分子机制；细胞机制；光受体；分子生物学；植物科学
translated_title: 植物的光信号转导——选择性历史
abstract: In addition to providing the radiant energy that drives photosynthesis, sunlight carries signals that enable plants to grow, develop and adapt optimally to the prevailing environment. Here we trace the path of research that has led to our current understanding of the cellular and molecular mechanisms underlying the plant's capacity to perceive and transduce these signals into appropriate growth and developmental responses. Because a fully comprehensive review was not possible, we have restricted our coverage to the phytochrome and cryptochrome classes of photosensory receptors, while recognizing that the phototropin and UV classes also contribute importantly to the full scope of light-signal monitoring by the plant.
affiliations: Department of Molecular Biosciences and The Institute for Cellular and Molecular Biology, The University of Texas at Austin, Austin, TX 78712, USA.; Basic Forestry and Plant Proteomics Research Center, Fujian Agriculture and Forestry University, Fuzhou 350002, China.; Department of Plant and Microbial Biology, University of California, Berkeley, Berkeley, CA 94720, USA.; Plant Gene Expression Center, Agricultural Research Service, US Department of Agriculture, Albany, CA 94710, USA.

translated_keywords: 作物；DREB转录因子；非生物胁迫；信号通路；植物激素
translated_abstract: 非生物胁迫是影响植物生存和生长的重要因素，在严重情况下甚至会导致植物死亡。转录因子通过调控下游基因的表达来增强植物抵抗各种胁迫的能力。脱水响应元件结合蛋白（DREB）是AP2/ERF转录因子家族中参与非生物胁迫的最大亚家族。然而，对DREB转录因子信号网络的研究不足限制了植物的生长与繁殖。此外，DREB转录因子在田间种植条件下的多重胁迫作用也需要进一步广泛研究。以往关于DREB转录因子的研究主要集中在其表达调控及其在植物非生物胁迫中的作用上。近年来，DREB转录因子研究取得了新的进展。本文综述了DREB转录因子的结构与分类、进化与调控、在非生物胁迫中的作用以及在作物中的应用，并重点介绍了DREB1/CBF的进化过程，以及在植物激素信号参与下DREB转录因子的调控机制及其亚组在非生物胁迫中的作用。未来，这将为深入研究DREB转录因子奠定坚实的基础，并为抗逆植物的培育铺平道路。
authors: Zhang Yan; Xia Pengguo
title: The DREB transcription factor, a biomacromolecule, responds to abiotic stress by regulating the expression of stress-related genes.
keywords: Crops; DREB transcription factors; Abiotic stress; Signal pathways; Plant hormones
translated_title: DREB转录因子，一种生物大分子，通过调节与应力相关的基因的表达来响应非生物胁迫。
abstract: Abiotic stress is a crucial factor that affects plant survival and growth and even leads to plant death in severe cases. Transcription factors can enhance the ability of plants to fight against various stresses by controlling the expression of downstream genes. The dehydration response element binding protein (DREB) is the most extensive subfamily of AP2/ERF transcription factors involved in abiotic stress. However, insufficient research on the signal network of DREB transcription factors has limited plant growth and reproduction. Furthermore, field planting of DREB transcription factors and their roles under multiple stress also require extensive research. Previous reports on DREB transcription factors have focused on the regulation of DREB expression and its roles in plant abiotic stress. In recent years, there has been new progress in DREB transcription factors. Here, the structure and classification, evolution and regulation, role in abiotic stress, and application in crops of DREB transcription factors were reviewed. And this paper highlighted the evolution of DREB1/CBF, as well as the regulation of DREB transcription factors under the participation of plant hormone signals and the roles of subgroups in abiotic stress. In the future, it will lay a solid foundation for further study of DREB transcription factors and pave the way for the cultivation of resistant plants.
affiliations: Key Laboratory of Plant Secondary Metabolism and Regulation of Zhejiang Province, College of Life Sciences and Medicine, Zhejiang Sci-Tech University, Hangzhou 310018, China.; Key Laboratory of Plant Secondary Metabolism and Regulation of Zhejiang Province, College of Life Sciences and Medicine, Zhejiang Sci-Tech University, Hangzhou 310018, China. translated_keywords: 基因组；序列模式挖掘；分类；核苷酸；RNA病毒
translated_abstract: 基因组序列分析与分类在深入理解生物体的主要特征、功能及其演化特性方面起着至关重要的作用。然而，随着基因组数据的快速增长，由于计算需求高、数据管理和理解困难等问题，基因组序列分析与分类成为一项极具挑战性的任务。近期提出的模型在基因组序列分类任务中取得了令人鼓舞的结果，但这些模型往往忽略了核苷酸的顺序特性，而这一特性对于揭示其潜在结构和功能至关重要。为了解决这一局限性，我们提出了SPM4GAC，这是一种基于序列模式挖掘（SPM）的框架，用于分析和分类病毒的大分子基因组序列。首先，构建了一个包含多种RNA病毒基因组序列的大型数据集，并将其转换为适合分析的格式。在转换后的数据集上，采用序列模式挖掘算法来识别核苷酸碱基的频繁顺序模式。然后，利用获得的频繁顺序模式作为特征对不同病毒进行分类。使用了十种分类器，并通过多种评估指标对其性能进行了评估。最后，与最先进的基因组序列分类/检测方法进行性能比较后发现，SPM4GAC的表现优于这些方法。
authors: Nawaz M Saqib; Fournier-Viger Philippe; Nawaz Shoaib; Zhu Haowei; Yun Unil
title: SPM4GAC: SPM based approach for genome analysis and classification of macromolecules.
keywords: Genomes; Sequential pattern mining; Classification; Nucleotides; RNA virus
translated_title: 基于SPM的基因组分析与大分子分类方法（SPM4GAC）
abstract: Genome sequence analysis and classification play critical roles in properly understanding an organism's main characteristics, functionalities, and changing (evolving) nature. However, the rapid expansion of genomic data makes genome sequence analysis and classification a challenging task due to the high computational requirements, proper management, and understanding of genomic data. Recently proposed models yielded promising results for the task of genome sequence classification. Nevertheless, these models often ignore the sequential nature of nucleotides, which is crucial for revealing their underlying structure and function. To address this limitation, we present SPM4GAC, a sequential pattern mining (SPM)-based framework to analyze and classify the macromolecule genome sequences of viruses. First, a large dataset containing the genome sequences of various RNA viruses is developed and transformed into a suitable format. On the transformed dataset, algorithms for SPM are used to identify frequent sequential patterns of nucleotide bases. The obtained frequent sequential patterns of bases are then used as features to classify different viruses. Ten classifiers are employed, and their performance is assessed by using several evaluation measures. Finally, a performance comparison of SPM4GAC with state-of-the-art methods for genome sequence classification/detection reveals that SPM4GAC performs better than those methods.
affiliations: College of Computer Science and Software Engineering, Shenzhen University, Shenzhen, China. Electronic address: msaqibnawaz@szu.edu.cn.; College of Computer Science and Software Engineering, Shenzhen University, Shenzhen, China. Electronic address: shoaib.nawaz@pharm.uol.edu.pk.; College of Computer Science and Software Engineering, Shenzhen University, Shenzhen, China. Electronic address: zhuhaowei2020@email.szu.edu.cn.; Sejong University, Seoul, Republic of Korea. Electronic address: yunei@sejong.ac.kr.

translated_keywords: 深度学习；群体分层； assortative mating（选择交配）；混合遗传；性别偏倚；人类；进化生物学；遗传结构；基因组学；遗传学
translated_abstract: 文化与社会经济差异在地理因素之外进一步分层人类社会并塑造其遗传结构。尽管社会文化分层限制了交配行为，但群体遗传学中的大多数人口模型通常假设随机交配。利用社会文化分层与混合群体遗传祖先比例之间的相关性，我们试图推断美洲的社会文化分层过程。为此，我们定义了一种交配模型，其中个体从美洲原住民、欧洲和撒哈拉以南非洲祖先群体继承的基因组比例通过与祖先相关的同质交配和性别偏见参数来约束交配概率。我们在该模型下模拟了广泛的混合场景。然后，我们训练了一个深度神经网络，并在预测基因组数据中的交配参数方面取得了良好的性能。我们的研究结果表明，由社会构建的种族和性别等级所塑造的人口分层自欧洲殖民化及随后的大西洋奴隶贸易以来，已经限制了美洲的混合过程。
authors: Mas-Sandoval Alex; Mathieson Sara; Fumagalli Matteo
title: The genomic footprint of social stratification in admixing American populations.
keywords: deep learning; population stratification; assortative mating; admixture; sex bias; human; evolutionary biology; genetic structure; genomics; genetics
translated_title: 混合群体中社会分层的基因组印记
abstract: Cultural and socioeconomic differences stratify human societies and shape their genetic structure beyond the sole effect of geography. Despite mating being limited by sociocultural stratification, most demographic models in population genetics often assume random mating. Taking advantage of the correlation between sociocultural stratification and the proportion of genetic ancestry in admixed populations, we sought to infer the former process in the Americas. To this aim, we define a mating model where the individual proportions of the genome inherited from Native American, European, and sub-Saharan African ancestral populations constrain the mating probabilities through ancestry-related assortative mating and sex bias parameters. We simulate a wide range of admixture scenarios under this model. Then, we train a deep neural network and retrieve good performance in predicting mating parameters from genomic data. Our results show how population stratification, shaped by socially constructed racial and gender hierarchies, has constrained the admixture processes in the Americas since the European colonization and the subsequent Atlantic slave trade.
affiliations: Department of Life Sciences, Silwood Park Campus, Imperial College London, London, United Kingdom.; Department of Statistical Sciences, University of Bologna, Bologna, Italy.; Department of Computer Science, Haverford College, Haverford, United States.; School of Biological and Behavioural Sciences, Queen Mary University of London, London, United Kingdom.

translated_keywords: 合成孔径雷达（SAR）；植物-病原体相互作用；β-葡聚糖
translated_abstract: 系统获得抗性（SAR）和诱导系统抗性（ISR）由多种因素引发，包括病原性和非病原性因子。β-葡聚糖主要来源于细菌和真菌，其中一些物种作为生物因子导致疾病。当β-葡聚糖进入植物时，会触发防御系统，导致一系列反应，如病原相关蛋白和防御酶的产生。通过从受干扰的微生物中提取β-葡聚糖并用作诱导剂，可以有效控制植物病害，激活植物的防御系统。在植物与病原体的互作过程中，β-葡聚糖起着关键作用。因此，建模植物-病原体关系并利用参与此互作的分子有助于控制植物病害，因为病原体具有与病原性抗性相关的基因。因此，通过提取这些化合物，在大规模上识别和使用生物诱导剂是合理的。
authors: Riseh Roohallah Saberi; Vazvani Mozhgan Gholizadeh; Kennedy John F
title: β-glucan-induced disease resistance in plants: A review.
keywords: SAR; Interaction plant-pathogen; β-Glucan
translated_title: 综述
abstract: Systemic acquired resistance (SAR) and induced systemic resistance (ISR) are caused by various factors, including both pathogenic and non-pathogenic ones. β-glucan primarily originates from bacteria and fungi, some species of these organisms work as biological agents in causing diseases. When β-glucan enters plants, it triggers the defense system, leading to various reactions such as the production of proteins related to pathogenicity and defense enzymes. By extracting β-glucan from disturbed microorganisms and using it as an inducing agent, plant diseases can be effectively controlled by activating the plant's defense system. β-glucan plays a crucial role during the interaction between plants and pathogens. Therefore, modeling the plant-pathogen relationship and using the molecules involved in this interaction can help in controlling plant diseases, as pathogens have genes related to resistance against pathogenicity. Thus, it is reasonable to identify and use biological induction agents at a large scale by extracting these compounds.

Electronic address: jfk@chembiotech.co.uk.

translated_keywords: 基因组岛检测；边界检测；分歧度量；基因组特征；特征选择
translated_abstract: 基因组岛是存在于细菌和古菌基因组中的外来DNA片段，通常与共生或致病性相关。尽管已提出了许多基因组岛检测方法，但对基因组信息处理工具和边界识别工具的效率评估仍然有限。本研究综述了基因组岛预测中涉及的统计方法，包括基因组特征、宿主特征提取、信息特征选择、分歧度测量以及边界检测等步骤。我们通过使用来自人工和真实基因组的外源片段，在模拟实验中比较了这些方法的性能。结果表明，在评估的九种基因组特征中，基因组特征频率和全概率表现最佳，但当归一化到其期望值和方差（如Z分数和组成向量）时，其性能有所下降。基于大肠杆菌基因组的实验，我们发现窗口方差的置信区间在宿主特征提取中表现最佳，最佳置信区间为标准误差的1.5至2倍。有序峰度在从单个基因组中选择信息特征时最为有效，且无需其他数据集的先验知识。在评估的三种分歧度测量方法中，双样本t检验最为成功，非重叠窗口结合小眼窗口（大小为2）最适合用于识别组成上不同的区域。最后，最大化的马尔可夫式Jensen-Shannon散度得分，在GC含量偏差方面，被发现可以加快边界检测速度，同时保持相似的错误率。
authors: Guo Xiangting; Guo Yichu; Chen Hu; Liu Xiaoqing; He Pingan; Li Wenshu; Zhang Michael Q; Dai Qi
title: Systematic comparison of genome information processing and boundary recognition tools used for genomic island detection.
keywords: Genomic island detection; Boundary detection; Divergence measure; Genomic signature; Feature selection
translated_title: 用于基因岛检测的基因组信息处理和边界识别工具的系统比较
abstract: Genomic islands are fragments of foreign DNA that are found in bacterial and archaeal genomes, and are typically associated with symbiosis or pathogenesis. While numerous genomic island detection methods have been proposed, there has been limited evaluation of the efficiency of the genome information processing and boundary recognition tools. In this study, we conducted a review of the statistical methods involved in genomic signatures, host signature extraction, informative signature selection, divergence measures, and boundary detection steps in genomic island prediction. We compared the performances of these methods on simulated experiments using alien fragments obtained from both artificial and real genomes. Our results indicate that among the nine genomic signatures evaluated, genomic signature frequency and full probability performed the best. However, their performance declined when normalized to their expectations and variances, such as Z-score and composition vector. Based on our experiments of the E. coli genome, we found that the confidence intervals of the window variances achieved the best performance in the signature extraction of the host, with the best confidence interval being 1.5-2 times the standard error. Ordered kurtosis was most effective in selecting informative signatures from a single genome, without requiring prior knowledge from other datasets. Among the three divergence measures evaluated, the two-sample t-test was the most successful, and a non-overlapping window with a small eye window (size 2) was best suited for identifying compositionally distinct regions. Finally, the maximum of the Markovian Jensen-Shannon divergence score, in terms of GC-content bias, was found to make boundary detection faster while maintaining a similar error rate.
