translated_keywords: 基因组;番茄育种;人类选择;有利性状;基因资源;基因组设计;农艺性状;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 在过去的1万年里，番茄物种经历了无意和有意的选择，以增强其对人类消费和加工有利的特性。这些选择过程显著影响了番茄物种的基因组，并在改善番茄品种方面发挥了关键作用。本文综述了番茄基因组测序的最新进展，探讨了人为选择的影响，并总结了与番茄育种中重要农艺性状相关的关键基因。我们通过几个基于基因组学的番茄育种实例，展示了基因组资源在促进番茄改良方面的潜力。此外，我们详细阐述了通过基因组设计进行番茄育种的进展和策略，并说明了这些努力如何有助于未来番茄改良，以满足可持续发展和不断变化的人类社会的需求。
authors: Wang Yan; Sun Chuanlong; Ye Zhibiao; Li Chuanyou; Huang Sanwen; Lin Tao
title: The genomic route to tomato breeding: Past, present, and future.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组;番茄育种;人类选择;有利性状;基因资源;基因组设计;农艺性状;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 过去、现在和未来
abstract: Over the past 10,000 years, tomato species have undergone both unintentional and intentional selection to enhance their favorable traits for human consumption and manufacturing. These selection processes have significantly influenced the genomes of tomato species and have played a critical role in improving tomato varieties. In this review, we summarize recent advances in tomato genome sequencing, explore the impact of human-driven selection, and recapitulate key genes associated with important agronomic traits in tomato breeding. We provide several examples of genomics-guided tomato breeding to highlight the potential of genome resources in facilitating tomato improvement. Furthermore, we elaborate the progress and strategies of tomato breeding through genome design and present how such efforts can help future enhancements of tomato to align with the demands of sustainability and evolving human societies.
affiliations: Beijing Key Laboratory of Growth and Developmental Regulation for Protected Vegetable Crops, College of Horticulture, China Agricultural University, Beijing 100193, China.; State Key Laboratory of Plant Genomics, National Center for Plant Gene Research (Beijing), Institute of Genetics and Developmental Biology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing 100101, China.; College of Horticulture Science and Engineering, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai'an 271018, China.; National Key Laboratory for Germplasm Innovation & Utilization of Horticultural Crops, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan 430070, China.; College of Life Sciences, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai'an 271018, China.; State Key Laboratory of Tropical Crop Breeding, Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory of Lingnan Modern Agriculture, Genome Analysis Laboratory of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen, Guangdong 518120, China.; State Key Laboratory of Tropical Crop Breeding, Chinese Academy of Tropical Agricultural Sciences, Haikou, Hainan 571101, China.

translated_keywords: 植物次生代谢;植物化学;二级代谢物;代谢组学;结构解析;功能研究;生物合成;生物技术;生物化学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 在过去的百年间，科学家们对构成活体植物的化学物质的身份有了初步认识，并由此展开了深入研究，探索这些分子的定位、合成机制及其最初被合成的原因。许多小分子是植物界特有的，尽管它们在植物结构、发育以及对外界环境的响应中发挥着基础且关键的作用，仍被称为植物次生代谢物。过去的一个世纪见证了对部分植物次生代谢物的结构、功能、定位及生物合成途径的阐明。然而，关于植物所产生化学物质的多样性及其在植物生物学中的作用，仍然存在诸多未解之谜。从早期对未经纯化的植物提取物进行表征，到现代通过“组学”技术整合以发现代谢物生物合成和感知过程中的基因，植物（生物）化学领域的研究为社会带来了巨大的益处，包括人类医学和农业生物技术的进步。本文回顾了这一领域的发展历程，并提出了未来的研究方向。同时，我们还介绍了近年来一些推动研究进展的新技术。
authors: Dixon Richard A; Dickinson Alexandra Jazz
title: A century of studying plant secondary metabolism-From "what?" to "where, how, and why?".
keywords: (Auto-generated) 植物次生代谢;植物化学;二级代谢物;代谢组学;结构解析;功能研究;生物合成;生物技术;生物化学;分子生物学
translated_title: 植物次生代谢研究百年历程——从“是什么”到“在哪里、如何以及为什么”。
abstract: Over the past century, early advances in understanding the identity of the chemicals that collectively form a living plant have led scientists to deeper investigations exploring where these molecules localize, how they are made, and why they are synthesized in the first place. Many small molecules are specific to the plant kingdom and have been termed plant secondary metabolites, despite the fact that they can play primary and essential roles in plant structure, development, and response to the environment. The past 100 yr have witnessed elucidation of the structure, function, localization, and biosynthesis of selected plant secondary metabolites. Nevertheless, many mysteries remain about the vast diversity of chemicals produced by plants and their roles in plant biology. From early work characterizing unpurified plant extracts, to modern integration of 'omics technology to discover genes in metabolite biosynthesis and perception, research in plant (bio)chemistry has produced knowledge with substantial benefits for society, including human medicine and agricultural biotechnology. Here, we review the history of this work and offer suggestions for future areas of exploration. We also highlight some of the recently developed technologies that are leading to ongoing research advances.
affiliations: BioDiscovery Institute and Department of Biological Sciences, University of North Texas, Denton, TX 76203, USA.; Department of Cell and Developmental Biology, University of California at San Diego, La Jolla, CA 92093, USA.

translated_keywords: intracellular gene transfers; pangenome; Triticeae; nuclear organellar gene; Poaceae; polyploidization; gene retention;生物信息学;植物进化
translated_abstract: 核基因组与细胞器（包括质体和线粒体）之间的细胞内基因转移（IGTs）在进化过程中不断重塑核基因组。尽管IGTs对基因组变异有显著贡献，但其在泛基因组水平上的动态轨迹仍不清楚。本文开发了一种名为IGTminer的方法，利用多基因组组装中的共线性和基因重新注释来绘制IGTs的进化轨迹。我们应用IGTminer构建了覆盖15个禾本科植物物种（包括67个基因组和重要作物）的核质基因（NOG）图谱。实验和测序数据集验证了这些NOG。我们的分析显示，大多数NOG是近期转移且谱系特异性的，小麦族物种比其他禾本科物种拥有更多的NOG。小麦（Triticum aestivum）的NOG保留率高于玉米（Zea mays）和水稻（Oryza sativa），保留的NOG可能参与光合作用和翻译途径。在两次多倍化过程中，大量NOG簇聚集在六倍体小麦中，促进了现代小麦种质间的遗传多样性。我们还开发了一个交互式网络服务器，以促进禾本科植物中NOG的探索。总之，本研究提供了资源和见解，揭示了IGTs在塑造种间和种内基因组变异以及推动植物基因组进化中的作用。
authors: Chen Yongming; Guo Yiwen; Xie Xiaoming; Wang Zihao; Miao Lingfeng; Yang Zhengzhao; Jiao Yuannian; Xie Chaojie; Liu Jie; Hu Zhaorong; Xin Mingming; Yao Yingyin; Ni Zhongfu; Sun Qixin; Peng Huiru; Guo Weilong
title: Pangenome-based trajectories of intracellular gene transfers in Poaceae unveil high cumulation in Triticeae.
keywords: (Auto-generated) intracellular gene transfers; pangenome; Triticeae; nuclear organellar gene; Poaceae; polyploidization; gene retention;生物信息学;植物进化
translated_title: 基于泛基因组的禾本科内细胞内基因转移轨迹揭示了小麦族的高累积现象。
abstract: Intracellular gene transfers (IGTs) between the nucleus and organelles, including plastids and mitochondria, constantly reshape the nuclear genome during evolution. Despite the substantial contribution of IGTs to genome variation, the dynamic trajectories of IGTs at the pangenomic level remain elusive. Here, we developed an approach, IGTminer, that maps the evolutionary trajectories of IGTs using collinearity and gene reannotation across multiple genome assemblies. We applied IGTminer to create a nuclear organellar gene (NOG) map across 67 genomes covering 15 Poaceae species, including important crops. The resulting NOGs were verified by experiments and sequencing data sets. Our analysis revealed that most NOGs were recently transferred and lineage specific and that Triticeae species tended to have more NOGs than other Poaceae species. Wheat (Triticum aestivum) had a higher retention rate of NOGs than maize (Zea mays) and rice (Oryza sativa), and the retained NOGs were likely involved in photosynthesis and translation pathways. Large numbers of NOG clusters were aggregated in hexaploid wheat during 2 rounds of polyploidization, contributing to the genetic diversity among modern wheat accessions. We implemented an interactive web server to facilitate the exploration of NOGs in Poaceae. In summary, this study provides resources and insights into the roles of IGTs in shaping interspecies and intraspecies genome variation and driving plant genome evolution.
affiliations: Frontiers Science Center for Molecular Design Breeding, Key Laboratory of Crop Heterosis and Utilization, Beijing Key Laboratory of Crop Genetic Improvement, China Agricultural University, Beijing 100193, China.; State Key Laboratory of Systematic and Evolutionary Botany, Institute of Botany, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing 100093, China.; University of Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing 100049, China.

translated_keywords: 生物信息学；宏基因组学；辅助基因组；宏基因组组装基因组（MAGs）；微生物生态学；核心基因组
translated_abstract: 在基因组层面，微生物在等位基因和基因组成方面表现出极高的适应性。这些可遗传的特征是响应不同环境生态位而产生的，并对微生物群落动态具有深远影响。因此，任何单一基因组或种群仅包含操作定义下“物种”总遗传多样性的一小部分，要充分理解其生态潜力，需要研究所有基因组及其所含基因。这一概念被称为泛基因组，对于研究微生物生态学和进化具有重要价值，因为它将基因组分为核心区域（存在于物种的所有基因组中，负责基本功能和物种水平的生态位适应）和辅助区域（仅存在于部分基因组中，负责种内分化）。本文介绍了一种名为SuperPang的算法，该算法可以从一组质量各异的输入基因组（包括宏基因组组装基因组MAGs）中生成泛基因组装配。SuperPang以线性时间运行，其结果完整、无冗余、保留基因顺序，并包含编码和非编码区域。我们的方法提供了泛基因组的模块化视图，能够识别操纵子和基因岛，并追踪它们在不同种群中的流行程度。我们通过分析淡水生态系统中普遍存在的细菌属Polynucleobacter的种内多样性来说明这一点，该属细菌以其简约型基因组和生态多功能性著称。我们展示了SuperPang如何在不同环境压力下同时分析等位基因和基因内容变异，从而以前所未有的分辨率研究微生物多样化的驱动因素。
authors: Puente-Sánchez Fernando; Hoetzinger Matthias; Buck Moritz; Bertilsson Stefan
title: Exploring environmental intra-species diversity through non-redundant pangenome assemblies.
keywords: bioinformatics; metagenomics; accessory genome; metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs); microbial ecology; core genome
translated_title: 通过非冗余泛基因组组装探索环境中的种内多样性
abstract: At the genome level, microorganisms are highly adaptable both in terms of allele and gene composition. Such heritable traits emerge in response to different environmental niches and can have a profound influence on microbial community dynamics. As a consequence, any individual genome or population will contain merely a fraction of the total genetic diversity of any operationally defined "species", whose ecological potential can thus be only fully understood by studying all of their genomes and the genes therein. This concept, known as the pangenome, is valuable for studying microbial ecology and evolution, as it partitions genomes into core (present in all the genomes from a species, and responsible for housekeeping and species-level niche adaptation among others) and accessory regions (present only in some, and responsible for intra-species differentiation). Here we present SuperPang, an algorithm producing pangenome assemblies from a set of input genomes of varying quality, including metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs). SuperPang runs in linear time and its results are complete, non-redundant, preserve gene ordering and contain both coding and non-coding regions. Our approach provides a modular view of the pangenome, identifying operons and genomic islands, and allowing to track their prevalence in different populations. We illustrate this by analysing intra-species diversity in Polynucleobacter, a bacterial genus ubiquitous in freshwater ecosystems, characterized by their streamlined genomes and their ecological versatility. We show how SuperPang facilitates the simultaneous analysis of allelic and gene content variation under different environmental pressures, allowing us to study the drivers of microbial diversification at unprecedented resolution.
affiliations: Department of Aquatic Sciences and Assessment, Swedish University of Agricultural Sciences, Uppsala, Sweden.

translated_keywords: 钙信号；低氧应答；植物；细胞质Ca2+；CAX家族；钙依赖性蛋白激酶；生物胁迫；分子生物学；植物生理学
translated_abstract: (1) 定义低氧如何触发并塑造这些Ca²⁺信号的动力学；(2) 鉴定大量下游元件，使Ca²⁺能够调节广泛的低氧响应网络。位于液泡膜上的Ca²⁺转运蛋白，例如CAX家族的Ca²⁺/H⁺反向转运蛋白，已成为形成与低氧相关的Ca²⁺信号的重要组成部分。下游是一系列对Ca²⁺敏感的蛋白质，如类钙调蛋白、Ca²⁺依赖性激酶以及与其相互作用的激酶的钙神经素B样蛋白。此外，其他多种调控因子，如活性氧和脂质介导的信号，在平行于Ca²⁺依赖性事件的过程中发挥作用，以紧密控制和协调低氧响应中所涉及的各种复杂反应。
authors: Bakshi Arkadipta; Gilroy Simon
title: Calcium signaling in hypoxic response.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 钙信号；低氧应答；植物；细胞质Ca2+；CAX家族；钙依赖性蛋白激酶；生物胁迫；分子生物学；植物生理学
translated_title: 低氧响应中的钙信号转导
abstract: Plants can experience a lack of oxygen due to environmental conditions, such as flooding events or intense microbial blooms in the soil, and from their own metabolic activities. The associated limit on aerobic respiration can be fatal. Therefore, plants have evolved sensing systems that monitor oxygen levels and trigger a suite of metabolic, physiologic, and developmental responses to endure, or potentially escape, these oxygen-limiting conditions. Low oxygen stress has long been known to trigger changes in cytosolic Ca2+ levels in plants, and recent work has seen some major steps forward in characterizing these events as part of a Ca2+-based signaling system through (1) defining how hypoxia may trigger and then shape the dynamics of these Ca2+ signals, and (2) identifying a host of the downstream elements that allow Ca2+ to regulate a wide-ranging network of hypoxia responses. Calcium transporters such as the CAX family of Ca2+/H+ antiporters at the tonoplast have emerged as important components of the system that forms hypoxia-related Ca2+ signals. Downstream lies a web of Ca2+-responsive proteins such as the calmodulin like proteins, Ca2+-dependent kinases, and the calcineurin-B like proteins along with their interacting kinases. A host of other regulators such as reactive oxygen species and lipid-mediated signals then act in parallel to the Ca2+-dependent events to closely control and coordinate the myriad responses that characterize the plant's low oxygen response.
affiliations: Department of Botany, University of Wisconsin-Madison, Birge Hall, 430 lincoln Drive, Madison, WI 53706, USA.

translated_keywords: Gasterosteus aculeatus）；群体基因组学
translated_abstract: 基因组测序使我们能够解答关于适应的遗传基础、种群结构以及表观遗传机制等基本问题。然而，在大多数情况下，我们需要一个合适的参考基因组来映射群体重测序数据。在一些模式生物系统中，可能存在多个参考基因组，这就带来了如何确定哪个参考基因组最适合数据的挑战。本文比较了两种不同参考基因组在三种棘鱼（刺鱼）（*Gasterosteus aculeatus*）中的应用，一种是来自欧洲雌核生殖个体的新参考基因组，另一种是北美个体的已发表参考基因组。具体而言，我们研究了使用本地参考基因组与源自不同谱系的参考基因组对几种常见的群体基因组学分析的影响。通过映射来自欧洲和北美的60条刺鱼的基因组重测序数据，我们证明样本与参考基因组之间的遗传距离会影响下游分析结果。使用本地参考基因组提高了映射效率和基因分型准确性，从而保留了更多且更好的数据。尽管基于SNP数据（即π、Tajima’s D 和FST）在整个基因组上生成的指标分布相似，但使用不同参考基因组进行窗口统计分析会导致不同的异常基因和富集的基因功能。基于标记的DNA甲基化分布分析在异常基因和功能方面具有相当高的重叠度，但具体差异取决于参考基因组。总体而言，我们的结果表明，使用本地参考基因组可以减少参考偏倚，提高下游数据分析的信心。这些结果对所有基于参考基因组的群体基因组学分析具有重要意义。
authors: Thorburn Doko-Miles J; Sagonas Kostas; Binzer-Panchal Mahesh; Chain Frederic J J; Feulner Philine G D; Bornberg-Bauer Erich; Reusch Thorsten B H; Samonte-Padilla Irene E; Milinski Manfred; Lenz Tobias L; Eizaguirre Christophe
title: Origin matters: Using a local reference genome improves measures in population genomics.
keywords: gynogenetic; read mapping; reference mapping bias; reference genomes; stickleback; genome assembly; Gasterosteus aculeatus; population genomics
translated_title: 使用本地参考基因组改善群体基因组学的测量。
abstract: Genome sequencing enables answering fundamental questions about the genetic basis of adaptation, population structure and epigenetic mechanisms. Yet, we usually need a suitable reference genome for mapping population-level resequencing data. In some model systems, multiple reference genomes are available, giving the challenging task of determining which reference genome best suits the data. Here, we compared the use of two different reference genomes for the three-spined stickleback (Gasterosteus aculeatus), one novel genome derived from a European gynogenetic individual and the published reference genome of a North American individual. Specifically, we investigated the impact of using a local reference versus one generated from a distinct lineage on several common population genomics analyses. Through mapping genome resequencing data of 60 sticklebacks from across Europe and North America, we demonstrate that genetic distance among samples and the reference genomes impacts downstream analyses. Using a local reference genome increased mapping efficiency and genotyping accuracy, effectively retaining more and better data. Despite comparable distributions of the metrics generated across the genome using SNP data (i.e. π, Tajima's D and FST ), window-based statistics using different references resulted in different outlier genes and enriched gene functions. A marker-based analysis of DNA methylation distributions had a comparably high overlap in outlier genes and functions, yet with distinct differences depending on the reference genome. Overall, our results highlight how using a local reference genome decreases reference bias to increase confidence in downstream analyses of the data. Such results have significant implications in all reference-genome-based population genomic analyses.
affiliations: School of Biological and Chemical Sciences, Queen Mary University of London, London, UK.; Department of Life Sciences, Imperial College London, London, UK.; Department of Zoology, School of Biology, Aristotle University of Thessaloniki, Thessaloniki, Greece.; Science for Life Laboratory, Department of Medical Biochemistry and Microbiology, National Bioinformatics Infrastructure Sweden (NBIS), Uppsala University, Uppsala, Sweden.; Department of Biological Sciences, University of Massachusetts Lowell, Lowell, Massachusetts, USA.; Department of Fish Ecology and Evolution, Centre of Ecology, Evolution and Biogeochemistry, EAWAG Swiss Federal Institute of Aquatic Science and Technology, Kastanienbaum, Switzerland.; Division of Aquatic Ecology and Evolution, Institute of Ecology and Evolution, University of Bern, Bern, Switzerland.; Evolutionary Bioinformatics, Institute for Evolution and Biodiversity, University of Münster, Münster, Germany.; Marine Evolutionary Ecology, GEOMAR Helmholtz Centre for Ocean Research, Kiel, Germany.; Department of Evolutionary Ecology, Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Biology, Plön, Germany.; Research Group for Evolutionary Immunogenomics, Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Biology, Plön, Germany.; Research Unit for Evolutionary Immunogenomics, Department of Biology, University of Hamburg, Hamburg, Germany.

translated_keywords: 共生；菌根共生体；食草；生态系统服务；营养级cascade；营养级相互作用
translated_abstract: 研究发现草甘膦残留比之前报道的在土壤中的存留时间更长，并影响根际微生物。这可能对作物和其他非靶标植物产生不利影响，因为植物的韧性和抗性很大程度上依赖于与之共生的微生物。土壤中普遍存在草甘膦残留，而这些残留物对其影响地上部分植物共生互惠微生物的作用尚不清楚。我们研究了土壤中除草剂残留对Epichloë属内生真菌的影响，该真菌广泛存在于冷季型草本植物的地上部分。在这类共生关系中，专性共生体完全依赖宿主植物生存，作为交换，它为宿主草提供具有抗虫性的生物碱，而宿主草则较少投入自身化学防御。首先，我们发现当直接暴露于两种浓度的草甘膦或基于草甘膦的除草剂时，Epichloë内生真菌的体外生长受到抑制。其次，我们提供了证据表明，在含有草甘膦历史的土壤中生长的内生真菌共生草地早熟禾（F. pratensis）植物中，由Epichloë产生的昆虫毒性洛林生物碱含量减少。植物在露天场地种植了两年，自然害虫侵害与草甘膦介导的洛林生物碱浓度降低呈正相关。我们的研究结果表明，土壤中的除草剂不仅会影响根际微生物群落，还会对植物地上部分内生真菌的功能产生影响，强调了草甘膦对植物共生微生物的破坏性作用，进而对植物-害虫昆虫相互作用产生了级联效应。
authors: Fuchs B; Saikkonen K; Damerau A; Yang B; Helander M
title: Herbicide residues in soil decrease microbe-mediated plant protection.
keywords: mutualism; fungal plant symbionts; herbivory; Ecosystem services; trophic cascades; trophic interactions
translated_title: 除草剂残留对土壤微生物介导的植物保护作用的影响
abstract: The residues of glyphosate are found to remain in soils longer than previously reported, affecting rhizosphere microbes. This may adversely affect crop and other non-target plants because the plant's resilience and resistance largely rely on plant-associated microbes. Ubiquitous glyphosate residues in soil and how they impact mutualistic microbes inhabiting the aboveground plant parts are largely unexplored. We studied the effects of herbicide residues in soil on Epichloë sp., which are common endophytic symbionts inhabiting aerial parts of cool-season grasses. In this symbiosis, the obligate symbiont subsists entirely on its host plant, and in exchange, it provides alkaloids conferring resistance to herbivores for the host grass that invests little in its own chemical defence. We first show decreased growth of Epichloë endophytes in vitro when directly exposed to two concentrations of glyphosate or glyphosate-based herbicides. Second, we provide evidence for a reduction of Epichloë-derived, insect-toxic loline alkaloids in endophyte-symbiotic meadow fescue (F. pratensis) plants growing in soil with a glyphosate history. Plants were grown for 2 years in an open field site, and natural herbivore infestation was correlated with the glyphosate-mediated reduction of loline alkaloid concentrations. Our findings indicate that herbicides residing in soil not only affect rhizosphere microbiota but also aerial plant endophyte functionality, which emphasizes the destructive effects of glyphosate on plant symbiotic microbes, here with cascading effects on plant-pest insect interactions.
affiliations: Biodiversity Unit, University of Turku, Turku, Finland.; Food Chemistry and Food Development, Department of Life Technologies, University of Turku, Turku, Finland.; Department of Biology, University of Turku, Turku, Finland.

translated_keywords: 合成生物学；植物二萜类化合物；生物合成途径；异源生产；药理活性；化学结构
journal_full_name: Journal of Animal Science and Biotechnology
translated_abstract: 越来越多的二萜化合物因其结构多样性和优异的生物活性而受到广泛关注，并被开发为临床药物或消费产品。大多数二萜化合物来源于植物。随着植物药材的长期开发，许多植物二萜类资源正在减少，关键活性成分的生物合成机制也逐渐成为研究热点。利用合成生物学将微生物工程化改造为“细胞工厂”以生产所需化合物是解决这些问题的重要手段。本文综述了植物来源的二萜化合物在化学结构、生物活性和生物合成途径方面的研究进展，以代表性植物二萜为例阐述其生物合成的研究进展，并总结近年来微生物中植物二萜异源生产的最新成果，希望为未来植物二萜的开发与应用奠定基础。
authors: Li Leilei; Fu Jia; Liu Nan
title: Advances in the Structures, Pharmacological Activities, and Biosynthesis of Plant Diterpenoids.
keywords: synthetic biology; Plant diterpenoids; biosynthetic pathways; heterologous production; pharmacological activities; chemical structures
translated_title: 植物二萜类化合物的结构、药理活性及生物合成研究进展
abstract: More and more diterpenoids have attracted extensive attention due to the diverse chemical structures and excellent biological activities, and have been developed into clinical drugs or consumer products. The vast majority of diterpenoids are derived from plants. With the long-term development of plant medicinal materials, the natural resources of many plant diterpenoids are decreasing, and the biosynthetic mechanism of key active components has increasingly become a research hotspot. Using synthetic biology to engineer microorganisms into "cell factories" to produce the desired compounds is an essential means to solve these problems. In this review, we depict the plant-derived diterpenoids from chemical structure, biological activities, and biosynthetic pathways. We use representative plant diterpenes as examples to expound the research progress on their biosynthesis, and summarize the heterologous production of plant diterpenoids in microorganisms in recent years, hoping to lay the foundation for the development and application of plant diterpenoids in the future.
affiliations: School of Chinese Materia Medica, Tianjin University of Traditional Chinese Medicine, Tianjin 301617, P.R. China.; State Key Laboratory of Component-based Chinese Medicine, Tianjin University of Traditional Chinese Medicine, Tianjin 301617, P.R. China.

translated_keywords: breeding；结构变异；家养动物；泛基因组
journal: Journal of animal science and biotechnology
journal_full_name: Journal of Animal Science and Biotechnology
translated_abstract: 随着大规模基因组研究的进展，人们发现单一的参考基因组模式无法代表物种层面的遗传多样性。家养动物往往具有复杂的起源和迁徙路线，这表明当前参考基因组可能遗漏了一些种群特异性的序列。相反，泛基因组是包含一个物种所有DNA序列的集合，其中既包括所有个体共享的序列（核心基因组），也能够展示每个个体特有的序列信息（可变基因组）。人类、植物以及家养动物泛基因组研究的进展证明，通过泛基因组学研究可以探索缺失的遗传成分并识别大型结构变异（SVs）。许多个体特异性序列已被证明与生物适应性、表型及重要的经济性状相关。第三代测序技术、端粒到端粒基因组、图染色体基因组以及无参组装技术的成熟将进一步推动泛基因组的发展。未来，结合长读长数据和多组学的泛基因组研究将有助于解析家养动物中的大型SVs及其与主要经济性状的关系，从而更好地揭示家养动物的驯化、进化和育种机制。本文综述了泛基因组分析在家养动物（羊、牛、猪、鸡）中揭示遗传变异及其对表型影响的方式，并探讨其如何帮助理解物种多样性。此外，我们还讨论了家畜和家禽泛基因组研究面临的潜在问题及未来展望。
authors: Gong Ying; Li Yefang; Liu Xuexue; Ma Yuehui; Jiang Lin
title: A review of the pangenome: how it affects our understanding of genomic variation, selection and breeding in domestic animals?
keywords: Breeding; Structural variations; Domestic animals; Pangenome
translated_title: 它如何影响我们对家养动物基因组变异、选择及育种的理解？
abstract: As large-scale genomic studies have progressed, it has been revealed that a single reference genome pattern cannot represent genetic diversity at the species level. While domestic animals tend to have complex routes of origin and migration, suggesting a possible omission of some population-specific sequences in the current reference genome. Conversely, the pangenome is a collection of all DNA sequences of a species that contains sequences shared by all individuals (core genome) and is also able to display sequence information unique to each individual (variable genome). The progress of pangenome research in humans, plants and domestic animals has proved that the missing genetic components and the identification of large structural variants (SVs) can be explored through pangenomic studies. Many individual specific sequences have been shown to be related to biological adaptability, phenotype and important economic traits. The maturity of technologies and methods such as third-generation sequencing, Telomere-to-telomere genomes, graphic genomes, and reference-free assembly will further promote the development of pangenome. In the future, pangenome combined with long-read data and multi-omics will help to resolve large SVs and their relationship with the main economic traits of interest in domesticated animals, providing better insights into animal domestication, evolution and breeding. In this review, we mainly discuss how pangenome analysis reveals genetic variations in domestic animals (sheep, cattle, pigs, chickens) and their impacts on phenotypes and how this can contribute to the understanding of species diversity. Additionally, we also go through potential issues and the future perspectives of pangenome research in livestock and poultry.
affiliations: Laboratory of Animal Genetics, Breeding and Reproduction, Ministry of Agriculture, Institute of Animal Sciences, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences (CAAS), Beijing, 100193, China.; National Germplasm Center of Domestic Animal Resources, Ministry of Technology, Institute of Animal Sciences, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences (CAAS), Beijing, 100193, China.; Centre d'Anthropobiologie et de Génomique de Toulouse, Université Paul Sabatier, 37 allées Jules Guesde, Toulouse, 31000, France.; Laboratory of Animal Genetics, Breeding and Reproduction, Ministry of Agriculture, Institute of Animal Sciences, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences (CAAS), Beijing, 100193, China. yuehui.ma@263.net.; National Germplasm Center of Domestic Animal Resources, Ministry of Technology, Institute of Animal Sciences, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences (CAAS), Beijing, 100193, China. yuehui.ma@263.net.; Laboratory of Animal Genetics, Breeding and Reproduction, Ministry of Agriculture, Institute of Animal Sciences, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences (CAAS), Beijing, 100193, China. Jianglin@caas.cn.; National Germplasm Center of Domestic Animal Resources, Ministry of Technology, Institute of Animal Sciences, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences (CAAS), Beijing, 100193, China. Jianglin@caas.cn.

translated_keywords: 基因组;品种;行为;形态;疾病易感性;结构变异;罕见变异;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 基因组学的最新进展，加上独特的种群结构和显著的变异水平，使家犬成为理解哺乳动物生物学基本原理的新系统。这一进步的核心是超过350个被认可的品种，每个品种都是一个封闭的种群，经历了对独特特征的选择。与其它家养哺乳动物相比，家犬的遗传变异特征尤为明确，已有近3000个高覆盖度的基因组公开可用。重要的是，随着测序基因组数量的增加，新的分析途径正在出现。本文讨论了关于行为、形态和疾病易感性的近期犬类基因组学发现。我们探讨了当前数据集在变异解释方面的局限性、测序策略之间的权衡，以及长读长基因组在捕捉结构性变异方面日益增长的作用。此外，我们还考虑了大规模全基因组序列数据集合如何推动稀有变异的发现，并评估了犬类多样性的地理分布，这表明亚洲是缺失变异的主要来源之一。最后，我们回顾了最近的比较基因组学分析，这些分析将促进狗非编码基因组的注释。
authors: Buckley Reuben M; Ostrander Elaine A
title: Large-scale genomic analysis of the domestic dog informs biological discovery.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组;品种;行为;形态;疾病易感性;结构变异;罕见变异;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 大规模基因组分析揭示家犬的生物学发现
abstract: Recent advances in genomics, coupled with a unique population structure and remarkable levels of variation, have propelled the domestic dog to new levels as a system for understanding fundamental principles in mammalian biology. Central to this advance are more than 350 recognized breeds, each a closed population that has undergone selection for unique features. Genetic variation in the domestic dog is particularly well characterized compared with other domestic mammals, with almost 3000 high-coverage genomes publicly available. Importantly, as the number of sequenced genomes increases, new avenues for analysis are becoming available. Herein, we discuss recent discoveries in canine genomics regarding behavior, morphology, and disease susceptibility. We explore the limitations of current data sets for variant interpretation, tradeoffs between sequencing strategies, and the burgeoning role of long-read genomes for capturing structural variants. In addition, we consider how large-scale collections of whole-genome sequence data drive rare variant discovery and assess the geographic distribution of canine diversity, which identifies Asia as a major source of missing variation. Finally, we review recent comparative genomic analyses that will facilitate annotation of the noncoding genome in dogs.
affiliations: National Human Genome Research Institute, National Institutes of Health, Bethesda, Maryland 20892, USA.; National Human Genome Research Institute, National Institutes of Health, Bethesda, Maryland 20892, USA eostrand@mail.nih.gov.

translated_keywords: pangenome graphs; 线性参考投影; 交互式可视化; 注释集成; 路径高亮; 基因组变异; 图形映射; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: 随着高质量基因组组装数据的日益丰富，泛基因组图谱作为一种新的基因组学研究范式，在种群和物种层面识别、编码和展示基因组变异方面发挥了重要作用。然而，通过具有生物学意义的可视化手段真正解析和解读泛基因组图谱仍然充满挑战。为了更好地探索和理解泛基因组图谱以获得新的生物学洞见，本文介绍了一个基于网络的交互式可视化与解释框架——线性参考投影泛基因组图谱可视化工具（VRPG）。VRPG 提供了高效且直观的支持，用于在基于线性基因组坐标系统（例如主要线性参考基因组）上探索和注释泛基因组图谱。此外，VRPG 还提供了许多独特的功能，如针对构成图谱输入组装体的路径高亮显示、嵌入图谱节点的拷贝数特征分析以及查询序列的基于图谱映射，这些功能对从事泛基因组图谱研究的研究人员极具价值。此外，VRPG 能够同时展示基于图谱的泛基因组表示与传统的基于主要线性参考基因组的特征注释，从而无缝衔接图谱与线性基因组背景。为进一步展示其功能性和可扩展性，我们通过专用的网络门户将 VRPG 应用于由数百个高质量基因组组装数据构建的前沿酵母和人类参考泛基因组图谱，并在图谱背景下检查了局部基因组多样性。
authors: Miao Zepu; Yue Jia-Xing
title: Interactive visualization and interpretation of pangenome graphs by linear reference-based coordinate projection and annotation integration.
keywords: (Auto-generated) pangenome graphs; 线性参考投影; 交互式可视化; 注释集成; 路径高亮; 基因组变异; 图形映射; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_title: 基于线性参考坐标投影和注释集成的泛基因组图交互式可视化与解释
abstract: With the increasing availability of high-quality genome assemblies, pangenome graphs emerged as a new paradigm in the genomic field for identifying, encoding, and presenting genomic variation at both the population and species level. However, it remains challenging to truly dissect and interpret pangenome graphs via biologically informative visualization. To facilitate better exploration and understanding of pangenome graphs toward novel biological insights, here we present a web-based interactive visualization and interpretation framework for linear reference-projected pangenome graphs (VRPG). VRPG provides efficient and intuitive support for exploring and annotating pangenome graphs along a linear-genome-based coordinate system (e.g., that of a primary linear reference genome). Moreover, VRPG offers many unique features such as in-graph path highlighting for graph-constituent input assemblies, copy number characterization for graph-embedding nodes, and graph-based mapping for query sequences, all of which are highly valuable for researchers working with pangenome graphs. Additionally, VRPG enables side-by-side visualization between the graph-based pangenome representation and the conventional primary linear reference genome-based feature annotations, therefore seamlessly bridging the graph and linear genomic contexts. To further demonstrate its functionality and scalability, we applied VRPG to the cutting-edge yeast and human reference pangenome graphs derived from hundreds of high-quality genome assemblies via a dedicated web portal and examined their local genome diversity in the graph contexts.
affiliations: State Key Laboratory of Oncology in South China, Guangdong Key Laboratory of Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma Diagnosis and Therapy, Guangdong Provincial Clinical Research Center for Cancer, Sun Yat-sen University Cancer Center, Guangzhou 510060, China yuejiaxing@gmail.com.

translated_keywords: 几何深度学习;基因组组装;重复序列;图神经网络;端粒到端粒;高倍率数据;多倍体;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 每个从头组装基因组的软件的关键阶段是识别组装图中的路径，这些路径对应于重建的基因组序列。现有的算法方法在此方面存在困难，主要是由于重复区域导致复杂的图结构纠缠，从而产生片段化的组装结果。本文介绍了一种名为GNNome的新框架，该框架基于几何深度学习，能够在组装图上进行模型训练而不依赖现有的组装策略。通过利用问题固有的对称性，GNNome使用PacBio HiFi读长重构的组装结果在连续性和质量上与最先进的工具在多种物种中相当。随着每个端粒到端粒组装的完成，我们可使用的可靠训练数据量也随之增加。结合生成大量模拟数据以涵盖各种基因组结构的能力以及人工智能方法，该框架成为未来研究复杂基因组（具有不同倍性和非整倍体）重构工作的潜在基石。为了促进此类发展，我们将框架和表现最佳的模型公开发布，作为一个可以直接用于组装新单倍体基因组的工具。
authors: Vrček Lovro; Bresson Xavier; Laurent Thomas; Schmitz Martin; Kawaguchi Kenji; Šikić Mile
title: Geometric deep learning framework for de novo genome assembly.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 几何深度学习;基因组组装;重复序列;图神经网络;端粒到端粒;高倍率数据;多倍体;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 针对从头组装基因组的几何深度学习框架
abstract: The critical stage of every de novo genome assembler is identifying paths in assembly graphs that correspond to the reconstructed genomic sequences. The existing algorithmic methods struggle with this, primarily due to repetitive regions causing complex graph tangles, leading to fragmented assemblies. Here, we introduce GNNome, a framework for path identification based on geometric deep learning that enables training models on assembly graphs without relying on existing assembly strategies. By leveraging only the symmetries inherent to the problem, GNNome reconstructs assemblies from PacBio HiFi reads with contiguity and quality comparable to those of the state-of-the-art tools across several species. With every new genome assembled telomere-to-telomere, the amount of reliable training data at our disposal increases. Combining the straightforward generation of abundant simulated data for diverse genomic structures with the AI approach makes the proposed framework a plausible cornerstone for future work on reconstructing complex genomes with different degrees of ploidy and aneuploidy. To facilitate such developments, we make the framework and the best-performing model publicly available, provided as a tool that can directly be used to assemble new haploid genomes.
affiliations: Genome Institute of Singapore, A*STAR, Singapore 138672; lovro_vrcek@gis.a-star.edu.sg mile_sikic@gis.a-star.edu.sg.; Faculty of Electrical Engineering and Computing, University of Zagreb, 10000, Zagreb, Croatia.; School of Computing, National University of Singapore, Singapore 117417.; Department of Mathematics, Loyola Marymount University, Los Angeles, California 90045, USA.; Genome Institute of Singapore, A*STAR, Singapore 138672.

translated_keywords: 生长素；乙烯；细胞分裂素；表观遗传学；赤霉素；脱落酸；组蛋白修饰
translated_abstract: 植物激素作为植物生长、发育以及对环境信号响应的关键调控因子，近年来被证实是表观遗传过程的核心调节者，这些过程控制着基因表达和表型可塑性。本文综述了植物激素与表观遗传机制之间的复杂相互作用，并强调了用于解析这些复杂关系的各种研究方法。我们全面概述了植物激素如何协调表观遗传修饰，从而塑造植物的适应性和生存策略。同时，我们也探讨了表观遗传调控因子如何维持激素平衡并调节关键植物激素的信号通路。此外，我们的研究还涉及寻找受表观遗传过程控制的植物激素调控的新基因。本综述提供了关于表观遗传与植物激素互作的现代概览，强调了其在植物生长、发育及潜在农学应用中的重要意义。
authors: Rudolf Jiri; Tomovicova Lucia; Panzarova Klara; Fajkus Jiri; Hejatko Jan; Skalak Jan
title: Epigenetics and plant hormone dynamics: a functional and methodological perspective.
keywords: auxin; ethylene; cytokinins; epigenetics; gibberellins; Abscisic acid; histone modifications
translated_title: 功能与方法学视角
abstract: Plant hormones, pivotal regulators of plant growth, development, and response to environmental cues, have recently emerged as central modulators of epigenetic processes governing gene expression and phenotypic plasticity. This review addresses the complex interplay between plant hormones and epigenetic mechanisms, highlighting the diverse methodologies that have been harnessed to decipher these intricate relationships. We present a comprehensive overview to understand how phytohormones orchestrate epigenetic modifications, shaping plant adaptation and survival strategies. Conversely, we explore how epigenetic regulators ensure hormonal balance and regulate the signalling pathways of key plant hormones. Furthermore, our investigation includes a search for novel genes that are regulated by plant hormones under the control of epigenetic processes. Our review offers a contemporary overview of the epigenetic-plant hormone crosstalk, emphasizing its significance in plant growth, development, and potential agronomical applications.
affiliations: Mendel Centre for Plant Genomics and Proteomics, CEITEC - Central European Institute of Technology, Masaryk University, Kamenice 753/5, CZ-62500 Brno, Czech Republic.; Department of Cell Biology and Radiobiology, Institute of Biophysics of the Czech Academy of Sciences, CZ-61265 Brno, Czech Republic.; National Centre for Biomolecular Research, Faculty of Science, Masaryk University, Kamenice 753/5, CZ-62500 Brno, Czech Republic.; Photon Systems Instruments, Prumyslova 470, CZ-664 24 Drasov, Czech Republic.

translated_keywords: 高覆盖率基因组; 人类基因组多样性项目; 千人基因组计划; 遗传变异; 群体结构; 混合分析; 公共数据资源; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: 由于资源匮乏，代表性不足的人群通常被排除在基因组研究之外。《千人基因组计划》（1kGP）和《人类基因组多样性计划》（HGDP）最近已达到高覆盖测序，因其捕捉到的全球多样性和开放的数据共享政策而成为宝贵的基因组资源。本文中，我们整合了来自HGDP和1kGP的80个群体共4094个高质量全基因组数据，并与《基因组聚合数据库》（gnomAD）的数据进行比对，鉴定出超过1.53亿个高质量单核苷酸变异（SNVs）、插入缺失（indels）和结构变异（SVs）。我们对该队列进行了详细的祖先分析，描述了种群结构和混合模式，分析了位点频率谱，并在全球及次大陆层面测量了变异计数。此外，我们展示了此数据集相比之前版本组件资源（通常是通过liftOver和变异交集组合而成）具有显著的附加价值，例如，我们记录了数百万个新遗传变异，其中大部分为罕见变异，与先前版本相比有所增加。除了无限制的个体级公共发布外，我们还提供了详细教程，指导如何在可扩展的云计算环境中执行这些数据的许多常见质量控制步骤和分析，并公开发布了新的相位联合调用集合，供用作相位和插补管道中的单倍型资源。该联合调用参考面板将成为支持多样化祖先人群研究的关键资源。
authors: Koenig Zan; Yohannes Mary T; Nkambule Lethukuthula L; Zhao Xuefang; Goodrich Julia K; Kim Heesu Ally; Wilson Michael W; Tiao Grace; Hao Stephanie P; Sahakian Nareh; Chao Katherine R; Walker Mark A; Lyu Yunfei; gnomAD Project Consortium; Rehm Heidi L; Neale Benjamin M; Talkowski Michael E; Daly Mark J; Brand Harrison; Karczewski Konrad J; Atkinson Elizabeth G; Martin Alicia R
title: A harmonized public resource of deeply sequenced diverse human genomes.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 高覆盖率基因组; 人类基因组多样性项目; 千人基因组计划; 遗传变异; 群体结构; 混合分析; 公共数据资源; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_title: 一个深度测序的多样化人类基因组公共数据库
abstract: Underrepresented populations are often excluded from genomic studies owing in part to a lack of resources supporting their analyses. The 1000 Genomes Project (1kGP) and Human Genome Diversity Project (HGDP), which have recently been sequenced to high coverage, are valuable genomic resources because of the global diversity they capture and their open data sharing policies. Here, we harmonized a high-quality set of 4094 whole genomes from 80 populations in the HGDP and 1kGP with data from the Genome Aggregation Database (gnomAD) and identified over 153 million high-quality SNVs, indels, and SVs. We performed a detailed ancestry analysis of this cohort, characterizing population structure and patterns of admixture across populations, analyzing site frequency spectra, and measuring variant counts at global and subcontinental levels. We also show substantial added value from this data set compared with the prior versions of the component resources, typically combined via liftOver and variant intersection; for example, we catalog millions of new genetic variants, mostly rare, compared with previous releases. In addition to unrestricted individual-level public release, we provide detailed tutorials for conducting many of the most common quality-control steps and analyses with these data in a scalable cloud-computing environment and publicly release this new phased joint callset for use as a haplotype resource in phasing and imputation pipelines. This jointly called reference panel will serve as a key resource to support research of diverse ancestry populations.
affiliations: Stanley Center for Psychiatric Research, The Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard, Cambridge, Massachusetts 02142, USA.; Analytic and Translational Genetics Unit, Massachusetts General Hospital, Boston, Massachusetts 02114, USA.; Program in Medical and Population Genetics, The Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard, Cambridge, Massachusetts 02142, USA.; Center for Genomic Medicine, Massachusetts General Hospital, Boston, Massachusetts 02114, USA.; Department of Neurology, Massachusetts General Hospital and Harvard Medical School, Boston, Massachusetts 02114, USA.; Broad Genomics, The Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard, Cambridge, Massachusetts, 02141, USA.; Data Sciences Platform, The Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard, Cambridge, Massachusetts 02142, USA.; Department of Biostatistics, Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health, Boston, Massachusetts 02115, USA.; Novo Nordisk Foundation Center for Genomic Mechanisms of Disease, Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard, Cambridge, Massachusetts 02142, USA.; Department of Medicine, Harvard Medical School, Boston, Massachusetts 02115, USA.; Institute for Molecular Medicine Finland, 00290 Helsinki, Finland.; Department of Molecular and Human Genetics, Baylor College of Medicine, Houston, Texas 77030, USA.; Stanley Center for Psychiatric Research, The Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard, Cambridge, Massachusetts 02142, USA; armartin@broadinstitute.org.

translated_keywords: 泛基因组；牦牛；PAV-GWAS；新基因；高海拔与低海拔
journal: Journal of animal science and biotechnology
journal_full_name: Journal of Animal Science and Biotechnology
translated_abstract: 野生、家养和金川。此外，通过整合基因频率、杂合性及基因PAV数据，我们提出了一个“双单倍型基因组杂交模型”，以理解品种间的杂交模式。一项基于基因PAV的全基因组关联分析（GWAS）鉴定出一个可能与金川牦牛多肋性状相关的新型基因（BosGru3G009179）。此外，综合转录组和泛基因组分析强调了高海拔和低海拔牦牛核心基因表达差异显著，并且不同表达基因的突变负荷也存在差异。跨物种的转录组分析显示，在高海拔和低海拔适应性比较中，牦牛在心脏和肺部表现出最独特的差异表达mRNA和lncRNA，特别是在高海拔和低海拔区域之间。该牦牛泛基因组为功能基因组学研究提供了全面的资源和新的见解，支持未来生物学研究和育种策略的发展。
authors: Lan Daoliang; Fu Wei; Ji Wenhui; Mipam Tserang-Donko; Xiong Xianrong; Ying Shi; Xiong Yan; Sheng Peng; Ni Jiangping; Bai Lijun; Shan Tongling; Kong Xiangdong; Li Jian
title: Pangenome and multi-tissue gene atlas provide new insights into the domestication and highland adaptation of yaks.
keywords: Pangenome; Yak; PAV-GWAS; Novel genes; High- and low-altitude
translated_title: 泛基因组和多组织基因图谱为家养牦牛的驯化及其高海拔适应提供了新的见解。
abstract: The genetic diversity of yak, a key domestic animal on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau (QTP), is a vital resource for domestication and breeding efforts. This study presents the first yak pangenome obtained through the de novo assembly of 16 yak genomes. We discovered 290 Mb of nonreference sequences and 504 new genes. Our pangenome-wide presence and absence variation (PAV) analysis revealed 5,120 PAV-related genes, highlighting a wide range of variety-specific genes and genes with varying frequencies across yak populations. Principal component analysis (PCA) based on binary gene PAV data classified yaks into three new groups: wild, domestic, and Jinchuan. Moreover, we proposed a 'two-haplotype genomic hybridization model' for understanding the hybridization patterns among breeds by integrating gene frequency, heterozygosity, and gene PAV data. A gene PAV-GWAS identified a novel gene (BosGru3G009179) that may be associated with the multirib trait in Jinchuan yaks. Furthermore, an integrated transcriptome and pangenome analysis highlighted the significant differences in the expression of core genes and the mutational burden of differentially expressed genes between yaks from high and low altitudes. Transcriptome analysis across multiple species revealed that yaks have the most unique differentially expressed mRNAs and lncRNAs (between high- and low-altitude regions), especially in the heart and lungs, when comparing high- and low-altitude adaptations. The yak pangenome offers a comprehensive resource and new insights for functional genomic studies, supporting future biological research and breeding strategies.
affiliations: Ministry of Education of Key Laboratory of Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau Animal Genetic Resource and Utilization, Southwest Minzu University, Chengdu, China. landaoliang@163.com.; College of Animal & Veterinary Sciences, Southwest Minzu University, Chengdu, China. landaoliang@163.com.; Institute of Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau, Southwest Minzu University, Chengdu, China. landaoliang@163.com.; College of Animal & Veterinary Sciences, Southwest Minzu University, Chengdu, China.; Institute of Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau, Southwest Minzu University, Chengdu, China.; Ministry of Education of Key Laboratory of Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau Animal Genetic Resource and Utilization, Southwest Minzu University, Chengdu, China.; Jiguang Gene Biotechnology Co., Ltd., Nanjing, China.; Chengdu Genepre Technology Co., Ltd., Chengdu, China.; Shanghai Veterinary Research Institute, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shanghai, China.; Jiguang Gene Biotechnology Co., Ltd., Nanjing, China. xdkong@zju.edu.cn.

translated_keywords: 上位性；代谢组学；全基因组关联分析；生化遗传学； canalization（通道化/沟道化）；数量性状位点
translated_abstract: 现代遗传学和生物化学彻底改变了我们对植物生物学的理解。然而，生化遗传学可以追溯到孟德尔遗传学的奠基时期；事实上，孟德尔发现的豌豆植株七个特性之一后来被归因于淀粉分支酶突变。本文综述了阐明植物代谢途径及其组成酶和调控因子编码基因的当前和历史策略。通过回顾历史，我们讨论了一系列经典的遗传现象，包括上位性、 canalization（通道化）和杂种优势，并通过多组学研究中目前采用的各种方法所获得的当代高通量数据进行解读。
authors: Alseekh Saleh; Karakas Esra; Zhu Feng; Wijesingha Ahchige Micha; Fernie Alisdair R
title: Plant biochemical genetics in the multiomics era.
keywords: epistasis; metabolomics; GWAS; Biochemical genetics; canalization; QTL
translated_title: 多组学时代的植物生化遗传学
abstract: Our understanding of plant biology has been revolutionized by modern genetics and biochemistry. However, biochemical genetics can be traced back to the foundation of Mendelian genetics; indeed, one of Mendel's milestone discoveries of seven characteristics of pea plants later came to be ascribed to a mutation in a starch branching enzyme. Here, we review both current and historical strategies for the elucidation of plant metabolic pathways and the genes that encode their component enzymes and regulators. We use this historical review to discuss a range of classical genetic phenomena including epistasis, canalization, and heterosis as viewed through the lens of contemporary high-throughput data obtained via the array of approaches currently adopted in multiomics studies.
affiliations: Max Planck Institute of Molecular Plant Physiology, 14476 Potsdam-Golm, Germany.; Center of Plant Systems Biology and Biotechnology, Plovdiv, Bulgaria.; National R&D Center for Citrus Preservation, Key Laboratory of Horticultural Plant Biology, Ministry of Education, Huazhong Agricultural University, 430070 Wuhan, China.

translated_keywords: PAMP触发的免疫；效应蛋白；E3连接酶；泛素化；泛素-蛋白酶体系统（UPS）；效应蛋白触发的免疫
translated_abstract: 病原体与宿主植物之间的生存斗争在其共同进化进程中发挥了至关重要的作用。然而，这场持续军备竞赛的结果主要取决于病原体分泌到宿主细胞中的效应蛋白。这些效应蛋白通过干扰植物的防御反应来促进成功感染。近年来的研究表明，越来越多的致病效应蛋白能够模拟或靶向保守的泛素-蛋白酶体系统（UPS）。泛素介导的降解途径对植物生命的各种过程不可或缺，因此，病原体似乎采用了一种以UPS为目标或模拟其功能的聪明策略。本文综述了近期关于某些致病效应蛋白如何模拟UPS组分或作为其组成部分，而另一些则直接靶向植物UPS系统的发现。
authors: Sharma Shambhavi; Prasad Ashish; Prasad Manoj
title: Ubiquitination from the perspective of plant pathogens.
keywords: PAMP-triggered immunity; effectors; E3 ligase; ubiquitination; ubiquitin–proteasome system (UPS); effector-triggered immunity
translated_title: 从植物病原体的角度看泛素化
abstract: The constant battle of survival between pathogens and host plants has played a crucial role in shaping the course of their co-evolution. However, the major determinants of the outcome of this ongoing arms race are the effectors secreted by pathogens into host cells. These effectors perturb the defense responses of plants to promote successful infection. In recent years, extensive research in the area of effector biology has reported an increase in the repertoire of pathogenic effectors that mimic or target the conserved ubiquitin-proteasome pathway. The role of the ubiquitin-mediated degradation pathway is well known to be indispensable for various aspects of a plant's life, and thus targeting or mimicking it seems to be a smart strategy adopted by pathogens. Therefore, this review summarizes recent findings on how some pathogenic effectors mimic or act as one of the components of the ubiquitin-proteasome machinery while others directly target the plant's ubiquitin-proteasome system.
affiliations: National Institute of Plant Genome Research, New Delhi, India.; Department of Botany, Kurukshetra University, Kurukshetra, India.; Department of Plant Sciences, University of Hyderabad, Hyderabad, India.

translated_keywords: KIT基因;段重复;面部脱色;图泛基因组;结构变异;白色头;重复次数;生物信息学;分子遗传学
translated_abstract: 牛在毛色、斑点以及色素减退模式等方面经历了选择性育种。尽管有人提出KIT基因上游的结构变异可能与弗莱维赫牛、西门塔尔牛和夏洛来牛等品种特有的白色头部特征有关，但其背后的显性遗传变异尚未被确定。本文通过构建包含24个单倍型组装的图谱泛基因组，首次基于长读长测序数据和泛基因组分析，识别并表征了与白色头部相关的位点。我们引入了一种全泛基因组关联映射方法，该方法通过分析图谱中的组装路径相似性，揭示了KIT基因上游66 kb处一个复杂结构变异（SV）的两个最可能的串联等位基因与面部色素减退之间的关联。该复杂SV包含数量可变的串联重复序列（每个重复大小为14.3 kb），由LTR、LINE和其他重复元件组成，这些重复元件会导致短读长和长读长测序数据在使用线性参考时出现错误比对。我们将250个短读长测序样本（涵盖15个牛品种）映射到泛基因组图谱上，进一步验证了SV的等位基因与头部色素减退相关联。通过图谱比对覆盖率估计发现，相对于西门塔尔牛和其他白色头部品种，夏洛来牛中重复序列的数量有所增加，这表明当前以夏洛来牛为基础的牛参考基因组存在大量未组装区域，其拷贝数较少。我们的研究结果表明，利用图谱泛基因组中的组装路径相似性可以揭示与性状相关的复杂结构变异。
authors: Milia Sotiria; Leonard Alexander S; Mapel Xena Marie; Bernal Ulloa Sandra Milena; Drögemüller Cord; Pausch Hubert
title: Taurine pangenome uncovers a segmental duplication upstream of KIT associated with depigmentation in white-headed cattle.
keywords: (Auto-generated) KIT基因;段重复;面部脱色;图泛基因组;结构变异;白色头;重复次数;生物信息学;分子遗传学
translated_title: 牛磺酸泛基因组揭示与白头牛去色素相关KIT上游的片段重复区域。
abstract: Cattle have been selectively bred for coat color, spotting, and depigmentation patterns. The assumed autosomal dominant inherited genetic variants underlying the characteristic white head of Fleckvieh, Simmental, and Hereford cattle have not been identified yet, although the contribution of structural variation upstream of the KIT gene has been proposed. Here, we construct a graph pangenome from 24 haplotype assemblies representing seven taurine cattle breeds to identify and characterize the white-head-associated locus for the first time based on long-read sequencing data and pangenome analyses. We introduce a pangenome-wide association mapping approach that examines assembly path similarities within the graph to reveal an association between two most likely serial alleles of a complex structural variant (SV) 66 kb upstream of KIT and facial depigmentation. The complex SV contains a variable number of tandemly duplicated 14.3 kb repeats, consisting of LTRs, LINEs, and other repetitive elements, leading to misleading alignments of short and long reads when using a linear reference. We align 250 short-read sequencing samples spanning 15 cattle breeds to the pangenome graph, further validating that the alleles of the SV segregate with head depigmentation. We estimate an increased count of repeats in Hereford relative to Simmental and other white-headed cattle breeds from the graph alignment coverage, suggesting a large under-assembly in the current Hereford-based cattle reference genome, which had fewer copies. Our work shows that exploiting assembly path similarities within graph pangenomes can reveal trait-associated complex SVs.
affiliations: Animal Genomics, ETH Zurich, Zurich 8092, Switzerland.; Animal Physiology, ETH Zurich, Zurich 8092, Switzerland.; Institute of Genetics, Vetsuisse Faculty, University of Bern, Bern 3012, Switzerland.; Animal Genomics, ETH Zurich, Zurich 8092, Switzerland; hubert.pausch@usys.ethz.ch.

translated_keywords: 比较基因组学;表观基因组浏览器;物种间比较;表观基因组数据;表观遗传差异;单核苷酸变异;结构变异;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 基因组浏览器已成为一种直观且至关重要的工具，用于可视化和分析基因组特征与数据。传统的基因组浏览器通常在单一参考基因组/组装版本上展示数据/注释；此外，还有基因组比对查看器/浏览器，帮助用户可视化同线区域之间的比对、错配和重排。然而，随着研究需求的增长，亟需一种比较表观基因组浏览器，能够跨不同物种展示基因组和表观基因组数据集，并允许用户在同线区域之间进行比较。本文介绍华盛顿大学（WashU）比较表观基因组浏览器。该浏览器允许用户加载映射到不同基因组的功能基因组数据集/注释，并同时在同线区域显示这些数据。浏览器还通过单核苷酸变异（SNV）到结构变异（SV）等遗传差异来展示基因组间的差异，从而可视化表观遗传差异与遗传差异之间的关联。它不依赖于参考基因组坐标，而是为不同的基因组组装版本创建独立坐标，以忠实地呈现映射到不同基因组上的特征和数据。它使用一个简单直观的基因比对轨迹来说明不同物种之间的同线关系。该浏览器扩展了广泛使用的WashU表观基因组浏览器基础设施，并可扩展支持多个物种。这一新功能将极大地促进比较基因组学/表观基因组学的研究，同时也支持最近日益增长的需求，即直接比较和评估端到端完整（T2T）CHM13组装和其他人类基因组组装版本。
authors: Zhuo Xiaoyu; Hsu Silas; Purushotham Deepak; Kuntala Prashant Kumar; Harrison Jessica K; Du Alan Y; Chen Samuel; Li Daofeng; Wang Ting
title: Comparing genomic and epigenomic features across species using the WashU Comparative Epigenome Browser.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 比较基因组学;表观基因组浏览器;物种间比较;表观基因组数据;表观遗传差异;单核苷酸变异;结构变异;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 使用WashU比较表观基因组浏览器比较不同物种的基因组和表观基因组特征
abstract: Genome browsers have become an intuitive and critical tool to visualize and analyze genomic features and data. Conventional genome browsers display data/annotations on a single reference genome/assembly; there are also genomic alignment viewer/browsers that help users visualize alignment, mismatch, and rearrangement between syntenic regions. However, there is a growing need for a comparative epigenome browser that can display genomic and epigenomic data sets across different species and enable users to compare them between syntenic regions. Here, we present the WashU Comparative Epigenome Browser. It allows users to load functional genomic data sets/annotations mapped to different genomes and display them over syntenic regions simultaneously. The browser also displays genetic differences between the genomes from single-nucleotide variants (SNVs) to structural variants (SVs) to visualize the association between epigenomic differences and genetic differences. Instead of anchoring all data sets to the reference genome coordinates, it creates independent coordinates of different genome assemblies to faithfully present features and data mapped to different genomes. It uses a simple, intuitive genome-align track to illustrate the syntenic relationship between different species. It extends the widely used WashU Epigenome Browser infrastructure and can be expanded to support multiple species. This new browser function will greatly facilitate comparative genomic/epigenomic research, as well as support the recent growing needs to directly compare and benchmark the T2T CHM13 assembly and other human genome assemblies.
affiliations: Department of Genetics, Washington University School of Medicine, St. Louis, Missouri 63110, USA.; The Edison Family Center for Genome Sciences and Systems Biology, Washington University School of Medicine, St. Louis, Missouri 63110, USA.; Department of Genetics, Washington University School of Medicine, St. Louis, Missouri 63110, USA; twang@genetics.wustl.edu.; McDonnell Genome Institute, Washington University School of Medicine, St. Louis, Missouri 63110, USA.

translated_keywords: 原位检测；荧光生物传感器；植物激素；空间分布；质谱成像
translated_abstract: 植物激素是调节植物生长、发育和胁迫响应等各方面的重要且结构多样的分子。然而，由于植物激素在复杂生物样本中的浓度低、水平动态变化以及空间分布复杂，其精确分析面临挑战。此外，激素信号网络的复杂性和相互关联性使得同时追踪多种激素的空间分布变得困难。本文综述了目前公认的植物小分子激素、信号肽激素和植物生长调节剂及其分析方法。我们深入探讨了质谱成像和原位荧光技术的最新进展，这些技术能够用于研究植物激素的空间分布。进一步讨论了这些成像技术的优势与局限性。最后，提出了成像技术未来可能的发展方向，以进一步增进对植物激素生物学的理解。
authors: Chen Lulu; Zhang Yue; Bu Yufen; Zhou Junhui; Man Yi; Wu Xinyuan; Yang Haobo; Lin Jinxing; Wang Xiaodong; Jing Yanping
title: Imaging the spatial distribution of structurally diverse plant hormones.
keywords: in situ detection; Fluorescent biosensors; plant hormones; spatial distribution; mass spectrometry imaging
translated_title: 成像结构多样的植物激素的空间分布
abstract: Plant hormones are essential and structurally diverse molecules that regulate various aspects of plant growth, development, and stress responses. However, the precise analysis of plant hormones in complex biological samples poses a challenge due to their low concentrations, dynamic levels, and intricate spatial distribution. Moreover, the complexity and interconnectedness of hormone signaling networks make it difficult to simultaneously trace multiple hormone spatial distributions. In this review, we provide an overview of currently recognized small-molecule plant hormones, signal peptide hormones, and plant growth regulators, along with the analytical methods employed for their analysis. We delve into the latest advancements in mass spectrometry imaging and in situ fluorescence techniques, which enable the examination of the spatial distribution of plant hormones. The advantages and disadvantages of these imaging techniques are further discussed. Finally, we propose potential avenues in imaging techniques to further enhance our understanding of plant hormone biology.
affiliations: State Key Laboratory of Tree Genetics and Breeding, College of Biological Sciences and Technology, Beijing Forestry University, No. 35 Qinghua East Road, Beijing, 100083, China.; National Engineering Research Center of Tree Breeding and Ecological Restoration, Beijing Forestry University, No. 35 Qinghua East Road, Beijing, 100083, China.; The Tree and Ornamental Plant Breeding and Biotechnology Laboratory of National Forestry and Grassland Administration, Beijing Forestry University, No. 35 Qinghua East Road, Beijing, 100083, China.; College of Life and Environmental Sciences, Centre for Imaging & Systems Biology, Minzu University of China, Beijing 100081, China.; Key Laboratory of Mass Spectrometry Imaging and Metabolomics (Minzu University of China), State Ethnic Affairs Commission, Beijing 100081, China.

translated_keywords: 大自噬；植物；巨自噬；细胞器；微自噬；液泡；自噬体形成；发育；胁迫
translated_abstract: 自噬是一种在真核生物中高度保守的细胞内降解过程。尽管植物自噬的分子机制与酵母和哺乳动物有相似之处，但也存在一些独特的机制。近期研究表明，自噬在植物营养生长阶段以及种子发育、萌发、开花和体细胞重编程等特定发育过程中起着重要作用。自噬使植物能够适应并应对诸如营养匮乏、高强度光照胁迫和热胁迫等恶劣环境条件，从而引发细胞内重塑和生理变化以响应压力。过去，植物自噬研究相对滞后于酵母和哺乳动物的相关研究；然而，近年来的研究进展极大地扩展了我们对植物特异性自噬机制和功能的理解。本文综述了当前关于植物自噬机制及其作用的研究成果，旨在加深对该重要过程的理解。
authors: Yagyu Mako; Yoshimoto Kohki
title: New insights into plant autophagy: molecular mechanisms and roles in development and stress responses.
keywords: macroautophagy; plant; mega-autophagy; organelle; microautophagy; vacuole; Autophagosome formation; development; stress
translated_title: 分子机制及其在发育和胁迫响应中的作用
abstract: Autophagy is an evolutionarily conserved eukaryotic intracellular degradation process. Although the molecular mechanisms of plant autophagy share similarities with those in yeast and mammals, certain unique mechanisms have been identified. Recent studies have highlighted the importance of autophagy during vegetative growth stages as well as in plant-specific developmental processes, such as seed development, germination, flowering, and somatic reprogramming. Autophagy enables plants to adapt to and manage severe environmental conditions, such as nutrient starvation, high-intensity light stress, and heat stress, leading to intracellular remodeling and physiological changes in response to stress. In the past, plant autophagy research lagged behind similar studies in yeast and mammals; however, recent advances have greatly expanded our understanding of plant-specific autophagy mechanisms and functions. This review summarizes current knowledge and latest research findings on the mechanisms and roles of plant autophagy with the objective of improving our understanding of this vital process in plants.
affiliations: Department of Life Sciences, School of Agriculture, Meiji University, 1-1-1 Higashimita, Tama-ku, Kawasaki, Kanagawa, 214-8571, Japan.; Life Sciences Program, Graduate School of Agriculture, Meiji University, 1-1-1 Higashimita, Tama-ku, Kawasaki, Kanagawa, 214-8571, Japan.

translated_keywords: 序列比对;泛基因组图;单倍型意识;重组惩罚;时间复杂度;锚点链;Minichain;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 见原文\]时间内解决了单倍型感知的序列到图比对问题，其中Q是查询序列，E是边集，H是图中表示的单倍型集合。为了补充我们的解决方案，我们证明了在强指数时间假设（SETH）下，不可能存在比\[公式：见原文\]更快的算法。其次，我们提出了一种单倍型感知的链式算法，该算法在图预处理后以\[公式：见原文\]的时间复杂度运行，其中N是输入锚点的数量。然后我们进一步证明了在SETH下，不可能存在比\[公式：见原文\]更快的链式算法。作为概念验证，我们将我们的链式算法实现于Minichain比对器中。通过将从人类主要组织相容性复合体（MHC）采样的序列比对到包含60个MHC单倍型的泛基因组图谱上，我们展示了我们的算法相比非单倍型感知的算法能够更好地与真实的重组结果保持一致性。
authors: Chandra Ghanshyam; Gibney Daniel; Jain Chirag
title: Haplotype-aware sequence alignment to pangenome graphs.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 序列比对;泛基因组图;单倍型意识;重组惩罚;时间复杂度;锚点链;Minichain;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 基于单倍型意识的序列比对到泛基因组图谱
abstract: Modern pangenome graphs are built using haplotype-resolved genome assemblies. When mapping reads to a pangenome graph, prioritizing alignments that are consistent with the known haplotypes improves genotyping accuracy. However, the existing rigorous formulations for colinear chaining and alignment problems do not consider the haplotype paths in a pangenome graph. This often leads to spurious read alignments to those paths that are unlikely recombinations of the known haplotypes. In this paper, we develop novel formulations and algorithms for sequence-to-graph alignment and chaining problems. Inspired by the genotype imputation models, we assume that a query sequence is an imperfect mosaic of reference haplotypes. Accordingly, we introduce a recombination penalty in the scoring functions for each haplotype switch. First, we solve haplotype-aware sequence-to-graph alignment in [Formula: see text] time, where Q is the query sequence, E is the set of edges, and H is the set of haplotypes represented in the graph. To complement our solution, we prove that an algorithm significantly faster than [Formula: see text] is impossible under the strong exponential time hypothesis (SETH). Second, we propose a haplotype-aware chaining algorithm that runs in [Formula: see text] time after graph preprocessing, where N is the count of input anchors. We then establish that a chaining algorithm significantly faster than [Formula: see text] is impossible under SETH. As a proof-of-concept, we implemented our chaining algorithm in the Minichain aligner. By aligning sequences sampled from the human major histocompatibility complex (MHC) to a pangenome graph of 60 MHC haplotypes, we demonstrate that our algorithm achieves better consistency with ground-truth recombinations compared with a haplotype-agnostic algorithm.
affiliations: Department of Computational and Data Sciences, Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore Karnataka 560012, India.; Department of Computer Science, The University of Texas at Dallas, Richardson, Texas 75080, USA.; Department of Computational and Data Sciences, Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore Karnataka 560012, India; chirag@iisc.ac.in.

translated_keywords: CRISPR–Cas；同源重组；DNA序列敲入；植物基因靶向；DNA序列替换
translated_abstract: 基因靶向技术可用于在植物基因组特定区域进行修饰，并为植物生物技术和育种开发高精度工具，但其低效率一直是限制其在植物中应用的主要障碍。CRISPR（成簇的规律间隔短回文重复序列）-Cas系统介导的位点特异性核酸酶的发现，能够诱导目标位点的双链断裂，从而推动了植物基因靶向技术的新方法的发展。近期多项研究表明，通过细胞类型特异性表达Cas核酸酶、使用自我扩增型基因靶向载体DNA或操控RNA沉默和DNA修复通路等手段可提高基因靶向效率。本文综述了CRISPR/Cas介导的植物基因靶向技术的最新进展，并讨论了潜在的效率提升策略。提高基因靶向技术的效率将有助于推动环境友好型农业中作物产量的增加和食品安全性的提升。
authors: Guzmán-Benito Irene; Achkar Natalia Patricia; Bologna Nicolas G; Ursache Robertas
title: CRISPR/Cas-mediated in planta gene targeting: current advances and challenges.
keywords: CRISPR–Cas; homologous recombination; DNA sequence knock-in; plant gene targeting; DNA sequence replacement
translated_title: 当前进展与挑战
abstract: Gene targeting can be used to make modifications at a specific region in a plant's genome and create high-precision tools for plant biotechnology and breeding. However, its low efficiency is a major barrier to its use in plants. The discovery of CRISPR (clustered regularly interspaced short palindromic repeats)-Cas-based site-specific nucleases capable of inducing double-strand breaks in desired loci resulted in the development of novel approaches for plant gene targeting. Several studies have recently demonstrated improvements in gene targeting efficiency through cell-type-specific expression of Cas nucleases, the use of self-amplified gene-targeting-vector DNA, or manipulation of RNA silencing and DNA repair pathways. In this review, we summarize recent advances in CRISPR/Cas-mediated gene targeting in plants and discuss potential efficiency improvements. Increasing the efficiency of gene targeting technology will help pave the way for increased crop yields and food safety in environmentally friendly agriculture.
affiliations: The Department of Plant Molecular Biology, University of Lausanne, 1015 Lausanne, Switzerland.; Centre for Research in Agricultural Genomics (CRAG), CSIC-IRTA-UAB-UB, Bellaterra, Barcelona 08193, Spain.

translated_keywords: 基因组;种群基因组学;花园鼠;遗传多样性;进化显著单元;种群结构;人类影响;生物多样性保护;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 基因组资源对于评估遗传多样性和支持保护工作至关重要。欧洲园睡鼠（*Eliomys quercinus*）是一种小型啮齿动物，在欧洲经历了现代最严重的种群数量下降之一。我们为欧洲园睡鼠提供了高质量的单倍型解析参考基因组，并结合全面的短读长和长读长转录组数据集以及基于同源性的方法，生成了高度完整的基因注释。基因组的种群历史分析显示，自上一次间冰期以来，其种群数量急剧下降，表明在人为影响之前，寒冷气候与种群下降之间存在关联。利用我们的基因组和来自100个个体的遗传数据（这些数据主要来源于一个公民科学项目，覆盖了该物种的现生分布范围），我们对该物种进行了首次种群基因组学分析。我们发现该物种在其中央欧洲核心分布区存在明显的种群结构。值得注意的是，我们的数据显示，阿尔卑斯山种群因其强烈的分化和较低的遗传多样性而表现出生殖隔离，可能代表了一个独特的进化显著单元（ESU）。东欧主要呈下降趋势的种群也显示出近期隔离的迹象，这一模式与全新世期间从西欧到东欧的种群扩张一致，留下了现在面临局部灭绝的遗留种群。总体而言，我们的研究结果表明，通过指定进化显著单元（ESUs），欧洲对欧洲园睡鼠的保护可能会得到增强。
authors: Byerly Paige A; von Thaden Alina; Leushkin Evgeny; Hilgers Leon; Liu Shenglin; Winter Sven; Schell Tilman; Gerheim Charlotte; Ben Hamadou Alexander; Greve Carola; Betz Christian; Bolz Hanno J; Büchner Sven; Lang Johannes; Meinig Holger; Famira-Parcsetich Evax Marie; Stubbe Sarah P; Mouton Alice; Bertolino Sandro; Verbeylen Goedele; Briner Thomas; Freixas Lídia; Vinciguerra Lorenzo; Mueller Sarah A; Nowak Carsten; Hiller Michael
title: Haplotype-resolved genome and population genomics of the threatened garden dormouse in Europe.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组;种群基因组学;花园鼠;遗传多样性;进化显著单元;种群结构;人类影响;生物多样性保护;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 欧洲濒危园睡鼠的单倍型分辨率基因组及群体基因组学研究
abstract: Genomic resources are important for evaluating genetic diversity and supporting conservation efforts. The garden dormouse (Eliomys quercinus) is a small rodent that has experienced one of the most severe modern population declines in Europe. We present a high-quality haplotype-resolved reference genome for the garden dormouse, and combine comprehensive short and long-read transcriptomics data sets with homology-based methods to generate a highly complete gene annotation. Demographic history analysis of the genome reveal a sharp population decline since the last interglacial, indicating an association between colder climates and population declines before anthropogenic influence. Using our genome and genetic data from 100 individuals, largely sampled in a citizen-science project across the contemporary range, we conduct the first population genomic analysis for this species. We find clear evidence for population structure across the species' core Central European range. Notably, our data show that the Alpine population, characterized by strong differentiation and reduced genetic diversity, is reproductively isolated from other regions and likely represents a differentiated evolutionary significant unit (ESU). The predominantly declining Eastern European populations also show signs of recent isolation, a pattern consistent with a range expansion from Western to Eastern Europe during the Holocene, leaving relict populations now facing local extinction. Overall, our findings suggest that garden dormouse conservation may be enhanced in Europe through the designation of ESUs.
