translated_abstract: 黄花繁缕属（*Chrysosplenium*）是虎耳草科的一种多年生草本植物，偏好在弱光和湿润环境中生长，根据叶序可分为交替叶组（*Alternifolia*）和对生叶组（*Oppositifolia*）。尽管近年来关于黄花繁缕属系统发育的研究取得了一些进展，但部分物种的系统发育位置仍存在争议。本研究通过组装了34种黄花繁缕属植物的叶绿体基因组（cp基因组），并结合已知的其他黄花繁缕属植物的cp基因组数据，共分析了44种黄花繁缕属植物。比较分析表明，黄花繁缕属植物的cp基因组在基因组结构、基因内容与排列、SSR以及密码子偏好等方面表现出较高的保守性，但在基因组大小及单拷贝/反向重复区边界上存在差异。系统发育分析显示，cp基因组显著提高了黄花繁缕属物种的系统发育支持度和分辨率，并强有力地支持该属为单系群，分为三个分支。结果还表明，交替叶组和对生叶组并非单系群，且小籽黄花繁缕（*C. microspermum*）并未与其他具有交替叶的黄花繁缕属物种聚类，而是与*sedakowii*分属不同分支。此外，我们鉴定出10个可能作为黄花繁缕属物种DNA条形码的突变热点区域。与盾瓣虎耳草属（*Peltoboykinia*）相比，黄花繁缕属的*clpP*和*ycf2*基因经历了正选择作用，并具有多个显著的正选择位点。进一步检测发现，黄花繁缕属两个叶组间的*petG*基因也存在显著的正选择位点。这些进化特征可能与其生长环境有关。本研究丰富了黄花繁缕属植物的cp基因组资源，为今后对其进化和起源的研究提供了参考。
authors: Yang Tiange; Wu Zhihua; Tie Jun; Qin Rui; Wang Jiangqing; Liu Hong
title: A Comprehensive Analysis of Chloroplast Genome Provides New Insights into the Evolution of the Genus Chrysosplenium.
keywords: Chrysosplenium; comparative genome; phylogeny; selection pressure; chloroplast
translated_title: 叶绿体基因组的综合分析为黄花蒿属的进化提供了新见解。
abstract: Chrysosplenium, a perennial herb in the family Saxifragaceae, prefers to grow in low light and moist environments and is divided into two sections of Alternifolia and Oppositifolia based on phyllotaxy. Although there has been some progress in the phylogeny of Chrysosplenium over the years, the phylogenetic position of some species is still controversial. In this study, we assembled chloroplast genomes (cp genomes) of 34 Chrysosplenium species and performed comparative genomic and phylogenetic analyses in combination with other cp genomes of previously known Chrysosplenium species, for a total of 44 Chrysosplenium species. The comparative analyses revealed that cp genomes of Chrysosplenium species were more conserved in terms of genome structure, gene content and arrangement, SSRs, and codon preference, but differ in genome size and SC/IR boundaries. Phylogenetic analysis showed that cp genomes effectively improved the phylogenetic support and resolution of Chrysosplenium species and strongly supported Chrysosplenium species as a monophyletic taxon and divided into three branches. The results also showed that the sections of Alternifolia and Oppositifolia were not monophyletic with each other, and that C. microspermum was not clustered with other Chrysosplenium species with alternate leaves, but with C. sedakowii into separate branches. In addition, we identified 10 mutational hotspot regions that could serve as potential DNA barcodes for Chrysosplenium species identification. In contrast to Peltoboykinia, the clpP and ycf2 genes of Chrysosplenium were subjected to positive selection and had multiple significant positive selection sites. We further detected a significant positive selection site on the petG gene between the two sections of Chrysosplenium. These evolutionary characteristics may be related to the growth environment of Chrysosplenium species. This study enriches the cp genomes of Chrysosplenium species and provides a reference for future studies on its evolution and origin.
affiliations: Hubei Provincial Key Laboratory for Protection and Application of Special Plant Germplasm in Wuling Area of China, College of Life Sciences, South-Central Minzu University, Wuhan 430074, China.; College of Life Sciences, Zhejiang Normal University, Jinhua 321004, China.; College of Computer Science, South-Central Minzu University, Wuhan 430074, China.

translated_keywords: 咪唑乙烟酸；矿质营养；磷；适应性反应；植物毒性
translated_abstract: 外源物质引起的必需矿质营养缺乏常导致植物死亡或无法完成生命周期。咪唑乙烟酸（Imazethapyr）是一种广泛应用的咪唑啉酮类除草剂，在土壤-植物系统中持久存在，可对非靶标植物产生毒性作用。然而，咪唑乙烟酸对矿质营养平衡的影响尚不完全清楚。本研究中，暴露于4和10 μg/L浓度咪唑乙烟酸下的拟南芥幼苗表现出明显的地上部分发育受阻，并呈现显著的深紫色，这通常与作物磷（P）缺乏相关。此外，与对照组相比，咪唑乙烟酸处理后拟南芥地上部分和根系中的总磷含量均显著下降。通过生理学和分子生物学分析相结合，我们发现咪唑乙烟酸会抑制无机磷（Pi）转运蛋白和酸性磷酸酶的数量及其功能。此外，咪唑乙烟酸还会损害植物应对Pi缺乏的适应策略，例如抑制Pi转运蛋白活性和阻碍根毛发育，最终加剧磷饥饿。这些结果表明，咪唑乙烟酸残留可能破坏植物的磷稳态及获取机制，为风险评估提供了有力证据，并强调了在特定条件下重新审视咪唑乙烟酸广泛使用的重要性，特别是在营养缺乏的情况下。
authors: Li Yihao; Zhang Nan; Xu Jiarui; Liu Lijuan; Cao Xiaochuang; Lin Xianyong; Sun Chengliang
title: Imazethapyr disrupts plant phosphorus homeostasis and acquisition strategies.
keywords: Imazethapyr; Mineral nutrition; Phosphorus; Adaption response; Phytotoxicity
translated_title: 咪唑乙烟酸破坏植物磷稳态和获取策略。
abstract: The deficiency of essential mineral nutrients caused by xenobiotics often results in plant mortality or an inability to complete its life cycle. Imazethapyr, a widely utilized imidazolinone herbicide, has a long-lasting presence in the soil-plant system and can induce toxicity in non-target plants. However, the effects of imazethapyr on mineral nutrient homeostasis remain poorly comprehended. In this study, Arabidopsis seedlings exposed to concentrations of 4 and 10 μg/L imazethapyr showed noticeable reductions in shoot development and displayed a distinct dark purple color, which is commonly associated with phosphorus (P) deficiency in crops. Additionally, the total P content in both the shoots and roots of Arabidopsis significantly decreased following imazethapyr treatment when compared to the control groups. Through the complementary use of physiological and molecular analyses, we discovered that imazethapyr hinders the abundance and functionality of inorganic phosphorus (Pi) transporters and acid phosphatase. Furthermore, imazethapyr impairs the plant's Pi-deficiency adaptation strategies, such as inhibiting Pi transporter activities and impeding root hair development, which ultimately exacerbate P starvation. These results provide compelling evidence that residues of imazethapyr have the potential to disrupt plant P homeostasis and acquisition strategies. These findings offer valuable insights for risk assessment and highlight the need to reconsider the indiscriminate use of imazethapyr, particularly under specific scenarios such as nutrient deficiency.
affiliations: MOE Key Laboratory of Environment Remediation and Ecological Health, College of Natural Resource & Environmental Sciences, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou 310058, PR China.; Key Laboratory of Pollution Exposure and Health Intervention of Zhejiang Province, Interdisciplinary Research Academy (IRA), Zhejiang Shuren University, Hangzhou 310015, PR China. Electronic address: liulij@zjsru.edu.cn.; State Key Laboratory of Rice Biology, China National Rice Research Institute, No. 359 Tiyuchang Road, Hangzhou 310006, PR China.; MOE Key Laboratory of Environment Remediation and Ecological Health, College of Natural Resource & Environmental Sciences, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou 310058, PR China. Electronic address: clsun@zju.edu.cn.

translated_keywords: 突变；纳米孔测序；泛基因组；重组形式；耐药性；病毒基因组；HIV-1
translated_abstract: 针对HIV-1药物耐药性的基因型检测主要通过Sanger测序法对编码不同药物靶点蛋白的基因片段进行测序。随着新型抗逆转录病毒药物类别的增加，靶点数量也随之增多，因此需要一种简单且高通量的系统来评估整个HIV-1基因组的核苷酸序列。本文开发了一种基于PCR扩增病毒泛基因组并通过纳米孔测序的新方法。使用HIV-1分子克隆的基准测试显示其准确性可达99.9%。此外，在106份临床样本的验证测试中，与基于Sanger测序数据的存档临床判定相比，本方法在耐药性和病毒株嗜性基因型判定上的符合率分别为92.5%和98.1%。这些结果表明，我们的新方法将是临床环境中全面调查HIV-1药物耐药突变的强大工具。
authors: Ode Hirotaka; Matsuda Masakazu; Shigemi Urara; Mori Mikiko; Yamamura Yoshimi; Nakata Yoshihiro; Okazaki Reiko; Kubota Mai; Setoyama Yuka; Imahashi Mayumi; Yokomaku Yoshiyuki; Iwatani Yasumasa
title: Population-based nanopore sequencing of the HIV-1 pangenome to identify drug resistance mutations.
keywords: Mutation; Nanopore sequencing; Pangenome; Recombinant forms; Drug resistance; Viral genome; HIV-1
translated_title: 基于人群的纳米孔测序研究HIV-1泛基因组以识别耐药突变
abstract: HIV-1 drug resistance genotypic tests have primarily been performed by Sanger sequencing of gene segments encoding different drug target proteins. Since the number of targets has increased with the addition of a new class of antiretroviral drugs, a simple high-throughput system for assessing nucleotide sequences throughout the HIV-1 genome is required. Here, we developed a new solution using nanopore sequencing of viral pangenomes amplified by PCR. Benchmark tests using HIV-1 molecular clones demonstrated an accuracy of up to 99.9%. In addition, validation tests of our protocol in 106 clinical samples demonstrated high concordance of drug resistance and tropism genotypes (92.5% and 98.1%, respectively) between the nanopore sequencing-based results and archived clinical determinations made based on Sanger sequencing data. These results suggest that our new approach will be a powerful solution for the comprehensive survey of HIV-1 drug resistance mutations in clinical settings.
affiliations: Clinical Research Center, National Hospital Organization Nagoya Medical Center, 4-1-1 Sannomaru, Naka-ku, Nagoya, Aichi, 460-0001, Japan.; Clinical Research Center, National Hospital Organization Nagoya Medical Center, 4-1-1 Sannomaru, Naka-ku, Nagoya, Aichi, 460-0001, Japan. iwatani.yasumasa.cp@mail.hosp.go.jp.; Division of Basic Medicine, Nagoya University Graduate School of Medicine, Nagoya, Aichi, Japan. iwatani.yasumasa.cp@mail.hosp.go.jp.

translated_keywords: 绿藻病毒；功能注释；方塔纳绿藻病毒；藻类病毒；AlphaFold；泛基因组学；基因组；绿藻病毒；衣藻DNA病毒科
translated_abstract: Phycodnaviridae是一类大型双链DNA病毒，在藻类感染和藻华生命周期中占据重要地位，因此有助于研究宿主-病毒相互作用及其共同进化。然而，由于大量未知功能的假设基因的存在，这些病毒的基因组解释受到阻碍。此外，尚不清楚这些基因中有多少在该分支中广泛共享。以Coccolithovirus这一最广泛研究的属为例，我们结合泛基因组分析、多种功能注释工具、AlphaFold结构建模以及文献分析，比较了核心与辅助泛基因组，并评估了对新功能预测的支持。结果表明，Coccolithovirus泛基因组中有30%的基因与全部14个毒株共享，构成了核心部分；而有34%的基因仅存在于最多三个毒株中。基于Coccolithovirus EhV-201藻类感染的转录组数据，核心基因在早期表达中富集，更可能与宿主蛋白相似，并且更可能参与复制、重组和修复等关键功能。此外，我们从12种不同的注释来源生成并整合了EhV代表株EhV-86的注释信息，为142个先前假设和推测的膜蛋白提供了信息。AlphaFold还成功预测了EhV-86蛋白中204个蛋白的结构，建模精度达到良好至较高水平。这些功能线索结合AlphaFold预测的结构，为未来对该模式属（以及其他巨型病毒）的表征以及对Coccolithovirus蛋白质组进化的进一步研究奠定了基础框架。
authors: Lobb Briallen; Shapter Anson; Doxey Andrew C; Nissimov Jozef I
title: Functional Profiling and Evolutionary Analysis of a Marine Microalgal Virus Pangenome.
keywords: Prasinovirus; functional annotation; Coccolithovirus; algal viruses; AlphaFold; pangenomics; genomes; Chlorovirus; Phycodnaviridae
translated_title: 海洋微藻病毒泛基因组的功能谱系分析与进化研究
abstract: Phycodnaviridae are large double-stranded DNA viruses, which facilitate studies of host-virus interactions and co-evolution due to their prominence in algal infection and their role in the life cycle of algal blooms. However, the genomic interpretation of these viruses is hampered by a lack of functional information, stemming from the surprising number of hypothetical genes of unknown function. It is also unclear how many of these genes are widely shared within the clade. Using one of the most extensively characterized genera, Coccolithovirus, as a case study, we combined pangenome analysis, multiple functional annotation tools, AlphaFold structural modeling, and literature analysis to compare the core and accessory pangenome and assess support for novel functional predictions. We determined that the Coccolithovirus pangenome shares 30% of its genes with all 14 strains, making up the core. Notably, 34% of its genes were found in at most three strains. Core genes were enriched in early expression based on a transcriptomic dataset of Coccolithovirus EhV-201 algal infection, were more likely to be similar to host proteins than the non-core set, and were more likely to be involved in vital functions such as replication, recombination, and repair. In addition, we generated and collated annotations for the EhV representative EhV-86 from 12 different annotation sources, building up information for 142 previously hypothetical and putative membrane proteins. AlphaFold was further able to predict structures for 204 EhV-86 proteins with a modelling accuracy of good-high. These functional clues, combined with generated AlphaFold structures, provide a foundational framework for the future characterization of this model genus (and other giant viruses) and a further look into the evolution of the Coccolithovirus proteome.
affiliations: Department of Biology, University of Waterloo, 200 University Ave. West., Waterloo, ON N2L 3G1, Canada.

translated_keywords: 幽门螺杆菌尿素酶阳性 (Campylobacter ureolyticus)；大环内酯类；乳腺脓肿 (breast abscess)；弯曲菌属 (Campylobacter)；泛基因组；全基因组测序 (whole-genome sequencing)；厌氧菌 (anaerobe)；大环内酯类 (macrolide)
translated_abstract: 尿素分解菌（*Campylobacter ureolyticus*）是一种新兴的人类病原体，在胃肠道感染和肠外感染中的致病作用日益受到重视。在非胃肠道感染背景下，关于该物种的基因组内容及其亲缘关系的研究较少，尤其是针对临床分离株的研究。我们回顾了过去十年本机构分离到的临床*Campylobacter ureolyticus*的流行病学特征。2010年1月至2022年8月期间共鉴定出51株独特的*Campylobacter ureolyticus*分离株，主要来源于脓肿和血培养样本。为了明确分离株之间的分类学关系，并将特定基因与不同的临床表现联系起来，我们对19株来自不同临床标本类型的可用分离株进行了全基因组测序，并结合公开数据库中的*Campylobacter ureolyticus*基因组开展了泛基因组分析。数字DNA-DNA杂交结果显示，这些*Campylobacter ureolyticus*分离株属于一个包含10个物种聚类（SCs）以及若干亚种聚类的复合种群。尽管在不同SCs和临床标本来源的分离株中观察到了某些直系同源基因或基因功能的富集现象，但未发现显著的相关性。近三分之一的分离株携带抗微生物耐药基因，包括可能赋予大环内酯类药物（人类campylobacteriosis重症治疗首选药物）耐药性的*ermA*耐药基因。本研究有效将公开可用的*Campylobacter ureolyticus*基因组数量增加了一倍，进一步明确了这一细菌复合种群内的分类学关系，并确定了未来研究的目标SCs。
authors: Maki Joel J; Howard Mondraya; Connelly Sara; Pettengill Matthew A; Hardy Dwight J; Cameron Andrew
title: Species Delineation and Comparative Genomics within the Campylobacter ureolyticus Complex.
keywords: Campylobacter ureolyticus; macrolides; breast abscess; Campylobacter; pangenome; whole-genome sequencing; anaerobe; macrolide
translated_title: 解脲支原体复合群中的物种界定与比较基因组学
abstract: Campylobacter ureolyticus is an emerging pathogen increasingly appreciated as a common cause of gastroenteritis and extra-intestinal infections in humans. Outside the setting of gastroenteritis, little work has been done to describe the genomic content and relatedness of the species, especially regarding clinical isolates. We reviewed the epidemiology of clinical C. ureolyticus cultured by our institution over the past 10 years. Fifty-one unique C. ureolyticus isolates were identified between January 2010 and August 2022, mostly originating from abscesses and blood cultures. To clarify the taxonomic relationships between isolates and to attribute specific genes with different clinical manifestations, we sequenced 19 available isolates from a variety of clinical specimen types and conducted a pangenomic analysis with publicly available C. ureolyticus genomes. Digital DNA:DNA hybridization suggested that these C. ureolyticus comprised a species complex of 10 species clusters (SCs) and several subspecies clusters. Although some orthologous genes or gene functions were enriched in isolates found in different SCs and clinical specimens, no association was significant. Nearly a third of the isolates possessed antimicrobial resistance genes, including the ermA resistance gene, potentially conferring resistance to macrolides, the treatment of choice for severe human campylobacteriosis. This work effectively doubles the number of publicly available C. ureolyticus genomes, provides further clarification of taxonomic relationships within this bacterial complex, and identifies target SCs for future analysis.
affiliations: Department of Pathology and Laboratory Medicine, University of Rochester Medical Center, Rochester, New York, USA.; Department of Pathology, Anatomy, and Cell Biology, Thomas Jefferson University, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA.; Department of Microbiology and Immunology, University of Rochester Medical Center, Rochester, New York, USA.

translated_keywords: 可持续农业；植物-微生物互作；根际微生物群；根际
translated_abstract: 可持续农业代表了对自然资源负责任的利用，同时保护自然环境的福祉。它旨在实现环境保护、经济增长以及社会经济平等的目标。为了实现人类的可持续发展，优先发展可持续农业至关重要。实现这一转型的一个重要途径是广泛利用微生物，因为植物依赖共生微生物提供的有益功能，这在遗传学上具有重要意义。本文综述了根际微生物群落（即根系微生物组，RM）的重要性。这是一种生活在根际并影响植物生长和健康的复杂微生物群落，它为宿主植物提供了多种与植物生长相关的益处，包括生物防治、生物肥料、植物刺激、根际修复、抗逆性和其他有利特性。然而，根系微生物组对可持续农业的贡献机制仍知之甚少。研究这一微生物群体为推进可持续农业提供了重大机遇。因此，本研究旨在概述根系微生物组在可持续农业实践中的多样性和应用。近年来，与根系微生物组研究及其在农业中的应用相关领域取得了越来越多的进展，包括根际工程、合成微生物组的应用、根系微生物组的基于代理的建模以及宏基因组学研究。因此，开发支持植物生长的这些有益微生物的生物制剂，可能成为未来实现新的绿色革命战略的一项有前景的解决方案。
authors: Behera Prateek Ranjan; Behera Kishan Kumar; Sethi Gangadhar; Prabina B Jeberlin; Bai A Thoyajakshi; Sipra B S; Adarsh Varanasi; Das Sasmita; Behera Kanhu Charan; Singh Lakshmi; Mishra Mihir Kumar; Behera Maheswari
title: Enhancing Agricultural Sustainability Through Rhizomicrobiome: A Review.
keywords: sustainable agriculture; plant−microbe interaction; rhizomicrobiome; rhizosphere
translated_title: 综述
abstract: Sustainable agriculture represents the responsible utilization of natural resources while safeguarding the well-being of the natural environment. It encompasses the objectives of preserving the environment, fostering economic growth, and promoting socioeconomic equality. To achieve sustainable development for humanity, it is imperative to prioritize sustainable agriculture. One significant approach to achieving this transition is the extensive utilization of microbes, which play a crucial role due to the genetic reliance of plants on the beneficial functions provided by symbiotic microbes. This review focuses on the significance of rhizospheric microbial communities, also known as the rhizomicrobiome (RM). It is a complex community of microorganisms that live in the rhizosphere and influence the plant's growth and health. It provides its host plant with various benefits related to plant growth, including biocontrol, biofertilization, phytostimulation, rhizoremediation, stress resistance, and other advantageous properties. Yet, the mechanisms by which the RM contributes to sustainable agriculture remain largely unknown. Investigating this microbial population presents a significant opportunity to advance toward sustainable agriculture. Hence, this study aims to provide an overview of the diversity and applications of RM in sustainable agriculture practices. Lately, there has been growing momentum in various areas related to rhizobiome research and its application in agriculture. This includes rhizosphere engineering, synthetic microbiome application, agent-based modeling of the rhizobiome, and metagenomic studies. So, developing bioformulations of these beneficial microorganisms that support plant growth could serve as a promising solution for future strategies aimed at achieving a new green revolution.
affiliations: School of Agriculture, GIET University, Rayagada, Odisha, India.; RCSM College of Agriculture, Kolhapur, Maharashtra, India.; Department of Botany, Shailabala Women's Autonomous College, Cuttack, Odisha, India.; Department of Soil Science and Agricultural Chemistry, VOC AGRL College and Research Institute, Killikulam, India.; Department of Plant Pathology, College of Agriculture, Jawarharlal Nehru Krishi Vishwavidyalaya, Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh, India.; Department of Botany, Ravenshaw University, Cuttack, Odisha, India.; Department of Botany, College of Basic Science and Humanities, Odisha University of Agriculture & Technology, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India.; Department of Chemistry, IIT Bombay, Mumbai, India.; Department of Plant Pathology, College of Agriculture, Odisha University of Agriculture & Technology, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India.

translated_keywords: 农杆菌；植物-微生物互作；可移动遗传元件；注释；基因组学
translated_abstract: //github.com/weisberglab/beav下载。注释基因组特征（如基因的存在及其预测功能，或编码分泌系统或生物合成基因簇的大片段）对于理解生物体所编码的功能是必要的。基因组还可以携带各种可移动遗传元件，例如整合型和结合型元件以及/或噬菌体，而现有流程通常无法注释这些元件。这些元件可以通过水平转移编码毒力、抗微生物耐药性或其他适应性功能的基因，并改变生物体的表型。我们开发了一种名为Beav的软件流程，结合新旧工具对这些及其他主要特征进行全面注释。现有流程常常错误注释植物相关细菌中与毒力或共生相关的位点。Beav包括自定义数据库和可选工作流，以改进植物相关细菌的注释。Beav的设计易于安装和运行，使全面的基因组注释广泛应用于研究社区。
authors: Jung Jewell M; Rahman Arafat; Schiffer Andrea M; Weisberg Alexandra J
title: Beav: a bacterial genome and mobile element annotation pipeline.
keywords: Agrobacterium tumefaciens; plant-microbe interactions; mobile genetic elements; annotation; genomics
translated_title: 一种细菌基因组和可移动元件注释管道
abstract: Comprehensive and accurate genome annotation is crucial for inferring the predicted functions of an organism. Numerous tools exist to annotate genes, gene clusters, mobile genetic elements, and other diverse features. However, these tools and pipelines can be difficult to install and run, be specialized for a particular element or feature, or lack annotations for larger elements that provide important genomic context. Integrating results across analyses is also important for understanding gene function. To address these challenges, we present the Beav annotation pipeline. Beav is a command-line tool that automates the annotation of bacterial genome sequences, mobile genetic elements, molecular systems and gene clusters, key regulatory features, and other elements. Beav uses existing tools in addition to custom models, scripts, and databases to annotate diverse elements, systems, and sequence features. Custom databases for plant-associated microbes are incorporated to improve annotation of key virulence and symbiosis genes in agriculturally important pathogens and mutualists. Beav includes an optional Agrobacterium-specific pipeline that identifies and classifies oncogenic plasmids and annotates plasmid-specific features. Following the completion of all analyses, annotations are consolidated to produce a single comprehensive output. Finally, Beav generates publication-quality genome and plasmid maps. Beav is on Bioconda and is available for download at https://github.com/weisberglab/beav. Annotation of genome features, such as the presence of genes and their predicted function, or larger loci encoding secretion systems or biosynthetic gene clusters, is necessary for understanding the functions encoded by an organism. Genomes can also host diverse mobile genetic elements, such as integrative and conjugative elements and/or phages, that are often not annotated by existing pipelines. These elements can horizontally mobilize genes encoding for virulence, antimicrobial resistance, or other adaptive functions and alter the phenotype of an organism. We developed a software pipeline, called Beav, that combines new and existing tools for the comprehensive annotation of these and other major features. Existing pipelines often misannotate loci important for virulence or mutualism in plant-associated bacteria. Beav includes custom databases and optional workflows for the improved annotation of plant-associated bacteria. Beav is designed to be easy to install and run, making comprehensive genome annotation broadly available to the research community.
affiliations: Department of Botany and Plant Pathology, Oregon State University, Corvallis, Oregon, USA.

translated_keywords: Human pangenome; 基因组多样性; 全相位组装; 祖先差异; 基因组参考; Nature论文; 均等见解; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: 在过去的几年里，人类泛基因组参考联盟（HPRC）的研究人员一直致力于编目几乎所有的人类基因组多样性。弗雷泽和斯科尔回顾了近期发表在《自然》上的一篇文章《一份草图人类泛基因组参考》，该文章代表了47个具有不同祖先的个体完全分相二倍体基因组组装的初步发布。
authors: Frazer Kelly A; Schork Nicholas J
title: The human pangenome reference anticipates equitable and fundamental genomic insights.
keywords: (Auto-generated) Human pangenome; 基因组多样性; 全相位组装; 祖先差异; 基因组参考; Nature论文; 均等见解; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_title: 人类泛基因组参考 anticipates 平等且基础的基因组见解
abstract: For the past few years, researchers in the Human Pangenome Reference Consortium (HPRC) have been working to catalog almost all human genomic diversity. Frazer and Schork preview an article recently published in Nature, "A draft human pangenome reference,"1 which represents the initial release of 47 fully phased diploid assemblies of genomes of individuals with diverse ancestries.

translated_keywords: 诺如病毒；选择压力；系统基因组学；序列相似性网络
translated_abstract: （1）GVIII和GIX嵌套在GII中；（2）GII.11、GII.18、GII.19（猪源诺如病毒）以及GIV和GVI的毒株形成了基于宿主的集群，特别是GIV.2[GVI.P1]毒株表明可能存在另一种人畜共患病传播实例。我们还比较了基于基因和全基因组分析的系统发育结果。总体而言，本研究是属诺如病毒系统发育基因组学分析的初步尝试，不仅有助于解释诺如病毒株之间的进化轨迹，也为开发抗病毒靶向策略提供了重要价值。
authors: Doh Huijeong; Lee Changhyeon; Kim Nam Yee; Park Yun-Yong; Kim Eun-Jeong; Choi Changsun; Eyun Seong-Il
title: Genomic diversity and comparative phylogenomic analysis of genus Norovirus.
keywords: Norovirus; Selection pressure; Phylogenomics; Sequence similarity network
translated_title: 诺如病毒属的基因组多样性和比较基因组学分析
abstract: Noroviruses consist of ten genogroups, five of which (GI, GII, GIV, GVIII, GIX) infect humans. Noroviruses are traditionally classified based on the VP1 (genotype), RdRP (P-type), or dual-typing nomenclature. However, current classifications solely relying on specific proteins may be insufficient to represent the evolutionary history due to their recombination events. Thus, it is challenging to identify the dual-types in environmental or stool samples co-infected with more than two types using the existing system. We performed a comprehensive genomic analysis using ten assembled genomes with 1417 genomes from NCBI. Our study provides a detailed examination of the genomic characteristics of norovirus and the criteria for current genotypes and P-types. The phylogenomic analysis revealed two key findings: (1) GVIII and GIX are nested within GII and (2) strains of GII.11, GII.18, and GII.19 (swine noroviruses) as well as GIV and GVI form host-based clusters, with GIV.2[GVI.P1] strains in particular suggesting the possibility of another instance of zoonotic transmission. We present a comparison of the phylogenetic findings from gene-based and genome-based analyses. Overall, our study represents an initial step towards the phylogenomic analysis of genus Norovirus. This is valuable for not only interpreting the evolutionary trajectory among norovirus strains but also developing antiviral targeting strategies.
affiliations: Department of Life Science, Chung-Ang University, Seoul, 06974, Korea.; Thermo Fisher Scientific Inc, Seoul, 06349, Korea.; Department of Diseases Research, Incheon Metropolitan City Institute of Public Health and Environment, Incheon, 22320, Korea.; Department of Food and Nutrition, Chung-Ang University, Gyeonggi, 17546, Korea.; Department of Life Science, Chung-Ang University, Seoul, 06974, Korea. eyun@cau.ac.kr.

translated_keywords: 基因组特征; 极端微生物; 环境适应; 税分类别; 机器学习; k-mer频率; 超嗜热生物; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: 本研究提供了全面的定量证据，表明对极端温度和pH值的适应在微生物嗜极菌的基因组特征中留下了可识别的环境成分印记。研究采用了有监督和无监督的机器学习算法来分析基因组特征，每个特征通过任意选取的代表基因组的500 kbp DNA片段的k-mer频率向量进行计算。计算实验对从经过整理的数据集中提取的[公式]嗜极菌（温度、pH值）细菌和古菌基因组的基因组特征进行了多尺度分类/聚类分析，分别为[公式]。有监督学习在[公式]级别上实现了较高的分类准确率，并且对于同一数据集在[公式]级别的环境类别分类也达到了中等到中高水平的准确率。对于[公式]，我们的发现与编码区氨基酸组成偏差和密码子使用模式一致，这些偏差和模式之前被归因于极端环境适应。无监督学习对未标记序列的分析识别出了一些超嗜热生物的例子，尽管它们属于生命之树的不同领域，但其基因组特征具有很大的相似性。
authors: Arias Pablo Millán; Butler Joseph; Randhawa Gurjit S; Soltysiak Maximillian P M; Hill Kathleen A; Kari Lila
title: Environment and taxonomy shape the genomic signature of prokaryotic extremophiles.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组特征; 极端微生物; 环境适应; 税分类别; 机器学习; k-mer频率; 超嗜热生物; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_title: 环境与分类学塑造了原核极端微生物的基因组特征。
abstract: This study provides comprehensive quantitative evidence suggesting that adaptations to extreme temperatures and pH imprint a discernible environmental component in the genomic signature of microbial extremophiles. Both supervised and unsupervised machine learning algorithms were used to analyze genomic signatures, each computed as the k-mer frequency vector of a 500 kbp DNA fragment arbitrarily selected to represent a genome. Computational experiments classified/clustered genomic signatures extracted from a curated dataset of [Formula: see text] extremophile (temperature, pH) bacteria and archaea genomes, at multiple scales of analysis, [Formula: see text]. The supervised learning resulted in high accuracies for taxonomic classifications at [Formula: see text], and medium to medium-high accuracies for environment category classifications of the same datasets at [Formula: see text]. For [Formula: see text], our findings were largely consistent with amino acid compositional biases and codon usage patterns in coding regions, previously attributed to extreme environment adaptations. The unsupervised learning of unlabelled sequences identified several exemplars of hyperthermophilic organisms with large similarities in their genomic signatures, in spite of belonging to different domains in the Tree of Life.
affiliations: School of Computer Science, University of Waterloo, Waterloo, ON, Canada. pmillana@uwaterloo.ca.; Department of Biology, University of Western Ontario, London, ON, Canada.; School of Mathematical and Computational Sciences, University of Prince Edward Island, Charlottetown, PE, Canada.; School of Computer Science, University of Waterloo, Waterloo, ON, Canada.

translated_keywords: 生物信息学；耳念珠菌；新发病原体；全基因组测序；流行病学
translated_abstract: 近年来，抗微生物真菌感染的临床发病率急剧上升。某些真菌病原体定植于各种体腔，导致威胁生命的血流感染。然而，在实验室中鉴定和表征真菌分离株仍然是医学和公共卫生领域的重要诊断挑战。全基因组测序提供了一种无偏见且统一的真菌病原体鉴定流程，但大多数生物信息学分析流程主要针对原核物种。为此，设计了TheiaEuk_Illumina_PE_PHB（TheiaEuk）以专注于真菌病原体的基因组分析。TheiaEuk采用容器化组件并使用工作流描述语言（WDL）编写，以便在基于云的开源生物信息学平台Terra上部署。该通用物种的工作流能够分析真菌基因组，而无需编程，从而降低了实验室科学家的入门门槛。为了证明此管道的实用性，我们调查了美国内华达州南部正在进行的耳念珠菌爆发。我们对此次爆发中的752个新分离的耳念珠菌进行了全基因组序列分析。此外，利用TheiaEuk观察了FKS1基因在整个爆发过程中突变的积累情况，强调了TheiaEuk与真菌病原体全基因组测序监测结合时作为新兴公共卫生威胁监测工具的效用。本研究的主要成果之一是一个包含5,667个独特基因组的精心整理的真菌数据库，代表了245个物种。TheiaEuk还为特定物种集成了分类特异性子模块，包括耳念珠菌的克隆型分型（C. auris）。此外，对于几种真菌物种，它执行动态参考基因组选择和变异调用，报告当前与抗真菌耐药相关的基因（FKS1、ERG11、FUR1）中发现的突变。使用ATCC真菌学收藏的基因组组装数据，TheiaEuk使用的分类鉴定模块正确地将135个基因组中的126个（93.3%）分配到物种水平，135个基因组中的131个（97%）分配到属水平，并且没有错误分类。将TheiaEuk应用于当地公共卫生实验室工作中获得的实际样本，结果在物种水平上正确识别了15个样本中的13个（86.7%），其中2个样本在属水平上被识别。没有错误分类。TheiaEuk在297/302（98.3%）的实例中准确评估了耳念珠菌的克隆型。TheiaEuk在从全基因组序列中鉴定真菌物种方面表现出有效性，并进一步展示了其在耳念珠菌克隆型分型以及鉴定已知与该菌株药物耐药相关的突变方面的准确性。
authors: Ambrosio Frank J; Scribner Michelle R; Wright Sage M; Otieno James R; Doughty Emma L; Gorzalski Andrew; Siao Danielle Denise; Killian Steve; Hua Chi; Schneider Emily; Tran Michael; Varghese Vici; Libuit Kevin G; Pandori Mark; Sevinsky Joel R; Hess David
title: TheiaEuk: a species-agnostic bioinformatics workflow for fungal genomic characterization.
keywords: bioinformatics; Candida auris; emerging pathogens; whole-genome sequencing; epidemiology
translated_title: 一种与物种无关的真菌基因组特征分析生物信息学工作流程
abstract: The clinical incidence of antimicrobial-resistant fungal infections has dramatically increased in recent years. Certain fungal pathogens colonize various body cavities, leading to life-threatening bloodstream infections. However, the identification and characterization of fungal isolates in laboratories remain a significant diagnostic challenge in medicine and public health. Whole-genome sequencing provides an unbiased and uniform identification pipeline for fungal pathogens but most bioinformatic analysis pipelines focus on prokaryotic species. To this end, TheiaEuk_Illumina_PE_PHB (TheiaEuk) was designed to focus on genomic analysis specialized to fungal pathogens. TheiaEuk was designed using containerized components and written in the workflow description language (WDL) to facilitate deployment on the cloud-based open bioinformatics platform Terra. This species-agnostic workflow enables the analysis of fungal genomes without requiring coding, thereby reducing the entry barrier for laboratory scientists. To demonstrate the usefulness of this pipeline, an ongoing outbreak of C. auris in southern Nevada was investigated. We performed whole-genome sequence analysis of 752 new C. auris isolates from this outbreak. Furthermore, TheiaEuk was utilized to observe the accumulation of mutations in the FKS1 gene over the course of the outbreak, highlighting the utility of TheiaEuk as a monitor of emerging public health threats when combined with whole-genome sequencing surveillance of fungal pathogens. A primary result of this work is a curated fungal database containing 5,667 unique genomes representing 245 species. TheiaEuk also incorporates taxon-specific submodules for specific species, including clade-typing for Candida auris (C. auris). In addition, for several fungal species, it performs dynamic reference genome selection and variant calling, reporting mutations found in genes currently associated with antifungal resistance (FKS1, ERG11, FUR1). Using genome assemblies from the ATCC Mycology collection, the taxonomic identification module used by TheiaEuk correctly assigned genomes to the species level in 126/135 (93.3%) instances and to the genus level in 131/135 (97%) of instances, and provided zero false calls. Application of TheiaEuk to actual specimens obtained in the course of work at a local public health laboratory resulted in 13/15 (86.7%) correct calls at the species level, with 2/15 called at the genus level. It made zero incorrect calls. TheiaEuk accurately assessed clade type of Candida auris in 297/302 (98.3%) of instances. TheiaEuk demonstrated effectiveness in identifying fungal species from whole genome sequence. It further showed accuracy in both clade-typing of C. auris and in the identification of mutations known to associate with drug resistance in that organism.
