translated_keywords: 飞虱；粉虱；RNA测序；蓟马；病毒入侵与传播；蚜虫；叶蝉
translated_abstract: 植物病毒通过昆虫媒介传播依赖于宿主植物、病毒和相关媒介之间明确的三边互作。新一代测序技术（包括全基因组测序、RNA/小RNA测序）、蛋白质组学和代谢组学的发展，有助于阐明昆虫媒介传播病毒以及感染宿主植物的分子机制。
authors: Jangra Sumit; Devendran Ragunathan; Ghosh Amalendu
title: Perspicacious insights into plant-virus-vector interactions applying omics.
keywords: Planthoppers; Whiteflies; RNA-seq; Thrips; Viral entry and transmission; Aphids; Leafhoppers
translated_title: 基于组学的植物-病毒-媒介昆虫相互作用的深刻见解
abstract: Transmission of plant viruses by insect vectors is facilitated by unequivocal tri-partite interactions among host plants, viruses, and associated vectors. The advent of next-generation sequencing including whole genome sequencing, RNA/small RNA sequencing, proteomics, and metabolomics aided in elucidating the molecular mechanisms involved in virus transmission by insect vectors and infection in host plants.
affiliations: UF/IFAS Tropical Research and Education Center, Homestead, FL, 33031, USA. jangra.sumit@ufl.edu.; Charles Tanford Protein Center, Martin-Luther University, 06120, Halle (Saale), Germany.; Advanced Centre for Plant Virology, Division of Plant Pathology, ICAR-Indian Agricultural Research Institute, New Delhi, 11012, India. amal4ento@gmail.com.

translated_keywords: 基因组学；生物医学；多项式插值；线性二次；支持向量；费曼-卡茨；一致相关性
translated_abstract: 基因组技术在临床生物医学领域的应用广泛，为提升医疗服务提供了可能性，涵盖了从医疗人才到疾病预测的多个方面。基因组疾病预测是生物医学研究中的重要议题。基因组疾病会导致多种复杂疾病，如癌症、痴呆症、糖尿病、莱伯氏遗传性视神经病等。现有的基于机器学习和深度学习的方法被引入用于基因组疾病的预测，但其预测结果仍不充分。为解决这一问题，提出了一种新的方法——二次费曼多项式插值与向量最近质心结合的方法（Quadratic Feynman Polynomial Interpolated and Vector Nearest Centroid-based, QFPI-VNC），以提高基因组疾病预测的敏感性和特异性。首先，我们利用公共基因组数据集中关于儿童的医学数据，并通过线性二次和费曼-卡奇基因组过滤技术获得计算效率更高的过滤结果。接着，这些结果被输入到一致性相关多项式插值中，以更精确地提取全基因组数据。最后，提取的特征被融合并输入支持向量机和最近质心模型进行基因组疾病预测。实验研究表明，所提出的QFPI-VNC方法在收敛速度、识别率、敏感性和特异性等方面均具有良好的性能表现，且相较于现有最先进的方法，其基因疾病检测率提高了14%，准确性提高了11%，敏感性提高了14%，特异性提高了12%，并且收敛速度降低了29%。这表明该方法在基因组疾病预测领域具有显著优势。
authors: Singh Sofia; Shukla Garima; Agrawal Rahul; Dhule Chetan; Allabun Sarah; Alqahtani Mohammed S; Othman Manal; Abbas Mohamed; Soufiene Ben Othman
title: Enhancing genomic disorder prediction through Feynman Concordance and Interpolated Nearest Centroid techniques.
keywords: Genomic; Biomedical; Polynomial interpolation; Linear Quadratic; Support Vector; Feynman Kac; Concordance correlated
translated_title: 通过费曼一致性及插值最近质心技术提升基因组无序预测
abstract: Clinical biomedical applications of genomic technologies are extensive and provide possibilities to enhance healthcare covering the span of medical talents. Genome disorder prediction is an important issue in biomedical research. Genome disorders cause multivariate diseases such as cancer, dementia, diabetes, Leigh syndrome, etc. Existing machine and deep learning-based methods were introduced to forecast genome disorders. However, the genome prediction outcomes were not sufficient. To address this issue, propose a new method called Quadratic Feynman Polynomial Interpolated and Vector Nearest Centroid-based (QFPI-VNC) for acutely predicting the genome disorder with improved sensitivity and specificity. First, we utilized medical data about children from a public genomes dataset and applied it to Linear Quadratic and Feynman Kac Genome filtering to obtain computationally efficient filtered results. Next, the results are fed to the Concordance Correlated Polynomial Interpolation with the purpose of extracting genome wide data in an accurate manner. Finally, the features extracted are fused and fed to the Support Vector and Nearest Centroid model for genome disorder prediction. Experimental investigations of the proposed method employing the genome dataset confirm that the performance of the proposed method is prospective and in the scope of acceptance with relative to state-of-the-art methods in terms of convergence speed, recognition rate, sensitivity, and specificity. Results suggest that the QFPI-VNC method produces the best performance with a higher genome disease detection rate by 14%, accuracy by 11%, sensitivity by 14% specificity by 12%, and lesser convergence speed by 29% than compared to state-of-the-art methods.
affiliations: Department of AI, ASET, Amity University, Noida, UP, India.; Department of CSE, Amity University, Mumbai, India.; Department of Data Science, IoT, Cybersecurity (DIC), G H Raisoni College of Engineering Nagpur, Nagpur, Maharashtra, India.; Department of Medical Education, College of Medicine, Princess Nourah bint Abdulrahman University, P.O.Box 84428, Riyadh, 11671, Saudi Arabia.; Radiological Sciences Department, College of Applied Medical Sciences, King Khalid University, Abha, 61421, Saudi Arabia.; BioImaging Unit, Space Research Centre, University of Leicester, Michael Atiyah Building, Leicester, LE1 7RH, UK.; Electrical Engineering Department, College of Engineering, King Khalid University, Abha, 61421, Saudi Arabia.; PRINCE Laboratory Research, ISITcom, Hammam Sousse, University of Sousse, Sousse, Tunisia. soufiene.benothman@isim.rnu.tn.

translated_keywords: 片段化基因组；基因家族；泛基因组；序列同源性；计算方法
translated_abstract: //github.com/InfOmics/PanDelos-frags公开获取。
authors: Bonnici Vincenzo; Mengoni Claudia; Mangoni Manuel; Franco Giuditta; Giugno Rosalba
title: PanDelos-frags: A methodology for discovering pangenomic content of incomplete microbial assemblies.
keywords: Fragmented genomes; Gene families; Pangenome; Sequence homology; Computational approach
translated_title: 一种发现不完整微生物组装的泛基因组内容的方法学
abstract: Pangenomics was originally defined as the problem of comparing the composition of genes into gene families within a set of bacterial isolates belonging to the same species. The problem requires the calculation of sequence homology among such genes. When combined with metagenomics, namely for human microbiome composition analysis, gene-oriented pangenome detection becomes a promising method to decipher ecosystem functions and population-level evolution. Established computational tools are able to investigate the genetic content of isolates for which a complete genomic sequence is available. However, there is a plethora of incomplete genomes that are available on public resources, which only a few tools may analyze. Incomplete means that the process for reconstructing their genomic sequence is not complete, and only fragments of their sequence are currently available. However, the information contained in these fragments may play an essential role in the analyses. Here, we present PanDelos-frags, a computational tool which exploits and extends previous results in analyzing complete genomes. It provides a new methodology for inferring missing genetic information and thus for managing incomplete genomes. PanDelos-frags outperforms state-of-the-art approaches in reconstructing gene families in synthetic benchmarks and in a real use case of metagenomics. PanDelos-frags is publicly available at https://github.com/InfOmics/PanDelos-frags.
affiliations: Department of Mathematical, Physical and Computer Sciences, University of Parma, Parco Area delle Scienze 53/a (Campus), Parma, 43124, PR, Italy. Electronic address: vincenzo.bonnici@unipr.it.; Department of Computer Science, University of Verona, Strada le Grazie, 15, Verona, 37134, VR, Italy.; Fondazione IRCCS Casa Sollievo della Sofferenza, San Giovanni Rotondo (FG), 71013, Italy; Department of Experimental Medicine, Sapienza University of Rome, Rome (RM), Italy.

translated_keywords: NUE（氮素利用效率）；BNI 排泄；细菌；氮淋失；根际模型
translated_abstract: (1) 铵浓度较低；(2) 铵在土壤中的吸附较强；(3) 植物对硝酸盐的吸收较快或对铵的吸收较慢；(4) 硝化细菌种群增长缓慢或快速下降。杀菌型抑制剂比抑菌型抑制剂更能促进氮吸收。然而，适度的硝化作用对于最大化铵和硝酸盐转运系统的氮吸收至关重要。因此，增加BNIs分泌应与改善铵吸收协同选择。尽管BNIs可能会降低氮吸收，但它们通常通过增加根际氮保留而对环境产生积极影响，这也是并非所有物种都分泌BNIs的原因之一。
authors: Kuppe Christian W; Postma Johannes A
title: Benefits and limits of biological nitrification inhibitors for plant nitrogen uptake and the environment.
keywords: NUE; BNI exudation; Bacteria; N leaching; Rhizosphere model
translated_title: 生物硝化抑制剂对植物氮吸收和环境影响的利与弊
abstract: Plant growth and high yields are secured by intensive use of nitrogen (N) fertilizer, which, however, pollutes the environment, especially when N is in the form of nitrate. Ammonium is oxidized to nitrate by nitrifiers, but roots can release biological nitrification inhibitors (BNIs). Under what conditions does root-exudation of BNIs facilitate nitrogen N uptake and reduce pollution by N loss to the environment? We modeled the spatial-temporal dynamics of nitrifiers, ammonium, nitrate, and BNIs around a root and simulated root N uptake and net rhizosphere N loss over the plant's life cycle. We determined the sensitivity of N uptake and loss to variations in the parameter values, testing a broad range of soil-plant-microbial conditions, including concentrations, diffusion, sorption, nitrification, population growth, and uptake kinetics. An increase in BNI exudation reduces net N loss and, under most conditions, increases plant N uptake. BNIs decrease uptake in the case of (1) low ammonium concentrations, (2) high ammonium adsorption to the soil, (3) rapid nitrate- or slow ammonium uptake by the plant, and (4) a slowly growing or (5) fast-declining nitrifier population. Bactericidal inhibitors facilitate uptake more than bacteriostatic ones. Some nitrification, however, is necessary to maximize uptake by both ammonium and nitrate transporter systems. An increase in BNI exudation should be co-selected with improved ammonium uptake. BNIs can reduce N uptake, which may explain why not all species exude BNIs but have a generally positive effect on the environment by increasing rhizosphere N retention.
affiliations: Institute of Bio- and Geosciences-Plant Sciences (IBG-2), Forschungszentrum Jülich GmbH, 52425, Jülich, Germany. c.kuppe@fz-juelich.de.; Faculty 1, RWTH Aachen University, Aachen, Germany. c.kuppe@fz-juelich.de.; Institute of Bio- and Geosciences-Plant Sciences (IBG-2), Forschungszentrum Jülich GmbH, 52425, Jülich, Germany.

translated_keywords: 泛基因组；端粒基因组；进化；人类基因组学；OMIM；常规基因组
translated_abstract: 泛基因组是某一特定物种中共同基因组和独特基因组的综合，它整合了所有采样基因组的遗传信息，形成一个庞大且多样的遗传物质集合。与传统基因组学研究相比，泛基因组分析具有诸多优势。通过整合所有采样基因组的遗传数据，它能够创造出一个广泛而多样的遗传物质谱系。与传统的基因组学研究相比，泛基因组学分析带来了许多好处。尽管最近的泛基因组学研究利用前沿测序技术揭示了生物多样性和改良的新见解，但泛基因组学在改良中的潜在应用尚未得到充分实现。在不同生物体中的泛基因组学研究表明，缺失的遗传成分以及重要结构变异（SVs）的检测可以通过泛基因组学方法进行研究。许多个体特异性序列与生物适应性、表型特征及关键经济属性相关联。本研究旨在探讨泛基因组分析如何揭示不同生物体（包括人类）之间的遗传差异及其对表型的影响，并阐明这如何帮助我们理解物种多样性。此外，本文还集中讨论了泛基因组学研究面临的潜在问题及其未来的发展前景。
authors: Sarawad Akansha; Hosagoudar Spoorti; Parvatikar Prachi
title: Pan-genomics: Insight into the Functional Genome, Applications, Advancements, and Challenges.
keywords: Pan-genomics; telomer genome; evolution; human genomics; OMIM; conventional genomic
translated_title: 功能基因组、应用、进展与挑战洞察
abstract: A pan-genome is a compilation of the common and unique genomes found in a given species. It incorporates the genetic information from all of the genomes sampled, producing a big and diverse set of genetic material. Pan-genomic analysis has various advantages over typical genomics research. It creates a vast and varied spectrum of genetic material by combining the genetic data from all the sampled genomes. Comparing pan-genomics analysis to conventional genomic research, there are a number of benefits. Although the most recent era of pan-genomic studies has used cutting-edge sequencing technology to shed fresh light on biological variety and improvement, the potential uses of pan-genomics in improvement have not yet been fully realized. Pan-genome research in various organisms has demonstrated that missing genetic components and the detection of significant Structural Variants (SVs) can be investigated using pan-genomic methods. Many individual-specific sequences have been linked to biological adaptability, phenotypic, and key economic attributes. This study aims to focus on how pangenome analysis uncovers genetic differences in various organisms, including human, and their effects on phenotypes, as well as how this might help us comprehend the diversity of species. The review also concentrated on potential problems and the prospects for future pangenome research.
affiliations: Department of Biotechnology, Applied School of Science and Technology, BLDE (DU), Vijayapura, Karnataka, India.

translated_keywords: 适应性混合;全基因组测序;Creole牛;单核苷酸多态性(SNPs);热带适应;选择信号;RXFP2基因;生物信息学;分子进化
translated_abstract: 瓜德罗普Creole牛（GUA）非常适应热带环境，其混合基因组可能在这一适应过程中发挥了重要作用。本文旨在检测GUA基因组中的选择信号。为此，我们对23头GUA个体进行了测序，并结合了代表欧洲、非洲和indicine群体的99个已测序动物的基因组数据。我们在GUA基因组中检测到17,228,983个单核苷酸多态性（SNP），从而提供了迄今为止对该品种遗传变异模式的最详细探索。我们确认了GUA的非洲和indicine祖先比例高于欧洲祖先，并揭示了GUA基因组中indicine祖先的非洲起源。我们确定了五个强候选区域，这些区域显示出过量的indicine祖先成分，并且在不同的检测方法中始终得到支持。这些区域包含与免疫、热耐受性和体力活动相关的适应性基因。我们还确认了一个先前鉴定的与角相关的基因RXFP2，在GUA群体中受到强烈的定向选择压力，这可能是由于人类驱动（社会文化）的压力所致。本研究的结果有助于深入了解家畜抗逆性特征的遗传机制。
authors: Ben-Jemaa Slim; Adam Gabriele; Boussaha Mekki; Bardou Philippe; Klopp Christophe; Mandonnet Nathalie; Naves Michel
title: Whole genome sequencing reveals signals of adaptive admixture in Creole cattle.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 适应性混合;全基因组测序;Creole牛;单核苷酸多态性(SNPs);热带适应;选择信号;RXFP2基因;生物信息学;分子进化
translated_title: 全基因组测序揭示了克里奥尔牛中的适应性混合信号。
abstract: The Creole cattle from Guadeloupe (GUA) are well adapted to the tropical environment. Its admixed genome likely played an important role in such adaptation. Here, we sought to detect genomic signatures of selection in the GUA genome. For this purpose, we sequenced 23 GUA individuals and combined our data with sequenced genomes of 99 animals representative of European, African and indicine groups. We detect 17,228,983 single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) in the GUA genome, providing the most detailed exploration, to date, of patterns of genetic variation in this breed. We confirm the higher level of African and indicine ancestries, compared to the European ancestry and we highlight the African origin of indicine ancestry in the GUA genome. We identify five strong candidate regions showing an excess of indicine ancestry and consistently supported across the different detection methods. These regions encompass genes with adaptive roles in relation to immunity, thermotolerance and physical activity. We confirmed a previously identified horn-related gene, RXFP2, as a gene under strong selective pressure in the GUA population likely owing to human-driven (socio-cultural) pressure. Findings from this study provide insight into the genetic mechanisms associated with resilience traits in livestock.
affiliations: INRAE, ASSET, 97170, Petit-Bourg, France. slim.ben-jemaa@inrae.fr.; Laboratoire des Productions Animales et Fourragères, Institut National de la Recherche Agronomique de Tunisie, Université de Carthage, 2049, Ariana, Tunisia. slim.ben-jemaa@inrae.fr.; INRAE, ASSET, 97170, Petit-Bourg, France.; AgroParisTech, GABI, INRAE, Université Paris-Saclay, 78350, Jouy-en-Josas, France.; GenPhySE, Ecole Nationale Vétérinaire de Toulouse (ENVT), INRA, Université de Toulouse, 24 Chemin de Borde Rouge, 31320, Castanet-Tolosan, France.; Sigenae, INRAE, 24 Chemin de Borde Rouge, 31320, Castanet-Tolosan, France.; Genotoul Bioinfo, BioInfoMics, MIAT UR875, Sigenae, INRAE, Castanet-Tolosan, France.; INRAE, ASSET, 97170, Petit-Bourg, France. michel.naves@inrae.fr.

translated_keywords: 铜绿假单胞菌；抗菌耐药；单元图；De Bruijn 图；特征选择
translated_abstract: 在当前的基因组研究中，广泛使用的抗微生物药物耐药性（AMR）预测方法通常依赖于已知AMR基因或参考基因组的先验知识。然而，这些方法存在局限性，由于对AMR机制和遗传变异的覆盖不完全，可能导致预测不够精确。为克服这些限制，我们提出了一种基于泛基因组的机器学习方法，以深化对AMR基因库的理解，并揭示用于精确分类AMR的潜在特征集。通过从数千个基因组构建紧凑型de Bruijn图（cDBG），并收集铜绿假单胞菌独特序列（unitigs）的存在/缺失模式，我们发现基于unitig为中心的泛基因组使用机器学习模型能够显著提高对抗生素耐药性或敏感性的准确预测。采用基于特征选择的机器学习算法，在训练数据集（受试者工作特征曲线下的面积（AUC）> 0.929）和独立验证数据集（AUC约为0.77）上均表现出令人满意的表现。此外，所选的unitigs揭示了之前未被识别的耐药基因，从而扩展了尚未在抗生素耐药性文献中描述的耐药基因库。这些结果表明，我们提出的基于unitig的泛基因组特征集在构建能够准确识别AMR病原体的机器学习预测器方面是有效的。通过这种方法提取的基因集可能为扩展已知的AMR基因以及形成新假设以揭示细菌AMR的潜在机制提供有价值的见解。
authors: Do Duyen Thi; Yang Ming-Ren; Vo Tran Nam Son; Le Nguyen Quoc Khanh; Wu Yu-Wei
title: Unitig-centered pan-genome machine learning approach for predicting antibiotic resistance and discovering novel resistance genes in bacterial strains.
keywords: Pseudomonas aeruginosa; Antimicrobial resistance; Unitig; De Bruijn graph, Feature selection
translated_title: 以单链单元为中心的泛基因组机器学习方法用于预测细菌株的抗生素耐药性并发现新的耐药基因
abstract: In current genomic research, the widely used methods for predicting antimicrobial resistance (AMR) often rely on prior knowledge of known AMR genes or reference genomes. However, these methods have limitations, potentially resulting in imprecise predictions owing to incomplete coverage of AMR mechanisms and genetic variations. To overcome these limitations, we propose a pan-genome-based machine learning approach to advance our understanding of AMR gene repertoires and uncover possible feature sets for precise AMR classification. By building compacted de Brujin graphs (cDBGs) from thousands of genomes and collecting the presence/absence patterns of unique sequences (unitigs) for Pseudomonas aeruginosa, we determined that using machine learning models on unitig-centered pan-genomes showed significant promise for accurately predicting the antibiotic resistance or susceptibility of microbial strains. Applying a feature-selection-based machine learning algorithm led to satisfactory predictive performance for the training dataset (with an area under the receiver operating characteristic curve (AUC) of > 0.929) and an independent validation dataset (AUC, approximately 0.77). Furthermore, the selected unitigs revealed previously unidentified resistance genes, allowing for the expansion of the resistance gene repertoire to those that have not previously been described in the literature on antibiotic resistance. These results demonstrate that our proposed unitig-based pan-genome feature set was effective in constructing machine learning predictors that could accurately identify AMR pathogens. Gene sets extracted using this approach may offer valuable insights into expanding known AMR genes and forming new hypotheses to uncover the underlying mechanisms of bacterial AMR.
affiliations: Graduate Institute of Biomedical Informatics, College of Medical Science and Technology, Taipei Medical University, Taipei, Taiwan.; Department of Electrical Engineering, National Taiwan University of Science and Technology, Taipei, Taiwan.; Department of Business Administration, College of Management, Lunghwa University of Science and Technology, Taoyuan City, Taiwan.; Professional Master Program in Artificial Intelligence in Medicine, College of Medicine, Taipei Medical University, Taipei, Taiwan.; Clinical Big Data Research Center, Taipei Medical University Hospital, Taipei, Taiwan.; TMU Research Center for Digestive Medicine, Taipei Medical University, Taipei, Taiwan.

translated_keywords: 致病性; 血流感染; 埃希氏菌; 全基因组; 毒力基因; 抗微生物耐药基因; 遗传变异; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: 大肠杆菌（*Escherichia coli*）是一种高度常见的共生菌，同时也是导致血流感染（BSI）的主要条件致病菌。目前尚缺乏系统分析来表征人类群体中外源性致病株与共生株在基因组决定因素方面的差异，这可能为阐明其致病机制、诊断方法、预防和治疗提供重要信息。我们使用了法国在17年期间（2000-2017年）收集的912株BSI分离株和370株共生株进行研究。通过比较它们的泛基因组、遗传背景（谱系、ST型、O群）、毒力相关基因（VAGs）以及抗菌耐药基因的存在情况，发现共生株与BSI株在所有比较中均存在显著差异。基于泛基因组衍生的所有遗传变异构建的机器学习线性模型，在控制种群结构后，揭示了VAGs中的相似差异，发现了与致病性相关的新型变异，并能够准确区分BSI株与共生株。致病性是一种高度可遗传的特征，细菌遗传变异可以解释高达69%的方差。此外，我们将共生株集合补充以1980年的旧有分离株集合，预测显示致病性从1980年到2000年再到2010年持续增加。综合来看，我们的研究结果表明，大肠杆菌表现出显著的遗传变异，这些变异促进了共生与致病状态之间的转换，且该物种正在向更高的致病性方向进化。
authors: Burgaya Judit; Marin Julie; Royer Guilhem; Condamine Bénédicte; Gachet Benoit; Clermont Olivier; Jaureguy Françoise; Burdet Charles; Lefort Agnès; de Lastours Victoire; Denamur Erick; Galardini Marco; Blanquart François; Colibafi/Septicoli & Coliville groups
title: The bacterial genetic determinants of Escherichia coli capacity to cause bloodstream infections in humans.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 致病性; 血流感染; 埃希氏菌; 全基因组; 毒力基因; 抗微生物耐药基因; 遗传变异; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_title: 大肠杆菌引起人类血流感染的细菌遗传决定因素研究
abstract: Escherichia coli is both a highly prevalent commensal and a major opportunistic pathogen causing bloodstream infections (BSI). A systematic analysis characterizing the genomic determinants of extra-intestinal pathogenic vs. commensal isolates in human populations, which could inform mechanisms of pathogenesis, diagnostic, prevention and treatment is still lacking. We used a collection of 912 BSI and 370 commensal E. coli isolates collected in France over a 17-year period (2000-2017). We compared their pangenomes, genetic backgrounds (phylogroups, STs, O groups), presence of virulence-associated genes (VAGs) and antimicrobial resistance genes, finding significant differences in all comparisons between commensal and BSI isolates. A machine learning linear model trained on all the genetic variants derived from the pangenome and controlling for population structure reveals similar differences in VAGs, discovers new variants associated with pathogenicity (capacity to cause BSI), and accurately classifies BSI vs. commensal strains. Pathogenicity is a highly heritable trait, with up to 69% of the variance explained by bacterial genetic variants. Lastly, complementing our commensal collection with an older collection from 1980, we predict that pathogenicity continuously increased through 1980, 2000, to 2010. Together our findings imply that E. coli exhibit substantial genetic variation contributing to the transition between commensalism and pathogenicity and that this species evolved towards higher pathogenicity.
affiliations: Institute for Molecular Bacteriology, TWINCORE Centre for Experimental and Clinical Infection Research, a joint venture between the Hannover Medical School (MHH) and the Helmholtz Centre for Infection Research (HZI), Hannover, Germany.; Cluster of Excellence RESIST (EXC 2155), Hannover Medical School (MHH), Hannover, Germany.; Université Sorbonne Paris Nord, INSERM, IAME, Bobigny, France.; Université Paris Cité, INSERM, IAME, Paris, France.; Département de Prévention, Diagnostic et Traitement des Infections, Hôpital Henri Mondor, Créteil, France.; Unité Ecologie et Evolution de la Résistance aux Antibiotiques, Institut Pasteur, UMR CNRS 6047, Université Paris-Cité, Paris, France.; Laboratoire de Génétique Moléculaire, Hôpital Bichat, AP-HP, Paris, France.; Center for Interdisciplinary Research in Biology, Collège de France, CNRS UMR7241 / INSERM U1050, PSL Research University, Paris, France.

translated_keywords: 泛基因组；基因注释；水平基因转移；细菌
translated_abstract: 水平基因转移（HGT）及其导致的基因获得和丢失模式是细菌进化的一个基本组成部分。研究这些模式有助于我们理解选择在细菌泛基因组演化中的作用，以及细菌如何适应新的生态位。预测基因的存在或缺失可能是一个高度易错的过程，这会妨碍我们理解水平基因转移的动态。本文综述了准确构建泛基因组所面临的挑战以及错误可能对下游分析产生的潜在影响。我们希望通过对这些问题进行总结，研究人员能够避免潜在的陷阱，从而改进细菌泛基因组的分析。
authors: Tonkin-Hill Gerry; Corander Jukka; Parkhill Julian
title: Challenges in prokaryote pangenomics.
keywords: pangenome; gene annotation; horizontal gene transfer; bacteria
translated_title: 原核生物泛基因组的挑战
abstract: Horizontal gene transfer (HGT) and the resulting patterns of gene gain and loss are a fundamental part of bacterial evolution. Investigating these patterns can help us to understand the role of selection in the evolution of bacterial pangenomes and how bacteria adapt to a new niche. Predicting the presence or absence of genes can be a highly error-prone process that can confound efforts to understand the dynamics of horizontal gene transfer. This review discusses both the challenges in accurately constructing a pangenome and the potential consequences errors can have on downstream analyses. We hope that by summarizing these issues researchers will be able to avoid potential pitfalls, leading to improved bacterial pangenome analyses.
affiliations: Department of Biostatistics, University of Oslo, Blindern, Norway.; Parasites and Microbes, Wellcome Sanger Institute, Cambridge, UK.; Helsinki Institute for Information Technology HIIT, Department of Mathematics and Statistics, University of Helsinki, Helsinki, Finland.; Department of Veterinary Medicine, University of Cambridge, Cambridge, UK.

translated_keywords: 物种概念；基因型-表型图谱；基因组演化
translated_abstract: 物种概念已通过多种视角进行定义，但几乎完全基于经验。本文讨论了一种基于理论上的基因型-表型图谱且要求单系群的物种分类过滤器对基因组数据的解读方式，该方式与各种现有的物种概念密切相关。
authors: Liberles David A
title: A Genomic Conceptualization of Species.
keywords: Species concept; Genotype–phenotype map; Genome evolution
translated_title: 物种的基因组概念化
abstract: Species concepts have been defined through a number of lenses, but are almost entirely empirical in nature. Fundamentally linked to various existing species concepts, an interpretation of genomic data through a species classification filter based upon a theoretical genotype-phenotype map with a monophyly requirement is discussed.
affiliations: Department of Biology and Center for Computational Genetics and Genomics, Temple University, Philadelphia, PA, 19122, USA. jme1@temple.edu.

translated_keywords: 噬菌体;多重耐药;大肠杆菌O177;比较基因组学;比较蛋白质组学;基因组序列;溶源性;核心基因;假定蛋白;整合酶;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 抗菌耐药（AMR）病原体的流行率不断上升已成为全球主要的健康问题。为应对这一挑战，必须优化噬菌体疗法等创新策略。基因组特征分析是识别适合对抗AMR病原体的噬菌体候选者的必要步骤。本研究旨在通过全基因组测序对感染大肠杆菌O177菌株的七种噬菌体进行基因组特征分析。基因组序列分析显示，这些噬菌体具有线性双链DNA，基因组大小在136,483至166,791碱基对之间，GC含量在35.39%到43.63%之间。从分类学角度来看，这些噬菌体被归类于三个不同的亚科（Stephanstirmvirinae、Tevenvirinae和Vequintavirinae）以及三个属（Phapecoctavirus、Tequatrovirus和Vequintavirus），均属于Caudoviricetes纲。基于计算机的PhageAI分析预测，所有噬菌体均为烈性噬菌体，置信度介于96.07%到97.26%之间。噬菌体基因组包含66至82个开放阅读框（ORFs），编码假设的功能蛋白和推测的功能蛋白。此外，噬菌体基因组还含有与分子过程相关的核心基因，包括DNA复制、转录调控、核苷酸代谢、噬菌体结构（衣壳和尾部）以及裂解相关基因。基因组中未发现与整合酶、抗菌耐药性、毒力和毒素相关的基因。研究结果显示，大肠杆菌O177噬菌体与其他已知大肠杆菌噬菌体之间存在高度的基因组和蛋白质组同源性。结果表明，这七种噬菌体分别是亚科Stephanstirmvirinae、Tevenvirinae和Vequintavirinae中属Phapecoctavirus、Tequatrovirus和Vequintavirus的新成员。
authors: Montso Peter Kotsoana; Kropinski Andrew M; Mokoena Fortunate; Pierneef Rian Ewald; Mlambo Victor; Ateba Collins Njie
title: Comparative genomics and proteomics analysis of phages infecting multi-drug resistant Escherichia coli O177 isolated from cattle faeces.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 噬菌体;多重耐药;大肠杆菌O177;比较基因组学;比较蛋白质组学;基因组序列;溶源性;核心基因;假定蛋白;整合酶;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 比较基因组学和蛋白质组学分析感染来自牛粪便的多重耐药大肠杆菌O177的噬菌体
abstract: The increasing prevalence of antimicrobial-resistant (AMR) pathogens has become a major global health concern. To address this challenge, innovative strategies such as bacteriophage therapy must be optimised. Genomic characterisation is a crucial step in identifying suitable phage candidates for combating AMR pathogens. The aim of this study was to characterise seven phages that infect the Escherichia coli O177 strain using a whole genome sequencing. The analysis of genome sequences revealed that these phages had linear dsDNA, with genome sizes spanning from 136, 483 to 166,791 bp and GC content varying from 35.39 to 43.63%. Taxonomically, the phages were classified under three different subfamilies (Stephanstirmvirinae, Tevenvirinae, and Vequintavirinae) and three genera (Phapecoctavirus, Tequatrovirus, and Vequintavirus) within the class Caudoviricetes. In silico PhageAI analysis predicted that all the phages were virulent, with confidence levels between 96.07 and 97.26%. The phage genomes contained between 66 and 82 ORFs, which encode hypothetical and putative functional proteins. In addition, the phage genomes contained core genes associated with molecular processes such as DNA replication, transcription modulation, nucleotide metabolism, phage structure (capsid and tail), and lysis. None of the genomes carried genes associated with undesirable traits such as integrase, antimicrobial resistance, virulence, and toxins. The study revealed high genome and proteome homology among E. coli O177 phages and other known Escherichia phages. The results suggest that the seven phages are new members of the genera Phapecoctavirus, Tequatrovirus, and Vequintavirus under the subfamilies Stephanstirmvirinae, Tevenvirinae, and Vequintavirinae, respectively.
affiliations: Food Security and Safety Focus Area, Faculty of Natural and Agricultural Sciences, North-West University, Private Bag X2046, Mmabatho, 2735, South Africa. montsokp@gmail.com.; Department of Microbiology, Faculty of Natural and Agricultural Sciences, North-West University, Private Bag X2046, Mmabatho, 2735, South Africa. montsokp@gmail.com.; Department Food Science, and Pathobiology, Ontario Veterinary College, University of Guelph, Guelph, ON, N1G 2W1, Canada.; Department of Biochemistry, Faculty of Natural and Agricultural Sciences, North-West University, Mmabatho, South Africa.; Department of Biochemistry, Genetics and Microbiology, University of Pretoria, Pretoria, 0001, South Africa.; Centre for Bioinformatics and Computational Biology, University of Pretoria, Pretoria, 0001, South Africa.; SARChI Chair: Marine Microbiomics, Microbiome@UP, Department of Biochemistry, Genetics and Microbiology, University of Pretoria (UP), Hatfield, Pretoria, South Africa.; Faculty of Agriculture and Natural Sciences, School of Agricultural Sciences, University of Mpumalanga, Mbombela, 1200, South Africa.; Food Security and Safety Focus Area, Faculty of Natural and Agricultural Sciences, North-West University, Private Bag X2046, Mmabatho, 2735, South Africa.; Department of Microbiology, Faculty of Natural and Agricultural Sciences, North-West University, Private Bag X2046, Mmabatho, 2735, South Africa.

translated_keywords: 紫花苜蓿；基于图的泛基因组；自四倍体；多倍体；作物泛基因组
translated_abstract: 泛基因组概念及其结构变异的重要性正在植物基因组学领域得到认可。由于测序和计算技术的进步，在合理成本下对单个物种的大量个体进行全基因组测序已成为可能。许多主要的二倍体作物，如水稻、玉米、大豆、高粱、珍珠粟、豌豆、向日葵、葡萄和芥菜等，已经构建了泛基因组。然而，多倍体物种的泛基因组相对较少，仅在小麦、棉花、油菜和马铃薯等少数作物中可用。本文综述了作物泛基因组开发的各种方法，并基于已发表的泛基因组研究探讨了这些技术面临的挑战和意义。我们提供了一个系统性的指导，并讨论了构建泛基因组和进行下游分析的工具。以异交、自四倍体的牧草作物紫花苜蓿为例，探讨了多倍体作物物种带来的问题与挑战。通过使用三种公开可用的基因组组装数据，我们采用线性和基于图的方法对紫花苜蓿进行了比较分析。为了展示泛基因组图谱捕捉复杂作物基因组细节的能力，我们选择了五种不同的基因序列，并将其与三种基于图的泛基因组进行比对。三种基于图的泛基因组方法的比较揭示了每种流程捕获的基因组变异存在显著差异。泛基因组资源通过提供核心基因和可选基因的见解、新基因发现以及全基因组变异模式，证明了其重要价值。开发用户友好的在线线性泛基因组可视化门户，使这些资源能够被更广泛的科学和育种社区所利用。然而，基于图的泛基因组仍面临一些挑战，包括与其他工具的兼容性、提取感兴趣区域的序列以及可视化泛基因组图谱中捕获的遗传变异。这些问题需要进一步完善工具和流程，以有效应对多倍体、高度杂合和异交物种的复杂性。
authors: Kaur Harpreet; Shannon Laura M; Samac Deborah A
title: A stepwise guide for pangenome development in crop plants: an alfalfa (Medicago sativa) case study.
keywords: Alfalfa; Graph-based pangenome; Autotetraploid; Polyploids; Crop pangenome
translated_title: 以苜蓿（紫花苜蓿）为例的研究
abstract: The concept of pangenomics and the importance of structural variants is gaining recognition within the plant genomics community. Due to advancements in sequencing and computational technology, it has become feasible to sequence the entire genome of numerous individuals of a single species at a reasonable cost. Pangenomes have been constructed for many major diploid crops, including rice, maize, soybean, sorghum, pearl millet, peas, sunflower, grapes, and mustards. However, pangenomes for polyploid species are relatively scarce and are available in only few crops including wheat, cotton, rapeseed, and potatoes. In this review, we explore the various methods used in crop pangenome development, discussing the challenges and implications of these techniques based on insights from published pangenome studies. We offer a systematic guide and discuss the tools available for constructing a pangenome and conducting downstream analyses. Alfalfa, a highly heterozygous, cross pollinated and autotetraploid forage crop species, is used as an example to discuss the concerns and challenges offered by polyploid crop species. We conducted a comparative analysis using linear and graph-based methods by constructing an alfalfa graph pangenome using three publicly available genome assemblies. To illustrate the intricacies captured by pangenome graphs for a complex crop genome, we used five different gene sequences and aligned them against the three graph-based pangenomes. The comparison of the three graph pangenome methods reveals notable variations in the genomic variation captured by each pipeline. Pangenome resources are proving invaluable by offering insights into core and dispensable genes, novel gene discovery, and genome-wide patterns of variation. Developing user-friendly online portals for linear pangenome visualization has made these resources accessible to the broader scientific and breeding community. However, challenges remain with graph-based pangenomes including compatibility with other tools, extraction of sequence for regions of interest, and visualization of genetic variation captured in pangenome graphs. These issues necessitate further refinement of tools and pipelines to effectively address the complexities of polyploid, highly heterozygous, and cross-pollinated species.
affiliations: Department of Horticultural Science, University of Minnesota, St. Paul, MN, 55108, USA. kaurh@umn.edu.; Department of Horticultural Science, University of Minnesota, St. Paul, MN, 55108, USA.; USDA-ARS, Plant Science Research Unit, St. Paul, MN, 55108, USA.

translated_keywords: 人类基因组计划；生态基因组学；人类基因组组织；“一个健康”；健康决定因素
translated_abstract: 环境通过生物圈中的环境因素（如气候和紫外线辐射）以及生物体接触的物质（即无机化学物质和污染物的表观遗传及致变作用，以及病原体的致病作用）影响生物体的基因组。新兴的科学共识认为，健康的社会决定因素、环境条件和遗传因素共同影响许多复杂疾病的发病风险。这一范式也可以解释健康与非健康的生态系统背后的环境和生态决定因素，这些生态系统是社区赖以生存的基础。我们建议，“生态基因组计划”是一项具有前瞻性的机会，可以探索人类基因组与自然之间的联系。我们提议整合生态基因组学的观点，为应对社会面临的环境挑战提供蓝图。这只能通过基因组学与生态学及其保护实践的跨学科合作实现。在这方面，“同一健康”方法是面向环境工作的典范。生态基因组学——一个用于描述生态基因组学领域的术语——已成为研究社会和自然环境中基因组的概念性研究。HUGO伦理、法律和社会委员会（CELS）建议，在基因组学领域采用跨学科的“同一健康”方法以促进伦理环境主义。这一观点已由HUGO CELS和HUGO执行董事会审阅并认可。
authors: Capps Benjamin; Chadwick Ruth; Lederman Zohar; Lysaght Tamra; Mills Catherine; Mulvihill John J; Oetting William S; Winship Ingrid; HUGO Committee on Ethics, Law and Society
title: The Human Genome Organisation (HUGO) and a vision for Ecogenomics: the Ecological Genome Project.
keywords: Human Genome Project; Ecogenomics; Human Genome Organisation; One Health; Determinants of health
translated_title: 生态基因组计划
abstract: The following outlines ethical reasons for widening the Human Genome Organisation's (HUGO) mandate to include ecological genomics. MAIN: The environment influences an organism's genome through ambient factors in the biosphere (e.g. climate and UV radiation), as well as the agents it comes into contact with, i.e. the epigenetic and mutagenic effects of inanimate chemicals and pollution, and pathogenic organisms. Emerging scientific consensus is that social determinants of health, environmental conditions and genetic factors work together to influence the risk of many complex illnesses. That paradigm can also explain the environmental and ecological determinants of health as factors that underlie the (un)healthy ecosystems on which communities rely. We suggest that The Ecological Genome Project is an aspirational opportunity to explore connections between the human genome and nature. We propose consolidating a view of Ecogenomics to provide a blueprint to respond to the environmental challenges that societies face. This can only be achieved by interdisciplinary engagement between genomics and the broad field of ecology and related practice of conservation. In this respect, the One Health approach is a model for environmental orientated work. The idea of Ecogenomics-a term that has been used to relate to a scientific field of ecological genomics-becomes the conceptual study of genomes within the social and natural environment. The HUGO Committee on Ethics, Law and Society (CELS) recommends that an interdisciplinary One Health approach should be adopted in genomic sciences to promote ethical environmentalism. This perspective has been reviewed and endorsed by the HUGO CELS and the HUGO Executive Board.
affiliations: Department of Bioethics, Dalhousie University, 5849 University Avenue, CRC Building, Room C-312, PO Box 15000, Halifax, NS, B3H 4R2, Canada. benjamin.capps@dal.ca.; Cardiff University, Cardiff, UK.; University of Hong Kong, Pokfulam, Hong Kong.; National University of Singapore, Singapore, Singapore.; Monash University, Melbourne, Australia.; University of Oklahoma Health Sciences Center, Oklahoma City, USA.; University of Minnesota, Minneapolis, USA.; University of Melbourne, Melbourne, Australia.

translated_keywords: Kutzneria chonburiensis; 二级代谢物; 生物合成基因簇; 基因组比较; 系统发育基因组学; 蛋白聚类直系同源群; 抗菌化合物; 分子生物学; 生物信息学
translated_abstract: 放线菌是一类富含活性次级代谢产物多样性的细菌。库茨内里亚（Kutzneria）属于假诺卡氏菌科，是一种稀有的放线菌，其基因组中含有大量的次级代谢物生物合成基因簇（BGCs），是天然产物的重要来源之一，值得优先研究。目前，库茨内里亚庞布里恩西斯SMC256^T已被确定为该属的最新模式菌株，但其全基因组序列尚未报道。因此，本文首次报道了SMC256^T的新完整基因组序列（基因组大小为10.4 Mbp），并对其进行了基因组注释和与其他已公开的库茨内里亚物种的特征比较。系统发育基因组学分析和直系同源蛋白群（COGs）分析结果表明，SMC256^T与库茨内里亚sp. 744、库茨内里亚甲府菌、库茨内里亚sp. CA-103260以及库茨内里亚武里喃森西斯亲缘关系最为接近。此外，在库茨内里亚基因组中检测到总计322个BGCs，并显示出多样性，其中在SMC256^T基因组中共预测出38个与已知BGCs高度匹配的基因簇。我们观察到，库茨内里亚庞布里恩西斯中六个负责抗微生物/抗肿瘤代谢物生物合成的基因簇为菌株特异性，这些潜在的代谢产物包括virginiamycin S1、lysolipin I、esmeraldin、rakicidin、aclacinomycin和streptoseomycin。基于以上发现，库茨内里亚庞布里恩西斯的基因组含有与其他属内成员不同的独特且未鉴定的BGCs，采用整合基因组学方法可能是靶向、分离和鉴定潜在的、未被发现的具有新或特定生物活性的次级代谢产物的一种有效替代方法。
authors: Chanama Manee; Prombutara Pinidphon; Chanama Suchart
title: Comparative genome features and secondary metabolite biosynthetic potential of Kutzneria chonburiensis and other species of the genus Kutzneria.
keywords: (Auto-generated) Kutzneria chonburiensis; 二级代谢物; 生物合成基因簇; 基因组比较; 系统发育基因组学; 蛋白聚类直系同源群; 抗菌化合物; 分子生物学; 生物信息学
translated_title: 库茨内里亚属朱拉邦亚种的比较基因组特征与次生代谢物生物合成潜力及其他相关物种比较
abstract: Actinobacteria are well known as a rich source of diversity of bioactive secondary metabolites. Kutzneria, a rare actinobacteria belonging to the family Pseudonocardiaceae has abundance of secondary metabolite biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) and is one of important source of natural products and worthy of priority investigation. Currently, Kutzneria chonburiensis SMC256T has been the latest type-strain of the genus and its genome sequence has not been reported yet. Therefore, we present the first report of new complete genome sequence of SMC256T (genome size of 10.4 Mbp) with genome annotation and feature comparison between SMC256T and other publicly available Kutzneria species. The results from comparative and functional genomic analyses regarding the phylogenomic and the clusters of orthologous groups of proteins (COGs) analyses indicated that SMC256T is most closely related to Kutzneria sp. 744, Kutzneria kofuensis, Kutzneria sp. CA-103260 and Kutzneria buriramensis. Furthermore, a total of 322 BGCs were also detected and showed diversity among the Kutzneria genomes. Out of which, 38 clusters showing the best hit to the most known BGCs were predicted in the SMC256Tgenome. We observed that six clusters responsible for biosynthesis of antimicrobials/antitumor metabolites were strain-specific in Kutzneria chonburiensis. These putative metabolites include virginiamycin S1, lysolipin I, esmeraldin, rakicidin, aclacinomycin and streptoseomycin. Based on these findings, the genome of Kutzneria chonburiensis contains distinct and unidentified BGCs different from other members of the genus, and the use of integrative genomic-based approach would be a useful alternative effort to target, isolate and identify putative and undiscovered secondary metabolites suspected to have new and/or specific bioactivity in the Kutzneria.
affiliations: Department of Microbiology, Faculty of Public Health, Mahidol University, Bangkok, 10400, Thailand. manee.cha@mahidol.ac.th.; Omics Sciences and Bioinformatics Center, Faculty of Science, Chulalongkorn University, Bangkok, 10330, Thailand.; Department of Biochemistry, Faculty of Science, Chulalongkorn University, Bangkok, 10330, Thailand.

translated_keywords: 基因注释;转录组;基因组;灵活注释;AGouTI;GTF文件;数据集成;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 基因组学和转录组学高通量工作流程的最新发展表明，对这些结果进行高效的注释对于研究人员从获得的数据中得出结论至关重要。尽管已有一些工具可用，但它们的功能有限。本文介绍了一种名为AGouTI的新工具，该工具能够使用存储在不同公共数据库中的已知基因组特征（以GTF或GFF文件形式）灵活注释任何基因组或转录组坐标。与目前可用的工具相比，AGouTI设计用于提供灵活选择与注释区间重叠或相邻的基因组特征，并且可以应用于来自不同数据分析管道的自定义基于列的文本文件。尽管提供了许多独特的选项，AGouTI在安装和使用上都非常简便，能够轻松集成到现有的数据分析工作流程中。
authors: Kosiński Jan G; Żywicki Marek
title: AGouTI-Flexible Annotation of Genomic and Transcriptomic Intervals.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因注释;转录组;基因组;灵活注释;AGouTI;GTF文件;数据集成;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 基因组和转录组区间灵活注释工具
abstract: The recent development of high-throughput workflows in genomics and transcriptomics revealed that efficient annotation of such results is essential for researchers to draw conclusions from obtained results. Although some tools are available, their functionality is limited. Here, we present AGouTI-a universal tool for flexible annotation of any genomic or transcriptomic coordinates using known genomic features deposited in different publicly available databases in the form of GTF or GFF files. In contrast to currently available tools, AGouTI is designed to provide a flexible selection of genomic features overlapping or adjacent to annotated intervals and can be used on custom column-based text files obtained from different data analysis pipelines. Although providing many unique options, AGouTI is straightforward in installation and usage, enabling effortless integration into existing data analysis workflows.
affiliations: Department of Computational Biology, Institute of Molecular Biology and Biotechnology, Faculty of Biology, Adam Mickiewicz University in Poznań, Poznań, Poland.

translated_keywords: 网络分析；弯曲菌多样性；泛基因组
translated_abstract: 弯曲菌属（Campylobacter）是一种与社区暴发和胃肠道症状相关的细菌属。目前针对弯曲菌的研究主要集中在特定的致病种，如空肠弯曲菌（C. jejuni）和结肠弯曲菌（C. coli）。随着数千个弯曲菌基因组的公开可用，现在可以更全面地评估该属的多样性。本文报告了一项基于网络分析的所有可用弯曲菌基因组的研究，旨在探索该属的结构和多样性，并揭示潜在的新物种及其特征。我们还假设之前确定的C. coli第三分支（Clade III）实际上是一种新物种（在此称为Campylobacter spp12）。此外，我们发现泛基因组流动性与饱和系数之间存在负相关关系，这可能对不同弯曲菌物种的生活方式具有潜在影响。由于泛基因组分析依赖于可获得的基因组数量，这种相关性可以帮助估算那些测序较少的弯曲菌物种的泛基因组指标，从而帮助理解其生活方式和生态位适应性。综合来看，我们的研究结果表明，需要重新评估弯曲菌属，特别关注基因组结构与生态位分化之间的相互作用。
authors: Henaut-Jacobs Sarah; Passarelli-Araujo Hemanoel; Venancio Thiago M
title: Comparative genomics and phylogenomics of Campylobacter unveil potential novel species and provide insights into niche segregation.
keywords: Network analysis; Campylobacter diversity; Pangenome
translated_title: 比较基因组学和系统发育基因组学揭示了弯曲菌属潜在的新物种并提供了生态位分离的见解。
abstract: Campylobacter is a bacterial genus associated with community outbreaks and gastrointestinal symptoms. Studies on Campylobacter generally focus on specific pathogenic species such as C. coli and C. jejuni. Currently, there are thousands of publicly available Campylobacter genomes, allowing a more complete assessment of the genus diversity. In this work, we report a network-based analysis of all available Campylobacter genomes to explore the genus structure and diversity, revealing potentially new species and elucidating genus features. We also hypothesize that the previously established Clade III of C. coli is in fact a novel species (referred here as Campylobacter spp12). Finally, we found a negative correlation between pangenome fluidity and saturation coefficient, with potential implications to the lifestyles of distinct Campylobacter species. Since pangenome analysis depends on the number of available genomes, this correlation could help estimate pangenome metrics of Campylobacter species with less sequenced genomes, helping understand their lifestyle and niche adaptation. Together, our results indicate that the Campylobacter genus should be re-evaluated, with particular attention to the interplay between genome structure and niche segregation.
affiliations: Laboratório de Química e Função de Proteínas e Peptídeos, Centro de Biociências e Biotecnologia, Universidade Estadual do Norte Fluminense Darcy Ribeiro, Campos dos Goytacazes, RJ, Brazil.; Laboratório de Química e Função de Proteínas e Peptídeos, Centro de Biociências e Biotecnologia, Universidade Estadual do Norte Fluminense Darcy Ribeiro, Campos dos Goytacazes, RJ, Brazil; Departamento de Bioquímica e Imunologia, Instituto de Ciências Biológicas, Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais, Belo Horizonte, MG, Brazil. Electronic address: passarelli@ufmg.br.; Laboratório de Química e Função de Proteínas e Peptídeos, Centro de Biociências e Biotecnologia, Universidade Estadual do Norte Fluminense Darcy Ribeiro, Campos dos Goytacazes, RJ, Brazil. Electronic address: tmvenancio@uenf.br.

translated_keywords: 端粒菌科；小rRNA基因科；毛壳菌科；基因组演化；全基因组系统发育
translated_abstract: 萨卡里亚目（Sordariales）在系统分类上具有多样性，并包含许多具有不同生活方式且经济价值巨大的物种。尽管其重要性显著，但目前尚缺乏对该目进行全面基因组规模的系统发育研究及其相关的比较基因组分析。本研究对包括99个萨卡里亚目物种在内的全基因组数据进行了分析，其中52个为新测序的基因组，并引入了7个外群物种。我们推导出一个全面的系统发育树，解决了该目内多个家族间存在争议的关系，并澄清了黑盘孢科（Podosporaceae）内部的家族关系。广泛的比较基因组学研究表明，数据集中三大主要家族（Chaetomiaceae、Podosporaceae 和 Sordariaceae）的基因组在GC含量、基因组大小、基因数量、重复序列比例、进化速率以及受重复诱导点突变（RIP）影响的基因组内容等方面存在显著差异。所有基因组特征均显示出系统发育信号，祖先状态重建表明这些特性的变异主要源于家族内部的演化。综上所述，本研究结果为理解这一重要真菌类群的基因组演化提供了详尽的框架。
authors: Hensen Noah; Bonometti Lucas; Westerberg Ivar; Brännström Ioana Onut; Guillou Sonia; Cros-Aarteil Sandrine; Calhoun Sara; Haridas Sajeet; Kuo Alan; Mondo Stephen; Pangilinan Jasmyn; Riley Robert; LaButti Kurt; Andreopoulos Bill; Lipzen Anna; Chen Cindy; Yan Mi; Daum Chris; Ng Vivian; Clum Alicia; Steindorff Andrei; Ohm Robin A; Martin Francis; Silar Philippe; Natvig Donald O; Lalanne Christophe; Gautier Valérie; Ament-Velásquez Sandra Lorena; Kruys Åsa; Hutchinson Miriam I; Powell Amy Jo; Barry Kerrie; Miller Andrew N; Grigoriev Igor V; Debuchy Robert; Gladieux Pierre; Hiltunen Thorén Markus; Johannesson Hanna
title: Genome-scale phylogeny and comparative genomics of the fungal order Sordariales.
keywords: Podosporaceae; Sordariaceae; Chaetomiaceae; Genome evolution; Whole-genome phylogeny
translated_title: 子囊菌纲座菌目全基因组系统发育与比较基因组学研究
abstract: The order Sordariales is taxonomically diverse, and harbours many species with different lifestyles and large economic importance. Despite its importance, a robust genome-scale phylogeny, and associated comparative genomic analysis of the order is lacking. In this study, we examined whole-genome data from 99 Sordariales, including 52 newly sequenced genomes, and seven outgroup taxa. We inferred a comprehensive phylogeny that resolved several contentious relationships amongst families in the order, and cleared-up intrafamily relationships within the Podosporaceae. Extensive comparative genomics showed that genomes from the three largest families in the dataset (Chaetomiaceae, Podosporaceae and Sordariaceae) differ greatly in GC content, genome size, gene number, repeat percentage, evolutionary rate, and genome content affected by repeat-induced point mutations (RIP). All genomic traits showed phylogenetic signal, and ancestral state reconstruction revealed that the variation of the properties stems primarily from within-family evolution. Together, the results provide a thorough framework for understanding genome evolution in this important group of fungi.
affiliations: Stockholm University, Department of Ecology, Environment and Plants Sciences, Stockholm, Sweden.; University of Montpellier, PHIM Plant Health Institute, Montpellier, France.; Oslo University, Natural History Museum, Oslo, Norway; Uppsala University, Department of Ecology and Genetics, Uppsala, Sweden.; Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory, U.S. Department of Energy Joint Genome Institute, Berkeley, CA, USA.; Université de Lorraine, INRAE, Champenoux, France.; Université de Paris Cité, Laboratoire Interdisciplinaire des Energies de Demain, Paris, France.; University of New Mexico, Department of Biology, Albuquerque, USA.; Stockholm University, Department of Zoology, Stockholm, Sweden.; Uppsala University, Museum of Evolution, Uppsala, Sweden.; Sandia National Laboratories, Dept. of Systems Design and Architecture, Albuquerque, USA.; University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign, Illinois Natural History Survey, USA.; Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory, U.S. Department of Energy Joint Genome Institute, Berkeley, CA, USA; University of California Berkeley, Department of Plant and Microbial Biology, Berkeley, CA, USA.; Université Paris-Saclay, Institute for Integrative Biology of the Cell, Gif-sur-Yvette, France.; Stockholm University, Department of Ecology, Environment and Plants Sciences, Stockholm, Sweden; The Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences, Stockholm, Sweden.; Stockholm University, Department of Ecology, Environment and Plants Sciences, Stockholm, Sweden; The Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences, Stockholm, Sweden. Electronic address: hanna.johannesson@su.se.

translated_keywords: 基因组学；植物育种；基因组选择；作物改良
translated_abstract: 尽管现代育种技术和方法的广泛应用已带来了长期的遗传增益，但遗传增益的速度仍需加快以满足全球农业需求。然而，标记辅助选择（MAS）在改良受少数基因调控且效应较大的质量性状方面已显示出潜力，但在改良受大量小效应基因调控的数量性状方面贡献有限。在此背景下，基因组选择（GS）被视为提升由多个微效基因调控的复杂性状遗传改良的最具前景的方法之一。通过检测群体的表型和高密度标记得分，基因组选择能够预测单个系的育种潜力。由于GS在预测模型中使用了所有标记数据，这避免了标记效应估计的偏差，并最大化了由小效应数量性状位点（QTL）引起的变异量。它还能加速育种周期，从而快速选出优良基因型。在考虑非加性效应、基因型与环境互作以及成本效益的前提下开发最佳的GS模型，将有助于GS在植物中的广泛应用。这些措施还将提高遗传力估算和预测准确性。本文综述了从传统选择方法向基因组选择的转变、其背后的统计工具与方法论、农业植物中GS研究的现状，以及其在培育气候适应性作物方面的应用前景。
authors: Parveen Rabiya; Kumar Mankesh; Swapnil; Singh Digvijay; Shahani Monika; Imam Zafar; Sahoo Jyoti Prakash
title: Understanding the genomic selection for crop improvement: current progress and future prospects.
keywords: Genomics; Plant breeding; Genomic selection; Crop improvement
translated_title: 当前进展与未来展望
abstract: Although increased use of modern breeding techniques and technology has resulted in long-term genetic gain, the pace of genetic gain must be sped up to satisfy global agricultural demand. However, marker-assisted selection has proven its potential for improving qualitative traits with large effects regulated by one to few genes. Its contribution to the improvement of the quantitative traits regulated by a number of small-effect genes is modest. In this context, genomic selection (GS) has been regarded as the most promising method for genetically enhancing complicated features that are regulated by several genes, each of which has minor effects. By examining a population's phenotypes and high-density marker scores, genomic selection can forecast the breeding potential of individual lines. The fact that GS uses all marker data in the prediction model prevents skewed marker effect estimations and maximizes the amount of variation caused by small-effect QTL. It has the ability to speed up the breeding cycle and as a consequence of which superior genotypes are selected rapidly. Developing the best GS models while taking into account non-additive effects, genotype-by-environment interaction, and cost-effectiveness will enable the widespread implementation of GS in plants. These steps will also increase heritability estimation and prediction accuracy. This review focuses on the shift from conventional selection methods to GS, underlying statistical tools and methodologies, the state of GS research in agricultural plants, and prospects for its effective use in the creation of climate-resilient crops.
affiliations: Department of Genetics and Plant Breeding, Bihar Agricultural University, Sabour, Bhagalpur, 813210, India.; Department of Genetics and Plant Breeding, Centurion University of Technology and Management, Paralakhemundi, 761211, India.; Department of Genetics and Plant Breeding, Narayan Institute of Agricultural Sciences, Gopal Narayan Singh University, Sasaram, 821305, India.; Department of Genetics and Plant Breeding, Maharana Pratap University of Agriculture and Technology, Udaipur, 313001, India.; Department of Agriculture and Allied Sciences, C.V. Raman Global University, Bhubaneswar, 752054, India. jyotiprakash.sahoo@cgu-odisha.ac.in.

translated_keywords: 泛基因组；图结构；微生物多样性
translated_abstract: 微生物的基因组多样性通常通过相对于某一特征明确但任意选择的分离株参考基因组的单核苷酸多态性（SNPs）来量化。然而，任何参考基因组仅包含微生物泛基因组的一部分，即在给定物种中观察到的所有基因的总和。因此，基于参考的方法无法捕捉附带基因组的动态变化，也无法识别基因顺序和拷贝数的变化。随着长读长测序技术的广泛应用，高质量、完整的基因组组装数量大幅增加。除了关注不同基因组中存在基因集变异的泛基因组方法外，完整的基因组组装还允许研究基因组结构和基因顺序的演化。然而，这一问题在计算上极具挑战性，可用以揭示这些动态变化的工具寥寥无几。本文介绍PanGraph，这是一个基于Julia语言开发的库及其命令行界面，用于将整个基因组对齐为一个图结构。每个基因组被表示为沿顶点路径，而这些顶点封装了同源的多重序列比对结果。由此产生的数据结构简洁地总结了群体水平上的核苷酸和结构多态性，并可导出为多种常见格式，供下游分析或直接可视化使用。
authors: Noll Nicholas; Molari Marco; Shaw Liam P; Neher Richard A
title: PanGraph: scalable bacterial pan-genome graph construction.
keywords: pangenome; graphs; microbial diversity
translated_title: 可扩展的细菌泛基因组图构建
abstract: The genomic diversity of microbes is commonly parameterized as SNPs relative to a reference genome of a well-characterized, but arbitrary, isolate. However, any reference genome contains only a fraction of the microbial pangenome, the total set of genes observed in a given species. Reference-based approaches are thus blind to the dynamics of the accessory genome, as well as variation within gene order and copy number. With the widespread usage of long-read sequencing, the number of high-quality, complete genome assemblies has increased dramatically. In addition to pangenomic approaches that focus on the variation in the sets of genes present in different genomes, complete assemblies allow investigations of the evolution of genome structure and gene order. This latter problem, however, is computationally demanding with few tools available that shed light on these dynamics. Here, we present PanGraph, a Julia-based library and command line interface for aligning whole genomes into a graph. Each genome is represented as a path along vertices, which in turn encapsulate homologous multiple sequence alignments. The resultant data structure succinctly summarizes population-level nucleotide and structural polymorphisms and can be exported into several common formats for either downstream analysis or immediate visualization.
affiliations: Kavli Institute for Theoretical Physics, University of California, Santa Barbara, CA, USA.; Swiss Institute of Bioinformatics, Basel, Switzerland.; Biozentrum, University of Basel, Basel, Switzerland.; Department of Biology, University of Oxford, Oxford, UK.

translated_keywords: 植物；二次选择；后口动物；基因组类别；限制性酶；原口动物
translated_abstract: 基因组结构是生物体的关键进化特征。由于多种复杂的适应性和中性力量对基因组施加进化压力，基因组特征表现出极大的变异性。然而，基因组内容的变异程度以及其在简化代表测序研究中对恢复位点分布的影响尚未得到充分探索。本文通过使用80个基因组组装数据发现，植物主要通过扩展其非编码区来增加基因组大小，而动物则同时扩展非编码区和内含子区，尽管这种扩展模式在后口动物和原口动物之间存在差异。通过计算机模拟酶切获得的内含子、外显子和非编码区位点分布与相应基因组中这些区域的比例呈正相关，表明位点分布主要反映了所选分类群的基因组结构。然而，无论使用何种酶，外显子区位点均显示出显著富集。此外，在使用选择性接头获取次级减少位点数据集时，保留位点的百分比和分布也发生了变化。具有G/C末端的接头恢复了较低比例的选择位点，并在外显子区进一步富集，而具有A/T末端的接头保留了较高比例的位点，并略微选择了比预期更多的内含子区。我们的结果强调了基因组组成、基因组GC含量、RAD酶的选择以及基于碱基的选择性接头对简化基因组表示技术的影响。这在种群和保护基因组学研究中尤为重要，因为它决定了位点的丰度和分布。
authors: Galià-Camps Carles; Pegueroles Cinta; Turon Xavier; Carreras Carlos; Pascual Marta
title: Genome composition and GC content influence loci distribution in reduced representation genomic studies.
keywords: Plants; Secondary selection; Deuterostomes; Genome categories; Restriction enzyme; Protostomes
translated_title: 基因组组成和GC含量影响简化代表基因组研究中的位点分布。
abstract: Genomic architecture is a key evolutionary trait for living organisms. Due to multiple complex adaptive and neutral forces which impose evolutionary pressures on genomes, there is a huge variability of genomic features. However, their variability and the extent to which genomic content determines the distribution of recovered loci in reduced representation sequencing studies is largely unexplored. Here, by using 80 genome assemblies, we observed that whereas plants primarily increase their genome size by expanding their intergenic regions, animals expand both intergenic and intronic regions, although the expansion patterns differ between deuterostomes and protostomes. Loci mapping in introns, exons, and intergenic categories obtained by in silico digestion using 2b-enzymes are positively correlated with the percentage of these regions in the corresponding genomes, suggesting that loci distribution mostly mirrors genomic architecture of the selected taxon. However, exonic regions showed a significant enrichment of loci in all groups regardless of the used enzyme. Moreover, when using selective adaptors to obtain a secondarily reduced loci dataset, the percentage and distribution of retained loci also varied. Adaptors with G/C terminals recovered a lower percentage of selected loci, with a further enrichment of exonic regions, while adaptors with A/T terminals retained a higher percentage of loci and slightly selected more intronic regions than expected. Our results highlight how genome composition, genome GC content, RAD enzyme choice and use of base-selective adaptors influence reduced genome representation techniques. This is important to acknowledge in population and conservation genomic studies, as it determines the abundance and distribution of loci.
affiliations: Departament de Genètica, Microbiologia i Estadística, Universitat de Barcelona, Avinguda Diagonal 643, Barcelona, 08028, Spain. cgaliacamps@gmail.com.; Institut de Recerca de la Biodiversitat (IRBio), Universitat de Barcelona (UB), Barcelona, Spain. cgaliacamps@gmail.com.; Department of Marine Ecology, Centre d'Estudis Avançats de Blanes (CEAB-CSIC), Accés Cala Sant Francesc 14, Blanes, 17300, Spain. cgaliacamps@gmail.com.; Departament de Genètica, Microbiologia i Estadística, Universitat de Barcelona, Avinguda Diagonal 643, Barcelona, 08028, Spain.; Institut de Recerca de la Biodiversitat (IRBio), Universitat de Barcelona (UB), Barcelona, Spain.; Department of Marine Ecology, Centre d'Estudis Avançats de Blanes (CEAB-CSIC), Accés Cala Sant Francesc 14, Blanes, 17300, Spain.

translated_keywords: 组蛋白；甲藻；基因组扩张；微RNA（miRNA）；反转录插入；共生；核蛋白；组学；寄生；基因调控
translated_abstract: （1）甲藻基因组已多次独立扩张，可能由活跃的反转录转座、重复DNA的积累以及基因组复制共同驱动；（2）共生甲藻科基因组高度分化，但共享约3,445个核心单基因，集中在219条KEGG通路中；（3）大多数甲藻基因以单向编码且不缺乏内含子；（4）甲藻细胞核经历了极端的进化变化，包括核小体和组蛋白H1的完全或接近完全丢失，以及获得甲藻病毒核蛋白（DVNP）；（5）主要碱性核蛋白（MBNP）、组蛋白样蛋白（HLP）和细菌HU样蛋白（HCc）属于同一蛋白家族，MBNP可作为统一名称；（6）甲藻基因表达受尚不清楚的机制调控，但microRNA和其他表观遗传机制可能起重要作用；（7）超过50%的甲藻基因是“暗基因”，其功能仍需通过功能遗传学手段解析；（8）初步揭示了寄生和互利共生的基因组基础。文章随后强调了功能独特且有趣的基因。未来研究需要完成基因组测序、处理大基因组、表征未知基因，并开发定量分子生态模型以解决生态问题。
authors: Lin Senjie
title: A decade of dinoflagellate genomics illuminating an enigmatic eukaryote cell.
keywords: Histone; Dinoflagellate; Genome expansion; MicroRNA (miRNA); Retroposition; Symbiotic; Nuclear protein; Omics; Parasitic; Gene regulation
translated_title: 藻类基因组学十年研究照亮一个神秘的真核生物细胞
abstract: Dinoflagellates are a remarkable group of protists, not only for their association with harmful algal blooms and coral reefs but also for their numerous characteristics deviating from the rules of eukaryotic biology. Genome research on dinoflagellates has lagged due to their immense genome sizes in most species (~ 1-250 Gbp). Nevertheless, the last decade marked a fruitful era of dinoflagellate genomics, with 27 genomes sequenced and many insights attained. This review aims to synthesize information from these genomes, along with other omic data, to reflect on where we are now in understanding dinoflagellates and where we are heading in the future. The most notable insights from the decade-long genomics work include: (1) dinoflagellate genomes have been expanded in multiple times independently, probably by a combination of rampant retroposition, accumulation of repetitive DNA, and genome duplication; (2) Symbiodiniacean genomes are highly divergent, but share about 3,445 core unigenes concentrated in 219 KEGG pathways; (3) Most dinoflagellate genes are encoded unidirectionally and are not intron-poor; (4) The dinoflagellate nucleus has undergone extreme evolutionary changes, including complete or nearly complete loss of nucleosome and histone H1, and acquisition of dinoflagellate viral nuclear protein (DVNP); (5) Major basic nuclear protein (MBNP), histone-like protein (HLP), and bacterial HU-like protein (HCc) belong to the same protein family, and MBNP can be the unifying name; (6) Dinoflagellate gene expression is regulated by poorly understood mechanisms, but microRNA and other epigenetic mechanisms are likely important; (7) Over 50% of dinoflagellate genes are "dark" and their functions remain to be deciphered using functional genetics; (8) Initial insights into the genomic basis of parasitism and mutualism have emerged. The review then highlights functionally unique and interesting genes. Future research needs to obtain a finished genome, tackle large genomes, characterize the unknown genes, and develop a quantitative molecular ecological model for addressing ecological questions.
affiliations: Department of Marine Sciences, University of Connecticut, Groton, CT, 06340, USA. senjie.lin@uconn.edu.

translated_keywords: 分子标记；基因组SSR；交叉转移性；构树；遗传多样性
translated_abstract: 桑树属（Moraceae）中的白构树（*Broussonetia papyrifera*）、单叶构树（*B. monoica*）和川构树（*B. kaempferi*）具有重要的经济价值和研究意义。然而，目前针对这些物种的分子标记开发与分子遗传育种应用较少。通过全基因组测序，我们成功开发了基因组分子标记（如简单序列重复，SSR），并构建了高密度物理图谱。在白构树、单叶构树和川构树的13条高质量假染色体及其未组装的支架中共鉴定到369,557、332,627和276,245个SSR。在三种构树中鉴定出的基因组SSR中，短重复序列更为丰富，而长重复序列的比例较低。此外，这三种构树SSR的主要重复基序由“A”和“T”重复组成。以白构树基因组为参考，共鉴定了4,419个在这三种物种中共有的SSR，其中2,048个SSR特异于川构树，4,285个SSR特异于单叶构树。分布分析表明，这三种构树伪染色体上的SSR分布模式具有显著相似性。进一步分析发现，在鉴定的SSR中，分别有28%、31%和24%的SSR定位到了白构树、川构树和单叶构树的基因上。这些基因相关的SSR可能通过影响基因活性和蛋白质功能来调控生物过程。为验证SSR的多态性，从潜在的10,752个多态性SSR位点中筛选了30个SSR进行PCR扩增，所有SSR均成功扩增并在三种构树中表现出多态性。这些结果有助于进一步研究构树属物种的起源、进化和迁移，并为该属种质资源的精准鉴定、系统评估和高效利用奠定了基础。
authors: Jia Xiaowen; Li Hanyu; Han Ying; Wang Lu; Lai Chanjuan; Liu Xi; Li Pan; Lei Zupei; Zhang Yonghua
title: Genome-wide microsatellite characterization and their marker development and transferability in Broussonetia Species.
keywords: Molecular markers; Genomic SSRs; Cross transferability; Broussonetia; Genetic diversity
translated_title: 葎草属物种全基因组微卫星特征及其标记开发与可转移性研究
abstract: Broussonetia papyrifera, B. monoica, and B. kaempferi belong to the genus Broussonetia (Moraceae). These three species hold significant economic and research values. However, few molecular markers have been effectively utilized for resource development and molecular genetic breeding of these species. Sequencing of their genomes allowed us to develop genomic markers (e.g. simple sequence repeats (SSRs)) and construct a high-density physical map. A total of 369,557, 332,627, and 276,245 SSRs were identified in 13 high-quality assembled pseudochromosomes and their unassembled scaffolds for B. papyrifera, B. monoica, and B. kaempferi, respectively. Among the identified genomic SSRs across the three species, short repeat sequences were more abundant, while long repeat sequences constituted a smaller proportion. Additionally, the predominant repeat motifs in the SSRs of the three Broussonetia species were composed of 'A' and 'T' repeats. Using B. papyrifera genome as a reference, 4,419 common SSRs were identified among these three species, while 2,048 SSRs were specific to B. kaempferi, and 4,285 SSRs were specific to B. monoica. Distribution analysis indicated a notable similarity in the distribution patterns of SSRs across the pseudochromosomes of these three species. Furthermore, of the identified SSRs, 28%, 31%, and 24% were mapped to genes in B. papyrifera, B. kaempferi, and B. monoica, respectively. Genic-mapped SSRs may regulate biological processes by influencing gene activity and protein function. To verify SSRs polymorphism, we selected 30 ones from 10,752 potentially polymorphic SSRs loci for PCR amplification among these three species, all of which were successfully amplified and exhibited polymorphism across these three species. These findings are helpful for further research on the origin, evolution, and migration of Broussonetia species and also laid the foundation for the precise identification, systematic evaluation, and efficient utilization of the germplasm resources of Broussonetia species.

translated_keywords: 非生物的；适应；共生的；机制；真菌；胁迫
translated_abstract: 环境胁迫严重损害植物生长，导致作物产量和品质显著下降。在各种非生物因素中，盐胁迫和干旱胁迫是影响植物养分和水分吸收的主要因素之一，从而最终影响植物的多种生理特性，降低作物产量。为了研究、解析并改善植物在应对干旱和盐胁迫时的分子适应机制，人们做出了持续的努力。在此背景下，存在于根际、内生和叶际中的有益微生物组，也被称为植物的“第二基因组”，因其在植物适应性中的作用而广为人知。探索菌根共生这一真菌与宿主植物之间的有益相互作用是一种特殊的交互方式，能够促进宿主植物的适应能力。菌根通过离子再分布（转运至植物不同部位）缓解植物的盐胁迫和干旱胁迫，并激活氧化系统。此外，菌根共生还能调节植物生长调节物质和渗透调节物质的水平，并协助植物获取有助于其适应极端环境胁迫的矿物质。本文综述了干旱和盐胁迫下植物生长调节物质的作用、植物抗氧化系统的功能，以及菌根共生的相关机制。
authors: Sharma Vivek; Sharma D P; Salwan Richa
title: Surviving the stress: Understanding the molecular basis of plant adaptations and uncovering the role of mycorrhizal association in plant abiotic stresses.
keywords: Abiotic; Adaptations; Symbiotic; Mechanisms; Fungi; Stress
translated_title: 解析植物适应的分子基础并揭示菌根共生在植物非生物胁迫中的作用。
abstract: Environmental stresses severely impair plant growth, resulting in significant crop yield and quality loss. Among various abiotic factors, salt and drought stresses are one of the major factors that affect the nutrients and water uptake by the plants, hence ultimately various physiological aspects of the plants that compromises crop yield. Continuous efforts have been made to investigate, dissect and improve plant adaptations at the molecular level in response to drought and salinity stresses. In this context, the plant beneficial microbiome presents in the rhizosphere, endosphere, and phyllosphere, also referred as second genomes of the plant is well known for its roles in plant adaptations. Exploration of beneficial interaction of fungi with host plants known as mycorrhizal association is one such special interaction that can facilitates the host plants adaptations. Mycorrhiza assist in alleviating the salinity and drought stresses of plants via redistributing the ion imbalance through translocation to different parts of the plants, as well as triggering oxidative machinery. Mycorrhiza association also regulates the level of various plant growth regulators, osmolytes and assists in acquiring minerals that are helpful in plant's adaptation against extreme environmental stresses. The current review examines the role of various plant growth regulators and plants' antioxidative systems, followed by mycorrhizal association during drought and salt stresses.

translated_keywords: C4植物；多用途作物；高粱；分子育种
journal: Journal of agricultural and food chemistry
translated_abstract: 高粱（*Sorghum bicolor* L.）是世界范围内产量和种植面积均居前五位的主要谷物之一，由于其优异的抗逆性，广泛种植于干旱和盐碱等非生物逆境严重的地区。此外，高粱是一种罕见的多用途作物，根据驯化方向和利用特性可分为 grain sorghum（ grain-type sorghum）、energy sorghum（ biofuel-type sorghum）和 silage sorghum（ forage-type sorghum），赋予其广泛的育种和经济价值。本文综述了高粱作为粮食、能源和饲料作物农艺性状的最新研究进展及调控基因，并探讨了多用途高粱改良的方向。同时，本文强调了通过基因工程方法培育多用途高粱的可行性，即利用野生高粱种质资源和遗传资源以及基因组资源探索潜在改良目标。
authors: Zheng Hongxiang; Dang Yingying; Sui Na
title: Sorghum: A Multipurpose Crop.
keywords: C4 plants; multipurpose crop; sorghum; molecular breeding
translated_title: 一种多用途作物
abstract: Sorghum (Sorghum bicolor L.) is one of the top five cereal crops in the world in terms of production and planting area and is widely grown in areas with severe abiotic stresses such as drought and saline-alkali land due to its excellent stress resistance. Moreover, sorghum is a rare multipurpose crop that can be classified into grain sorghum, energy sorghum, and silage sorghum according to its domestication direction and utilization traits, endowing it with broad breeding and economic value. In this review, we mainly discuss the latest research progress and regulatory genes of agronomic traits of sorghum as a grain, energy, and silage crop, as well as the future improvement direction of multipurpose sorghum. We also emphasize the feasibility of cultivating multipurpose sorghum through genetic engineering methods by exploring potential targets using wild sorghum germplasm and genetic resources, as well as genomic resources.
affiliations: Shandong Provincial Key Laboratory of Plant Stress, College of life Sciences, Shandong Normal University, Jinan, 250014, China.; Dongying Institute, Shandong Normal University, Dongying, 257000, China.

translated_keywords: 选择效率；基因组大小；自然选择的松弛；转录组；新热带蝾螈
translated_abstract: 真核生物的基因组大小变化对从基因组到整个有机体水平的生物学特性有着多方面的影响。较大的基因组可能会降低选择效率，因为较小的有效种群规模允许有害突变通过遗传漂变固定下来，从而增加基因组大小并降低选择效率。由于基因组大小与每碱基重组率之间可能存在负相关关系，基因组增大也可能增强基因组中连锁选择的作用，从而降低自然选择在固定或清除突变方面的效率。我们利用包含15个物种和其中6个物种的转录组数据集（这些物种的基因组大小范围从12到87皮克），研究了基因组大小与选择效率之间的关系。我们估计了小基因组和大基因组蝾螈的dN/dS值，并测试了大基因组中是否存在选择放松的现象。出乎意料的是，我们并未发现基因组大小与选择效率之间存在显著关系，也未发现大基因组物种的dN/dS值显著高于预期。此外，我们几乎没有发现大基因组物种中存在明显的选择放松现象。在这个群体中，基因组大小与分布范围（作为种群规模的替代指标）呈正相关，这与大基因组物种中更强遗传漂变的预测不符。我们的结果强调了塑造基因组巨量化有机体基因组变异的多种力量之间复杂的相互作用。
authors: Rios-Carlos Hairo; Segovia-Ramírez María Guadalupe; Fujita Matthew K; Rovito Sean M
title: Genomic Gigantism is not Associated with Reduced Selection Efficiency in Neotropical Salamanders.
keywords: Selection efficiency; Genome size; Relaxation of natural selection; Transcriptomes; Neotropical salamanders
translated_title: 基因组大小增大与热带蝾螈的选择效率降低无关。
abstract: Genome size variation in eukaryotes has myriad effects on organismal biology from the genomic to whole-organism level. Large genome size may be associated with lower selection efficiency because lower effective population sizes allow fixation of deleterious mutations via genetic drift, increasing genome size and decreasing selection efficiency. Because of a hypothesized negative relationship between genome size and recombination rate per base pair, increased genome size could also increase the effect of linked selection in the genome, decreasing the efficiency with which natural selection can fix or remove mutations. We used a transcriptomic dataset of 15 and a subset of six Neotropical salamander species ranging in genome size from 12 to 87 pg to study the relationship between genome size and efficiency of selection. We estimated dN/dS of salamanders with small and large genomes and tested for relaxation of selection in the larger genomes. Contrary to our expectations, we did not find a significant relationship between genome size and selection efficiency or strong evidence for higher dN/dS values in species with larger genomes for either species set. We also found little evidence for relaxation of selection in species with larger genomes. A positive correlation between genome size and range size (a proxy of population size) in this group disagrees with predictions of stronger drift in species with larger genomes. Our results highlight the complex interactions between the many forces shaping genomic variation in organisms with genomic gigantism.
affiliations: Unidad de Genómica Avanzada, Centro de Investigación y de Estudios Avanzados del Instituto Politécnico Nacional, km 9.6 Libramiento Norte Carretera Irapuato-León, Irapuato, Guanajuato, México.; Department of Biology, Amphibian and Reptile Diversity Research Center, The University of Texas, Arlington, TX, USA.; Unidad de Genómica Avanzada, Centro de Investigación y de Estudios Avanzados del Instituto Politécnico Nacional, km 9.6 Libramiento Norte Carretera Irapuato-León, Irapuato, Guanajuato, México. sean.rovito@cinvestav.mx.

translated_keywords: 生物生产；分子农业；酵母；植物组织培养；基因组编辑；植物次生代谢物；生物转化；代谢工程；合成生物学；植物工厂
translated_abstract: （i）工程酵母中新植源高附加值萜类化合物的从头合成；（ii）植物基材料的生物转化；（iii）基于植物生物生产的基因编辑技术；（iv）植物工厂中代谢产物生产对环境的影响；（v）分子制药。
authors: Fujiyama Kazuhito; Muranaka Toshiya; Okazawa Atsushi; Seki Hikaru; Taguchi Goro; Yasumoto Shuhei
title: Recent advances in plant-based bioproduction.
keywords: Bioproduction; Molecular farming; Yeast; Plant tissue culture; Genome editing; Plant specialized metabolite; Biotransformation; Metabolic engineering; Synthetic biology; Plant factory
translated_title: 植物生物制造的最新进展
abstract: Unable to move on their own, plants have acquired the ability to produce a wide variety of low molecular weight compounds to survive against various stresses. It is estimated that there are as many as one million different kinds. Plants also have the ability to accumulate high levels of proteins. Although plant-based bioproduction has traditionally relied on classical tissue culture methods, the attraction of bioproduction by plants is increasing with the development of omics and bioinformatics and other various technologies, as well as synthetic biology. This review describes the current status and prospects of these plant-based bioproduction from five advanced research topics, (i) de novo production of plant-derived high value terpenoids in engineered yeast, (ii) biotransformation of plant-based materials, (iii) genome editing technology for plant-based bioproduction, (iv) environmental effect of metabolite production in plant factory, and (v) molecular pharming.
affiliations: International Center for Biotechnology, Osaka University, 2-1 Yamada-Oka, Suita, Osaka 565-0871, Japan; Department of Biotechnology, Graduate School of Engineering, Osaka University, Suita, Osaka 565-0871, Japan; Industrial Biotechnology Initiative Division, Institute for Open and Transdisciplinary Research Initiatives (OTRI), Osaka University, Suita, Osaka 565-0871, Japan.; Department of Biotechnology, Graduate School of Engineering, Osaka University, Suita, Osaka 565-0871, Japan; Industrial Biotechnology Initiative Division, Institute for Open and Transdisciplinary Research Initiatives (OTRI), Osaka University, Suita, Osaka 565-0871, Japan.
