translated_keywords: 纳米农业；水通道蛋白；植物激素；分子机制；热休克蛋白；抗氧化剂；非生物胁迫；纳米材料
journal: Journal of agricultural and food chemistry
translated_abstract: 全球变暖对农业生产力构成了巨大压力，高温和干旱引起的非生物胁迫已成为植物以及全球粮食安全的严重威胁。在农业中应用纳米材料能够平衡植物的氧化水平，同时调节植物激素水平，从而在热胁迫和干旱胁迫下维持正常的植物生长。纳米材料可以激活并调控特定的胁迫相关基因，进而提高热激蛋白和水通道蛋白的活性，增强植物对非生物胁迫的抗性。本文旨在综述纳米技术增强植物耐热性和抗旱性的现状，探讨纳米材料缓解植物非生物胁迫的分子机制。与有机分子相比，纳米材料具有靶向传输和缓释的优势，这些特性有助于其减轻植物的干旱和热胁迫。
authors: Zhao Weichen; Wu Zhangguo; Amde Meseret; Zhu Guikai; Wei Yujing; Zhou Pingfan; Zhang Qinghua; Song Maoyong; Tan Zhiqiang; Zhang Peng; Rui Yukui; Lynch Iseult
title: Nanoenabled Enhancement of Plant Tolerance to Heat and Drought Stress on Molecular Response.
keywords: nanoagriculture; aquaporin; phytohormones; molecular mechanism; heat shock protein; antioxidant; abiotic stress; nanomaterials
translated_title: 纳米技术增强植物耐热和抗旱胁迫的分子响应研究
abstract: Global warming has posed significant pressure on agricultural productivity. The resulting abiotic stresses from high temperatures and drought have become serious threats to plants and subsequent global food security. Applying nanomaterials in agriculture can balance the plant's oxidant level and can also regulate phytohormone levels and thus maintain normal plant growth under heat and drought stresses. Nanomaterials can activate and regulate specific stress-related genes, which in turn increase the activity of heat shock protein and aquaporin to enable plants' resistance against abiotic stresses. This review aims to provide a current understanding of nanotechnology-enhanced plant tolerance to heat and drought stress. Molecular mechanisms are explored to see how nanomaterials can alleviate abiotic stresses on plants. In comparison with organic molecules, nanomaterials offer the advantages of targeted transportation and slow release. These advantages help the nanomaterials in mitigating drought and heat stress in plants.
affiliations: State Key Laboratory of Environmental Chemistry and Ecotoxicology, Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing 100085, China.; Beijing Key Laboratory of Farmland Soil Pollution Prevention and Remediation, College of Resources and Environmental Sciences, China Agricultural University, Beijing 100193, China.; University of Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing 100049, China.; School of Environment, Hangzhou Institute for Advanced Study, University of Chinese Academy of Sciences, Hangzhou 310024, Zhejiang Province, China.; Department of Chemistry, College of Natural and Computational Sciences, Haramaya University, Oromia 103, Ethiopia.; School of Environment, Tsinghua University, Beijing 100084, China.; Department of Environmental Science and Engineering, University of Science and Technology of China, Hefei 230026, China.; School of Geography, Earth and Environmental Sciences, University of Birmingham, Edgbaston, Birmingham B15 2TT, U.K.

translated_keywords: 禾谷镰孢菌；泛基因组；植物病原体；表达分析；长链非编码RNA
translated_abstract: 长链非编码RNA（lncRNAs）是广泛参与多种生物学过程的调控分子。在真菌病原体中，lncRNAs能够响应压力，并在调节生长和营养获取方面发挥作用。最近的研究证据表明，lncRNAs可能还在毒力方面发挥作用，例如调控与致病性相关的酶以及宿主上的繁殖周期。尽管lncRNAs的重要性已被认可，但只有少数模式真菌具有详细的lncRNA目录记录。本研究中，我们应用一种近期开发的计算流程，在重要全球小麦病原体——禾谷镰刀菌（Zymoseptoria tritici）中预测了高置信度的lncRNA候选者。通过分析宿主感染周期中的表达情况，我们研究了lncRNAs的基因组特征及其可能关联的过程。我们发现lncRNAs在早期感染阶段频繁表达，此时还未切换到坏死型生长模式。它们主要位于可选择性异染色质区域，这些区域包含许多与致病性相关的基因。此外，我们还发现lncRNAs经常与可能参与响应宿主防御信号（如氧化应激）的基因共表达。最后，我们利用四个额外的参考质量基因组评估了lncRNAs的泛基因组特征。我们发现不同个体间表达的lncRNA种类存在显著差异，尽管从基因组水平来看，lncRNA位点通常是共享的。总体而言，本研究为禾谷镰刀菌中的lncRNA提供了目录及其潜在功能，为这一重要病原体的分子遗传学和功能分析奠定了基础。
authors: Glad Hanna M; Tralamazza Sabina Moser; Croll Daniel
title: The expression landscape and pangenome of long non-coding RNA in the fungal wheat pathogen Zymoseptoria tritici.
keywords: Zymoseptoria tritici; pangenomes; plant pathogen; expression analyses; long non-coding RNA
translated_title: 禾谷镰刀菌中长非编码RNA的表达谱系与泛基因组
abstract: Long non-coding RNAs (lncRNAs) are regulatory molecules interacting in a wide array of biological processes. lncRNAs in fungal pathogens can be responsive to stress and play roles in regulating growth and nutrient acquisition. Recent evidence suggests that lncRNAs may also play roles in virulence, such as regulating pathogenicity-associated enzymes and on-host reproductive cycles. Despite the importance of lncRNAs, only a few model fungi have well-documented inventories of lncRNA. In this study, we apply a recent computational pipeline to predict high-confidence lncRNA candidates in Zymoseptoria tritici, an important global pathogen of wheat impacting global food production. We analyse genomic features of lncRNAs and the most likely associated processes through analyses of expression over a host infection cycle. We find that lncRNAs are frequently expressed during early infection, before the switch to necrotrophic growth. They are mostly located in facultative heterochromatic regions, which are known to contain many genes associated with pathogenicity. Furthermore, we find that lncRNAs are frequently co-expressed with genes that may be involved in responding to host defence signals, such as oxidative stress. Finally, we assess pangenome features of lncRNAs using four additional reference-quality genomes. We find evidence that the repertoire of expressed lncRNAs varies substantially between individuals, even though lncRNA loci tend to be shared at the genomic level. Overall, this study provides a repertoire and putative functions of lncRNAs in Z. tritici enabling future molecular genetics and functional analyses in an important pathogen.
affiliations: Laboratory of Evolutionary Genetics, Institute of Biology, University of Neuchâtel, 2000 Neuchâtel, Switzerland.

translated_keywords: 植物；纳米酶；污染物检测；植物抗性；农环境；作物产量
journal: Journal of agricultural and food chemistry
translated_abstract: 随着全球人口的增长，粮食需求大幅增加，给农业的可持续性带来了更大压力。为满足这一需求，亟需开发全新技术。由于纳米酶兼具高效的酶催化活性和纳米材料独特的尺寸、比表面积、光学及热学特性等优势，其在植物与环境领域的应用潜力正逐渐显现。本文系统分析了具有不同酶样活性的纳米酶的催化机制，并总结了其通过调节活性氧（ROS）水平提高作物产量、增强抗逆性以及检测和去除有害污染物的应用。最后，本文全面分析了纳米酶在尺寸、设计、应用、经济性和生物安全性等方面面临的挑战，并展望了其未来发展方向，以更好地服务于可持续农业。
authors: Huang Yuewen; Peng Shan; Liu Yufeng; Feng Guangfu; Ding Zizi; Xiang Bo; Zheng Lijuan; Cheng Haobin; Liu Shiyu; Yao Hao; Fang Jun
title: Emerging Roles of Nanozymes in Plant and Environmental Sectors.
keywords: plant; nanozyme; pollutant detection; plant resistance; agro-environment; crop yield
translated_title: 纳米酶在植物和环境领域中的新兴作用
abstract: The demand for food has increased dramatically as the global population increases, putting more strain on the sustainability of agriculture. To fulfill this requirement, it is imperative to develop brand-new technologies. The application potential of nanozymes in the plant and environmental sectors is progressively becoming apparent as a result of their effective enzymatic catalytic activity and the distinctive characteristics of nanomaterials, including size, specific surface area, optical properties, and thermal properties. Herein, we systematically analyze the catalytic mechanisms of nanozymes with different enzyme-mimetic activities and summarize their applications in improving crop yields by regulating ROS levels and enhancing stress resistance and detecting and removing hazardous pollutants. Finally, we thoroughly analyze the challenges faced by nanozymes regarding size, design, application, economy, and biosafety and look forward to their future development directions to better serve sustainable agriculture.
affiliations: College of Bioscience and Biotechnology, Hunan Agricultural University, Changsha 410128, P. R. China.; Changsha IMADEK Intelligent Technology Company, Limited, Changsha 410081, P. R. China.

translated_keywords: 量子点；分布；植物激素；荧光探针；可视化
journal: Journal of agricultural and food chemistry
translated_abstract: 植物激素作为调控植物生长发育的关键因素，在提高作物抗逆性方面引起了广泛关注。理解植物体内植物激素的分布对于评估植物健康状况和研究其功能至关重要，同时也有助于开发和利用植物生长调节剂。荧光探针技术的进步，以及荧光团种类的丰富和成像方法的改进，使其成为监测植物体内植物激素的有效手段。该技术在植物研究中已被证实有效，特别是在检测荧光探针对植物激素响应方面。本文综述了荧光探针在外部胁迫条件下测量和可视化植物体内植物激素分布方面的应用价值。然而，在活体植物中实现高空间分辨率的植物激素可视化以及获得高生物相容性仍面临重大挑战。尽管如此，这一领域仍有许多未被充分挖掘的机会。本文旨在深入探讨这一主题的进一步讨论潜力。
authors: Liu Yaming; Liao Anjing; Chen Shunhong; Xu Ying; Zhou Jing-Jiang; Wu Jian
title: Fluorescent Probes Visualize Phytohormone: Research Status and Opportunities.
keywords: quantum dot; distribution; phytohormone; fluorescent probe; visualization
translated_title: 研究现状与机遇
abstract: Phytohormones, as crucial regulatory factors in plant growth and development, have garnered increased interest in improving crop stress resistance. It is essential to comprehend the distribution of phytohormones in plants to assess their health status and investigate their functions. This knowledge also serves as a guide for developing and using plant growth regulators. The advancement of fluorescent probe technology, along with the wide range of fluorophores and improvements in imaging methods, has made it a successful approach for monitoring phytohormones in plants. This technique has been confirmed to be effective in plants, particularly in detecting the response of fluorescent probes to phytohormones. In this Perspective, we highlight the utility of fluorescent probes in measuring and visualizing the distribution of phytohormones in plants under external stress. However, the visualization of phytohormones with high spatial resolution and the achievement of high biocompatibility in living plants have posed significant challenges for researchers. Nonetheless, there are also many untapped opportunities in this field. This paper seeks to delve into the potential for further discussion on the subject.
affiliations: State Key Laboratory Breeding Base of Green Pesticide and Agricultural Bioengineering, Key Laboratory of Green Pesticide and Agricultural Bioengineering, Ministry of Education, Guizhou University, Huaxi District, Guiyang 550025, China.

translated_keywords: 水生到陆生过渡;转座子;基因组重排;基因组动态;两栖类;肉鳍鱼类;进化事件;生物进化;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 脊椎动物进化中的主要转变与显著的基因组重排相关联。与脊椎动物起源或辐鳍鱼类分化之前的进化过程不同，在水生到陆生的转变过程中并未发生全基因组复制事件，而基因组动态如何对此重要的进化事件作出贡献仍然是一个悬而未决的问题。事实上，最近对肉鳍鱼类和两栖类基因组的测序显示，这一转变前后现存谱系中转座元件的数量异常丰富，这促使人们推测这些序列可能催化了使脊椎动物能够向陆地进化的适应性变化。本文综述了与脊椎动物进化主要转变相关的基因组动态，并讨论了通过最近对两栖类和肉鳍鱼类基因组特征研究揭示的高度重复的基因组景观，表明在水生到陆生转变之前可能发生了动荡的基因组动态，从而可能促成了这一转变。
authors: Falcon Francisco; Tanaka Elly M; Rodriguez-Terrones Diego
title: Transposon waves at the water-to-land transition.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 水生到陆生过渡;转座子;基因组重排;基因组动态;两栖类;肉鳍鱼类;进化事件;生物进化;分子生物学
translated_title: 转座子在水生到陆生转变中的波浪效应
abstract: The major transitions in vertebrate evolution are associated with significant genomic reorganizations. In contrast to the evolutionary processes that occurred at the origin of vertebrates or prior to the radiation of teleost fishes, no whole-genome duplication events occurred during the water-to-land transition, and it remains an open question how did genome dynamics contribute to this prominent evolutionary event. Indeed, the recent sequencing of sarcopterygian and amphibian genomes has revealed that the extant lineages immediately preceding and succeeding this transition harbor an exceptional number of transposable elements and it is tempting to speculate that these sequences might have catalyzed the adaptations that enabled vertebrates to venture into land. Here, we review the genome dynamics associated with the major transitions in vertebrate evolution and discuss how the highly repetitive genomic landscapes revealed by recent efforts to characterize the genomes of amphibians and sarcopterygians argue for turbulent genome dynamics occurring before the water-to-land transition and possibly enabling it.
affiliations: Institute of Molecular Pathology (IMP), Vienna Biocenter (VBC), Campus Vienna Biocenter, 1030, Vienna, Austria; Vienna BioCenter PhD Program, Doctoral School of the University of Vienna and Medical University of Vienna, Vienna, Austria. Electronic address: https://twitter.com/@FcoJFalcon.; Institute of Molecular Pathology (IMP), Vienna Biocenter (VBC), Campus Vienna Biocenter, 1030, Vienna, Austria. Electronic address: elly.tanaka@imp.ac.at.; Institute of Molecular Pathology (IMP), Vienna Biocenter (VBC), Campus Vienna Biocenter, 1030, Vienna, Austria. Electronic address: diego.terrones@imp.ac.at.

translated_keywords: 人类大脑;基因组学;脑发育;分子功能;独特序列;基因表达调控;神经科学;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 理解是什么使我们成为独特的智人物种，这一问题贯穿于基因组学、神经科学、发育生物学乃至医学等多个领域。人类特异性基因组序列的发现，为理解人类大脑进化的分子特征开启了新的视角。测序技术、计算方法以及体外筛选技术的进步共同揭示了这些独特序列在调控基因表达中的新功能。本文综述了人类特异性位点的图景，并描述了新兴技术如何被用于理解其分子功能及其对脑发育的影响。此外，我们还讨论了该领域的当前挑战，并探讨了整合新假说和新技术以推动我们对人脑理解的可能性。
authors: Moss Nicole D; Lollis Davoneshia; Silver Debra L
title: How our brains are built: emerging approaches to understand human-specific features.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 人类大脑;基因组学;脑发育;分子功能;独特序列;基因表达调控;神经科学;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 理解人类特有特征的新方法。
abstract: Understanding what makes us uniquely human is a long-standing question permeating fields from genomics, neuroscience, and developmental biology to medicine. The discovery of human-specific genomic sequences has enabled a new understanding of the molecular features of human brain evolution. Advances in sequencing, computational, and in vitro screening approaches collectively reveal new roles of uniquely human sequences in regulating gene expression. Here, we review the landscape of human-specific loci and describe how emerging technologies are being used to understand their molecular functions and impact on brain development. We describe current challenges in the field and the potential of integrating new hypotheses and approaches to propel our understanding of the human brain.
affiliations: Department of Molecular Genetics and Microbiology, Duke University Medical Center, Durham, NC 27710, USA.; Department of Molecular Genetics and Microbiology, Duke University Medical Center, Durham, NC 27710, USA. Electronic address: https://twitter.com/@_mlollis.; Department of Molecular Genetics and Microbiology, Duke University Medical Center, Durham, NC 27710, USA; Department of Cell Biology and Neurobiology, Duke University Medical Center, Durham, NC 27710, USA; Duke Institute for Brain Sciences and Duke Regeneration Center, Duke University Medical Center, Durham, NC 27710, USA. Electronic address: debra.silver@duke.edu.

translated_keywords: 植物化学素；植物寄生线虫；次生代谢物；杀线虫化合物
translated_abstract: 植物寄生线虫是破坏性最强的植物病原体之一，每年造成的全球经济损失约为3580亿美元。使用合成杀线虫剂来控制植物寄生线虫会导致环境的广谱毒性。近年来，植物源次生代谢物作为一种可行的选择，为在各种作物系统中管理植物寄生线虫提供了有效、环保且可再生的途径。然而，关于植物源次生代谢物的来源、化学结构及其杀线虫活性的综合信息仍然有限。本研究旨在整理和分析过去二十年收集到的具有杀线虫特性的植物源次生代谢物数据。综述中，我们确定了来自35个植物科和65种植物的262种具有杀线虫活性的植物源代谢物。其中，生物碱、萜类化合物、皂苷、黄酮类、香豆素、硫代苯并呋喃和安诺酰基丙酮被列为研究最多的化合物。除了特定代谢物的结构-活性关系外，还讨论了从植物材料中提取和分离这些代谢物的各种技术。我们的研究结果表明，植物作为获取杀线虫化合物的原料以及发现可用于开发下一代杀线虫剂的新化学物质具有潜力。© 2024 作者（们）。《害虫管理科学》由John Wiley & Sons有限公司代表化学工业学会出版。
authors: Ibrahim Hashim; Nchiozem-Ngnitedem Vaderament-A; Dandurand Louise-Marie; Popova Inna
title: Naturally-occurring nematicides of plant origin: two decades of novel chemistries.
keywords: phytochemicals; plant‐parasitic nematodes; secondary metabolites; nematicidal compounds
translated_title: 二十年来的新型化学物质
abstract: Plant-parasitic nematodes are among the most destructive plant pathogens, resulting in a global annual economic loss of about 358 billion dollars. Using synthetic nematicides to control plant-parasitic nematodes has resulted in broad-spectrum toxicity to the environment. Plant-derived secondary metabolites have recently emerged as viable options that provide effective, greener, and renewable routes for managing plant-parasitic nematodes in various cropping systems. However, limited comprehensive information on plant-derived secondary metabolites sources, chemical structures, and nematicidal activities is available. This study aims to compile and analyze data on plant-based secondary metabolites with nematicidal properties collected over the last two decades. In this review, we identified 262 plant-based metabolites with nematicidal activities that were isolated from 35 plant families and 65 plant species. Alkaloids, terpenoids, saponins, flavonoids, coumarins, thiophenes, and annonaceous acetogenins were among the most studied compounds. In addition to the structure-activity relation for specific metabolites with nematicidal potency, various techniques for their extraction and isolation from plant material are discussed. Our findings demonstrate the potential of plants as a feedstock for sourcing nematicidal compounds and discovering new chemistries that could potentially be used for developing the next generation of nematicides. © 2024 The Author(s). Pest Management Science published by John Wiley & Sons Ltd on behalf of Society of Chemical Industry.
affiliations: Department of Soil and Environmental Sciences, University of Wisconsin-Madison, Madison, WI, USA.; Institut für Chemie, University of Potsdam, Potsdam-Golm, Germany.; Department of Entomology, Plant Pathology, and Nematology, University of Idaho, Moscow, USA.

translated_keywords: Hi-C; 基因组组装; 染色体级 scaffolding; 三角区策略; 动态窗口; scaffolding 干扰; 比较基因组学; 生物信息学
translated_abstract: 高质量的染色体规模基因组对于基因组分析至关重要。包括三维基因组学、表观遗传学和比较基因组学在内的分析依赖于高质量的基因组组装，而Hi-C数据通常被用来辅助完成这一过程。然而，对现有基因组的整理表明，目前基于Hi-C的支架算法要么会产生排序和方向错误，要么无法生成高质量的染色体水平支架。在此，我们推出了软件Puzzle Hi-C，它利用Hi-C读数准确地将contig或scaffold分配到染色体上。Puzzle Hi-C使用三角区域而不是方形区域来计数Hi-C热图中的相互作用，这一策略显著减少了由长程相互作用引起的支架干扰。此外，该软件在组装过程中引入了动态三角窗口策略，初始较小的窗口会随着相互作用的增加而扩展，从而产生更有效的聚类。Puzzle Hi-C的表现优于现有的支架工具。
authors: Lin Guoliang; Huang Zhiru; Yue Tingsong; Chai Jing; Li Yan; Yang Huimin; Qin Wanting; Yang Guobing; Murphy Robert W; Zhang Ya-Ping; Zhang Zijie; Zhou Wei; Luo Jing
title: Puzzle Hi-C: An accurate scaffolding software.
keywords: (Auto-generated) Hi-C; 基因组组装; 染色体级 scaffolding; 三角区策略; 动态窗口; scaffolding 干扰; 比较基因组学; 生物信息学
translated_title: 一种精确的支架组装软件。
abstract: High-quality, chromosome-scale genomes are essential for genomic analyses. Analyses, including 3D genomics, epigenetics, and comparative genomics rely on a high-quality genome assembly, which is often accomplished with the assistance of Hi-C data. Curation of genomes reveal that current Hi-C-assisted scaffolding algorithms either generate ordering and orientation errors or fail to assemble high-quality chromosome-level scaffolds. Here, we offer the software Puzzle Hi-C, which uses Hi-C reads to accurately assign contigs or scaffolds to chromosomes. Puzzle Hi-C uses the triangle region instead of the square region to count interactions in a Hi-C heatmap. This strategy dramatically diminishes scaffolding interference caused by long-range interactions. This software also introduces a dynamic, triangle window strategy during assembly. Initially small, the window expands with interactions to produce more effective clustering. Puzzle Hi-C outperforms available scaffolding tools.
affiliations: State Key Laboratory for Conservation and Utilization of Bio-resource, School of Ecology and Environment, School of Life Sciences and School of Medicine, Yunnan University, Kunming, Yunnan, China.; Department of Biology, University of Waterloo, Waterloo, ON, Canada.; Reptilia Zoo and Education Centre, Vaughan, ON, Canada.; Southwest United Graduate School, Yunnan University, Kunming, Yunnan, China.; National Pilot School of Software, Yunnan University, Kunming, Yunnan, China.

translated_keywords: Structural variants; Telomere-to-telomere genome; Pangenome; Primate species; Long-read sequencing; Base pair differences; Inter- and intra-species SV; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: 结构变异（SVs）占灵长类物种内和物种间大多数碱基差异。然而，由于灵长类基因组草图的质量以及关键分类单元缺乏基因组资源，我们对灵长类物种间和物种内的SV理解一直受到限制。近年来，长读长测序和基因组组装的进步开始从根本上改变我们对SV的理解。其中两项具有里程碑意义的成就包括人类端粒到端粒（T2T）基因组的发表以及首个完整的人类泛基因组参考的开发。本文首先回顾了奠定这些项目基础的主要研究工作。接着，我们探讨了T2T基因组组装和泛基因组如何改变我们对灵长类SV的理解和研究方法。最后，我们讨论了在T2T基因组和泛基因组时代灵长类SV研究的未来发展方向。
authors: L Rocha Joana; Lou Runyang N; Sudmant Peter H
title: Structural variation in humans and our primate kin in the era of telomere-to-telomere genomes and pangenomics.
keywords: (Auto-generated) Structural variants; Telomere-to-telomere genome; Pangenome; Primate species; Long-read sequencing; Base pair differences; Inter- and intra-species SV; 生物信息学; 分子生物学
translated_title: 在端粒到端粒基因组和泛基因组时代的人类及其灵长类近亲的结构变异
abstract: Structural variants (SVs) account for the majority of base pair differences both within and between primate species. However, our understanding of inter- and intra-species SV has been historically hampered by the quality of draft primate genomes and the absence of genome resources for key taxa. Recently, advances in long-read sequencing and genome assembly have begun to radically reshape our understanding of SVs. Two landmark achievements include the publication of a human telomere-to-telomere (T2T) genome as well as the development of the first human pangenome reference. In this review, we first look back to the major works laying the foundation for these projects. We then examine the ways in which T2T genome assemblies and pangenomes are transforming our understanding of and approach to primate SV. Finally, we discuss what the future of primate SV research may look like in the era of T2T genomes and pangenomics.
affiliations: Department of Integrative Biology, University of California, Berkeley, Berkeley, USA. Electronic address: https://twitter.com/@joanocha.; Department of Integrative Biology, University of California, Berkeley, Berkeley, USA. Electronic address: https://twitter.com/@NicolasLou10.; Department of Integrative Biology, University of California, Berkeley, Berkeley, USA; Center for Computational Biology, University of California, Berkeley, Berkeley, USA. Electronic address: psudmant@berkeley.edu.

translated_keywords: 基因组装；第三代测序；表观遗传学；转录组
translated_abstract: 三代测序技术在人类和家畜遗传学的基因组、转录组及表观遗传研究中得到了广泛应用。该技术在复杂基因组区域的测序、精细结构变异的鉴定以及高质量基因组的构建方面具有显著优势，其长读长、无需PCR扩增以及直接检测DNA/RNA等特点进一步增强了其效能。本文综述了以单分子实时测序（SMRT）和牛津纳米孔技术（ONT）为代表的三代测序技术，并重点探讨了其在家畜基因组学研究中的进展，包括基因组组装、结构变异检测、转录组测序及表观遗传学研究。文章对三代测序技术在家畜基因组检测中的应用及其面临的挑战进行了全面分析。除了深入剖析家畜基因组结构分析和稀有基因鉴定的价值外，本文还探索了决定典型性状的遗传机制。本综述不仅增进了我们对家畜基因组的认识，也为这一领域的研究提供了新的视角。
authors: Liu Xinyue; Zheng Junyuan; Ding Jialan; Wu Jiaxin; Zuo Fuyuan; Zhang Gongwei
title: When Livestock Genomes Meet Third-Generation Sequencing Technology: From Opportunities to Applications.
keywords: gene assembly; third-generation sequencing; epigenetics; transcriptome
translated_title: 从机遇到应用
abstract: Third-generation sequencing technology has found widespread application in the genomic, transcriptomic, and epigenetic research of both human and livestock genetics. This technology offers significant advantages in the sequencing of complex genomic regions, the identification of intricate structural variations, and the production of high-quality genomes. Its attributes, including long sequencing reads, obviation of PCR amplification, and direct determination of DNA/RNA, contribute to its efficacy. This review presents a comprehensive overview of third-generation sequencing technologies, exemplified by single-molecule real-time sequencing (SMRT) and Oxford Nanopore Technology (ONT). Emphasizing the research advancements in livestock genomics, the review delves into genome assembly, structural variation detection, transcriptome sequencing, and epigenetic investigations enabled by third-generation sequencing. A comprehensive analysis is conducted on the application and potential challenges of third-generation sequencing technology for genome detection in livestock. Beyond providing valuable insights into genome structure analysis and the identification of rare genes in livestock, the review ventures into an exploration of the genetic mechanisms underpinning exemplary traits. This review not only contributes to our understanding of the genomic landscape in livestock but also provides fresh perspectives for the advancement of research in this domain.
affiliations: College of Animal Science and Technology, Southwest University, Rongchang, Chongqing 402460, China.; Beef Cattle Engineering and Technology Research Center of Chongqing, Southwest University, Rongchang, Chongqing 402460, China.

translated_keywords: 细菌素；泛基因组；丁酸梭菌；代谢途径
translated_abstract: 丁酸梭菌是一种革兰氏阳性厌氧菌，以其能够生产丁酸而闻名。本研究对从中国各地收集的14株丁酸梭菌工业菌株进行了全基因组测序和组装，并对这14个组装菌株与从NCBI下载的139个菌株进行了泛基因组比较分析。我们发现，与关键工业生产途径相关的基因主要存在于核心和软核基因类别中。系统发育分析表明，同属一个系统发育树分支的菌株具有相似的抗生素抗性和毒力因子，这些基因大多存在于壳基因和云基因类别中。最后，我们预测了产生细菌素、肉毒毒素以及负责宿主防御的CRISPR系统的基因。总之，本研究为丁酸梭菌在工业生产、食品应用和遗传学研究方面提供了理想的泛基因组数据库。
authors: Yang Yicheng; Shao Yuan; Pei Chenchen; Liu Yangyang; Zhang Min; Zhu Xi; Li Jinshan; Feng Lifei; Li Guanghua; Li Keke; Liang Yunxiang; Li Yingjun
title: Pangenome analyses of Clostridium butyricum provide insights into its genetic characteristics and industrial application.
keywords: Bacteriocin; Pangenome; Clostridium butyricum; Metabolic pathways
translated_title: 丁酸梭菌的泛基因组分析揭示其遗传特性和工业应用潜力
abstract: Clostridium butyricum is a Gram-positive anaerobic bacterium known for its ability to produce butyate. In this study, we conducted whole-genome sequencing and assembly of 14C. butyricum industrial strains collected from various parts of China. We performed a pan-genome comparative analysis of the 14 assembled strains and 139 strains downloaded from NCBI. We found that the genes related to critical industrial production pathways were primarily present in the core and soft-core gene categories. The phylogenetic analysis revealed that strains from the same clade of the phylogenetic tree possessed similar antibiotic resistance and virulence factors, with most of these genes present in the shell and cloud gene categories. Finally, we predicted the genes producing bacteriocins and botulinum toxins as well as CRISPR systems responsible for host defense. In conclusion, our research provides a desirable pan-genome database for the industrial production, food application, and genetic research of C. butyricum.

translated_keywords: 基因组分析;图像处理;深度学习模型;混沌游戏表示法;自然语言处理;基因组信息编码;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: A（腺嘌呤）、C（胞嘧啶）、G（鸟嘌呤）和T（胸腺嘧啶）。然而，另一种方法是通过图像表示来展示与序列相关的信息，例如混沌游戏表示法（CGR）和读取堆叠图像。随着计算机视觉和自然语言处理领域深度学习（DL）方法的快速发展，越来越多的研究者对将基于图像的DL方法应用于基因组序列分析产生了兴趣。这些方法包括将基因组信息编码为图像或将图像中的空间信息整合到分析过程中。本文综述了三种典型的应用案例，这些案例利用深度学习模型结合图像处理技术进行基因组分析，并探讨了这些基于图像的方法的使用及其优势。
authors: Zhang Yao-Zhong; Imoto Seiya
title: Genome analysis through image processing with deep learning models.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组分析;图像处理;深度学习模型;混沌游戏表示法;自然语言处理;基因组信息编码;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 基于深度学习模型的图像处理在基因组分析中的应用
abstract: Genomic sequences are traditionally represented as strings of characters: A (adenine), C (cytosine), G (guanine), and T (thymine). However, an alternative approach involves depicting sequence-related information through image representations, such as Chaos Game Representation (CGR) and read pileup images. With rapid advancements in deep learning (DL) methods within computer vision and natural language processing, there is growing interest in applying image-based DL methods to genomic sequence analysis. These methods involve encoding genomic information as images or integrating spatial information from images into the analytical process. In this review, we summarize three typical applications that use image processing with DL models for genome analysis. We examine the utilization and advantages of these image-based approaches.
affiliations: Division of Health Medical Intelligence, Human Genome Center, the Institute of Medical Science, the University of Tokyo, 4-6-1 Shirokanedai, Minato-ku, Tokyo, 108-8639, Japan. yaozhong@hgc.jp.; Division of Health Medical Intelligence, Human Genome Center, the Institute of Medical Science, the University of Tokyo, 4-6-1 Shirokanedai, Minato-ku, Tokyo, 108-8639, Japan. imoto@hgc.jp.

translated_keywords: 系统发育关系；叶绿体基因组；蔷薇科；重复序列；比较基因组学
translated_abstract: 目前，中国杏的生产和品质受到种质资源特征鉴定（包括种和品种水平的鉴定）不足的限制。为解决这一问题，本研究对毛桃（*Prunus armeniaca* L.）、西伯利亚杏（*P. sibirica* L.）以及食用仁杏的完整叶绿体基因组进行了测序、特征分析及系统发育分析。三种叶绿体（cp）基因组大小在157,951至158,224 bp之间，共鉴定出131个基因，包括86个蛋白编码基因、37个rRNA和8个tRNA。GC含量范围为36.70%至36.75%。在检测到的170个重复序列中，有42个序列在三种物种间共享；同时检测到53-57个简单序列重复，其AT碱基偏好明显。比较基因组学分析显示，三种杏的总体结构和基因内容高度相似，并存在七个变异热点区域，包括*psbA-trnK-UUU*、*rpoC1-rpoB*、*rpl32-trnL-UAG*、*trnK-rps16*、*ndhG-ndhI*、*ccsA-ndhD*和*ndhF-trnL*。系统发育分析表明，三种杏聚为一组，其中*P. armeniaca*与食用仁杏的遗传关系最近。本研究结果为杏遗传多样性的进一步研究以及分子标记开发和利用用于杏的遗传改良提供了理论基础。
authors: Yi Ru; Bao Wenquan; Ao Dun; Bai Yu-E; Wang Lin; Wuyun Ta-Na
title: Sequencing and Phylogenetic Analysis of the Chloroplast Genome of Three Apricot Species.
keywords: phylogenetic relationship; chloroplast genome; Rosaceae; repetitive sequence; comparative genomics
translated_title: 三种杏属植物叶绿体基因组的测序与系统发育分析
abstract: The production and quality of apricots in China is currently limited by the availability of germplasm resource characterizations, including identification at the species and cultivar level. To help address this issue, the complete chloroplast genomes of Prunus armeniaca L., P. sibirica L. and kernel consumption apricot were sequenced, characterized, and phylogenetically analyzed. The three chloroplast (cp) genomes ranged from 157,951 to 158,224 bp, and 131 genes were identified, including 86 protein-coding genes, 37 rRNAs, and 8 tRNAs. The GC content ranged from 36.70% to 36.75%. Of the 170 repetitive sequences detected, 42 were shared by all three species, and 53-57 simple sequence repeats were detected with AT base preferences. Comparative genomic analysis revealed high similarity in overall structure and gene content as well as seven variation hotspot regions, including psbA-trnK-UUU, rpoC1-rpoB, rpl32-trnL-UAG, trnK-rps16, ndhG-ndhI, ccsA-ndhD, and ndhF-trnL. Phylogenetic analysis showed that the three apricot species clustered into one group, and the genetic relationship between P. armeniaca and kernel consumption apricot was the closest. The results of this study provide a theoretical basis for further research on the genetic diversity of apricots and the development and utilization of molecular markers for the genetic engineering and breeding of apricots.
affiliations: College of Forestry, Inner Mongolia Agricultural University, Hohhot 010018, China.; State Key Laboratory of Tree Genetics and Breeding, Research Institute of Non-Timber Forestry, Chinese Academy of Forestry, Zhengzhou 450003, China.; Key Laboratory of Non-Timber Forest Germplasm Enhancement & Utilization of National Forestry and Grassland Administration, Research Institute of Non-Timber Forestry, Chinese Academy of Forestry, Zhengzhou 450003, China.

translated_keywords: Pan-genome; 生活方式; 基因组适应潜力; 移动遗传元件; 核心基因组; 宿主关联; 自由生活; 生态适应; 生物多样性; 微生物学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract:
Paracoccus 属能够栖息于多种不同的生态位，包括海洋和陆地环境，并且在全球范围内分布。此外，该属在分类学、代谢方式以及生活方式上具有高度多样性。迄今为止，关于 Paracoccus 如何适应如此广泛的生态位和生活方式知之甚少。本研究对 Paracoccus 属进行了基因组系统发育分析（n=160），并重新审视了该属，从而对 16 株未分类的 Paracoccus 菌株进行了种水平分类，并检测到 5 种错误分类。此外，我们对来自不同生态位的 Paracoccus 模式菌株进行了泛基因组分析，这些生态位包括不同土壤、潮间带沉积物、宿主关联（如蓝点笛鲷、Bugula plumosa 和造礁珊瑚 Stylophora pistillata），以阐明 i) 生活方式和适应潜力的重要性，以及 ii) 基因组装备与生态位适应潜力的作用。

通过结合短读长和长读长技术，对 6 株完整基因组进行了从头拼接。这些 Paracoccus 基因组使模式菌株完全闭合的高质量基因组数量从 15 增加到 21。泛基因组分析显示，由 13,819 个基因组成的开放型泛基因组中，最小染色体核心仅为 8.84%，这突显了基因组的适应潜力以及额外染色体元件的巨大影响。所有基因组均受到各种可移动遗传元件的影响，包括基因岛、前噬菌体、转座酶和插入序列，强调了其基因组的可塑性。就生活方式而言，应根据生态背景分别评估每个可移动遗传元件。相比之下，自由生活的基因组倾向于包含（1）更大的基因组或更多的额外染色体元件，（2）更多基因岛和插入序列元件，以及（3）较少完整的前噬菌体区域。就生活方式适应而言，自由生活的基因组共享与通过 T4SS 进行基因交换相关的基因，这对 Paracoccus 尤为重要，因其拥有大量额外染色体元件，使其能够适应动态环境。相反，宿主关联的基因组则包含多种与分子运输、细胞壁修饰、附着、应激保护、DNA 修复、碳和氮代谢相关的基因。由于适应性基因数量众多，Paracoccus 可以快速适应不断变化的环境条件。
authors: Hollensteiner Jacqueline; Schneider Dominik; Poehlein Anja; Brinkhoff Thorsten; Daniel Rolf
title: Pan-genome analysis of six Paracoccus type strain genomes reveal lifestyle traits.
keywords: (Auto-generated) Pan-genome; 生活方式; 基因组适应潜力; 移动遗传元件; 核心基因组; 宿主关联; 自由生活; 生态适应; 生物多样性; 微生物学; 分子生物学
translated_title: 六株Paracoccus模式菌株的泛基因组分析揭示了其生活方式特性。
abstract: The genus Paracoccus capable of inhabiting a variety of different ecological niches both, marine and terrestrial, is globally distributed. In addition, Paracoccus is taxonomically, metabolically and regarding lifestyle highly diverse. Until now, little is known on how Paracoccus can adapt to such a range of different ecological niches and lifestyles. In the present study, the genus Paracoccus was phylogenomically analyzed (n = 160) and revisited, allowing species level classification of 16 so far unclassified Paracoccus sp. strains and detection of five misclassifications. Moreover, we performed pan-genome analysis of Paracoccus-type strains, isolated from a variety of ecological niches, including different soils, tidal flat sediment, host association such as the bluespotted cornetfish, Bugula plumosa, and the reef-building coral Stylophora pistillata to elucidate either i) the importance of lifestyle and adaptation potential, and ii) the role of the genomic equipment and niche adaptation potential. Six complete genomes were de novo hybrid assembled using a combination of short and long-read technologies. These Paracoccus genomes increase the number of completely closed high-quality genomes of type strains from 15 to 21. Pan-genome analysis revealed an open pan-genome composed of 13,819 genes with a minimal chromosomal core (8.84%) highlighting the genomic adaptation potential and the huge impact of extra-chromosomal elements. All genomes are shaped by the acquisition of various mobile genetic elements including genomic islands, prophages, transposases, and insertion sequences emphasizing their genomic plasticity. In terms of lifestyle, each mobile genetic elements should be evaluated separately with respect to the ecological context. Free-living genomes, in contrast to host-associated, tend to comprise (1) larger genomes, or the highest number of extra-chromosomal elements, (2) higher number of genomic islands and insertion sequence elements, and (3) a lower number of intact prophage regions. Regarding lifestyle adaptations, free-living genomes share genes linked to genetic exchange via T4SS, especially relevant for Paracoccus, known for their numerous extrachromosomal elements, enabling adaptation to dynamic environments. Conversely, host-associated genomes feature diverse genes involved in molecule transport, cell wall modification, attachment, stress protection, DNA repair, carbon, and nitrogen metabolism. Due to the vast number of adaptive genes, Paracoccus can quickly adapt to changing environmental conditions.
affiliations: Genomic and Applied Microbiology and Göttingen Genomics Laboratory, Institute of Microbiology and Genetics, Georg-August University of Göttingen, Göttingen, Germany.; Institute for Chemistry and Biology of the Marine Environment, University of Oldenburg, Oldenburg, Germany.

translated_keywords: 代谢组学；组学整合；蛋白质组学；作物改良；非生物胁迫；基因组学；多组学；表型组学
translated_abstract: 当今全球变暖和气候变化通过施加环境（非生物）胁迫和病害压力对植物产生不利影响。主要的非生物因素如干旱、高温、低温、盐碱等阻碍了植物的内在生长发育，导致产量和品质下降，并可能伴随不良性状的出现。在21世纪，高通量测序工具、先进的生物技术方法以及生物信息学分析流程的出现，使得利用“组学”工具箱轻松表征植物对非生物胁迫响应和耐受机制成为可能。如今，包括基因组学、转录组学、蛋白质组学、代谢组学、表观基因组学、蛋白基因组学、互作组学、离子组学、表型组学等在内的泛组学分析流程变得非常实用。这有助于通过理解植物基因、转录本、蛋白质、表观基因组、细胞代谢回路及其表型的分子机制，培育出适应气候的未来作物。与单一组学相比，两种或多种（即“多组学”）整合组学方法能够更好地解析植物对非生物胁迫的耐受反应。通过多组学特征化的植物可以作为强大的遗传资源引入未来的育种计划。为了实现作物改良的实际应用，针对特定非生物胁迫耐受性的多组学方法可以与基于基因组的育种（GAB）相结合，通过结合提高作物产量、食品质量和相关农艺性状，开启一种新的“组学辅助育种”时代。因此，多组学分析流程能够揭示作物在不同非生物胁迫耐受性下的分子过程、生物标志物、遗传工程靶点、调控网络以及精准农业解决方案，从而确保在环境变化条件下实现粮食安全。
authors: Roychowdhury Rajib; Das Soumya Prakash; Gupta Amber; Parihar Parul; Chandrasekhar Kottakota; Sarker Umakanta; Kumar Ajay; Ramrao Devade Pandurang; Sudhakar Chinta
title: Multi-Omics Pipeline and Omics-Integration Approach to Decipher Plant's Abiotic Stress Tolerance Responses.
keywords: metabolomics; omics integration; proteomics; crop improvement; abiotic stress; genomics; multi-omics; phenomics
translated_title: 多组学流程与组学整合方法解析植物非生物胁迫耐受响应
abstract: The present day's ongoing global warming and climate change adversely affect plants through imposing environmental (abiotic) stresses and disease pressure. The major abiotic factors such as drought, heat, cold, salinity, etc., hamper a plant's innate growth and development, resulting in reduced yield and quality, with the possibility of undesired traits. In the 21st century, the advent of high-throughput sequencing tools, state-of-the-art biotechnological techniques and bioinformatic analyzing pipelines led to the easy characterization of plant traits for abiotic stress response and tolerance mechanisms by applying the 'omics' toolbox. Panomics pipeline including genomics, transcriptomics, proteomics, metabolomics, epigenomics, proteogenomics, interactomics, ionomics, phenomics, etc., have become very handy nowadays. This is important to produce climate-smart future crops with a proper understanding of the molecular mechanisms of abiotic stress responses by the plant's genes, transcripts, proteins, epigenome, cellular metabolic circuits and resultant phenotype. Instead of mono-omics, two or more (hence 'multi-omics') integrated-omics approaches can decipher the plant's abiotic stress tolerance response very well. Multi-omics-characterized plants can be used as potent genetic resources to incorporate into the future breeding program. For the practical utility of crop improvement, multi-omics approaches for particular abiotic stress tolerance can be combined with genome-assisted breeding (GAB) by being pyramided with improved crop yield, food quality and associated agronomic traits and can open a new era of omics-assisted breeding. Thus, multi-omics pipelines together are able to decipher molecular processes, biomarkers, targets for genetic engineering, regulatory networks and precision agriculture solutions for a crop's variable abiotic stress tolerance to ensure food security under changing environmental circumstances.

Ranga Agricultural University (ANGRAU), Guntur 522034, Andhra Pradesh, India.; Department of Genetics and Plant Breeding, Faculty of Agriculture, Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Agricultural University, Gazipur 1706, Bangladesh.; Department of Botany, Maharshi Vishwamitra (M.V.) College, Buxar 802102, Bihar, India.; Department of Biotechnology, Mizoram University, Pachhunga University College Campus, Aizawl 796001, Mizoram, India.; Plant Molecular Biology Laboratory, Department of Botany, Sri Krishnadevaraya University, Anantapur 515003, Andhra Pradesh, India.

translated_keywords: 异疱疹病毒科；特征基因；水产养殖病毒基因组；淡水螯虾纤病毒；虹彩病毒科；鱼疱疹病毒；那玛病毒科；赖诺病毒属
translated_abstract: Iridoviridae（蛙病毒科）、Alloherpesviridae（鱼疱疹病毒科）和Nimaviridae（白斑综合病毒科）。这些病毒的基因组大小接近或超过100千碱基对，基因数量超过100个，被归类为大型DNA病毒。通过基因组分析和实验研究，已鉴定出一些与基因组复制、转录及病毒-宿主相互作用相关的基因。此外，还讨论了一些与病毒遗传变异或特异性相关的基因。这些进展的总结将为未来新发或再发水产养殖病毒的发现和研究提供参考。
authors: Ke Fei; Zhang Qi-Ya
title: Advances on genomes studies of large DNA viruses in aquaculture: A minireview.
keywords: Alloherpesviridae; Featured genes; Aquaculture virus genome; Freshwater crayfish whispovirus; Iridoviridae; Fish herpesvirus; Nimaviridae; Ranavirus
translated_title: 小型综述
abstract: Genomic studies of viral diseases in aquaculture have received more and more attention with the growth of the aquaculture industry, especially the emerging and re-emerging viruses whose genome could contain recombination, mutation, insertion, and so on, and may lead to more severe diseases and more widespread infections in aquaculture animals. The present review is focused on aquaculture viruses, which is belonged to two clades, Varidnaviria and Duplodnaviria, and one class Naldaviricetes, and respectively three families: Iridoviridae (ranaviruses), Alloherpesviridae (fish herpesviruses), and Nimaviridae (whispoviruses). The viruses possessed DNA genomes nearly or larger than 100 kbp with gene numbers more than 100 and were considered large DNA viruses. Genome analysis and experimental investigation have identified several genes involved in genome replication, transcription, and virus-host interactions. In addition, some genes involved in virus genetic variation or specificity were also discussed. A summary of these advances would provide reference to future discovery and research on emerging or re-emerging aquaculture viruses.
affiliations: Institute of Hydrobiology, The Innovative Academy of Seed Design, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Wuhan 430072, China.; Institute of Hydrobiology, The Innovative Academy of Seed Design, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Wuhan 430072, China. Electronic address: zhangqy@ihb.ac.cn.

translated_keywords: 命名规则；组装；基因模型；数据库；基因组
translated_abstract: 高质量基因组组装数量的快速增长为基因组学研究带来了显著的新机遇。然而，数据集中缺乏标准化的基因组组装和注释命名惯例，造成了重大挑战。不一致的命名阻碍了正确组装的识别，使生物信息学流程的整合变得复杂，并且难以在多个资源间关联组装。为了解决这些问题，我们开发了一种用于标准化参考基因组组装命名的规范，以提高数据集之间的一致性并促进互操作性。该规范的制定充分考虑了FAIR（可发现、可访问、可互操作、可重用）原则，确保参考组装在研究社区中更容易被定位、获取和重复使用。此外，它还设计为与主要的基因组数据存储库兼容，包括国际核酸序列数据库协作联盟（INSDC）的成员，从而确保与广泛使用的数据库的兼容性。虽然最初是为农业基因组学社区量身定制的，但该规范可以适应不同分类群的使用。广泛采用这种标准化命名法将简化组装管理，更好地支持跨物种分析，并提高研究的可重复性。它还将增强依赖于基因组文献中一致参考组装名称的自然语言处理应用，推动基因组数据的更大程度集成和自动化分析。现在正是考虑更一致的基因组数据命名法的好时机，因为许多研究社区和数据资源现在发现自己需要同时处理来自多个数据提供者的多组数据集。
authors: Cannon Ethalinda K S; Molik David C; Wright Adam J; Zhang Huiting; Honaas Loren; Chougule Kapeel; Dyer Sarah
title: Guidelines for gene and genome assembly nomenclature.
keywords: nomenclature; assembly; gene model; database; genome
translated_title: 基因和基因组组装命名规则指南
abstract: The rapid increase in the number of reference-quality genome assemblies presents significant new opportunities for genomic research. However, the absence of standardized naming conventions for genome assemblies and annotations across datasets creates substantial challenges. Inconsistent naming hinders the identification of correct assemblies, complicates the integration of bioinformatics pipelines, and makes it difficult to link assemblies across multiple resources. To address this, we developed a specification for standardizing the naming of reference genome assemblies, to improve consistency across datasets and facilitate interoperability. This specification was created with FAIR (Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, and Reusable) practices in mind, ensuring that reference assemblies are easier to locate, access, and reuse across research communities. Additionally, it has been designed to comply with primary genomic data repositories, including members of the International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration consortium, ensuring compatibility with widely used databases. While initially tailored to the agricultural genomics community, the specification is adaptable for use across different taxa. Widespread adoption of this standardized nomenclature would streamline assembly management, better enable cross-species analyses, and improve the reproducibility of research. It would also enhance natural language processing applications that depend on consistent reference assembly names in genomic literature, promoting greater integration and automated analysis of genomic data. This is a good time to consider more consistent genomic data nomenclature as many research communities and data resources are now finding themselves juggling multiple datasets from multiple data providers.

Western Ave., Wenatchee, WA 98801, USA.; USDA Agricultural Research Service-Physiology and Pathology of Tree Fruits Research Unit, Physiology and Pathology of Tree Fruits Research Unit, 1104 N. Western Ave., Wenatchee, WA 98801, USA.; Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory-Ware Laboratory, Cold Spring Harbor Laboratory, 1 Bungtown Rd, Cold Spring Harbor, NY 11724, USA.; EMBL-EBI-Non-Vertebrate Genomics Team, European Molecular Biology Laboratory, European Bioinformatics Institute, Wellcome Trust Genome Campus, Cambridge CB10 1SD, UK.

translated_keywords: 3D基因组结构；3D基因组浏览器；移动应用程序；虚拟现实（VR）；增强现实（AR）
translated_abstract: 在过去的二十年里，科学家们逐渐意识到三维（3D）基因组结构在调控细胞活动中的重要性。Hi-C及相关实验生成的二维接触矩阵可用于推断染色体结构的三维模型。然而，在三维空间中可视化和分析基因组仍然具有挑战性。本文介绍了一款增强现实三维基因组可视化工具——ARGV。该工具包含超过350个基于Hi-C和成像数据推断并注释的基因组结构。它能够利用标准的移动电话或平板电脑实现三维空间中基因组的交互式和协作式可视化。用户研究显示，与现有工具相比，ARGV具有显著优势。
authors: Drogaris Chrisostomos; Zhang Yanlin; Zhang Eric; Nazarova Elena; Sarrazin-Gendron Roman; Wilhelm-Landry Sélik; Cyr Yan; Majewski Jacek; Blanchette Mathieu; Waldispühl Jérôme
title: ARGV: 3D genome structure exploration using augmented reality.
keywords: 3D genome organization; 3D genome browser; Mobile app; Virtual reality VR; Augmented reality AR
translated_title: 利用增强现实探索3D基因组结构
abstract: Over the past two decades, scientists have increasingly realized the importance of the three-dimensional (3D) genome organization in regulating cellular activity. Hi-C and related experiments yield 2D contact matrices that can be used to infer 3D models of chromosome structure. Visualizing and analyzing genomes in 3D space remains challenging. Here, we present ARGV, an augmented reality 3D Genome Viewer. ARGV contains more than 350 pre-computed and annotated genome structures inferred from Hi-C and imaging data. It offers interactive and collaborative visualization of genomes in 3D space, using standard mobile phones or tablets. A user study comparing ARGV to existing tools demonstrates its benefits.
affiliations: School of Computer Science, McGill University, Montréal, QC, H3A 0E9, Canada.; Beam Me Up Inc., 5925 Monkland Ave, Suite, 100, Montréal, H4A 1G7, Canada.; Department of Human Genetics, McGill University, Montréal, QC, H3A 1B1, Canada.; School of Computer Science, McGill University, Montréal, QC, H3A 0E9, Canada. jerome.waldispuhl@mcgill.ca.

translated_keywords: 线粒体基因组；泛基因组； Cyclospora cayetanensis ；分子标记
translated_abstract: 核心同源基因分析和线粒体基因组分析。利用36个完整的*C. cayetanensis* 基因组构建了泛基因组，并使用33个线粒体基因组进行了单倍型网络和系统发育分析。通过对泛基因组的分析，确定了47个潜在的标记物，强调了获取更多序列数据以实现全面表征的重要性。此外，对线粒体基因组的分析揭示了19个单核苷酸变异，可作为该寄生虫亚型划分的特征标记。这些发现不仅有助于选择用于*C. cayetanensis* 亚型分型的分子标记，还推动了对该寄生虫进行全面基因分型方法发展的知识进步。
authors: González-Gómez Jean P; Lozano-Aguirre Luis F; Medrano-Félix José A; Chaidez Cristobal; Gerba Charles P; Betancourt Walter Q; Castro-Del Campo Nohelia
title: Evaluation of nuclear and mitochondrial phylogenetics for the subtyping of Cyclospora cayetanensis.
keywords: Mitochondrial genome; Pangenome; Cyclospora cayetanensis; Molecular markers
translated_title: 隐孢子虫亚型的核基因组和线粒体基因组系统发育评估
abstract: Cyclospora cayetanensis is an enteric coccidian parasite responsible for gastrointestinal disease transmitted through contaminated food and water. It has been documented in several countries, mostly with low-socioeconomic levels, although major outbreaks have hit developed countries. Detection methods based on oocyst morphology, staining, and molecular testing have been developed. However, the current MLST panel offers an opportunity for enhancement, as amplification of all molecular markers remains unfeasible in the majority of samples. This study aims to address this challenge by evaluating two approaches for analyzing the genetic diversity of C. cayetanensis and identifying reliable markers for subtyping: core homologous genes and mitochondrial genome analysis. A pangenome was constructed using 36 complete genomes of C. cayetanensis, and a haplotype network and phylogenetic analysis were conducted using 33 mitochondrial genomes. Through the analysis of the pangenome, 47 potential markers were identified, emphasizing the need for more sequence data to achieve comprehensive characterization. Additionally, the analysis of mitochondrial genomes revealed 19 single-nucleotide variations that can serve as characteristic markers for subtyping this parasite. These findings not only contribute to the selection of molecular markers for C. cayetanensis subtyping, but they also drive the knowledge toward the potential development of a comprehensive genotyping method for this parasite.
affiliations: Laboratorio Nacional para la Investigación en Inocuidad Alimentaria (LANIIA), Centro de Investigación en Alimentación y Desarrollo, A.C. translated_keywords: 品种特异性 panel；瘤牛；遗传改良
translated_abstract: 单核苷酸多态性（SNP）芯片和参考基因组组装的进步显著改变了牛的基因组学研究，特别是在普通牛（Bos taurus indicus，又称瘤牛）领域。许多商业化的SNP芯片最初是为普通牛（Bos taurus taurus）设计的，导致了选择偏倚，并排除了许多对瘤牛群体至关重要的SNP。本文综述了针对瘤牛群体开发的SNP芯片和参考基因组的研究进展及其对基因组选择和育种效率的影响。我们回顾了与瘤牛相关的SNP芯片、参考基因组组装以及SNP基因分型技术的相关文献，特别关注专为瘤牛品种设计的SNP芯片，评估其在基因组评估中的贡献，并识别预测准确性方面的局限性。近期的进展，例如GeneSeek公司开发的低密度和高密度SNP面板，通过提供品种特异性面板，旨在减少选择偏倚并包含关键的瘤牛SNP。这些面板在鉴定与经济重要性状相关的基因组区域方面发挥了重要作用，尤其是在纳拉伊牛（Nellore cattle）中。研究表明，定制的SNP芯片和品种特异性参考基因组能够提高遗传多样性评估的准确性并改善基因组预测，从而支持更有效的瘤牛育种计划。改进的SNP芯片和品种特异性参考基因组对于瘤牛的准确基因组选择至关重要。未来的工作应优先考虑扩展从头组装的基因组、减少选择偏倚，并开发针对瘤牛群体的成本效益高的基因分型解决方案。针对性的基因组工具最终将促进更高效的育种实践，并增强对经济重要性状的基因组选择。
authors: Ogunbawo Adebisi R; Mulim Henrique A; Campos Gabriel S; Schinckel Allan P; Oliveira Hinayah Rojas de
title: Tailoring Genomic Selection for Bos taurus indicus: A Comprehensive Review of SNP Arrays and Reference Genomes.
keywords: breed-specific panels; Zebu cattle; genetic improvement
translated_title: SNP芯片和参考基因组的综合评述
abstract: Advances in SNP arrays and reference genome assemblies have significantly transformed cattle genomics, particularly for Bos taurus indicus (Zebu cattle). Many commercial SNP arrays were originally designed for Bos taurus taurus, leading to ascertainment bias and the exclusion of crucial SNPs specific to Zebu populations. This review assesses progress in SNP array and reference genome development, with a focus on efforts tailored to Zebu populations and their impact on genomic selection and breeding efficiency. We reviewed the relevant literature on the development of SNP arrays, reference genome assemblies, and SNP genotyping techniques used for Zebu cattle. Emphasis was placed on SNP arrays specifically designed for Zebu breeds, evaluating their contributions to genomic evaluations and identifying limitations in prediction accuracy. Recent advancements, such as GeneSeek's low- and high-density SNP panels, have aimed to reduce ascertainment bias and include key SNPs for Zebu populations by providing breed-specific panels. These panels have been instrumental in identifying genomic regions associated with economically important traits in Nellore cattle. Studies show that tailored SNP arrays and breed-specific reference genomes can enhance genetic diversity assessment and improve genomic predictions, supporting more effective breeding programs for Zebu cattle. Improved SNP arrays and breed-specific reference genomes are crucial for accurate genomic selection in Zebu cattle. Future efforts should prioritize expanding de novo genome assemblies, reducing ascertainment bias, and developing cost-effective genotyping solutions tailored to Zebu populations. Targeted genomic tools will ultimately enable more efficient breeding practices and enhance genomic selection for economically important traits in B. t. indicus cattle.
affiliations: Department of Animal Sciences, Purdue University, West Lafayette, IN 47907, USA.; Department of Animal Biosciences, Interbull Centre, S-75007 Uppsala, Sweden.

translated_keywords: 人口遗传学；计算基因组学；遗传人类学
translated_abstract: 经济实惠的基因组测序技术的兴起以及新计算工具的发展开启了基因组学知识的新纪元。目前已有数以万计的人类基因组序列数据可供使用，其中包括数千个古人类基因组。海量的数据催生了新的分析工具，这些工具可用于揭示人群的种群历史和进化历程。因此，一系列计算方法得以发展，可以用来回答人类学问题。这些方法包括新颖的似然估计法与贝叶斯方法、机器学习技术以及种类繁多的人口模拟器。尽管这些计算工具能够从基因组数据集中提供有力的见解，但它们通常对计算经验较少的研究者来说并不易用。本文概述了计算基因组学方法背后的理论机制、在应用这些计算方法时的局限性和其他考量因素，并举例说明了计算方法如何已应用于人类学问题。我们希望本综述能激励其他人类学者在其研究中利用这些强大的工具。
authors: Witt Kelsey E; Villanea Fernando A
title: Computational Genomics and Its Applications to Anthropological Questions.
keywords: population genetics; computational genomics; genetic anthropology
translated_title: 计算基因组学及其在人类学问题中的应用
abstract: The advent of affordable genome sequencing and the development of new computational tools have established a new era of genomic knowledge. Sequenced human genomes number in the tens of thousands, including thousands of ancient human genomes. The abundance of data has been met with new analysis tools that can be used to understand populations' demographic and evolutionary histories. Thus, a variety of computational methods now exist that can be leveraged to answer anthropological questions. This includes novel likelihood and Bayesian methods, machine learning techniques, and a vast array of population simulators. These computational tools provide powerful insights gained from genomic datasets, although they are generally inaccessible to those with less computational experience. Here, we outline the theoretical workings behind computational genomics methods, limitations and other considerations when applying these computational methods, and examples of how computational methods have already been applied to anthropological questions. We hope this review will empower other anthropologists to utilize these powerful tools in their own research.
affiliations: Department of Genetics and Biochemistry and Center for Human Genetics, Clemson University, Clemson, South Carolina, USA.; Department of Anthropology, University of Colorado Boulder, Boulder, Colorado, USA.

translated_keywords: 基因组组装；转座元件；有鳞类；基因组测序；系统基因组学
translated_abstract: 有鳞目（Squamata）包括超过11,000种现存的蜥蜴、蛇和盲蛇，其超过2亿年的进化历史展现了令人眼花缭乱的表型多样性。本文介绍了有鳞目（Squamata目）并定义了这一类群，回顾了基于DNA测序、基因组组装和进化分析技术进步的基因组学研究在揭示有鳞目演化模式与过程中的历史与前景。我们调查了最近发布的有鳞目完整基因组组装情况，包括可用基因组的分类分布，并评估了这些基因组的质量指标及其对科学研究的实用性。随后，我们聚焦于有鳞目系统发育推断中的分歧，探讨高通量系统基因组学方法如何影响这些推断，并展示了全基因组数据在解决或维持有鳞目持久性系统发育争议中的潜力。我们还回顾了转座元件在脊椎动物演化中的作用、转座元件注释与分析的方法，并进一步证明，通过理解有鳞目基因组中转座元件的多样性、丰度和活性，有鳞目可以成为研究脊椎动物基因组大小与结构演化的理想模型。此外，我们讨论了有鳞目基因组在其他生物学领域中的贡献，如毒液系统、表型演化研究以及性别决定机制。由于有鳞目代表了现存爬行动物种类的30%以上，因此它们应享有与其他近期基因组计划（如哺乳动物和鸟类）类似的基因组联盟，以尽可能多地对这一类群的现存科进行测序。
authors: Gable Simone M; Mendez Jasmine M; Bushroe Nicholas A; Wilson Adam; Byars Michael I; Tollis Marc
title: The State of Squamate Genomics: Past, Present, and Future of Genome Research in the Most Speciose Terrestrial Vertebrate Order.
keywords: genome assembly; transposable elements; squamates; genome sequencing; phylogenomics
translated_title: 陆地脊椎动物中最多样化目基因组研究的过去、现在与未来。
abstract: Squamates include more than 11,000 extant species of lizards, snakes, and amphisbaenians, and display a dazzling diversity of phenotypes across their over 200-million-year evolutionary history on Earth. Here, we introduce and define squamates (Order Squamata) and review the history and promise of genomic investigations into the patterns and processes governing squamate evolution, given recent technological advances in DNA sequencing, genome assembly, and evolutionary analysis. We survey the most recently available whole genome assemblies for squamates, including the taxonomic distribution of available squamate genomes, and assess their quality metrics and usefulness for research. We then focus on disagreements in squamate phylogenetic inference, how methods of high-throughput phylogenomics affect these inferences, and demonstrate the promise of whole genomes to settle or sustain persistent phylogenetic arguments for squamates. We review the role transposable elements play in vertebrate evolution, methods of transposable element annotation and analysis, and further demonstrate that through the understanding of the diversity, abundance, and activity of transposable elements in squamate genomes, squamates can be an ideal model for the evolution of genome size and structure in vertebrates. We discuss how squamate genomes can contribute to other areas of biological research such as venom systems, studies of phenotypic evolution, and sex determination. Because they represent more than 30% of the living species of amniote, squamates deserve a genome consortium on par with recent efforts for other amniotes (i.e., mammals and birds) that aim to sequence most of the extant families in a clade.
affiliations: School of Informatics, Computing, and Cyber Systems, Northern Arizona University, Flagstaff, AZ 86011, USA.

translated_keywords: 马铃薯；多样性；共表达；注释
translated_abstract: 马铃薯是一种重要的粮食作物，其基因组复杂且为多倍体。随着测序技术的进步以及基因组组装算法的改进，现已能够生成栽培四倍体马铃薯的阶段性、染色体规模的基因组组装。SpudDB数据库存储了马铃薯的基因组序列及其注释信息，其中双单倍体DM 1-3 516 R44（以下简称DM）基因组作为参考基因组和单倍型。通过一系列基因报告页面提供了DM基因的各种注释数据类型，包括在438个马铃薯样本中的基因表达谱。为了进一步基于表达对马铃薯基因进行注释，构建了65个基因共表达模块，这些模块允许识别DM在发育过程中以及响应创伤、非生物胁迫和生物胁迫时紧密共调控的基因。提供了DM及其他28个马铃薯基因组的基因组浏览器视图，并提供了一个用于下载基因组序列和注释的页面。为了连接单倍型内部和之间的同源基因，通过25个栽培马铃薯基因组鉴定了同源基因（syntelogs）。通过访问马铃薯基因组序列及其相关注释，SpudDB能够帮助马铃薯生物学家、遗传学家和育种者继续改良这一重要粮食作物。
authors: Hamilton John P; Brose Julia; Buell C Robin
title: SpudDB: a database for accessing potato genomic data.
keywords: potato; diversity; co-expression; annotation
translated_title: 一种用于访问马铃薯基因组数据的数据库
abstract: Potato is a key food crop with a complex, polyploid genome. Advancements in sequencing technologies coupled with improvements in genome assembly algorithms have enabled generation of phased, chromosome-scale genome assemblies for cultivated tetraploid potato. The SpudDB database houses potato genome sequence and annotation, with the doubled monoploid DM 1-3 516 R44 (hereafter DM) genome serving as the reference genome and haplotype. Diverse annotation data types for DM genes are provided through a suite of Gene Report Pages including gene expression profiles across 438 potato samples. To further annotate potato genes based on expression, 65 gene co-expression modules were constructed that permit the identification of tightly co-regulated genes within DM across development and responses to wounding, abiotic stress, and biotic stress. Genome browser views of DM and 28 other potato genomes are provided along with a download page for genome sequence and annotation. To link syntenic genes within and between haplotypes, syntelogs were identified across 25 cultivated potato genomes. Through access to potato genome sequences and associated annotations, SpudDB can enable potato biologists, geneticists, and breeders to continue to improve this key food crop.
affiliations: Department of Crop & Soil Sciences, University of Georgia, Athens, GA 30602, USA.; Center for Applied Genetic Technologies, University of Georgia, Athens, GA 30602, USA.; Institute of Plant Breeding, Genetics & Genomics, University of Georgia, Athens, GA 30602, USA.; The Plant Center, University of Georgia, Athens, GA 30602, USA.

translated_keywords: 叶绿体基因组；系统发育；密码子使用；景天科；水景天；rpoC1内含子丢失
translated_abstract: *Crassula*和*Disporocarpa*。尽管系统发育树支持亚属分类系统，但节级分类系统需要重新评估。本研究对景天属的cp基因组进行了比较分析，推断了景天属cp基因组的演化趋势，并提供了分子证据支持将* Tillaea*属整合进景天属。然而，由于本研究并未涵盖* Tillaea*属的所有物种，因此需要进一步开展全面的系统发育分析。
authors: Park Kyu Tae; Son OGyeong
title: Complete Chloroplast Genome of Crassula aquatica: Comparative Genomic Analysis and Phylogenetic Relationships.
keywords: chloroplast genome; phylogeny; codon usage; Crassulaceae; Crassula aquatica; rpoC1 intron loss
translated_title: 比较基因组分析与系统发育关系
abstract: Crassula aquatica (L.) Schonl. is a very small annual plant growing along riverbanks. Chloroplast (cp) genomes, crucial for photosynthesis, are highly conserved and play a key role in understanding plant evolution. In this study, we conducted cp genome analysis of C. aquatica, aiming to elucidate its phylogenetic position and structural variations. We analyzed and described the features of the complete cp genome of C. aquatica and conducted comparative analysis with the cp genomes of closely related taxa. The cp genome was 144,503 bp in length and exhibited the typical quadripartite structure, consisting of a large single-copy region (LSC; 77,993 bp), a small single-copy region (SSC; 16,784 bp), and two inverted repeats (24,863 bp). The cp genome of C. aquatica comprised 113 unique genes, including 79 protein-coding genes (PCGs), 30 tRNAs, and 4 rRNA genes. Comparative genomic analysis of 13 other Crassula species and six outgroups demonstrated highly conserved gene content and order among Crassula species. However, notable differences were observed, including the complete loss of the rpoC1 intron in C. aquatica and several closely related species, which may serve as a synapomorphic trait supporting the monophyly of the subgenus Disporocarpa. We analyzed the nucleotide diversity among 14 Crassula cp genomes and identified five highly variable regions (pi > 0.08) in the IGS regions. Phylogenetic analysis based on 78 PCGs confirmed the monophyly of Crassula and its division into two subgenera: Crassula and Disporocarpa. Although the phylogenetic tree supported the subgeneric classification system, the sectional classification system requires reassessment. In this study, we conducted a comparative analysis of the cp genome of the genus Crassula. We inferred evolutionary trends within the Crassula cp genome and provided molecular evidence supporting the integration of the genus Tillaea into the genus Crassula. However, as this study does not represent all species within the genus Tillaea, further comprehensive phylogenetic analyses are requrired.
affiliations: Department of Life Sciences, Yeungnam University, Gyeongsan 38541, Republic of Korea.; Planning & Budget Office, Management Planning Division, Daegu National Science Museum, Yugaeup, Daegu 43023, Republic of Korea.

translated_keywords: 植物基因组；靶向基因组测序（TGS）；植物转录组；单分子实时测序（SMRT）；纳米孔测序（ONT）
translated_abstract: 近年来，第三代测序（TGS）技术彻底改变了基因组学和转录组学研究，为重大发现提供了新的机遇。与第二代测序（NGS）相比，长读长测序平台凭借其明确的操作流程、缩短的操作时间和实时测序等独特优势，在植物基因组学领域展现出巨大潜力。TGS通过省去耗时的拼接工具，优化并提升了数据分析效率。本文综述了基于牛津纳米孔技术和太平洋生物科学公司等快速发展的TGS平台所驱动的生物信息学工具开发及其在数据处理与注释中的应用。利用TGS进行转录组分析已被广泛应用于解析复杂植物转录组和基因组，特别是那些具有高重复序列和基因组重复频率的物种。因此，本文重点介绍了当前采用定制化混合测序技术（结合NGS和TGS）生成复杂植物基因组转录组和全基因组序列的方法。本文展望了TGS在未来植物研究中的应用前景，阐明了其优势、应用范围、局限性以及未来发展的广阔前景。
authors: Medhi Upasana; Chaliha Chayanika; Singh Archana; Nath Bikash K; Kalita Eeshan
title: Third generation sequencing transforming plant genome research: Current trends and challenges.
keywords: Plant Genome; TGS; Plant Transcriptome; SMRT; ONT
translated_title: 现状与挑战
abstract: In recent years, third-generation sequencing (TGS) technologies have transformed genomics and transcriptomics research, providing novel opportunities for significant discoveries. The long-read sequencing platforms, with their unique advantages over next-generation sequencing (NGS), including a definitive protocol, reduced operational time, and real-time sequencing, possess the potential to transform plant genomics. TGS optimizes and enhances the efficiency of data analysis by removing the necessity for time-consuming assembly tools. The current review examines the development and application of bioinformatics tools for data analysis and annotation, driven by the rapid advancement of TGS platforms like Oxford Nanopore Technologies and Pacific Biosciences. Transcriptome analysis utilizing TGS has been extensively employed to elucidate complex plant transcriptomes and genomes, particularly those characterized by high frequencies of duplicated genomes and repetitive sequences. As a result, current methodologies that allow for generating transcriptomes and comprehensive whole-genome sequences of complex plant genomes employing tailored hybrid sequencing techniques that integrate NGS and TGS technologies have been emphasized herein. This paper, thus, articulates a vision for a future in which TGS effectively addresses the challenges faced in plant research, offering a comprehensive understanding of its advantages, applications, limitations, and promising prospects.
affiliations: Department of Molecular Biology and Biotechnology, Cotton University, Panbazar, Guwahati, Assam, 781001, India.; School of Natural Resource Management, College of Post Graduate Studies in Agricultural Sciences-CAU Imphal, Umiam, Meghalaya, 793104, India.; Department of Plant Molecular Biology, University of Delhi South Campus, Benito Juarez Road, Dhaula Kuan, New Delhi, 110021, India.; Department of Molecular Biology and Biotechnology, Tezpur University, Assam, 784028, India.; Department of Molecular Biology and Biotechnology, Cotton University, Panbazar, Guwahati, Assam, 781001, India. Electronic address: eeshan.kalita@cottonuniversity.ac.in.

translated_keywords: 植物进化；生物复杂性；信号网络；链型藻类；植物登陆化进程
translated_abstract: 陆生植物是信息处理的惊人者；由于其固着的生活方式，它们根据栖息环境调整定义其发育和生理机能的分子程序。外部输入转化为相应的内部程序在很大程度上依赖于分子信号级联，其中许多信号级联在陆生植物及其最近亲属链型藻类的祖先中具有深远的进化起源。本文综述了链型藻类信号级联定义因素的进化历史，这些级联不仅存在于现存的陆生植物和链型藻类中，而且很可能在其数亿年前已灭绝的藻类祖先中也起作用。我们希望本文能为未来研究对植物信号通路的多样性和复杂性做出贡献的进化机制提供一个起点，并特别强调识别潜在偏差的重要性。
authors: Zegers Jaccoline M S; Irisarri Iker; de Vries Sophie; de Vries Jan
title: Evolving circuitries in plant signaling cascades.
keywords: Plant evolution; Biological complexity; Signaling networks; Streptophyte algae; Plant terrestrialization
translated_title: 植物信号级联中的 evolving 电路图
abstract: Land plants are astounding processors of information; due to their sessile nature, they adjust the molecular programs that define their development and physiology in accordance with the environment in which they dwell. Transduction of the external input to the respective internal programs hinges to a large degree on molecular signaling cascades, many of which have deep evolutionary origins in the ancestors of land plants and its closest relatives, streptophyte algae. In this Review, we discuss the evolutionary history of the defining factors of streptophyte signaling cascades, circuitries that not only operate in extant land plants and streptophyte algae, but that also likely operated in their extinct algal ancestors hundreds of millions of years ago. We hope this Review offers a starting point for future studies on the evolutionary mechanisms contributing to the current diversity and complexity of plant signaling pathways, with an emphasis on recognizing potential biases.
affiliations: University of Goettingen, Institute for Microbiology and Genetics, Department of Applied Bioinformatics, Goldschmidtstr. 1, 37077 Goettingen, Germany.; Section Phylogenomics, Centre for Molecular biodiversity Research, Leibniz Institute for the Analysis of Biodiversity Change (LIB), Museum of Nature Hamburg, Martin-Luther-King-Platz 3, 20146 Hamburg, Germany.; University of Goettingen, Campus Institute Data Science (CIDAS), Goldschmidstr. 1, 37077 Goettingen, Germany.; University of Goettingen, Goettingen Center for Molecular Biosciences (GZMB), Department of Applied Bioinformatics, Goldschmidtstr. 1, 37077 Goettingen, Germany.

translated_keywords: MLST（多 locus sequence typing）；肺炎链球菌基因组学；肺炎链球菌；群体结构；全基因组测序；流行病学
translated_abstract: 基于基因的七位点多位点序列分型（MLST）、基于核心基因组MLST（cgMLST）的分层聚类（HierCC）分配、生命识别号（LIN）条形码和基于k-mer的PopPUNK聚类（在该物种中称为GPSC）。我们将聚类结果与系统发育和泛基因组分析进行比较，以评估它们与基因组多样性和进化的关系，因为我们期望一个好的聚类方法能够形成一个单系的聚类群，具有高内部相似性的基因组内容。结果显示，这四种方法通常能够根据这些指标准确反映种群结构，并且这些方法彼此之间大体上是一致的。我们进一步研究了聚类之间的差异。LIN条形码和HierCC之间的最大一致性被观察到（调整后的互信息得分=0.950），这是可以预期的，因为这两种方法都利用了cgMLST，但定义个体聚类的方法和核心基因组方案不同。然而，这两种方法之间存在的差异表明，核心基因组方案的选择可以在研究之间引入不一致性。GPSC和HierCC分配也高度一致（AMI=0.946），表明使用全基因组的基于k-mer的方法不需要仔细选择核心基因组方案，同样能有效表示种群结构。此外，在这些方法之间存在聚类差异的地方，可以通过未在cgMLST中识别的辅助基因组差异来解释。我们得出结论，对于肺炎链球菌来说，随着可用基因组数量的增加，标准化和稳定的命名法非常重要。此外，研究界应逐渐放弃七位点MLST，而更广泛地使用cgMLST、GPSC和LIN分配。然而，为了便于研究之间的比较，并使先前的文献相关，应在研究中标准化报告多个聚类名称。
authors: King Alannah C; Kumar Narender; Mellor Kate C; Hawkins Paulina A; McGee Lesley; Croucher Nicholas J; Bentley Stephen D; Lees John A; Lo Stephanie W
title: Comparison of gene-by-gene and genome-wide short nucleotide sequence-based approaches to define the global population structure of Streptococcus pneumoniae.
keywords: MLST; pneumococcal genomics; Streptococcus pneumoniae; population structure; whole genome sequencing; epidemiology
translated_title: 基于短核苷酸序列的基因-by-基因与全基因组方法界定肺炎链球菌全球种群结构的比较研究
abstract: Defining the population structure of a pathogen is a key part of epidemiology, as genomically related isolates are likely to share key clinical features such as antimicrobial resistance profiles and invasiveness. Multiple different methods are currently used to cluster together closely related genomes, potentially leading to inconsistency between studies. Here, we use a global dataset of 26 306 Streptococcus pneumoniae genomes to compare four clustering methods: gene-by-gene seven-locus MLST, core genome MLST (cgMLST)-based hierarchical clustering (HierCC) assignments, life identification number (LIN) barcoding and k-mer-based PopPUNK clustering (known as GPSCs in this species). We compare the clustering results with phylogenetic and pan-genome analyses to assess their relationship with genome diversity and evolution, as we would expect a good clustering method to form a single monophyletic cluster that has high within-cluster similarity of genomic content. We show that the four methods are generally able to accurately reflect the population structure based on these metrics and that the methods were broadly consistent with each other. We investigated further to study the discrepancies in clusters. The greatest concordance was seen between LIN barcoding and HierCC (adjusted mutual information score=0.950), which was expected given that both methods utilize cgMLST, but have different methods for defining an individual cluster and different core genome schema. However, the existence of differences between the two methods shows that the selection of a core genome schema can introduce inconsistencies between studies. GPSC and HierCC assignments were also highly concordant (AMI=0.946), showing that k-mer-based methods which use the whole genome and do not require the careful selection of a core genome schema are just as effective at representing the population structure. Additionally, where there were differences in clustering between these methods, this could be explained by differences in the accessory genome that were not identified in cgMLST. We conclude that for S. pneumoniae, standardized and stable nomenclature is important as the number of genomes available expands. Furthermore, the research community should transition away from seven-locus MLST, whilst cgMLST, GPSC and LIN assignments should be used more widely. However, to allow for easy comparison between studies and to make previous literature relevant, the reporting of multiple clustering names should be standardized within the research.
affiliations: Parasites and Microbes, The Wellcome Sanger Institute, Wellcome Genome Campus, Hinxton, Cambridge, UK.; Rollins School Public Health, Emory University, Atlanta, GA, USA.; Emory Global Health Institute, Emory University, Atlanta, GA, USA.; MRC Centre for Global Infectious Disease Analysis, Department of Infectious Disease Epidemiology, Imperial College London, London, UK.; EMBL-EBI, Wellcome Genome Campus, Hinxton, Cambridge, UK.; Milner Centre for Evolution, Department of Life Sciences, University of Bath, Bath, UK.

translated_keywords: 生物信息注释；知识库；本体论；模式生物；棘皮动物；数据库；基因组学
translated_abstract: 1 直系同源关系。JBrowse 轨道可用于展示来自完全支持物种和部分支持物种（Anneissia japonica，羽星；Asterias rubens，糖星；L. pictus，彩绘海胆）的功能基因组学数据的可视化。Echinobase 通过提供注释的基因组、直系同源关系、与基因组对齐的功能基因组数据以及经过整理的试剂和数据，发挥了关键作用。棘皮动物解剖学本体论为整个门类的发育数据标准化提供了框架，知识库内容也按照可发现、可访问、可互操作和可重用的原则进行格式化，以满足科研社区的需求。
authors: Telmer Cheryl A; Karimi Kamran; Chess Macie M; Agalakov Sergei; Arshinoff Bradley I; Lotay Vaneet; Wang Dong Zhuo; Chu Stanley; Pells Troy J; Vize Peter D; Hinman Veronica F; Ettensohn Charles A
title: Echinobase: a resource to support the echinoderm research community.
keywords: biocuration; knowledgebase; ontology; model organism; echinoderm; database; genomics
translated_title: 支持棘皮动物研究社区的资源
abstract: Echinobase (www.echinobase.org) is a model organism knowledgebase serving as a resource for the community that studies echinoderms, a phylum of marine invertebrates that includes sea urchins and sea stars. Echinoderms have been important experimental models for over 100 years and continue to make important contributions to environmental, evolutionary, and developmental studies, including research on developmental gene regulatory networks. As a centralized resource, Echinobase hosts genomes and collects functional genomic data, reagents, literature, and other information for the community. This third-generation site is based on the Xenbase knowledgebase design and utilizes gene-centric pages to minimize the time and effort required to access genomic information. Summary gene pages display gene symbols and names, functional data, links to the JBrowse genome browser, and orthology to other organisms and reagents, and tabs from the Summary gene page contain more detailed information concerning mRNAs, proteins, diseases, and protein-protein interactions. The gene pages also display 1:1 orthologs between the fully supported species Strongylocentrotus purpuratus (purple sea urchin), Lytechinus variegatus (green sea urchin), Patiria miniata (bat star), and Acanthaster planci (crown-of-thorns sea star). JBrowse tracks are available for visualization of functional genomic data from both fully supported species and the partially supported species Anneissia japonica (feather star), Asterias rubens (sugar star), and L. pictus (painted sea urchin). Echinobase serves a vital role by providing researchers with annotated genomes including orthology, functional genomic data aligned to the genomes, and curated reagents and data. The Echinoderm Anatomical Ontology provides a framework for standardizing developmental data across the phylum, and knowledgebase content is formatted to be findable, accessible, interoperable, and reusable by the research community.
affiliations: Department of Biological Sciences, Carnegie Mellon University, Pittsburgh, PA 15213, USA.; Department of Biological Sciences, University of Calgary, Calgary, AB, Canada T2N 1N4.

translated_keywords: 浏览器；POInT；比较基因组学
translated_abstract: //wgd.statgen.ncsu.edu 。
authors: Siddiqui Mustafa; Conant Gavin C
title: POInTbrowse: orthology prediction and synteny exploration for paleopolyploid genomes.
keywords: Browser; POInT; Comparative genomics
translated_title: 古多倍体基因组的直系同源预测与共线性探索
abstract: We describe POInTbrowse, a web portal that gives access to the orthology inferences made for polyploid genomes with POInT, the Polyploidy Orthology Inference Tool. Ancient, or paleo-, polyploidy events are widely distributed across the eukaryotic phylogeny, and the combination of duplicated and lost duplicated genes that these polyploidies produce can confound the identification of orthologous genes between genomes. POInT uses conserved synteny and phylogenetic models to infer orthologous genes between genomes with a shared polyploidy. It also gives confidence estimates for those orthology inferences. POInTbrowse gives both graphical and query-based access to these inferences from 12 different polyploidy events, allowing users to visualize genomic regions produced by polyploidies and perform batch queries for each polyploidy event, downloading genes trees and coding sequences for orthologous genes meeting user-specified criteria. POInTbrowse and the associated data are online at https://wgd.statgen.ncsu.edu .
affiliations: Department of Biological Sciences, North Carolina State University, Raleigh, NC, USA.; Department of Biological Sciences, North Carolina State University, Raleigh, NC, USA. gconant@ncsu.edu.; Bioinformatics Research Center, North Carolina State University, Raleigh, NC, USA. gconant@ncsu.edu.; Program in Genetics, North Carolina State University, Raleigh, NC, USA. gconant@ncsu.edu.

translated_keywords: 基因流动;基因渗入;非洲人群;自然选择;尼安德特人;人类进化;双向交流;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 在进化过程中，现代人与尼安德特人种群多次相遇并混合，导致了遗传物质的交换。对多样化的非洲人群的新基因组分析揭示了双向基因流动的历史以及作用于回流等位基因的选择。
authors: Ragsdale Aaron P
title: Human evolution: Neanderthal footprints in African genomes.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因流动;基因渗入;非洲人群;自然选择;尼安德特人;人类进化;双向交流;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 尼安德特人在非洲基因组中的足迹。
abstract: Human and Neanderthal populations met and mixed on multiple occasions over evolutionary time, resulting in the exchange of genetic material. New genomic analyses of diverse African populations reveal a history of bidirectional gene flow and selection acting on introgressed alleles.
affiliations: Department of Integrative Biology, University of Wisconsin-Madison, Madison, WI 53706, USA. Electronic address: apragsdale@wisc.edu.

translated_keywords: DNA测序；基因组学；课堂科学；普氏野马
translated_abstract: 通过我们最近发表的普氏野马（*Equus ferus przewalskii*）基因组研究，学生进行基因组测序如今已成为现实。在这篇综述中，我描述了在课堂上教授基因组组装的经验。在我的课程中，学生们使用牛津纳米孔长读长测序技术，仅花费4000美元的材料费用，就完成了高质量的普氏野马基因组测序、组装和发表工作。除了主基因组外，我们还组装了线粒体基因组、序列变异、预测了基因注释，并分析了DNA甲基化水平。我们的基因组统计数据远远超过了之前的普氏野马基因组组装版本，并且与家马基因组（EquCab3.0）相当。方法被精简、简化，并以Markdown格式记录和传达，以便在课堂上完整记录和应用。所有学生均为最终论文的作者。通过将基因组组装引入课堂，我们同时为科学界提供了新的参考基因组和新的基因组学专业知识。
authors: Faulk Christopher
title: Sequencing and assembling the genome of Przewalski's horse in the classroom.
keywords: DNA sequencing; Genomics; Classroom science; Przewalski's horse
translated_title: 马氏野马基因组测序与组装的课堂实践
abstract: Sequencing a genome by students has now become practical as we demonstrated with our recent publication of the Przewalski's horse (Equus ferus przewalskii) genome. In this review, I describe my experience teaching genome assembly in the classroom. In my course, students sequenced, assembled, and published a high-quality genome for Przewalski's horse using Oxford Nanopore long-read sequencing with only $4000 of materials. Along with the genome, we assembled the mitochondrial genome, sequence variants, predicted gene annotations, and DNA methylation levels. Our genome statistics far exceeded the previous Przewalski's horse assembly and is on par the domestic horse genome, EquCab3.0. Methods were streamlined, simplified, and conveyed in markdown for complete recording and use in the classroom. All students were authors on the resulting manuscript. By bringing genome assembly into the classroom, we provide both new reference genomes and new genomics expertise to the scientific community at the same time.
affiliations: Department of Animal Science, College of Food, Agricultural, and Natural Resource Sciences, University of Minnesota. Electronic address: cfaulk@umn.edu.

translated_keywords: 基因组分析；突变；网络服务器；可视化；计算图解
translated_abstract: 共突变图（comutation plot）是一种广泛使用的可视化方法，用于展示大规模基因组研究中的突变全景。目前创建共突变图的工具要么是需要编码的离线包，要么是功能各异的在线网络服务器。使用这些包时，往往需要反复运行代码来调整单一特征，而这一操作在网页应用程序中可能只需点击几下即可完成。然而，网页应用通常自定义能力有限，并且无法处理非常大的基因组文件。为了改进现有工具，我们识别了在绘制图表时最常调整的功能，并将其整合到Comut-viz中，这是一个交互式筛选和可视化突变数据并可下载图表的应用程序。它包括用于数值元数据的颜色标签、预加载的调色板以更改颜色以及两个用于调整宽度和高度的输入框。它可以接受标准突变注释格式（MAF）文件作为输入，并能够处理超过20万行的大规模MAF文件。作为一个仅前端的应用程序，Comut-viz保证了用户数据的隐私并且在分析过程中没有延迟。Comut-viz是一款响应迅速且可扩展的网络应用程序，用于制作共突变图。它针对经常调整的功能提供了定制化选项，并能接受大型基因组文件作为输入。它适用于拥有上千个样本的基因组研究。
authors: Duan Qiaonan; Wang Weiyi; Feng Feiling; Jiang Xiaoqing; Chen Hao; Zhang Dadong; Zhang Tongyi
title: Comut-viz: efficiently creating and browsing comutation plots online.
keywords: Genomic analysis; Mutation; Web server; Visualization; Comutation plot
translated_title: 高效在线创建和浏览共变图
abstract: Comutation plot is a widely used visualization method to deliver a global view of the mutation landscape of large-scale genomic studies. Current tools for creating comutation plot are either offline packages that require coding or online web servers with varied features. When a package is used, it often requires repetitive runs of code to adjust a single feature that might only be a few clicks in a web app. But web apps mostly have limited capacity for customization and cannot handle very large genomic files. To improve on existing tools, we identified features that are most frequently adjusted in creating a plot and incorporate them in Comut-viz that interactively filters and visualizes mutation data as downloadable plots. It includes colored labels for numeric metadata, a preloaded palette for changing colors and two input boxes for adjusting width and height. It accepts standard mutation annotation format (MAF) files as input and can handle large MAF files with more than 200 k rows. As a front-end only app, Comut-viz guarantees privacy of user data and no latency in the analysis. Comut-viz is a highly responsive and extensible web app to make comutation plots. It provides customization for frequently adjusted features and accepts large genomic files as input. It is suitable for genomic studies with more than a thousand samples.
