translated_keywords: 反向疫苗学；百日咳鲍特菌；百日咳；疫苗
journal: Biologicals : journal of the International Association of Biological Standardization
translated_abstract: 百日咳是一种由鲍特菌（Bordetella pertussis）引起的疾病，其发病率有所上升，促使当前疫苗的改进成为必要。反向疫苗学是一种能够快速且以较少资源识别具有良好特性蛋白的策略。本研究利用反向疫苗学方法，结合多种生物信息学工具对鲍特菌的蛋白质组和泛基因组进行了分析。我们使用NERVE软件分析了鲍特菌Tohama I株的蛋白质组，并将其与234种鲍特菌副百日咳株（B. parapertussis）、支气管炎鲍特菌（B. bronchiseptica）和霍姆斯鲍特菌（B. holmesii）的蛋白进行比较。通过VaxiJen计算抗原性值，设定阈值为0.6，筛选出84种候选蛋白。根据文献信息及ABCpred、Bcepred、IgPred和C-ImmSim预测的免疫反应，这些候选蛋白被进一步筛选并归类为八个家族蛋白，以选择代表性候选蛋白。此外，我们还使用PanRV软件对603株鲍特菌进行了泛基因组研究，鉴定出3421个核心蛋白，并从中筛选出最佳候选蛋白。最终，从蛋白质组研究中选出15种蛋白，从泛基因组分析中选出7种蛋白作为优良的疫苗候选蛋白。
authors: Monterrubio-López Gloria Paulina; Llamas-Monroy José Luis; Martínez-Gómez Ángel Antonio; Delgadillo-Gutiérrez Karen
title: Novel vaccine candidates of Bordetella pertussis identified by reverse vaccinology.
keywords: Reverse vaccinology; Bordetella; Whooping cough; Vaccine
translated_title: 应用反向疫苗学识别的百日咳鲍特菌新型疫苗候选物
abstract: Whooping cough is a disease caused by Bordetella pertussis, whose morbidity has increased, motivating the improvement of current vaccines. Reverse vaccinology is a strategy that helps identify proteins with good characteristics fast and with fewer resources. In this work, we applied reverse vaccinology to study the B. pertussis proteome and pangenome with several in-silico tools. We analyzed the B. pertussis Tohama I proteome with NERVE software and compared 234 proteins with B. parapertussis, B. bronchiseptica, and B. holmessi. VaxiJen was used to calculate an antigenicity value; our threshold was 0.6, selecting 84 proteins. The candidates were depurated and grouped in eight family proteins to select representative candidates, according to bibliographic information and their immunological response predicted with ABCpred, Bcepred, IgPred, and C-ImmSim. Additionally, a pangenome study was conducted with 603 B. pertussis strains and PanRV software, identifying 3421 core proteins that were analyzed to select the best candidates. Finally, we selected 15 proteins from the proteome study and seven proteins from the pangenome analysis as good vaccine candidates.
affiliations: Departamento de Microbiología, Escuela Nacional de Ciencias Biológicas, Instituto Politécnico Nacional (IPN), Mexico City, Mexico.; Departamento de Microbiología, Escuela Nacional de Ciencias Biológicas, Instituto Politécnico Nacional (IPN), Mexico City, Mexico. Electronic address: kdelgadillog@ipn.mx.

translated_keywords: 路径覆盖；序列比对；基因组测序；变异图
translated_abstract: //github.com/at-cg/PanAligner)。
authors: Rajput Jyotshna; Chandra Ghanshyam; Jain Chirag
title: Co-linear chaining on pangenome graphs.
keywords: Path cover; Sequence alignment; Genome sequencing; Variation graph
translated_title: 泛基因组图上的共线链式分析
abstract: Pangenome reference graphs are useful in genomics because they compactly represent the genetic diversity within a species, a capability that linear references lack. However, efficiently aligning sequences to these graphs with complex topology and cycles can be challenging. The seed-chain-extend based alignment algorithms use co-linear chaining as a standard technique to identify a good cluster of exact seed matches that can be combined to form an alignment. Recent works show how the co-linear chaining problem can be efficiently solved for acyclic pangenome graphs by exploiting their small width and how incorporating gap cost in the scoring function improves alignment accuracy. However, it remains open on how to effectively generalize these techniques for general pangenome graphs which contain cycles. Here we present the first practical formulation and an exact algorithm for co-linear chaining on cyclic pangenome graphs. We rigorously prove the correctness and computational complexity of the proposed algorithm. We evaluate the empirical performance of our algorithm by aligning simulated long reads from the human genome to a cyclic pangenome graph constructed from 95 publicly available haplotype-resolved human genome assemblies. While the existing heuristic-based algorithms are faster, the proposed algorithm provides a significant advantage in terms of accuracy. Implementation ( https://github.com/at-cg/PanAligner ).
affiliations: Department of Computational and Data Sciences, Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore, 560012, Karnataka, India.; Department of Computational and Data Sciences, Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore, 560012, Karnataka, India. chirag@iisc.ac.in.

translated_keywords: 猪图泛基因组;结构变异;适应性;经济性状;肉质;BTF3基因;肌肉内脂肪;生物信息学;基因组学
translated_abstract: 包含27个基因组的猪图谱泛基因组的构建代表了迄今为止最全面的猪基因组数据集。对这一泛基因组的分析揭示了结构变异在驱动适应和定义品种特异性特征中的关键作用。值得注意的是，研究确定BTF3是调控猪肌内脂肪沉积和肉质的重要候选基因。这些发现强调了泛基因组方法在揭示与重要农业性状相关的新型基因组特征方面的强大能力。总体而言，这些结果展示了利用大规模多基因组分析推进我们对家畜基因组的理解并加速遗传改良的价值。
authors: Li Dong; Wang Yulong; Yuan Tiantian; Cao Minghao; He Yulin; Zhang Lin; Li Xiang; Jiang Yifan; Li Ke; Sun Jingchun; Lv Guangquan; Su Guosheng; Wang Qishan; Pan Yuchun; Li Xinjian; Jiang Yu; Yang Gongshe; Groenen Martien A M; Derks Martijn F L; Ding Rongrong; Ding Xiangdong; Yu Taiyong
title: Pangenome and genome variation analyses of pigs unveil genomic facets for their adaptation and agronomic characteristics.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 猪图泛基因组;结构变异;适应性;经济性状;肉质;BTF3基因;肌肉内脂肪;生物信息学;基因组学
translated_title: 猪的泛基因组和基因组变异分析揭示了其适应性和农艺特性相关的基因组特征。
abstract: The development of a comprehensive pig graph pangenome assembly encompassing 27 genomes represents the most extensive collection of pig genomic data to date. Analysis of this pangenome reveals the critical role of structural variations in driving adaptation and defining breed-specific traits. Notably, the study identifies BTF3 as a key candidate gene governing intramuscular fat deposition and meat quality in pigs. These findings underscore the power of pangenome approaches in uncovering novel genomic features underlying economically important agricultural traits. Collectively, these results demonstrate the value of leveraging large-scale, multi-genome analyses for advancing our understanding of livestock genomes and accelerating genetic improvement.
affiliations: Key Laboratory of Animal Genetics, Breeding and Reproduction of Shaanxi Province, Laboratory of Animal Fat Deposition & Muscle Development, College of Animal Science and Technology Northwest A&F University Yangling Shaanxi China.; State Key Laboratory of Animal Biotech Breeding National Engineering Laboratory for Animal Breeding, College of Animal Science and Technology China Agricultural University Beijing China.; Key Laboratory of Vertebrate Evolution and Human Origins Chinese Academy of Sciences Beijing China.; Institute of Subtropical Agriculture Chinese Academy of Sciences Changsha Hunan China.; Centre for Quantitative Genetics and Genomics Aarhus University Aarhus Denmark.; Department of Animal Science, College of Animal Science Zhejiang University Hangzhou China.; Sanya Institute Hainan Academy of Agricultural Science Sanya Hainan China.; Animal Breeding and Genomics Wageningen University and Research Wageningen The Netherlands.

translated_keywords: 痴呆；泛基因组学；痴呆的行为与心理症状（BPSD）；神经退行性疾病，神经变性；阿尔茨海默病
translated_abstract: 泛基因组由一组个体的所有遗传变异组成，将其应用于神经退行性疾病的研究可能有助于深入了解这些复杂疾病的遗传异质性的潜在方面，包括基因表达、表观遗传学以及翻译机制。此外，参考泛基因组能够识别个体之间之前未被发现的结构共同点和差异，这可能有助于疾病的诊断、支持对疾病进展的预测（预后），并从个性化医疗的角度帮助开发新的治疗方法。因此，在本综述中，我们将讨论和分析泛基因组概念在神经退行性疾病研究中的应用及其改善这些疾病诊断和预后的潜力，从而基于整个群体的基因组构成知识，为个体患者制定针对性治疗方案。
authors: Abondio Paolo; Bruno Francesco; Passarino Giuseppe; Montesanto Alberto; Luiselli Donata
title: Pangenomics: A new era in the field of neurodegenerative diseases.
keywords: Dementia; Pangenomics; Behavioral and psychological symptoms of dementia (BPSD); Neurodegenerative diseases, neurodegeneration; Alzheimer’s disease
translated_title: 神经退行性疾病研究的新纪元
abstract: A pangenome is composed of all the genetic variability of a group of individuals, and its application to the study of neurodegenerative diseases may provide valuable insights into the underlying aspects of genetic heterogenetiy for these complex ailments, including gene expression, epigenetics, and translation mechanisms. Furthermore, a reference pangenome allows for the identification of previously undetected structural commonalities and differences among individuals, which may help in the diagnosis of a disease, support the prediction of what will happen over time (prognosis) and aid in developing novel treatments in the perspective of personalized medicine. Therefore, in the present review, the application of the pangenome concept to the study of neurodegenerative diseases will be discussed and analyzed for its potential to enable an improvement in diagnosis and prognosis for these illnesses, leading to the development of tailored treatments for individual patients from the knowledge of the genomic composition of a whole population.
affiliations: Laboratory of Ancient DNA, Department of Cultural Heritage, University of Bologna, Via degli Ariani 1, 48121 Ravenna, Italy. Electronic address: paolo.abondio2@unibo.it.; Academy of Cognitive Behavioral Sciences of Calabria (ASCoC), Lamezia Terme, Italy; Regional Neurogenetic Centre (CRN), Department of Primary Care, Azienda Sanitaria Provinciale Di Catanzaro, Viale A. Perugini, 88046 Lamezia Terme, CZ, Italy; Association for Neurogenetic Research (ARN), Lamezia Terme, CZ, Italy.; Department of Biology, Ecology and Earth Sciences, University of Calabria, Rende 87036, Italy.; Laboratory of Ancient DNA, Department of Cultural Heritage, University of Bologna, Via degli Ariani 1, 48121 Ravenna, Italy.

translated_keywords: 基于k-mer的方法；泛基因组学；比较基因组学；核心基因组分析
translated_abstract:
计算泛基因组学涉及对一个物种所有基因组序列的联合分析，已在许多研究领域的各种任务中成功应用。DNA测序技术的进一步发展使得越来越多的物种基因组序列得以获取，这极大地提升了泛基因组学研究的吸引力。然而，更大的数据集也给处理这些数据所需的数据结构和算法带来了新的挑战。高效的泛基因组学方法通常利用k-mer的概念。核心检测是泛基因组分析的一种常见方式，其核心被定义为在所有个体成员中共有的基因组信息子集。经典上，它不仅可以在基因的抽象层面上确定，还可以在序列层面上进行描述。

在本章中，我们概述了基于k-mer的方法在泛基因组学研究中的应用。首先回顾了现有的k-mer计数和k-mer集合表示的软件解决方案。随后，我们描述了两种基于k-mer的方法（Pangrowth和Corer）在泛基因组核心检测中的应用。
authors: Schulz Tizian; Parmigiani Luca; Rempel Andreas; Stoye Jens
title: Methods for Pangenomic Core Detection.
keywords: k-mer-based methods; Pangenomics; Comparative genomics; Core genome analysis
translated_title: 泛基因组核心检测方法
abstract: Computational pangenomics deals with the joint analysis of all genomic sequences of a species. It has already been successfully applied to various tasks in many research areas. Further advances in DNA sequencing technologies constantly let more and more genomic sequences become available for many species, leading to an increasing attractiveness of pangenomic studies. At the same time, larger datasets also pose new challenges for data structures and algorithms that are needed to handle the data. Efficient methods oftentimes make use of the concept of k-mers.Core detection is a common way of analyzing a pangenome. The pangenome's core is defined as the subset of genomic information shared among all individual members. Classically, it is not only determined on the abstract level of genes but can also be described on the sequence level.In this chapter, we provide an overview of k-mer-based methods in the context of pangenomics studies. We first revisit existing software solutions for k-mer counting and k-mer set representation. Afterward, we describe the usage of two k-mer-based approaches, Pangrowth and Corer, for pangenomic core detection.
affiliations: Faculty of Technology and Center for Biotechnology, Bielefeld University, Bielefeld, Germany.; Faculty of Technology and Center for Biotechnology, Bielefeld University, Bielefeld, Germany. jens.stoye@uni-bielefeld.de.

translated_keywords: 个性化参考;基因分型;参考偏倚;全基因组测序;变异检测;精准医学;生物信息学
journal: bioRxiv : the preprint server for biology
journal_full_name: bioRxiv: The Preprint Server for Biology
translated_abstract: 泛基因组索引可以减少测序数据分析中的参考偏倚，但通过使用个性化参考（例如，匹配供体个体等位基因的二倍体人类参考）可以进一步降低偏倚。我们提出了一种新颖的先验预测后比对框架，结合了基因型预测和泛基因组比对的元素。该框架首先仅使用输入读取数据的子样本对个体进行基因分型。接着，利用参考面板和高效的预测算法构建个性化的二倍体参考。最后，对该个性化参考进行索引，并应用线性或图比对器以将完整的读取数据集比对到个性化参考上。与泛基因组比对器相比，该框架在变异检测召回率（99.54% 对 99.37%）、精确度（99.36% 对 99.18%）和F1分数（99.45% 对 99.28%）方面均表现更优。此外，与泛基因组索引相比，个性化参考更小且查询速度更快，因此对于全基因组DNA测序实验而言，它是一种总体上更有优势的选择。
authors: Vaddadi Kavya; Mun Taher; Langmead Ben
title: Minimizing Reference Bias with an Impute-First Approach.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 个性化参考;基因分型;参考偏倚;全基因组测序;变异检测;精准医学;生物信息学
translated_title: 采用先插补方法以最小化参考偏倚
abstract: Pangenome indexes reduce reference bias in sequencing data analysis. However, bias can be reduced further by using a personalized reference, e.g. a diploid human reference constructed to match a donor individual's alleles. We present a novel impute-first alignment framework that combines elements of genotype imputation and pangenome alignment. It begins by genotyping the individual using only a subsample of the input reads. It next uses a reference panel and efficient imputation algorithm to impute a personalized diploid reference. Finally, it indexes the personalized reference and applies a read aligner, which could be a linear or graph aligner, to align the full read set to the personalized reference. This framework achieves higher variant-calling recall (99.54% vs. 99.37%), precision (99.36% vs. 99.18%), and F1 (99.45% vs. 99.28%) compared to a graph pangenome aligner. The personalized reference is also smaller and faster to query compared to a pangenome index, making it an overall advantageous choice for whole-genome DNA sequencing experiments.
affiliations: Department of Computer Science, Johns Hopkins University.

translated_keywords: 人类基因组;pangenomic参考;biogeographic多样性;疾病筛查;cancer疗法;遗传多样性;精准医疗;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 包含 47 名个体的人类泛基因组参考草案初稿已问世，这些个体经过挑选以最大化其生物地理多样性，这为更准确和有效的疾病筛查提供了途径。这种对遗传多样性更广泛且更完整的视角可能带来癌症治疗的新靶点。
title: New Genomic Sequencing Resource Could Improve Care.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 人类基因组;pangenomic参考;biogeographic多样性;疾病筛查;cancer疗法;遗传多样性;精准医疗;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 新的基因组测序资源可能改善护理质量。
abstract: The first draft of a human pangenomic reference, which includes 47 individuals selected to maximize biogeographic diversity, offers a path to more accurate and effective screening for disease. This broader and more complete view of genetic diversity could lead to new targets for cancer therapies.

translated_keywords: 序列比对；索引；基因分型
translated_abstract: //github.com/alshai/rowbowt 获取。
authors: Mun Taher; Vaddadi Naga Sai Kavya; Langmead Ben
title: Pangenomic genotyping with the marker array.
keywords: Sequence alignment; Indexing; Genotyping
translated_title: 基于标记数组的泛基因组基因分型
abstract: We present a new method and software tool called rowbowt that applies a pangenome index to the problem of inferring genotypes from short-read sequencing data. The method uses a novel indexing structure called the marker array. Using the marker array, we can genotype variants with respect from large panels like the 1000 Genomes Project while reducing the reference bias that results when aligning to a single linear reference. rowbowt can infer accurate genotypes in less time and memory compared to existing graph-based methods. The method is implemented in the open source software tool rowbowt available at https://github.com/alshai/rowbowt .
affiliations: Department of Computer Science, Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, MD, USA.; Department of Computer Science, Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, MD, USA. langmea@cs.jhu.edu.

translated_keywords: 辅助基因；肺炎链球菌；流程；Roary；泛基因组；细菌；同源物；聚类
journal: bioRxiv : the preprint server for biology
journal_full_name: bioRxiv: The Preprint Server for Biology
translated_abstract: //github.com/IndraGonz/CLARC] 通过利用功能注释和连接信息来压缩辅助COGs，从而改进了泛基因组分析。通过这种方法，直系同源群被整合为更实用的选择单位。对8,000多株肺炎链球菌基因组的分析表明，CLARC减少了超过30%的辅助基因估计，并基于辅助基因频率提高了进化预测的准确性。通过精确定义COGs，CLARC为细菌进化提供了关键见解，有助于不同群体中的遗传学研究。
authors: González Ojeda Indra; Palace Samantha G; Martinez Pamela P; Azarian Taj; Grant Lindsay R; Hammitt Laura L; Hanage William P; Lipsitch Marc
title: Linkage-based ortholog refinement in bacterial pangenomes with CLARC.
keywords: Accessory genes; S. pneumonia; Pipeline; Roary; Pangenome; Bacteria; Ortholog; Clustering
translated_title: 基于连接性的细菌泛基因组中CLARC的直系同源 refinements
abstract: Bacterial genomes exhibit significant variation in gene content and sequence identity. Pangenome analyses explore this diversity by classifying genes into core and accessory clusters of orthologous groups (COGs). However, strict sequence identity cutoffs can misclassify divergent alleles as different genes, inflating accessory gene counts. CLARC (Connected Linkage and Alignment Redefinition of COGs) [https://github.com/IndraGonz/CLARC] improves pangenome analyses by condensing accessory COGs using functional annotation and linkage information. Through this approach, orthologous groups are consolidated into more practical units of selection. Analyzing 8,000+ Streptococcus pneumoniae genomes, CLARC reduced accessory gene estimates by more than 30% and improved evolutionary predictions based on accessory gene frequencies. By refining COG definitions, CLARC offers critical insights into bacterial evolution, aiding genetic studies across diverse populations.
affiliations: Center for Communicable Disease Dynamics, Department of Epidemiology, T.H. Chan School of Public Health, Harvard University, Boston, Massachusetts, USA.; Harvard Biophysics Graduate Program, Graduate School of Arts and Sciences, Harvard University, Boston, Massachusetts, USA.; Department of Immunology and Infectious Diseases, T.H. Chan School of Public Health, Harvard University, Boston, Massachusetts, USA.; Department of Microbiology, University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign, Champaign, Illinois, USA.; Burnett School of Biomedical Sciences, University of Central Florida, Orlando, Florida, USA.; Department of International Health, Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, Baltimore, Maryland, USA.

translated_keywords: Pangenome图;路径引导;随机梯度下降;基因组变异;低维嵌入;可视化;生物特征;生物信息学
journal: bioRxiv : the preprint server for biology
journal_full_name: bioRxiv: The Preprint Server for Biology
translated_abstract: 即将图嵌入到低维（例如二维）表示中。然而，由于泛基因组图可能非常庞大，这成为一个重要的挑战。为了解决这一问题，我们提出了一种新的图布局算法：路径引导随机梯度下降法（Path-Guided Stochastic Gradient Descent, PG-SGD）。PG-SGD利用泛基因组图中表示为路径的基因组作为嵌入的位置系统，来采样节点对之间的基因组距离。这种方法避免了以往基于随机梯度下降（Stochastic Gradient Descent, SGD）绘图方法中的二次成本。我们证明了我们的实现能够高效地计算吉字节规模泛基因组图的低维布局，揭示其生物学特征。我们将PG-SGD集成到了ODGI中，ODGI已作为MIT开源许可证下的免费软件发布。源代码可在https://github.com/pangenome/odgi获取。
authors: Heumos Simon; Guarracino Andrea; Schmelzle Jan-Niklas M; Li Jiajie; Zhang Zhiru; Hagmann Jörg; Nahnsen Sven; Prins Pjotr; Garrison Erik
title: Pangenome graph layout by Path-Guided Stochastic Gradient Descent.
keywords: (Auto-generated) Pangenome图;路径引导;随机梯度下降;基因组变异;低维嵌入;可视化;生物特征;生物信息学
translated_title: 基于路径引导随机梯度下降的泛基因组图布局
abstract: The increasing availability of complete genomes demands for models to study genomic variability within entire populations. Pangenome graphs capture the full genomic similarity and diversity between multiple genomes. In order to understand them, we need to see them. For visualization, we need a human readable graph layout: A graph embedding in low (e.g. two) dimensional depictions. Due to a pangenome graph's potential excessive size, this is a significant challenge. In response, we introduce a novel graph layout algorithm: the Path-Guided Stochastic Gradient Descent (PG-SGD). PG-SGD uses the genomes, represented in the pangenome graph as paths, as an embedded positional system to sample genomic distances between pairs of nodes. This avoids the quadratic cost seen in previous versions of graph drawing by Stochastic Gradient Descent (SGD). We show that our implementation efficiently computes the low dimensional layouts of gigabase-scale pangenome graphs, unveiling their biological features. We integrated PG-SGD in ODGI which is released as free software under the MIT open source license. Source code is available at https://github.com/pangenome/odgi.
affiliations: Quantitative Biology Center (QBiC), University of Tübingen, Tübingen 72076, Germany.; Biomedical Data Science, Department of Computer Science, University of Tübingen, Tübingen 72076, Germany.; Department of Genetics, Genomics and Informatics, University of Tennessee Health Science Center, Memphis, TN 38163, USA.; Genomics Research Centre, Human Technopole, Milan 20157, Italy.; Department of Computer Engineering, School of Computation, Information and Technology (CIT), Technical University of Munich, Munich 80333, Germany.; School of Electrical and Computer Engineering, Cornell University, Ithaca, NY 14853, USA.; Computomics GmbH, Eisenbahnstr. 1, 72072 Tübingen, Germany.; M3 Research Center, University Hospital Tübingen, 72076 Tübingen, Germany.

translated_keywords: 肾小管间质病；单基因肾病；肉芽肿性肾病；全基因组分析
translated_abstract: 本文报道了一例16岁慢性肾病女孩的病例，肾活检显示为伴有肉芽肿的 tubulointerstitial 肾病。初始治疗采用免疫抑制疗法，但基因外显子测序结果显示其患有由 NPHP1 基因纯合缺失引起的肾结构异常性肾病，这标志着一种与肾结构异常性肾病相关的独特肉芽肿性肾病。由于严重的肾脏损伤，其肾功能未恢复，需要进行腹膜透析和肾移植。该病例强调了在炎症性间质性和肉芽肿性肾病中考虑肾结构异常性肾病的重要性，尤其是在病情严重且发病较早时。此外，还突显了基因检测在儿童肾病的准确诊断和管理中的重要性。
authors: Vedrine Enzo; Bessenay Lucie; Philipponnet Carole; Dancer Marine; Bertholet-Thomas Aurelia
title: Granulomatous nephropathy: have you thought about genetics?
keywords: Nephronophthisis; Monogenic nephropathy; Granulomatous nephropathy; Pangenomic analysis
translated_title: 你考虑过遗传因素吗？
abstract: We report here the case of a 16-year-old girl with chronic kidney disease, where biopsy revealed tubulointerstitial nephropathy with granulomas. Initial treatments included immunosuppressive therapy unless genetic testing with exome sequencing identified nephronophthisis due to a homozygous deletion of the NPHP1 gene, marking a unique instance of granulomatous nephropathy related to nephronophthisis. With severe kidney damage, her function has not recovered, necessitating peritoneal dialysis and transplantation. This case highlights the need to consider nephronophthisis in inflammatory interstitial and granulomatous nephropathy, especially when it appears severe and early in life. In addition, it underscores the importance of genetic testing for accurate diagnosis and management in pediatric nephropathies.
affiliations: Service de Néphrologie, Centre de Référence Des Maladies Rénales Rares, Filières de Santé Maladies Rares ORKID Et ERKNet, Hôpital Édouard-Herriot, Hospices Civils de Lyon, Lyon, France. enzo.vedrine@chu-lyon.fr.; Department of Pediatric Nephrology, Centre Hospitalier Universitaire de Clermont-Ferrand, Clermont-Ferrand, France.; Nephrology, Dialysis and Transplantation Department, University Hospital, Clermont-Ferrand, France.; Consortium Auragen, LBMMS Auragen, Lyon, France.; Pediatric Nephrology - Rheumatology and Dermatology Unit, Centre de Référence Des Maladies Rénales Rares, Filières de Santé Maladies Rares ORKID Et ERKNet, Hôpital Femme Mère Enfant, Hospices Civils de Lyon, Bron, France.

translated_keywords: 系统基因组学；创伤弧菌；基因组测序；毒力基因
journal: International microbiology : the official journal of the Spanish Society for Microbiology
translated_abstract: 副溶血弧菌 *toranzoniae* 是一种属于Splendidus分支的海洋细菌，最初从西班牙西北部加利西亚地区的健康蛤蜊中分离得到。该菌株在不同宿主和海水中被分离出，表明其具有两种生活方式和广泛的地理分布。本研究旨在确定六株菌（其中四株来自蛤蜊，两株来自海水）在基因组水平上的差异，并分析其系统发育关系。为此，采用包括Illumina和PacBio在内的不同技术对这六株菌的全基因组进行测序，并对所得序列进行校正。通过多种在线工具对基因组进行注释和比较。此外，还研究了核心基因组和泛基因组的内容，并推断其系统发育关系。根据所用工具的不同，核心基因组内容范围为2953到2766个基因，而泛基因组内容范围为6278到6132个基因。尽管这些菌株之间存在一定的同源性，其DDH值范围为77.10至82.30，OrthoANI值高于97%，但还是发现了一些与运动性、荚膜合成、铁获取系统或可移动遗传元件相关的差异。基于核心基因组的系统发育分析未能揭示菌株根据生活方式（共生或自由生活）的分化，但基于泛基因组的分析显示，在同一生长区域存在一定的地理隔离。本研究重新分类了之前描述为 *V. toranzoniae* 的一些菌株，并证明了已存入数据库的高质量序列对于正确系统发育分类的重要性。
authors: Barcia-Cruz Rubén; Balboa Sabela; Lema Alberto; Romalde Jesús L
title: Comparative genomics of Vibrio toranzoniae strains.
keywords: Phylogenomics; Vibrio toranzoniae; Genome sequencing; Virulence genes
translated_title: 创伤弧菌株的比较基因组学
abstract: Vibrio toranzoniae is a marine bacterium belonging to the Splendidus clade that was originally isolated from healthy clams in Galicia (NW Spain). Its isolation from different hosts and seawater indicated two lifestyles and wide geographical distribution. The aim of the present study was to determine the differences at the genomic level among six strains (4 isolated from clam and 2 from seawater) and to determine their phylogeny. For this purpose, whole genomes of the six strains were sequenced by different technologies including Illumina and PacBio, and the resulting sequences were corrected. Genomes were annotated and compared using different online tools. Furthermore, the study of core- and pan-genomes were examined, and the phylogeny was inferred. The content of the core genome ranged from 2953 to 2766 genes and that of the pangenome ranged from 6278 to 6132, depending on the tool used. Although the strains shared certain homology, with DDH values ranging from 77.10 to 82.30 and values of OrthoANI values higher than 97%, some differences were found related to motility, capsule synthesis, iron acquisition systems or mobile genetic elements. Phylogenetic analysis of the core genome did not reveal a differentiation of the strains according to their lifestyle (commensal or free-living), but that of the pangenome indicated certain geographical isolation in the same growing area. This study led to the reclassification of some isolates formerly described as V. toranzoniae and demonstrated the importance of cured deposited sequences to proper phylogenetic assignment.
affiliations: Departamento de Microbiología y Parasitología, CIBUS-Facultad de Biología, Universidade de Santiago de Compostela, Campus Vida S/N, 15782, Santiago de Compostela, Spain.; French Agency for Food, Environmental and Occupational Health and Safety (Anses), 94701, Maisons-Alfort Cedex, France.; Centro de Investigación Interdisciplinar en Tecnología Ambientales (CRETUS), Universidade de Santiago de Compostela, 15782, Santiago de Compostela, Spain.; AllGenetics & Biology SL, Oleiros, 15172, Perillo, A Coruña, Spain.; Departamento de Microbiología y Parasitología, CIBUS-Facultad de Biología, Universidade de Santiago de Compostela, Campus Vida S/N, 15782, Santiago de Compostela, Spain. jesus.romalde@usc.es.; Centro de Investigación Interdisciplinar en Tecnología Ambientales (CRETUS), Universidade de Santiago de Compostela, 15782, Santiago de Compostela, Spain. jesus.romalde@usc.es.

translated_keywords: 泛基因组；适应辐射；物种形成；宏进化；多样化；关键创新
translated_abstract: 原核生物多样性构成了生命之树的绝大部分，并对生物圈的功能以及人类健康至关重要。然而，与动物和植物相比，原核生物多样化的模式和机制受到的关注相对较少。适应辐射（adaptive radiation），即祖先物种快速分化为多个生态上不同的物种的过程，是宏观生物多样性形成的基本过程之一。本文探讨了生态机会是否可能在细菌中引发类似的多样化爆发。我们探索了原核生物如何通过水平获得的关键创新来启动适应辐射，这些创新使谱系能够入侵新的生态位空间，随后这些空间被分化的专业化后代所占据。我们讨论了关键创新进化后新型适应区如何被殖民和利用，以及某些类型的原核生物是否更容易发生适应辐射。当重组障碍不存在时，向生态位专家的辐射并不一定会导致细菌的物种形成。我们提出，在这种情况下，特定生态位的基因可能会在一个单一谱系内积累，从而导致开放型泛基因组的进化。
authors: Vos Michiel; Padfield Daniel; Quince Christopher; Vos Rutger
title: Adaptive radiations in natural populations of prokaryotes: innovation is key.
keywords: pangenomes; adaptive radiations; speciation; macroevolution; diversification; key innovations
translated_title: 创新是关键。
abstract: Prokaryote diversity makes up most of the tree of life and is crucial to the functioning of the biosphere and human health. However, the patterns and mechanisms of prokaryote diversification have received relatively little attention compared to animals and plants. Adaptive radiation, the rapid diversification of an ancestor species into multiple ecologically divergent species, is a fundamental process by which macrobiological diversity is generated. Here, we discuss whether ecological opportunity could lead to similar bursts of diversification in bacteria. We explore how adaptive radiations in prokaryotes can be kickstarted by horizontally acquired key innovations allowing lineages to invade new niche space that subsequently is partitioned among diversifying specialist descendants. We discuss how novel adaptive zones are colonized and exploited after the evolution of a key innovation and whether certain types of are more prone to adaptive radiation. Radiation into niche specialists does not necessarily lead to speciation in bacteria when barriers to recombination are absent. We propose that in this scenario, niche-specific genes could accumulate within a single lineage, leading to the evolution of an open pangenome.
affiliations: European Centre for Environment and Human Health, University of Exeter Medical School, Environment and Sustainability Institute, Treliever Road, Penryn Campus, Penryn, TR10 9FE, United Kingdom.; Environment and Sustainability Institute, University of Exeter, Treliever Road, Penryn Campus, Penryn, TR10 9FE, United Kingdom.; Organisms and Ecosystems, Earlham Institute, Norwich Research Park, Norwich NR4 7UZ, United Kingdom.; Gut Microbes and Health, Quadram Institute, Norwich Research Park, Norwich NR4 7UQ, United Kingdom.; Naturalis Biodiversity Center, Understanding Evolution, Darwinweg 2, Leiden 2333 CR, the Netherlands.; Institute of Biology Leiden, Leiden University, Sylviusweg 72, Leiden 2333 BE, the Netherlands.

translated_keywords: 小麦；生长习性；结构变异；泛基因组；着丝粒可塑性
journal: Journal of genetics and genomics = Yi chuan xue bao
translated_abstract: 越来越多的研究表明，结构变异（SVs）是多种农艺性状的重要致变因。然而，小麦中SVs的数量、分布及其贡献的系统性探索仍显不足。本文报道了基于高质量基因组和SV构建的小麦泛基因组，包含22个六倍体小麦组装样本，这些样本表现出广泛的染色体大小、基因数量及转座元件（TE）组成，显示其在表征小麦遗传多样性方面的代表性。泛基因分析揭示了140,261个独特的基因家族，其中仅有23.2%在所有样本中共享。此外，我们构建了一个约16.15 Gb的图泛基因组，包含695,897个气泡，涉及5,132个基因和230,307个顺式调控区域。两两基因组比较鉴定出约1,978,221个非冗余SVs和230,307个SV热点。值得注意的是，气泡以及SVs的密度在着丝粒区域表现出显著聚集，这可能在染色体可塑性和稳定性中发挥重要作用。在功能SVs探索方面，我们鉴定了2,769个绝对相对频率差异超过0.7的SVs，这些SVs在春化型和冬化型生长习性群体之间存在显著差异。此外，一些已知的功能基因如PPD-A1、VRT-A2和TaNAAT2-A在小麦中显示出复杂的结构图谱。这些发现加深了对小麦遗传多样性的理解，为提高全基因组关联映射效率提供了宝贵的图形化泛基因组和变异资源。
authors: Cheng Hong; Kong Lingpeng; Zhu Kun; Zhao Hang; Li Xiuli; Zhang Yanwen; Ning Weidong; Jiang Mei; Song Bo; Cheng Shifeng
title: Structural variation-based and gene-based pangenome construction reveals untapped diversity of hexaploid wheat.
keywords: Wheat; Growth habit; Structural Variation; Pangenome; Centromere Plasticity
translated_title: 基于结构变异和基因的泛基因组构建揭示了六倍体小麦未被开发的多样性。
abstract: Increasing number of structural variations (SVs) have been identified as causative mutations for diverse agronomic traits. However, the systematic exploration of SVs quantity, distribution and contribution in wheat was lacking. Here, we report high-quality gene-based and SV-based pangenomes comprising 22 hexaploid wheat assemblies showing a wide range of chromosome size, gene number, and TE component, which indicates their representativeness of wheat genetic diversity. Pan-gene analyses uncover 140,261 distinct gene families, of which only 23.2% are shared in all accessions. Moreover, we built a ∼16.15 Gb graph pangenome containing 695,897 bubbles, intersecting 5,132 genes and 230,307 cis-regulatory regions. Pairwise genome comparisons identified ∼1,978,221 non-redundant SVs and 497 SV hotspots. Notably, the density of bubbles as well as SVs show remarkable aggregation in centromeres, which probably play an important role in chromosome plasticity and stability. As for functional SVs exploration, we identify 2,769 SVs with absolute relative frequency differences exceeding 0.7 between spring and winter growth habit groups. Additionally, several reported functional genes in wheat display complex structural graphs, for example PPD-A1, VRT-A2, and TaNAAT2-A. These findings deepen our understanding of wheat genetic diversity, providing valuable graphical pangenome and variation resources to improve the efficiency of genome-wide association mapping in wheat.
affiliations: Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory for Lingnan Modern Agriculture, Genome Analysis Laboratory of the Ministry of Agriculture, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen, Guangdong 518100, China; College of Grassland Agriculture, Northwest A&F University, Yangling, Shaanxi 712100, China. Electronic address: chenghong92@163.com.; Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory for Lingnan Modern Agriculture, Genome Analysis Laboratory of the Ministry of Agriculture, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen, Guangdong 518100, China.; State Key Laboratory of Crop Stress Adaptation and Improvement, School of Life Sciences, Henan University, No. 379 Mingli Road (North Section), Zhengzhou, Henan 450046, China.; Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory for Lingnan Modern Agriculture, Genome Analysis Laboratory of the Ministry of Agriculture, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen, Guangdong 518100, China. Electronic address: chengshifeng@caas.cn.

translated_keywords: 应用计算；计算基因组学；泛基因组学；压缩索引；比较基因组学
journal: bioRxiv : the preprint server for biology
journal_full_name: bioRxiv: The Preprint Server for Biology
translated_abstract: 随着高质量长读长组装技术的普及，泛基因组的数量和规模正在增长。然而，目前研究泛基因组内序列组成和保守性的方法存在局限性。基于图模型的泛基因组方法需要计算代价高昂的多重比对步骤，这可能导致某些变异被遗漏；而基于k-mer和de Bruijn图的索引方法仅限于回答特定子字符串长度k的问题。我们提出了Maximal Exact Match Ordered（MEMO），这是一种基于序列间最大精确匹配（MEMs）的泛基因组索引方法。单一的MEMO索引可以处理泛基因组窗口内的任意长度查询。MEMO既能执行测试k-mer存在与否的成员资格查询，也能进行统计窗口内包含特定k-mer的基因组数量的保守性查询。对于由89个人类常染色体单倍型组成的泛基因组，其对应的MEMO索引大小仅为2.04 GB，比等效的KMC3索引小8.8倍，比PanKmer索引小11.4倍。通过牺牲部分计数分辨率，MEMO索引可以进一步减小，例如我们的十分位分辨率HPRC索引大小仅为0.67 GB。在人类白细胞抗原位点上，MEMO可以在13.89秒内完成31-mer的保守性查询，比其他方法快2.5倍。MEMO的小巧索引尺寸、不受k-mer长度限制以及高效的查询能力使其成为研究和可视化泛基因组中子串保守性的灵活工具。
authors: Hwang Stephen; Brown Nathaniel K; Ahmed Omar Y; Jenike Katharine M; Kovaka Sam; Schatz Michael C; Langmead Ben
title: MEM-based pangenome indexing for k-mer queries.
keywords: Applied computing; Computational genomics; Pangenomics; Compressed indexing; Comparative genomics
translated_title: 基于MEM的泛基因组索引用于k-mer查询
abstract: Pangenomes are growing in number and size, thanks to the prevalence of high-quality long-read assemblies. However, current methods for studying sequence composition and conservation within pangenomes have limitations. Methods based on graph pangenomes require a computationally expensive multiple-alignment step, which can leave out some variation. Indexes based on k-mers and de Bruijn graphs are limited to answering questions at a specific substring length k. We present Maximal Exact Match Ordered (MEMO), a pangenome indexing method based on maximal exact matches (MEMs) between sequences. A single MEMO index can handle arbitrary-length queries over pangenomic windows. MEMO enables both queries that test k-mer presence/absence (membership queries) and that count the number of genomes containing k-mers in a window (conservation queries). MEMO's index for a pangenome of 89 human autosomal haplotypes fits in 2.04 GB, 8.8× smaller than a comparable KMC3 index and 11.4× smaller than a PanKmer index. MEMO indexes can be made smaller by sacrificing some counting resolution, with our decile-resolution HPRC index reaching 0.67 GB. MEMO can conduct a conservation query for 31-mers over the human leukocyte antigen locus in 13.89 seconds, 2.5x faster than other approaches. MEMO's small index size, lack of k-mer length dependence, and efficient queries make it a flexible tool for studying and visualizing substring conservation in pangenomes.
affiliations: XDBio Program, Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore MD, USA.; Department of Computer Science, Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore MD, USA.

translated_keywords: 高效索引;注释查询;泛基因组图谱;Graph Alignment Format (GAF);HTSlib;变异投影;文本格式;生物信息学;分子生物学
journal: bioRxiv : the preprint server for biology
journal_full_name: bioRxiv: The Preprint Server for Biology
translated_abstract: 当前参考基因组是多样化且丰富的注释数据的基础。简单文本格式如VCF或BED已被广泛采用，并促进了基因组信息的关键交换。迫切需要工具和格式来支持泛基因组注释，以促进泛基因组参考的丰富化。图对齐格式（GAF）是一种类似于BED/VCF文件的制表符分隔文本格式，用于表示对齐结果。GAF还可以用来存储泛基因组图中的路径表示注释，但目前缺乏高效索引和查询这些路径的工具。本文介绍了对vg和HTSlib的扩展，提供了对GAF文件高效排序、索引和查询的功能。通过这种方法，可以快速提取与子图重叠的注释。路径根据遍历节点的ID进行排序，使用BGZIP压缩，并通过我们针对GAF格式的扩展与HTSlib/tabix一起索引。与二进制GAM格式相比，GAF文件由于是纯文本格式，因此更易于编辑或检查，并且我们证明它们的排序速度是其两倍，磁盘占用仅为一半。此外，我们更新了vg annotate工具，该工具可以处理基于线性序列的BED或GFF3注释文件，并将其投影到泛基因组中。现在它可以生成表示这些注释在泛基因组中路径的GAF文件。我们在多个应用中展示了这些新工具。我们将所有人类泛基因组参考联盟第一年单倍型的注释（包括基因、片段重复、串联重复和重复注释）投影到了基于Minigraph-Cactus的泛基因组（GRCh38版本v1.1）。我们还将GWAS目录中的已知变异和GTEx项目的表达QTL投影到了泛基因组中。最后，我们重新分析了ENCODE的ATAC-seq数据，展示了泛基因组图中覆盖轨迹可能的样子。这些丰富的注释可以通过vg快速查询，并使用现有的工具（如Sequence Tube Map或Bandage）可视化。
authors: Novak Adam M; Chung Dickson; Hickey Glenn; Djebali Sarah; Yokoyama Toshiyuki T; Garrison Erik; Narzisi Giuseppe; Paten Benedict; Monlong Jean
title: Efficient indexing and querying of annotations in a pangenome graph.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 高效索引;注释查询;泛基因组图谱;Graph Alignment Format (GAF);HTSlib;变异投影;文本格式;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 泛基因组图中注释索引与查询的高效方法
abstract: The current reference genome is the backbone of diverse and rich annotations. Simple text formats, like VCF or BED, have been widely adopted and helped the critical exchange of genomic information. There is a dire need for tools and formats enabling pangenomic annotation to facilitate such enrichment of pangenomic references. The Graph Alignment Format (GAF) is a text format, tab-delimited like BED/VCF files, which was proposed to represent alignments. GAF could also be used to store paths representing annotations in a pangenome graph, but there are no tools to index and query them efficiently. Here, we present extensions to vg and HTSlib that provide efficient sorting, indexing, and querying for GAF files. With this approach, annotations overlapping a subgraph can be extracted quickly. Paths are sorted based on the IDs of traversed nodes, compressed with BGZIP, and indexed with HTSlib/tabix via our extensions for the GAF format. Compared to the binary GAM format, GAF files are easier to edit or inspect because they are plain text, and we show that they are twice as fast to sort and half as large on disk. In addition, we updated vg annotate, which takes BED or GFF3 annotation files relative to linear sequences and projects them into the pangenome. It can now produce GAF files representing these annotations' paths through the pangenome. We showcase these new tools on several applications. We projected annotations for all Human Pangenome Reference Consortium Year 1 haplotypes, including genes, segmental duplications, tandem repeats and repeats annotations, into the Minigraph-Cactus pangenome (GRCh38-based v1.1). We also projected known variants from the GWAS Catalog and expression QTLs from the GTEx project into the pangenome. Finally, we reanalyzed ATAC-seq data from ENCODE to demonstrate what a coverage track could look like in a pangenome graph. These rich annotations can be quickly queried with vg and visualized using existing tools like the Sequence Tube Map or Bandage.
affiliations: UC Santa Cruz Genomics Institute, University of California, Santa Cruz, Santa Cruz, CA, USA.; IRSD - Digestive Health Research Institute, University of Toulouse, INSERM, INRAE, ENVT, UPS, Toulouse, France.; Department of Computational Biology and Medical Sciences, Graduate School of Frontier Sciences, The University of Tokyo, Chiba, Japan.; Department of Genetics, Genomics and Informatics, University of Tennessee Health Science Center, Memphis, TN, USA.; New York Genome Center, New York, NY 10013, USA.

translated_keywords: 压缩索引；泛基因组学；比较基因组学
translated_abstract: 测试k-mer存在与否的成员资格查询以及统计窗口内包含k-mer的基因组数量的保守性查询。对于由89个人类常染色体单倍型组成的泛基因组，其对应的MEMO索引大小为2.04 GB，比等效的KMC3索引小8.8倍，比PanKmer索引小11.4倍。通过牺牲部分计数精度，MEMO索引可以进一步缩小，例如我们的十分位分辨率HPRC索引仅需0.67 GB。在人类白细胞抗原位点上，MEMO可以在13.89秒内完成31-mer的保守性查询，比其他方法快2.5倍。MEMO的小巧索引尺寸、不受k-mer长度限制以及高效的查询能力使其成为研究和可视化泛基因组中子串保守性的灵活工具。
authors: Hwang Stephen; Brown Nathaniel K; Ahmed Omar Y; Jenike Katharine M; Kovaka Sam; Schatz Michael C; Langmead Ben
title: Mem-based pangenome indexing for k-mer queries.
keywords: Compressed indexing; Pangenomics; Comparative genomics
translated_title: 基于内存的泛基因组索引用于k-mer查询

However, current methods for studying sequence composition and conservation within pangenomes have limitations. translated_keywords: 肺外的；泛基因组；结核病
translated_abstract: 结核病（TB）是全球范围内由传染性疾病引起的首要死亡原因之一，由结核分枝杆菌（Mycobacterium tuberculosis）感染引起，可导致肺结核（PTB）或肺外结核（EPTB）。然而，目前尚无关于该病原体遗传决定因素的共识，这些因素可能与EPTB的发生有关。本研究构建了结核分枝杆菌的泛基因组，并将其作为工具，基于其辅助基因组差异来寻找与TB临床表现相关的基因组特征。本研究分析了从公共数据库获取的490个结核分枝杆菌基因组的原始读数（PTB n=245，EPTB n=245），以及来自墨西哥菌株的10个基因组（PTB n=5，EPTB n=5），这些基因组均已完成组装和注释，随后用于使用Roary和Panaroo构建泛基因组。通过Roary构建的泛基因组包含2231个核心基因和3729个辅助基因；而通过Panaroo构建的泛基因组则包含2130个核心基因和5598个辅助基因。利用Scoary和Pyseer工具对辅助基因分布与PTB/EPTB表型之间的关联进行了分析。两种工具均发现hspR、plcD、Rv2550c、pe_pgrs5、pe_pgrs25和pe_pgrs57基因与PTB基因型之间存在显著关联。相反，aceA、esxR、plcA和ppe50基因的缺失则与EPTB表型显著相关。根据Scoary的结果，Rv1759c和Rv3740与PTB表型相关，但使用Pyseer时未观察到这种关联。所构建泛基因组及其基因-表型关联的稳健性得到了多个因素的支持，包括分析大量基因组、包含相同数量的PTB/EPTB基因组以及由于使用不同生物信息学工具而获得的可重复结果。这些特点超越了大多数先前的结核分枝杆菌泛基因组。因此可以推断，这些基因的缺失可能导致参与应激反应和脂肪酸代谢的过程发生变化，从而赋予与肺结核或肺外结核表型相关的表型优势。本研究首次尝试利用泛基因组方法在结核分枝杆菌中寻找基因-表型关联。
authors: Negrete-Paz Andrea Monserrat; Vázquez-Marrufo Gerardo; Gutiérrez-Moraga Ana; Vázquez-Garcidueñas Ma Soledad
title: Pangenome Reconstruction of Mycobacterium tuberculosis as a Guide to Reveal Genomic Features Associated with Strain Clinical Phenotype.
keywords: extrapulmonary; pangenome; tuberculosis
translated_title: 结核分枝杆菌泛基因组重建作为揭示与菌株临床表型相关基因组特征的指导
abstract: Tuberculosis (TB) is one of the leading causes of human deaths worldwide caused by infectious diseases. TB infection by Mycobacterium tuberculosis can occur in the lungs, causing pulmonary tuberculosis (PTB), or in any other organ of the body, resulting in extrapulmonary tuberculosis (EPTB). There is no consensus on the genetic determinants of this pathogen that may contribute to EPTB. In this study, we constructed the M. tuberculosis pangenome and used it as a tool to seek genomic signatures associated with the clinical presentation of TB based on its accessory genome differences. The analysis carried out in the present study includes the raw reads of 490 M. tuberculosis genomes (PTB n = 245, EPTB n = 245) retrieved from public databases that were assembled, as well as ten genomes from Mexican strains (PTB n = 5, EPTB n = 5) that were sequenced and assembled. All genomes were annotated and then used to construct the pangenome with Roary and Panaroo. The pangenome obtained using Roary consisted of 2231 core genes and 3729 accessory genes. On the other hand, the pangenome resulting from Panaroo consisted of 2130 core genes and 5598 accessory genes. Associations between the distribution of accessory genes and the PTB/EPTB phenotypes were examined using the Scoary and Pyseer tools. Both tools found a significant association between the hspR, plcD, Rv2550c, pe_pgrs5, pe_pgrs25, and pe_pgrs57 genes and the PTB genotype. In contrast, the deletion of the aceA, esxR, plcA, and ppe50 genes was significantly associated with the EPTB phenotype. Rv1759c and Rv3740 were found to be associated with the PTB phenotype according to Scoary; however, these associations were not observed when using Pyseer. The robustness of the constructed pangenome and the gene-phenotype associations is supported by several factors, including the analysis of a large number of genomes, the inclusion of the same number of PTB/EPTB genomes, and the reproducibility of results thanks to the different bioinformatic tools used. Such characteristics surpass most of previous M. tuberculosis pangenomes. Thus, it can be inferred that the deletion of these genes can lead to changes in the processes involved in stress response and fatty acid metabolism, conferring phenotypic advantages associated with pulmonary or extrapulmonary presentation of TB. This study represents the first attempt to use the pangenome to seek gene-phenotype associations in M. tuberculosis.
affiliations: División de Estudios de Posgrado, Facultad de Ciencias Médicas y Biológicas "Dr. Ignacio Chávez", Universidad Michoacana de San Nicolás de Hidalgo, Morelia 58020, Michoacán, Mexico.; Centro Multidisciplinario de Estudios en Biotecnología, Facultad de Medicina Veterinaria y Zootecnia, Universidad Michoacana de San Nicolás de Hidalgo, Tarímbaro 58893, Michoacán, Mexico.; Instituto de Ciencias Biomédicas, Vicerrectoría de Investigación y Doctorados, Universidad Autónoma de Chile, Santiago 7500912, Chile.

translated_keywords: QTL-seq；群体设计；泛基因组图谱；混合分离群体分析；实验性；ID-seq
journal: BioEssays : news and reviews in molecular, cellular and developmental biology
translated_abstract: 基因发现揭示新的生物学知识，扩展了标记辅助选择的应用范围，并实现了目标突变体的精准编辑。然而，这类发现通常需要耗费超过十年的时间。本文提出了一种名为“敏捷遗传学”（Agile Genetics）的一般性策略，利用嵌套且结构化的群体来克服基因定位中的常见限制。通过对真实遗传架构进行广泛的模拟研究显示，在样本数量大于5000的情况下，通过混合分离池可以实现单基因分辨率。在此规模下，测序深度和实验技术重复成为影响分辨率的关键因素。一些新兴的富集方法正在解决覆盖度问题，我们介绍了一种可能性——迭代深度测序（ID-seq）。此外，在实验群体中基于图模型的泛基因组学将继续提高准确性并改善解释能力。基于农业规模与分子及生物信息学创新的结合，我们预测将迎来一个快速基因发现的新时代。
authors: Vaughn Justin N; Korani Walid; Clevenger Josh; Ozias-Akins Peggy
title: Agile Genetics: Single gene resolution without the fuss.
keywords: QTL‐seq; population design; pangenomic graph; bulk segregant analysis; experimental; ID‐seq
translated_title: 单基因分辨率，简而不凡。
abstract: Gene discovery reveals new biology, expands the utility of marker-assisted selection, and enables targeted mutagenesis. Still, such discoveries can take over a decade. We present a general strategy, "Agile Genetics," that uses nested, structured populations to overcome common limits on gene resolution. Extensive simulation work on realistic genetic architectures shows that, at population sizes of >5000 samples, single gene-resolution can be achieved using bulk segregant pools. At this scale, read depth and technical replication become major drivers of resolution. Emerging enrichment methods to address coverage are on the horizon; we describe one possibility - iterative depth sequencing (ID-seq). In addition, graph-based pangenomics in experimental populations will continue to maximize accuracy and improve interpretation. Based on this merger of agronomic scale with molecular and bioinformatic innovation, we predict a new age of rapid gene discovery.
affiliations: USDA-ARS, Athens, Georgia, USA.; Hudson-Alpha Institute of Biotechnology, Huntsville, Alabama, USA.; University of Georgia, Athens, Georgia, USA.

translated_keywords: MLST（多位点序列分型）；无乳链球菌（Streptococcus suis）；ARG（抗生素抗性基因）；抗菌素耐药性；泛基因组
translated_abstract: 猪链球菌（*Streptococcus suis*, S. *suis*）是一种人畜共患病原体，可引起人类和猪的严重疾病，包括脑膜炎、败血症、纤维素性渗出性多浆膜炎、关节炎和心内膜炎。本研究旨在调查2021年至2023年间从湖北省患病猪体内分离的19株S. *suis*菌株的生物学特性。通过生物信息学分析，我们探讨了这19株S. *suis*分离株的血清型、多位点序列分型（MLST）、泛基因组特征、单核苷酸多态性（SNP）、抗生素耐药性（AMR）及整合与可接合元件（ICE）。在19株S. *suis*菌株中，鉴定出10种血清型，其中血清型9最为常见（占21.05%）。发现了10个新的等位基因和9个新的序列类型（ST），ST28和ST243成为主要的ST类型。S. *suis*泛基因组分析结果显示，共有943个核心基因、2259个壳基因和5663个云基因。通过SNP进化分析发现SS31与参考基因组P1/7之间存在较强的遗传相似性。抗生素耐药基因分析显示，19株S. *suis*菌株中普遍存在erm(B)和tet(O)基因，这可能与S. *suis*对林可酰胺类、大环内酯类和四环素类药物的高耐药性相关。在16株菌株中检测到整合与可接合元件（ICEs）以及整合与可移动元件（IMEs），携带率为84.21%，其中8株菌株的ICE/IME元件中检测到耐药基因。抗菌药物敏感性测试表明，所有菌株均对万古霉素和林可霉素敏感，但对替米考星、泰妙菌素、阿莫西林和多西环素耐药。本研究有助于了解中国湖北省S. *suis*的基因组多样性，为全国范围内S. *suis*感染的综合预防和控制提供了重要数据。
authors: Xia Yingjun; Wang Zhaoyang; Hu Yanli; Zhao Pengfei; Li Jianhai; Zhang Li; Fang Rui; Zhao Junlong
title: Isolation, Identification, Genomic Diversity, and Antimicrobial Resistance Analysis of Streptococcus suis in Hubei Province of China from 2021 to 2023.
keywords: MLST; Streptococcus suis; ARG; antimicrobial resistance; pan-genome
translated_title: 2021年至2023年期间中国湖北省链球菌（Streptococcus suis）的分离、鉴定、基因组多样性及抗菌药物耐药性分析
abstract: Streptococcus suis (S. suis) is a zoonotic pathogen capable of causing severe diseases in humans and pigs, including meningitis, sepsis, polyserositis, arthritis, and endocarditis. This study aimed to investigate the biological characteristics of 19 strains of S. suis isolated from diseased pigs in Hubei Province between 2021 and 2023. Through bioinformatics analysis, we investigated the serotype, MLST, pan-genome characteristics, SNP, AMR, and ICE of the 19 S. suis isolates. Among the 19 S. suis strains, ten serotypes were identified, and serotype 9 was the most prevalent (21.05%). Ten new alleles and nine new sequence types (STs) were discovered, with ST28 and ST243 emerging as the predominant STs. The results of the pan-genomic analysis of S. suis indicate that there are 943 core genes, 2259 shell genes, and 5663 cloud genes. Through SNP evolutionary analysis, we identified a strong genetic similarity between SS31 and the reference genome P1/7. The analysis of antibiotic resistance genes revealed widespread presence of erm(B) and tet(O) genes among 19 strains of S. suis. This association may be linked to the high resistance of S. suis to lincosamides, macrolides, and tetracyclines. Integrative and conjugative elements (ICEs) and integrative and mobilizable elements (IMEs) were identified in 16 strains, with a carriage rate of 84.21%, and resistance genes were identified within the ICE/IME elements of 8 strains. Antimicrobial susceptibility testing revealed that all strains showed sensitivity to vancomycin and lincomycin but resistance to tilmicosin, tiamulin, amoxicillin, and doxycycline. This study contributes to our understanding of the genomic diversity of S. suis in Hubei Province of China, providing essential data for the comprehensive prevention and control of S. suis infections in China.
affiliations: State Key Laboratory of Agricultural Microbiology, College of Veterinary Medicine, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan 430070, China.; Key Laboratory of Preventive Veterinary Medicine in Hubei Province, Wuhan 430070, China.; Key Laboratory of Animal Epidemical Disease and Infectious Zoonoses, Ministry of Agriculture, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan 430070, China.

translated_keywords: 保健食品；农艺性状；生物合成；荞麦；活性成分；多组学
translated_abstract: 荞麦（Fagopyrum spp.）是一种典型的假谷物，因其丰富的营养保健潜力以及数百年的栽培历史而备受重视。鞑靼荞麦和普通荞麦因富含蛋白质、黄酮类化合物和矿物质等营养成分而在全球范围内被广泛使用，并成为广为人知的营养食品。此外，其日益增长的需求使得提升荞麦的营养保健特性和产量变得尤为重要。本文综述了荞麦中积累的生物活性化合物，根据其化学结构、性质及其生理功能进行了全面评估。系统总结了黄酮类化合物、酚酸和荞麦素的合成途径，并探讨了黄酮类化合物合成的调控机制。尽管已有研究提出了经典的合成途径，但荞麦中这些特定化合物的代谢流仍尚未完全揭示。基于多组学研究，鉴定了参与黄酮醇合成、胁迫响应及植物发育的功能基因。此外，还深入探讨了多组学在改善荞麦农艺性状（包括产量、营养成分含量、抗逆性和生物活性化合物合成）中的应用。通过泛基因组与其他组学结合挖掘优良基因，研究特定农艺性状的调控网络与机制，开发更高效的遗传转化系统以实现遗传工程育种设计，从而增强荞麦的优良性状，仍需进一步探索。本综述将为荞麦营养保健特性提升和性状改良提供全面的理解。
authors: Song Yingjie; Long Chunlin; Wang Ying; An Yuxing; Lu Yinglin
title: Advancements in multi-omics for nutraceutical enhancement and traits improvement in buckwheat.
keywords: nutraceutical; agronomic traits; biosynthesis; Buckwheat; bioactive components; multi-omics
translated_title: 多组学在荞麦功能成分提升和性状改良中的进展
abstract: Buckwheat (Fagopyrum spp.) is a typical pseudocereal, valued for its extensive nutraceutical potential as well as its centuries-old cultivation. Tartary buckwheat and common buckwheat have been used globally and become well-known nutritious foods due to their high quantities of: proteins, flavonoids, and minerals. Moreover, its increasing demand makes it critical to improve nutraceutical, traits and yield. In this review, bioactive compounds accumulated in buckwheat were comprehensively evaluated according to their chemical structure, properties, and physiological function. Biosynthetic pathways of flavonoids, phenolic acids, and fagopyrin were methodically summarized, with the regulation of flavonoid biosynthesis. Although there are classic synthesis pathways presented in the previous research, the metabolic flow of how these certain compounds are being synthesized in buckwheat still remains uncovered. The functional genes involved in the biosynthesis of flavonols, stress response, and plant development were identified based on multi-omics research. Furthermore, it delves into the applications of multi-omics in improving buckwheat's agronomic traits, including: yield, nutritional content, stress resilience, and bioactive compounds biosynthesis. While pangenomics combined with other omics to mine elite genes, the regulatory network and mechanism of specific agronomic traits and biosynthetic of bioactive components, and developing a more efficient genetic transformation system for genetic engineering require further investigation for the execution of breeding designs aimed at enhancing desirable traits in buckwheat. This critical review will provide a comprehensive understanding of multi-omics for nutraceutical enhancement and traits improvement in buckwheat.
affiliations: Institute of Nanfan and Seed Industry, Guangdong Academy of Sciences, Guangzhou, P.R. China.; College of Life and Environmental Sciences, Minzu University of China, Beijing, China.; Key Laboratory of South China Agricultural Plant Molecular Analysis and Genetic Improvement & Guangdong Provincial Key Laboratory of Applied Botany, South China Botanical Garden, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Guangzhou, China.

translated_keywords: 屎肠球菌；模型可解释性；特征排名；粪肠球菌；抗菌耐药；机器学习
translated_abstract: 随着病原体抗微生物药物耐药性（AMR）的快速演变，准确识别表型耐药的遗传决定因素对于改善监测、用药管理和临床干预至关重要。机器学习（ML）模型在诊断中的AMR预测显示出潜力，但要有效使用，需要深入了解其内部过程。本研究利用来自人畜共患病连续统一体上647株屎肠球菌和粪肠球菌基因组的AMR基因、泛基因组和预测质粒特征，以及相应的耐药表型，开发了解释性的ML分类器。以vanA操纵子为研究对象，发现使用AMR基因特征预测万古霉素耐药的准确率为99%，使用泛基因组特征为98%，使用质粒簇为96%。泛基因组的顶级特征与vanA操纵子的耐药基因重叠，这些基因通常通过质粒水平转移。四环素耐药的预测使用泛基因组特征可达到约92%的准确率，其中顶级特征是Tn916结合转座子的tet(M)载体元件。红霉素耐药预测模型的准确率约为90%，但顶级特征与耐药呈负相关，这是由于种群结构的混杂效应所致。这项工作表明，即使在获得高性能指标时，审查ML模型的特征以辨别其生物学意义也非常重要。我们的工作流程有望提出实验验证的假设，从而增强对抗AMR机制的理解，这对于应对AMR危机至关重要。
authors: Kim Jee In; Manuele Alexander; Maguire Finlay; Zaheer Rahat; McAllister Tim A; Beiko Robert G
title: Identification of key drivers of antimicrobial resistance in Enterococcus using machine learning.
keywords: Enterococcus faecium; model interpretability; feature ranking; Enterococcus faecalis; antimicrobial resistance; machine learning
translated_title: 利用机器学习识别肠球菌耐药性关键驱动因素
abstract: With antimicrobial resistance (AMR) rapidly evolving in pathogens, quick and accurate identification of genetic determinants of phenotypic resistance is essential for improving surveillance, stewardship, and clinical mitigation. Machine learning (ML) models show promise for AMR prediction in diagnostics but require a deep understanding of internal processes to use effectively. Our study utilised AMR gene, pangenomic, and predicted plasmid features from 647 Enterococcus faecium and Enterococcus faecalis genomes across the One Health continuum, along with corresponding resistance phenotypes, to develop interpretive ML classifiers. Vancomycin resistance could be predicted with 99% accuracy with AMR gene features, 98% with pangenome features, and 96% with plasmid clusters. Top pangenome features overlapped with the resistance genes of the vanA operon, which are often laterally transmitted via plasmids. Doxycycline resistance prediction achieved approximately 92% accuracy with pangenome features, with the top feature being elements of Tn916 conjugative transposon, a tet(M) carrier. Erythromycin resistance prediction models achieved about 90% accuracy, but top features were negatively correlated with resistance due to the confounding effect of population structure. This work demonstrates the importance of reviewing ML models' features to discern biological relevance even when achieving high-performance metrics. Our workflow offers the potential to propose hypotheses for experimental testing, enhancing the understanding of AMR mechanisms, which are crucial for combating the AMR crisis.
affiliations: Faculty of Computer Science, Dalhousie University, Halifax, NS, Canada.; Institute for Comparative Genomics, Dalhousie University, Halifax, NS, Canada.; Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, Lethbridge, AB, Canada.; Department of Community Health and Epidemiology, Dalhousie University, Faculty of Medicine, Halifax, NS, Canada.

translated_keywords: 蓝莓;蔓越莓;泛基因组;遗传多样性;疾病抗性;代谢物合成;辅助基因;生物信息学;分子生物学
journal: bioRxiv : the preprint server for biology
journal_full_name: bioRxiv: The Preprint Server for Biology
translated_abstract: 蔓越莓和蓝莓的人工栽培分别始于19世纪早期和20世纪早期的美国，由于其风味及对健康的促进作用，如今这两种作物已在全球范围内种植和消费。然而，该产业仍面临诸多生产挑战（如病害压力）以及对高产且果实品质更优品种的需求。遗憾的是，与其它高价值作物相比，针对这些物种的分子工具相对有限。本文描述了蓝莓和蔓越莓的第一个泛基因组的构建与分析。通过对这两个泛基因组的分析发现，这两种作物表现出极大的遗传多样性，高丛蓝莓中有48.4%的基因存在表达与否的变化，蔓越莓中则有47.0%的基因存在类似变化。辅助基因（即不被所有品种共享的基因）显著富集了与抗病性和次生代谢物合成相关的分子功能，其中包括之前与改善果实品质性状相关的化合物。发现的数千个未出现在先前蓝莓和蔓越莓参考基因组中的基因，将成为未来研究的基础，并作为未来育种工作的潜在目标。泛基因组作为一个多序列比对工具，以及单独的注释基因组，均可通过Vaccinium基因组数据库（一个经过整理和集成的基于网络的关系型数据库）进行公开分析。最后，泛基因组的核心基因预测结果将有助于开发社区基因分型平台，以指导该科植物未来的分子育种工作。
authors: Yocca Alan E; Platts Adrian; Alger Elizabeth; Teresi Scott; Mengist Molla F; Benevenuto Juliana; Ferrão Luis Felipe V; Jacobs MacKenzie; Babinski Michal; Magallanes-Lundback Maria; Bayer Philipp; Golicz Agnieszka; Humann Jodi L; Main Dorrie; Espley Richard V; Chagné David; Albert Nick W; Montanari Sara; Vorsa Nicholi; Polashock James; Díaz-Garcia Luis; Zalapa Juan; Bassil Nahla V; Munoz Patricio R; Iorizzo Massimo; Edger Patrick P
title: Blueberry and cranberry pangenomes as a resource for future genetic studies and breeding efforts.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 蓝莓;蔓越莓;泛基因组;遗传多样性;疾病抗性;代谢物合成;辅助基因;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 越橘和蔓越莓的泛基因组资源在今后遗传学研究和育种工作中的应用
abstract: Domestication of cranberry and blueberry began in the United States in the early 1800s and 1900s, respectively, and in part owing to their flavors and health-promoting benefits are now cultivated and consumed worldwide. The industry continues to face a wide variety of production challenges (e.g. disease pressures) as well as a demand for higher-yielding cultivars with improved fruit quality characteristics. Unfortunately, molecular tools to help guide breeding efforts for these species have been relatively limited compared with those for other high-value crops. Here, we describe the construction and analysis of the first pangenome for both blueberry and cranberry. Our analysis of these pangenomes revealed both crops exhibit great genetic diversity, including the presence-absence variation of 48.4% genes in highbush blueberry and 47.0% genes in cranberry. Auxiliary genes, those not shared by all cultivars, are significantly enriched with molecular functions associated with disease resistance and the biosynthesis of specialized metabolites, including compounds previously associated with improving fruit quality traits. The discovery of thousands of genes, not present in the previous reference genomes for blueberry and cranberry, will serve as the basis of future research and as potential targets for future breeding efforts. The pangenome, as a multiple-sequence alignment, as well as individual annotated genomes, are publicly available for analysis on the Genome Database for Vaccinium - a curated and integrated web-based relational database. Lastly, the core-gene predictions from the pangenomes will serve useful to develop a community genotyping platform to guide future molecular breeding efforts across the family.
affiliations: Department of Horticulture, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, 48824, USA.; Department of Plant Biology, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, 48824, USA.; Genetics and Genome Sciences, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, 48824, USA.; Plants for Human Health Institute, North Carolina State University, Kannapolis, NC USA.; Horticultural Sciences Department, University of Florida, Gainesville, FL 32611, USA.; Department of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, 48824, USA.; University of Western Australia, Perth 6009 Australia.; Justus Liebig University, Giessen, 35390 Germany.; Department of Horticulture, Washington State University, Pullman, WA, 99163, USA.; The New Zealand Institute for Plant and Food Research Limited (PFR), Auckland, New Zealand.; The New Zealand Institute for Plant and Food Research Limited (PFR), Palmerston, New Zealand.; The New Zealand Institute for Plant and Food Research Limited (PFR), Motueka, New Zealand.; SEBS, Plant Biology, Rutgers University, New Brunswick NJ 01019 USA.; USDA-ARS, VCRU, Department of Horticulture, University of Wisconsin-Madison, Madison, WI 53706, USA.; USDA-ARS, National Clonal Germplasm Repository, Corvallis, OR 97333, USA.; Department of Horticulture, North Carolina State University, Kannapolis, NC USA.; MSU AgBioResearch, Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI, 48824, USA.

translated_keywords: 念珠藻目；蓝细菌水华；系统发育；宏基因组学；潘普利亚湖
translated_abstract: 从巴西贝洛奥里藏特市（米纳斯吉拉斯州）帕姆普拉湖采集的两份淡水宏基因组数据中，成功恢复了两种Raphidiopsis（=Cylindrospermopsis）raciborskii宏基因组组装基因组（MAGs）。自20世纪70年代末以来，由于废水输入导致湖泊富营养化压力不断增加，该超富营养化的人工浅水水库频繁发生蓝藻水华。PAMP2011和PAMP2012 MAGs的主要区别在于PAMP2012缺乏石房蛤毒素基因簇，其基因组也较小，而PAMP2011则携带完整的sxt基因簇以及所有必需的蛋白质和基因簇。通过NCBI数据库中所有可用的Raphidiopsis/Cylindrospermopsis基因组进行泛基因组分析，包括PAMP2011和PAMP2012 MAGs（All33子集），以及排除南美菌株的子集（noSA子集），以及仅限于南美菌株的子集（SA10和SA8子集）。我们发现与All33子集相比，noSA子集的核心基因组大小显著增加，这表明核心基因组反映了泛基因组成员之间的亲缘关系，结果强烈表明关键基因库的保守程度似乎受到被分析菌株地理来源的影响，支持存在一个独特的南美（SA）分支的观点。Raphidiopsis的泛基因组包含总共7943个直系同源蛋白簇，这两个新MAGs使泛基因组规模增加了11%。基于泛基因组的系统发育分析显示，33个分析基因组中的SA基因组以99%的自举支持率聚类在一起，进一步证实了Raphidiopsis南美分支在产生石房蛤毒素方面的独特代谢特性，同时也表明由于地理隔离导致其具有不同的进化历史。
authors: Laux Marcele; Piroupo Carlos Morais; Setubal João Carlos; Giani Alessandra
title: The Raphidiopsis (= Cylindrospermopsis) raciborskii pangenome updated: Two new metagenome-assembled genomes from the South American clade.
keywords: Nostocales; Cyanobacteria blooms; Phylogeny; Metagenomics; Pampulha lake
translated_title: 南美分支的两个新宏基因组组装基因组
abstract: Two Raphidiopsis (=Cylindrospermopsis) raciborskii metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) were recovered from two freshwater metagenomic datasets sampled in 2011 and 2012 in Pampulha Lake, a hypereutrophic, artificial, shallow reservoir, located in the city of Belo Horizonte (MG), Brazil. Since the late 1970s, the lake has undergone increasing eutrophication pressure, due to wastewater input, leading to the occurrence of frequent cyanobacterial blooms. The major difference observed between PAMP2011 and PAMP2012 MAGs was the lack of the saxitoxin gene cluster in PAMP2012, which also presented a smaller genome, while PAMP2011 presented the complete sxt cluster and all essential proteins and clusters. The pangenome analysis was performed with all Raphidiopsis/Cylindrospermopsis genomes available at NCBI to date, with the addition of PAMP2011 and PAMP2012 MAGs (All33 subset), but also without the South American strains (noSA subset), and only among the South American strains (SA10 and SA8 subsets). We observed a substantial increase in the core genome size for the 'noSA' subset, in comparison to 'All33' subset, and since the core genome reflects the closeness among the pangenome members, the results strongly suggest that the conservation level of the essential gene repertoire seems to be affected by the geographic origin of the strains being analyzed, supporting the existence of a distinct SA clade. The Raphidiopsis pangenome comprised a total of 7943 orthologous protein clusters, and the two new MAGs increased the pangenome size by 11%. The pangenome based phylogenetic relationships among the 33 analyzed genomes showed that the SA genomes clustered together with 99% bootstrap support, reinforcing the metabolic particularity of the Raphidiopsis South American clade, related to its saxitoxin producing unique ability, while also indicating a different evolutionary history due to its geographic isolation.
affiliations: Department of Botany, Phycology Laboratory, Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais, 31270-901, Belo Horizonte, MG, Brazil.; Department of Biochemistry, Institute of Chemistry, Universidade de São Paulo, 05508-000, São Paulo, SP, Brazil.; Department of Botany, Phycology Laboratory, Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais, 31270-901, Belo Horizonte, MG, Brazil. Electronic address: agiani@ufmg.br.

translated_keywords: 宏基因组学；代谢组学；脂质组学；蛋白质组学；口腔微生物群；泛基因组学；转录组学；基因组学
translated_abstract: 口腔微生物群对人类健康具有巨大影响，目前已被证实与多种口腔和全身性疾病相关。近年来，测序技术、质谱分析、生物信息学、计算生物学以及机器学习的进步正在彻底改变口腔微生物组研究，使得利用多组学方法在前所未有的规模和分辨率下进行分析成为可能。本文综述了当前最先进的工具，包括基因组学、宏基因组学、系统发育基因组学、泛基因组学、转录组学、蛋白质组学、代谢组学、脂质组学以及多组学分析在（所有）微生物组研究中的应用，并提供了这些技术在口腔微生物组研究中具体应用的例子。此外，文章还强调了这些研究的关键发现及其领域内尚未解决的挑战。尽管文中讨论的方法主要针对口腔微生物组研究，但它们同样适用于任何微生物组的研究。本文的目标读者不仅限于希望了解微生物组学基础或最新多组学方法的学者。继续使用多组学方法研究口腔微生物群对于改善人类健康、延长寿命和提高生活质量至关重要。
authors: Baker Jonathon L
title: Illuminating the oral microbiome and its host interactions: recent advancements in omics and bioinformatics technologies in the context of oral microbiome research.
keywords: metagenomics; metabolomics; lipidomics; proteomics; oral microbiome; pangenomics; transcriptomics; genomics
translated_title: 口腔微生物组研究中组学和生物信息学技术的最新进展。
abstract: The oral microbiota has an enormous impact on human health, with oral dysbiosis now linked to many oral and systemic diseases. Recent advancements in sequencing, mass spectrometry, bioinformatics, computational biology, and machine learning are revolutionizing oral microbiome research, enabling analysis at an unprecedented scale and level of resolution using omics approaches. This review contains a comprehensive perspective of the current state-of-the-art tools available to perform genomics, metagenomics, phylogenomics, pangenomics, transcriptomics, proteomics, metabolomics, lipidomics, and multi-omics analysis on (all) microbiomes, and then provides examples of how the techniques have been applied to research of the oral microbiome, specifically. Key findings of these studies and remaining challenges for the field are highlighted. Although the methods discussed here are placed in the context of their contributions to oral microbiome research specifically, they are pertinent to the study of any microbiome, and the intended audience of this includes researchers would simply like to get an introduction to microbial omics and/or an update on the latest omics methods. Continued research of the oral microbiota using omics approaches is crucial and will lead to dramatic improvements in human health, longevity, and quality of life.
affiliations: Department of Oral Rehabilitation & Biosciences, School of Dentistry, Oregon Health & Science University, 3181 Sam Jackson Park Road, Portland, OR 97202, United States.; Genomic Medicine Group, J. Craig Venter Institute, La Jolla, CA 92037, United States.; Department of Pediatrics, UC San Diego School of Medicine, La Jolla, CA 92093, United States.

translated_keywords: 泛基因组学；祖先集重构；非同源重组；同源重组；变异图
translated_abstract: 母体和父体染色体之间的同源重组是人类遗传的关键机制，并塑造了我们物种的群体遗传特性。然而，类似的机制也可以在相同序列的不同拷贝之间发生，这种情况下被称为非等位同源重组（NAHR）。这一过程可能导致基因组重排，包括缺失、重复和倒位，并与许多基因组疾病相关。尽管NAHR对基因组进化和疾病具有重要意义，但目前缺乏用于研究易受NAHR影响的基因组位点的计算模型。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种计算模型，为等位同源重组和NAHR提供了统一的框架。我们的模型将一组基因组表示为一个图，其中单倍型对应于该图中的路径。我们在这一重组模型下定义了两个奠基者集问题，并提供了基于流的算法来解决这些问题。此外，我们还描述了精确方法来表征重组事件的数量，并展示了模型在实际问题实例上的可扩展性。
authors: Bonnet Konstantinn; Marschall Tobias; Doerr Daniel
title: Constructing founder sets under allelic and non-allelic homologous recombination.
keywords: Pangenomics; Founder set reconstruction; NAHR; Homologous recombination; Variation graph
translated_title: 在等位和非等位同源重组下构建奠基者集
abstract: Homologous recombination between the maternal and paternal copies of a chromosome is a key mechanism for human inheritance and shapes population genetic properties of our species. However, a similar mechanism can also act between different copies of the same sequence, then called non-allelic homologous recombination (NAHR). This process can result in genomic rearrangements-including deletion, duplication, and inversion-and is underlying many genomic disorders. Despite its importance for genome evolution and disease, there is a lack of computational models to study genomic loci prone to NAHR. In this work, we propose such a computational model, providing a unified framework for both (allelic) homologous recombination and NAHR. Our model represents a set of genomes as a graph, where haplotypes correspond to walks through this graph. We formulate two founder set problems under our recombination model, provide flow-based algorithms for their solution, describe exact methods to characterize the number of recombinations, and demonstrate scalability to problem instances arising in practice.
affiliations: Institute for Medical Biometry and Bioinformatics, Medical Faculty, and Center for Digital Medicine, Heinrich Heine University, Moorenstr. 5, 40225, Düsseldorf, Germany.; Institute for Medical Biometry and Bioinformatics, Medical Faculty, and Center for Digital Medicine, Heinrich Heine University, Moorenstr. 5, 40225, Düsseldorf, Germany. tobias.marschall@hhu.de.; Institute for Medical Biometry and Bioinformatics, Medical Faculty, and Center for Digital Medicine, Heinrich Heine University, Moorenstr. 5, 40225, Düsseldorf, Germany. daniel.doerr@hhu.de.

translated_keywords: 工业应用；非致病与致病；镰刀菌病；镰刀菌属，多样生物学；基因组与泛基因组；霉菌毒素中毒症；生态位与环境
translated_abstract: 子囊菌门（Ascomycota）中的镰刀菌属（Fusarium），最初由Link于1809年提出，目前包含431个物种以及3558个未分类的分离株和杂交种（根据NCBI分类列表）。这些真菌具有多样的生活方式和感染周期，能够利用广泛的环境、宿主、生态位和营养来源。本文综述了镰刀菌属的泛基因组学研究，描述并探讨了致病性和内生性物种所利用的迷人及较少被关注的生态位。我们调查了感染植物、人类、动物和/或无脊椎动物宿主的物种，以及栖息于陆地、空气或水基天然生态系统的自由生活的非致病性物种，直至那些利用人为改造环境或在工业生产系统中培养的物种。已有189个镰刀菌物种的全基因组完成测序、组装和注释，其中许多达到了染色体水平。此外，对于一些世界上最重要的物种，其单物种泛基因组或密切相关的形式专化基因组簇也已广泛可用。以往的比较基因组学研究主要集中在分类学上受限的镰刀菌物种群集。本文进一步探索了这些在生物学特性、生态位和环境占据方面存在巨大差异的镰刀菌物种间潜在的新关系，以及它们各自基因组的进化过程。
authors: Armer Victoria J; Kroll Erika; Darino Martin; Smith Daniel P; Urban Martin; Hammond-Kosack Kim E
title: Navigating the Fusarium species complex: Host-range plasticity and genome variations.
keywords: Industrial uses; Non-pathogenic and pathogenic; Fusariosis; Genus Fusarium, diverse biologies; Genomes and pangenomes; Mycotoxicosis; Niches and environments
translated_title: 寄主范围可塑性与基因组变异
abstract: The Ascomycete genus Fusarium, first introduced by Link in 1809, currently consists of 431 species and 3558 unclassified isolates and hybrids (according to NCBI Taxonomy lists). Collectively, these fungi have diverse lifestyles and infection cycles exploiting a wide range of environments, hosts, ecological niches, and nutrient sources. Here, we carried out a pan-Fusarium species review to describe and explore the glamorous, and the less attractive niches, exploited by pathogenic and endophytic species. We survey species that infect plant, human, animal and/or invertebrate hosts, free-living non-pathogenic species dwelling in land, air or water-based natural ecosystems, through to those species that exploit human-modified environments or are cultivated in industrial production systems. Fully sequenced, assembled and annotated reference genomes are already available for 189 Fusarium species, many at chromosome scale. In addition, for some of the world's most important species extensive single species pangenomes or closely related formae speciales genome clusters are readily available. Previous comparative genomics studies have focussed on taxonomically restricted clusters of Fusarium species. We now investigate potential new relationships between these vastly contrasting Fusarium biologies, niches and environmental occupancies and the evolution of their respective genomes.
affiliations: Protecting Crops and the Environment, Rothamsted Research, Harpenden, Herts, AL5 2JQ, UK.; Intelligent Data Ecosystems, Rothamsted Research, Harpenden, Herts, AL5 2JQ, UK.; Protecting Crops and the Environment, Rothamsted Research, Harpenden, Herts, AL5 2JQ, UK. Electronic address: kim.hammond-kosack@rothamsted.ac.uk.

translated_keywords: Streptococcus pneumoniae; serotype 3; CC180 clade; PCV13 vaccine; population genomics; antibiotic susceptibility; pangenome; 假设蛋白编码基因; 预后基因组学; 生物信息学
journal: medRxiv : the preprint server for health sciences
translated_abstract:
克隆复合体180（CC180）目前是血清型3肺炎链球菌（Spn）的主要克隆株。尽管疫苗中包含多糖成分，但13价肺炎球菌结合疫苗（PCV13）对血清型3没有显著的效力。有假设认为PCV13可能有效控制CC180中的Clade I，但Clades III和IV具有抗药性，导致种群结构变化，从而使血清型3得以持续存在。这种情况在美国、英国和威尔士被观察到，但在西班牙却没有。我们利用葡萄牙的数据集进一步测试了这一假设。  
方法：我们对1999年至2020年间从葡萄牙肺炎链球菌感染患者中分离出的501株血清型3菌株进行了全基因组测序（WGS）。这些草图基因组经过系统发育分析、泛基因组分析以及全基因组关联研究（GWAS）。此外，我们还完成了抗生素敏感性测试，并整合了超过2600个血清型3多 locus 序列类型180（MLST180）的WGS数据以进行全球比较基因组学分析。  
结果：在非侵入性肺炎分离株与侵袭性疾病分离株之间（Fisher精确检验，P=0.29），以及成人病例与儿童病例之间（Fisher精确检验，P=0.074），CC180 Clades I、II、III、IV和VI的分布相似。PCV13接种后，血清型3的CC发生了变化（Fisher精确检验，P<0.0001），Clade I成为主导。Clade I主要对抗生素敏感，并携带phiOXC141前噬菌体，但其泛基因组异质性较高。葡萄牙和西班牙的菌株在PCV13接种后Clade I仍占主导地位，其泛基因组较大，并与两个编码假想蛋白的基因的存在相关。  
解释：尽管受到前噬菌体负担和抗生素敏感性的限制，PCV13接种后Clade I在葡萄牙仍成为主导。辅助基因组内容可能缓解了这些适应性成本。Clade I流行率和泛基因组异质性的区域差异表明，克隆动态并非理解血清型3疫苗逃逸现象的一般化方法。  
资金来源：美国国立儿童健康与人类发展研究所、辉瑞公司和默克公司。
authors: Stanley Sydney; Silva-Costa Catarina; Gomes-Silva Joana; Melo-Cristino Jose; Malley Richard; Ramirez Mario
title: CC180 clade dynamics do not universally explain Streptococcus pneumoniae serotype 3 persistence post-vaccine: a global comparative population genomics study.
keywords: (Auto-generated) Streptococcus pneumoniae; serotype 3; CC180 clade; PCV13 vaccine; population genomics; antibiotic susceptibility; pangenome; 假设蛋白编码基因; 预后基因组学; 生物信息学
translated_title: 一项全球比较群体基因组学研究
abstract: Background Clonal complex 180 (CC180) is currently the major clone of serotype 3 Streptococcus pneumoniae (Spn). The 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine (PCV13) does not have significant efficacy against serotype 3 despite polysaccharide inclusion in the vaccine. It was hypothesized that PCV13 may effectively control Clade I of CC180 but that Clades III and IV are resistant, provoking a population shift that enables serotype 3 persistence. This has been observed in the United States, England, and Wales but not Spain. We tested this hypothesis further utilizing a dataset from Portugal. Methods We whole-genome sequenced (WGS) 501 serotype 3 strains from Portugal isolated from patients with pneumococcal infections between 1999-2020. The draft genomes underwent phylogenetic analyses, pangenome profiling, and a genome-wide association study (GWAS). We also completed antibiotic susceptibility testing and compiled over 2,600 serotype 3 multilocus sequence type 180 (MLST180) WGSs to perform global comparative genomics. Findings CC180 Clades I, II, III, IV, and VI distributions were similar when comparing non-invasive pneumonia isolates and invasive disease isolates (Fisher's exact test, P=0.29), and adult and pediatric cases (Fisher's exact test, P=0.074). The serotype 3 CCs shifted post-PCV13 (Fisher's exact test, P<0.0001) and Clade I became dominant. Clade I is largely antibiotic-sensitive and carries the phiOXC141 prophage but the pangenome is heterogenous. Strains from Portugal and Spain, where Clade I remains dominant post-PCV13, have larger pangenomes and are associated with the presence of two genes encoding hypothetical proteins. Interpretation Clade I became dominant in Portugal post-PCV13, despite the burden of the prophage and antibiotic sensitivity. The accessory genome content may mitigate these fitness costs. Regional differences in Clade I prevalence and pangenome heterogeneity suggest that clade dynamics is not a generalizable approach to understanding serotype 3 vaccine escape. Funding National Institute of Child Health and Human Development, Pfizer, and Merck Sharp & Dohme.

translated_keywords: 超毒力；尿路致病菌；泛基因组；克雷伯菌属；基因型-表型关联
translated_abstract: 由耐药且毒力较强的肺炎克雷伯菌（K. pneumoniae）引起的尿路感染（UTI）正成为一个日益严重的问题。理解其基因组并验证基因组特征，同时结合泛基因组分析，有助于对肺炎克雷伯菌高风险克隆进行监测，从而为早期检测和管理策略提供支持。本研究旨在探讨肺炎克雷伯菌属的耐药组与表型抗微生物耐药性以及毒力组与致病性的相关性。研究目标是完成肺炎克雷伯菌属的全基因组测序，并分析耐药组与表型抗微生物耐药性及毒力组与致病性的相关性。为了了解肺炎克雷伯菌属的耐药组、泛基因组和毒力组，使用了ResFinder、CARD、IS Finder、PlasmidFinder、PHASTER、Roary和VFDB等工具。表型敏感性分析显示尿路致病性kp3表现出多重药物耐药性。耐药组和体外抗微生物分析表明，所有测试抗生素均与研究菌株一致。未观察到任何测试分离株的高黏液表型；这一表型特征与rmpA和magA基因的缺失完全吻合。据我们所知，这是首次报道在肺炎克雷伯菌基因组中存在鼠伤寒沙门氏菌血清型Typhimurium的主要菌毛操纵子ste、stf、stc和sti。研究发现肺炎克雷伯菌属的毒力组与其毒力之间存在不一致性。全基因组分析和表型相关性确定尿路致病性肺炎克雷伯菌kp3为碳青霉烯类耐药且具有毒力的病原体。肺炎克雷伯菌的泛基因组呈开放状态，表明其具有较高的遗传多样性。观察到了多种K血清型。序列分型揭示了导管相关尿路感染患者中肺炎克雷伯菌高风险克隆的流行情况。研究还强调了耐药组与体外敏感性测试的一致性。尤为重要的是，研究指出了毒力组和表型毒力标志物对于及时诊断和治疗高风险肺炎克雷伯菌克隆的重要性。
authors: Sundaresan Abhirami Krishnamoorthy; Gangwar Jaya; Murugavel Aravind; Malli Mohan Ganesh Babu; Ramakrishnan Jayapradha
title: Complete genome sequence, phenotypic correlation and pangenome analysis of uropathogenic Klebsiella spp.
keywords: Hypervirulence; Uropathogen; Pangenome; Klebsiella spp.,; Genotype-Phenotype association
translated_title: 尿路致病 Klebsiella spp. 的全基因组序列、表型相关性及泛基因组分析
abstract: Urinary tract infections (UTI) by antibiotic resistant and virulent K. pneumoniae are a growing concern. Understanding the genome and validating the genomic profile along with pangenome analysis will facilitate surveillance of high-risk clones of K. pneumoniae to underpin management strategies toward early detection. The present study aims to correlate resistome with phenotypic antimicrobial resistance and virulome with pathogenicity in Klebsiella spp. The present study aimed to perform complete genome sequences of Klebsiella spp. and to analyse the correlation of resistome with phenotypic antimicrobial resistance and virulome with pathogenicity. To understand the resistome, pangenome and virulome in the Klebsiella spp, the ResFinder, CARD, IS Finder, PlasmidFinder, PHASTER, Roary, VFDB were used. The phenotypic susceptibility profiling identified the uropathogenic kp3 to exhibit multi drug resistance. The resistome and in vitro antimicrobial profiling showed concordance with all the tested antibiotics against the study strains. Hypermucoviscosity was not observed for any of the test isolates; this phenotypic character matches perfectly with the absence of rmpA and magA genes. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first report on the presence of ste, stf, stc and sti major fimbrial operons of Salmonella enterica serotype Typhimurium in K. pneumoniae genome. The study identifies the discordance of virulome and virulence in Klebsiella spp. The complete genome analysis and phenotypic correlation identify uropathogenic K. pneumoniae kp3 as a carbapenem-resistant and virulent pathogen. The Pangenome of K. pneumoniae was open suggesting high genetic diversity. Diverse K serotypes were observed. Sequence typing reveals the prevalence of K. pneumoniae high-risk clones in UTI catheterised patients. The study also highlights the concordance of resistome and in vitro susceptibility tests. Importantly, the study identifies the necessity of virulome and phenotypic virulence markers for timely diagnosis and immediate treatment for the management of high-risk K. pneumoniae clones.
affiliations: Actinomycetes Bioprospecting Lab, Centre for Research in Infectious Diseases (CRID), School of Chemical and Biotechnology (SCBT), SASTRA Deemed University, Tirumalaisamudram, Thanjavur, 613401, Tamil Nadu, India.; Microbial Omics Lab, Centre for Research in Infectious Diseases (CRID), School of Chemical and Biotechnology (SCBT), SASTRA Deemed University, Tirumalaisamudram, Thanjavur, 613401, Tamil Nadu, India.; Center for Tropical and Emerging Global Diseases (CTEGD), University of Georgia, Georgia, Athens, United States of America.; Actinomycetes Bioprospecting Lab, Centre for Research in Infectious Diseases (CRID), School of Chemical and Biotechnology (SCBT), SASTRA Deemed University, Tirumalaisamudram, Thanjavur, 613401, Tamil Nadu, India. antibioticbiology@gmail.com.

translated_keywords: 孟德尔随机化；泛基因组；全基因组关联分析（GWAS）；人类生物样本库计划（HuBMAP）；全基因组测序
translated_abstract: 全基因组关联研究（GWAS）在揭示各种特征和疾病的遗传结构方面发挥了重要作用。尽管GWAS取得了成功，但其固有的局限性，如识别稀有和超稀有变异、潜在的虚假关联以及确定因果因素的能力不足，可能会影响诊断能力。本文综述了GWAS，并重点介绍了遗传学领域的一些最新进展，这些进展采用了多种方法，包括全基因组测序（WGS）、孟德尔随机化（MR）、高质量的泛基因组T2T-CHM13面板以及人类生物分子图谱计划（HuBMAP），作为推动当前和未来GWAS研究的潜在工具。现有文献表明，这些技术能够增强GWAS的统计功效。WGS以其全面的方法捕获整个基因组，超越了传统GWAS技术仅关注预定义单核苷酸多态性（SNP）位点的能力。泛基因组的T2T-CHM13面板采用整体方法，有助于分析高序列同一性的区域，如片段重复（SD）。孟德尔随机化提高了因果推断的能力，改善了临床诊断并促进了明确结论的得出。此外，空间生物学技术如HuBMAP，能够在单细胞分辨率下对组织进行三维分子测绘，为复杂特征的病理提供见解。本研究旨在阐明并倡导这些技术的更广泛应用，强调它们塑造GWAS研究未来的潜力。
authors: Omidiran Oluwaferanmi; Patel Aashna; Usman Sarah; Mhatre Ishani; Abdelhalim Habiba; DeGroat William; Narayanan Rishabh; Singh Kritika; Mendhe Dinesh; Ahmed Zeeshan
title: GWAS advancements to investigate disease associations and biological mechanisms.
keywords: Mendelian Randomization; Pangenome; GWAS; HuBMAP; Whole Genome Sequencing
translated_title: 全基因组关联研究在探索疾病关联与生物学机制方面的进展
abstract: Genome-wide association studies (GWAS) have been instrumental in elucidating the genetic architecture of various traits and diseases.
