translated_keywords: 植原体；植物病毒；寄生植物；吸器
translated_abstract: 寄生植物是一类半寄生或全寄生的特殊植物，具有从其他植物中提取水分、矿物质和有机化合物的能力。所有寄生植物，无论是根寄生还是茎寄生、半寄生还是全寄生，都通过一种高度特化的器官——吸器，与宿主植物建立维管连接。除了是营养物质提取的器官外，吸器连接还充当了各种大分子（包括DNA、蛋白质以及显然还有植物病原体）的传输通道。至少一些寄生植物被视为重要的农业害虫，对全球农作物产量造成了巨大损失。它们的负面影响主要表现为直接消耗宿主植物的适应力，导致生长减缓及种子/果实形成减少。此外，它们可能通过促进跨物种病原体传播，对农业生产构成额外威胁。本文综述了现有信息，旨在提高人们对这一较少被研究问题的认识。我们进一步探讨了某些植物病原体作为控制寄生植物及其相关病原体的有效方法的适用性，并提出了相应的控制措施。
authors: Savov Stefan; Marinova Bianka; Teofanova Denitsa; Savov Martin; Odjakova Mariela; Zagorchev Lyuben
title: Parasitic Plants-Potential Vectors of Phytopathogens.
keywords: phytoplasma; plant virus; parasitic plants; haustoria
translated_title: 寄生植物——植物病原体的潜在传播媒介
abstract: Parasitic plants represent a peculiar group of semi- or fully heterotrophic plants, possessing the ability to extract water, minerals, and organic compounds from other plants. All parasitic plants, either root or stem, hemi- or holoparasitic, establish a vascular connection with their host plants through a highly specialized organ called haustoria. Apart from being the organ responsible for nutrient extraction, the haustorial connection is also a highway for various macromolecules, including DNA, proteins, and, apparently, phytopathogens. At least some parasitic plants are considered significant agricultural pests, contributing to enormous yield losses worldwide. Their negative effect is mainly direct, by the exhaustion of host plant fitness and decreasing growth and seed/fruit formation. However, they may pose an additional threat to agriculture by promoting the trans-species dispersion of various pathogens. The current review aims to summarize the available information and to raise awareness of this less-explored problem. We further explore the suitability of certain phytopathogens to serve as specific and efficient methods of control of parasitic plants, as well as methods for control of the phytopathogens.
affiliations: Department of Biochemistry, Faculty of Biology, Sofia University "St. Kliment Ohridski", 8 Dragan Tsankov blvd., 1164 Sofia, Bulgaria.

translated_keywords: miRNA；代谢工程；植物分子生物学；CRISPR；植物化学成分
journal: Plant science : an international journal of experimental plant biology
translated_abstract: 植物次生代谢物因其广泛的药用、营养保健和工业应用而具有极大重要性。然而，在植物体内这些次生代谢物通常以极微量存在，因此在发现任何潜在代谢物后，主要制约因素是能否生成足够的材料以满足工业和治疗应用的需求。为了满足对高附加值代谢物日益增长的需求，研究者倾向于采用不同的分子方法来实现这些植物化合物的规模化和可持续生产。本文讨论了工程化这些生物活性植物化合物的新兴调控趋势，并就如何成功应用这些前沿技术将学术研究成果转化为新的工艺和产品提出了建议。
authors: Saifi Monica; Ashrafi Kudsiya; Qamar Firdaus; Abdin M Z
title: Regulatory trends in engineering bioactive-phytocompounds.
keywords: MiRNA; Metabolic Engineering; Plant Molecular Biology; CRISPR; Phytocompounds
translated_title: 生物活性植物化合物工程的监管趋势
abstract: The secondary plant metabolites are of enormous importance because of their extensive medicinal, nutraceutical, and industrial applications. In plants, these secondary metabolites are often found in extremely small amounts, therefore, following the discovery of any prospective metabolite, the main constraining element is the ability to generate enough material for use in both industrial and therapeutic settings. In order to satisfy the rising demand for value-added metabolites, researchers prefer to use different molecular approaches for scalable and sustainable production of these phytocompounds. Here, we discuss the emerging regulatory trends in engineering these bioactive-phytocompounds and provide recommendation on successful employment of these state-of-the-art technologies for translation of these academic researches into novel process and products.
affiliations: Centre for Transgenic Plant Development, Department of Biotechnology, School of Chemical and Life Sciences, Jamia Hamdard, Hamdard Nagar, New Delhi 110062, India.; Centre for Transgenic Plant Development, Department of Biotechnology, School of Chemical and Life Sciences, Jamia Hamdard, Hamdard Nagar, New Delhi 110062, India. Electronic address: mzabdin.ctpd@gmail.com.

translated_keywords: 柠檬酸杆菌；毒力；新发病原体；抗菌素耐药性；泛基因组学；医院感染；全基因组测序；比较基因组学
translated_abstract: Citrobacter werkmanii是一种在发展中国家发现的人类新兴机会性病原体，可引起伤口感染、尿路感染和血液感染。本研究对来自不同地理位置和来源的C. werkmanii菌株集合进行了比较基因组分析，以识别相关的毒力和抗菌耐药基因。泛基因组分析将所研究的C. werkmanii菌株分为五个不同的分支；后续分类确定了核心基因组中与碳水化合物和一般代谢功能相关的基因，以及壳层和云基因组中与分泌、黏附和可移动遗传元件相关的基因。最大似然系统发育树结合热图显示了不同分支菌株中存在或不存在的毒力和抗菌基因，表明这些菌株中存在与分泌系统、黏附、enterobactin和siderophore功能相关的基因。第五分支中的C. werkmanii菌株主要来源于临床样本，携带与II型和Vb型分泌系统相关的基因，以及对氨基糖苷类、β-内酰胺酶、氟喹诺酮类、酚类、甲氧苄啶、大环内酯类、磺胺类和四环素具有多重耐药性的基因。综上所述，这些比较基因组分析揭示了C. werkmanii菌株中高度致病性和多重耐药的遗传特征，表明这种共生和机会性人类病原体具有潜在的致病能力。
authors: Aguirre-Sánchez José R; Quiñones Beatriz; Ortiz-Muñoz José A; Prieto-Alvarado Rogelio; Vega-López Inés F; Martínez-Urtaza Jaime; Lee Bertram G; Chaidez Cristóbal
title: Comparative Genomic Analyses of Virulence and Antimicrobial Resistance in Citrobacter werkmanii, an Emerging Opportunistic Pathogen.
keywords: Citrobacter; virulence; emerging pathogens; antimicrobial resistance; pangenomics; nosocomial infections; whole-genome sequencing; comparative genomics
translated_title: Citrobacter werkmanii 毒力与抗菌耐药性的比较基因组分析——一种新出现的机会致病菌
abstract: Citrobacter werkmanii is an emerging and opportunistic human pathogen found in developing countries and is a causative agent of wound, urinary tract, and blood infections. The present study conducted comparative genomic analyses of a C. werkmanii strain collection from diverse geographical locations and sources to identify the relevant virulence and antimicrobial resistance genes. Pangenome analyses divided the examined C. werkmanii strains into five distinct clades; the subsequent classification identified genes with functional roles in carbohydrate and general metabolism for the core genome and genes with a role in secretion, adherence, and the mobilome for the shell and cloud genomes. A maximum-likelihood phylogenetic tree with a heatmap, showing the virulence and antimicrobial genes' presence or absence, demonstrated the presence of genes with functional roles in secretion systems, adherence, enterobactin, and siderophore among the strains belonging to the different clades. C. werkmanii strains in clade V, predominantly from clinical sources, harbored genes implicated in type II and type Vb secretion systems as well as multidrug resistance to aminoglycoside, beta-lactamase, fluoroquinolone, phenicol, trimethoprim, macrolides, sulfonamide, and tetracycline. In summary, these comparative genomic analyses have demonstrated highly pathogenic and multidrug-resistant genetic profiles in C. werkmanii strains, indicating a virulence potential for this commensal and opportunistic human pathogen.
affiliations: Laboratorio Nacional para la Investigación en Inocuidad Alimentaria, Centro de Investigación en Alimentación y Desarrollo A.C. (CIAD), Coordinación Regional Culiacán, Culiacan 80110, Mexico.; Produce Safety and Microbiology Research Unit, Western Regional Research Center, Agricultural Research Service, U.S. Department of Agriculture, Albany, CA 94710, USA.; Parque de Innovación Tecnológica de la Universidad Autónoma de Sinaloa, Culiacan 80040, Mexico.; Departament de Genètica i de Microbiologia, Universitat Autờnoma de Barcelona, 08193 Bellaterra, Spain.

translated_keywords: 环境压力因子；表观遗传调控；表观遗传记忆；分子适应；压力缓解
journal: Biochimica et biophysica acta. General subjects
translated_abstract: 植物感知、响应并最终适应各种胁迫的能力，彰显了其非凡的韧性。在应对胁迫时，植物激活了一系列复杂的分子和生理机制，包括应激响应基因的快速激活、保护性化合物的合成、细胞过程的调控以及生长发育模式的改变，以提高其生存几率。表观遗传机制在塑造植物对环境胁迫响应的过程中起着关键作用。本文综述了表观遗传调控与植物胁迫缓解之间的复杂相互作用，深入探讨了表观遗传修饰的动态变化及其对基因表达和最终胁迫耐受性的影响。本综述汇集了当前研究进展，揭示了植物表观遗传机制在恶劣条件下蓬勃发展的潜在策略。
authors: Gaude Aishwarya Ashok; Siqueira Roxiette Heromina; Botelho Savia Bernadette; Jalmi Siddhi Kashinath
title: Epigenetic arsenal for stress mitigation in plants.
keywords: Environmental stressors; Epigenetic regulation; Epigenetic memory; Molecular adaptation; Stress mitigation
translated_title: 植物抗逆的表观遗传学武器库
abstract: Plant's ability to perceive, respond to, and ultimately adapt to various stressors is a testament to their remarkable resilience. In response to stresses, plants activate a complex array of molecular and physiological mechanisms. These include the rapid activation of stress-responsive genes, the manufacturing of protective compounds, modulation of cellular processes and alterations in their growth and development patterns to enhance their chances of survival. Epigenetic mechanisms play a pivotal role in shaping the responses of plants to environmental stressors. This review explores the intricate interplay between epigenetic regulation and plant stress mitigation. We delve into the dynamic landscape of epigenetic modifications, highlighting their influence on gene expression and ultimately stress tolerance. This review assembles current research, shedding light on the promising strategies within plants' epigenetic arsenal to thrive amidst adverse conditions.
affiliations: Discipline of Botany, School of Biological Sciences and Biotechnology, Goa University, Goa 403206, India. Electronic address: aishwarya.phd.sbsb@unigoa.ac.in.; Discipline of Botany, School of Biological Sciences and Biotechnology, Goa University, Goa 403206, India. Electronic address: roxiette.phd.bot@unigoa.ac.in.; Discipline of Botany, School of Biological Sciences and Biotechnology, Goa University, Goa 403206, India. Electronic address: saviabotelho@gmail.com.; Discipline of Botany, School of Biological Sciences and Biotechnology, Goa University, Goa 403206, India. Electronic address: siddhi@unigoa.ac.in.

translated_keywords: strigolactones; 植物激素; 环境胁迫; 抗氧化能力; 共生; abscisic acid; 氢化酶; 植物生理学; 分子生物学
translated_abstract: 非生物胁迫会损害植物的生长发育，导致作物产量低、品质差。越来越多的研究表明，独脚金内酯（SL）作为一种植物激素，可通过调控植物生理过程和基因表达来增强植物的抗逆性。本文综述了SL在盐胁迫、干旱胁迫、光胁迫、热胁迫、冷胁迫及镉胁迫下的响应及其调节作用，并探讨了SL如何缓解植物的非生物胁迫损伤，进一步介绍了SL从遗传水平上提高植物抗逆性的机制。在非生物胁迫下，外源SL类似物GR24可诱导植物体内SL的合成，而内源SL则能减轻非生物胁迫对植物造成的伤害。SL通过保护光合作用、增强植物抗氧化能力以及促进植物与丛枝菌根（AM）的共生来提高植物的抗逆性。此外，SL与脱落酸（ABA）、水杨酸（SA）、生长素、细胞分裂素（CK）、茉莉酸（JA）、过氧化氢（H₂O₂）等信号分子相互作用，共同调控植物的抗逆性。最后，本文概述了SL的重要性及其未来研究面临的挑战，以进一步阐明SL在植物应对非生物胁迫中的具体作用机制。
authors: Qi Jin; Mao Yuanzhi; Cui Jing; Lu Xuefang; Xu Junrong; Liu Yunzhi; Zhong Haini; Yu Wenjin; Li Changxia
title: The role of strigolactones in resistance to environmental stress in plants.
keywords: (Auto-generated) strigolactones; 植物激素; 环境胁迫; 抗氧化能力; 共生; abscisic acid; 氢化酶; 植物生理学; 分子生物学
translated_title: 独脚金内酯在植物抗逆境胁迫中的作用
abstract: Abiotic stress impairs plant growth and development, thereby causing low yield and inferior quality of crops. Increasing studies reported that strigolactones (SL) are plant hormones that enhance plant stress resistance by regulating plant physiological processes and gene expressions. In this review, we introduce the response and regulatory role of SL in salt, drought, light, heat, cold and cadmium stresses in plants. This review also discusses how SL alleviate the damage of abiotic stress in plants, furthermore, introducing the mechanisms of SL enhancing plant stress resistance at the genetic level. Under abiotic stress, the exogenous SL analog GR24 can induce the biosynthesis of SL in plants, and endogenous SL can alleviate the damage caused by abiotic stress. SL enhanced the stress resistance of plants by protecting photosynthesis, enhancing the antioxidant capacity of plants and promoting the symbiosis between plants and arbuscular mycorrhiza (AM). SL interact with abscisic acid (ABA), salicylic acid (SA), auxin, cytokinin (CK), jasmonic acid (JA), hydrogen peroxide (H2O2) and other signal molecules to jointly regulate plant stress resistance. Lastly, both the importance of SL and their challenges for future work are outlined in order to further elucidate the specific mechanisms underlying the roles of SL in plant responses to abiotic stress.
affiliations: College of Agriculture, Guangxi University, Nanning, China.

translated_keywords: 中间普雷沃菌；黑色普雷沃菌；牙龈卟啉单胞菌；核心基因组；泛基因组
journal: The Chinese journal of dental research
translated_abstract: 牙龈卟啉单胞菌（Porphyromonas gingivalis）、中间普雷沃氏菌（Prevotella intermedia）和黑色普雷沃氏菌（Prevotella nigrescens）。利用北京基因组学研究所开发的Pan-genome Analysis Pipeline软件（版本1.2.1），分别对66、33和5个公开可用的全基因组序列进行了泛基因组分析，这些序列分别来自牙龈卟啉单胞菌、中间普雷沃氏菌和黑色普雷沃氏菌。基于整个泛基因组以及核心基因组中的单核苷酸多态性构建了系统发育树。此外，还比较了这三种物种在核心基因组和可变基因组中毒力基因的分布与丰度。三种细菌均具有开放型泛基因组。牙龈卟啉单胞菌、中间普雷沃氏菌和黑色普雷沃氏菌的核心基因组分别包含1001、1514和1745个直系同源群，主要与基本细胞功能如代谢有关。牙龈卟啉单胞菌、中间普雷沃氏菌和黑色普雷沃氏菌的可变基因组分别由2814、2689和906个直系同源群组成，其中富集了与致病性或未知功能相关的基因。系统发育树清晰地将牙龈卟啉单胞菌、中间普雷沃氏菌和黑色普雷沃氏菌区分开来，验证了黑色色素相关物种的重新分类。此外，这三种细菌共享几乎相同的粘附、蛋白水解和宿主防御逃逸相关的毒力因子。部分毒力基因在种间保守，而另一些则属于可变基因组，可能通过水平基因转移获得。本研究表明泛基因组分析对于推断黑色色素相关物种的进化线索具有重要意义，揭示了它们的同源性和系统发育多样性。
authors: Meng Pei Qi; Zhang Qian; Ding Yun; Lin Jiu Xiang; Chen Feng
title: Evolutionary and Pan-genome Analysis of Three Important Black-pigmented Periodontal Pathogens.
keywords: Prevotella intermedia; Prevotella nigrescens; Porphyromonas gingivalis; core genome; pan-genome
translated_title: 三种重要黑化牙周病原菌的进化与泛基因组分析
abstract: To analyse the pan-genome of three black-pigmented periodontal pathogens: Porphyromonas gingivalis, Prevotella intermedia and Prevotella nigrescens. Pan-genome analyses of 66, 33 and 5 publicly available whole-genome sequences of P. gingivalis, P. intermedia and P. nigrescens, respectively, were performed using Pan-genome Analysis Pipeline software (version 1.2.1; Beijing Institute of Genomics, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing, PR China). Phylogenetic trees were constructed based on the entire pan-genome and single nucleotide polymorphisms within the core genome. The distribution and abundance of virulence genes in the core and dispensable genomes were also compared in the three species. All three species possess an open pan-genome. The core genome of P. gingivalis, P. intermedia and P. nigrescens included 1001, 1514 and 1745 orthologous groups, respectively, which were mainly related to basic cellular functions such as metabolism. The dispensable genome of P. gingivalis, P. intermedia and P. nigrescens was composed of 2814, 2689 and 906 orthologous groups, respectively, and it was enriched in genes involved in pathogenicity or with unknown functions. Phylogenetic trees presented a clear separation of P. gingivalis, P. intermedia and P. nigrescens, verifying the reclassification of the black-pigmented species. Furthermore, the three species shared almost the same virulence factors involved in adhesion, proteolysis and evasion of host defences. Some of these virulence genes were conserved across species whereas others belonged to the dispensable genome, which might be acquired through horizontal gene transfer. This study highlighted the usefulness of pan-genome analysis to infer evolutionary cues for black-pigmented species, indicating their homology and phylogenomic diversity.

translated_keywords: 原位；植物信号分子；电化学传感器；智慧农业；实时；植物学研究
translated_abstract: 植物信号分子可分为植物信使信号分子（如钙离子、过氧化氢、一氧化氮）和植物激素信号分子（如生长素（主要为吲哚-3-乙酸或IAA）、水杨酸、脱落酸、细胞分裂素、茉莉酸或甲基茉莉酸、赤霉素、油菜素内酯、独脚金内酯和乙烯），在调控植物生长发育及响应环境方面发挥着关键作用。鉴于植物信号分子在植物中的重要作用，许多检测方法被开发出来。植物信号分子的原位实时检测以及便携式传感器的发展将是植物学研究和农业技术的关键突破点。电化学方法因其操作简便、灵敏度高、选择性好等特点，为植物体内信号分子的原位实时检测提供了便捷手段。本文综述了过去十年来关于植物信号分子电化学检测的研究进展，总结了电化学传感器的各种类型电极及其多种纳米材料的应用以提高电极的选择性和灵敏度。此外，本文还通过实例介绍了电化学检测领域的当前研究趋势，并强调了电化学传感器在未来应用中的适用性和创新性，如小型化、非侵入性、长期稳定性、集成化、自动化和智能化等。总之，电化学传感器能够实现植物体内信号分子动态变化的原位、实时和智能化获取，在推动植物学基础研究和智能农业发展方面具有重要意义。
authors: Liu Wei; Zhang Zhiyao; Geng Xinliu; Tan Rong; Xu Songzhi; Sun Lijun
title: Electrochemical sensors for plant signaling molecules.
keywords: In situ; Plant signaling molecules; Electrochemical sensor; Smart agriculture; Real-time; Botanical research
translated_title: 植物信号分子的电化学传感器
abstract: Plant signaling molecules can be divided into plant messenger signaling molecules (such as calcium ions, hydrogen peroxide, Nitric oxide) and plant hormone signaling molecules (such as auxin (mainly indole-3-acetic acid or IAA), salicylic acid, abscisic acid, cytokinin, jasmonic acid or methyl jasmonate, gibberellins, brassinosteroids, strigolactone, and ethylene), which play crucial roles in regulating plant growth and development, and response to the environment. Due to the important roles of the plant signaling molecules in the plants, many methods were developed to detect them. The development of in-situ and real-time detection of plant signaling molecules and field-deployable sensors will be a key breakthrough for botanical research and agricultural technology. Electrochemical methods provide convenient methods for in-situ and real-time detection of plant signaling molecules in plants because of their easy operation, high sensitivity, and high selectivity. This article comprehensively reviews the research on electrochemical detection of plant signaling molecules reported in the past decade, which summarizes the various types electrodes of electrochemical sensors and the applications of multiple nanomaterials to enhance electrode detection selectivity and sensitivity. This review also provides examples to introduce the current research trends in electrochemical detection, and highlights the applicability and innovation of electrochemical sensors such as miniaturization, non-invasive, long-term stability, integration, automation, and intelligence in the future. In all, the electrochemical sensors can realize in-situ, real-time and intelligent acquisition of dynamic changes in plant signaling molecules in plants, which is of great significance for promoting basic research in botany and the development of intelligent agriculture.
affiliations: School of Life Sciences, Nantong University, 9 Seyuan Rd, Nantong, Jiangsu, 226019, China.; School of Life Sciences, Nantong University, 9 Seyuan Rd, Nantong, Jiangsu, 226019, China. Electronic address: slj.1226@ntu.edu.cn.

translated_keywords: 生物技术；防御机制；生物碱；抗病蛋白NBS-LRR
journal: Plant science : an international journal of experimental plant biology
translated_abstract: 在复杂的自然环境中，植物为求生存进化出了精妙而微妙的防御反应调控机制。植物特异性的防御包括疾病抗性蛋白核苷酸结合位点富含亮氨酸重复序列（NBS-LRR）蛋白以及代谢物衍生的生物碱，是这些复杂机制中的关键组分。NBS-LRR蛋白能够特异性识别病原微生物的入侵以触发免疫反应机制，而生物碱（由氨基酸或其衍生物合成）同样能够抑制病原体。本研究综述了植物保护中NBS-LRR蛋白的激活、识别及其下游信号转导，以及与生物碱相关的合成信号通路和防御调控机制。此外，我们阐明了这些植物防御分子的基本调控机制，并总结了它们在当前生物技术中的应用及未来发展的潜力。对NBS-LRR蛋白和生物碱植物抗病分子的研究可能为培育抗病作物和开发植物源农药提供理论基础。
authors: Liu Qian; Zhang Chunhong; Fang Huiyong; Yi Letai; Li Minhui
title: Indispensable biomolecules for plant defense against pathogens: NBS-LRR and "nitrogen pool" alkaloids.
keywords: Biotechnology; Defense mechanism; Alkaloids; Disease resistance protein NBS-LRR
translated_title: 植物抵御病原体的必要物质——NBS-LRR 和“氮池”生物碱。
abstract: In a complex natural environment, plants have evolved intricate and subtle defense response regulatory mechanisms for survival. Plant specific defenses, including the disease resistance protein nucleotide-binding site leucine-rich repeat (NBS-LRR) protein and metabolite derived alkaloids, are key components of these complex mechanisms. The NBS-LRR protein can specifically recognize the invasion of pathogenic microorganisms to trigger the immune response mechanism. Alkaloids, synthesized from amino acids or their derivatives, can also inhibit pathogens. This study reviews NBS-LRR protein activation, recognition, and downstream signal transduction in plant protection, as well as the synthetic signaling pathways and regulatory defense mechanisms associated with alkaloids. In addition, we clarify the basic regulation mechanism and summarize their current applications and the development of future applications in biotechnology for these plant defense molecules. Studies on the NBS-LRR protein and alkaloid plant disease resistance molecules may provide a theoretical foundation for the cultivation of disease resistant crops and the development of botanical pesticides.

translated_keywords: CRISPR/Cas9；植物生长促进 rhizobacteria (PGPR)；植物胁迫；渗透保护剂；盐胁迫
translated_abstract: 土壤盐碱化是全球关注的问题，它会降低农田作物的生长性能并加剧粮食短缺。盐胁迫对植物的离子平衡、渗透压平衡和氧化应激等多个生理功能产生不利影响。植物通过多种策略应对盐胁迫，包括渗透感知、渗透调节、离子稳态以及抗氧化物质合成等。盐胁迫不仅引发氧化胁迫，其他类型的胁迫也会如此，因此植物具有有效的抗氧化系统来对抗由胁迫产生的过量活性氧带来的负面影响。农业土壤盐分升高显著影响作物产量和植物发育，但植物具有一套已知的防御机制，通过促进次生代谢物、抗氧化剂的生成、离子稳态及脱落酸（ABA）合成等方式减轻盐胁迫的影响。为解决这一问题，亟需开发环境友好的解决方案，例如耐盐促生根际细菌、环保型添加剂以及渗透保护剂/抗氧化剂的叶面施用。最近发现，CRISPR/Cas9这一新型基因剪刀是一种有效减少盐碱土中植物盐胁迫的手段。理解这些生理和生化反应背后的机制，可能有助于未来更有效地控制作物产量。本文综述了植物针对盐胁迫诱导的抗氧化系统的研究进展，以及基于CRISPR/Cas9技术在盐胁迫下调控植物生长的适当长期策略的发展。
authors: Chauhan Prabhat K; Upadhyay Sudhir K; Tripathi Manikant; Singh Rajesh; Krishna Deeksha; Singh Sushil K; Dwivedi Padmanabh
title: Understanding the salinity stress on plant and developing sustainable management strategies mediated salt-tolerant plant growth-promoting rhizobacteria and CRISPR/Cas9.
keywords: Crispr/Cas9; PGPR; Plant stress; Osmoprotectants; Salinity
translated_title: 理解植物的盐分胁迫并开发基于耐盐促生根际细菌与CRISPR/Cas9的可持续管理策略
abstract: Soil salinity is a worldwide concern that decreases plant growth performance in agricultural fields and contributes to food scarcity. Salt stressors have adverse impacts on the plant's ionic, osmotic, and oxidative balance, as well as numerous physiological functions. Plants have a variety of coping strategies to deal with salt stress, including osmosensing, osmoregulation, ion-homeostasis, increased antioxidant synthesis, and so on. Not only does salt stress cause oxidative stress but also many types of stress do as well, thus plants have an effective antioxidant system to battle the negative effects of excessive reactive oxygen species produced as a result of stress. Rising salinity in the agricultural field affects crop productivity and plant development considerably; nevertheless, plants have a well-known copying mechanism that shields them from salt stress by facilitated production of secondary metabolites, antioxidants, ionhomeostasis, ABAbiosynthesis, and so on. To address this problem, various environment-friendly solutions such as salt-tolerant plant growth-promoting rhizobacteria, eco-friendly additives, and foliar applications of osmoprotectants/antioxidants are urgently needed. CRISPR/Cas9, a new genetic scissor, has recently been discovered to be an efficient approach for reducing salt stress in plants growing in saline soil. Understanding the processes underlying these physiological and biochemical responses to salt stress might lead to more effective crop yield control measures in the future. In order to address this information, the current review discusses recent advances in plant stress mechanisms against salinity stress-mediated antioxidant systems, as well as the development of appropriate long-term strategies for plant growth mediated by CRISPR/Cas9 techniques under salinity stress.
affiliations: Department of Environmental Science, V.B.S. Purvanchal University, Jaunpur, India.; Biotechnology Program, Dr. RamManohar Lohia Avadh University, Ayodhya, India.; Guangxi Key Laboratory of Sugarcane Genetic Improvement, Sugarcane Research Institute, Guangxi Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Nanning, China.; College of agriculture, Fisheries and Forestry, Fiji National University, Fiji.; Department of Agri-Business, V.B.S. Purvanchal University, Jaunpur, India.; Department of Plant Physiology, Institute of Agricultural Sciences, Banaras Hindu University, Varanasi, India.

translated_keywords: 气候变化；分子演化；非生物胁迫；膜转运蛋白；气孔保卫细胞；可持续植物生产；光合作用
translated_abstract: 全球气候变化正在影响植物的光合作用和蒸腾作用过程，并且对数十年来的社会政治、环境事件及决策产生影响。植物生物学和生态学的一个主要研究挑战是光合作用与环境之间的相互作用。气孔控制植物的气体交换，其进化是一项至关重要的创新，使最早的陆地植物能够成功定居于陆地环境。气孔通过与角质层、细胞间气体空间以及内皮质水传导系统的耦合，实现了植物的同水性，使植物能够在地球上适应并多样化分布。植物通过调节保卫细胞膨压（由膜转运蛋白和信号转导介导）来响应环境变化从而控制气孔运动。然而，气孔的起源、进化及其主动调控仍存在争议。我们首先回顾了气孔的进化与多样性，提供了其起源的化石和系统发育证据。我们总结了保卫细胞膜转运蛋白的功能进化背景下的气候变化和环境压力。我们的分析表明，气孔运动的核心信号元件比气孔本身更为古老，而参与气孔发育的基因则与最早的气孔共同进化而来。这些结果表明，在植物进化过程中获得了特定的气孔发育相关新基因，而调控气孔运动的基因（尤其是细胞信号通路）则是祖先遗传并被动态功能分化所利用的。这两种过程反映了陆地植物进化过程中不同的适应策略。
authors: Chen Guang; Qin Yuan; Wang Jian; Li Sujuan; Zeng Fanrong; Deng Fenglin; Chater Caspar; Xu Shengchun; Chen Zhong-Hua
title: Stomatal evolution and plant adaptation to future climate.
keywords: climate change; molecular evolution; abiotic stresses; membrane transporters; stomatal guard cell; sustainable plant production; photosynthesis
translated_title: 气孔演化与植物对未来气候的适应
abstract: Global climate change is affecting plant photosynthesis and transpiration processes, as well as increasing weather extremes impacting socio-political and environmental events and decisions for decades to come. One major research challenge in plant biology and ecology is the interaction of photosynthesis with the environment. Stomata control plant gas exchange and their evolution was a crucial innovation that facilitated the earliest land plants to colonize terrestrial environments. Stomata couple homoiohydry, together with cuticles, intercellular gas space, with the endohydric water-conducting system, enabling plants to adapt and diversify across the planet. Plants control stomatal movement in response to environmental change through regulating guard cell turgor mediated by membrane transporters and signaling transduction. However, the origin, evolution, and active control of stomata remain controversial topics. We first review stomatal evolution and diversity, providing fossil and phylogenetic evidence of their origins. We summarize functional evolution of guard cell membrane transporters in the context of climate changes and environmental stresses. Our analyses show that the core signaling elements of stomatal movement are more ancient than stomata, while genes involved in stomatal development co-evolved de novo with the earliest stomata. These results suggest that novel stomatal development-specific genes were acquired during plant evolution, whereas genes regulating stomatal movement, especially cell signaling pathways, were inherited ancestrally and co-opted by dynamic functional differentiation. These two processes reflect the different adaptation strategies during land plant evolution.
affiliations: Central Laboratory, Zhejiang Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Hangzhou, China.; College of Agriculture, Collaborative Innovation Centre for Grain Industry, Yangtze University, Jingzhou, China.; Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew, Richmond, UK.; Plants, Photosynthesis, and Soil, School of Biosciences, University of Sheffield, Sheffield, UK.; Xianghu Laboratory, Hangzhou, China.; School of Science, Western Sydney University, Penrith, Australia.; Hawkesbury Institute for the Environment, Western Sydney University, Penrith, Australia.

translated_keywords: 职业发展；植物科学；教育；研究协调网络；社区；CRISPR；植物转化；生物工程
journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology
journal_full_name: The Plant Journal: For Cell and Molecular Biology
translated_abstract: 植物转化是植物研究和作物改良的重要组成部分，但其方法仍然复杂、劳动密集且效率低下。PlantGENE 是一个由学术界、产业界、非营利研究机构以及政府组织的科学家组成的社区，致力于改进植物转化技术。PlantGENE 提供虚拟培训、互动网络研讨会，并运营一个包含职业机会、名录等资源的网站。植物科学界对 PlantGENE 表现出极大的兴趣和支持。
authors: Malzahn Aimee A; Kaeppler Heidi; Gordon-Kamm William; Lee Keunsub; Taylor Nigel; Veena Veena; Parrott Wayne; Van Eck Joyce
title: PlantGENE: Advancing plant transformation through community engagement.
keywords: career development; plant science; education; research coordination network; community; CRISPR; plant transformation; bioengineering
translated_title: 通过社区参与推动植物转化
abstract: Plant transformation is an important part of plant research and crop improvement. Transformation methods remain complex, labor intensive, and inefficient. PlantGENE is a community of scientists from academia, industry, non-profit research institutes, and government organizations working to improve plant transformation. PlantGENE hosts virtual training, interactive webinars, and a website with career opportunities, directories, and more. The plant science community has shown great interest and support for PlantGENE.
affiliations: Boyce Thompson Institute, Ithaca, New York, USA.; Department of Plant and Agroecosystems Sciences, University of Wisconsin-Madison, Madison, Wisconsin, USA.; Wisconsin Crop Innovation Center, University of Wisconsin-Madison, Madison, Wisconsin, USA.; Corteva Agriscience, Johnston, Iowa, USA.; Department of Agronomy, Iowa State University, Ames, Iowa, USA.; Donald Danforth Plant Science Center, St. Louis, Missouri, USA.; Plant Transformation Facility, Donald Danforth Plant Science Center, St. Louis, Missouri, USA.; Department of Crop & Soil Sciences, University of Georgia, Athens, Georgia, USA.; Plant Breeding & Genetics Section, Cornell University, Ithaca, New York, USA.

translated_keywords: 植物免疫;根际促生菌;生物胁迫;信号化合物;基因表达;蛋白表达;代谢途径;生物技术;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 植物与环境的相互作用，尤其是生物胁迫，在动态环境中导致作物减产，因此对全球粮食安全的重要性日益增加。理解植物对生物胁迫的响应对于减轻损害至关重要。有益微生物及其与植物的共生关系能够减少植物病原体引起的损害。其中一类是植物促生根际细菌（PGPR），它通过与生物胁迫因子和植物信号化合物相互作用显著影响植物免疫。本文综述了PGPR的种类、代谢及作用机制，包括其酶途径以及PGPR分泌的信号化合物在调控植物防御过程中基因和蛋白质表达的作用。此外，文章还将探讨PGPR与其他植物生长调节剂和信号化合物之间的互作，揭示PGPR在多种生物胁迫下（如与真菌、细菌和病毒的相互作用）对植物的生理、生化和分子层面的影响。总体而言，本文全面扩展了我们对PGPR在植物免疫中的作用及其在农业韧性和粮食安全保障中应用的认识。
authors: Kumari Rinkee; Pandey Ekta; Bushra Sayyada; Faizan Shahla; Pandey Saurabh
title: Plant Growth Promoting Rhizobacteria (PGPR) induced protection: A plant immunity perspective.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 植物免疫;根际促生菌;生物胁迫;信号化合物;基因表达;蛋白表达;代谢途径;生物技术;分子生物学
translated_title: 从植物免疫的角度出发
abstract: Plant-environment interactions, particularly biotic stress, are increasingly essential for global food security due to crop losses in the dynamic environment. Therefore, understanding plant responses to biotic stress is vital to mitigate damage. Beneficial microorganisms and their association with plants can reduce the damage associated with plant pathogens. One such group is PGPR (Plant growth-promoting rhizobacteria), which influences plant immunity significantly by interacting with biotic stress factors and plant signalling compounds. This review explores the types, metabolism, and mechanisms of action of PGPR, including their enzyme pathways and the signalling compounds secreted by PGPR that modulate gene and protein expression during plant defence. Furthermore, the review will delve into the crosstalk between PGPR and other plant growth regulators and signalling compounds, elucidating the physiological, biochemical, and molecular insights into PGPR's impact on plants under multiple biotic stresses, including interactions with fungi, bacteria, and viruses. Overall, the review comprehensively adds to our knowledge about PGPR's role in plant immunity and its application for agricultural resilience and food security.
affiliations: Environmental Physiology Laboratory, Department of Botany, Aligarh Muslim University, Aligarh, (U.P.), India.; Department of Agriculture, Guru Nanak Dev University, Amritsar, Punjab, India.

translated_keywords: 植物来源的细胞外囊泡；纳米递送；分离；功能食品成分；表面工程
translated_abstract: 植物来源的细胞外囊泡（PLEVs）作为一种天然存在的脂质双层膜结构，因其能够包封疏水和亲水化合物、保护其免受外部环境压力、实现可控释放、展现生物相容性和可降解性，而成为一种极具潜力的新型递送载体。本文综述了天然囊泡的工程化制备策略，重点关注PLEVs及其纯化和表面改造技术。此外，文章还涵盖了利用PLEVs输送活性成分作为纳米治疗系统的最新进展。同时，讨论了PLEVs的应用前景和发展潜力。期望本研究不仅能够填补关于PLEVs现有知识的空白，还能为食品科学和生物医学领域的研究人员提供有价值的指导，推动植物源性治疗方案的创新突破。
authors: Wu Caiyun; Li Jiaxuan; Huang Kexin; Tian Xueying; Guo Yaqiong; Skirtach Andre G; You Mingliang; Tan Mingqian; Su Wentao
title: Advances in preparation and engineering of plant-derived extracellular vesicles for nutrition intervention.
keywords: Plant-derived extracellular vesicles; Nano-delivery; Separation; Functional food components; Surface engineering
translated_title: 植物来源细胞外囊泡的制备与工程化改造在营养干预中的研究进展
abstract: Plant-derived extracellular vesicles (PLEVs), as a type of naturally occurring lipid bilayer membrane structure, represent an emerging delivery vehicle with immense potential due to their ability to encapsulate hydrophobic and hydrophilic compounds, shield them from external environmental stresses, control release, exhibit biocompatibility, and demonstrate biodegradability. This comprehensive review analyzes engineering preparation strategies for natural vesicles, focusing on PLEVs and their purification and surface engineering. Furthermore, it encompasses the latest advancements in utilizing PLEVs to transport active components, serving as a nanotherapeutic system. The prospects and potential development of PLEVs are also discussed. It is anticipated that this work will not only address existing knowledge gaps concerning PLEVs but also provide valuable guidance for researchers in the fields of food science and biomedical studies, stimulating novel breakthroughs in plant-based therapeutic options.
affiliations: State Key Lab of Marine Food Processing & Safety Control, Dalian Polytechnic University,Dalian,China; Academy of Food Interdisciplinary Science, School of Food Science and Technology, Dalian Polytechnic University, Dalian, China; National Engineering Research Center of Seafood, Dalian Polytechnic University, Dalian, China.; Department of R&D, Hangzhou AimingMed Medical Technology Co., Ltd., China. Electronic address: suwentao2020@yeah.net.

translated_keywords: 植物组织；高分辨率显微镜；纳米颗粒定位；电子显微镜；纳米材料
journal: Plant science : an international journal of experimental plant biology
translated_abstract: 纳米技术通过基于纳米材料的产品带来了显著的进步，但这些材料在环境中的积累及其对生物潜在毒性的担忧仍然存在。植物能够吸收纳米材料（NMs），这可能会引起其生理和形态的变化。另一方面，纳米颗粒（NPs）已被用于农业中通过将其纳入农用化学品来促进植物生长和控制害虫。纳米材料在植物组织内的相互作用、内化和积累所面临的挑战是巨大的，主要是由于纳米材料的各种特性以及缺乏可靠的分析工具。随着我们对纳米材料与植物细胞之间相互作用的认识不断加深，我们可以设计出定制化、靶向性和安全性更高的新型纳米材料，从而最大限度地减少纳米材料对环境的影响。本文综述并比较了用于研究植物细胞壁中纳米材料的主要显微镜技术、光谱方法以及远场超分辨方法。
authors: Pinheiro Sergimar Kennedy de Paiva; Pontes Montcharles da Silva; Miguel Thaiz Batista Azevedo Rangel; Grillo Renato; Souza Filho Antonio Gomes de; Miguel Emilio de Castro
title: Nanoparticles and plants: A focus on analytical characterization techniques.
keywords: Plant tissue; High-resolution microscopy; Nanoparticle mapping; Electron microscopy; Nanomaterials
translated_title: 聚焦于分析表征技术
abstract: Nanotechnology has brought about significant progress through the use of goods based on nanomaterials. However, concerns remain about the accumulation of these materials in the environment and their potential toxicity to living organisms. Plants have the ability to take in nanomaterials (NMs), which can cause changes in their physiology and morphology. On the other hand, nanoparticles (NPs) have been used to increase plant development and control pests in agriculture by including them into agrochemicals. The challenges of the interaction, internalization, and accumulation of NMs within plant tissues are enormous, mainly because of the various characteristics of NMs and the absence of reliable analytical tools. As our knowledge of the interactions between NMs and plant cells expands, we are able to create novel NMs that are tailored, targeted, and designed to be safe, thus minimizing the environmental consequences of nanomaterials. This review provides a thorough examination and comparison of the main microscopy techniques, spectroscopic methods, and far-field super-resolution methodologies used to examine nanomaterials within the cell walls of plants.
affiliations: Biomaterials Laboratory, Department of Metallurgical Engineering and Materials and Analytical Center, Federal University of Ceará (UFC), Fortaleza, CE, Brazil.; Optics and Photonics Group, SISFOTON Lab, Institute of Physics, Federal University of Mato Grosso do Sul (UFMS), Campo Grande, MS, Brazil.; Biotechnology Laboratory, Food Engineering Department, Federal University of Ceará (UFC), Fortaleza, CE, Brazil.; Environmental Nanochemistry Group, Department of Physics and Chemistry, São Paulo State University (UNESP), Ilha Solteira, SP, Brazil.; Departament of Physics, Center of Science, Federal University of Ceará (UFC), Fortaleza, CE, Brazil.; Biomaterials Laboratory, Department of Metallurgical Engineering and Materials and Analytical Center, Federal University of Ceará (UFC), Fortaleza, CE, Brazil. Electronic address: emiliomiguel@ufc.br.

translated_keywords: pH值；信号通路；串扰；RALF（快速碱化因子）；碱化；植物发育；胁迫；受体激酶
journal: Plant science : an international journal of experimental plant biology
translated_abstract: 植物生长于高度动态的环境中，需要迅速响应各种环境刺激，以维持其最佳生长发育状态。一种小分子植物肽——快速碱化因子（RALF），能够迅速提高植物细胞胞外基质的pH值。RALF通常与其相应的受体共同发挥作用。从机制上讲，在植物生长发育的关键时期或在不同外部环境因素的作用下，会诱导并释放有效量的RALF。近期研究还强调了RALF多肽作为植物细胞间通讯的重要调节因子的作用，并揭示其在信号感知以及作为质膜表面不同受体激酶配体方面的功能，从而整合多种环境信号。在此背景下，通过遗传学手段解决作物适应当前气候变化下各种恶劣环境问题，理解上述过程的细节至关重要。本文综述了关于RALF多肽结构与多样性及其在植物发育和逆境响应中的作用的现有知识，同时指出了尚未回答的问题和待解决的问题。
authors: Liu Lining; Liu Xing; Bai Zhenkun; Tanveer Mohsin; Zhang Yujing; Chen Wenjie; Shabala Sergey; Huang Liping
title: Small but powerful: RALF peptides in plant adaptive and developmental responses.
keywords: PH value; Signaling pathway; Crosstalk; RALF; Alkalinization; Plant development; Stress; Receptor kinase
translated_title: RALF多肽在植物适应性和发育响应中的作用。
abstract: Plants live in a highly dynamic environment and require to rapidly respond to a plethora of environmental stimuli, so that to maintain their optimal growth and development. A small plant peptide, rapid alkalization factor (RALF), can rapidly increase the pH value of the extracellular matrix in plant cells. RALFs always function with its corresponding receptors. Mechanistically, effective amount of RALF is induced and released at the critical period of plant growth and development or under different external environmental factors. Recent studies also highlighted the role of RALF peptides as important regulators in plant intercellular communications, as well as their operation in signal perception and as ligands for different receptor kinases on the surface of the plasma membrane, to integrate various environmental cues. In this context, understanding the fine-print of above processes may be essential to solve the problems of crop adaptation to various harsh environments under current climate trends scenarios, by genetic means. This paper summarizes the current knowledge about the structure and diversity of RALF peptides and their roles in plant development and response to stresses, highlighting unanswered questions and problems to be solved.
affiliations: International Research Center for Environmental Membrane Biology, Foshan University, Foshan, China.; Xinjiang Institute of Ecology and Geography, Chinese Academy of Sciences, Urumqi, China.; International Research Center for Environmental Membrane Biology, Foshan University, Foshan, China; School of Biological Science, University of Western Australia, Crawley, Perth, Australia. Electronic address: Seregy.Shabala@uwa.edu.au.; International Research Center for Environmental Membrane Biology, Foshan University, Foshan, China. Electronic address: liphuang@fosu.edu.cn.

translated_keywords: 环境；毒性；生物体；生物降解；除草剂；污染
translated_abstract: 除草剂的无序使用已导致非靶标生物出现不良影响，这在科学文献中有相关记录。然而，仍需进一步研究这些化学物质对环境的影响，以填补该领域的知识空白。
authors: Baćmaga Małgorzata; Wyszkowska Jadwiga; Kucharski Jan
title: Environmental Implication of Herbicide Use.
keywords: environmental; toxicity; organisms; biodegradation; herbicides; contamination
translated_title: 除草剂使用带来的环境影响
abstract: One of the guiding principles of the sustainable use of herbicides is their targeted action exclusively against weeds, consisting of blocking photosynthesis and synthesis of amino acids and growth regulators. Herbicides are major elements of plant production, indispensable to the functioning of modern agriculture. Nevertheless, their influence on all elements of the natural environment needs to be continuously controlled. This review article summarizes research addressing the effects of herbicides on the natural environment and the changes they trigger therein. Herbicides, applied to protect crops against weed infestation, are usually mixtures of various active substances; hence, it is generally difficult to analyze their impact on the environment and organisms. Nonetheless, an attempt was made in this review to discuss the effects of selected herbicides on individual elements of the natural environment (water, soil, and air) and organisms (humans, animals, plants, and microorganisms). In addition, the article presents examples of the biodegradation of selected herbicides and mechanisms of their degradation by bacteria and fungi. Based on this information, it can be concluded that the uncontrolled use of herbicides has led to adverse effects on non-target organisms, as documented in the scientific literature. However, further research on the environmental effects of these chemicals is needed address the missing knowledge on this subject.
affiliations: Department of Soil Science and Microbiology, Faculty of Agriculture and Forestry, University of Warmia and Mazury in Olsztyn, Łódzki 3 Sq., 10-719 Olsztyn, Poland.

translated_keywords: 组蛋白乙酰化；表观遗传工程；DNA甲基化；胁迫耐受性
journal: Plant science : an international journal of experimental plant biology
translated_abstract: 重金属和类金属胁迫对植物生态系统的威胁日益加剧，迫切需要创新策略来增强植物的抗逆性和保障农业的可持续发展。本文综述了通过表观遗传途径提高植物对有毒重金属和类金属胁迫耐受性的研究进展，提供了重要的见解。表观遗传修饰，包括脱氧核糖核酸（DNA）甲基化、组蛋白修饰以及小核糖核酸（RNA）工程，为调整植物响应以减轻重金属和类金属胁迫的影响提供了创新路径。高通量基因组测序和功能基因组学技术的进步揭示了表观遗传调控在应对重金属和类金属污染中的复杂机制。该领域的最新进展包括鉴定与胁迫耐受相关的特定表观遗传标记、开发表观基因组编辑工具以及将表观遗传数据整合到抗逆作物育种计划中。理解表观遗传与胁迫响应之间的动态相互作用具有巨大的潜力，可培育出能在重金属和类金属污染环境中茁壮成长的抗逆作物。最终，利用表观遗传策略为面对日益严峻环境挑战的可持续农业开辟了光明前景。随着植物表观基因组学的发展，采用先进的表观遗传方法实现可持续农业的潜力愈发显现。这些进展奠定了理解表观遗传学在植物胁迫生物学中日益增长的重要性及其减轻全球农业中重金属和类金属污染有害影响潜力的基础。
authors: Iqbal Babar; Ahmad Naveed; Li Guanlin; Jalal Arshad; Khan Ali Raza; Zheng Xiaojun; Naeem Muhammad; Du Daolin
title: Unlocking plant resilience: Advanced epigenetic strategies against heavy metal and metalloid stress.
keywords: Histone acetylation; Epigenetic engineering; DNA methylation; Stress tolerance
translated_title: 针对重金属和类金属胁迫的先进表观遗传策略
abstract: The escalating threat of heavy metal and metalloid stress on plant ecosystems requires innovative strategies to strengthen plant resilience and ensure agricultural sustainability. This review provides important insights into the advanced epigenetic pathways to improve plant tolerance to toxic heavy metals and metalloid stress. Epigenetic modifications, including deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) methylation, histone modifications, and small ribonucleic acid (RNA) engineering, offer innovative avenues for tailoring plant responses to mitigate the impact of heavy metal and metalloid stress. Technological advancements in high-throughput genome sequencing and functional genomics have unraveled the complexities of epigenetic regulation in response to heavy metal and metalloid contamination. Recent strides in this field encompass identifying specific epigenetic markers associated with stress resilience, developing tools for editing the epigenome, and integrating epigenetic data into breeding programs for stress-resistant crops. Understanding the dynamic interaction between epigenetics and stress responses holds immense potential to engineer resilient crops that thrive in environments contaminated with heavy metals and metalloids. Eventually, harnessing epigenetic strategies presents a promising trajectory toward sustainable agriculture in the face of escalating environmental challenges. Plant epigenomics expands, the potential for sustainable agriculture by implementing advanced epigenetic approaches becomes increasingly evident. These developments lay the foundation for understanding the growing significance of epigenetics in plant stress biology and its potential to mitigate the detrimental effects of heavy metal and metalloid pollution on global agriculture.
affiliations: School of Environment and Safety Engineering, Jiangsu University, Zhenjiang 212013, China.; Joint Center for Single Cell Biology, Shanghai Collaborative Innovation Center of Agri-Seeds, School of Agriculture and Biology, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, Shanghai 200240, China.; School of Environment and Safety Engineering, Jiangsu University, Zhenjiang 212013, China; Jiangsu Collaborative Innovation Center of Technology and Material of Water Treatment, Suzhou University of Science and Technology, Suzhou 215009, China.; Center for Desert Agriculture, King Abdullah University of Science and Technology, Thuwal 23955-6900, Saudi Arabia; School of Engineering, Department of Plant Health, Rural Engineering and Soils, São Paulo State University - UNESP-FEIS, Ilha Solteira, São Paulo 15385-000, Brazil.; Department of Plant Science, School of Agriculture and Biology, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, Shanghai 200240, China. Electronic address: mnaeem@sjtu.edu.cn.; Jingjiang College, Institute of Environment and Ecology, School of Emergency Management, School of Environment and Safety Engineering, School of Agricultural Engineering, Jiangsu University, Zhenjiang 212013, China. Electronic address: ddl@ujs.edu.cn.

translated_keywords: 植物能动性；学习；植物通讯；植物行为；记忆
translated_abstract: 新近发现的植物行为，结合历史观察、当代技术以及对信号机制的新兴认识，表明植物利用了复杂的信息处理系统。从进化的和生理学的意义上来看，植物具有目标导向性；它们表现出自主性和学习能力。尽管大多数关于植物可塑性、学习和记忆的研究集中在单个植物对资源可用性和生物胁迫的响应上，但适应性信息往往是从邻近植物感知并协调的，同时在有限资源的竞争中进行交互。基于现有知识、技术和可持续发展原则，气候智能型农业实践正在被采纳以增强作物的韧性和生产力。深入理解植物行为的动力学，为改善自然生态系统和农业生态系统的生产力和健康状况提供了丰富的潜在改良策略。
authors: Novoplansky A; Souza G M; Brenner E D; Bhatla S C; Van Volkenburgh E
title: Exploring the complex information processes underlying plant behavior.
keywords: plant agency; Learning; plant communication; plant behavior; memory
translated_title: 探究植物行为背后的复杂信息过程
abstract: Newly discovered plant behaviors, linked to historical observations, contemporary technologies, and emerging knowledge of signaling mechanisms, argue that plants utilize complex information processing systems. Plants are goal-oriented in an evolutionary and physiological sense; they demonstrate agency and learning. While most studies on plant plasticity, learning, and memory deal with the responsiveness of individual plants to resource availability and biotic stresses, adaptive information is often perceived from and coordinated with neighboring plants, while competition occurs for limited resources. Based on existing knowledge, technologies, and sustainability principles, climate-smart agricultural practices are now being adopted to enhance crop resilience and productivity. A deeper understanding of the dynamics of plant behavior offers a rich palette of potential amelioration strategies for improving the productivity and health of natural and agricultural ecosystems.
affiliations: Mitrani Department of Desert Ecology, Blaustein Institutes for Desert Research, Ben-Gurion University of the Negev, Midreshet Ben-Gurion, Israel.; Department of Botany, Institute of Biology - Section of Plant Physiology, Federal University of Pelotas, Pelotas, RS, Brazil.; Department of Biology, Pace University, New York, New York, USA.; Department of Botany, University of Delhi, New Delhi, Delhi, India.; Department of Biology, University of Washington, Seattle, WA, USA.

translated_keywords: 干旱胁迫；盐胁迫；淹水胁迫；金属胁迫；冷胁迫；基因；低光胁迫；细胞信号传导
translated_abstract: 在本综述中，我们讨论了通过膜转运蛋白介导的植物耐受非生物胁迫的详细信号级联以及其在气候韧性作物发育中的潜在重要应用。植物转运蛋白在养分吸收、细胞平衡和胁迫响应中发挥着重要作用。它们通过信号转导、渗透调节和离子稳态促进植物膜内外化学物质和信号的交换。因此，研究植物转运蛋白对于理解植物胁迫耐受机制至关重要。这些转运蛋白在提高作物抗逆性的育种工作中具有潜在应用价值。本文探讨了不同转运蛋白家族（如ABC、MATE、NRAMP、NRT、PHT、ZIP）的功能，包括它们在非生物胁迫耐受性和植物发育中的作用。此外，我们强调了转运蛋白在植物应对干旱、低温、盐害、重金属毒性、低光、淹水和营养缺乏等非生物胁迫中的重要性，并讨论了参与多种植物胁迫响应的转运蛋白通路和过程。本综述讨论了近年来关于膜转运蛋白在拟南芥及其他作物非生物胁迫耐受性中的作用进展。综述涵盖了近年来发现的相关基因及其分子机制，这些机制提高了植物耐受非生物胁迫的能力，并探讨了通过整合膜转运蛋白与其他技术可能的未来应用。
authors: Mishra Gayatri; Mohapatra Subrat Kumar; Rout Gyana Ranjan
title: Plant membrane transporters function under abiotic stresses: a review.
keywords: Drought stress; Salinity stress; Flooding stress; Metal stress; Cold stress; Genes; Low light stress; Cell signaling
translated_title: 综述
abstract: In the present review, we discussed the detailed signaling cascades via membrane transporters that confer plant tolerance to abiotic stresses and possible significant use in plant development for climate-resilient crops. Plant transporters play significant roles in nutrient uptake, cellular balance, and stress responses. They facilitate the exchange of chemicals and signals across the plant's membrane by signal transduction, osmotic adjustment, and ion homeostasis. Therefore, research into plant transporters is crucial for understanding the mechanics of plant stress tolerance. Transporters have potential applications in crop breeding for increased stress resistance. We discuss new results about various transporter families (ABC, MATE, NRAMP, NRT, PHT, ZIP), including their functions in abiotic stress tolerance and plant development. Furthermore, we emphasize the importance of transporters in plant responses to abiotic stresses such as drought, cold, salt, and heavy metal toxicity, low light, flooding, and nutrient deficiencies. We discuss the transporter pathways and processes involved in diverse plant stress responses. This review discusses recent advances in the role of membrane transporters in abiotic stress tolerance in Arabidopsis and other crops. The review contains the genes discovered in recent years and associated molecular mechanisms that improve plants' ability to survive abiotic stress and their possible future applications by integrating membrane transporters with other technologies.
affiliations: The Department of Biological Sciences, The University of Utah, 257 1400 E, Salt Lake City, UT, 84112, USA. gayatrimishra22@gmail.com.; The Department of Agricultural Statistics, Institute of Agricultural Sciences, Siksha 'O' Anusandhan University, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, 751030, India.; The Department of Molecular Biology and Biotechnology, Institute of Agricultural Sciences, Siksha 'O' Anusandhan University, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, 751030, India. grrout@rediffmail.com.

translated_keywords: 耐受机制；缺氧胁迫；活性氧（ROS）；低氧；抗氧化剂
journal: Environmental science and pollution research international
translated_abstract: 氧气（O₂）是植物在淹水和洪涝环境生长发育的主要抑制因子。植物会经历不同的氧浓度（如常氧、低氧和无氧），这些浓度随空间和时间变化。植物已进化出多种形态、生理和生化适应机制以应对低氧胁迫，其中许多机制已被深入研究。本文综述了植物如何响应低氧这一由洪涝引起的显著胁迫。低氧胁迫从细胞、发育和环境层面影响植物。本文重点介绍了作物用于应对缺氧的遗传、分子和代谢适应策略。各种转录因子（TFs）及其基因调控机制在调节植物低氧条件下生理反应中的作用尤为突出。此外，本文指出关于植物在复氧阶段（恢复正常氧水平）的研究存在显著空白，尤其是在自然光照条件下的研究。复氧过程会带来活性氧（ROS）积累和光抑制挑战，影响低氧后植物的恢复。我们讨论了提高植物低氧耐受性的多种策略，包括传统育种、基因改造和嫁接技术，并强调需要综合理解低氧感知与响应机制。本文强调了植物对低氧适应的复杂性以及该领域持续研究的重要性，特别是在全球气候变化背景下。这对于发展可持续农业实践和确保未来粮食安全至关重要。
authors: Basit Farwa; Khalid Muhammad; El-Keblawy Ali; Sheteiwy Mohamed S; Sulieman Saad; Josko Izabela; Zulfiqar Faisal
title: Hypoxia stress: plant's sensing, responses, and tolerance mechanisms.
keywords: Tolerance mechanism; Oxygen deprivation stress; ROS; Hypoxia; Antioxidants
translated_title: 植物的感知、响应与耐受机制
abstract: Oxygen (O2) is an inhibiting factor for plant growth and development in submerged and flooding environments. Plants experience different O2 concentrations, such as normoxia, hypoxia, and anoxia, which can change over space and time. Plants have evolved various morphological, physiological, and biochemical adaptations to withstand low O2 stress, many of which have been well investigated. This review provides a detailed analysis of how plants respond to hypoxia, a significant stress factor primarily caused by flooding. Hypoxia affects plants at various cellular, developmental, and environmental levels. This review highlights genetic, molecular, and metabolic adaptations crops employ to cope with O2 deficiency. The roles of various transcription factors (TFs) and gene regulation mechanisms in enabling plants to modulate their physiological responses under hypoxic conditions are notable. The review also identifies a significant gap in research on plant responses during reoxygenation, the phase of returning to normal O2 levels, especially under natural lighting conditions. This transition poses ROS generation and photoinhibition challenges, affecting plant recovery post-hypoxia. We discuss various strategies to enhance plant hypoxia tolerance, including traditional breeding, genetic modification, and grafting techniques. It emphasizes integrating these approaches with a comprehensive understanding of hypoxia sensing and response mechanisms. We underscore the complexity of plant adaptations to hypoxia and the need for continued research in this field, especially in the face of global climate change. This is vital for developing sustainable agricultural practices and ensuring future food security.

translated_keywords: 疾病管理；木霉菌；害虫控制；内生真菌
translated_abstract: 木霉菌（Trichoderma）被广泛认为是植物健康管理中最常见的真菌生物防治剂。已有超过25个木霉菌物种经过深入研究，并显示出显著潜力，不仅能够抑制植物病原体的生长，还能控制昆虫害虫的侵害。除了作为生物杀虫剂的应用外，越来越多的证据表明，某些木霉菌物种可以通过定殖于特定植物组织而作为内生真菌发挥作用。这种定殖能够促进植物生长并提高其对非生物和生物胁迫的耐受性。在过去的几十年里，关于木霉菌内生菌在作物保护中的作用的文献数量迅速增加。尽管植物与内生真菌相互作用的机制尚未完全明了，但已有研究表明其在农业中的潜在应用，特别是在减轻植物病虫害方面。本文综述了木霉菌内生菌的多样性及其在控制作物特定病虫害方面的潜在用途。木霉菌内生菌被认为是一种潜在的解决方案，通过减少对农用化学品的依赖来降低生产成本和环境影响。
authors: Natsiopoulos Dimitrios; Topalidou Eleni; Mantzoukas Spyridon; Eliopoulos Panagiotis A
title: Endophytic Trichoderma: Potential and Prospects for Plant Health Management.
keywords: disease management; Trichoderma; pest control; endophytic fungi
translated_title: 植物健康管理水平提升的潜力与前景
abstract: The fungus Trichoderma is widely regarded as the most common fungal biocontrol agent for plant health management. More than 25 Trichoderma species have been extensively studied and have demonstrated significant potential in inhibiting not only phytopathogen growth but also insect pest infestations. In addition to their use as biopesticides, there is increasing evidence that several Trichoderma species can function as fungal endophytes by colonizing the tissues of specific plants. This colonization enhances a plant's growth and improves its tolerance to abiotic and biotic stresses. In recent decades, there has been a proliferation of literature on the role of Trichoderma endophytes in crop protection. Although the mechanisms underlying plant-fungal endophyte interactions are not yet fully understood, several studies have suggested their potential application in agriculture, particularly in the mitigation of plant pests and diseases. This review focuses on the diversity of Trichoderma endophytic strains and their potential use in controlling specific diseases and pests of crop plants. Trichoderma endophytes are considered a potential solution to reduce production costs and environmental impact by decreasing reliance on agrochemicals.
affiliations: Plant Health Management Lab, Department of Agrotechnology, University of Thessaly, 41500 Larissa, Greece.; Hellenic Agricultural Organization DIMITRA, Forest Research Institute, 57006 Thessaloniki, Greece.; Department of Agriculture, University of Ioannina, 47100 Arta, Greece.

translated_keywords: 食品加工；代谢组学；地理起源；植物性食物；品种鉴别
translated_abstract: 代谢组学作为系统研究代谢物的学科，在植物性食物的研究中发挥着关键作用，尤其是在其营养成分分析和质量控制方面。由于植物性食物具有复杂的化学组成，这导致了其感官特性和营养价值的差异。本文综述了代谢组学方法在植物性食物产地溯源、品种鉴别及加工方式研究中的应用，并探讨了面临的挑战及未来发展方向。通常情况下，结合其他组学或技术手段时，可以揭示协同互补的信息，从而提升模型的分类与预测能力。未来的研究应致力于全面评估影响食品质量的各种因素，而这需要深入探究影响机制、代谢通路以及基因表达等课题。
authors: Liang Lu; Li Yuhao; Mao Xuejin; Wang Yuanxing
title: Metabolomics applications for plant-based foods origin tracing, cultivars identification and processing: Feasibility and future aspects.
keywords: Food processing; Metabolomics; Geographical origin; Plant-based foods; Cultivars identification
translated_title: 可行性与展望
abstract: Metabolomics, the systematic study of metabolites, is dedicated to a comprehensive analysis of all aspects of plant-based food research and plays a pivotal role in the nutritional composition and quality control of plant-based foods. The diverse chemical compositions of plant-based foods lead to variations in sensory characteristics and nutritional value. This review explores the application of the metabolomics method to plant-based food origin tracing, cultivar identification, and processing methods. It also addresses the challenges encountered and outlines future directions. Typically, when combined with other omics or techniques, synergistic and complementary information is uncovered, enhancing the classification and prediction capabilities of models. Future research should aim to evaluate all factors affecting food quality comprehensively, and this necessitates advanced research into influence mechanisms, metabolic pathways, and gene expression.
affiliations: State Key Laboratory of Food Science and Resource, Nanchang University, Nanchang 30047, China.; State Key Laboratory of Food Science and Resource, Nanchang University, Nanchang 30047, China. Electronic address: maoxuejin@ncu.edu.cn.; State Key Laboratory of Food Science and Resource, Nanchang University, Nanchang 30047, China. Electronic address: yuanxingwang@ncu.edu.cn.

translated_keywords: Toggle型开关；植物合成生物学；回路；布尔逻辑门；正交控制
translated_abstract: 合成生物学的应用范围从构建简单的状态监测电路到复杂的能够重构生命某些方面的电路。后者在植物合成生物学中具有巨大潜力，可通过改革农业和提高高需求分子的产量来应对当前社会问题。因此，开发高效工具以精确控制电路中的基因表达必须优先考虑。本文综述了最近在表征、标准化以及将遗传部件组装为更高级别结构的努力，以及可用于调控植物系统转录的诱导系统的类型。随后，我们讨论了基因表达正交控制、布尔逻辑门和合成遗传翻转开关等领域的最新进展。最后，我们认为通过结合多种基因表达调控手段，可以构建出能够重塑植物生命的复杂电路。
authors: Koukara Jenny; Papadopoulou Kalliope K
title: Advances in plant synthetic biology approaches to control expression of gene circuits.
keywords: Toggle-like switches; Plant synthetic biology; Circuits; Boolean logic gates; Orthogonal control
translated_title: 植物合成生物学方法在基因回路表达调控中的进展
abstract: The applications of synthetic biology range from creating simple circuits to monitor an organism's state to complex circuits capable of reconstructing aspects of life. The latter has the potential to be used in plant synthetic biology to address current societal issues by reforming agriculture and enhancing production of molecules of increased demand. For this reason, development of efficient tools to precisely control gene expression of circuits must be prioritized. In this review, we report the latest efforts towards characterization, standardization and assembly of genetic parts into higher-order constructs, as well as available types of inducible systems to modulate their transcription in plant systems. Subsequently, we discuss recent developments in the orthogonal control of gene expression, Boolean logic gates and synthetic genetic toggle-like switches. Finally, we conclude that by combining different means of controlling gene expression, we can create complex circuits capable of reshaping plant life.
affiliations: Laboratory of Plant and Environmental Biotechnology, Department of Biochemistry and Biotechnology, University of Thessaly, Larissa, Greece.; Laboratory of Plant and Environmental Biotechnology, Department of Biochemistry and Biotechnology, University of Thessaly, Larissa, Greece. translated_keywords: 抗氧化酶；生长；重金属；氧化损伤；光合作用；褪黑素
translated_abstract: 褪黑素通过固定细胞壁中的重金属（HM）并将其隔离在根细胞液泡中，减少从根到地上部分的重金属转移，在植物应对重金属胁迫中发挥保护作用。它促进渗透调节物质的产生，提高抗氧化酶活性，并改善光合作用，从而提升细胞功能。理解由褪黑素介导的响应与信号传导机制，有助于在重金属污染土壤中持续维持作物生产。褪黑素是一种多效信号分子，在植物生长和抗逆性（尤其是对土壤中重金属的耐受性）中起着关键作用。重金属普遍存在于土壤-水环境中，容易被植物吸收，从而破坏矿物质营养平衡、渗透压平衡、氧化应激以及初级和次级代谢过程。植物通过内在防御机制如金属排除、限制叶片中金属转移、金属隔离与区室化、螯合以及抗氧化酶清除自由基等方式应对重金属胁迫。褪黑素通过固定细胞壁中的重金属并将它们隔离在根细胞液泡中，减少从根到地上部分的重金属转移，从而减轻重金属胁迫对植物的损害。这一机制提高了植物对大量元素和微量元素的吸收。此外，褪黑素还促进渗透调节物质的生成，改善植物水分关系，增加抗氧化酶活性以限制脂质过氧化和活性氧（ROS）水平。褪黑素还能减缓叶绿素降解并促进其合成，同时增强RuBisCO活性以改善光合作用。所有这些功能共同促进了暴露于重金属胁迫下的植物细胞功能的改善。本文旨在深入探讨在重金属胁迫下植物中由褪黑素介导的响应与信号传导机制，这可能对在重金属污染土壤中维持作物生产具有重要意义。
authors: Altaf Muhammad Ahsan; Sharma Nitin; Srivastava Dipali; Mandal Sayanti; Adavi Sandeep; Jena Rupak; Bairwa Rakesh Kumar; Gopalakrishnan Abilash Valsala; Kumar Awadhesh; Dey Abhijit; Lal Milan Kumar; Tiwari Rahul Kumar; Kumar Ravinder; Ahmed Parvaiz
title: Deciphering the melatonin-mediated response and signalling in the regulation of heavy metal stress in plants.
keywords: Antioxidant enzymes; Growth; Heavy metal; Oxidative damage; Photosynthesis; Melatonin
translated_title: 解析褪黑素介导的植物重金属胁迫响应与信号转导机制
abstract: Melatonin has a protective effect against heavy metal stress in plants by immobilizing HM in cell walls and sequestering them in root cell vacuoles, reducing HM's translocation from roots to shoots. It enhances osmolyte production, increases antioxidant enzyme activity, and improves photosynthesis, thereby improving cellular functions. Understanding the melatonin-mediated response and signalling can sustain crop production in heavy metal-stressed soils. Melatonin is a pleiotropic signal molecule that plays a critical role in plant growth and stress tolerance, particularly against heavy metals in soil. Heavy metals (HMs) are ubiquitously found in the soil-water environment and readily taken up by plants, thereby disrupting mineral nutrient homeostasis, osmotic balance, oxidative stress, and altered primary and secondary metabolism. Plants combat HM stress through inbuilt defensive mechanisms, such as metal exclusion, restricted foliar translocation, metal sequestration and compartmentalization, chelation, and scavenging of free radicals by antioxidant enzymes. Melatonin has a protective effect against the damaging effects of HM stress in plants. It achieves this by immobilizing HM in cell walls and sequestering them in root cell vacuoles, reducing HM's translocation from roots to shoots. This mechanism improves the uptake of macronutrients and micronutrients in plants. Additionally, melatonin enhances osmolyte production, improving the plant's water relations, and increasing the activity of antioxidant enzymes to limit lipid peroxidation and reactive oxygen species (ROS) levels. Melatonin also decreases chlorophyll degradation while increasing its synthesis, and enhances RuBisCO activity for better photosynthesis. All these functions contribute to improving the cellular functions of plants exposed to HM stress. This review aims to gain better insight into the melatonin-mediated response and signalling under HM stress in plants, which may be useful in sustaining crop production in heavy metal-stressed soils.

translated_keywords: 进化；植物激素；次生代谢；初生代谢
journal: Philosophical transactions of the Royal Society of London. Series B, Biological sciences
journal_full_name: Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society of London. Series B, Biological Sciences
translated_abstract: 植物的一个显著特征是其巨大的化学多样性。这种化学多样性主要由高度复杂且生物多样化的生化机制支撑。植物代谢酶起源于其真核和原核祖先，并通过陆地植物经历的前所未有的基因复制和功能化速率进一步多样化。与频繁发生水平基因转移以及多种能量和有机碳输入的原核微生物不同，陆地植物主要依赖于从CO₂生成的有机碳，在其近期进化历史中经历了相对较少的基因转移。因此，植物代谢网络以现有网络为基础，逐步演化，并受到各种进化限制的影响。然而，直到最近，只有少数几种代谢特征的演化得到了深入研究，代谢演化的研究也只占了发育演化等其他领域关注的一部分。然而，代谢组学和新一代测序技术的进步，最近使我们对植物初级代谢和次级代谢途径如何在自然选择和驯化及作物改良过程中演化有了更深刻的理解。本文是“植物代谢的演化”专题讨论的一部分。
authors: Fernie Alisdair R; de Vries Sophie; de Vries Jan
title: Evolution of plant metabolism: the state-of-the-art.
keywords: evolution; phytohormone; secondary metabolism; primary metabolism
translated_title: 现状
abstract: Immense chemical diversity is one of the hallmark features of plants. This chemo-diversity is mainly underpinned by a highly complex and biodiverse biochemical machinery. Plant metabolic enzymes originated and were inherited from their eukaryotic and prokaryotic ancestors and further diversified by the unprecedentedly high rates of gene duplication and functionalization experienced in land plants. Unlike prokaryotic microbes, which display frequent horizontal gene transfer events and multiple inputs of energy and organic carbon, land plants predominantly rely on organic carbon generated from CO2 and have experienced relatively few gene transfers during their recent evolutionary history. As such, plant metabolic networks have evolved in a stepwise manner using existing networks as a starting point and under various evolutionary constraints. That said, until recently, the evolution of only a handful of metabolic traits had been extensively investigated and as such, the evolution of metabolism has received a fraction of the attention of, the evolution of development, for example. Advances in metabolomics and next-generation sequencing have, however, recently led to a deeper understanding of how a wide range of plant primary and specialized (secondary) metabolic pathways have evolved both as a consequence of natural selection and of domestication and crop improvement processes. This article is part of the theme issue 'The evolution of plant metabolism'.
affiliations: Max-Planck-Institute of Molecular Plant Physiology, Am Mühlenberg 1 , Potsdam-Golm 14476, Germany.; Department of Applied Bioinformatics, University of Goettingen, Institute of Microbiology and Genetics, Goldschmidtstr. 1 , Goettingen 37077, Germany.; University of Goettingen, Campus Institute Data Science (CIDAS), Goldschmidstr. 1 , Goettingen 37077, Germany.; Department of Applied Bioinformatics, University of Goettingen, Goettingen Center for Molecular Biosciences (GZMB), Goldschmidtstr. 1 , Goettingen 37077, Germany.

translated_keywords: 真菌病原体；内生真菌；入侵植物；群落构建；生物防治；天敌释放；植物-真菌相互作用；以疾病介导的入侵
journal: Biological reviews of the Cambridge Philosophical Society
translated_abstract: 共生微生物可能影响宿主植物的生长成败、维持可生存种群的能力，以及其在原生范围之外定殖和扩散的可能性。某些或全部生命周期中无症状的细胞间和细胞内微生物共生体——内生菌——可以与宿主形成互利共生、兼性共生或致病关系，并有时与外来植物形成新的关联。真菌内生菌可能是感染植物最常见的内共生体，其生活史、形态学、生理学及与植物的共生特性与其他内生菌群体有明显区别。本文综述了真菌内生菌在植物入侵过程中的群落动态及其在入侵的不同阶段（运输、引入（定殖）、建立和扩散）中功能角色可能发生的变化。每个入侵阶段都存在独特的生态过滤器，外来植物必须克服这些过滤器才能进入下一阶段。内生菌可以交替帮助宿主克服特定阶段的过滤器，或者加剧过滤器施加的障碍（如生物抗性），从而影响入侵路径。少数真菌可以通过种子内生菌从原生范围传播并在非原生范围垂直传递给下一代，特别是在禾本科植物中。在其他植物类群中，外来植物主要通过水平传播从入侵地植物群落中获取内生菌，宿主内生菌群落受宿主筛选和生物地理因素（如散布限制、环境筛选）的影响。感染外来植物的内生菌（无论是随宿主传播还是在非原生范围积累）可能通过影响植物生长、繁殖、环境适应性以及对病原体和食草动物防御能力来影响入侵成功；然而，这些效应的方向和强度可能取决于宿主身份、生命阶段、生态条件和入侵阶段。这种情境依赖性可能导致内生菌在相同或不同宿主中转变为非内生菌（如致病菌）的功能阶段，从而改变外来-本地植物群落动态。最后，我们指出了外来宿主如何利用内生菌功能在新环境中的情境依赖性，以及在入侵的不同阶段中利用这一特性的方式。
authors: Bard Nicholas W; Cronk Quentin C B; Davies T Jonathan
title: Fungal endophytes can modulate plant invasion.
keywords: fungal pathogens; fungal endophytes; invasive plants; community assembly; biocontrol; enemy release; plant–fungal interactions; disease‐mediated invasions
translated_title: 内生真菌可调控植物入侵。
abstract: Symbiotic organisms may contribute to a host plant's success or failure to grow, its ability to maintain viable populations, and potentially, its probability of establishment and spread outside its native range. Intercellular and intracellular microbial symbionts that are asymptomatic in their plant host during some or all of their life cycle - endophytes - can form mutualistic, commensal, or pathogenic relationships, and sometimes novel associations with alien plants. Fungal endophytes are likely the most common endosymbiont infecting plants, with life-history, morphological, physiological, and plant-symbiotic traits that are distinct from other endophytic guilds. Here, we review the community dynamics of fungal endophytes during the process of plant invasion, and how their functional role may shift during the different stages of invasion: transport, introduction (colonisation), establishment, and spread. Each invasion stage presents distinct ecological filters that an alien plant must overcome to advance to the subsequent stage of invasion. Endophytes can alternately aid the host in overcoming stage-specific filters, or contribute to the barriers imposed by filters (e.g. biotic resistance), thereby affecting invasion pathways. A few fungi can be transported as seed endophytes from their native range and be vertically transmitted to future generations in the non-native range, especially in graminoids. In other plant groups, alien plants mostly acquire endophytes via horizontal transmission from the invaded plant community, and the host endophyte community is shaped by host filtering and biogeographic factors (e.g. dispersal limitation, environmental filtering). Endophytes infecting alien plants (both those transported with their host and those accumulated in the non-native range) may influence invasion success by affecting plant growth, reproduction, environmental tolerance, and pathogen and herbivory defences; however, the direction and magnitude of these effects can be contingent upon the host identity, life stage, ecological conditions, and invasion stage. This context dependence may cause endophytic fungi to shift to a non-endophytic (e.g. pathogenic) functional life stage in the same or different hosts, which can modify alien-native plant community dynamics. We conclude by identifying paths in which alien hosts can exploit the context dependency of endophyte function in novel abiotic and biotic conditions and at the different stages of invasion.
affiliations: Department of Botany, University of British Columbia, 3156-6270 University Blvd., Vancouver, British Columbia, V6T 1Z4, Canada.; Beaty Biodiversity Museum, University of British Columbia, 2212 Main Mall, Vancouver, British Columbia, V6T 1Z4, Canada.; Department of Forest & Conservation Sciences, University of British Columbia, 3041-2424 Main Mall, Vancouver, British Columbia, V6T 1Z4, Canada.

translated_keywords: 植物健康;分子分布;质谱成像;代谢物定位;农业生态;分子影像;离子化偏差;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 植物健康影响着衍生食品产品的营养质量和安全性，而这种健康状况受到与微生物共生相互作用的影响。这些相互作用会影响组织水平上的局部分子特征。因此，研究植物、微生物和基于植物的食品中分子的分布对于评估植物健康、确保进入食物供应链的农产品的安全性和质量以及规划农业管理实践至关重要。在此框架内，可以通过质谱成像（MSI）可视化植物基样本中的分子分布。本文综述了关键的MSI方法学，并强调了它们在揭示植物、微生物和食品产品中代谢物、脂质、蛋白质、色素和元素成分定位方面的作用。此外，还描述了结合其他成像技术的多模态分子成像方法的研究。文章描述了影响其在不同农食研究中适用性的各种MSI技术的优势和局限性，以支持针对特定分析的信息决策。例如，某些MSI技术需要精心准备样品，而另一些则会牺牲空间分辨率以提高通量。本综述讨论了灵敏度、电离偏差和碎片化、参考数据库以及化合物类别特异性等关键参数。随着仪器、数据分析和互补技术集成的不断改进，MSI加深了我们对农业生态系统分子生物学的理解。这反过来推动了可持续且高产的农业实践的发展。
authors: Vats Mudita; Cillero-Pastor Berta; Cuypers Eva; Heeren Ron M A
title: Mass spectrometry imaging in plants, microbes, and food: a review.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 植物健康;分子分布;质谱成像;代谢物定位;农业生态;分子影像;离子化偏差;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 综述
abstract: Plant health, which affects the nutritional quality and safety of derivative food products, is influenced by symbiotic interactions with microorganisms. These interactions influence the local molecular profile at the tissue level. Therefore, studying the distribution of molecules within plants, microbes, and plant-based food is crucial to assess plant health, ensure the safety and quality of the agricultural products that become part of our food supply, and plan agricultural management practices. Within this framework, the molecular distribution within plant-based samples can be visualized with mass spectrometry imaging (MSI). This review describes key MSI methodologies, highlighting the role they play in unraveling the localization of metabolites, lipids, proteins, pigments, and elemental components across plants, microbes, and food products. Furthermore, investigations that involve multimodal molecular imaging approaches combining MSI with other imaging techniques are described. The advantages and limitations of the different MSI techniques that influence their applicability in diverse agro-food studies are described to enable informed choices for tailored analyses. For example, some MSI technologies involve meticulous sample preparation while others compromise spatial resolution to gain throughput. Key parameters such as sensitivity, ionization bias and fragmentation, reference database and compound class specificity are described and discussed in this review. With the ongoing refinements in instrumentation, data analysis, and integration of complementary techniques, MSI deepens our insight into the molecular biology of the agricultural ecosystem. This in turn empowers the quest for sustainable and productive agricultural practices.
affiliations: Maastricht MultiModal Molecular Imaging Institute (M4i), Division of Imaging Mass Spectrometry, Maastricht University, Maastricht, the Netherlands. r.heeren@maastrichtuniversity.nl.; MERLN Institute for Technology-inspired Regenerative Medicine, Department of Cell Biology-Inspired Tissue Engineering (cBITE), Maastricht University, Maastricht, the Netherlands.

translated_keywords: 人工造林；播种；联合国生态系统恢复十年；幼苗；林业；苗圃
translated_abstract: 全球约有20亿公顷的土地退化，亟需生态修复。主动修复通常涉及植被恢复，这带来了直接播种还是种植苗圃培育幼苗的两难选择。植被恢复方法的选择可以调节植物的存活率和表现，并具有经济影响，最终反馈到我们的修复能力上。我们遵循同行评审的协议，开发了一个系统地图，以汇总、描述和分类关于播种与种植在实现修复目标方面的比较研究。我们编制了一个数据库，包含所有检索到的研究特征，可以通过该数据库搜索特定地点、栖息地、修复目标、植物材料、技术方面以及所测量结果的研究。搜索使用了八种语言，共检索到3355篇出版物，其中保留了178篇。系统地图确定了研究空白，例如缺乏全球南方国家、热带雨林以及长期研究的案例，这些都代表了扩展实地研究的机会。此外，许多研究忽略了报告一些重要的技术细节，如种子来源和苗圃栽培方法，而浇水或幼苗保护等其他方面在种植中的应用频率高于播种，这限制了我们从过去的研究中学习的能力。大多数研究关注目标植物的结果，但避免测量一般性的修复结果或经济方面的问题。这是一个重要的研究空白，因为植被恢复方法的选择很大程度上基于经济因素，而修复目标的实现不仅仅依赖于植物的建立。最后，我们发现大量研究是在温带地区和短期内（0-5年）进行的。这一研究集群呼吁未来进行深入综合分析，可能通过元分析来揭示播种与种植之间的总体平衡，并评估这种问题的回答是否受物种特性、环境特征或技术因素的影响。除了识别研究集群和空白外，系统地图数据库还允许管理者找到最相关的科学文献，以判断特定条件（如某些物种或栖息地）下播种与种植的适宜性。
authors: Lázaro-González Alba; Andivia Enrique; Hampe Arndt; Hasegawa Shun; Marzano Raffaella; Santos Ana M C; Castro Jorge; Leverkus Alexandro B
title: Revegetation through seeding or planting: A worldwide systematic map.
keywords: Reforestation; Sowing; UN Decade on ecosystem restoration; Seedling; Forestry; Nursery
translated_title: 一项全球系统性地图研究
abstract: Roughly 2 billion ha of land are degraded and in need of ecological restoration worldwide. Active restoration frequently involves revegetation, which leads to the dilemma of whether to conduct direct seeding or to plant nursery-grown seedlings. The choice of revegetation method can regulate plant survival and performance, with economic implications that ultimately feed back to our capacity to conduct restoration. We followed a peer-reviewed protocol to develop a systematic map that collates, describes and catalogues the available studies on how seeding compares to planting in achieving restoration targets. We compiled a database with the characteristics of all retrieved studies, which can be searched to identify studies of particular locations and habitats, objectives of restoration, plant material, technical aspects, and outcomes measured. The search was made in eight languages and retrieved 3355 publications, of which 178 were retained. The systematic map identifies research gaps, such as a lack of studies in the global South, in tropical rainforests, and covering a long time period, which represent opportunities to expand field-based research. Additionally, many studies overlooked reporting on important technical aspects such as seed provenance and nursery cultivation methods, and others such as watering or seedling protection were more frequently applied for planting than for seeding, which limits our capacity to learn from past research. Most studies measured outcomes related to the target plants but avoided measuring general restoration outcomes or economic aspects. This represents a relevant gap in research, as the choice of revegetation method is greatly based on economic aspects and the achievement of restoration goals goes beyond the establishment of plants. Finally, we identified a substantial volume of studies conducted in temperate regions and over short periods (0-5 y). This research cluster calls for a future in-depth synthesis, potentially through meta-analysis, to reveal the overall balance between seeding and planting and assess whether the response to this question is mediated by species traits, environmental characteristics, or technical aspects. Besides identifying research clusters and gaps, the systematic map database allows managers to find the most relevant scientific literature on the appropriateness of seeding vs. planting for particular conditions, such as certain species or habitats.

translated_keywords: 群体感应；信号传导；根际；定殖；叶际；植物-微生物互作；内生体
translated_abstract: 植物与微生物在复杂的生态系统中共存，对农业生产力具有重要影响。植物与微生物之间的相互作用可能有益或有害于植物健康，具体取决于它们之间的交互方式。微生物通过分泌影响植物细胞的蛋白质、产生抗生素或毒素等生物活性化合物以及释放如N-酰基高丝氨酸内酯类分子来协调其行为等方式与植物相互作用。此外，微生物还产生植物激素，帮助调节植物的生长和应激反应。植物则通过释放碳源、氮源、群体感应分子、肽信号以及类黄酮和独脚金内酯等次生代谢物与相关微生物进行互动。成功的化学信号交换对于维持这些关联至关重要，并对植物的生长发育具有重要意义。本文综述了调控植物-微生物相互作用的复杂信号分子和机制，阐明了化学通讯途径的关键作用。通过研究这些分子对话，本综述旨在加深我们对化学信号分子的理解，为未来利用这些网络促进农业可持续发展奠定基础。
authors: Bisht Nikita; Singh Tanya; Ansari Mohd Mogees; Chauhan Puneet Singh
title: The hidden language of plant-beneficial microbes: chemo-signaling dynamics in plant microenvironments.
keywords: Quorum sensing; Signaling; Rhizosphere; Colonization; Phyllosphere; Plant-microbe interactions; Endosphere
translated_title: 植物微环境中的化学信号动态
abstract: Plants and microorganisms coexist within complex ecosystems, significantly influencing agricultural productivity. Depending on the interaction between the plant and microbes, this interaction can either help or harm plant health. Microbes interact with plants by secreting proteins that influence plant cells, producing bioactive compounds like antibiotics or toxins, and releasing molecules such as N-acyl homoserine lactones to coordinate their behaviour. They also produce phytohormones which help regulate growth and stress responses in plants. Plants also interact with the associated microorganisms by exuding substances such as carbon and nitrogen sources, quorum-sensing molecules, peptide signals, secondary metabolites such as flavonoids and strigolactones. A successful exchange of chemical signals is essential for maintaining these associations, with significant implications for plant growth and development. This review explores the intricate array of signaling molecules and complex mechanisms governing plant-microbe interactions, elucidating the pivotal role of chemo-communication pathways. By examining these molecular dialogues, the review aims to deepen our understanding of chemo-signaling molecules, paving the way for future applications of these networks in promoting agricultural sustainability.
affiliations: CSIR-National Botanical Research Institute (CSIR-NBRI), Rana Pratap Marg, Lucknow, India.; CSIR-National Botanical Research Institute (CSIR-NBRI), Rana Pratap Marg, Lucknow, India. puneet@nbri.res.in.

translated_keywords: 硼；土壤盐胁迫；植物适应性；细胞壁重构；离子通道调控；水孔蛋白；H+-ATP酶；生物化学；植物生理学
translated_abstract: 土壤盐碱化是影响农业生产和生态系统可持续性和盈利能力的主要环境限制因素之一。虽然野生作物近缘种群对盐碱胁迫具有一定的耐受性，但在驯化过程中这种耐受性往往丧失或显著减弱。鉴于盐碱胁迫耐受性性状的遗传和生理复杂性，农艺学解决方案可能是改善作物盐碱胁迫耐受性的可行替代方法。其中一种方法是优化施肥实践，以帮助植物应对土壤中升高的盐分水平。本文综述了硼（一种必需的类金属微量元素）的可利用性与植物在整体、细胞和分子水平上对盐碱胁迫适应性反应之间的因果关系，并探讨了利用硼缓解盐碱胁迫的可能性。所涵盖的主题包括盐碱胁迫对细胞壁重塑、质膜完整性、激素信号传导以及各种介导植物离子和水分稳态的膜转运蛋白操作的影响，以及硼在调节H⁺-ATP酶活性中的作用，该酶的运作对于控制多种电压门控离子通道至关重要。此外，还讨论了硼的可用性与水孔蛋白表达模式及其功能之间的复杂关系。
authors: Qu Mei; Huang Xin; García-Caparrós Pedro; Shabala Lana; Fuglsang Anja Thoe; Yu Min; Shabala Sergey
title: Understanding the role of boron in plant adaptation to soil salinity.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 硼；土壤盐胁迫；植物适应性；细胞壁重构；离子通道调控；水孔蛋白；H+-ATP酶；生物化学；植物生理学
translated_title: 理解硼在植物适应土壤盐碱化中的作用
abstract: Soil salinity is a major environmental constraint affecting the sustainability and profitability of agricultural production systems. Salinity stress tolerance has been present in wild crop relatives but then lost, or significantly weakened, during their domestication. Given the genetic and physiological complexity of salinity tolerance traits, agronomical solutions may be a suitable alternative to crop breeding for improved salinity stress tolerance. One of them is optimizing fertilization practices to assist plants in dealing with elevated salt levels in the soil. In this review, we analyse the causal relationship between the availability of boron (an essential metalloid micronutrient) and plant's adaptive responses to salinity stress at the whole-plant, cellular, and molecular levels, and a possibility of using boron for salt stress mitigation. The topics covered include the impact of salinity and the role of boron in cell wall remodelling, plasma membrane integrity, hormonal signalling, and operation of various membrane transporters mediating plant ionic and water homeostasis. Of specific interest is the role of boron in the regulation of H+-ATPase activity whose operation is essential for the control of a broad range of voltage-gated ion channels. The complex relationship between boron availability and expression patterns and the operation of aquaporins is also discussed.
affiliations: International Research Center for Environmental Membrane Biology, Foshan University, Foshan, China.; Tasmanian Institute of Agriculture, University of Tasmania, Hobart, Australia.; Department of Plant and Environmental Sciences, University of Copenhagen, Copenhagen, Denmark.; Agronomy Department of Superior School Engineering, University of Almería, Almería, Spain.; School of Biological Sciences, University of Western Australia, Perth, Australia.

translated_keywords: 声感知；植物声学；植物-环境互作；植物-植物互作；声音模仿
journal: The Plant journal : for cell and molecular biology
journal_full_name: The Plant Journal: For Cell and Molecular Biology
