translated_abstract: 动物和昆虫通过人类耳朵难以察觉的低频或高频振动进行交流。植物和树木同样能够感知并发出声音。Khait等利用可靠的录音系统捕捉到了受压植物产生的空气传播声波。这些声音不仅帮助植物传递压力信号，还对植物防御、生长发育及抗逆性起到重要作用，同时也能作为危险逼近的预警。Demey等和其他研究者讨论了针对植物在原子和生物层面听觉能力的审计检查。他们探讨了植物声音的生物学意义、植物对声音的形态生理响应，以及植物在数米范围内产生的可听见和不可听见的空气传播声波。
authors: El-Sappah Ahmed H; Yan Kuan; Li Jia
title: RETRACTED: The plant is neither dumb nor deaf; it talks and hears.
keywords: sound perception; plant acoustics; plant‐environmental interaction; plant–plant interaction; sound imitation
translated_title: 植物既非哑巴也非聋子；它会说话且能听懂。
abstract: Animals and insects communicate using vibrations that are frequently too low or too high for human ears to detect. Plants and trees can communicate and sense sound. Khait et al. used a dependable recording system to capture airborne sounds produced by stressed plants. In addition to allowing plants to communicate their stress, sound aids in plant defense, development, and resilience. It also serves as a warning that danger is approaching. Demey et al. and others discussed the audit examinations that were conducted to investigate sound discernment in plants at the atomic and biological levels. The biological significance of sound in plants, the morphophysiological response of plants to sound, and the airborne noises that plants make and can hear from a few meters away were all discussed.
affiliations: College of Agriculture, Forestry, and Food Engineering, Yibin University, Yibin, Sichuan, China.; Department of Genetics, Faculty of Agriculture, Zagazig University, Zagazig, 44511, Egypt.

translated_keywords: 谱系注释；注释一致性；多基因组比对；注释映射；基因预测
translated_abstract: 新的基因组序列正以前所未有的速度被添加到生命之树中。其中很大一部分新基因组在系统发育上接近于先前测序和注释的基因组。在其他情况下，则需要同时注释密切相关的物种或菌株的整个分支。在后续研究中，当共享的基因结构普遍存在时，这些密切相关物种或菌株之间的差异往往成为研究的重点。本文综述了比较结构基因组注释的方法。这些方法包括经典的蛋白质序列或蛋白质特征图谱与基因组比对的方法，以及利用基因组比对进行比较基因预测的方法，后者可以同时注释单个目标基因组或所有输入基因组。我们讨论了这些方法如何依赖于基因组的系统发育位置，并就方法选择提供了建议，还通过一个例子检验了基因结构注释之间的一致性。此外，我们还提供了关于基因组注释的一般性实用建议。
authors: Nachtweide Stefanie; Romoth Lars; Stanke Mario
title: Comparative Genome Annotation.
keywords: Clade annotation; Annotation consistency; Multi-genome alignment; Annotation mapping; Gene prediction
translated_title: 比较基因组注释
abstract: Newly sequenced genomes are being added to the tree of life at an unprecedented fast pace. A large proportion of such new genomes are phylogenetically close to previously sequenced and annotated genomes. In other cases, whole clades of closely related species or strains ought to be annotated simultaneously. Often, in subsequent studies, differences between the closely related species or strains are in the focus of research when the shared gene structures prevail. We here review methods for comparative structural genome annotation. The reviewed methods include classical approaches such as the alignment of protein sequences or protein profiles against the genome and comparative gene prediction methods that exploit a genome alignment to annotate either a single target genome or all input genomes simultaneously. We discuss how the methods depend on the phylogenetic placement of genomes, give advice on the choice of methods, and examine the consistency between gene structure annotations in an example. Furthermore, we provide practical advice on genome annotation in general.
affiliations: Fraunhofer Institute for Digital Medicine MEVIS, Bremen, Germany.; , Greifswald, Germany.; Institute for Mathematics and Computer Science, Greifswald, Germany. mario.stanke@uni-greifswald.de.

translated_keywords: 植物生长调节剂;干旱胁迫;植物适应性;信号传导;代谢基因;转录因子;可持续农业;生物化学;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 随着全球气候变化加剧，各种非生物胁迫的发生频率和严重程度将对植物健康和生产力构成重大威胁。干旱胁迫（DS）作为一种严峻的障碍，通过特定的形态学、生理学、生化和分子机制扰乱植物正常功能。理解植物如何应对DS对于减轻其不利影响至关重要。在DS条件下，植物合成或积累多种植物生长调节剂（PGRs），包括植物激素、神经递质、气体信号分子和多胺等，这些物质为适应或耐受胁迫条件提供了有前景的可持续绿色化学策略。这些PGRs协调调控植物结构与功能的关键调整，激活防御系统并调节细胞水平响应、转录水平、转录因子、代谢基因以及胁迫响应候选蛋白。然而，这些分子缓解DS的效果取决于植物种类、施用的PGR剂量、处理方式、DS暴露时长及生长阶段等因素。因此，探索PGRs综合影响以提升植物适应性和DS耐受性的潜力，对全球粮食安全和可持续农业具有重要意义。本文综述了植物对DS的响应，解释了外源施用不同PGRs的潜力，剖析了PGRs之间的复杂化学关系，并探讨了利用组学方法揭示DS耐受性分子基础的可能性。本更新综述为利用各种PGRs提高DS条件下植物整体适应性提供了全面的机制见解。
authors: Raza Ali; Bhardwaj Savita; Rahman Md Atikur; García-Caparrós Pedro; Copeland Rhys G R; Charagh Sidra; Rivero Rosa M; Gopalakrishnan Subramaniam; Corpas Francisco J; Siddique Kadambot H M; Hu Zhangli
title: Fighting to thrive via plant growth regulators: Green chemical strategies for drought stress tolerance.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 植物生长调节剂;干旱胁迫;植物适应性;信号传导;代谢基因;转录因子;可持续农业;生物化学;分子生物学
translated_title: 抗旱的绿色化学策略
abstract: As global climate change intensifies, the occurrence and severity of various abiotic stresses will significantly threaten plant health and productivity. Drought stress (DS) is a formidable obstacle, disrupting normal plant functions through specific morphological, physiological, biochemical, and molecular mechanisms. Understanding how plants navigate DS is paramount to mitigating its adverse effects. In response to DS, plants synthesize or accumulate various plant growth regulators (PGRs), including phytohormones, neurotransmitters, gasotransmitters, and polyamines, which present promising sustainable green chemical strategies to adapt or tolerate stress conditions. These PGRs orchestrate crucial plant structure and function adjustments, activating defense systems and modulating cellular-level responses, transcript levels, transcription factors, metabolic genes, and stress-responsive candidate proteins. However, the efficacy of these molecules in mitigating DS depends on the plant species, applied PGR dose, treatment type, duration of DS exposure, and growth stages. Thus, exploring the integrated impact of PGRs on enhancing plant fitness and DS tolerance is crucial for global food security and sustainable agriculture. This review investigates plant responses to DS, explains the potential of exogenously applied diverse PGRs, dissects the complex chemistry among PGRs, and sheds light on omics approaches for harnessing the molecular basis of DS tolerance. This updated review delivers comprehensive mechanistic insights for leveraging various PGRs to enhance overall plant fitness under DS conditions.
affiliations: Guangdong Key Laboratory of Plant Epigenetics, College of Life Sciences and Oceanography, Shenzhen University, Shenzhen, China.; College of Physics and Optoelectronic Engineering, Shenzhen University, Shenzhen, China.; Shenzhen Engineering Laboratory for Marine Algal Biotechnology, Guangdong Technology Research Center for Marine Algal Biotechnology, Shenzhen Collaborative Innovation Public Service Platform for Marine Algae Industry, Longhua Innovation Institute for Biotechnology, College of Life Sciences and Oceanography, Shenzhen University, Shenzhen, China.; Department of Botany, MCM DAV College, Kangra, Himachal Pradesh, India.; ABEx Bio-Research Center, East Azampur, Dhaka, Bangladesh.; Agronomy Department of Superior School Engineering, University of Almería, Almería, Spain.; WA State Agricultural Biotechnology Centre, Centre for Crop and Food Innovation, Food Futures Institute, Murdoch University, Murdoch, WA, Australia.; State Key Laboratory of Rice Biology, China National Rice Research Institute, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences (CAAS), Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China.; Department of Plant Nutrition, Center of Edaphology and Applied Biology of Segura (CEBAS-CSIC), Murcia, Spain.; International Institute of Tropical Agriculture (IITA), Dar es Salaam, Tanzania.; Group of Antioxidants, Free Radicals and Nitric Oxide in Biotechnology, Food and Agriculture, Department of Biochemistry, Cell and Molecular Biology of Plants, Estación Experimental del Zaidín, Spanish National Research Council (CSIC), Granada, Spain.; The UWA Institute of Agriculture, The University of Western Australia, Crawley, Perth, Australia.

translated_keywords: 转座元件；Helitron；基因组演化
translated_abstract: 作为DNA转座子的一种，Helitron通过滚环中间体实现转座。与其它DNA转座子不同，它们在转座过程中不会改变原始模板元件，因此被定义为“剥离-粘贴元件”。Helitron能够捕获并移动宿主基因组片段，对宿主基因组产生深远影响。本文综述了当前对Helitron的理解，探讨了其起源、转座机制以及其活动对基因组结构和功能的广泛影响。我们还研究了由Helitron转座基因片段引发的进化冲突，并阐明了其被驯化以调节环境挑战响应的过程。展望未来，这一领域的进一步研究有望揭示Helitron在塑造基因组景观中的重要作用。
authors: Barro-Trastoy Daniela; Köhler Claudia
title: Helitrons: genomic parasites that generate developmental novelties.
keywords: transposable elements; Helitron; genome evolution
translated_title: 产生发育创新的基因组寄生虫
abstract: Helitrons, classified as DNA transposons, employ rolling-circle intermediates for transposition. Distinguishing themselves from other DNA transposons, they leave the original template element unaltered during transposition, which has led to their characterization as 'peel-and-paste elements'. Helitrons possess the ability to capture and mobilize host genome fragments, with enormous consequences for host genomes. This review discusses the current understanding of Helitrons, exploring their origins, transposition mechanism, and the extensive repercussions of their activity on genome structure and function. We also explore the evolutionary conflicts stemming from Helitron-transposed gene fragments and elucidate their domestication for regulating responses to environmental challenges. Looking ahead, further research in this evolving field promises to bring interesting discoveries on the role of Helitrons in shaping genomic landscapes.
affiliations: Max Planck Institute of Molecular Plant Physiology, Am Mühlenberg 1, 14476 Potsdam-Golm, Germany.; Max Planck Institute of Molecular Plant Physiology, Am Mühlenberg 1, 14476 Potsdam-Golm, Germany; Department of Plant Biology, Swedish University of Agricultural Sciences and Linnean Center for Plant Biology, Uppsala 75007, Sweden. Electronic address: koehler@mpimp-golm.mpg.de.

translated_keywords: 保守相邻关系；双重断裂-融合；基因同源性推断；基因组中位数；基因组相似性；共同区间；基因组距离；无基因家族；基因组排列分析
translated_abstract: 在不同物种间比较大规模基因组结构可以提供有关物种系统发育、基因组组织以及基因关联的宝贵见解。在本章中，我们回顾了家族无关的基因组比较工具FFGC。该工具通过内置接口与序列比较工具（BLAST+或DIAMOND）以及整数线性规划求解器（CPLEX或Gurobi）结合，提供了多种无需预先对研究基因组中的基因进行分类即可进行分析的方法。以注释过的基因组序列作为输入，FFGC是一个完整的基因组比较工作流程，不仅可以计算相似性和差异性的度量，还可以同时基于序列相似性和大规模基因组特征推断基因家族。
authors: Braga Marilia D V; Doerr Daniel; Rubert Diego P; Stoye Jens
title: Family-Free Genome Comparison.
keywords: Conserved adjacencies; Double-cut-and-join; Gene orthology inference; Genome median; Genome similarity; Common intervals; Genome distance; Gene family-free; Gene order analysis
translated_title: 无族系基因组比较
abstract: The comparison of large-scale genome structures across distinct species offers valuable insights into the species' phylogeny, genome organization, and gene associations. In this chapter, we review the family-free genome comparison tool FFGC that, relying on built-in interfaces with a sequence comparison tool (either BLAST+ or DIAMOND) and with an ILP solver (either CPLEX or Gurobi), provides several methods for analyses that do not require prior classification of genes across the studied genomes. Taking annotated genome sequences as input, FFGC is a complete workflow for genome comparison allowing not only the computation of measures of similarity and dissimilarity but also the inference of gene families, simultaneously based on sequence similarities and large-scale genomic features.
affiliations: Faculty of Technology and Center for Biotechnology, Bielefeld University, Bielefeld, Germany.; Department for Endocrinology and Diabetology, Medical Faculty and University Hospital Düsseldorf, German Diabetes Center (DDZ), Leibniz Institute for Diabetes Research, and Center for Digital Medicine, Heinrich Heine University, Düsseldorf, Germany.; Faculdade de Computacão, Universidade Federal de Mato Grosso do Sul, Campo Grande, MS, Brazil.; Faculty of Technology and Center for Biotechnology, Bielefeld University, Bielefeld, Germany. jens.stoye@uni-bielefeld.de.

translated_keywords: 昼夜节律;根际微生物组;植物根系分泌物;土壤生物地球化学循环;微生物功能;植物免疫;微生物互作;生态学;生物信息学
translated_abstract: 根际是植物、微生物与土壤之间的关键界面，影响植物健康和营养，并调节陆地生物地球化学循环。近期研究表明，根际环境比之前认为的更加动态，出现了关于根际化学成分和微生物群落组成昼夜节律性的证据。这种节律部分与宿主植物的昼夜节律相关，但一些异养型根际细菌和真菌也可能具有内在的节律性。本文综述了根际微生物群落昼夜节律性及其与植物昼夜节律钟之间联系的证据。讨论了可能驱动微生物节律的因素，包括根系分泌物通量和组成的昼夜变化、根际理化性质以及植物免疫系统。还考虑了可能促成群落节律性的微生物过程，包括自持的微生物节律、细菌进入和离开根际的运动，以及微生物间的相互作用。此外，我们探讨了由植物昼夜节律钟介导的微生物组成变化是否会影响微生物功能及其对植物健康和更广泛的土壤生物地球化学循环过程的意义。我们指出了关键的知识空白和方法，这些可以帮助解决根际微生物节律的空间和时间变异及其功能意义。这包括阐明决定微生物活动、生长和死亡振荡的因素，以及在昼夜时间框架内与宿主的交叉对话。我们得出结论，昼夜节律是根际的一个固有特性，在根际研究中应考虑并报告时间因素。
authors: Bending Gary D; Newman Amy; Picot Emma; Mushinski Ryan M; Jones Davey L; Carré Isabelle A
title: Diurnal Rhythmicity in the Rhizosphere Microbiome-Mechanistic Insights and Significance for Rhizosphere Function.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 昼夜节律;根际微生物组;植物根系分泌物;土壤生物地球化学循环;微生物功能;植物免疫;微生物互作;生态学;生物信息学
translated_title: 机制洞见及其对根际功能的意义
abstract: The rhizosphere is a key interface between plants, microbes and the soil which influences plant health and nutrition and modulates terrestrial biogeochemical cycling. Recent research has shown that the rhizosphere environment is far more dynamic than previously recognised, with evidence emerging for diurnal rhythmicity in rhizosphere chemistry and microbial community composition. This rhythmicity is in part linked to the host plant's circadian rhythm, although some heterotrophic rhizosphere bacteria and fungi may also possess intrinsic rhythmicity. We review the evidence for diurnal rhythmicity in rhizosphere microbial communities and its link to the plant circadian clock. Factors which may drive microbial rhythmicity are discussed, including diurnal change in root exudate flux and composition, rhizosphere physico-chemical properties and plant immunity. Microbial processes which could contribute to community rhythmicity are considered, including self-sustained microbial rhythms, bacterial movement into and out of the rhizosphere, and microbe-microbe interactions. We also consider evidence that changes in microbial composition mediated by the plant circadian clock may affect microbial function and its significance for plant health and broader soil biogeochemical cycling processes. We identify key knowledge gaps and approaches which could help to resolve the spatial and temporal variation and functional significance of rhizosphere microbial rhythmicity. This includes unravelling the factors which determine the oscillation of microbial activity, growth and death, and cross-talk with the host over diurnal time frames. We conclude that diurnal rhythmicity is an inherent characteristic of the rhizosphere and that temporal factors should be considered and reported in rhizosphere studies.
affiliations: School of Life Sciences, University of Warwick, Coventry, UK.; School of Environmental and Natural Sciences, Bangor University, Bangor, UK.; Food Futures Institute, Murdoch University, Perth, WA, Australia.

translated_keywords: 植物；DNA；表观遗传调控；非生物胁迫；机制
journal: Biochimica et biophysica acta. General subjects
translated_abstract: 植物在其生存环境中面临多种挑战，包括生物胁迫（由活体生物引起）和非生物胁迫（由非活体因素引起）。在影响作物植物的主要非生物胁迫因素中，温度变化、水分供应、盐分以及寒冷对作物产量和产品质量构成了显著威胁。植物具有惊人的适应性和韧性，并通过遗传和表观遗传机制来应对非生物胁迫。支持植物对抗这些胁迫的关键表观遗传机制包括DNA甲基化和组蛋白修饰。这些机制在帮助植物在恶劣环境条件下生存和繁衍方面起着至关重要的作用。不同表观遗传机制在响应非生物胁迫时的作用机制各不相同，每种植物种类和胁迫类型可能引发独特的表观遗传反应，这凸显了植物在胁迫条件下适应能力的复杂性。本文综述了表观遗传学在提高植物在各种非生物胁迫下生存和表现能力方面的关键作用，强调了我们对植物非生物胁迫耐受性相关表观遗传机制理解的最新进展。这一不断增长的知识对于未来减轻非生物胁迫对各种作物的影响至关重要。
authors: Shilpa; Thakur Rajnikant; Prasad Pramod
title: Epigenetic regulation of abiotic stress responses in plants.
keywords: Plants; DNA; Epigenetic regulation; Abiotic stresses; Mechanism
translated_title: 植物非生物胁迫响应的表观遗传调控
abstract: Plants face a wide array of challenges in their environment, both from living organisms (biotic stresses) and non-living factors (abiotic stresses). Among the major abiotic stressors affecting crop plants, variations in temperature, water availability, salinity, and cold pose significant threats to crop yield and the quality of produce. Plants possess remarkable adaptability and resilience, and they employ a range of genetic and epigenetic mechanisms to respond and cope with abiotic stresses. A few crucial set of epigenetic mechanisms that support plants in their battle against these stresses includes DNA methylation and histone modifications. These mechanisms play a pivotal role in enabling plants to endure and thrive under challenging environmental conditions. The mechanisms of different epigenetic mechanisms in responding to the abiotic stresses vary. Each plant species and type of stress may trigger distinct epigenetic responses, highlighting the complexity of the plant's ability to adapt under stress conditions. This review focuses on the paramount importance of epigenetics in enhancing a plant's ability to survive and excel under various abiotic stresses. It highlights recent advancements in our understanding of the epigenetic mechanisms that contribute to abiotic stress tolerance in plants. This growing knowledge is pivotal for shaping future efforts aimed at mitigating the impact of abiotic stresses on diverse crop plants.
affiliations: Department of Biotechnology, Dr Yashwant Singh Parmar University of Horticulture and Forestry, Solan, Himachal Pradesh, India. Electronic address: shilpachaudhary05@gmail.com.; ICAR-Indian Institute of Wheat and Barley Research, Regional Station, Shimla-2, Himachal Pradesh, India.; ICAR-Indian Institute of Wheat and Barley Research, Regional Station, Shimla-2, Himachal Pradesh, India. Electronic address: pramoddewli@gmail.com.

translated_keywords: 荧光化学传感器;植物健康;生态环境监测;设计策略;小分子探针;纳米探针;超分子探针;可持续农业;生物技术;分子生物学
translated_abstract: 在全球范围内，91%的植物生产会受到各种环境胁迫的影响，导致产量损失50%-60%，这对满足人口需求和保护环境资源提出了严峻挑战。因此，监测环境与植物健康之间的联系显得尤为重要。荧光化学传感器因其高灵敏度和生物相容性，在监测植物健康和环境方面取得了显著进展。然而，截至目前，尚无关于用于监测植物健康与其环境相关性的荧光化学传感器的全面分析和系统总结。因此，本文综述了从设计策略到在监测植物-环境相互作用过程中的应用的当前荧光化学传感器。首先，我们强调了具有设计策略的荧光化学传感器类型，以解决监测植物健康和生活环境中遇到的瓶颈问题。此外，还讨论了荧光小分子、纳米和超分子化学传感器在可视化植物健康和生活环境方面的应用。最后，概述了该领域的主要挑战和前景。本研究将为设计高效的荧光化学传感器以监测植物健康提供指导，并促进可持续农业的发展。
authors: Gao Yang-Yang; He Jie; Li Xiao-Hong; Li Jian-Hong; Wu Hong; Wen Ting; Li Jun; Hao Ge-Fei; Yoon Juyoung
title: Fluorescent chemosensors facilitate the visualization of plant health and their living environment in sustainable agriculture.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 荧光化学传感器;植物健康;生态环境监测;设计策略;小分子探针;纳米探针;超分子探针;可持续农业;生物技术;分子生物学
translated_title: 荧光化学传感器助力可持续农业中植物健康及其生存环境的可视化。
abstract: Globally, 91% of plant production encounters diverse environmental stresses that adversely affect their growth, leading to severe yield losses of 50-60%. In this case, monitoring the connection between the environment and plant health can balance population demands with environmental protection and resource distribution. Fluorescent chemosensors have shown great progress in monitoring the health and environment of plants due to their high sensitivity and biocompatibility. However, to date, no comprehensive analysis and systematic summary of fluorescent chemosensors used in monitoring the correlation between plant health and their environment have been reported. Thus, herein, we summarize the current fluorescent chemosensors ranging from their design strategies to applications in monitoring plant-environment interaction processes. First, we highlight the types of fluorescent chemosensors with design strategies to resolve the bottlenecks encountered in monitoring the health and living environment of plants. In addition, the applications of fluorescent small-molecule, nano and supramolecular chemosensors in the visualization of the health and living environment of plants are discussed. Finally, the major challenges and perspectives in this field are presented. This work will provide guidance for the design of efficient fluorescent chemosensors to monitor plant health, and then promote sustainable agricultural development.
affiliations: State Key Laboratory of Green Pesticide, Key Laboratory of Green Pesticide and Agricultural Bioengineering, Ministry of Education, Center for Research and Development of Fine Chemicals, Guizhou University, Guiyang 550025, P. R. China. gefei_hao@foxmail.com.; College of Chemistry, Huazhong Agricultural University, Wuhan 430070, China. lijun1986@mail.hzau.edu.cn.; Department of Chemistry and Nanoscience, Ewha Womans University, Seoul 120-750, Korea. jyoon@ewha.ac.kr.

translated_keywords: 人肠道；宏基因组；群落组装；温泉；温度
journal: DNA research : an international journal for rapid publication of reports on genes and genomes
translated_abstract: 环境中存在各种各样的微生物，每种微生物都有其最适生长温度（OGT）。长期以来，人们一直在研究基因组信息与每个物种OGT之间的关系，其中一项研究表明，可以根据原核生物基因组中所有编码氨基酸序列中七种氨基酸（IVYWREL）的比例，精确预测其OGT。在此发现的基础上，我们开发了一种“宏基因组温度计”，用于基于宏基因组序列预测环境温度。利用公开可用的宏基因组数据对不同环境的温度预测表明，宏基因组温度计能够预测环境温度，并且在温度小幅变化和微生物从其他环境流入较少的情况下表现良好。通过使用人工热水管道进行的演示实验进一步验证了宏基因组温度计的准确性。此外，该温度计还被应用于人类肠道宏基因组样本，得到了人体体温的合理准确值，这进一步表明人体核心体温决定了肠道菌群的主要谱系。宏基因组温度计提供了一种新的视角，即基于氨基酸组成而非微生物分类单元来理解温度驱动的群落组装。
authors: Kurokawa Masaomi; Higashi Koichi; Yoshida Keisuke; Sato Tomohiko; Maruyama Shigenori; Mori Hiroshi; Kurokawa Ken
title: Metagenomic Thermometer.
keywords: human gut; metagenome; community assembly; hot spring; temperature
translated_title: 宏基因组温度计
abstract: Various microorganisms exist in environments, and each of them has its optimal growth temperature (OGT). The relationship between genomic information and OGT of each species has long been studied, and one such study revealed that OGT of prokaryotes can be accurately predicted based on the fraction of seven amino acids (IVYWREL) among all encoded amino-acid sequences in its genome. Extending this discovery, we developed a 'Metagenomic Thermometer' as a means of predicting environmental temperature based on metagenomic sequences. Temperature prediction of diverse environments using publicly available metagenomic data revealed that the Metagenomic Thermometer can predict environmental temperatures with small temperature changes and little influx of microorganisms from other environments. The accuracy of the Metagenomic Thermometer was also confirmed by a demonstration experiment using an artificial hot water canal. The Metagenomic Thermometer was also applied to human gut metagenomic samples, yielding a reasonably accurate value for human body temperature. The result further suggests that deep body temperature determines the dominant lineage of the gut community. Metagenomic Thermometer provides a new insight into temperature-driven community assembly based on amino-acid composition rather than microbial taxa.
affiliations: Genome Evolution Laboratory, National Institute of Genetics, 1111 Yata, Mishima, Shizuoka 411-8540, Japan.; Department of Biological Information, Tokyo Institute of Technology, 2-12-1 Ookayama, Meguro-ku, Tokyo 152-8550, Japan.; Earth-Life Science Institute, Tokyo Institute of Technology, 2-12-1 Ookayama, Meguro-ku, Tokyo 152-8551, Japan.; Genome Diversity Laboratory, National Institute of Genetics, 1111 Yata, Mishima, Shizuoka 411-8540, Japan.

translated_keywords: 组学技术；植物胁迫响应；植物砷毒性；植物对砷酸盐/亚砷酸盐的响应
translated_abstract: 组学方法为植物砷胁迫响应提供了全面的见解，为培育耐砷作物奠定了基础。考虑到砷（As）对土壤生产力和环境健康的影响，理解植物中的砷毒性对于环境和农业的可持续发展至关重要。尽管已有文章详细探讨了砷毒性和耐受性的分子机制，但需要一篇综合综述来总结近期组学技术在研究植物对砷暴露反应方面的进展。本文综述强调了组学方法（基因组学、转录组学、蛋白质组学和代谢组学）在表征植物整体复杂砷响应方面的重要贡献，这可能推动耐砷植物的开发。基因组技术，如数量性状位点（QTL）作图、全基因组关联分析（GWAS）、随机扩增多态性DNA（RAPD）和抑制消减杂交（SSH），能够提供有关植物对砷胁迫响应的遗传多样性和表达模式的宝贵信息，并突显了CRISPR-Cas9等新技术的强大功能。转录组学方法（如微阵列和RNA测序）揭示了植物在砷胁迫下的基因表达模式，强调了硫代谢在砷耐受性中的作用。蛋白质组学通过双向电泳（2-DE）结合基质辅助激光解吸电离飞行时间质谱（MALDI-ToF MS）或电喷雾电离串联质谱（ESI-MS/MS），提供了关于应激诱导蛋白及其在缓解砷毒性中作用的见解，而基于iTRAQ的蛋白质组学则有助于理解高砷浓度下品种特异性响应。代谢组学利用液相色谱-质谱（LC-MS）、气相色谱-质谱（GC-MS）、高效液相色谱（(U)HPLC）和核磁共振（NMR），阐明了植物暴露于砷时小分子变化和复杂的代谢活动。数据和证据相关工具的综合应用为推进耐砷植物的开发以及增强环境和农业韧性提供了基础。
authors: Hassan Sayyeda Hira; Simiele Melissa; Scippa Gabriella Stefania; Morabito Domenico; Trupiano Dalila
title: Omics advancements towards exploring arsenic toxicity and tolerance in plants: a review.
keywords: Omics technologies; Plant stress response; Arsenic toxicity in plants; Plant response to arsenate/arsenite
translated_title: 综述
abstract: Omics approaches provide comprehensive insights into plant arsenic stress responses, setting the stage for engineering arsenic-tolerant crops. Understanding arsenic (As) toxicity in plants is crucial for environmental and agricultural sustainability, considering the implications of As in impacting soil productivity and environmental health. Although some articles already examined the detailed molecular mechanisms behind As toxicity and tolerance, a comprehensive review of recent omics advancements in studying plant responses to As exposure is needed. The present review highlights the valuable contribution of omics approaches (genomics, transcriptomics, proteomics, and metabolomics) to characterize the intricate response to As overall, which could empower As-tolerant plant development. Genomic techniques, such as QTL mapping, GWAS, RAPD, and SSH, hold the potential to provide valuable insights into the genetic diversity and expression patterns associated with the plant response to As stress, highlighting also the power of new advanced technology such as CRISPR-Cas9. Transcriptomics approaches (e.g., microarrays and RNA sequencing) revealed gene expression patterns in plants under As stress, emphasizing the role of sulfur metabolism in As tolerance. Proteomics, using 2-DE combined with MALDI-ToF MS or ESI-MS/MS, offers insights into the stress-inducible proteins and their involvement in As toxicity mitigation, while iTRAQ-based proteomics enabled an understanding of cultivar-specific responses under high As concentration. Metabolomics, with LC-MS, GC-MS, (U)HPLC, and NMR, elucidated small molecule alterations and complex metabolic activities occurring under As plant exposure. Compendium of data and evidence-related tools offers a foundation for advancing As-tolerant plant development and promoting environmental and agricultural resilience.
affiliations: Department of Biosciences and Territory, University of Molise, Pesche, IS, Italy.; University of Orleans, LBLGC EA 1207, INRAe-USC1328, Orleans, France.; Department of Biosciences and Territory, University of Molise, Pesche, IS, Italy. dalila.trupiano@unimol.it.

translated_keywords: 干旱；抗氧化酶；植物促生根细菌；活性氧；盐胁迫；经济作物
translated_abstract: 干旱和盐胁迫是影响全球众多植物种类形态解剖学、生理生化及解剖学特性的主要非生物胁迫因素。这些环境因子对植物叶片和茎部解剖结构的不利影响表现为细胞壁厚度、栅栏组织、海绵组织、韧皮部和木质部组织变薄等特征的下降。此外，在盐胁迫和干旱条件下还观察到类囊体堆叠的解体以及线粒体体积增大现象。干旱和盐胁迫显著降低了植物株高、叶片数量、分枝数、叶面积、鲜重与干重以及植物相对含水量（RWC%）和光合色素浓度。另一方面，由胁迫诱导的脂质过氧化作用、丙二醛（MDA）生成、电解质渗漏（EL%）以及活性氧（ROS）的产生在盐胁迫和干旱条件下增加。抗氧化防御系统如过氧化氢酶、过氧化物酶、谷胱甘肽还原酶、抗坏血酸和γ-氨基丁酸是植物应对干旱和盐胁迫的重要组成部分，用于保护植物细胞器免受ROS引起的氧化损伤。采用安全且环保的处理方法是克服干旱和盐胁迫对植物生长特性及产量负面影响的重要策略。研究表明，施用植物促生菌（PGPB）可改善盐胁迫和干旱胁迫下的形态解剖学特性；酵母提取物、甘露醇、脯氨酸、褪黑素、硅、壳聚糖、α-生育酚（维生素E）和生物炭通过清除ROS减轻了干旱和盐胁迫的负面影响，从而改善了受胁迫植物的特性及其产量。本文综述了安全和环保处理措施在缓解与植物解剖学、形态解剖学及生化特性改善相关的盐胁迫和干旱胁迫有害影响中的作用。
authors: Alshammari Wasimah Buraykan; Alshammery Kholoud; Lotfi Salwa; Altamimi Haya; Alshammari Abeer; Al-Harbi Nadi Awad; Jakovljević Dragana; Alharbi Mona Hajed; Moustapha Moustapha Eid; Abd El-Moneim Diaa; Abdelaal Khaled
title: Improvement of morphophysiological and anatomical attributes of plants under abiotic stress conditions using plant growth-promoting bacteria and safety treatments.
keywords: Drought; Antioxidant enzymes; PGPB; ROS; Salinity; Economic plants
translated_title: 利用促生细菌和安全措施改善植物在非生物胁迫条件下的形态生理与解剖学特性
abstract: Drought and salinity are the major abiotic stress factors negatively affecting the morphophysiological, biochemical, and anatomical characteristics of numerous plant species worldwide. The detrimental effects of these environmental factors can be seen in leaf and stem anatomical structures including the decrease in thickness of cell walls, palisade and spongy tissue, phloem and xylem tissue. Also, the disintegration of grana staking, and an increase in the size of mitochondria were observed under salinity and drought conditions. Drought and salt stresses can significantly decrease plant height, number of leaves and branches, leaf area, fresh and dry weight, or plant relative water content (RWC%) and concentration of photosynthetic pigments. On the other hand, stress-induced lipid peroxidation and malondialdehyde (MDA) production, electrolyte leakage (EL%), and production of reactive oxygen species (ROS) can increase under salinity and drought conditions. Antioxidant defense systems such as catalase, peroxidase, glutathione reductase, ascorbic acid, and gamma-aminobutyric acid are essential components under drought and salt stresses to protect the plant organelles from oxidative damage caused by ROS. The application of safe and eco-friendly treatments is a very important strategy to overcome the adverse effects of drought and salinity on the growth characteristics and yield of plants. It is shown that treatments with plant growth-promoting bacteria (PGPB) can improve morphoanatomical characteristics under salinity and drought stress. It is also shown that yeast extract, mannitol, proline, melatonin, silicon, chitosan, α-Tocopherols (vitamin E), and biochar alleviate the negative effects of drought and salinity stresses through the ROS scavenging resulting in the improvement of plant attributes and yield of the stressed plants. This review discusses the role of safety and eco-friendly treatments in alleviating the harmful effects of salinity and drought associated with the improvement of the anatomical, morphophysiological, and biochemical features in plants.
affiliations: Department of Biology, College of Science, University of Hail, Hail, Saudi Arabia.; Biology Department, University College of Tayma, University of Tabuk, Tabuk, Saudi Arabia.; Department of Biology and Ecology, Faculty of Science, University of Kragujevac, Kragu-jevac, Serbia.; Department of Biology, College of Scince and Humanities in Al-Kharj, Prince Sattam bin Abdulaziz University, Al-Kharj, Saudi Arabia.; Department of Chemistry, College of Science and Humanities in Al-Kharj, Prince Sattam bin Abdulaziz University, Al-Kharj, Saudi Arabia.; Department of Plant Production (Genetic Branch), Faculty of Environmental Agricultural Sciences, Arish University, El-Arish, Egypt.; EPCRS Excellence Center, Plant Pathology and Biotechnology Lab, Faculty of Agriculture, Kafrelsheikh University, Kafrelsheikh, Egypt.

translated_keywords: 绿色基础设施；基于自然的解决方案；植物覆盖；灌溉；景天属植物；生命周期研究
translated_abstract: 绿色屋顶因其提供的环境、社会和经济效益而被广泛研究。因此，绿色屋顶在许多城市居民的日常语言中已经变得普遍，并且在北美许多城市的法规和建筑标准中也有所体现，这使得这种绿色基础设施成为城市景观的一部分。尽管几十年前建造的绿色屋顶实例存在，但很少有绿色屋顶能够被长期监测（超过十年），并且以一种允许实验、分析并得出性能或功能结论的方式进行。本研究展示了加拿大多伦多一个绿色屋顶测试设施长达十多年的监测结果，重点关注了该设施前七年的表现（2011-2021）。我们考察了种植基质、植被选择以及灌溉对绿色屋顶性能的影响。研究发现，在2011年至2017年的维护阶段，使用景天属植物（Sedum）种植、包含有机基质且接受灌溉的模块具有最高的植物覆盖度和生物量，而未灌溉条件下种植豆科植物（forbs）和草类的模块表现最差，无论基质类型如何。在停止灌溉后的后期维护阶段（2017-2021），最初种植景天属植物的模块仍能维持较高的植物覆盖度和生物量，而原本种植豆科植物和草类的模块则大多消失，这些区域最终被景天属植物占据。我们的研究结果表明，在有灌溉的情况下，豆科植物和草类可以维持一定的植物覆盖度和生物量。然而，景天属植物能够缓冲环境条件的重大变化或维护方式的突然改变，为扩展型绿色屋顶提供了额外的安全保障，降低了失败风险。
authors: MacIvor J Scott; Appleby Madison; Miotto Samantha; Rosenblat Howard; Margolis Liat
title: Plant cover and biomass change on extensive green roofs over a decade and ten lessons learned.
keywords: Green infrastructure; Nature-based solutions; Plant cover; Irrigation; Sedum; End of life study
translated_title: 十年间大面积绿色屋顶的植物覆盖度与生物量变化及十条经验教训
abstract: Green roofs are well studied for the environmental, social, and economic services these provide. As a result, green roofs are widespread and within the common vernacular of city residents. Green roof bylaws and construction standards are present in many cities in North America, rooting the presence of this green infrastructure within urban landscapes. Although examples of green roofs constructed decades ago exist, rarely are green roofs monitored over such long periods, and in ways that allow for experimentation, analysis, and conclusions about performance or function. In this study we present findings on plant cover and biomass from a green roof testing facility in Toronto, Canada that was monitored for over a decade. We examine the contributions of growing media, planting, and irrigation in the first seven years (2011-2021) of the eleven-year monitoring period. We found that during this maintenance phase period (2011-2017), plant cover and biomass was highest in modules planted with Sedum, included organic media, and were irrigated, whereas non-irrigated modules planted with forbs and grasses had the poorest performance regardless of media type. Following the stoppage of irrigation, and the post maintenance phase (2017-2021), modules initially planted with Sedum continued to sustain cover and biomass whereas planted forbs and grasses mostly disappeared, and these treatments were overtaken by Sedum. Our findings demonstrate that with irrigation, plantings of forbs and grasses can sustain plant cover and biomass. However, Sedum buffers against major changes to environmental conditions or abrupt changes to maintenance, adding insurance against failure of extensive green roofs.
affiliations: Department of Biological Sciences, University of Toronto Scarborough, 1265 Military Trail, Toronto, Ontario, Canada. Electronic address: scott.macivor@utoronto.ca.; Daniels Faculty of Architecture, Landscape, and Design, University of Toronto, 1 Spadina Cresent, Toronto, Ontario, Canada.

translated_keywords: 生活史；种群统计学；资源限制；功能性状；存活；种群生态学；繁殖；趋同进化；温度；干扰格局
journal: Biological reviews of the Cambridge Philosophical Society
translated_abstract: 植物策略是经自然选择塑造的表型，使种群能够在特定环境中生存。植物策略理论对于理解植物群落的组装、预测植物对气候变化的响应以及改善退化生物圈的恢复至关重要。然而，现有的植物策略模型差异很大，往往倾向于单独强调功能特征或生活史特征，而未能将两者整合到一个通用框架中，以提升我们对植物形态与功能的生态学和进化论理解。要推进对植物策略的理解，需要投资于两个互补的研究议程，这些议程将统一功能生态学和种群生态学。首先，我们必须通过量化植物性状的维度来确定其可能的表型范围。这一步骤需要对代表地球上广泛系统发育谱系、环境梯度和地区多样性的物种进行密集的性状取样。继续在本地取样并全球共享数据以填补性状数据库中的偏见空缺非常重要。其次，我们必须测试性状在解释物种分布、种群增长率以及资源限制、干扰模式、温度、植被密度和其他策略频率等环境梯度下的种群增长速率的能力。这一步骤需要有理论指导的经验主义研究。超出原生范围的移植实验和综合人口建模是最有力的方法，用于确定性状-环境相互作用如何影响适合度。超越易于测量的性状，并评估在不同环境背景下受到最强烈生态选择的性状，将有助于我们理解植物适应性。植物策略理论有望（i）分解生产力和干扰梯度的多重维度，并区分对气候和资源限制的适应与对干扰的适应，（ii）区分表型的基本和实际生态位，以及（iii）阐明功能特征和生活史特征之间的区别和关系。
authors: Laughlin Daniel C
title: Unifying functional and population ecology to test the adaptive value of traits.
keywords: life history; demography; resource limitation; functional traits; survival; population ecology; reproduction; convergent evolution; temperature; disturbance regime
translated_title: 整合功能生态学与种群生态学以检验性状的适应价值
abstract: Plant strategies are phenotypes shaped by natural selection that enable populations to persist in a given environment. Plant strategy theory is essential for understanding the assembly of plant communities, predicting plant responses to climate change, and enhancing the restoration of our degrading biosphere. However, models of plant strategies vary widely and have tended to emphasize either functional traits or life-history traits at the expense of integrating both into a general framework to improve our ecological and evolutionary understanding of plant form and function. Advancing our understanding of plant strategies will require investment in two complementary research agendas that together will unify functional ecology and population ecology. First, we must determine what is phenotypically possible by quantifying the dimensionality of plant traits. This step requires dense taxonomic sampling of traits on species representing the broad diversity of phylogenetic clades, environmental gradients, and geographical regions found across Earth. It is important that we continue to sample traits locally and share data globally to fill biased gaps in trait databases. Second, we must test the power of traits for explaining species distributions, demographic rates, and population growth rates across gradients of resource limitation, disturbance regimes, temperature, vegetation density, and frequencies of other strategies. This step requires thoughtful, theory-driven empiricism. Reciprocal transplant experiments beyond the native range and synthetic demographic modelling are the most powerful methods to determine how trait-by-environment interactions influence fitness. Moving beyond easy-to-measure traits and evaluating the traits that are under the strongest ecological selection within different environmental contexts will improve our understanding of plant adaptations. Plant strategy theory is poised to (i) unpack the multiple dimensions of productivity and disturbance gradients and differentiate adaptations to climate and resource limitation from adaptations to disturbance, (ii) distinguish between the fundamental and realized niches of phenotypes, and (iii) articulate the distinctions and relationships between functional traits and life-history traits.
affiliations: Botany Department, University of Wyoming, Laramie, Wyoming, 82071, USA.

translated_keywords: 蛋白质组学；BLAST2GO；基因组注释；RNA测序；基因组；下一代测序；BLAST
translated_abstract: 基因组测序项目的标志性任务是提供物种的遗传信息，并对基因和蛋白质进行功能注释。这一过程高度依赖于基于同源性检测的基因组注释，而同源性检测则来自先前已知的基因组数据。基因组测序技术的快速发展使得基因组测序在生成基因组数据的时间框架内变得经济高效。因此，基因组测序已成为一种常见的实践。新测序基因组的注释与表征是任何基于基因组数据的生物学实验成功的关键因素。蛋白质基因组学领域需要进一步注释的基因组来支持基于蛋白质组学的研究，并且这些研究通常结合了基因组和RNA-seq数据。本章描述了从头开始的基因组注释过程，包括从基因组测序到通用基因组注释以及使用BLAST、BLAT2GO（现为OMICSBOX）、PANNZER、基因本体论（GO）和KEGG的专门基因组注释。此外，还涵盖了重复序列识别与掩蔽、基因预测、全基因组注释过程以及RNA-seq协议等内容。同时，本章聚焦于一些感兴趣的基因，如与生物合成基因簇（BGCs）、碳水化合物活性酶（CAZymes）、丝氨酸蛋白酶抑制剂（serpins）、膜转运蛋白和毒素相关的基因。手动注释对于至少某些基因组也是关键步骤，这些基因组往往对所研究的物种至关重要。本章还简要介绍了基因组注释过程中所需的系统发育和系统基因组学过程。
authors: Kumar Abhishek
title: Genome Annotation.
keywords: Proteogenomics; BLAST2GO; Genome annotation; RNA-seq; Genome; NGS; BLAST
translated_title: 基因组注释
abstract: The hallmark of genome sequencing projects is to provide genetic information on a species with functional annotations of genes and proteins. This process heavily relies on genome annotation based on homology detections from previously known genomic data. The rapid advancement of genome sequencing technologies has made genome sequencing affordable and effective in terms of the time frame for the generation of genomic data. Hence, genome sequencing has become a common practice. The annotation and characterization of newly sequenced genomes are crucial factors for the success of any biological experiment based on genomic data. The proteogenomic sector requires annotated genome further characterization of proteomic-based studies, and these are coupled with genomic and RNA-seq data. This chapter describes the genome annotation process from scratch genome sequencing to general genome annotation and specialized genome annotation using BLAST, BLAT2GO (now OMICSBOX), PANNZER, gene ontology (GO), and KEGG. It also covers different processes like repeat identification and masking, gene prediction, genome-wide annotation process, and RNA-seq protocol. It also focuses on genes of interest such as genes associated with BGCs (biosynthetic gene clusters), carbohydrate-active enzymes (CAZymes), serpins (serine protease inhibitors), membrane transporters, and toxins. Manual annotation is also a critical step for at least some groups of genes, which are often critical for the species in consideration. This chapter also briefly describes the phylogenetic and phylogenomic processes required during genome annotation.
affiliations: Manipal Academy of Higher Education (MAHE), Manipal & Institute of Bioinformatics, Bangalore, India. abhishek@ibioinformatics.org.

translated_keywords: 基因组语言模型；变异效应预测；迁移学习；机器学习；序列设计
translated_abstract: 大型语言模型（LLMs）正在广泛的科学领域产生变革性影响，尤其是在生物医学科学领域。正如自然语言处理的目标是理解单词序列一样，生物学的一个主要目标是理解生物序列。基因组语言模型（gLMs），即在DNA序列上训练的LLMs，有可能显著提升我们对基因组的理解以及不同尺度上的DNA元件如何相互作用以产生复杂功能的认识。为了展示这种潜力，我们强调了gLMs的关键应用，包括功能约束预测、序列设计和迁移学习。然而，尽管近期取得了显著进展，开发有效且高效的gLMs仍面临诸多挑战，尤其是对于具有大型复杂基因组的物种而言。在这里，我们讨论了开发和评估gLMs的主要考虑因素。
authors: Benegas Gonzalo; Ye Chengzhong; Albors Carlos; Li Jianan Canal; Song Yun S
title: Genomic language models: opportunities and challenges.
keywords: genomic language models; variant effect prediction; transfer learning; machine learning; sequence design
translated_title: 机遇与挑战
abstract: Large language models (LLMs) are having transformative impacts across a wide range of scientific fields, particularly in the biomedical sciences. Just as the goal of natural language processing is to understand sequences of words, a major objective in biology is to understand biological sequences. Genomic language models (gLMs), which are LLMs trained on DNA sequences, have the potential to significantly advance our understanding of genomes and how DNA elements at various scales interact to give rise to complex functions. To showcase this potential, we highlight key applications of gLMs, including functional constraint prediction, sequence design, and transfer learning. Despite notable recent progress, however, developing effective and efficient gLMs presents numerous challenges, especially for species with large, complex genomes. Here, we discuss major considerations for developing and evaluating gLMs.
affiliations: Computer Science Division, University of California, Berkeley, CA, USA.; Department of Statistics, University of California, Berkeley, CA, USA.; Computer Science Division, University of California, Berkeley, CA, USA; Department of Statistics, University of California, Berkeley, CA, USA; Center for Computational Biology, University of California, Berkeley, CA, USA. Electronic address: yss@berkeley.edu.

translated_keywords: 基因组；基因组浏览器
translated_abstract: 同一操纵子内是否存在两个相邻基因？多个转录因子结合位点的顺序和间距是什么？基因组浏览器是一种数据可视化与探索工具，生物学家可以利用它回答这些问题。本文报告了我们浏览器Genome Explorer的一项重大更新，该更新实现了基因组近乎即时的缩放和平移，使用户能够快速轻松地放大到感兴趣的区域。用户可以在展示整个基因组、单个基因以及序列的不同尺度之间迅速切换；Genome Explorer针对每个尺度呈现最相关的信息和上下文。通过将整个基因组的数据下载到用户的网页浏览器并动态生成本地可视化，我们实现了对缩放和平移功能的精细控制以及实时重新绘制可视化图像，从而比其他浏览器提供了更流畅、更直观的基因组探索体验。此外，Genome Explorer以熟悉的图形方式在同一行显示基因组特征，而许多其他浏览器则使用低信息密度的数据轨道来表示基因组特征，这可能在视觉上掩盖特征之间的相对位置。Genome Explorer图示具有高信息密度，能够在给定尺寸的显示器上提供比基于轨道的浏览器更多的基因组上下文和序列信息。Genome Explorer还提供可选的数据轨道用于分析大规模数据集，并且具有独特的比较模式，该模式在同源基因处对齐基因组并同步缩放。基因组浏览器通过图形化展示基因组信息，加快科学家对复杂基因组数据的吸收速度。它们提供搜索操作帮助科学家查找信息，并提供缩放操作使科学家能够在不同分辨率下查看基因组特征。我们介绍了Genome Explorer浏览器，该浏览器提供了极快的基因组可视化和高信息密度的显示以及缩放功能。
authors: Herson James; Krummenacker Markus; Spaulding Aaron; O'Maille Paul; Karp Peter D
title: The Genome Explorer genome browser.
keywords: genome; genome browser
translated_title: 基因组探索者基因浏览器
abstract: Are two adjacent genes in the same operon? What are the order and spacing between several transcription factor binding sites? Genome browsers are software data visualization and exploration tools that enable biologists to answer questions such as these. In this paper, we report on a major update to our browser, Genome Explorer, that provides nearly instantaneous scaling and traversing of a genome, enabling users to quickly and easily zoom into an area of interest. The user can rapidly move between scales that depict the entire genome, individual genes, and the sequence; Genome Explorer presents the most relevant detail and context for each scale. By downloading the data for the entire genome to the user's web browser and dynamically generating visualizations locally, we enable ﬁne control of zoom and pan functions and real-time redrawing of the visualization, resulting in smoother and more intuitive exploration of a genome than is possible with other browsers. Further, genome features are presented together, in-line, using familiar graphical depictions. In contrast, many other browsers depict genome features using data tracks, which have low information density and can visually obscure the relative positions of features. Genome Explorer diagrams have a high information density that provides larger amounts of genome context and sequence information to be presented in a given-sized monitor than for tracks-based browsers. Genome Explorer provides optional data tracks for the analysis of large-scale data sets and a unique comparative mode that aligns genomes at orthologous genes with synchronized zooming. Genome browsers provide graphical depictions of genome information to speed the uptake of complex genome data by scientists. They provide search operations to help scientists find information and zoom operations to enable scientists to view genome features at different resolutions. We introduce the Genome Explorer browser, which provides extremely fast zooming and panning of genome visualizations and displays with high information density.
affiliations: Advanced Technology and Systems Division, SRI International, Menlo Park, California, USA.; Artiﬁcial Intelligence Center, SRI International, Menlo Park, California, USA.; BioSciences Division, SRI International, Menlo Park, California, USA.

translated_keywords: 基因组组装；重复区域；结构变异；基因组注释
translated_abstract: 大鼠（*Rattus norvegicus*）一直是生物医学研究中重要的模式生物。本文综述了该物种的起源、其进入实验室研究的过程以及利用这一模式生物所发展起来的遗传学和基因组学方法。基因组学研究在多个具有重要生物学意义的性状上取得了重要进展，并提供了新的见解。然而，由于缺乏完整且准确的参考基因组，一些研究受到了阻碍。针对大鼠的新测序和基因组组装方法已经产生了新的参考基因组装配版本GRCr8，这是一个接近端粒到端粒的高碱基水平准确性装配，并整合了之前组装中未捕获的多个元素。随着基因组组装方法的不断进步以及生产成本逐渐不再是显著障碍，多种近交系大鼠的基因组装配正在出现。这些装配将使构建一个大鼠泛基因组成为可能，该泛基因组能够捕捉选定用于研究的品系中的所有遗传变异，从而克服依赖单一参考装配所带来的参考偏倚问题。通过这种方式，这种模式生物在基因组学研究中的全部潜力将开始得以展现。
authors: Kalbfleisch Theodore S; Smith Melissa L; Ciosek Julia L; Li Kai; Doris Peter A
title: Three decades of rat genomics: approaching the finish(ed) line.
keywords: genome assembly; repetitive regions; structural variation; genome annotation
translated_title: 接近终点（线）。
abstract: The rat, Rattus norvegicus, has provided an important model for investigation of a range of characteristics of biomedical importance. Here we survey the origins of this species, its introduction into laboratory research, and the emergence of genetic and genomic methods that utilize this model organism. Genomic studies have yielded important progress and provided new insight into several biologically important traits. However, some studies have been impeded by the lack of a complete and accurate reference genome for this species. New sequencing and genome assembly methods applied to the rat have resulted in a new reference genome assembly, GRCr8, which is a near telomere-to-telomere assembly of high base-level accuracy that incorporates several elements not captured in prior assemblies. As genome assembly methods continue to advance and production costs become a less significant obstacle, genome assemblies for multiple inbred rat strains are emerging. These assemblies will allow a rat pangenome assembly to be constructed that captures all the genetic variations in strains selected for their utility in research and will overcome reference bias, a limitation associated with reliance on a single reference assembly. By this means, the full utility of this model organism to genomic studies will begin to be revealed.
affiliations: Gluck Equine Research Center, University of Kentucky, Lexington, Kentucky, United States.; Department of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology, University of Louisville School of Medicine, Louisville, Kentucky, United States.; Center for Human Genetics, Brown Foundation Institute of Molecular Medicine, McGovern Medical School, University of Texas Health Science Center, Houston, Texas, United States.

translated_keywords: 组装评估流程；错误组装检测；错误组装断点；组装冗余；组装质量；基因组组装；组装指标
journal: Journal of genetics and genomics = Yi chuan xue bao
translated_abstract: //github.com/zy-optimistic/GAEP。借助GAEP，用户可以快速获得准确可靠的评估结果，从而促进高质量基因组组装的比较与选择。
authors: Zhang Yong; Lu Hong-Wei; Ruan Jue
title: GAEP: a comprehensive genome assembly evaluating pipeline.
keywords: Assembly evaluation pipeline; Misassembly detection; Misassembly breakpoint; Assembly redundancy; Assembly quality; Genome assembly; Assembly metrics
translated_title: 一个全面的基因组组装评估管道
abstract: With the rapid development of sequencing technologies, especially the maturity of third-generation sequencing technologies, there has been a significant increase in the number and quality of published genome assemblies. The emergence of these high-quality genomes has raised higher requirements for genome evaluation. Although numerous computational methods have been developed to evaluate assembly quality from various perspectives, the selective use of these evaluation methods can be arbitrary and inconvenient for fairly comparing the assembly quality. To address this issue, we have developed the Genome Assembly Evaluating Pipeline (GAEP), which provides a comprehensive assessment pipeline for evaluating genome quality from multiple perspectives, including continuity, completeness, and correctness. Additionally, GAEP includes new functions for detecting misassemblies and evaluating the assembly redundancy, which performs well in our testing. GAEP is publicly available at https://github.com/zy-optimistic/GAEP under the GPL3.0 License. With GAEP, users can quickly obtain accurate and reliable evaluation results, facilitating the comparison and selection of high-quality genome assemblies.
affiliations: Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory of Lingnan Modern Agriculture, Genome Analysis Laboratory of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen, Guangdong 518120, China.; State Key Laboratory of Rice Biology and Breeding, China National Rice Research Institute, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Hangzhou, Zhejiang 311401, China.; Shenzhen Branch, Guangdong Laboratory of Lingnan Modern Agriculture, Genome Analysis Laboratory of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs, Agricultural Genomics Institute at Shenzhen, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Shenzhen, Guangdong 518120, China. Electronic address: ruanjue@caas.cn.

translated_keywords: 棉花；大豆；种球；微生物组
translated_abstract: 本研究的核心假设是植物种类和种子分泌物释放会改变胚珠土壤中微生物的组装。我们的研究调查了微生物对胚珠土壤中初始营养爆发的响应，填补了先前研究的空白，这些研究是在无菌条件下预萌发种子。我们确定了几种具有长期促进植物生长历史的富营养型细菌谱系，在响应初始分泌物释放时大量增殖。通过比较网络方法，我们证明这些富营养型细菌并非网络的核心，表明其他微生物（包括真菌）可能对群落结构很重要。本研究提高了对鲜为人知的胚珠微生物动态的认识，并有助于为解决胚珠病原体提供生物学或生态学启发的解决方案。
authors: Olofintila Oluwakemisola E; Noel Zachary A
title: Soybean and Cotton Spermosphere Soil Microbiome Shows Dominance of Soilborne Copiotrophs.
keywords: cotton; soybean; spermosphere; microbiome
translated_title: 大豆和棉花种子球土壤微生物群以土壤习居富养菌为主。
abstract: The spermosphere is the transient, immediate zone of soil around imbibing and germinating seeds. It represents a habitat where there is contact between seed-associated microbes and soil microbes, but it is studied less than other plant habitats. Previous studies on spermosphere microbiology were primarily culture based or did not sample the spermosphere soil as initially defined in space and time. Thus, the objectives of this study were to develop an efficient strategy to collect spermosphere soils around imbibing soybean and cotton in nonsterile soil and investigate changes in microbial communities. The method employed sufficiently collected spermosphere soil as initially defined in space by constraining the soil sampled with a cork borer and confining the soil to a 12-well microtiter plate. Spermosphere prokaryote composition changed over time and depended on the crop within 6 h after seeds were sown. By 12 to 18 h, crops had unique microbial communities in spermosphere soils. Prokaryote evenness dropped following seed imbibition, with the proliferation of copiotrophic soil bacteria. Due to their long history of plant growth promotion, prokaryote operational taxonomic units (OTUs) in Bacillus, Paenibacillus, Burkholderia, Massilia, Azospirillum, and Pseudomonas were notable organisms enriched. Fungi and prokaryotes were hub taxa in cotton and soybean spermosphere networks. Additionally, the enriched taxa were not hubs in networks, suggesting that other taxa besides those enriched may be important for spermosphere communities. Overall, this study advances knowledge in the assembly of the plant microbiome early in a plant's life, which may have plant health implications in more mature plant growth stages. IMPORTANCE The central hypothesis of this research was that plant species and seed exudate release would alter the assembly of microbes in the spermosphere soil. Our research investigated the response of microbes to the initial burst of nutrients into the spermosphere soil, filling knowledge gaps from previous studies that pregerminated seeds under sterile conditions. We identified several copiotrophic bacterial lineages with a long history of plant growth promotion proliferating in response to the initial exudate release. With a comparative network approach, we show that these copiotrophic bacteria are not central to networks, demonstrating that other microbes (including fungi) may be important for community structure. This study improves knowledge on microbial dynamics in the understudied spermosphere and helps inform solutions for biologically or ecologically motivated solutions to spermosphere pathogens.
affiliations: Department of Entomology and Plant Pathology, Auburn University, Auburn, Alabama, USA.

translated_keywords: 基因组序列；噬菌体；多样性；分类学；噬菌体发现；噬菌体-细菌相互作用；宿主范围
translated_abstract: 细菌噬菌体多样性是一个相对未知的前沿领域，但正在迅速被探索，从而带来了大量新信息。通过噬菌体分离研究和元基因组分析，新型噬菌体正以惊人的速度被发现。此外，基于核苷酸序列的病毒分类系统已经开发出来，以便更好地处理这些新信息。由于这些发展，噬菌体科学家们正从认识到自然环境中必定存在大量多样化的噬菌体颗粒，转向识别特定环境中实际存在的噬菌体丰度和多样性。本文综述了这一转变的开端，揭示了该领域正在发生的巨大变化。它见证了噬菌体研究前沿的扩展，展示了在揭示细菌噬菌体多样性的复杂世界以及推进我们对这些神秘病毒实体的理解方面所取得的显著进展。
authors: Ely Bert; Lenski Jacob; Mohammadi Tannaz
title: Structural and Genomic Diversity of Bacteriophages.
keywords: Genome sequences; Bacteriophages; Diversity; Taxonomy; Phage discovery; Phage bacteria interactions; Host range
translated_title: 噬菌体的结构与基因组多样性
abstract: Bacteriophage diversity is a relatively unknown frontier that is rapidly being explored, leading to a wealth of new information. New bacteriophages are being discovered at an astounding rate via both phage isolation studies and metagenomic analyses. In addition, a nucleotide sequence-based viral taxonomic system has been developed to better handle this wealth of new information. As a result of these developments, phage scientists are transitioning from knowing that there must be huge numbers of diverse kinds of phage particles in natural environments to identifying the actual abundance and phage diversity that is present in specific environments. This review documents the beginning of this transition, offering a glimpse into the magnitude of change unfolding in the field. It stands as a testament to the expanding frontiers of phage research, illuminating the remarkable progress made in unraveling the intricate world of bacteriophage diversity and advancing our understanding of these enigmatic viral entities.
affiliations: Department of Biological Sciences, University of South Carolina, Columbia, SC, USA. ELY@biol.sc.edu.; Department of Biological Sciences, University of South Carolina, Columbia, SC, USA.

translated_keywords: 人类疾病；结构变异；进化医学；长读长测序；风险等位基因；完整基因组
translated_abstract: 进化医学整合了进化生物学与医学，极大地提升了我们对人类特征及疾病易感性的理解。然而，由于技术限制，在刻画复杂基因组区域方面存在困难，以往该领域的研究多集中于单核苷酸变异，这阻碍了对其进化起源和临床意义的全面分析。本文综述了全端粒到端粒（T2T）、灵长类基因组及其他灵长类资源的最新进展，并展示了这些资源如何促进对复杂区域的研究。我们重点关注几个与生物医学相关的区域，以探讨灵长类基因组进化与人类疾病之间的关系。此外，我们还强调了高通量功能基因组技术在评估候选位点方面的潜力。最后，我们在进化医学的背景下讨论了灵长类研究的未来方向。
authors: Ma Kaiyue; Yang Xiangyu; Mao Yafei
title: Advancing evolutionary medicine with complete primate genomes and advanced biotechnologies.
keywords: human diseases; structural variation; evolutionary medicine; long-read sequencing; risk alleles; complete genomes
translated_title: 利用完整灵长类基因组和先进生物技术推动进化医学的发展
abstract: Evolutionary medicine, which integrates evolutionary biology and medicine, significantly enhances our understanding of human traits and disease susceptibility. However, previous studies in this field have often focused on single-nucleotide variants due to technological limitations in characterizing complex genomic regions, hindering the comprehensive analyses of their evolutionary origins and clinical significance. In this review, we summarize recent advancements in complete telomere-to-telomere (T2T), primate genomes and other primate resources, and illustrate how these resources facilitate the research of complex regions. We focus on several biomedically relevant regions to examine the relationship between primate genome evolution and human diseases. We also highlight the potentials of high-throughput functional genomic technologies for assessing candidate loci. Finally, we discuss future directions for primate research within the context of evolutionary medicine.
affiliations: Bio-X Institutes, Key Laboratory for the Genetics of Developmental and Neuropsychiatric Disorders, Ministry of Education, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, Shanghai, China.; Bio-X Institutes, Key Laboratory for the Genetics of Developmental and Neuropsychiatric Disorders, Ministry of Education, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, Shanghai, China; Center for Genomic Research, International Institutes of Medicine, Fourth Affiliated Hospital, Zhejiang University, Yiwu, Zhejiang, China. Electronic address: yafmao@sjtu.edu.cn.

translated_keywords: 基因树；系统基因组学；全基因组；系统发育网络；物种树；系统发育
translated_abstract: 系统基因组学旨在考虑整个基因组或基因组的大片段来重建生物的进化历史。系统基因组学在进化生物学、系统学、比较基因组学和保护遗传学等领域具有重要意义，能够为物种的起源与关系提供有价值的见解，并有助于我们理解生物多样性和进化过程。本章综述了旨在构建基因树和物种树的系统发育概念与方法，同时讨论了常见的陷阱，并提供了相关计算机程序的参考。本章最后给出一个包括细菌基因组的实际系统基因组分析示例。
authors: Patané José S L; Martins Joaquim; Setubal João Carlos
title: A Guide to Phylogenomic Inference.
keywords: Gene trees; Phylogenomics; Whole genome; Phylogenetic networks; Species trees; Phylogeny
translated_title: 系统基因组学推断指南
abstract: Phylogenomics aims at reconstructing the evolutionary histories of organisms taking into account whole genomes or large fractions of genomes. Phylogenomics has significant applications in fields such as evolutionary biology, systematics, comparative genomics, and conservation genetics, providing valuable insights into the origins and relationships of species and contributing to our understanding of biological diversity and evolution. This chapter surveys phylogenetic concepts and methods aimed at both gene tree and species tree reconstruction while also addressing common pitfalls, providing references to relevant computer programs. A practical phylogenomic analysis example including bacterial genomes is presented at the end of the chapter.
affiliations: Laboratório de Genética e Cardiologia Molecular, Instituto do Coração/Heart Institute Hospital das Clínicas - Faculdade de Medicina da Universidade de São Paulo São Paulo, São Paulo, SP, Brazil.; Integrative Omics group, Biorenewables National Laboratory, Brazilian Center for Research in Energy and Materials, Campinas, SP, Brazil.; Departmento de Bioquímica, Instituto de Química, Universidade de São Paulo, São Paulo, SP, Brazil. setubal@iq.usp.br.

translated_keywords: 噬菌体；前噬菌体；比较基因组学；噬菌体聚类；生物信息学；功能注释
translated_abstract: 细菌病毒（噬菌体）是地球上丰度最高且多样性最丰富的生物实体。由于其在应对多重耐药病原体方面的巨大潜力，全球范围内对以噬菌体为中心的研究重新产生了浓厚兴趣。越来越多完整的噬菌体基因组得以获得，这些基因组既来源于新分离的培养噬菌体，也来源于宏基因组测序数据中恢复的未培养噬菌体。强有力的比较分析对于全面理解噬菌体的基因型变异及其相关的进化过程至关重要，同时也有助于研究噬菌体与其宿主之间的相互作用机制。本章介绍了一种用于噬菌体比较基因组学的实验方案，所选用的工具来自当前众多可用工具中的精选，重点关注分类为鞘尾病毒纲（Caudoviricetes）的完整噬菌体基因组。该方案能够准确识别新旧已知完整噬菌体基因组之间的相似性、差异性和模式，并实现噬菌体的聚类和分类鉴定。
authors: Rossi Fernando Pacheco Nobre; Flores Vinicius Sousa; Uceda-Campos Guillermo; Amgarten Deyvid Emanuel; Setubal João Carlos; da Silva Aline Maria
title: Comparative Analyses of Bacteriophage Genomes.
keywords: Phage; Prophage; Comparative genomics; Phage clustering; Bioinformatics; Functional annotation
translated_title: 噬菌体基因组的比较分析
abstract: Bacterial viruses (bacteriophages or phages) are the most abundant and diverse biological entities on Earth. There is a renewed worldwide interest in phage-centered research motivated by their enormous potential as antimicrobials to cope with multidrug-resistant pathogens. An ever-growing number of complete phage genomes are becoming available, derived either from newly isolated phages (cultivated phages) or recovered from metagenomic sequencing data (uncultivated phages). Robust comparative analysis is crucial for a comprehensive understanding of genotypic variations of phages and their related evolutionary processes, and to investigate the interaction mechanisms between phages and their hosts. In this chapter, we present a protocol for phage comparative genomics employing tools selected out of the many currently available, focusing on complete genomes of phages classified in the class Caudoviricetes. This protocol provides accurate identification of similarities, differences, and patterns among new and previously known complete phage genomes as well as phage clustering and taxonomic classification.
affiliations: Departamento de Bioquímica, Instituto de Química, Universidade de São Paulo, Sao Paulo, SP, Brazil.; Hospital Israelita Albert Einstein, Sao Paulo, Brazil.; Departamento de Bioquímica, Instituto de Química, Universidade de São Paulo, Sao Paulo, SP, Brazil. almsilva@iq.usp.br.

translated_keywords: 癌症进化;基因组网络;非整倍体;三阴性乳腺癌;染色体失衡;基因组不平衡;癌症基因组;分子生物学;生物信息学
translated_abstract: 非整倍体是一种在癌症中经常发现的染色体失衡状态，导致复杂的癌症基因组。Kuzmin及其同事在三阴性乳腺癌中识别出非整倍体基因组如何通过独特的基因组网络相互作用而形成。
authors: Snarski Yifat Bar Or; Shoshani Ofer
title: Genomic linkages dictate cancer evolution.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 癌症进化;基因组网络;非整倍体;三阴性乳腺癌;染色体失衡;基因组不平衡;癌症基因组;分子生物学;生物信息学
translated_title: 基因组关联决定了癌症的进化。
abstract: Aneuploidy, a state of chromosome imbalance frequently found in cancer, results in convoluted cancer genomes. Here, Kuzmin and colleagues1 identify how the aneuploid genome in triple-negative breast cancer is being shaped by unique genome network interactions.
affiliations: Department of Biomolecular Sciences, Weizmann Institute of Science, Rehovot, Israel.; Department of Biomolecular Sciences, Weizmann Institute of Science, Rehovot, Israel. Electronic address: ofer.shoshani@weizmann.ac.il.

translated_keywords: 亚基因组；偏向性分数分化；异源多倍体；转座元件；k-mer
translated_abstract: 全基因组复制（WGD）是真核生物中广泛存在的基因组事件，被认为对许多谱系的进化成功做出了贡献，包括开花植物、酵母和脊椎动物。WGD通常可以分为自源多倍体（来自单一物种的倍性增加）或异源多倍体（来自多个物种的倍性增加）。确定异源多倍体的亲本物种（在多倍体中称为亚基因组）对于理解多倍体的生物学和进化至关重要，包括杂交后亚基因组的不对称进化（偏分选择）。本文综述了用于识别异源多倍体亚基因组祖先的不同方法，讨论了这些方法的优势和劣势，并概述了这些方法如何影响后续基因组进化分析的含义。
authors: Session Adam M
title: Allopolyploid subgenome identification and implications for evolutionary analysis.
keywords: subgenome; biased fractionation; allopolyploid; transposable elements; k-mer
translated_title: 异源多倍体亚基因组鉴定及其对进化分析的意义
abstract: Whole-genome duplications (WGDs) are widespread genomic events in eukaryotes that are hypothesized to contribute to the evolutionary success of many lineages, including flowering plants, Saccharomyces yeast, and vertebrates. WGDs generally can be classified into autopolyploids (ploidy increase descended from one species) or allopolyploids (ploidy increase descended from multiple species). Assignment of allopolyploid progenitor species (called subgenomes in the polyploid) is important to understanding the biology and evolution of polyploids, including the asymmetric subgenome evolution following hybridization (biased fractionation). Here, I review the different methodologies used to identify the ancestors of allopolyploid subgenomes, discuss the advantages and disadvantages of these methods, and outline the implications of how these methods affect the subsequent evolutionary analysis of these genomes.
affiliations: Department of Biological Sciences, Binghamton University, Binghamton, NY 13902, USA. Electronic address: asession@binghamton.edu.

translated_keywords: 基因组学；核质巨病毒门；巨型病毒；GC含量；痘病毒
journal: Brazilian journal of microbiology : [publication of the Brazilian Society for Microbiology]
translated_abstract: 在基因组研究中，序列组成采用多种方法，例如计算给定序列中鸟嘌呤和胞嘧啶的比例（GC含量），这可以揭示生物体生物学的多个方面。在此背景下，GC含量可以提供关于病毒-宿主关系和进化的见解。本文对属于囊病毒门的61个代表性病毒进行了全面的基因分析，该门类包含已知病毒圈中最大基因组的病毒。参数不仅基于给定病毒物种与整个门的平均GC含量进行评估，还考虑了基因位置和系统发育历史。我们的结果显示，一些家族在其代表中表现出相似的GC含量（如马赛病毒科），而其他家族如痘病毒科、藻病毒科和拟菌病毒科则具有GC含量差异显著的成员，这可能反映了适应特定生物周期和宿主的结果。有趣的是，位于末端区域或特定基因组簇中的某些基因显示出与平均值不同的GC含量，表明近期获得或独特的进化压力。此外，我们评估了GC含量差异最大的基因中的水平基因转移以及潜在旁系同源物的存在，表明存在多种进化历史。综上所述，据我们所知，这项研究首次对囊病毒门成员基因组中的GC含量分布和特征进行了全局性和基因层面的分析，突出了其多样性，并确定了未来研究的潜在新目标。
authors: Witt Amanda Stéphanie Arantes; Carvalho João Victor Rodrigues Pessoa; Serafim Mateus Sá Magalhães; Arias Nidia Esther Colquehuanca; Rodrigues Rodrigo Araújo Lima; Abrahão Jônatas Santos
title: The GC% landscape of the Nucleocytoviricota.
keywords: Genomics; Nucleocytoviricota; Giant viruses; GC% content; Poxviruses
translated_title: Nucleocytoviricota的GC含量分布景观
abstract: Genomic studies on sequence composition employ various approaches, such as calculating the proportion of guanine and cytosine within a given sequence (GC% content), which can shed light on various aspects of the organism's biology. In this context, GC% can provide insights into virus-host relationships and evolution. Here, we present a comprehensive gene-by-gene analysis of 61 representatives belonging to the phylum Nucleocytoviricota, which comprises viruses with the largest genomes known in the virosphere. Parameters were evaluated not only based on the average GC% of a given viral species compared to the entire phylum but also considering gene position and phylogenetic history. Our results reveal that while some families exhibit similar GC% among their representatives (e.g., Marseilleviridae), others such as Poxviridae, Phycodnaviridae, and Mimiviridae have members with discrepant GC% values, likely reflecting adaptation to specific biological cycles and hosts. Interestingly, certain genes located at terminal regions or within specific genomic clusters show GC% values distinct from the average, suggesting recent acquisition or unique evolutionary pressures. Horizontal gene transfer and the presence of potential paralogs were also assessed in genes with the most discrepant GC% values, indicating multiple evolutionary histories. Taken together, to the best of our knowledge, this study represents the first global and gene-by-gene analysis of GC% distribution and profiles within genomes of Nucleocytoviricota members, highlighting their diversity and identifying potential new targets for future studies.
affiliations: Department of Microbiology, Institute of Biological Sciences, Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais, Belo Horizonte, Minas Gerais, Brazil.; Department of Microbiology, Institute of Biological Sciences, Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais, Belo Horizonte, Minas Gerais, Brazil. jonatas.abrahao@gmail.com.

translated_keywords: 天然产物；生物医学；直接克隆；合成生物学；生物技术；大片段基因组片段
translated_abstract: 挖掘基因组的大规模功能区域有助于理解细胞生命本质。基因组信息的快速积累为基因组功能、进化和结构研究提供了丰富的素材。DNA克隆技术是理解、分析和操控生物遗传密码的重要工具。随着合成生物学家设计更复杂、更广泛的遗传通路，并将其研究扩展到新的生物体中，能够操作大规模DNA的有效工具将为设计、改造和构建工程化生命提供动力。本文综述了直接克隆大基因组片段（尤其是50-150 kb片段）领域的最新进展，特别介绍了这些克隆策略中目标片段释放与捕获步骤的技术进步。此外，还总结了大片段克隆在功能基因组学和天然产物挖掘中的应用。最后，我们进一步探讨了这些技术在未来面临的挑战与前景。
authors: Chen Ya-Nan; Cui You-Zhi; Chen Xiang-Rong; Wang Jun-Yi; Li Bing-Zhi; Yuan Ying-Jin
title: Direct cloning strategies for large genomic fragments: A review.
keywords: Natural product; Biomedicine; Direct cloning; Synthetic biology; Biotechnology; Large genomic fragments
translated_title: 综述
abstract: Mining large-scale functional regions of the genome helps to understand the essence of cellular life. The rapid accumulation of genomic information provides a wealth of material for genomic functional, evolutionary, and structural research. DNA cloning technology is an important tool for understanding, analyzing, and manipulating the genetic code of organisms. As synthetic biologists engineer greater and broader genetic pathways and expand their research into new organisms, efficient tools capable of manipulating large-scale DNA will offer momentum to the ability to design, modify, and construct engineering life. In this review, we discuss the recent advances in the field of direct cloning of large genomic fragments, particularly of 50-150 kb genomic fragments. We specifically introduce the technological advances in the targeted release and capture steps of these cloning strategies. Additionally, the applications of large fragment cloning in functional genomics and natural product mining are also summarized. Finally, we further discuss the challenges and prospects for these technologies in the future.
affiliations: Frontiers Science Center for Synthetic Biology and Key Laboratory of Systems Bioengineering (Ministry of Education), School of Chemical Engineering and Technology, Tianjin University, Tianjin 300072, China; Frontiers Research Institute for Synthetic Biology, Tianjin University, Tianjin 30072, China.; Frontiers Science Center for Synthetic Biology and Key Laboratory of Systems Bioengineering (Ministry of Education), School of Chemical Engineering and Technology, Tianjin University, Tianjin 300072, China; Frontiers Research Institute for Synthetic Biology, Tianjin University, Tianjin 30072, China. Electronic address: bzli@tju.edu.cn.

translated_keywords: 节肢动物；特有基因；基因组学；超基因；宏进化；水平基因转移；基因丢失；基因复制
translated_abstract: 当前的测序技术使得生成高度连续的基因组变得相对经济实惠。技术的进步使研究人员能够研究各种基因组变异（如基因获得与丢失）所带来的后果。随着大量高质量基因组数据的可用性，我们评估了这些基因组变异对表型进化的具体影响。我们特别强调，识别感兴趣的基因组变异仅仅是理解其影响的第一步，而建立基因组变异与表型进化之间的因果关系仍需要大量的实验室或野外工作。本文主要聚焦于节肢动物的研究，因为这一门类具有令人印象深刻的表型多样性，同时也是进化遗传学研究的重要对象。本文旨在既突出该领域的最新进展，也为学习进化遗传学和基因组学提供入门指导。
authors: Cheatle Jarvela Alys M; Wexler Judith R
title: Advances in genome sequencing reveal changes in gene content that contribute to arthropod macroevolution.
keywords: Arthropods; Lineage-specific genes; Genomics; Supergenes; Macroevolution; Horizontal gene transfer; Gene loss; Gene duplication
translated_title: 基因组测序的进步揭示了对节肢动物宏进化有贡献的基因内容变化。
abstract: Current sequencing technology allows for the relatively affordable generation of highly contiguous genomes. Technological advances have made it possible for researchers to investigate the consequences of diverse sorts of genomic variants, such as gene gain and loss. With the extraordinary number of high-quality genomes now available, we take stock of how these genomic variants impact phenotypic evolution. We take care to point out that the identification of genomic variants of interest is only the first step in understanding their impact. Painstaking lab or fieldwork is still required to establish causal relationships between genomic variants and phenotypic evolution. We focus mostly on arthropod research, as this phylum has an impressive degree of phenotypic diversity and is also the subject of much evolutionary genetics research. This article is intended to both highlight recent advances in the field and also to be a primer for learning about evolutionary genetics and genomics.
affiliations: Department of Entomology, University of Maryland, College Park, MD, USA. jarvelaa@hhmi.org.; HHMI Janelia Research Campus, Ashburn, VA, USA. jarvelaa@hhmi.org.; Department of Ecology, Evolution, and Behavior, The Hebrew University in Jerusalem, Jerusalem, Israel. judith.wexler@mail.huji.ac.il.

translated_keywords: 基因组组装；克氏锥虫；纳米孔；查加斯病
translated_abstract: 克氏锥虫是查加斯病的致病原，每年导致约一万人死亡。尽管查加斯病的病死率很高，但迄今为止仅有少量的寄生虫基因组被组装完成，甚至一些常用的实验室菌株也缺乏基因组数据。这至少部分归因于克氏锥虫复杂且高度重复的基因组，传统短读长测序方法难以对其进行研究。本研究利用长读长Nanopore测序技术，在无需短读长测序数据辅助的情况下，生成了商业可用的VI型杂交株Tulahuen的高质量全基因组组装。该组装基因组包含25%的重复区域、17%的可变多拷贝基因家族成员以及27%的转座元件（TEs），其质量与同时使用长读长和短读长数据的克氏锥虫基因组组装结果相当。值得注意的是，我们发现含有转座元件的区域显著富集了多拷贝表面蛋白，并且表面蛋白相对于其他编码区更接近转座元件。这一发现表明，转座子等移动遗传元件可能驱动了表面蛋白基因家族内的重组。本研究证明了Nanopore测序技术在解析克氏锥虫复杂基因组区域方面的可行性，并通过这些解析的区域为基因组多样化提供了可能的机制支持。
authors: Hakim Jill M C; Gutierrez Guarnizo Sneider A; Málaga Machaca Edith; Gilman Robert H; Mugnier Monica R
title: Whole-genome assembly of a hybrid Trypanosoma cruzi strain assembled with Nanopore sequencing alone.
keywords: genome assembly; Trypanosoma cruzi; Nanopore; Chagas
translated_title: 仅使用纳米孔测序组装的克鲁兹锥虫杂交株全基因组拼接
abstract: Trypanosoma cruzi is the causative agent of Chagas disease, which causes 10,000 deaths per year. Despite the high mortality associated with Chagas, relatively few parasite genomes have been assembled to date, with genome assemblies unavailable even for some commonly used laboratory strains. This is at least partially due to T. cruzi's highly complex and highly repetitive genome, which defies investigation using traditional short-read sequencing methods. In this study, we have generated a high-quality whole-genome assembly of the hybrid Tulahuen strain, a commercially available type VI strain, using long-read Nanopore sequencing without short-read scaffolding. The assembled genome contains 25% repeat regions, 17% variable multigene family members, and 27% transposable elements (TEs) and is of comparable quality with T. cruzi genome assemblies that utilized both long- and short-read data. Notably, we find that regions with TEs are significantly enriched for multicopy surface proteins, and that surface proteins are, on average, closer to TEs than to other coding regions. This finding suggests that mobile genetic elements such as transposons may drive recombination within surface protein gene families. This work demonstrates the feasibility of Nanopore sequencing to resolve complex regions of T. cruzi genomes, and with these resolved regions, provides support for a possible mechanism for genomic diversification.
affiliations: Department of Molecular Microbiology and Immunology, Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, Baltimore, MD 21205, USA.; Department of International Health, Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, Baltimore, MD 21205, USA.; Asociación Benéfica PRISMA, Lima 15102, Peru.; Infectious Diseases Research Laboratory, Department of Cellular and Molecular Sciences, Universidad Peruana Cayetano Heredia, Lima 15102, Peru.

translated_keywords: 基因功能预测；基因组邻近区域；比较基因组学；蛋白质域
translated_abstract: //bioinfo.sggw.edu.pl/neighborhood_analysis。
authors: Baranowski Bartosz; Pawłowski Krzysztof
title: Protein family neighborhood analyzer-ProFaNA.
keywords: Gene function prediction; Genomic neighborhoods; Comparative genomics; Protein domains
translated_title: 蛋白质家族邻域分析器——ProFaNA。
abstract: Functionally related genes are well known to be often grouped in close vicinity in the genomes, particularly in prokaryotes. Notwithstanding the diverse evolutionary mechanisms leading to this phenomenon, it can be used to predict functions of uncharacterized genes. Here, we provide a simple but robust statistical approach that leverages the vast amounts of genomic data available today. Considering a protein domain as a functional unit, one can explore other functional units (domains) that significantly often occur within the genomic neighborhoods of the queried domain. This analysis can be performed across different taxonomic levels. Provisions can also be made to correct for the uneven sampling of the taxonomic space by genomic sequencing projects that often focus on large numbers of very closely related strains, e.g., pathogenic ones. To this end, an optional procedure for averaging occurrences within subtaxa is available. Several examples show this approach can provide useful functional predictions for uncharacterized gene families, and how to combine this information with other approaches. The method is made available as a web server at http://bioinfo.sggw.edu.pl/neighborhood_analysis.
affiliations: Department of Biochemistry and Microbiology, Warsaw University of Life Sciences, Warszawa, Poland.; Institute of Biochemistry and Biophysics, Polish Academy of Sciences, Warszawa, Poland.; Department of Molecular Biology, University of Texas Southwestern Medical Center, Dallas, Texas, United States.; Department of Translational Sciences, Lund University, Lund, Sweden.

translated_keywords: phenomics; genomics; complex traits; millets; genetic basis; high-throughput; multi-omics; 植物育种; 生物信息学
translated_abstract: 粟米是一类富含小粒种子的作物群体，在营养、环境和经济方面具有重要意义。理解受多种遗传因素影响的复杂性状是农业研究中的重要挑战与机遇。本文综述了表型组学和基因组学在解析这些复杂遗传结构中的变革性作用。在表型组学领域，高通量平台生成了关于植物形态、生理及不同环境下表现的丰富数据集。结合田间试验和控制条件，这些数据有助于解释环境如何与遗传相互作用。基因组学则提供了这些复杂性状的基础蓝图。全基因组测序和基因分型技术揭示了粟米基因组的图景，展示了多样的基因库和进化关系。此外，不同的组学方法揭示了驱动表型表达的基因表达、蛋白质功能和代谢物积累的复杂信息。这种多组学方法对于识别候选基因和阐明调控复杂性状的复杂途径至关重要。本文强调了表型组学和基因组学之间的协同作用。基于基因组信息的表型分析可以针对特定性状，减少育种规模和成本。相反，表型分析可确定用于基因组分析的有前景的种质资源，优先考虑性能优越的变异体。这种动态交互加速了育种计划，并促进了气候智能型、营养丰富的粟米品种及其杂交种的发展。总之，本文强调了表型组学和基因组学在揭开粟米遗传谜团中的关键作用。
authors: Jadhav Yashoda; Thakur Niranjan Ravindra; Ingle Krishnananda Pralhad; Ceasar Stanislaus Antony
title: The role of phenomics and genomics in delineating the genetic basis of complex traits in millets.
keywords: (Auto-generated) phenomics; genomics; complex traits; millets; genetic basis; high-throughput; multi-omics; 植物育种; 生物信息学
translated_title: 表型组学和基因组学在揭示谷物复杂性状遗传基础中的作用
abstract: Millets, comprising a diverse group of small-seeded grains, have emerged as vital crops with immense nutritional, environmental, and economic significance. The comprehension of complex traits in millets, influenced by multifaceted genetic determinants, presents a compelling challenge and opportunity in agricultural research. This review delves into the transformative roles of phenomics and genomics in deciphering these intricate genetic architectures. On the phenomics front, high-throughput platforms generate rich datasets on plant morphology, physiology, and performance in diverse environments. This data, coupled with field trials and controlled conditions, helps to interpret how the environment interacts with genetics. Genomics provides the underlying blueprint for these complex traits. Genome sequencing and genotyping technologies have illuminated the millet genome landscape, revealing diverse gene pools and evolutionary relationships. Additionally, different omics approaches unveil the intricate information of gene expression, protein function, and metabolite accumulation driving phenotypic expression. This multi-omics approach is crucial for identifying candidate genes and unfolding the intricate pathways governing complex traits. The review highlights the synergy between phenomics and genomics. Genomically informed phenotyping targets specific traits, reducing the breeding size and cost. Conversely, phenomics identifies promising germplasm for genomic analysis, prioritizing variants with superior performance. This dynamic interplay accelerates breeding programs and facilitates the development of climate-smart, nutrient-rich millet varieties and hybrids. In conclusion, this review emphasizes the crucial roles of phenomics and genomics in unlocking the genetic enigma of millets.
affiliations: International Crops Research Institutes for the Semi-Arid Tropics, Patancheru, TS, India.; Vasantrao Naik Marathwada Agricultural University, Parbhani, MS, India.; Internet of Things (IoT), Department of Precision Farming, RCP, Navi Mumbai, MS, India.; Division of Plant Molecular Biology and Biotechnology, Department of Biosciences, Rajagiri College of Social Sciences, Kochi, KL, India.

translated_keywords: 基因组资源;家猪与野猪;进化与散布;疾病抗性;生产性能;遗传多样性;样本收集;生物多样性保护;生物信息学;分子生物学
journal: Mammalian genome : official journal of the International Mammalian Genome Society
translated_abstract: 猪（包括家养和野生）存在于除南极洲以外的所有大陆，并为人类提供了重要的食物资源，同时在生物医学研究中也充当了重要模型。基因组测序技术的持续进步使研究人员能够比较来自不同种群的猪基因组，从而有助于阐明其进化与扩散过程。对这些样本的进一步分析可能会为提高家养猪的疾病抗性和生产力提供线索，同时也可能为更好地分类和保护野生及圈养猪的遗传多样性提供更优的方法。然而，从不同种群采集样本是一项资源密集型工作，且可能对濒危种群产生负面影响。本文列出了欧洲和北美收藏机构中丰富的猪组织和DNA样本资源。这些样本曾用于全基因组测序、靶向DNA测序、RNA测序以及简化代表性亚硫酸氢盐测序（RRBS）。这项工作为希望利用已发表数据库的研究人员提供了一个重要的集中资源。
authors: Benjamin Neal R; Crooijmans Richard P M A; Jordan Luke R; Bolt Courtni R; Schook Lawrence B; Schachtschneider Kyle M; Groenen Martien A M; Roca Alfred L
title: Swine global genomic resources: insights into wild and domesticated populations.
keywords: (Auto-generated) 基因组资源;家猪与野猪;进化与散布;疾病抗性;生产性能;遗传多样性;样本收集;生物多样性保护;生物信息学;分子生物学
translated_title: 野生和驯养种群的见解
abstract: Suids, both domesticated and wild, are found on all continents except for Antarctica and provide valuable food resources for humans in addition to serving as important models for biomedical research. Continuing advances in genome sequencing have allowed researchers to compare the genomes from diverse populations of suids helping to clarify their evolution and dispersal. Further analysis of these samples may provide clues to improve disease resistance/resilience and productivity in domestic suids as well as better ways of classifying and conserving genetic diversity within wild and captive suids. Collecting samples from diverse populations of suids is resource intensive and may negatively impact endangered populations.
